zʋya
Kʋdr yɩɩ paalle
A Samayi roga a Mawõ. A Mawõ rag n yaa a Bɛt-Sʋʋr ba. A Kalɛɛb pʋg-rɩkdg a Maaka roga a Sebɛɛr ne a Tɩrana. 
La sĩng fãa b sẽn dag n dɩk n sagl terok fãa pʋgẽ wã, noor ra tʋʋg n yii yɩng sẽn tat kãntɩɩg a yembre. La sĩng fãa noor dag n yaa gilga, t'a yaadmã rag n yaa kãntɩɩg a yembr la pʋɩ-sʋka. La b rag n gʋla nag-teed sĩng fãa noor zugu. La tebendsã rag n yaa magdo, b ka gils ye. Nao-gils a naasã rag n bee kud-paklsã tẽngre, tɩ gãtsã tong ne terokã n yõge. Naoor a yembr fãa zãntlem dag n yaa kãntɩɩg a yembr la pʋɩ-sʋka. 
Tʋʋmdã sɩngrẽ, a Odill WEDRAOOGO/YẼ sẽn be ministɛɛrẽ wã n get kaorengã la buudã goam taoor kẽnde, la segl tɩ b yi so-togs n tɩ bao bãngr la yama, a kosa neb nins sẽn zĩnd tigsgã pʋg tɩ b sak n kõ b mense ne pʋ-peelem, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b seg taaba tõog n wom biisi.
Yaa wakat ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã y seb-gʋnd kaseng sẽn bẽd n pʋʋs karen-saamb dãmbã, karen-biisã, la neb nins fãa sẽn kẽesd b toog kaorengã pʋgẽ wã.
Pag ra bõang n paas a sid ne noogo. Zomb bõang wĩnd-toogo, n zomb bõang soab yʋngo.
Mam ka tol n tall yãmb rũng we-rũng sẽn kʋ nem-begs n wa kɩs yãmb ye. Rẽ fãa yɩɩ maam n bao n lebse. Wagdr sã n dag n zuk yãmb rũng wĩndg bɩ yʋngo, yãmb kɩtdame tɩ mam yao. Wĩndga, tʋʋlg namsa maam, la yʋngo, waood namsa maam! La mam dag n ka tõe n gũs ye. 
La pʋg-yãangã yeelame : «Tɩ sã n ya woto tɛka, ka toog ye.
Tɩ m ba Katr yeel-a yasa : « Ki f ye ! Ki f ye ! Ki f ye ! »
A kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ yellã yãgre, yaa nebã fãa n wa ne-a.
Neb kẽer tagsdame tɩ biribl ka tõe n yɩ rao meng t’a ka reng n gāand pag ye. Yõwã ka sɩd ye !
Pĩim sã n kẽ koẽega bɩ b wõog-a koẽega. Pĩnd n ku la lilgu
Yιι woto tι katr na n lak n bas pυg-yãangã! Bãng-bãnge: Bõe n lam doog n yaool n pa kẽedẽ ? Leoore : Lugri
la wala sẽn gʋls Sebr pʋgẽ, tõnd togsda ninsaal nif sẽn zɩɩ n yãende, t'a tʋbr zɩ n wʋme, t'a sũur nan ka reege, Wẽnd sẽn segl sẽn nong-b bãmba fãa yĩnga. 
Sẽn na n yɩlẽ n paam tɩ koodã tõog n t’a tẽns nins b sẽn dat n kõ wã, b wilgame tɩ b rɩka tõkr ne tẽngã taoor dãmba, sẽn na yɩl n paam tɩ b sõng-ba.
Dẽ, a Eli yeela Baall no-rɛɛsdbã yaa: «Yãmb sẽn yaa wʋsg n yɩɩdã yĩnga, bɩ y yɩ pipi n yãk loalg a yembr n kʋ n maan maoongo, la y pʋʋs ne y wẽnnaamã yʋʋre, la y ra ning bugum ye.» Bãmb dɩka loalg b sẽn kõ bãmbã n maneg maoongã yĩnga. La bãmb pʋʋsa ne a Baall yʋʋr yibeoog hal tɩ ta wĩnto-sʋka. Bãmb dag n kelemdame n yetẽ: «Baalle! Leok-d wɛ!» La bãmb ka wʋm koɛɛga, la ned ka leok me ye. Bãmb dag n bee tẽn-kugrã bãmb sẽn maanã taoor n yɩgd n tiimsdẽ. 
La b maana sãnem nugbĩns a yiib n ning maan-kʋʋd kãsem fuugã bãgd tẽngre zĩig ning sẽbdgã sẽn tong ne fuugã. B baoo wĩ-kẽeg n loe yãoog lutgã nugbĩnsã ne maan-kʋʋr fuugã nugbĩnsã, tɩ yãoog lutgã tõog n tabl maan-kʋʋr fuugã n da lak ye, wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. 
Kay tɩ b wɩta, ta tɩ bɩaal deeg zĩiga.
Bɩ a Aarõ yõog wisd sẽn tar yũ-noog a zugu. Yẽnda na n yõogd-a-la yibeoog fãa, yẽnda sẽn wat n manegd fɩtl-dãmbã wakate. A Aarõ sã n na n yõgen fɩtl-dãmbã zaabre, bɩ a yõog-a. Yaa woto la yãmb na n yõog wisd wakat fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor yãmb zamaan-dãmbã fãa. 
Faarõ bi-puglã yeelame t'a kẽnge. Dẽ, bi-puglã kẽngame n tɩ bool biigã ma. Biigã sẽn bɩ, pagã tall-a lame n tɩ kɩs Faarõ bi-puglã, t'a lebg wa yẽnda meng biiga. Yẽnda pʋda biigã yʋʋr t'a Moyiisi, n yeele: «Bala, mam yaaga yẽnda koom pʋgẽ.» 
Raop sã n zab taaba, n fão pag sẽn tʋt t'a pʋgã sãam tɩ pagã meng yaool n ka ki, bɩ sẽn fão-b pagã yao sẽn zems pagã sɩd sẽn yaoolg bãmb bũmb ningã, wa sẽn zems bʋ-kaoodbã sẽn yeelã. La a sã n ki, nedã na n yao a vɩɩm vɩɩm yĩnga, 
wa n ta n sok-ba: Yeelame tu bõe tι yãmb y yiib fãa boog n zĩ woto? Ned n ka keem la, bι ned n maan kaalem?
Daar a ye masã la katr yιk yã, n pẽgen a kãan-koεεngã,
Wẽnd pãng yɩɩda naam pãnga, la Wẽnd ka ningd naam yãnd ye.
«Yaa m ba n tʋm maam, tɩ m wa mok bugum n wa t’a sẽ sãoore »
Dẽ, bãmb na n kelga fo koɛɛgã. Bɩ foom ne Israyɛll kãsem-dãmbã kẽng Ezɩpt rĩmã nengẽ n tɩ yeel yẽnda yaa: Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Ebre nebã Wẽnnaamã waa tõnd nengẽ. Dẽ, tõnd kota yãmb sor moasã n kẽng rasem a tãab kẽnd we-raoogã pʋgẽ n tɩ maan maoong Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã yĩnga. 
Karen-dotã sẽn pagã kɩtame tɩ karen-biis 700000 baa kaorengo.
Bũmb nins sẽn lebs tʋʋmdã poorẽ, n paase, yaa naam wẽ-n-dɩk ning sẽn zĩnd yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 24 yʋʋm 2022, n lub a Rok naamã.
Tẽeg-y kaool ning b  sẽn maan ne a Abrahaamã yelle, la wẽeneg ning bãmb sẽn wẽen ne a Izakã yelle. 
Bɩ nanamb-kãens kaood nebã bʋʋd wakat fãa. Sã n yaa yel-kãsemse, bɩ b tall n wa fo nengẽ, la bɩ b mens kao yel-bãoonegã bʋʋdo. Sak tɩ b sõng foom n boog f zɩɩbã. Fo sã n maan bõn-kãngã, la Wẽnnaam sã n yeel foom tɩ f maan woto wall woto, fo na n tõoga tʋʋmdã, la nin-bãmbã fãa me na n tõog n ta b zĩigẽ wã ne bãane.» 
Wakat bilf zugẽ, a Yembi tõog n lebg n kẽngda lekɔllã; bãmb baab-bila deega roogã ne b pʋta fãa.
Yaa politik taoor dãmba, nin-zaals lagem-n-taar sula, rog-n-mik taoor dãmba, dĩin taoor dãmba, sodaas buud toor-toor taoor dãmba, la guvɛgneer rãmbã sẽn be Reezẽo rãmbã zãadbã pʋsẽ wã.
A Kenan vɩɩmã zãng yɩɩ yʋʋm kobs-wɛ la piiga, la a kiime. A Yerɛɛd rogmã zugẽ, a Mahalaleyɛll vɩɩmda yʋʋm kobs-nii la pis-tã, la a roga kom-dibli la kom-pugli. 
Baag ne m ba Boɛɛga beem sɩngre
Maam bal n yeel m sũurẽ tɩ m pa na n leb y nengẽ y sũ-sãanga pʋgẽ ye. M sã n gʋls-y y sẽn mi wã, yaa m sẽn pa rat tɩ m waoonga yɩ sũ-sãang ne neb niyns sẽn da tog n pids-m ne sũ-noogo; m mii vẽenega tɩ m sũ-noog yaa yãmb me rẽnda. 
Ned sã n zuk a to naafo, a pesgo, wall a bʋʋg n kʋ, wall a koos-a, a tog n lebsa loalgã soab niig a nu lol-yendã yĩnga, la rũm-bãooneg a naase, peosg a yembre, wall bʋʋg a yembr fãa yĩnga.» 
Bugla ne gernaadã lɩʋʋsa taab n gilg fu-yor-bila noore. Fu-kãng yaa maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem tʋʋmd yĩng wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel a Moyiisã. La b maana sẽbds n kãd-b ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miid sẽn tar tʋʋm-mitbã nug tʋʋmd wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiis t'a maanã. 
A Berekɩya ne a Ɛlkana n dag n gũud koglgã. Dẽ poore, a Davɩɩd ne Israyɛll kãsem-dãmbã la tãb-biis nanambsã rɩka sor n na n kẽng a Obɛɛd-Edom zakẽ wã, n tɩ rɩk Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã ne sũ-noogo. 
Sẽn beẽ n beẽ, a Zozɛf soaalã pag nif rag n bee a Zozɛf zugu, la a yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Wa gãand ne maam!» La a Zozɛf zãgsame n yeel a soaalã pag yaa: «Gese, mam sẽn be mam soaalã nengẽ tɛka, bãmb ka leb n get bũmb baa yembr yell b zakã pʋg ye. Bãmb dɩka bũmb nins fãa b sẽn so wã n ning mam nugẽ. 
A Izak peega a Rebeka n tɩ kẽes-a a ma a Saara fu-roogẽ. La a Izak peega a Rebeka n maan a paga, la a Izak nonga a Rebeka. Woto, a Izak paama belsg wʋsg a ma a Saara kũumã poore. 
Tall-y y rũm-bãoonegã ne y rũm-bɛdã me n looge, wa y sẽn dag n kosã. Kẽng-y la y ning mam me zug barka.» 
Dẽ, nebã fãa rag n pʋgda a Salmo n peebd wɩɩse, la b maand sũ-noog wʋsgo, la bãmb kelemsã rag n kɩtame tɩ tẽngã rĩmda. A Zonatã leoka a Adoniza yaa: «Yaool n ka woto ye! Mam watame n na n togs yãmb tɩ rĩm a Davɩɩd yãka a Salmo n kɩt t'a lebg rĩm n na n led bãmb zĩigẽ. 
A ka zɛt ned nin bãaneg ye
Fo na n kɩtame me, tɩ bõn-vɩɩsã gill fãa wa kẽ koglgã pʋg yiib-yiib n naag foom n paam n vɩɩmde. Fo tog n kẽesa raoog ne yãanga, kãadem-kãadem, wa sẽn zems b buudã sẽn yaa to-to, bõn-yɩgdɩ wã, rũmsã, bõn-bãoonegã sẽn saagd tẽn-gãongã zugã fãa na n waa fo nengẽ, n tõog n vɩɩmde. 
Dẽ, a Zakoob kolga a ba a Izake, t'a saag-a, n bas n yeele: «Koɛɛgã wẽnda a Zakoob koɛɛg wɛ, la nusã yaa a Ezayu nusi.» A Izak sokame: «Fo sɩd yaa mam biig a Ezayu bɩ?» T'a leok tɩ n-yẽe. 
Bɩ y tall lols a yiib n wa kõ-do, tɩ Baall no-rɛɛsdbã yãk loalg ning bãmb sẽn date, n kʋ-a n beese, n dogl a nemdã raad zugu, la b ra ning bugum ye. La mam me na n yõka a yembrã n maan a woto me n palg raad zugu n ka ning bugum ye. Dẽ poore, bɩ y pʋʋs ne yãmb wẽnnaamã yʋʋre, tɩ mam me pʋʋs ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋre. La Wẽnnaam ning sẽn na n leok-a n kɩt tɩ bugum sigã, yaa wẽnnaam-kãng n yaa Wẽnnaam meng-menga.» La nebã fãa yeelame tɩ b sakame. 
Ra lagem neb n maan wẽnga, b sẽn yaa wʋsgã yĩng ye. Ra kɩs kaset kegr bʋʋd wakate, fo sẽn dat n tũ neb wʋsgã yĩng ye. Ra sõng ned bʋʋd zĩigẽ, a sẽn yaa naong soab yĩng ye. 
Waaf la zugu
Seg-taab kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ Asɩɩsnasnallã paka a kʋɩlense rũnda yibeoogã Wagademill sallde kõnferãasã pʋga.
A Davɩɩd tõoga Israyɛll yagsã. Dẽ poore, a Davɩɩd tõoga Filistẽ-dãmbã, n ning-b yãnde, n deeg Gat ne a tẽn-kɩremsã fãa. Wakat ning a Davɩɩd sẽn wa n kẽng n tɩ soog Efrat kʋɩlgã, yẽnda zaba ne a Hadadezɛɛr sẽn yaa Soba rĩmã Hamat tẽngã sẽnẽ, n tõog-a. 
F sã n ta tẽngẽ n wʋm yag-kẽgenga pa põore yaa zõanga
Y buuda da ka buud ye la ad-y y sen lebg Wẽnd buud sõng marsã! Yãmb da ka paamd tɩ b kũm y nimbãaneg ye la ad-b sẽn zoe y nimbãanega marsã. M sẽn nong b rãmb wa fãa fãa, maam n yõkd y sɛɛga, y sẽn ya sãamba la so-toagdba yĩnga, tɩ y zãag y mens ne y yĩnga tʋls wẽns sẽn sogd maoor ne y sɩɩgã. 
Boto, wilgdame tɩ b fãa yaa Burkĩna kamba.
Kibayã kũun sẽn ya bũmb sẽn tõe n sõng zabrã yĩnga, tẽngã taoor soab kos-b lame tɩ b kẽes b toog n sõng tɩ b tõog n zab n deeg tẽngã.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Mam sã n yãnd nin-tɩrs pis-nu sẽn be Sodom tẽngã pʋga, mam na n kõo tẽn-kãng nebã sugr neb pis-nu wã maasem yĩnga.» A Abrahaam leb n yeelame: «Mam leb n maanda raood n na n gom ne Zu-soabã. Mam yaool n yaa tẽng tom, la tompeglem bala. 
Noy sẽn kẽed Pak tigrã wɛɛngẽ. Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Moyiis n yeele: Welg nebã ne rũmsã kom-dẽemsã fãa toor mam yĩnga, bala, Israyɛll bi-ribl-rẽeng ne rũng bi-rẽeng fãa yaa maam n so. 
La a Leya yeelame: «Wẽnnaam yaoo maam, mam sẽn dɩk m yem-poakã n kõ m sɩdã yĩnga.» Dẽ, a pʋda bi-kãng yʋʋr t'a Isakaare . A Leya yeelame: «Wẽnnaam kõo maam kũun sẽn yaa neere. Moasã wã yẽ, mam sɩdã na n paa ne maam, bala, mam doga kom-dibli a yoob n kõ-a.» La a Leya pʋda biigã yʋʋr t'a Zabulõ . 
Sulla a to la b zĩnig yã, sul-kãng na n pʋgdame n get tʋʋmdã, n nan gũud noorã, meng b sẽn na n wa rɩk-a n ning na-kẽnd-paallã pʋgẽ.
Wala ned sã n yãend foo, foom a bãng-n-tɩgame soab, tɩ f rɩt wẽn-naands taoore, b waoogr zĩigẽ, nin-kãng sẽn nan ket n ya koamsã, a tẽebẽ wã, a ka na n tags t'a me tõe n wãba maand nemdo? 
A Aaza rɩka kũun nins a ba wã sẽn welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩngã, ne kũun nins yẽnda mengã sẽn welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩngã, n tall n kẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogẽ wã. Yaa wanzuri, sãnem ne teed buud toor-toore. Zʋʋda rĩm a Aaza ne Israyɛll rĩm a Basa vɩɩmã tɛka, b rag n zabda taaba. 
Tẽnga rãmb baoome n na n bãng SIDAwã  bãag võore
Masã, d toẽ n yeelame tɩ SIDAwã bãag tara nin-kãng soaba. Bãasa  sẽn lebg wʋsga yĩnga kɩtedame t‘a soaba wa baas n ki.
Neb sẽn yaa buud toor-toor neb me n dag n be ne bãmba, la nin-bãmb rag n tara rũm-bãooneg ne rũm-bɛd wʋsgo. 
F sã n bas f rɩẽ yaoore tãnbeok la f tʋkda
Fo sã n yeel biig t'a ra tu bogd tɩ yaa wiisi, t'a yet tɩ yẽ baooda wag-bi bɩ f bas-a
Pondr nong koom la ka ko-tʋʋlg ye
·  A soaba noorã ne a taorã lobda yũyã.
B maana rĩ-tɛɛgã sẽn yaa sõama sẽn wilgd yẽnda welgrã ne sãnem, la b gʋlsa a zug ne kɩtg tɩ yɩ wa bãnde. A gʋlsmã yaa: Welga toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. La b loee yẽnda ne loɛtg sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo t'a zĩnd zug peendã zugu, a wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. 
Bãmb sẽn yi Refidim, bãmb taa Sinayi we-raoogã pʋgẽ n tilg b tãb-sikã we-raoogẽ wã. Israyɛll nebã tilga b tãb-sikã beenẽ, n tees tãngã. 
Togame tɩ neba ges-do wa Krista tʋʋm-tʋmdba la Wẽnd laog ning sẽn solga wã pʋɩtba. Sã n ya maam, m toog ka ne yãmb bʋʋdo bɩ ne ninsaal a to rẽnd ye; yɩɩd rẽ, m ka kaood m meng bʋʋd ye. 
Gãeeng me tara zoa
Fo sã n yã ned ne a rɩɩgẽ bãaga, ra yet-a kõn ta beoog ye.
Mao ne Wẽnnaam sakre. Bala, yĩngã modgr yõod yaa bilfu, la Wẽnnaam sakr bee yõod ne bũmb fãa. A tara vɩɩm ning sẽn be moasã wã kãabgo, la vɩɩm ning sẽn watã yĩnga. Da sak n maan tɩ ned paoog foom f yãadem yĩng ye. Yɩ mamsg neb nins sẽn maand sɩdã yĩnga, ne f noor goamã, ne f kẽnde, ne f nonglem, ne f tẽebo, ne f sõmblem. 
Woto n tõkd naoora tã marsã m sẽn wat y nengẽ. Koɛɛg buud faa ratame tɩ b welg-a ne kaset dãmb a yiib bɩ a tãabo. Yãmb dat n bãnga sã n yaa sɩd tɩ Krista gomda ne m noore? Bãmb yẽ la sẽn ka põnegd-y wã la, bãmb wata yãmb sʋk ne pãng la! 
A Basolma BAAZIE sẽn pak tʋʋmdã tẽngã taoor soab yʋʋr yĩnga, a wilgame tɩ zu-loees nins sẽn be Burkĩna Faso wã kɩtame tɩ koobã la gʋʋlgã leb poorẽ.
A Nowe sɩnga tẽn-gãongã koobo, la a sela  reezẽ tɩɩse . A Kam sẽn yaa Kana nebã yaabã yãnda a ba a Nowe zaalã, n dɩk n yi yɩng n togs a ba-biis a yiibã. 
Tõnd pa le tar gomd ne-b ye».
Dẽ, pagã gãda a Zozɛf fuugã n yeel-a: «Wa gãand ne maam!» La a Zozɛf wudgame n yi n bas fuugã pagã nugẽ. a boola a tʋmtʋmdbã n yeel-b yaa: «Ges-y-yã, b talla Ebre nedã n wa ka t'a na n yaal tõndo! Yẽnda waa mam nengẽ n dat n gãand maam, la mam wɩka m meng n kelme. 
Rĩm a Davɩɩd yik n yalsame yeele: «M saam-biis la m nebã, kelg-y-yã! Mam dag n data ne m sũur fãa, n me roog sẽn yaa vʋʋsg zĩig Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã yĩnga, tɩ yɩ tõnd Wẽnnaamã nao roagendga, la m dag n segendame n na n me-a. La Wẽnnaam yeela maam yaa: ‹Ka na n yɩ foom n na n me roog mam yʋʋrã yĩng ye. Bala, fo yaa ned sẽn zab zaba, la fo raaga zɩɩm wʋsgo.› 
Bi-bɩɩg a ye n paam zu-noogo, tɩ Wẽnnaam ning-a barka, t’a sɩng tolbo, n daad ki, bɛnga, la kood buud toor-toore, n paas ne rũm-bãoonego, n leebdẽ, tɩ sɩd tar barka.
Talla woto, t'a Yellpagindim pag wa roge. A roga bi-ribla. Biig sẽn  tar rasãnde, t'a Yellpagindim ne a pag a Wẽndtõe sũur ya noogo. Yaẽ bũmbu, b pa baoẽ b yamleoog yυυr n pυd-a.
Laog nins fãa ne bũmb nins rĩm a Davɩɩd ne buudã kãsem-dãmb la tãb-biis tusr-tusr ne tãb-biis koabg-koabg nanambse, la tãb-biisã nanambs sẽn dag n welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩngã, yaa Selomot-kãng ne a ba-biisã n dag n get b yelle. Rag n yaa teed b sẽn wʋk zabrã zĩigẽ wã la b yãk n welg toore, Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã manegr yĩnga. 
Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get karengã, la buudã goam taoor kẽnd wilgarõandã yʋʋmdã kaorengã na-kẽndr sẽnya a soaba.
Zĩ-kãens fãa yaa bũmb sẽn dat manegre, la rẽndame tɩ b kẽng ne-a ne tʋʋlem.
 Tɩ kinkirgã gir a zugu. : «Bɩ, m na n tɩ sõng-a lame, n sõd a ligdã, t’a yãk n kõ-ma?»
Karensaamba segd n zẽka a koɛɛg n karem kibara fãa, wala a kɩt tɩ  karembiig fãa karem bilfu t’a to reege. Yãmb na n yãa kibarã sẽn be  karensaamba sebrẽ n naag ne yãmb sẽn tõe n yã-a zĩig ninga karembiiga  sebrẽ.
Ad-y y zug yaa noogo y sã n pʋs n namsdẽ y sõmblema na paas yĩnga; dɩlla da zoe-y rabeem ye la y ra bas tɩ sũur kiuus ye. Y sẽn tog n maane, yaa waoogd Soaala, Wẽnd Nedã, y sũurẽ la rẽ tɩ y bob n yɛsame n na leok sẽn na n soka yãmbã: bõe saagr la y zĩi n saagdẽ? 
Rɩk pe-bila, wall bʋʋg n tek bõang fãa sẽn yaa a ma bi-rẽenga. La fo sã n ka rat n tek bõangã, bɩ f wẽ a kãar n wãage. La fo kom-dibli wã fãa sẽn yaa kom-dẽemsã. Bɩ ned da wa mam taoor ne nug-vɩɩd ye. Tʋm dasem a yoobe, la f vʋʋs rasem a yopoe wã daare. Vʋʋse, baa sã n yaa peseng wakat bɩ tigsg wakate. 
Yʋʋm a 8 loogr poore, neb n ket nan ka paam tɩbsg ye.
Yaa rẽ tɩ Gibo karen-biisã yi n kẽn n wilgi, tɩ b sũur ka noom ne ye.
Bʋ-sadg kĩndi zãmboees n na n yore.
Zʋllã goama, neb koabg pʋga, yaa neb 6 la bal n wʋmd-a la b gomd- n gomda.
A Ezayu sokame yaa: «Fo rat n maana bõe ne rũm-kʋʋng ning mam sẽn segã?» A Zakoob leok-a lame: «Yaa sẽn na n kõ yãmb m soaalã tɩ y tõe n sak n deeg-ma.» Dẽ, a Zakoob leokame: «Ayo! Yãmb sã n sɩd basa maam taale, mam kotame tɩ y sak n deeg kũunã mam meng sẽn kõt yãmbã. Bala, rẽ kɩtame tɩ mam sẽn yãnd yãmb nengã yaa wa mam sẽn yãnd Wẽnnaam neng bala, la wilgdame tɩ yãmb sak n deega maam sõama. 
Ned nan ka sak n koos a meng ne wẽng n maan sẽn ka sõama Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ wa a Akaab sẽn maanã ye. La yaa yẽnda pag a Zezabɛll n kɩt t'a maan woto. Yẽnda maana sẽn yaa wẽng hal wʋsg n yɩɩd fãa. A tũu wẽn-naandse, n waoog-b wa Amoor-dãmbã me sẽn dag n waoogd wẽn-naands tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩt tɩ Israyɛll nebã rig-b n deeg tẽngã. 
Samogembã goama, neb koabg pʋga, ka yɩɩd neb a 2 n dat n gom-a ye.
Ned sã n pa tõe-fo, a lobda f baag kuga
B wilga b sẽn dat tɩ b maan bũmb ninsi, la sard nins b sẽn dɩke, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b fãa ratmã paam pisisgu.
A Ãminat da maanda yɩɩr ne b sẽn na n gãand zĩig ninga la b sẽn da na n dɩ bũmb ninga.
Sẽn paase, fo yĩnga sãn paam sã-pogre, tɩ ned sẽn tar SIDAwã bãag  bil zɩɩm sɩɩs sã-pogrã, a yõkda foo. Mamsego: wala fo zɩɩm sãn sa,  tɩ b rɩk ned sẽn tar SIDAwã bãag bil zɩɩm n kõ foo, a yõkda foo.
La, a yãka yam, n yeel t’a ka na n kʋ naafã zõaag sẽn be zĩig ning ye.
Maan taabl ne akasiya raado. A woglmã tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg a yiibu, a yalmã kãntɩɩg a yembre, a zãntlmã kãntɩɩg a ye la pʋɩ-sʋka. 
naab a Kenaaze, naab a Teman, naab a Mibtsaare, naab a Magdiyɛlle, ne naab a Iram. Woto n yaa Edom soolem nanambsã ne b zĩisi. Yaa a Ezayu sẽn yaa Edom nebã yaabã soolem. 
Yaa bĩisim la m kõ-y pĩnd tɩ y yũ, ka rɩ taok ye tɩ y ra nan ka tõe n deeg sẽn tagem ye. La ne marsã menga y ket n ka tõe n deeg-a ye, 
La a ba Izak sok-a lame: «Yaa ãnda la foom?» T'a leoke: «Mam yaa yãmb bi-kãseng a Ezayu.» 
Bũmb nins fãa bãngd a Sãmwɛll ne a Kiis biig a Sayulli, la a Neer biig a Abneere, ne a Seruya biig a Zoaab sẽn dag n welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩngã, la bũmb nins fãa sẽn dag n welg toorã, rag n yaa a Selomit ne a ba-biisã n dag n get b yelle. A Yitsaar buudã sʋka, rag n yaa a Kenaniya ne a kom-dibli wã la b rag n yãk tɩ b get Israyɛll nimbuiidã yɛl welgr yelle, la b leb n yaa seb-gʋlsdb ne bʋ-kaoodba. 
Dẽe, yẽ wiliga a Poko a sẽn toẽ n maan bũmb niisa n tõog n ges a ma yell tɩ SIDAwã bãag ra yõk-a; la a wilig-a a sẽn toẽ n maan rɩ-nood toto n kõ a ma t‘a rɩ.
Zug n be tɩ geonf beẽ. Zug n maas la yõor niida
Pok baba maana a wãn tɩ SIDAwã bãag wa  tõog n yõk-a? A ma me maana a wãn tɩ  yõk-a?
La naabã yeela wãoorã : « A Ka-yelle sẽn be ka tɛka a zɩ n paoog maam ye. A waoogda nebã fãa, a pa tar a toor yell ye. A nan pa maan bũmb sẽn sek m kʋ-a ye. Nebã meng sãn wʋm yel-kãnga b pa na n kõ maam bʋʋm ye. Woto wã mam na n maan a wãnã. »
Sɩd me, a Davɩɩd dag n yeela woto: Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã kõ b nebã vʋʋsgo, la b na n paa Zeruzalɛm wakat sẽn ka sɛta. Yaa a Davɩɩd yaoolem koe-kãensã zugẽ la b sɩng Leevi nebã sõdbo, sẽn sɩng ne sẽn tar-b yʋʋm pisi la a nu, la sẽn yɩɩd woto. 
Kiuug a nii soabã rasem piig la a nu wã daare, a Zeroboaam maana tigr Israyɛll nebã yĩnga, wa sẽn zems daar ning yẽnda sẽn dag n yãkã. Badaare, yẽnda yõoga wisd tẽn-kugr ning yẽnda sẽn me Betɛllã zugu. 
Seg-taabã sẽn wa n sa, Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor dãmb pẽga Nasẽo zini sullã seb gʋnd-kasenga, a sẽn sak tãrãzisẽo wã na-kẽnda wã, la a yãk yam n na n yãag-b tɩ b zab ne yõ-koglg kaalmã, n paas rɩɩbã, la laafɩ wã wɛɛngẽ wã.
Ninsaal yaa a to tɩɩm
Yaa woto la m gʋls-y tɩ m ket yɩɩga tɩ d sã n wa pẽneg taaba bɩ d bas toolem ne yã; Soaal kõo tõnd pãng kãng manegr yĩnga, ka sãoong yĩng ye. Pʋʋs-y taab neere. Saam-biisa fãa tɩ d pʋʋs y zãnga. 
A Abram yiime n loog wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel yẽnda wã. La a Lot tũu yẽnda n looge. 
Bãmb pa na n sak n maan bũmb sẽn lebsd tẽngã poorẽ ye.
Pag sakame la roog ka ye
Ra tʋʋs Wẽnnaam ye. La f ra kãab f nebã naab wẽng ye. Ra kaoos n yãk f bõn-koaadl dẽenem biisi, wall fo reezẽ rãam sẽn na n deng n yi reezẽ wẽkr koglg pʋgẽ wã ye. La bɩ f rɩk f bi-rẽeng n kõ maam. 
Baag sã n ka ta zãog n zaodẽ, yaa ba-kɩɩnga.
Bõe bãn n wiligd tɩ SIDAwã bãag tara neda?
Badaar bala, a Izak tʋmtʋmdbã wa n togsa yẽnda bulgã bãmb sẽn tu wã yell sẽn yaa to-to. Bãmb yeela a Izak yaa: «Tõnd paama koom.» A Ezayu sẽn wa n tar yʋʋm pis-naase, a peega pagba. Yaa Hɛt ned a Beeri bi-pugl a Zehuditi, ne Hɛt ned a Elon bi-pugl a Basmate. 
Bi-bɩɩg a yembr kibare.
Yaa rasem a yopoe wã sẽn pʋgdã pʋg bal la b na n sɩng-a.
Dẽ, bãmb yãkame n bĩng tɩ ta beoog wa a Moyiis sẽn yeel bãmbã. La rɩɩbã ka põoge, la zũnzũiy me ka kẽ-a ye. 
Bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 19 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Waogd bʋ-kaood ro-kaseng a yiib n soabã kõo sor tɩ b pak yʋʋm 2021 la yʋʋm 2022 soabã bʋʋd kaoob vuk a tãab soaba.
Mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo rog hal wʋsgo, la m na n kɩtame tɩ buud wʋsg yi fo pʋgẽ. La rĩm-dãmb na n yii fo pʋgẽ. Mam na n vigla m kaoolã ne foom, la ne fo yagensã sẽn na n wa pʋgl foom n wa wã, zamaan woo zamaane. Na n yɩɩ kaool sẽn paad wakat sẽn kõn sa. Woto yaa sẽn wilgd tɩ mam na n yɩɩ foom ne f yagensã sẽn na n wa fo loogr zugẽ wã Wẽnnaam. 
La a ka ra maan-kʋʋdbã pʋt ye. Bala, Faarõ rag n yiisa tõog maan-kʋʋdbã sõngr yĩnga, la maan-kʋʋdbã rag n vɩɩ ne bõn-kãnga. Yaa rẽ n kɩte, tɩ maan-kʋʋdbã ka koos b pʋtã ye. A Zozɛf yeela nimbuiidã yaa: «Mam daa yãmb rũndã ne y pʋtã n kõ Faarõ. Reeg-y bõn-buudu, n tɩ bʋd y pʋtã. 
Bao-y yɩɩlle a Pok sẽn tõe n yɩɩl sẽn gomd  SIDAwã bãag sẽn wa ne toog ninga a zaka pʋgẽwã.
Boɛɛg ka yaad ne a land ye.
La Ezɩpt nebã pʋgla Israyɛll nebã n kẽ ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ, yaa Faarõ wiidã ne a saar-dãmbã la a wed-rʋʋdbã fãa. Beoogã vẽegr wakate, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn be sawad-taokã pʋgẽ wã sulgame n ges Ezɩpt rãmba. La bãmb kɩtame tɩ rãmbg zĩnd Ezɩpt rãmbã sʋka. 
A Rasɛll yem-poak a Bila leb n dɩka pʋg naoor a yiibẽ soab n dog a Zakoob bi-ribla. A Leya yem-poak a Zilpa roga a Zakoob bi-ribla. 
Ned pa gãanded ne kũum n pa fẽgs ye
Nebã sẽn yãnd t'a Moyiis kaoosda tãngã zug n ka sigdã, bãmb tigma taab a Aarõ nengẽ n yeel yẽnda yaa: «Maan wẽnnaam n kõ tõnd t'a lʋɩ tõnd taoor n tɛ tõndo. Bala, Moyiis-kãngã, rao ning sẽn yiis-a tõnd Ezɩpt tẽngã, tõnd ka mi bũmb ning sẽn paam-a ye.» 
Bãmb yõka a Abram yao wã biig a Lot sẽn dag n be Sodomã, la b wʋk a teedã n tall n looge. Ned a yembr n zoe n põs n wa togs Ebre ned a Abram yellã sẽn yɩ to-to. A Abram dag n bee Mamre tɩɩsã sʋka. A Mamre yɩɩ Amoor-dãmbã buud neda, n yaa a Ɛskoll ne a Aneer saam-biiga. Bãmb dag n maana kaool ne a Abram. 
Nug-tikr a 5 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR n get tẽngã soog-m-meng zãabo, tẽngã todse, gosneerã tʋʋma, la nug tigsa nins Burkĩna Faso sẽn maan ne tẽns a taabã waoogre.
A Zakoob yikame n kɩt t'a kambã ne a pagbã zomb yʋgma. A Zakoob kãaga a rũmsã fãa, la a wʋk a laogã yẽnda sẽn dag n paama zãnga. Yaa ne rũms nins yẽnda sẽn dag n paam Padan-Aram soolmẽ wã. A Zakoob yiime n loog n na n kẽng a Ba a Izak nengẽ Kana tẽnga. 
Karen-biisã sẽn yi wã ya a Maru Yɩlbʋʋd sẽn ya Gibo Perfe wã la b kɩs b sũ-pa-noaangã sebre, la yẽ me pʋlmame t’a na taas b kosgã tẽngã zãadba.
Yẽsg n gãe pʋg yãanga.
Bãmb tõe n yãka yam tɩ b ka na n le lagm taaba hal tɩ b wa kẽ kãadem ye.
A Akaab rɩka a Nebat biig a Zeroboaam naoor n maan sẽn yaa wẽnga. La sẽn yaa wẽng n yɩɩd fãa, a kẽng n tɩ rɩka Sɩdõ nebã rĩm a Ɛtball bi-pugl a Zezabɛll n maan a paga, n sak n wõgemd wẽn-naandg a Baall taoor n waoog-a. A Akaab mee roog a Baall yĩng Samaari, la a me tẽn-kugr zĩ-kãng a yĩnga. 
B sẽn wa n vʋʋs n lebg n yik baas soab b sẽn boond tɩ deezɛm mitã wã, la a Yisufu Dayo kẽng n tɩ sui, rẽ tɩ b sɩng tãoog a minit 61 yĩnga.
Tɩ Pondr leoke : « Yaa maam ! Wẽnnaam sẽn wa naand tẽngãongã, tẽnga da ra yaa begdo. La wĩndgã yiime n kʋɩɩs begdã t’a lebg kegemd n pus pusi, yaa rẽ la mam sẽn yɩgd n zʋʋsd bogdã.»
Yaa rẽ tɩ karen-biisã ne b ba rãmb yi n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b karen-dotã, la b yãk taoor dãmb karen-saamb dãmb nins sẽn sak n zĩ porvẽesã pʋgẽ sʋka, tɩ kaorengã tõog n kẽng taoore.
Sẽn deng sigra taabo, a Pok baaba maana kaalem.
Yẽnda kẽem-dãmbã yeela yẽnda yaa: «Fo tagsdame tɩ fo na n sooga tõnd bɩ? Bɩ fo tagsdame tɩ f na n yɩɩ tõnd zu-soaba?» La bãmb leb n kisga a Zozɛf n yɩɩg pĩnda, yẽnda zãmsdã ne a goamã yĩnga. A Zozɛf leb n zãmsa zãmsd a to yɛsa, n leb n dɩk n togs a kẽem-dãmbã. Yẽnda yeelame: «Ges-y-yã! Mam leb n zãmsa zãmsdo! Ade, wĩndgã ne kiuugã la ãds piig la a yembr n dag n wõgemded mam taoore.» 
Nugẽ bãngã tʋʋm-teed ka le kẽnd ye.
Katr sẽn  wυm dẽ wã, a yã-raoogã sẽn  ya wala kurg naoorã tol n kelmame t’a yet tι Wẽnd na kõ-d kυυrã raar ne laafι. kυυrã daar yibeoog pĩnda, soaamb yikame n bao tãnd n pãb n wυlg n be a rũmdi, n zĩ a roog noore. Pa kaoose, la a katr sẽn  be waoongẽ, n yet t’a yik tι b kenge.
Yaa rẽ gosneerã, wilg t’a sũur ka yɩ noog ne kibarã ye.
Da leng nin-kẽem ne pãng ye, sagl-a wa a yaa f ba. Maan kom-bɩɩsã wa f ba-biisi, Pʋg‑kõor sã n tar kamb bɩ yagense, bɩ kom-kãens zãms tɩ reng n zoe b meng yirã rãmb nimbãanega, n lebs bãmb bũmb nins b sẽn dag n ges bãmb yell ne wã, bala, manesem-kãng nooma Wẽnnaam. 
ninbuiid katɛk yiime n wilgdẽ tɩ bãmb ratame tɩ Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE lʋɩ tẽnga taoore, la b leb n wilg tɩ rẽndame tɩ b maan nug tikr ne Risi tẽnga rãmba tɩ wa tõog n zab ne yõ-koglg kaalema.
ƐMPESƐƐRÃ rãmb wilga sebr ning b sẽn gʋls tẽngã zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Waogdg Meeri wã rɩka masĩn-dãmb tʋʋm zãmsg n taas lagem-n- taar sula taoor dãmba.
Moog lim koadeng kõn lim a koɛɛga.
Taoor soabã sã n wa tar gɩdgre, yaa taoor soab pʋgdgã n get rẽ.
Ezɩpt tɩtã-rãmb me maana woto ne b tɩɩmã. La Faarõ sũurã riglmame tɩ yẽnda ka kelg bãmb ye. Kell n yɩɩ wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeelã. Faarõ lebg n kuila a yiri, la yẽnda ka ges bõn-kãng wa yell ye. 
Karensaamba yeele: “Bɩ mẽoog la kõsg le yõk a  Abdu.” A “Mẽoog” ne a “Kõsg” kẽ a Abdu yĩnga pʋga. Soda  yenda sẽn keta ka le tõe n dig-b n yiis ye. Dẽe, b kel n gõoda  pʋgẽ bala.
Ninsaal pʋda yir dũmsã fãa yʋyã, la bõn-yɩgdɩ sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã yʋyã, la a pʋd we-rũmsã fãa yʋyã. La ninsaal ka tol n yãnd sõangd sẽn wẽnd yẽnda ye. 
Maan loets pis-nu peend a yembr kɩrenga, la f maan loets pis-nu me peend a yiib soabã kɩrenga. Ning bãmb b yiibã fãa loets tɩ b zems taaba. Maan sãnem sogds pis-nu n sog pɛɛlã ne taaba tɩ b lebg roog a yembre. 
La tãoosã maag a meng n lall n kelgd-b goama. La pʋʋgã soab pagã yeel a taabã :  « D rɩ la d kell m sɩd m ba Tẽedb rũnda.»
Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Moyiis n yeele: A Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã na n yãka koomã be n nudg b nusi la b waas b naoã. 
A kell n bẽda be n pʋʋs Mahamadu YISUF barka, a sẽn maan bũmb nins fãa n sõng Burkĩna ne CEDEAO sullã yẽsg pʋgẽ.
Bala, tẽngã gilli, sẽn da rat-ba, a DAMIB t’a kaoo naamẽ wã ra le waoog ye.
La a Moyiis rɩka maandã zɩɩm pʋɩ-sʋk n ning laas pʋsẽ. La zɩɩmã pʋɩ-sʋk sẽn kellã, yẽnda rɩk-a-lame n mes tẽn-kugrã. Rẽ, yẽnda rɩka kaoolã sebr n karem tɩ nebã kelge. La nebã yeelame: «Tõnd na n sak n maana bũmb nins fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel tõndã.» 
La, m ba a Katr yeela a pagã : «Ad nemdã yaa noog dɛ».
yɩɩ wakat gosneerã taor soab sẽn kell n wilg tɩ b zĩniga tẽn-gubri, t’a sɩngd zaabr wakat a yoobe n ta yibeoog wakat a yoobe.
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam wʋma bãmb yãbrã, n tẽeg kaool ning bãmb sẽn dag n maan ne a Abrahaam la a Izak ne a Zakoobã yelle. Wẽnnaam gesa Israyɛll nebã, la Wẽnnaam bãnga b namsgã. 
Senufã goama, neb kobg pʋga, yaa neb a 2 bal n gomd-a.
A Eli leoka pʋg-kõorã yaa: «Ra zoe rabeem ye! Kẽng n kuil n tɩ maan wa fo sẽn yeelã bala. La bũmb ning sẽn be, reng n segl rɩɩb bilf n wa kõ maam, la f yaool n kẽng n tɩ segl foom ne f biigã yĩnga. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yetame: ‹Zom ning sẽn be rʋkẽ wã ka na n sɛ ye. La kaamã sẽn be lengrẽ wã me kõn sɛ, hal tɩ ta daar ning maam a Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn na n kɩt tɩ saagã ni tẽng zugu.› » 
Bãmb leb n yeela a Abram yaa: «Mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, maam n yiis foom Ʋʋr tẽngã sẽn be Kalde rãmbã soolmẽ wã, n wa kõ foom tẽn-kãngã tɩ f sooge.» A Abram leokame: «Zu-soab a Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, bõe n wilgd tɩ mam na n sooga tẽngã?» 
A Zimri kũumã zugẽ, Israyɛll nebã welga taab zĩis a yiibu. Israyɛll neb kẽer dag n datame t'a Ginat biig a Tibni lebg Israyɛll rĩmã, tɩ kẽer me rat t'a Omri yɩ rĩmã. Neb nins sẽn be a Omri poorẽ wã pãng yɩɩga a Ginat biig a Tibni poorẽ dãmbã, la b kʋ a Tibni t'a Omri lebg Israyɛll rĩmã. 
ƐMPESƐƐRÃ rãmb wilga sebr ning b sẽn gʋls tẽngã zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Tʋm-tʋmd maagda karg, la a ka maagd sũur ye.
Rao wã yeelame : «Wa tɩ d rɩ, la d kell m ba sɩd a Tẽedba.»
Walg na zè t'a biig keoose?
B leb n kẽnga taoor n wilg b su-pa-noaang ne ƐRƐFI kiba-kɩtã sẽn wilg a sõasgã baoosgẽ tɩ yaa bu-welsg la Burkĩna Faso rãmb sẽn maandã, la a na n waa ne zabr sẽn pa na n tol n sa.
A Natã biig a Azariya n yaa kombɛɛmbã taoor soaba. A Natã biig a Zabuud n dag n yaa rĩmã maan-kʋʋda, n yaa rĩmã meng zoa. Rĩm a Salmo rag n tara kombɛɛmb piig la a yiib Israyɛll soolmã fãa pʋgẽ. Yaa bãmb n dag n get rĩmã ne a zakã rãmb rɩɩb yelle. La yʋʋmd pʋgẽ, bãmb ned kam fãa rag n tog n dɩlga rĩmã zakã kiuug a yembre. 
A pʋgẽ, tẽngã naab tõe n yɩɩ sodaaga, bɩ nin-zaalga.
Yãmb mii neere Soaal a Zezi Krista ne b kõt yaarã. B sẽn da ya arzɛk soaba b lebga naong soab tõnd yĩnga la woto b naonga lɛɛg n pidsa tõnd ne arzɛka. Dɩlla yaa saglg bala la m kõt yãmba la wã n tog ne yã tɩ yãmb n deng neba fãa rɩẽ, n tags tʋʋmd kãng yelle la y sɩng-a. 
B kẽes b mens tɩ b wa n ka tõog-b fasɩ me, bɩ b koms b raoodã.
La Abrahaam leokame: «Gũus f meng n da wa peeg mam bi-riblã n leb tẽng ning mam sẽn yiẽ wã ye! 
Yẽnda maana taabl ne akasiya raado. A woglem yaa kãntɩɩg a yiibu, a yalem yaa kãntɩɩg a yembre, la a zãntlem yaa kãntɩɩg a ye la pʋɩ-sʋka. Yẽnda maana sãnem tuiids a naas sẽn yaa gilsi, n ning bãmb a nao a naasã fãa sokr zĩisẽ. 
La bɩ f bolga a pʋgã ne a yɩngã ne sãnem halaale. La f maan kogsr sẽn yaa sãnem n gilg a zugã. Rõog sãnem tuiid-gils a naas n ning bãmb a kɩrems a naasẽ wã. Ning tuiids a yiibã kɩreng a yembre, la f ning tuiids a yiibã me a kɩreng a to wã. 
La a Moyiis lebg n leba Sẽn-Ka-Saab nengẽ n tɩ yeele: «M Zu-soabã, m kãntɩɩga! Nin-kãensã maana yel-wẽn-kãsenga. Bãmb maana sãnem wẽnnaam b mensã yĩnga. Baoosgo, kõ-y bãmb b yel-wẽnã sugri. La yãmb sã n ka na n kõ bãmb b yel-wẽnã sugri, m kotame tɩ y yẽes mam yʋʋrã yãmb sẽn dag n gʋls yãmb sebrã pʋgẽ wã.» 
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 28 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Polɩɩs Minisipallã paga baar dãmb a 5 Arõndiisma a 3 ne a 4 pʋgẽ.
Rat n yeel tɩ milyaar 31 la b segd n yãk komindã koglgẽ, tɩ b pak-n-taag paas a 5 sẽn ketã.
Sẽn sɩng ne wakat ninga a Potifaar sẽn kɩt t'a Zozɛf lebg yẽnda zakã yel-gɛt n get yẽnda bũmbã fãa yellã tɛka, Sẽn-Ka-Saab ninga Ezɩpt nedã zak bark a Zozɛf zug maasem yĩnga. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab barkã rag bee a Potifaar sẽn so bũmb nins fãa wã zugu, ne a zakã pʋga, la bũmb nins sẽn be weoogẽ wã me zugu. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 12 sẽn loogã, sull ning sẽn sigl kẽndã taoor dãmb sega kiba-kɩtbã n wilg b sẽn tagsd bũmb ning Reezẽo de lɛs zugu, la b kos tẽngã taoor dãmb tɩ b puk b nin n ges tɩ karen-biis sõor sẽn ta tus 100000 n be Reezẽo wã pʋg n dat n leb b karen-dotẽ wã.
Sũ-sãong kãng yaa wa pɔglogo b sũyã pʋsẽ. A wa tõnd sẽn  sɛgd n yiis rẽgd n d nõdã pʋsã, woto me, tõnd sɛgd n yiisa toogã d sũurã  pʋgẽ.
La tõnd yeela yẽnda tɩ tõnd yaa sɩd dãmba, la d ka tẽn-gũusdb ye. La d yeel-a lame me tɩ tõnd yaa tõnd piig la a yiibu, la tõnd fãa yaa ned a yembr kamba, la tõnd yao a yembr n ka leb n be ye. La d yeel-a t'a yembr n pa ne tõnd baaba wã Kana tẽnga. 
A Zoaab yãame tɩ zabrã yaa zĩis a yiibu, poorẽ la a taoore. Dẽ, yẽnda yãka Israyɛll tãb-biis nins sẽn ya-b gãndaadã, tɩ b na n na n teedg n zab ne Siiri nebã, A Zoaab yeela a Abisayi yaa: «Siiri nebã sã n wa rat n tõog maam, bɩ f wa sõng-ma. La Amo nebã sã n wa rat n tõog foom, mam me na n wa sõnga foom. 
A yaa na-kẽndre, sẽn na n sõng kom-bɩɩbã, la neb nins sẽn zoe n bas b tẽnsã tɩ b tõog n paam tʋʋm tẽn-kɩrensã pʋsẽ.
Pãng sãn tũũd sore, bʋʋm bʋta moogo.
Leokre: ya a sẽn da gãe roogẽwã n ka le tʋmdẽ wã. A waglame, n ka le  tar pãng n deemd ne a kamba ye
Tõnd segd n talla loaleng tɩ zind tõnd sẽn  zoe n mi bũmb niisã ne tõnd sẽn na zãmsed būmb niisa sʋka.
M sẽn deeg Zʋɩf rãmba nengẽ kaas pistã la a wɛ — a ye bal n ka pisnaase — yaa naoor a nu. Sor zug yaams yɩɩ ka tɛka; ad kʋɩlsa gɩdgre, ad so-gɩtba, ad saam-biisi, ad bu-zẽmba, ad tẽng pugẽ yel-pakre, ad we-raoog rẽnna, mogr dẽnna, ad buuda neb zãmbo, 
Nin-buiidã kell n yalsame n tɩ tãag b sẽn dɩk noor n yãk tẽn-gubri.
A lar paam saasa, n bool a kutoaag yalma.
A Moyiis rʋʋ Sinayi tãngã zugu. Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Kẽng nebã nengẽ n tɩ kɩt tɩ b yɩlg-b rũndã ne beoogo, la b pegs b futu. Bɩ b segl b mens rasem a tãabẽ soabã yĩnga. Bala, rasem a tãabã daare, Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n siga Sinayi tãngã zug nebã fãa nifẽ. 
Sũur kʋʋdame tɩ bõn gʋse.
Dẽ, Faarõ yeelame: «Mam na n basa yãmb tɩ y kẽng we-raoogẽ wã n tɩ maan maoong n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaam, la bɩ yãmb da kẽng zĩ-zãrgẽ ye. Pʋʋs-y Wẽnnaam mam yĩnga.» 
Ned kõn zao will, la f kẽed-a ye
Tɩ bala, sig-noy kiuug yʋʋm 2021 Fãrense, la Bɛlzik kiba-kɩtb la b rig yã, tɩ b rat n tiisa gosneem tʋʋma.
La a Labã sãda beoogo, n mogs a kom-pugli wã ne a kom-dibli wã, la a ning-b barka. Rẽ zugẽ, a Labã lebg n kuila a yiri. A Zakoob kell n dɩka a sor n looge. La Wẽnnaam malɛgs n seg-a. 
Rĩm a Salmo tʋmame tɩ b kẽng Tɩɩr n tɩ bool a Hiram. A Hiram leb n maana nag-teed a taab ne zũud n ning pugli wã zutu. Yaa gãmba sẽn yaa neeba. La pugl fãa rag n tara nag-teed a yopoe. 
Paoogr nobda yalem n faag mita
A Saadu Ganaba ne a karen-bi-taasã raab yaa karen-dotã tõog n lebg n pake.
La, a wa n zẽka a nenga, n yã kinkirga, sẽn zĩ n sõt a ligdi.
Ɛrtebe televisẽo wã ra pa pa le kõt n ye.
La yambã sã n yeel t'a nonga a zu-soabã ne a pagã, la a kambã, tɩ la a ka rat tɩ b kõ-a lohorem t'a yi, bɩ a tall-a n wa Wẽnnaam taoore, n kɩt t'a kolg kʋɩlengã, wall lugrã sɛɛgẽ t'a zu-soabã vʋdg a tʋbrã ne pĩim. La yẽnda na n kell n yɩ a zu-soabã yamb a yõor tɛka. 
A Nimrood yii beenẽ n kẽng Asʋʋre, n tɩ tilg Niniiv tẽngã, ne Rehobot tẽngã, ne Kala tẽngã, ne Patroos la Kaslu buudã, yaa bãmb sʋk la Filistẽ-dãmbã ne Kaftoor-dãmbã yi yã. 
Vugr bala, a zõond n kelmame n kell n menem zĩig pυgẽ.
 B zoe n tɩ kẽe tãng bokẽ, n na n sool saagã.
B sã n deeme, b na n yãame».
Daar a yembre, a Adoniza kẽnga Zowelɛt pĩigã sẽn be Rogɛll ko-bundgã noorã sɛɛg n tɩ maan rũm-bãoonego, ne rũm-bɛd maando, la ne rũm-nobds buud toay-toaya. Dẽ, yẽnda boola a yaopã fãa sẽn yaa rĩmã kom-dibli wã, la a bool Zʋʋda nebã sẽn yaa rĩmã tʋmtʋmdbã. La yẽnda ka bool Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Natã ne a Benaya, la rĩmã gãndaadã ye. A leb n ka bool a yao a Salmo me ye. 
Ned sã n yet t'a na n kõ-f kuirga, ges a sẽn tare
Efrayiim buudã pʋgẽ, yaa a Azaziya biig a Ooze n yaa b naaba.  A Manaase buudã pʋɩ-sʋk a yembr pʋgẽ, yaa a Pedaya biig a Zowɛll n yaa b naaba. Dan buudã pʋgẽ, yaa a Yerokam biig a Azareyɛll n yaa b naaba.  Nin-bãmbã fãa n yaa Israyɛll buudã nanambse. 
Rĩm a Salmo ninga serubẽ-rãmb a yiibã ro-taoorã sẽn yaa zĩig sẽn welg toor n yɩɩdã pʋgẽ. Serubẽ a yembr fãa pɩgsr tika roogã lalga, la bãmb b yiibã pɩgs teega taab roogã sʋka. Rĩm a Salmo kɩtame tɩ b pees roogã lalgã raadã, la a pʋgẽ wã ne a yɩngã, b naana serubẽ-rãmba, la komse, ne tɩ-puud sẽn yaa neeb raadã zug n gilg zĩigã fãa. 
Biiga a Ka-yelle
A Leevi kamb yaa a Gerson, a Kehat ne a Meraari. A Zʋʋda kamb yaa a Ɛɛre, a Onan, a Sela, a Perɛtse, ne a Zerake. La a Ɛɛr ne a Onan kii Kana tẽnga. A Perɛts kamb yaa a Ɛtsron ne a Hamulli. 
Ad a Disan kamba: Yaa a Uts ne a Aran. naab a Dison, naab a Ɛtsɛɛre, ne naab a Disan. Yaa bãmb n yaa Hoor nebã nanambse, n be Seyɩɩr soolmẽ wã. 
A Moyiis yeelame: «Ade, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame: ‹Yʋn-sʋkã, mam na n pɩʋʋga Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋga. La Ezɩpt kom-dẽemsã fãa na n kiime. Yaa sẽn sɩng ne Faarõ sẽn zao a naam geerẽ wã bi-rẽenga, hal n tãag yem-pogsã sẽn be neerẽ n werdã kom-dẽemse, ne rũmsã kom-dẽemsã fãa. 
Ad-b sẽn gʋlse: Yaa Siõ tãng zug la m vigĩnd kuga ma, kugr m sẽn tũusi, kugr sẽn be neere la ned ninga fãa sẽn na n teeg kugr kãnga kõn yãe yãnd ye. Yãmb tẽedba yĩnga a na wa ne y pẽgre; sã ya kɩɩsdbã, b bãng tɩ kugr ninga metba sẽn bas kɛɛngã, yẽ n lebg kuga ma, 
Da sak-y yoob wala bãmb kẽer sẽn sake, tɩ bãmb tus pisi la a tã na n ki daar a ye wã ye. Da kʋɩɩb-y Soaala wa bãmb kẽer sẽn kʋɩɩb-ba tɩ wiis kɛ-b n kʋ wã ye. 
Kẽng yẽnda nengẽ beoog yibeoogo, wakat ning yẽnda sẽn na n kẽng koomã noorã. Kẽng n tɩ yaas be n seg yẽnda Nill kʋɩlgã noore. La bɩ f zã dasaar ning sẽn dag n lebg waafã f nugẽ. 
Koomã, yaa sẽn na n tar n walgd zĩigã, tɩ wubsgã ra yikdẽ ye.
Katr ne baag beem ka tõe n sa ye
A Moyiis yeela a Aarõ yaa: «Yeel Israyɛll zama wã fãa yaa: ‹Kolg-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore. Bala, bãmb wʋma yãmb yẽgengã.› » La a Aarõ sẽn wa n ket n gomd ne Israyɛll zama wã, bãmb wẽnemda b nens n tees we-raoogã sẽnẽ. La ade, Sẽn-Ka-Saab ziirã puka sawaodg pʋgẽ. 
la a Basmat sẽn yaa a Ismayɛll bi-pugla n yaa a Nebayot tão-poakã. La a Oholibama roga a Yewuusi, a Yalam ne a Koore. Bãmb yaa a Ezayu kom-dibli nins a sẽn dog Kana soolmẽ wã. 
A Izak yika beenẽ n kẽng Bɛɛr-Seba. Badaar yʋngo, Sẽn-Ka-Saab puka b meng ne yẽnda n yeele: «Mam yaa fo ba a Abrahaam Wẽnnaam, da zoe rabeem ye. Bala, mam bee ne foom. Mam na n ninga fo zug barka, n kɩt tɩ fo yagensã fɩɩg n lebg wʋsgo, mam tʋmtʋmd a Abrahaam zug maasem yĩnga.» 
La sẽn paase, mam wʋma Ezɩpt nebã sẽn kẽes Israyɛll nebã yembd tɩ b yãbdã, la mam tẽega m kãabgã. Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ f yeel Israyɛll nebã tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, la m na n yiisa Israyɛll nebã tʋʋm-wɛgl nins Ezɩpt nebã sẽn modg bãmb tɩ b maanã pʋgẽ. La mam na n fãaga bãmb n yiis-b yembd ning pʋg Ezɩpt nebã sẽn kẽes bãmbã. Yaa kang sẽn tar pãng la mam na n tẽeg n fãag yãmba. La mam na n sɩbga bãmb ne sɩbgr sẽn yaa kãseng n fãag yãmba. 
Wʋg pɛɛl piig la a yembr ne bʋʋs kõbdo, n lud fu-roogã yĩngrã. Peend fãa woglem tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg pis-tã, la a yalmã tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg a naase. Pɛɛl piig la a yembrã yalem tog n zemsa taaba. 
A Daooda GƐLLO, wa n wilgame t’a yiis a meng wags-taabã pʋgẽ.
Dẽ, a Natã sokame yaa: «N-na! Rẽ yĩnga, yaa yãmb n kõ noor tɩ b maan bũmb a woto, n yaool n ka reng n togs yãmb tʋmtʋmdã sẽn tog n wa led yãmb zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã sɩda?» La rĩm a Davɩɩd yeelame: «Mam wẽenda ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn vɩ wã, soab ning sẽn dag n fãag-a maam m sũ-sãangã pʋgẽ wã, 
La, bʋʋgã soab sẽn mi a yellã yĩnga, a ka bao n na n bʋ ne-a ye.
Tãab soaba, gosneema tʋʋm yalsame.
Miniisr Basolma BAAZIE wilgame tɩ sapaol-koobã, la gʋʋlgã wɛɛngẽ zu-loees ka be ye.
«Maan fu-yerd n kõ a Aarõ kom-dibli wã. La f maan sẽbds ne pugli me n kõ bãmba, sẽn na n wilg tɩ b tara b zĩiga la b ziiri. 
a Koore biig a Yitsaare, a Yitsaar biig a Keyate, a Kehat biig a Leevi, a Leevi biig a Israyɛlle. t'a Malkiya yaa a Ɛtni biiga, t'a Ɛtni yaa a Zeera biiga, t'a Zeera yaa a Adaya biiga, 
Sιd yιι woto, t’a Yellpagindim yι zok-zok-zoke, n wa ta n wõgemd n pυυse, la a soke: N-Naa! Tι yãmb n boonde? M waame. N-naa!
Rɩ n yãag pʋg pa rigd beoog kom ye
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE, leb n sigla, sodaas sula a yoobe.
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ b kot nin-buiidã tɩ b kõ-b sɩda, tɩ bala yaa bũmb nins fãa sẽn sõngd tẽngã t’a kẽnd taoor la bãmb rata.
Sok-y-ã neba fãa. Bũmb sã n paoog bɩ y paase.
Rẽ n so tɩ b gʋls b su-pa-noaang sebr n wa kõ taoor dãmbã, tɩ b sõng-ba, tɩ b tõog n paam karen-saamb dãmba, Reezẽo pʋgẽ, la b paas yõ-koagendbã sõor Kõngũs ne Gibo sorã zugu.
A le wa n yeela a biigã t’a sã, tɩ biigã sã, tɩ zõos ka wa ye, t’a yeele, tɩ marsã, naafã kʋʋb zĩig taame.
Raoa a ye n da be tẽng a yembr pʋgẽ. La raoa da nonga pagbã wʋsgo. Ned bi-neer bɩ a pʋg neer ka pɩʋʋgd-a taoor ye. al tɩ sakã, tẽnga éa tẽn-yagsã fãa wa gomd-a zĩndi-ta la a kõb- wẽndlmã yelle.
Hagaar buudã ned a Yaziiz n dag n get rũm-bãoonegã yelle. Yaa nin-bãmbã fãa n dag get rĩm a Davɩɩd laogã yelle. A Davɩɩd zakã nebã. A Davɩɩd yɛsb a Zonatã rag n yaa sagenda. A Zonatã rag n yaa ned sẽn tar bãngre, la a rag n yaa gʋlsda. A Hakmoni biig a Yekiyɛll n dag n get rĩmã kamb yelle. 
B Barãmba kuum zugẽ, bõe rabeem n da tar a  Pok ne a yaopa?
A sẽn wa n na n bãngã, yaa bõnyẽeg sẽn tir n yaase. Katr sẽn wẽneg n maag a yĩng n gese, a mikame tι yιιda peosgo: yaa we-naab menga. T 'a wẽ fuss..., n kυι tĩiga, n fãood beoosã la tuudã, n baood a menga.
A Eli mengã kẽna daar tõr we-raoogã pʋga, la a tɩ zĩnda tɩɩg tẽngre, la a kosa kũum n yeele: «Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, moasã wã, mam yaa n yɛɛme. Reeg-y m vɩɩmã tɩ mam ka yɩɩd m yaab-rãmbã ye.» A Eli sẽn gese, a mikame tɩ bur sẽn wʋm kug-tʋʋls zut rɩg a sɛɛgẽ, tɩ koom ne yubl tẽga. La a rɩɩme la a yũ, n lebg n gãande. 
Zu-noogo, SIDAwã bãaga bil ka yõk a Yõdi ye.
Rɩk zũud n maan tẽn-kugrã teed fãa, maan laas sẽn tar n wʋkd tompeglem sẽn lagem ne kaam, la pɛll-dãmb ne maoong zɩɩm laase, la nemd kõsds ne bugum laase. Maan a teedã fãa ne zũudu. 
Katr daaga, baag kṍn kẽng ye
La Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis t'a yeel a Aarõ yaa: «Rɩk f dasaarã n tẽeg f nug Ezɩpt soolmã koom zugu. La bãmb kʋɩlsã ne b Nill kʋɩlgã ko-soayã, la b bãgsã, ne bãmb zĩis nins fãa b sẽn bĩngd b koomã, koom na n lebga zɩɩm. Zɩɩmã na n zĩnda ko-yũus nins fãa sẽn be Ezɩpt soolmã fãa pʋgẽ wã pʋse, baa ne b sẽn maan-b rãmb ne raad la kugã.» 
Koadeng yeelame tɩ yõor la gɛla.
Kom-kãsengã rag n bee zĩiga fãa. Dẽ, a Zozɛf pagsa bao wã fãa, n koos koodã ne Ezɩpt tẽngã nebã. La komã wa n lebgda toog wʋsg Ezɩpt soolmã pʋg n paasdẽ. La nebã rag n yita dũniyã zĩisã fãa pʋs n wat Ezɩpt tẽng n daad koodã a Zozɛf nengẽ. Bala, kom-kãsengã rag n kẽe dũniyã gill fãa. 
A karma Dõosẽ Lekolẽ wã, n paam a bãngr kaset sebr b sẽn boond tɩ sɛtfika wã yʋʋm 1978 soabã.
 Hal tɩ saka neba, tẽngã la tẽn-yagsã fãa, wa gomd a zĩnd-n-ta-kõb-wẽndlmã yelle.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Yãmb sã n sak Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã koɛɛg neere, yãmb sã n maan sẽn tat bãmb yam, yãmb sã n yok y tʋb n kelg bãmb noyã, la y sã n sak bãmb no-tũudsã fãa, mam kõn lobg yãmb ne bãas nins fãa mam sẽn lobg Ezɩpt nebã ba a yembr ye. Bala, mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn maagd yãmba.» 
Zabr be beoog ka fãrgd weef ki ye
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam yeela yẽnda yaa: «Ade, rɩk f biigã, fo bi-ribl-yendã, a Izak fo sẽn nongã, n kẽng Moriiza, la f sã n ta beenẽ, bɩ f rɩk-a n maan maoong sẽn yõogd bugum tãng ning mam sẽn na n wilg foomã zugu.» 
Maam n pa so m meng bɩ bõe? Maam n pa Soaala tʋʋm-tʋmd bɩ bõe? Maam n pa yãend Soaal a Zezi bɩ bõe? M tʋʋmdã sẽn paam yõod Soaala nengẽ wã, ka yãmb laa? 
La Wẽnnaam goma ne b no-rɛɛs a Semaya n yeel-a yaa: tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame yaa: Bɩ y ra kẽng n tɩ zab ne y saam-biisã sẽn yaa Israyɛll nebã ye! Bɩ ned kam fãa lebg n kuil a yiri, bala, yaa maam n kɩt tɩ yellã yɩ a woto.» Bãmb saka Sẽn-Ka-Saab koɛɛgã n maan wa b sẽn yeelã n lebg n kuili. 
 B sẽn ta yiri, wa tar sõasg yasa, rao wã le yeelame : «Wa tɩ d rɩ, la d kell m sɩda m ba Tẽedba.»
A ned ka kõata, bɩ a belem Wẽnde.
Burkĩna Faso gosneerã sõoga ƐREFI ne Zend afirik rãmb nugu.
Tãb-biis baoo yẽnda noore,  la b tãoo yẽnda ne pɛɛma. Yẽnda bɛɛbã rag n yaa tãb-tãoodba. La yẽnda kell n gãda a tãpã kãenkãe.  A Zakoob pãng-soabã paasa yẽnda nusã pãnga. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ yẽnda lebg pe-kɩɩma, n yaa Israyɛll pĩig kugr sẽn tar pãnga. 
Ned sẽn dɩk a pẽk n tek doore
Bao-y leokra kibara pũga. Yãmb maana a wãn n bãng t’a Pok baaba ka  keeme?
la b kẽe koglgã pʋg kãadem-kãadem n naag a Nowe, raoog ne yãanga, wa Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n yeel a Nowe wã. La saagã nii dũniyã zug rasem pis-naase, la yʋnd pis-naase. 
B koeesa pʋga, b wilgame tɩ tẽnga na-kʋdr soa a meng masa, la a segd n maana tʋʋm kẽer ne tẽnga taoor dãmb nanda, tʋʋm bãmb poor la na n yaool n wa seg pagtɩ wã rãmba tɩ b tõog n paam kibaya fãa n bãnge.
A Davɩɩd yeelame: Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã zĩig na n yɩɩ zĩ-kãngã, la yaa ka la b na n maan tẽn-kugr ning Israyɛll nebã sẽn na n maand maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã. A Davɩɩd segenda Wẽnd doogã meebo. A Davɩɩd kɩtame tɩ b tigim sãamb nins sẽn dag n be Israyɛll soolmã pʋgẽ wã, n kɩt tɩ kug-pɛɛsdb pees kug-bɛd Wẽnnaam doogã meeb yĩnga. 
Yaa rẽ t’a kotẽ, tɩ ned kam fãa mao n wa ne na-kẽndre, sẽn tõe n tũ, n waoog Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã raabo.
A koeesã pʋgẽ, a wilgame tɩ rẽndame tɩ nin-sablsã mens yik n zab n fãag b mense la b ra gũ tɩ sõngr yi zĩig a to n wa ye.
bɩ y welg biig fãa sẽn yaa a ma bi-rẽenga, la ne yãmb rũmsã kom-dẽems nins fãa sẽn yaa raadã n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Raadã fãa yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n so. 
Zĩ-kãnga, a Rooze WEDRAOOG kos-b lame tɩ b sã n wa yã tɩ polɩɩs tʋmd ninsaal yam daab tʋʋmd bɩ b ning pãng tɩ ta b taoor dãmbã.
Tikrã pʋga, b wilga ligd sõor b sẽn na n dɩk n tʋm yʋʋm 2023 soabã pʋgẽ.
Fo sẽn na n dɩt n ka tɩgd,tɩ b naag-f ne baase.
Kell n kosame tɩ nebã me sak n kẽes b toogo, tɩ zabrã yaa sẽn na n fãag tẽngã.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã zĩnda saasẽ n bool a Abrahaam naoor a yiibẽ soaba. Malɛɛkã yeelame: «Mam wẽenda ne m menga! Yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab koɛɛga. Fo sẽn maan bõn-kãngã n ka zãgs tɩ f ka na n kõ maam f biigã sẽn yaa fo bi-ribl-yendã, 
A Saadu Ganaba sẽn ya Gibo karen-biisã taoor soab rɩka koɛɛg n wilg tɩ bãmb sẽn yi wã, yaa sẽn na n wilg Burkĩna Faso tẽngã zãadba, tɩ hal kaorengã yikr n tãag bãmb sẽn kẽndã, b karen-dotã ket n pagame, b leb n pa tar karen-saamb dãmb ye.
Yaa zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 yʋʋmdã la karen-biisã fãa kaoreng sɩngre.
Ges-y-yã! Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn kõ yãmb vʋʋsg daarã yĩng n kɩte, tɩ bãmb kõt yãmb dasem a yiib rɩɩbo, rasem a yoobã daare. Bɩ ned kam fãa kell n pa a zĩigẽ n da yi rasem a yopoe wã daar ye.» 
B kuda sãnem tɩ lebg faasga, n bẽes tɩ lebg wa gĩsi. La b kalma sãnemã ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miid la lamd gĩs-bãanega, n wʋge, n kãd t'a yaa wa tʋʋm-mit sẽn tʋme. B maana bãg-tabds a yiib n tong maan-kʋʋd kãsem fuugã poorẽ la a taoore. 
Bãmb saam-biis nins sẽn yaa sull a yiibẽ soab n dag n sõngd bãmbã yaa a Zakari, a Bɛn, a Yahaziyɛlle, a Semiramote, a Yekiyɛlle, a Uni, a Eliyaabe, a Benaya, a Maseya, a Matitiya, a Eliflewu, a Mikneya, a Obɛɛd-Edom, n paas a Yeyiyɛlle. Nin-bãmb n dag n yaa rigno-gũudbã. Yɩɩn-yɩɩndb a Eman ne a Azaf la a Etan dag n wẽeda zũud kɛma. 
Rẽ poore, a kẽnga Dõosẽ karen-saamb dãmbã zãmsg zĩigẽ yʋʋm 2018 soabã, n tɩ maan karen-saambdem.
La, a Katr wa n zoe, n tɩ kẽe yaoor bokẽ. 
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtba nengẽ.
Ned a ye nooma, neb a yiib n yɩɩda
Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel-a, tɩ, Wẽnd na sik laafɩ.
Yaa woto la b pʋɩ ned kam fãa ne a tʋʋmde, tɩ b na n kẽed Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogẽ wã, wa sẽn zems noor ning b sẽn dag n tũnug bãmb ba a Aarõ n kõ bãmbã, la wa sẽn zems Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã sẽn dag n yeelã. A Leevi yagens a taaba. A Rehabiya kom-dibli wã sʋka, yaa a Yisiya sẽn yaa a buudã naabã. 
Yaa bãmb yagensã n sãeeg n be tẽms nins sẽn koom sẽn gũbgã, n lebg soolem-dãmb n tar b tẽmse, soolem fãa ne a goamã, la a roto. A Kuus kom-dibli yaa a Seba, a Havɩla, a Sabta, a Rama, ne a Sabteka. A Rama kamb yaa a Seba, ne a Dedan. 
Yaa woto la b maan fu-roogã sẽn yaa sɛk roogã tʋʋmã n sɛ. Israyɛll nebã maana bũmb fãa tɩ zems wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. Bãmb maana woto bala. la kaset koglgã ne a ra-bɩlem la a limdã sẽn yaa bas-taal zĩigã, 
Yik n gilg tẽngã n ges a woglmã ne a yalmã, bala, mam na n kõ-a-la foom tɩ f sooge.» Dẽ, a Abram tilga a fu-rotã Mamre tɩɩsã sẽnẽ, n yegl Ebrõ n kẽ. La a Abram mee tẽn-kugr beenẽ Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã Reezẽo de lɛs soolmã, karen-biisã ne b ba rãmb kẽname, n wilg b sũ-pa-noaanga, ne b tẽnsã pʋsẽ karen-dotã sẽn ket n pag b kʋɩlẽnse, b soolmã pʋga.
M lebga koamsa ne koms rãmba n na n paam koms rãmba. M lebga neb fãa bũmbu, n na n fãag-ba, ba sã n ka b zãnga. M maana rẽ fãa Koe-nooga yĩnga tɩ m me bũmb zĩnd sʋka. 
Rẽ sã n looge, yaa bʋ-kaod-ro-kasengã taoor soab n dɩkd sebr ning a Poll Ãari SÃANDAOOGO DAMIB sẽn tik a nug n wilg t’a siga bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 soabã, la a bas naamã, ne Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE, n karem n wilgi.
Bõn-kãensã loogr zugẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Abram vẽnegr pʋgẽ n yeele: «Abram, da zoe rabeem ye! Mam meng n yaa fo gãongo, la fo keoor na n yɩɩ kãseng wʋsgo.» La a Abram leokame: «Mam Zu-soab a Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yãmb na n kõo maam bõe? Mam na n loogame n ka paam biig ye. La ned ning sẽn na n yõd n soog-a mam zakã, yaa Damaas rao a Eliyezɛɛr sẽn yaa mam tʋmtʋmdã.» 
Bõnyẽeg tog ne waka, la h’a!
La woto ned kõn zĩndi n tõe n tãoos raood Wẽnd taoor ye. Yɩɩ woto la sẽn gʋlsa pids yã: «Sẽn baood-a pẽgr bɩ a bao-a Wẽnd nengẽ.» 
Yɩɩ delegasẽo ɛspesɛllã taoor soab n lʋɩ tʋʋmdã taoore.
Dẽ poore, yaa yõg-laaga la b rɩk yã n yeele: «Wã yaa zood paalg sẽn yõg m zɩɩmẽ laaga; y sẽn na n tugla raar ning fãa bɩ y tẽeg m yelle.» 
A Paskal Kaboor sẽn yaa soda-kʋdr wilgame tɩ sã n yaa ne yẽnda , tigsga loogr poore, yaa Kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWARE, la b yãk t’a zã tẽngã, tɩ permye minisrã yɩ nin-zaal sẽn tara revolisẽo wã yam.
La zakã kɩreng ning sẽn teesd nug-rɩtgã pɛɛlã yalem yaa kãntɩɩg koabg wa zakã woglem sẽn yaa bũmb ningã. La ra-lugds pisi ne zũud nao pisi n be be. La ra-lugdsã ne b bãensã yaa wanzuri. La kɩreng ning sẽn be nin-taoorã pɛɛl yalem yaa kãntɩɩg pis-nu wa zakã yalem sẽn yaa bũmb ningã. La a tara ra-lugds piig ne b nao piiga. La ra-lugdsã tuiidsã ne b bãensã maana ne wanzuri. 
Zaabr sẽn ta, t'a Zakoob yi weoog n watẽ, a Leya yiime n sega a Zakoob n yeele: «Yãmb tog n wa kẽe ne maam yʋngã, bala, mam dɩka m biigã mandragoor n yao n na deeg yãmba.» Dẽ, badaar yʋngo, a Zakoob gãanda ne a Leya. La Wẽnnaam leoka a Leya kosgo, la a rɩka pʋg n dog a Zakoob bi-ribla, la rẽ n tõkd a Leya rogem a nu soaba. 
Kaorengã sẽn pak tɛka, komind dãmb 27 wã zugu, yaa komind a 8 pʋgẽ bala, la b tõog n pak karen-dotã.
Moasã, kãab-wẽng bee fo zugu, fo na n zãaga ne tẽng ning sẽn yaag a noor n deeg fo yao wã zɩɩmã fo sẽn daag ne f meng nusã. Fo sã n ko tẽn-gãongã, a ka na n leb n kõ foom a bi-sõama wã ye. Fo na n yeeba dũniyã, n ka yas zĩ-yɛng ye.» 
A Roboaam saka a saam-dãmba, la b mum-a lame n naag a saam-dãmbã, a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋga. Yẽnda ma wã rag n yaa Amo neda, t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Naama. La a Roboaam biig a Abiyam n led a zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. 
Dẽ, Faarõ yeela bãmb yaa: «Sã n yaa woto, mam sã n wa bas yãmb ne y zagsã rãmb tɩ y na n looge, bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab zĩnd ne yãmba. La mam miime tɩ yãmb sẽn dat n maan bũmb ningã yaa wẽnga. 
Wall yet tɩ ned pa tõe n yɩgd la a tʋɩt ye
Pog yẽng sɩd ne rakõor n zem
Bala, yaa neb sõor na ta milyão la zak n zoe n bas b tẽnse.
Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã pirsa Asiiri rĩm a Pulli, ne Asiiri rĩm a Tɩlgat-Pilnezɛɛre, n kɩt t'a Tɩlgat-Pilnezɛɛr yõg Rubɛn nebã ne Manaase buudã pʋɩ-sʋk n tɩ kẽes yembdo. A tall-b lame n kẽng Hala, Haboore, Haara, Gozan kʋɩlgã noore, la b keta beenẽ n tãag rũndã. A Leevi yagensã sẽn yaa maan-kʋʋr kãsem-dãmbã. A Leevi kom-dibli la woto: yaa a Gɛrson ne a Kehat la a Meraari. 
A Izak kiime tɩ b mum-a n naag a saam-dãmba. La rẽ t'a Izak kʋʋlame n lebg nin-kẽem-kʋdre. Yaa a Izak kambã, a Ezayu ne a Zakoob n mum-a. 
Koom wãagdame n zems tɩ sakd kelgre. Koom zèta bẽgd zugu
Pʋ-toap yũud a bĩnd-koom.
A Timna rag n yaa a Ezayu biig a Elifaaz pʋg-rɩkdga. A Timna roga a Elifaaz biig a Amalɛke. Yaa a Ezayu pag a Ada kambã la woto. Ad a Rewuyɛll kamba: Yaa a Nahate, a Zeera, a Sama ne a Miiza. Yaa bãmb la a Ezayu pag a Basmat kamba. 
Yɩɩ neb 250 n sak n kõ meng ne yamleoogo n tʋmd tʋʋmdã, ned ba a ye pa reeg ba wakɩr ye.
Talla woto, n ta bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, bugraad rãamd sẽn na n leb n nek Waogdg nin-buiidã.
Mam tʋmtʋmdbã na n talla raadã n yi Libã n kẽng n tɩ sik ko-kãsengã noore. La mam na n kɩtame tɩ b sẽb-b kil-kila, n tũnug-b ko-kãsengã n ta zĩig ning yãmb sẽn na n wilg maamã. La mam na n kɩtame tɩ b logs ra-kilã n bas beenẽ, tɩ yãmb tʋmtʋmdbã tɩ wʋke. La mam sẽn kot yãmb bũmb ning bala, yaa tɩ yãmb kɩt rɩɩbo, m na-yirã neb rɩlgr yĩnga.» Dẽ, a Hiram kõ a Salmo raad tɩ sek wa a sẽn datã tɛka. 
Miniisr dãmbã me wilgame tɩ b na n yãka b sapaoolg kiuugã yaood pʋsʋk n kõ tɩ b sõng neb nins sẽn zoe n bas b tẽnsã, n be zu-loees pʋgẽ wã.
Neb sõor na ta bãmb 50 la zak n maan kaalem tɩ neb 300 paam sãnpogr nin-buiidã sẽn yi n wilg b sũ-pũur Kɛɛd soolmã pʋga.
Dẽ zugẽ, a Pedaya leb n paama kom-dibli a nu: yaa a Hasuba, a Owɛlle, a Berekɩya, a Hasadiya, n paas a Yusaab ne a Hesɛɛde. A Sekaniya roga bi-ribl-yɛnga: yaa a Semaya. A Semaya kom-dibli yaa a Hatuusi, a Igalle, a Bariya, la a Neyariya ne a Safate. 
Gũus neer n sak bũmb ning mam sẽn wilgd foom dũndã wã. La mam na n diga Amoor-dãmbã ne Kana-rãmbã la Hɛt-dãmbã ne Perɛɛz-rãmbã la Hevi-rãmbã ne Zebuuz-rãmbã fo taoore. 
Naam sẽn kʋʋd kurs pa wat ne kur paall ye
F ba sã n be pʋɩɩrẽ bɩ f bas lɩɩs-toogo.

Tɩ arzɛkã soab leok-a : «Yaa ziri, bʋ-kãngã roga ka n bɩ ka , yaa mam bʋʋga; da bao m noor yibeoogã ye».
Nin-buiidã wʋsg wʋmda buudã goama, b leb n vʋɩɩ tẽngã babs nins zu-loees sẽn waoogẽ wã.
B tigsgã pʋgẽ, kiba-kang n yɩɩ no-rɩk-kaseng miniisr dãmbã sẽn tiki.
Yãk ka-kãng n tik sɛk roogã ne kaset koglgã, la taablã ne a teedã fãa, la fɩtl doagendgã ne a teedã fãa, la tẽn-kugr ning b sẽn na n yõog wisd a zugã, 
A Yembi sokame yaa: “M ma, yãmb solga bũmb laa?” A ma rɩka a nugã n sɩɩs a pʋgã n yeel yaa: “Tõnd zaka na n yalgame.
A Zakoob yeelame: «M yaab a Abrahaam Wẽnnaam, ne m ba a Izak Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yãmb yeela maam yaa: ‹Lebg n leb f tẽngẽ wã, leb f ba-yirã tɩ mam na n maan-f-la neere.› 
 Ned kam fãa rɩk raoogo, n wa wẽ-a, tɩ d ges bõe n be be.
M le segendame n na n wa yãmb nengẽ la woto n tõkd m naoor a tãab soaba la m kõn bõs y sãando, tɩ mam sẽn data, pa yãmb paoong ye, ya y mense. Yaa kamb n tigsd b ba rãmb yĩnga, bɩ yaa ba rãmb n tigsd b kamb yĩnga? Beneere, nina na n yeelame tɩ mam pa rɩ yãmb ye, yaa sɩda, la m belg n dɩɩme tɩ m sɩlma yaa sɩlem baafo. 
Pυg-yãangã sũur ra sãama hal wυsgo. A ra basa taal la bala. A pa tar yellã tιιm la! Daar fãa, a tara yãbr bala. La Wẽnd pa naand yell n pa ning a tιιm ye.
Woto, rĩmã ka kelg nin-buiidã ye. Bala, yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n dag n dat tɩ yɩ a woto, tɩ bũmb ning bãmb sẽn dag n kɩt tɩ Sɩlo rao a Akiya togs a Nebat biig a Zeroboaamã tõe n paam pidsgu. 
Wẽnd põda rũmd n zems rõabga.
tɩ mam ba wã rag n kɩtame tɩ mam wẽen ne-a. A yeela maam a woto: ‹Mam na n kiime! La mam datame tɩ f mum maam yaoog ning pʋg mam sẽn dag n tu Kana tẽngã.› Dẽ wã, mam datame n kẽng n tɩ mum m ba wã la m wa.» La Faarõ yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Kẽng n tɩ mum f ba wã, wala a sẽn dag n kɩt tɩ fo wẽen to-to wã.» 
La, a leokame, tɩ yẽ sẽn dɩ a buudu, yaa wʋsgo.
A yeel-b lame tɩ b maoome, tɩ birgã maaneg zĩig sẽn be Kugpɛɛlã na n tõog n sɩng tʋʋm yʋʋm 2023 pʋgẽ.
A Zakoob leoka a Ezayu yaa: «M soaala, yãmb la sẽn mi tɩ mam kambã ka tar pãngã la! Sẽn paas me, yaa tɩ mam tara piis ne niig sẽn tar kom-peend sẽn ket n yẽsemdẽ. Dẽ wã, b sã n na n modg bãmb tɩ b kẽn daarã tõre, rũm-bãoonegã fãa na n kiime. 
La Israyɛll pʋgẽ, mam na n basa raop tus a yopoe tɩ b põse. Yaa neb nins sẽn ka yĩgimd Baall taoore, la b ka mogs-a wã.» A Eli yii be n looge, la a tɩ mika a Safat biig a Eliize t'a tar niig sẽn balg yiib-yiib zĩis piig la a yiib n kooda. La a Eliize rag n bee ne piig la a yiibẽ soabã. A Eli tũu yẽnda nengẽ n dɩk a fuug n lob a Eliize zugu. 
Dẽ, a Moyiis maana tẽn-kugri, n pʋd a yʋʋr tɩ Adonayi-Nisi . La yẽnda yeelame:  «Nug n zẽk n zabd ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab geerã. Woto yĩnga, Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n yika zabre. Bãmb na n zaba ne Amalɛk rãmbã zamaan woo zamaane.» 
Zɛt n wẽesdẽ pa rabeem ye, yaa gũusgu
Tɩ m ba Yʋgempend yet tɩ bõe la wã?
M ba Katr kvoongo
Ra-sãar sã n woagem me, a tara gãdb zĩiga.
A Apolos yaa bõe, a Pol me yaa bõe? Ka neb sẽn sõng yãmb tɩ y paam tẽeba laa? La ned kam fãa pa tʋm wa Wẽnd sẽn kõ-a pãnga laa? Tɩɩga la mam sel yã, t'a Apolos zãgs-a koom la ka yɩ Wẽnd n kõ-a bɩʋʋng laa? 
A Zozɛf leoka rĩma n yeele: «Ka maam n na n bilg a võorã ye! Yaa Wẽnnaam n na n bilg zãmsdã võor n kõ Faarõ!» Dẽ, Faarõ yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Mam zãmsdã pʋga, mam yãndame tɩ m dag n yasa Nill kʋɩlg noore. 
Kɩɩb zems ne wẽnd la a bas sẽn kẽede
Tẽegre, yaa Sapaolg kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, la VDP rãmbã gʋlsg na n pag a kʋɩlense.
A Sefoora sẽn yeel tɩ «mam zɩɩm sɩdã,» Sẽn-Ka-Saab basa a Moyiis taale, bãongã kẽesg yĩnga. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Aarõ yaa: «Kẽng n tɩ seg a Moyiis we-raoogã pʋgẽ.» Dẽ, a Aarõ kẽngame n tɩ seg a Moyiis Wẽnnaam tãngã zugu, n mok-a. 
Sã n ya sẽn lagma ne Krista, yẽ soab me lebga yam a ye ne Bãmba. Zoe-y yoobo! Yɛl a taaba ninsaal sẽn maand pa sog ne a yĩng ye la ned ninga sẽn maanda yoob maanda wẽng ne a yĩnga. 
Ka bool põaag na-yir ye.
Tʋʋmdã tɩʋʋsg poore, b yãk a Burɛɛma TARWAR sẽn ya depite rãmbã fãa kasem t’a lʋɩ tʋʋmdã taoore.
Ra maan-y wẽnnaam-dãmb ne wanzuri wall sãnem yãmb mens yĩnga, n paas maam ye. 
Fo ka tõe me, n bool-a bʋʋd ye, tɩ bala, a tara tõogo, hal tɩ tẽngã nebã fãa wa gomd a yelle.
Lɔgtorã yiiri, b na n maka yãmb zɩɩma n gese  yãmb sãn tara SIDAwã bãag bil bɩ y ka tar-a.
Sẽn zomb a kur ka-laad tɩ b ka sʋk-a yaas n dɩk ma.
Maan loets ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo peendã sẽn maan ne pɛɛl a nu sẽn bogl taabã noor kɩreng a ye. La f maan woto ne a to wã me. 
La, m ba Soaamb wa n sɩnga kʋndã wẽebo, hal tɩ noosã tar saooga.
A Benzame yagense. A Benzame doga kom-dibli a tãabo: yaa a Bela, a Bekɛɛre ne a Yediyayɛlle. A Bela kom-dibli yaa a Ɛtsbon, a Uuzi, a Uziyɛlle, a Yerimote, la a Uuri. Bãmb b nu wã rag n yaa buud kãsem-dãmba, n yaa gãndaado. B buudã neb nins b sẽn sõdã yaa neb tus pisi la a yiib la pis-tã la a naase. 
A Saadu Ganaba ne a karen-bi-taasã raab yaa karen-dotã tõog n lebg n pake.
A Pok sũur da yaa noogo, a Seeni sẽn da wat n sõngd yẽ n tʋmdã zẽeda yĩnga.
La we-gõodb n wa n yã a Wobg sẽn n ki n dɩga, tɩ b vu-a n kẽes tɩɩg maasem tẽngre, n na n pase.
Taotao bala, a paam n bãnga bũmb ning sẽn tar-a wã.
Kibay paalã segd n  loe ne tõnd sẽn zoe n mi n wã ; sãn ka woto, kibay kãensa na n  kel n yɩɩ sãamb bala.
A zug yaa wa kãoog zugu: a pa zaeed yamsem wʋmb ye
F sã n kʋ mam bʋʋga, naaf la f ronda
Gosneer tʋʋm noor ning sẽn get kaorengã yell sẽn be porvẽesã pʋgẽ wã pa le tʋmd ye.
Doaag noaag pa zẽgemsd ye
La a Zozɛf leoka a baaba n yeel tɩ yaa kom-dibli nins Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ yẽnda Ezɩpt tẽngã. A Israyɛll yeelame tɩ b tall kambã n kolg-a t'a ning-b barka. A Israyɛll rag n kʋʋlame t'a ninã pãng boog t'a ka leb n neẽ ye. Dẽ, a Zozɛf kɩtame tɩ kambã kolg a Israyɛlle, la a Israyɛll mobg-b lame n mok-ba. 
Koadeng yet tɩ yõor la gẽla
Tõnd sã n dag n ka kaoosẽ, woto tɩ tõnd dag n kẽngẽ lame n lebg n wa, n lebg n leb naoor a yiibẽ soab n leb n lebg n wa.» Bãmb ba a Israyɛll yeela bãmb yaa: «Sã n yaa woto, ad yãmb sẽn na n maan bũmb ninga: Bao-y tẽngã bõn-sõama wã n sui y yondẽ wã n tall n tɩ kõ raoã. Yãk-y tɩdar bilfu, sɩɩd bilfu, wisdu, kaam sẽn tar yũ-noogo, Pistaas biisi, ne Amand-dãmba. 
Yẽnda na n loee a bõang reezẽ tɩɩga,  la a rɩk a bõan-bil n loe ne reezẽ bu-sõng tɩɩg willi. Yẽnda na n pegsa a fut reezẽ rãam pʋga, la a pekda a fu-yerg reezẽ rãam sẽn moog wa zɩɩm pʋga. Rãam kɩtame tɩ yẽnda nin mooge,  la bĩisim na n pelga a yẽna. 
«Ãnda n wa n kogsd m yẽdga ?»
Maam n kẽ la m ka rɩk ye,wagda kasma.
Ayo! Rẽ ka tõe ye! M kotame tɩ yãmb daopã bal kẽng n tɩ waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Bala, yaa woto la yãmb kos yã.» Dẽ, b riga bãmb tɩ b yi Faarõ nengẽ n looge. Dẽ poore, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis t'a tẽeg a nug Ezɩpt tẽngã zugu, tɩ sʋy kẽ tẽngã n sãam koodã zãnga, ne bũmb nins fãa sapɩlmã sẽn basã. 
Bala, mam na n diga buud wʋsg tɩ b zoe fo taoore, la mam na n yalga fo soolmã. Fo sã n kẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa fo Wẽnnaamã nengẽ naoor a tãab yʋʋmd fãa pʋgẽ, ned ka be sẽn na n bao tɩ soog fo tẽngã ye. 
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbã nengẽ.
CEDEAO no-rɛɛsdb pẽga Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
La sã n yaa ne rĩm a Salmo meng na-yirã, a me-a lame n sɛ yʋʋm piig la a tãab pʋgẽ. A Salmo reng n mee roog ning sẽn boond tɩ ‹Libã tɩɩs roogã.› La ro-kãng woglmã yaa kãntɩɩg koabga, t'a yalmã yaa kãntɩɩg pis-nu, t'a zãntlmã yaa kãntɩɩg pis-tã. B tilga roogã ne sɛɛdr tɩɩs ra-lugds ruls a naase, la b yaool n dɩk sɛɛdr tɩɩs ra-paadsã, n palg b zutu. 
Gosneer tʋʋm noor ning sẽn get kaorengã yell sẽn be porvẽesã pʋgẽ wã pa le tʋmd ye.
Wakat sẽn wate, mam pʋ-peelmã n na n wilg mam sẽn yaa ned ninga. Yãmb sã n wa n wa mam nengẽ, n na n ges mam yaoodã, n mik tɩ bʋʋg bɩ peosg n be mam rũmsã sʋk n ka pẽrem-pẽrem, la a ka wad-wada, tɩ peosg be beenẽ n ka sablga, rẽnd mam zuu rũm-bãmba.» 
Tʋʋmdã ra gãnegame tɩ b na n zĩnda rasem a yiib n tʋme, la a wa n tɩ paga a kʋɩlens badaare, yʋng wakat piig «1h00» sasa.
A Zeroboaam yãka kiuug a nii soabã rasem piig la a nu wã daare, tɩ yaa tigr daare. La tig-kãng kell n zemsda ne Zʋʋda tigrã daare. La yẽnda meng n yik n maan maand tẽn-kugrã zugu. A Zeroboaam maana a woto Betɛll n maand maand n kõt nag-bi nins yẽnda sẽn maanã. Yẽnda zĩniga maan-kʋʋdb maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ wã Betɛlle. 
F sã n pa nong tɩ yak ki me, f rat t'a serg n bas raboogo
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela yẽnda yaa: «Ãnda n yeel foom tɩ f yaa f zaala? M mi tɩ fo ka rɩ tɩɩg ning mam sẽn yeel foom tɩ f ra rɩ wã biis la?» Raoã leokame: «Yaa yãmb sẽn kõ maam pag ning t'a be ne maamã n yãk tɩɩgã bil n kõ maam tɩ m dɩ.» 
La woto wã, yaa fo bãngrã n lub koamsã yel-wẽndẽ. La yẽ me yaa f saam-biiga, la Krista ki-la a yĩnga. 
Pondr pa nobd n yɩɩg a gãong ye
Yaa Kolonell mazoor Kaasem KULBALI, miniisr ning sẽn get Sodaasã, n wa zĩnd tẽngã taoor soab yʋʋr yĩnga.
Badaare, a Zakoob ning-b-la bark n yeele:  «Yãmb maasem yĩnga, Israyɛll nebã na n ningda nebã bark n yetẽ: ‹Wẽnd na kɩt tɩ f yɩ wa a Efrayiim, la wa a Manaase!› » Yɩɩ woto, t'a Zakoob reng n bool a Efrayiim yʋʋre, n yaool na n bool a Manaase yʋʋrã. 
Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã leb n vɩɩmda ne buraad rãamd wa yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 24 sẽn loogã.
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ bb yãk yam nna n sõng-ba.
Yaa rũndã, zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 4 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, la CEDEAO sullã yãk neb tɩ b wa seg sodaas nins sẽn lub Letena kolonell Poll Ãari Sãadaoogo DAMIB naamã.
 La, fo sã n yã gɛla, n yet tɩ ad m gelle, f kiidame.
Saag sã n pãb noaga, a mit n daad-a.
Kiuug a nii soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Husa tẽng rao a Sibkayi sẽn yaa Zerak buudã ned a yembrã n dag get sull a nii soabã yelle. A Sibkayi sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. Kiuug a wɛ soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Anatot tẽng rao a Abiyezɛɛr sẽn yaa Benzame buudã ned a yembrã n dag n get sull a wɛ soabã yelle. A Abiyezɛɛr sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. 
Raopã soka a Lot yaa: «Fo tara neb a taab sẽn be ka bɩ? Peeg f reem-dãmbã, f kom-dibli wã ne f kom-pugli wã, la f wʋk fo sẽn so bũmb ninsã fãa tɩ be tẽngã pʋgã n yi ka n looge. Bala, tõnd na n sãama tẽngã. Tẽn-kãngã nebã tʋʋm-beedã yell goam yaa wʋsg n zẽk n ta Sẽn-Ka-Saab nengẽ. Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab tʋma tõnd tɩ d wa sãam tẽngã.» 
Rĩmã kɩtame tɩ maan-kʋʋd a Sadok ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Natã la a Zehozada biig a Benaya, ne Kerɛt la Pelɛt nebã yãag a Salmo. Bãmb zombg-a-la rĩm a Davɩɩd meng bõn-wɛɛgã. A Salmo mengã tol n zomba naamã geer zugu. 
Bãmb sẽn wat n tʋmdẽwã wakate, a Seeni yaowã sẽn da minim n tũud-a n watẽwã reemda ne a Yõdi.
Karen-saamb a Zãmbatiis BÕNTOOG wilgame, tɩ bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a yãk yam n lebg n dɩk tigung yɩɩn-kʋdã, yaa sẽn na n wilg kom-yaoobã, pipi Kiris nebã sẽn da yɩɩnd n pẽgd Wẽnd ne sik-m-menga, tɩ b bãng tɩ ra ka wẽnd rũnda, b sẽn dɩk yɩɩlã tɩ lebg nasaar yɛlã ye.
Badaare, Sẽn-Ka-Saab fãaga Israyɛll nebã Ezɩpt rãmbã nugẽ. La Israyɛll nebã yãnda Ezɩpt rãmba kũum ko-kãsengã noore. 
La zĩig pʋgẽ bala, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã pilga peendã n bas a nengã, la Israyɛll rĩmã bãngame tɩ yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã ned a yembre. Dẽ, Israyɛll rĩmã lebg n kuila a yir Samaari ne sũ-sãang la sũ-puugri. 
La yẽnda yãka Israyɛll kom-bɩɩs n tʋm tɩ b tɩ maan maand sẽn yõogd bugum, la b kʋ lols n maan zems-n-taar maand n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. 
Gom-zug b sẽn yãk n sigl tʋʋmdã, yaa:«kambã fãa sã n paam kaorengã, a sõngdame tɩ wʋm taab la vɩɩmd-n-taar zĩnd zamaan pʋgẽ» Fõndasẽo Ebomaf taoor soabã, a Salimata Bõnkũng yeelame, tɩ b miime tɩ kamb wʋsg n ka na n kẽng kaorengo, sẽn kẽed ne zu-loeeg nins sẽn pɩʋʋg tẽngã.
Dẽ wã, wa tɩ d yũnug d ba wã rãam n paam n kẽ ne-a, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n kɩt tɩ d baaba wã paam yagense.» La badaar yʋngo, bãmb yũnuga b ba wã rãam, la bi-pugl-kãsmã kẽng n tɩ gãanda ne a ba wã, la a ba wã ka bãng a gãandgo, wall a yikr wakat ye. 
B gãdame tɩ Miniisr dãmbã na n yɩɩ bãmb 25, tɩ depite rãmbã 71.
Karensaamba yeele: “Y nee, “Sodaaga” sẽn keta ka le tõe n dig  bãasa biis ye. SIDAwã bãag yõka a Abdu mõasã.” A “Abdu  yĩnga” pãng boogdame.
Bãmb yeela yẽnda yaa: «Yõk nag-sadg sẽn tar yʋʋm a tãabo, la f bao bʋ-yãang sẽn tar yʋʋm a tãabo, ne pe-raoog sẽn tar yʋʋm a tãabo, la f bao walle, ne man-wan-bila n wa kõ maam.» Yẽnda baoo rũm-bãmba fãa, n pasg pʋɩ-sʋgse, n dɩk bogr fãa n dɩgl n yegl a to, la yẽnda ka pas bõn-yɩgdɩ wã ye. 
D saam-biig a to la d paas bãmb b yiibã; d yãenda naoor yaka la bũmb wʋsg pʋgẽ tɩ nin-kãng tara tʋʋmda sũuri; so kãngã, a le wɩsg a meng n yɩɩda, a pʋg sẽn peel ne-y yĩnga. Wilg-y-ba, tẽedba fãa taoore, y nonglma sẽn ta zĩig ninga la sẽn tũ ne bũmb ning tɩ d tar zu-zẽkre y fãa gill poorẽ. 
Sãan pʋto-ned yũuda a bĩnd koom
A Zakoob zãmba a Ezayu. A Izak rag n lebga nin-kẽema, t'a ninã pãng boog t'a ka leb n neẽ ye. A Izak boola yẽnda bi-kãseng a Ezayu, la a yeelame: «Ad-ma.» La a Izak yeela a Ezayu yaa: «Mam lebga nin-kẽema, la mam ka mi m kũum daar ye. 
A Zozafat rɩka a ba a Aaza naoor n ka bʋdg ye. Yẽnda maana sẽn yaa tɩrg Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ. A Zozafat tʋʋm a taabã ne a gãndaalmã tʋʋmã, la zabã a sẽn zabã fãa gʋlsa Zʋʋda rĩm-dãmbã kibay sebr pʋga. 
Mam na n deega yãmb tɩ y yɩ mam neba, la mam na n yɩɩ yãmb Wẽnnaam. La yãmb na n bãngame tɩ yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n yaa yãmb Wẽnnaam, soab ning sẽn fãag-a yãmb ne tʋʋm-wɛgl nins Ezɩpt nebã sẽn modg yãmb tɩ y maanã. 
La a Moyiis yeela Wẽnnaam yaa: «Maam la ãnda n na n kẽng Faarõ nengẽ n tɩ yiis Israyɛll nebã Ezɩpt soolem pʋgẽ?» Wẽnnaam yeelame: «Mam na n zĩnda ne foom. La ad bãnd ning sẽn na n kɩt tɩ fo bãng tɩ yaa maam n tʋm foom. Fo sã n tõog n tall nebã n yi Ezɩpt soolmẽ wã, bɩ y waoog Wẽnnaam tãn-kãngã zugu.» 
 La, kinkirgã yãka ligdã, n kõ-a, t’a tõdge, n yet t’a ka rat ye, tɩ yẽ sẽn datã, ya a bãngrã.
La bãmb kʋʋ a Hamoor ne a biig a Sɩkɛm ne sʋʋga, la b peeg a Dina sẽn dag n be a Sɩkɛm doogẽ wã n yi n looge. Bãmb yõga rũm-bãoonegã, ne rũm-bɛdã ne bõensã, la b wʋk bũmb nins fãa sẽn dag n be tẽngã pʋgẽ wã, ne wetẽ wã. 
Yaa no-rɩkds 27 n be sebr ning b sẽn gʋlsã pʋgẽ.
Zug koom ka gind neng ye
Tẽng-n-ned kãar sãoo sãan nenga.
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 24 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, tẽngã taoor soab tʋma miniisr ning sẽn get kadensã tʋʋma, a Basolma BAAZIE t’a tɩ kõ sore, tɩ b sɩng yʋʋm 2022 la yʋʋm 2023 soabã sapaol-koobo, la b kell n bog rũmsã sẽn na yɩlẽ n zab ne rũm-bãasã.
A Omri maana sẽn yaa wẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ. Yẽnda maana wẽng n yɩɩd rĩm-dãmb nins fãa sẽn deng-b yẽnda n zĩndã. A Omri tʋʋm a taabã ne bũmb nins fãa a sẽn maanã, la a gãndaalmã gʋlsa Israyɛll rĩm-dãmbã kibay sebr pʋga. 
A Moyiis rɛɛmb a Zetro peega a Moyiis pag a Sefoora n wa, a Moyiis rag n kɩtame t'a Sefoora ne a kom-dibli a yiibã kuili. Bi-ribl a yembr yʋʋr dag n boondame t'a Gersom . Bala, a Moyiis rag n yeelame: «Mam yaa sãan n be tẽn-zẽnga.» 
A Moyiis yeela Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa: «Yãmb meng sã n ka na n yãag tõndo, bɩ y ra sak tɩ tõnd yi ka ye. Dẽ, yaa ne bõe la ned na n bãng tɩ maam ne yãmb nebã paama bark yãmb nifẽ? Ka yãmb sẽn yãagd tõndã yĩng sɩda? Yaa rẽ yĩng la maam ne yãmb nebã yaa toor ne neb a taabã fãa sẽn be dũniyã zugã.» 
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kʋdr a ye n dag n be Betɛlle. Yẽnda biig a yembr n wa n togs-a bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam daoã sẽn maan Betɛll badaarã, la goam nins Wẽnnaam daoã sẽn togs rĩmã. Kambã sẽn togs b ba wã rẽ fãa n sɛ, Dẽ, b ba wã yeel-b lame tɩ b ning a bõangã yolgo. La b maana woto n kõ-a t'a zombe. 
A Moyiis togsa Israyɛll nebã gom-kãensã, la b ka kelg a Moyiis ye. Bala, bãmb dag n bee sũ-sãang pʋga, b yembdã sẽn yaa toogã yĩnga. «Kẽng n tɩ togs Faarõ sẽn yaa Ezɩpt rĩmã t'a kõ Israyɛll nebã sor tɩ b yi soolmã pʋgẽ.» 
A Abram paa Kana tẽnga, la a Lot tɩ zĩnda tẽms nins sẽn be kunkubẽ wã, la a tɩ tilga a fu-rotã Sodom tẽnga. Sodom tẽngã neb rag n yaa nin-wẽns meng-menga, la b maanda yel-wẽn n beegd Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. 
A Zozɛf sẽn wa n na n ki wã, t'a tara yʋʋm koabg la piiga. La b segla a Zozɛf kũumã n ning wisd buud toor-toore, n ning kũum koglg pʋg n bĩng Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋga. 
Mam ket n tẽrame tι mam sẽn wa n ya bilfu, zaabr sã n da ta tι sagb rι n sa, tõnd da tigsda taab n solemdẽ. Soalem me yaool n sιd tara yõodo.
Rĩm a Salmo kõo Seba rĩm-poakã bũmb nins fãa a sẽn date, la a sẽn kose, n paas kũun a taaba, wa sẽn zems rĩm sẽn ta yẽnda a Salmo wã sẽn tog n kõ. Rẽ zugẽ, Seba rĩm-poakã ne a poorẽ dãmbã lebg n kuila b tẽngẽ. Yʋʋmd fãa, b rag n wat n kõta rĩm a Salmo sãnem kɩlo tus pisi la a tãab la kobs-tã la piiga, 
Maan-kʋʋdb a Benaya ne a Yakaziyɛll rag n peebda tãntãad Wẽnnaam kaoolã koglgã taoor wakat fãa. Bao-y Sẽn-Ka-Saabo,  bao-y bãmb pãngã, bao-y bãmb wakat fãa! 
Tɩɩr dĩm a Hiram rag n tallda sɛɛdr ne sɩprɛs tɩɩs raado, n wat n kõt rĩm a Salmo, la ne sãnem sẽn zems rĩmã sẽn dat tɛka. Dẽ, rĩm a Salmo yãka tẽms pisi Galɩle soolmã pʋgẽ n kõ a Hiram. Woto, rĩm a Hiram yii Tɩɩr n na n tɩ ges tẽms nins rĩm a Salmo sẽn kõ yẽnda wã. La a tɩ mikame tɩ tẽmsã ka ta yẽnda yam ye. 
La tʋg-neer ka rɩlgd liuul ye
Raoog sã n kaoos koomẽ a kõn lebg yẽbg ye
Bãmb dɩka zom-nagdem nins b sẽn yi ne Ezɩptã n maan bur-maas sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle. Bala, b riga bãmb Ezɩpt tɩ b ka paam n yals tɩ zom-nagdmã wuki, la b ka paam n bao rɩɩb n zã me ye. 
Yɩɩ tẽngã taoor soab a Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWARE, n lʋɩ tʋʋmdã taoore, tɩ b tɩ rɩgl tɩ-puudu, n tẽeg a Tooma SÃNKAR ne a tũud-n-taasã b sẽn kʋ-b zĩig ninga, zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 15 yʋʋm 1987 soabã.
Asɩll Tãpsoab gʋlsa sebr n wilg t’a Edi Kõmbeoog ka segd n tɩ zĩnd Asɩɩsnasnallã SEDEPE wã yʋʋr yĩng ye.
Rẽ n kɩt tɩ b tus b taoor soabã n lubi, la b na n maneg n kẽng ne b yãabã taoore.
Pit sã n pa wʋm toogo, soaamb pa yit ye
Bʋsãansã goama, yaa neb koabg pʋga, neb a 3 n wʋmd-a la b gomd-a.
Ra lagem bur sẽn tar dã-bɩll ne maoong zɩɩm ye. Ra bas Pak tigrã maoong nemd tɩ kell n vẽeg beoog ye. Tall fo tẽn-gãongã dẽenem biisã sẽn yaa sõama n yɩɩdã n wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa fo Wẽnnaamã roogẽ.  Da rʋg-y bull a ma bĩisim pʋg ye.» 
La bãmb yeelame: «Mam na n kɩtame tɩ mam sõmblmã fãa lʋɩ fo taoore, la m wilg foom m yʋʋrã sẽn yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, la mam na n ninga m sẽn dat n ning a soab zug barkã barka, la m zoe mam sẽn dat n zoe a soab nimbãanegã nimbãanega.» 
Nao sẽn kɩɩs taab la wobendo.
Gar pa yão ye
D lʋɩɩs d toogo.
Dẽ, bɩ f reeg bõn-kãens b nusẽ wã, n yõog bugum tẽn-kugrã zugu. Yaa maoong sẽn yõogd bugum Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga, n tar yũ-noogo. Yaa kũun b sẽn yõogd bugum zãng Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. Rɩk pe-raoog ning sẽn yaa maoong sẽn wilgd tɩ b ninga maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd a Aarõ zugã yãoog n yuum Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore. La yẽnda na n yɩɩ fo pʋɩɩre. 
Dẽ la m kot-y tɩ y wẽneg maam. La yaa rẽ me yĩng la m tʋm a Timote y nengẽ: a yaa m bi-nongre la a pelga a pʋg ne Krista tũudem. A na tẽeg-y m sẽn yals bũmb ninga Krista tũudma poorẽ, la m sẽn zãmsd Tigeng kamba fãa. 
Kibarã yii Burkina 24.
Ad yaa ned kʋɩɩm sẽn ya wa ba-raoog kʋɩɩm
Wẽndooga sõnga a Poko t‘a paam bĩis-zom la koom sẽn ya yɩlemde n kõt bipɛɛlgã.
Raag yi laafɩ yaa tẽn-n-rãmb n wʋm taab noore
La soolem-kãng nebã sã n dag n sok a Izak a pagã sẽn yaa ned ninga, yẽnda yetame tɩ yaa yẽnda tão-poaka. Bala, yẽnda rag n zoeta rabeem t'a sã n yeel tɩ yaa yẽnda paga, tẽngã nebã na n kʋʋ yẽnda. Bala, a Rebeka rag n yaa pʋg-neere. 
Sulla a to la b zĩnig yã, sul-kãng na n pʋgdame n get tʋʋmdã, n nan gũud noorã, meng b sẽn na n wa rɩk-a n ning na-kẽnd-paallã pʋgẽ.
Nand tɩ b yãk-a t’a lebg kiba-kɩtbã la kʋdemdã miniisri, a Jean Emmanuel OUÉDRAOGO, ra yaa Ɛrtebe televisẽo wã taoor soaba, sẽn sɩng ne bõn-bɩʋʋg kiuug rasem 16 yʋʋm 2021 soabã.
Wẽnnaam dag n kɩtame tɩ tɩɩs yi. Yaa tɩɩs buud toay-toay sẽn yaa neeba, la sẽn tar bi-nood sẽn tõe n dɩ. La zẽedã zĩig tẽn-sʋka, Wẽnnaam ninga tɩɩg sẽn kõt vɩɩm, ne wẽng la sõmb bãngr tɩɩga. 
Rĩm a Salmo sẽn me Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã ne na-yirã, la a maan bũmb nins fãa yẽnda sẽn dag n tagsd a sũur pʋgẽ n dat n maanã n sɛ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab vẽnega b meng ne yẽnda naoor a yiibẽ soaba, wa bãmb sẽn dag n vẽneg b meng ne yẽnda Gabawõ wã. 
Zaamẽ ne beoog pa pʋʋsd ne zɛ-nif ye
A Moyiis sak n deega a rɛɛmbã saglgo, n maan bũmb nins fãa yẽnda sẽn yeelã. A Moyiis yãka nin-yẽesens Israyɛll nebã fãa sʋka, n kɩt tɩ b lebg neb tusr-tusr nanambse, neb koabg-koabg nanambse, neb pis-nunu nanambse, la neb piig-piig nanambse. 
M ba Soaamb ne m ba Katre
Yopoe soaba, tʋʋm sẽn kẽed Politik wɛɛngẽ yalsame.
 B sẽn lebg n kuili, a yembrã le yeela a ba wã, t’a kʋ a Naamde, bala, nebã fãa yetame, t’a Naamd be neere.
Toog a yoobẽ soaba: Nod-tãoodse. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis ne a Aarõ yaa: Bao-y wʋng vũund n pids y nusã, t'a Moyiis lob-a yĩngr Ezɩpt rimã nifẽ. 
A gãanda ne pag a yembr SIDAwã  bãag bil sẽn da be ne. A ma sẽn paam-a wãa,  yaa yẽ me sẽn wa n lagem ne a sidã sẽn da  zoe n tar bãaga bil a pʋgẽwã yĩnga.
Sẽn n kẽed ne seb kãngã
SIDAwã bãaga bil ne bãas a taabã kõ n tol n yõk bãmba wa b  sẽn yõkd neb niis sẽn ka yõkd b mensã ye.
A Davɩɩd deega a Hadadezɛɛr saar-dãmb tusri, la a yõg a wed-rʋʋdb tus a yopoe, ne tãb-biis tus pisi sẽn ka zao wiidi. A Davɩɩd yãka wiid koabg sẽn tat saar-dãmbã, la a kɛ wiid a taabã fãa nao-gĩin n pase. Siiri nebã yii Damaas n wa n na n sõng Soba rĩm a Hadadezɛɛre, la a Davɩɩd kʋʋ Siiri neb tus pisi la a yiibu. 
Kõ f Zɩɩm, ya f to yõor fãagre.
A Eli yeela rĩm a Akaab yaa: «Lebg-y n tɩ rɩ-y la y yũ, bala mam wʋmda saag kɛleng rãamde.» La a Eli yeela a rakõorã yaa: «M kos tɩ f rʋ n ges ko-kãsengã sẽnẽ.» La a rakõorã rʋʋme n ges n yeele: «Mam ka ne bũmb ye.» A Eli tʋm-a lame t'a tɩ ges naoor a yopoe. 
A Bɛn-Hadaad yeela a Akaab yaa: «Mam na n lebsa yãmb tẽms nins mam ba wã sẽn dag n dees yãmb ba wã nengẽ wã. Woto, yãmb tõe n kẽnda Damaas n koosd y teed wa mam ba wã me sẽn dag n maand Samaari wã.» Dẽ, rĩm a Akaab yeelame: «Maam a Akaab na n maana kaool ne yãmba, la m yaool n kõ-y lohorem tɩ y looge.» Bãmb sẽn maan kaoolã n sɛ, a Akaab kõ-a-la lohorem t'a looge. 
Wĩndgã sẽn  da paam n lυι yĩnga, pυg-yãangã yeela kom-pugli wã tι b pa n gãande, tι  beoogo, b na kuli. Kambã sιd saka gõogrã. Mik pυg-yãangã yaa sõya.
Yɩɩ Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, yɩɩ Politik taoor dãmba, sodaas taoor dãmba, la sula buud toor toor taoor dãmb n zĩnd n dɩk na-kẽnda nins b sẽn na n tik n zã tãrãzisẽo wã.
F bẽ ki sã n bɩ, bɩ f sak t'a bɩɩme
Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne Tisbe rao a Eli sẽn yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã n yeel-a yaa: Kẽng n tɩ yeel-a tɩ maam a Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame: Akaabe, fo kʋʋ neda, la f reeg a sẽn so. La maam a Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame tɩ zĩig ning baasã sẽn leg a Nabot zɩɩmã, zĩ-kãng bala, baas n na n leg fo me zɩɩmã.» 
Nug-tikr a 7 soaba: taoor soabã le tara sor n tõe kõ tẽns a taaba no-rɛɛsdba, bɩ zamaan-zẽns rãmb sẽn tʋm neb nins sõor tɩ b tõe n zĩnd Burkĩna Faso tẽngã pʋgẽ.
sẽn data n dɩ n yiis a kom, tʋg n dɩ yiri n da wa bao yelle n kõ saam-biisa ye. Sẽn ketã, d na yãend taaba m sã n wa. 
A pẽ naab n ning a zãr naab wĩiri
Dẽ zugẽ, fo toẽ n sõnga tõnd t‘a Yembi me tõog n lebg n kẽng lekɔllã.
Kell n yɩɩ wakat polɩɩs rãmbã taoor soab sẽn wilg bãmb tʋʋma na-kẽndre, la neb sõor sẽn be a pʋgẽ, la btʋʋma zãmsg na-kẽndr sẽn ya a toto.
Rẽ wã, mam kot-y lame tɩ y bas tɩ mam led biigã zĩigẽ n pa ka n lebg yãmb yamba, tɩ biigã lebg n tũ a kẽem-dãmbã n kuili. Sã n ka rẽ, mam na n maana a wãn n kẽng m ba wã nengẽ, tɩ biigã ka tũ maam? Mam ka rat n yãnd m ba wã sẽn na n paam sũ-sãang ningã ye!» 
A Abrahaam zẽka a neng n gese, la a yãnda raop a tãab sẽn yas yẽnda neng-taoore. A Abrahaam sẽn yãnd-bã, a yika a fu-roogã noor n wudg n seg-b n wõgemd tẽnga, n yeele: «Zu-soaba, yãmb sã n nonga maam, mam kot-y lame tɩ y ra loog n ka yals mam sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã nengẽ ye. 
A Adiyɛll biig a Azmavɛt n dag n get rĩmã kood bĩngr yelle.  A Oozɩyaas biig a Zonatã n dag n get rĩmã koodã b sẽn bĩng pʋtẽ wã, tẽn-bɛdẽ wã, la tẽn-bãoonegẽ wã ne gãsdã pʋsẽ wã yelle. Rama tẽng rao a Simeyi n dag n get reezẽ pʋtã yelle.  Neb nins sẽn dag n be-b reezẽ pʋtẽ wã n get reezẽ rãamã bĩngr yellã, yaa a Sefam biig a Zabdi n dag n yaa b naaba. 
Sẽn wa n zems yibeoog wakat a 9 wã sasa, Waogdg nebã yiime n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ nug tikr buud fãa Burkĩna Faso sẽn da maan ne Farens tẽngã, bɩ b kiis-a.
Bɛngã womb wakat sẽn wa n ta, m ba Katr rẽ wã, maana puud sõma, n dat n wome, n yɩɩd m ba Soaamb rẽndã.
Dẽ, bɩ f tall pe-raadã sʋk pe-raoog a yembr n wa, la bɩ a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã palg bãmb nus pe-raoogã zugu. La bɩ f kʋ pe-raoogã n dɩk a zɩɩmã n daag n gilg tẽn-kugrã fãa. 
Gosneem bẽda be n tẽegd ƐREFI, ne Zend afirik kiba-kɩtbã tɩ b mi n bao vẽenem wʋsg kibayã kũun wɛɛngẽ, la b yaool n dɩk-a n gome.
Yiib soaba, noy nins fãa b sẽn da rɩk tãrãzisẽo wã zãab wɛɛngẽ yalsame.
Ra-lugds nins sẽn gũbg zakã soga taab ne wanzuri bãense. B bola bãmb pugli wã ne wanzuri, la b naoã maana ne zũudu. Zakã noor fu-lillidgã wʋga ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo ne gĩs-moaama, la gĩs-miid ne lamd gĩs-bãaneg tʋʋm-mitba sẽn maandã. A yalem zemsa kãntɩɩg pisi, la a zãntlem yaa kãntɩɩg a nu, wa zakã peendã yalem sẽn yaa bũmb ningã. 
La Sẽn-Ka-Saab puka a meng ne a Izak n yeel-a yaa: «Ra kẽng Ezɩpt ye, pa tẽng ning mam sẽn na n wilg foomã pʋga. Zĩnd sãand tẽn-kãng pʋga, bala, mam bee ne foom, la m na n ning-f-la barka. Bala, mam na n dɩka tẽn-bãmb fãa n kõ foom ne f yagensã tɩ y sooge. Mam na n maana woto, n pids wẽeneg ning mam sẽn dag n wẽen ne fo ba a Abrahaamã. 
Kom-pugli a tãab n wa n tũ taab n kẽng raad wυsgo. B sẽn wa n yi n dabdã, yao-zυυgã yeelame tι yẽ na n tũume, t'a kẽem-dãmbã tõdge. Yao wã yυυr la a Yamne. B yeel-a lame tι weoogã zãra wυsgo, la a ra tũ ye.
 A le wa n yeela a biigã t’a sã, tɩ biigã sɩd sã, la zõosã yɩɩ wãa… n wa.
Tɩ zãms nebã b sẽn na n maan toto n zãag b mens ne  SIDAwã bãaga wala b kɩt t’a ra long neb a taaba.
Wobg sẽn wυm woto wã, rabeem yõk-a lame. Yẽ la sẽn zabd ne soaamb n yet t’a kõn wãb weoogã yamdã la. Tao bal t’a yeela weoogã bõn-vιιlι fãa tι b bao a soaamb t’a wa sak yẽnda, t’a tara koεεg ne-a.
m kõn gom m tʋʋmde, m namsgo, gõeem kaalem, kom la ko-yũud yelle, kom-gãaga, fut sẽn na n yiis waood kaalem. M sẽn tõe n zẽk m meng ne bũmb ning yaa m komsma. 
 B zoe n tɩ kẽe roog a ye pʋg n na n solge. Mik, roogã yaa kinkirgã roogo.
Faarõ pidga a meng nugbĩngã sẽn tar nug-tikr bãndã n pid a Zozɛf nug-bila, la a kɩt tɩ b yeelg-a fu-neeb sẽn pɩnda, la a pid a Zozɛf loorã ne sãnem yãndo. La rĩm a Faarõ kɩtame t'a Zozɛf kẽ  Saar  a yiibẽ soabã sẽn pʋgd yẽnda wã, la nebã rag n kelemdame n yetẽ tɩ: «Wõgemd-y-yã!» Rẽ, yɩɩ woto tɩ Faarõ kõ a Zozɛf noor t'a soog Ezɩpt soolmã zãnga. 
Pĩim sã n kẽ koɛɛga, bɩ b foog-a koɛɛga.
La nanambsã waa ne onigs kuga, la kug buud a taab b sẽn na n ning gãtsã sẽn be maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã la yãoog lutgã zugã pʋsã. Israyɛll raopã, ne pagb nins fãa sẽn dat n kõ bũmb tʋʋmdã yĩng wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel a Moyiis t'a maanã, talla b kũunã n wa kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab ne yamleoogo. 
Bala, nin-sabls tẽnsã rãmb sã n data b tõe n tigsa ligd b tʋʋma pʋsẽ n sõng b mense.
A bõang yũbla, mod yã guugu, ka mod me guugu.
Sẽn paase, mam sũurã sẽn loe ne m Wẽnnaamã roogã yĩnga, mam dɩkda m meng paoong sẽn yaa sãnem ne wanzuri, n na n paas bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn segl zĩ-sõngã yĩngã, n kõt m Wẽnnaamã roog yĩnga. Yaa ofɩɩr sãnem toan koabga, ne wanzuri halaal toan kobessi la pis-naase, sẽn na n tall n bol Wẽnnaam doogã lalse, 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã yeela yẽnda: «Lebg n kẽng f zu-soben-poakã nengẽ n tɩ sik f meng a taoore.» Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã yeel-a lame:  «Ade, fo tʋtame! Fo na n doga bi-ribla. La fo na n pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Ismayɛlle. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab wʋma fo koɛɛgã, f paoogrã pʋga. 
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 17 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Metr Benewẽnd SÃNKAR sẽn ya bʋ-kaod-soãngdã, n leb n ya pagtɩ Politik taoor soabã, zẽk a naoor n kẽng reezẽo di Sãntr Guvɛgnoora, n tɩ gʋls a yʋʋr n na n sõng sodaasã n zab n fãag tẽngã.
Katr ne soaamb gεl baoobo
Rẽ yĩnga, ka f nin sẽn ne fãa, la f rɩt ye. D mi n deeg saglse.
Kãoong ka kõ-m zaalem, Kãoong reeg m doore. Door ka m doore, Door a naab a Wẽnd doore. Naab a Wẽnd ka kõ-m zaalem,  Naab a Wẽnd kυυ m ba, n kυ m ma, N keeg roor n kõ-m tι m tar n lobg sυy yee... Na-pagã baoo koodo, n kõ kιιbã.
A Moyiis ne Israyɛll nebã yɩɩlle. Dẽ, a Moyiis ne Israyɛll nebã yɩɩla yɩɩn-kãngã n waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saab n yeele:  «Mam na n yɩɩlame n waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Bala, bãmb naamã yaa kãsenga. Bãmb luba wiid ne b wed-rʋʋdb ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ. 
Yãmb tẽnga ned sãn n bãng tɩ SIDAwã bãag n tar-a, dẽ yĩnga a togsda a  zaka rãmb bii? A sãn ka togsdẽ, yaa bõe yĩnga?
La, nebã wa n sɩngame, n yet rao wã: «Haya! fo sã n ka gilim n bao kogl-m-menga, f bɛɛbã na n kʋ-f lame, wala b sãam f paoongã ». 
SIDAwã bãag bil ka yõkd kamba sẽn zems yʋʋm a 5 tɩ ta 14  tao tao ye. Bõn kõng yĩnga, a zemsame tɩ d wilig kambã b sẽn  segd n maan toto tɩ bãaga da yõk b sẽn deng b bɩʋʋnga ye.
Ta m toor raag n kẽede
Ned sã n wãbend a rũms a pʋʋgẽ ka rẽ bɩ a  reezẽ tɩɩs  pʋʋgẽ n bas rũmsã tɩ b tɩ kẽ n sãam ned a to pʋʋgo, yẽnda na n yaoo yaood sẽn zems pʋʋgã bõn-koaadlã, wall reezẽ tɩɩs pʋʋgã bõn-koaadlã a sẽn womd sõama wakate. 
Wakat ning a Zezabɛll sẽn wa n kʋʋd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã, a Abdyaas rag n peega no-rɛɛsdb koabg n tɩ solg-b pis-nunu tãng bogd a yiib pʋgẽ, n kẽnd n kõt-b rɩɩb ne koom. Rĩm a Akaab yeela a Abdyaas yaa: «Wa tɩ d na n gilga tẽngã gilli.
