A Yamne sẽn  yeel woto, pũg-yãangã yikame n tι bao bĩis-naare, n wa kõ-a, la a gõgnemdẽ: Ya n yaa bõe sι-lak biig la woto, n tõt gõeem? pũg-yãangã ne biigã kell n talla woto, hal ti ziigã wa zυυge.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, sẽn kisa, sɩd kisame.
A Moyiis yeelame: «Ade, mam na n yi n basa yãmba, n tɩ pʋʋs Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. La beoogo, kɛooda wã na n loogame n bas yãmb ne y poorẽ dãmbã la y nebã. La baoosgo, bɩ y ra leb n belg tõnd n kɩɩs n ka bas nebã tɩ b kẽng n tɩmaan maoong Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩng ye.» 
Yaa miniisr dãmb 20 ne b sõangdb a 3.
F sã n maan yãnd tɩ sẽn kẽedẽ kaẽ, f kũum n são
A sẽlẽmbooser nif moogre, kõ vol a rõbgo.
Dẽ wã, bɩ y ra leb n zoe rabeem ye. Mam na n gesa yãmb yell ne bũmb fãa, la m ges yãmb kambã yelle.» A Zozɛf goma ne bãmb a woto n bels-ba, la b pɛlgã gãandame. 
Israyɛll nebã yãndame t'a Moyiis nengã pɩndame. Dẽ, a Moyiis lebgd n luda a nengã ne peendã yɛsa, hal tɩ ta yẽnda sẽn na n leb n kẽ n gom ne Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. 
A Basa sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, a basa Rama meebo, la a kẽng n tɩ zĩnd Tirsa tẽnga. Woto, rĩm a Aaza boola Zʋʋda nebã fãa n ka bak ned ba a yembre, n kɩt tɩ b tɩ wʋk kugã ne raad nins fãa rĩm a Basa sẽn dag n tigs n na n me Rama lalgã. La rĩm a Aaza talla ra-kãens ne kug-kãens n me Geba tẽngã sẽn be Benzame soolmẽ wã ne Mispa tẽngã. 
Yẽ wilgame tɩ rẽnda tɩ tẽngã taoor dãmb sɩd rɩk na-kẽnda, tɩ bãmb zu-loeesã paam welgre.
Yũug sã n pa be yiri, yõns panemda gemgondo
Bala tẽngã taoor soab meng wilgame tɩ bũmbã fãa segd n yɩɩ yãgbo.
A Zakoob yii a Labã nengẽ n zoe. A Zakoob wa n wʋma a Labã kom-dibli wã sẽn gomd n yetẽ: «A Zakoob reega tõnd ba wã laog zãnga. La yaa tõnd ba wã laogã yĩng n kɩt t'a lebg arzɛk soaba.» La a Zakoob mikame t'a Labã sũurã ka leb n noom ne yẽnda wa pĩndã ye. 
Pag sã n tar SIDAwã bãag bila, bɩ SIDAwã bãag menga,  dẽ yĩnga a segd n kõo a biiga a meng biisĩm bii?
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam yeelame yaa: «Da kolg ka ye. Piid f neooda wã, bala, zĩig ning fo sẽn yɛsã yaa zĩig sẽn welg toore.» Bãmb leb n yeelame: «Mam yaa fo ba wã Wẽnnaam, n yaa a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoob Wẽnnaam.» La a Moyiis luda a nenga, bala, yẽnda rag n zoeta rabeem n ka rat n ges Wẽnnaam ye. 
A Ezayu ne a Zakoob rogem. Ad a Abrahaam biig a Izak yagense. A Abrahaam n dog a Izake. 
Zemsame tɩ a pʋɩ zãmsog a ye fãa zĩis wʋsgo n zãms nebã. Ad  zãmsog a ye fãa sẽn segd n kẽn toto :
Yaa rẽ n kɩte, tɩ bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 29 ne a rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaasã sull n yik n deeg naamã, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n maneg n sigl tɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn da ka kẽnd sõma wã, tõog n tũ taoore.
La rĩmã yeela bãmb yaa: «Peeg-y mam tʋmtʋmdbã, la y zombg m biig a Salmo mam meng bõn-wɛɛgã zugu, n tall-a n kẽng Gihon. Rẽ poore, bɩ y lʋɩɩs-a taoore, n pʋg-a t'a wa zaoond mam zaoorẽ wã, bala yaa yẽnda n na n led mam zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. Mam kõta yẽnda noore, t'a soog Israyɛll ne Zʋʋda buudã nebã.» 
A sẽn wa n moe n sa, a rɩka laagã ne rɩɩbã, n bĩng a poorẽ wã.
pũg-yãangã sẽn  paam t’a Yamne gũsã, a yikame n saas a sυυgã, n kood kãmb a naasã. sẽn  ya likã, a pa bãng tι  yaa yẽ meng kambã la a sẽn koodã ye. A ra tẽedame tι  yaa kom-pugli wã.
Yaa bãmb n get reezẽo Sãntrã, Palatosãntralel, Lɛse, Sãntr wɛse Sãntrsɩɩde, Sãntr wɛse, Sãntr noore, la Sayɛllã soolem.
D sẽn pa rat tɩ b sãbs-dã, d modgda d manesem fãa pʋgẽ, n wilg tɩ d yaa Soaala tʋʋm-tʋmdba. D modgdame n sak lengr daar fãa, n sak sũ-beedo la yɩɩre, d modgda ne pʋ-peelem, ne bãngr baoobo, ne sũ-tõogo, ne taab sʋk ningri, ne yam sõng baoobo, ne taab nonglem akɩka, 
Yam pidung soab bɛɛ, sẽn gãe ne bãngr soab bɛɛ, zamaana gom minim soab bɛɛ? Wẽnd pa kɩt tɩ zamaana Sɩlma lebg gãeemdo? Zamaana ne a sɩlma sẽn ka tõog n bãng Wẽnd ne Wẽnd yam pidungã, yɩɩ ne goama, pika goam sẽn wẽnd gãeemdã, la Wẽnd tʋlg n fãag tẽedbã. 
Dẽ, rao ning sẽn yaa tẽngã soaalã yeelame: ‹Ad bũmb ning sẽn na n wilg tɩ yãmb yaa sɩd dãmba. Bas-y yãmb ba-biig a yembr ne maam ka, tɩ sẽn ket-bã tall koodã n tɩ kɩs yirã rãmba, tɩ komã yaa wʋsgo. 
Bãng-bãnge: M loee m wed-moaag roogẽ t'a zυυr likd yinga. Yaa bõe ? Leoore : Bugum sẽn be roogẽ tι bug-zõos yita.
Ad b sẽn maan terok-rãmbã to-to: B rag n maana b wamsã ne zũud sẽn yaa paklse, la b rɩk b wamsã n sog ne tebendsã. B rag n gʋla gɩgma, lolse, la serubẽ-rãmb naana pɩgdsã sẽn dag n dog wamsã zugã zutu. La b maana nag-teed sẽn yaa tɩ-puud buud n ning gɩgma wã ne lolsã yĩngr ne b tẽngr tɩ luundẽ. 
A Zakoob yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Pãng-Soab a Wẽnnaam vẽnega b meng ne maam Luuzi, Kana tẽnga pʋga, la b ninga maam barka. 
Kʋk zũnzũur pa mi tɩ tɩ-noog le beeme ye
Ka ne rasem a wãna, m na n lebame, maam ne tõnd zakã rãmb fãa. Nananda, reeg-y bĩisim. Yaa mam niigã bĩisim. Naaba sẽn wυm woto, a kιtame tι b yõk biigã n pag roogo.
Wẽnnaam tʋma malɛɛk Zeruzalɛm t'a kẽng n tɩ sãam tẽngã. La malɛɛkã sẽn sãamd tẽngã wakate, Sẽn-Ka-Saab gesame la b maana b bãngẽ ne to-kãnga. Dẽ, b yeela malɛɛkã sẽn dag n sãamd tẽngã yaa: Bas woto tɩ sekame! Wakat-kãng tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã rag n yɛsa a Zebuus ned a Ornan   zɛɛgã sɛɛgẽ. 
Dẽ, a Moyiis yeela bãmb yaa: «Yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n yeel tɩ b maan a woto. Beoog na n yɩɩ vʋʋsg daare. Yaa vʋʋsg daar sẽn welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab waoogr yĩnga. Yãmb sẽn dat n kɩɩm bũmb ninsã, bɩ y kɩɩme, la yãmb sẽn dat n dʋg bũmb ninsã, bɩ y rʋge. La bũmb nins fãa sẽn kellã, bɩ y bĩng tɩ ta beoogo.» 
Kibarã yii Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã la buuda goam taoor kẽndã kiba-kɩtb zĩigẽ.
B sã n na n kõ kibay zabra wɛɛngẽ, bɩ mao tɩ yɩ kibay nins sẽn na n kõ sodaasã raoodo, la a ra koms pãng ye.
A Yembi me yeelame yaa: “Mam me na n kẽngame; daarninga, m na tɩ paam zorãmb n paase.“
M ba Katr yalemda yĩnga a sɩd leba boka pʋga. Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel m ba Naafo : « Fo bao n na n fãaga m ba Katr t’a rat n kʋ foo, loog la f bas-a boka pʋga ».
 La, a zoa wã, yãag-a-la tɩɩm soab nengẽ, n tɩ ta n togs a zu-loɛɛgã.
D ka na n tũ sor a to wala sor ning d sẽn dɩka ka taas tõnd yãmb nengẽ ye. D taame menga ne Krista Koe-noogo. Tõnd pa na n pẽg d meng tɩ loog ne d taab tʋʋm ye la d saagdame tɩ y tẽeba sẽn yẽrgd n dabd taoorã, d na waa n lebg y zu-zẽkre wa sẽn yɩ zĩisa taabã. 
Bala, yãmb meng n wilg maam tɩ y na n kɩtame tɩ m yageng a yembr ledg maam m zaoorẽ wã. Yaa rẽ yĩng n kɩt tɩ m sũur keemẽ tɩ m yas yãmb taoor n pʋʋsdẽ. Taa yãmb yam tɩ y na n ning m doogã barka, t'a tõe n kaoos yãmb taoor wakat fãa. Bala yaa yãmb n so barka, la yãmb sã n ning barka, yaa wakat fãa yĩnga!» 
Yaa bõe tɩ Ezɩpt nebã na n yeele: ‹Wẽnnaam yiisa bãmb Ezɩpt tẽngã n na n tɩ kʋ-b tãmsã sʋka, tɩ b buudã menem tẽng zugu!› Bas-y yãmb sũ-kãbrã, la y ra maan y nebã wẽng ning y sẽn dag n dat n maan-bã ye. 
Vẽkembeoogo, a Moyiis yeela nebã yaa: «Yãmb kongame n maan yel-wẽn-kãsenga. La mam na n kẽnga Sẽn-Ka-Saab nengẽ moasã. Daarninga, mam na n paama sugr yãmb yel-wẽnã yĩnga.» 
La daar a yembre, a Zakoob rag n dʋgda a rɩɩbo, la a Ezayu yii a weoogã n lebg n wa, la a rag n yɛɛ zãnga. A Ezayu yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Mam kotame tɩ f yãk f rɩ-moomdã n kõ-m tɩ m dɩ. Bala, mam yɛɛ zãnga.» Rẽ kɩtame tɩ b pʋd a Ezayu yʋʋr t'a Edom, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹rɩ-moomde.› 
A Hamoor goma ne bãmb n yeel yaa: «Mam biig a Sɩkɛm yamã loee ne yãmb bi-puglã hal wʋsgo. Mam kot-y lame tɩ y rɩk-a n kõ m biigã t'a maan a paga. Woto, tõnd tõe n maana zood ne taaba, yi-kãadmã yĩnga, tɩ yãmb dɩkd y kom-pugli n kõt tõndo, la y peegd tõnd kom-pugli n maand y pagba. 
Yam-dãmb a yiib sã n wʋm-taab kibare,yaa wa b sẽn yã taaba
Ade, mam tara kom-pugli a yiib sẽn nan ka bãng rao ye, mam na n yiisa bãmb n kõ-yã, tɩ y maan bãmb wa y sẽn date. La bũmb sẽn be bala, ra maan-y rao-bãmbã bũmb ye. Bala, bãmb wa n siga mam zakẽ.» 
Ned kõn yõg wãoor n le zè a met ye
Nebã yeela maam yaa: ‹Maan wẽnnaam n kõ tõnd t'a lʋɩ tõnd taoor n tɛ-do. Bala, Moyiis-kãngã, rao ning sẽn yiis-a tõnd Ezɩpt tẽngã, tõnd ka mi bũmb ning sẽn paam-a ye.› 
Tʋb-kɩd wʋmda a wa reeg kõbre
Ned ning sẽn tara tẽng zug yama ka reegd sẽn yita Vʋʋsem Sõng nengẽ ye: dẽ zʋʋga a yam t'a ka tõe n deeg ye. Bũmba sẽn yɩɩd ninsaal yama, dẽnd a paam Wẽnd dẽnna n tõog n bãng b sẽn yala. 
Rɩk pe-raoog a yiibẽ soabã t'a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã palg b nus pe-rao-kãng zugã. La bɩ f kʋ pe-raoogã n yãk a zɩɩmã n tẽk a Aarõ rɩtg tʋbrã, ne yẽnda kom-dibli wã rɩtg tʋbã, la bãmb dɩtg nug-raadã ne b rɩtg nao-raadã, la bɩ f rɩk zɩɩmã sẽn ketã n daag n gilg tẽn-kugrã kɩremsã fãa. 
Bãng -bãnge: Mam taa tẽngẽ tι sẽn  ki-bã pυυsd maam, tι sẽn vι-bã sĩnd b noore. Yaa bõe? Leoore :  Tιιg tẽngr vã-koeemsã ne vã-maasã.
La a Zozɛf yeelame: «Ayo! Mam ka na n maan a woto ye. Yaa b sẽn yãnd mam wũmblã ned ning nengẽ wã n na n lebg mam yamba, la yãmb tõe n lebg n leba y ba wã nengẽ ne bãane.». A Zʋʋda yõka a Zozɛf sɛɛga 
Kiuug piig soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Netofa tẽng rao a Maharayi sẽn yaa Zerak buudã ned a yembrã n dag get sull piig soabã yelle. A Maharayi sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. Kiuug piig la a yembr soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Piraton tẽng rao a Benaya sẽn yaa Efrayiim yagensã sʋk ned a yembrã n dag n get sull piig la a yembr soabã yelle. Yẽnda sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. 
La a Moyiis leokame: «Yãmb meng n na n kõ tõnd rũms tɩ d maan zems-n-taar maoongã, ne maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã. 
Rẽ ra sẽn da pɩʋʋgã, d fãa ra tẽedame tɩ naam-wẽ-n-dɩkã na ya n kolg weoogo, la moos maan b gomd tɩ « bɛ sã n digdg-f n ka yalse, bɩ f me ra yals ye».
Yãg-yãg n daad baag zugu.
La Wẽnnaam waa a Abimelɛk nengẽ yʋng zãmsd pʋg n yeel-a yaa: «Fo na n kii pag ning fo sẽn peegã poorẽ. Bala, yẽnda tara sɩda.» La rẽ t'a Abimelɛk dag n nan ka kẽ ne a Saara ye. Dẽ, yẽnda sokame yaa: «Zu-soaba, yãmb na n sak n sãama maam ne m tẽnga, baa mam sã n tar bʋʋm? 
Ne raood la ne sũnoogo, a paasa neba pãnga tɩ b tõog n kelg bũmb niisa fãa sẽn kẽed SIDAwã bãag wɛɛngẽ sẽn ya toogã.
Ra maan sũ-kiir ne f to zak ye. Ra maan sũ-kiir ne f to pag wall a yem-daoogo, bɩ a yem-poaka, wall a loalga, bɩ a bõanga, wall bũmb ning fãa sẽn yaa fo to rẽnd ye.» 
Tʋʋmdã ra gãnegame tɩ b na n zĩnda rasem a yiib n tʋme, la a wa n tɩ paga a kʋɩlens badaare, yʋng wakat piig «1h00» sasa.
Bãmb taa Maara, la b ka tõog n yũ Maara koomã ye. Bala, a rag n yaa toogo. Yaa woto n kɩt tɩ b pʋd zĩigã yʋʋr tɩ Maara. 
F sã n kẽ saoog n pa yã kilsg bɩ f targ n leb poorẽ
Havɩla tẽng sãnemã yaa sãnem halaale. Soolem-kãng pʋgẽ me, tɩɩs buud sũm sẽn tar yũ-noogo, la kugr buud b sẽn boond tɩ Onigs n be beenẽ. Ko-sor a yiibẽ soabã yʋʋr boondame tɩ ‹Gihon.› Ko-so-kãng zoetame n gilgd Kuus  tẽngã. 
Ned sã n yãg tɩ malge, a sã n maag-a-meng-n-yɩɩda.
B wilgame tɩ wakat sẽn wate, b na n boola tẽngã tʋʋm noy taood dãmba, la tẽngã neb buud toor-toore, tɩ b lebg n gʋls noy nins b sẽn na n tũ n zã tãrãzisẽo wã.
Koomã rag n fẽbgda bilf-bilf dũniyã zugu, la rasem koabg la pis-nu pʋgẽ, a boogame. Koomã rag n ket n boogdame hal tɩ ta kiuug piig soabã. Kiuug piig soabã pipi daarã, tãmsã zut pukame. 
À T’a Sĩndbal sok-a: Yell paam tôndo? Ãnda? Yell paam foo kae. Pa foo n dιk korgã la? Mam toog be be?  Nebã pema a Ratzãng n tall-a n kẽng na-yiri, n yaoo! N bas a Sĩndbal tι yẽ loog a loogre.  Kiba-kãngã wilgdame tι ned pa sedg n yã ligd n yĩm zood ye.
Wakat ning Wẽnnaam sẽn wa n na n sãam tẽms nins sẽn be kunkubã zutã, bãmb tẽega a Abrahaam yelle, la b yiisa a Lot t'a põs sãoongã, wakat ning bãmb sẽn wa n na n sãam tẽms nins a Lot sẽn dag n beẽ wã. Moaab ne Amo buudã sɩngre 
A Lot sẽn wa n na n ta Sowaar tẽngã, rẽ tɩ sõorã pukdame. Bãmb sãama tẽn-bãmb b yiibã, ne b kunkubã, la b tẽngã nebã fãa, la ne bõn-bɩtsã sẽn yi tẽn-gãongã zugã zãnga. 
Sũm-wagdr bas-a-meng-ne-Wẽnde, zĩ-soalgd kae ye.
A pẽgda Fõndasẽo Ebomaf b sẽn kõ-b kũunã.
Sẽn kẽed ne sodaarã wɛɛngẽ, a wilgame tɩ yaa tẽngã taoor soab n na n ges rẽ.
A koeesã pʋgẽ, a lebg n tẽeg bũmb nins fãa sẽn pɩʋʋg tẽngã, sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 24 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
Bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tãrãzisẽo wã taoor soaba, Liyetena Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB tɩ kaaga Nizɛɛr tẽnga taoor soaba, A Mohameed BAZUM, b soasgã pʋgẽ, b goma yõ-koglgã tẽns a tãabã toos pʋgẽ, la Ze 5 Sayɛllã me yelle.
Ziif sã n yi koomẽ n wa yeel tɩ yẽbg nin n zabde, ned pa tõe n kɩɩs ye
Bɩ yãmb da rɩ bũmb sẽn ning rã-bɩll ye. Yãmb sẽn be zĩig ning fãa, bɩ y rɩ bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle. 
La a Moyiis baoome n na n sigs Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yẽnda Wẽnnaamã sũuri. Yẽnda soka bãmb yaa: «Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yaa bõe tɩ yãmb sũur kãbd wʋsg ne yãmb nebã yãmb sẽn yiis Ezɩpt ne pãn-kãsenga, la ne nug sẽn tar pãngã? 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Sig n keoog nebã tɩ b ra wa yɩ tao-tao n kolg Sẽn-Ka-Saab n na n gese, tɩ neb wʋsg bãmb sʋkã wa sãam ye. Bɩ maan-kʋʋdbã me sẽn kolgd maamã me yɩlg b mense, tɩ m da wa sãam neb bãmb sʋkã ye.» 
Raag kisgu,togsda a raag luglug raare.
Sũ-tõog soab n yũud nag-kɩr bĩisim
A sɛgla sɛb bõoneg ne moore, n na n bilg neba b  sẽn na n maan toto tɩ SIDAwã bãaga bil da yõk-ba, la bsẽn na n maan toto me n ges SIDAwã bãag sẽn yõk neb niisã yell tɩ yɩ sõama.
Wakat ning mam sẽn na n tẽeg m nugã Ezɩpt tẽngã n yiis Israyɛll nebã bãmb sʋkã, Ezɩpt rãmbã na n bãngame tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» Wakat ning bãmb sẽn kẽng n na n tɩ gom ne Faarõ wã, rẽ t'a Moyiis tara yʋʋm pis-nii, t'a Aarõ tar yʋʋm pis-nii la a tãabo. 
A Kayẽ yeela Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa: «Mam kongrã sɩbgr yaa kãseng wʋsg n yɩɩd mam sẽn tõe n zɩ. Yãmb digda maam dũndã n yiisd tẽng ning sẽn sakd koobã pʋga, tɩ mam ka na n tõog n leb n yãnd yãmb yɛs ye, la m na n yɩɩ yɛɛbda, n ka yas zĩ-yɛng dũniyã zug ye. La ned ning sẽn yãnd maam, a na n kʋʋ maam.» 
A Aarõ ne Israyɛll nebã fãa yãndame t'a Moyiis nengã pɩndame. Dẽ, bãmb zoee rabeem n ka rat n kolg-a ye. Dẽ poorẽ, Israyɛll nebã fãa yaool n kolgame, la yẽnda togsa bãmb bũmb nins fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn togs yẽnda Sinayi tãngã zugã. 
Bugum sok waongo, n paas zũnd-zãnde.
Pʋ-peelem ka rɩɩb ye, la a be basem yam
Burkĩna Faso gosneerã  teka bilfu.
Sãan ka mi long ye
Yɩ-y mam togs-n-taase wa m meng sẽn ya Krista togs-n-taaga. 
Wakɩr sã n lʋɩ bulgẽ ne nif sãagre, f sãamda turs n bao-a
Burkĩna Faso gosneerã wilga a sũ-sãang ne kibarã ka sɩd ye.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-biis katɛk yii Gibo tẽngã pʋg n kẽn n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ Gosneer lebg n pak b karen-dotã tɩ b paam n karem.
Ned sã n wãb yiu bɩ a ra yĩm yibeoog saag yell ye.
Politik rãmba, la lagem-n-taarã sula neb kẽer zẽka koeese, la b kosa tẽngã taoor soab t’a kẽes-b na-kẽnd paall ning a sẽn dɩke, wilg tẽngã koglg wɛɛngẽ wã.
Rẽ zugẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Eli n yeel-a yaa: A Eli yikame n dɩk Sarepta sore, la yẽnda sẽn ta tẽngã noore, a yãnda pʋg-kõor sẽn dag n wɩɩsd raado. A Eli boola pʋg-kõorã n yeel-a: «Paga, m kotame tɩ f kẽng n tɩ toog koom bilf ne wamd n wa kõ-m tɩ m yũ.» 
Kɩɩb rɩt medga, tɩ wẽnd pund bɩɩm
A sigbã poore, sodaas nins sẽn deeg tẽngã yiisa mooneg koɛɛg n pʋʋs nin-buiidã, la b wilg tɩ b na n sega ministɛɛr dãmbã seb-gʋndb taoor rãmb tɩ b zĩnd ne taab n ges tʋʋm-yãgdem nins sẽn be.
Dẽ, zĩiga sẽn sobge a Pok kolga a ma n sok-a yaa: “Sidawã Bãag tara m baaba sɩdaa? Togs-m yaa tɩ mame lebga bi-kãseng wɛ! A ma sulga a nẽnga, dẽ, a Pok mikame t‘a ma yãbdame.
Yaa Wẽnd Ba sẽn mi fãa wã n tũus yãmb al daar woko, t'a Vʋʋsem Sõng pids-y ne b kũuni, tɩ y na n pʋg a Zezi Krista la y sak tɩ b mes-y ne b meng zɩɩm. Bɩ Wẽnd nimbãan-zoeere la b laafi sig y zug zembala! 
Tι katr yeel tι yaa yẽ pag a Pok n dυυg n yet tι yẽ wa wυke. Soaamb yaool n miime tι yaa zĩrimbeed bal fass... La a pãngã sẽn pa tõe katr yĩnga, a yeel-a lame t'a wυke, tι katr sιd Wυk n sui a waoogẽ.
M taa Troas n moon Krista Koe-noogã. M mikame tɩ Soaala paka kʋɩlensa yalengo n kõ-m be, baasg fãa m sũura pa tol n gãand laafi tɩ m pa yãend m saam-biig a Tit ye. M pʋʋs-b lame n le wẽnemd n dɩk Masedoan tẽng sor. 
Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab wẽnemd tõnd sũyã n tees bãmba, n kɩt tɩ tõnd sak bãmb tʋlsmã fãa, ne b tõodã la b noyã ne b minind nins fãa bãmb sẽn dag n kõ tõnd yaab-rãmbã. Woto, dũniyã nebã fãa na n bãngame tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab bal n yaa Wẽnnaam, la Wẽnnaam a to ka be ye. 
Moasã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam Wẽnnaamã kɩtame tɩ mam soolmã fãa zĩ bãane, la b kɩt tɩ mam ka leb n tar bɛyã, la toog me ka leb n beẽ ye. Dẽ yĩngã, mam tagsdame n dat n me roog Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam Wẽnnaamã yʋʋr yĩnga. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n yeela m ba a Davɩɩd woto: Fo bi-ribl ning mam sẽn na n kɩt t'a led fo zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã, n na n me roog mam yʋʋrã yĩnga. 
Yʋgempeend yãab-raar la a rɩkr-daare.
M ba Katr sẽn yã rẽ wã, a tẽedame, tɩ yaa noosã, t’a kẽng n ta, n kool n sui a waoogẽ, n tall n kuili.
Wẽnnaam yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Mam yaa Pãng-Soab a Wẽnnaam. Bɩ f paam dogem n fɩɩg n lebg wʋsgo, fo na n yɩɩ bu-kãsenga, la buud wʋsg na n yii fo pʋgẽ. La rĩm-dãmb na n yii fo pʋgẽ. 
Neb kẽer reegdame n dɩgendẽ tɩ b wa kõ-b bũmb tɩ b yaool gese.
·  A soaba yĩnga zagemdame.
Yʋng-noaag ka sãoor ye.
Dẽ yĩnga tɩ tags tɩ pʋgsad ka mɩ rao ne nebã yaa sũnoog bii ? bɩ yaa yãnde?
Vɩʋʋg ka relld ye.
M pa kɩɩs yoob wa rɩkr ye
Ãna n get kɩɩbsa yelle ? B sãn ka tar ba rãmb sẽn get b yelle, bõe n maande ? B segd n paama bõe ?
Yʋʋma sẽn loog sẽn ka  kaoose, lɔgtor yir bãngdba maoome n na n gɩdg tɩ bãaga bil da yõk neb  wʋsog Afirik soolome ye. Neb kẽer wɩsga b pãng n moon tɩ b rɩkd suudã  b sẽn boond tɩ kapotã tɩ bãaga bil da yõk b ye.
Tẽegre, yɩɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 25 yʋʋm 2022 soabã la b yiis mooneg koɛɛg n wilg neb nins b sẽn yãk tɩ b zĩnd gosneerã pʋgẽ.
La, a ba wã sɩd wa makame, n kong n deeg zũurã n kõ-a.
Yaa m sũura sẽn da kegem woto la m da rat n deng n tũ y nengẽ n le paas y sũ-noogo. Wala Wẽnd sẽn yɛs b sɩd zĩigẽ, tõnd goama ne yãmb ka naag n yɩ N-yẽe la Ayoo ye. 
La mikame t'a Labã rag n kẽnga a rũm-bãooneg wõrsgo. A Rasɛll zuu a ba wã wẽn-naandse. A Zakoob wʋka a sẽn so wã fãa n zoe. Yẽnda yikame n pɩʋʋg kʋɩlgã n kẽng Galaad soolem ning sẽn be tãms sʋkã sẽnẽ. A Labã babsa a Zakoobe 
Bãmb tõeeme n tal suudã b sãn dat n lagm taaba. La b  segd n zãmsa a sẽn maand toto wakat fãa.
Yãmb da yaa wa pe-yãans sẽn kẽ weoogo la marsã y le leba y pe-kɩɩma la y sɩɩsa gũud nengẽ. 
Vel kĩga yaa nana, la bʋkem-bʋkem lebga toogo
Kur n bao la nang tão-a
Tɩp tɩɩm soaba m ba Yũuga
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Mam sɩɩgã ka na n kell n pa ninsaal pʋgẽ wakat sẽn kõn sa yĩng ye. Bala, ninsaal yaa yĩng bala. Dẽ, yẽnda yʋʋmã na n yɩɩ koabg la pisi.» 
Tab koaas pa mi t'a tab pa noom ye
B sã n deeme, b na n yãame».
Rĩmã yeela maan-kʋʋd a Abiyataar yaa: «Yik n kẽng Anatot sẽn yaa fo zĩigã, bala, m dag n tog n kʋʋ foom, la rũndã, m ka na n kʋ-f ye. Bala, fo rag n tʋka Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Zu-soabã kaoolã koglgã n lʋɩ m ba a Davɩɩd taoore, la f naaga m ba a Davɩɩd b namsgã fãa pʋga.» 
Nanambs a yiibã sõasg ne taab loogr poore, b tẽnsã taoor dãmb me zĩnda ne taab n sõse.
Yaa rẽ n so, tɩ sodaas sẽn be ƐMPESƐƐRÃ pʋgẽ ges tɩ tʋʋmd nins sẽn maandã pa b sẽn da tʋlg a soabã ye.
Yoaad a yembr kibare.
A Nowe leb n yeelame: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, sẽn yaa a Sɛm Wẽnnaamã paam pẽgre. Bɩ a Kana yɩ bãmb yamba! A Nowe sẽn wa n na n ki wã t'a tara yʋʋm kobs-wɛ la pis-nu. 
Fo zab ne gãeenga, pa tar yõodo, fo sĩnd f noor me, sũ-toogo.
Tõnd tɩɩm pa kis bɩt ye
Bɩ b yãk a zɩɩmã n mes y rot nins yãmb sẽn na n zĩnd-b pʋs n dɩ-a wã lug a yiibã zutu, la y mes rignoorã zugẽ. Badaar yʋngo, bɩ y sẽ rũngã, la y wãb a nemdã ne bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle, la ne mood sẽn yaa toogo. 
ƐMPEYƐSƐR taoor dãmbã wilga mooneg koɛɛgã pʋga, tɩ yaa ne sũ-ka-noong la b wʋmd tɩ neb yiisd koees n boondẽ tɩ b yi n gɩdg CEDEAO wã sẽn tʋʋm b rãmb tɩ b wa seg tẽngã taoor dãmb tɩ b zĩnd n sõsã.
Zõang sã n yẽgd longo, pʋleng yẽgda wẽnde
A kom tar yaka, kom tar da-gjʋngo.
«Fo yãnda a Akaab sẽn sik a meng to-to mam taoorã bɩ? Yẽnda sẽn sik a meng mam taoorã yĩnga, mam ka na n kɩt tɩ yel-beedã paam-a a sẽn ket n vɩ wã wakat ye. La yaa wakat ning yẽnda biig sẽn wat n dɩt naamã la mam na n kɩt tɩ yel-beedã paam a roogã.» 
Yaa neb 30 la b yãk tɩ b lʋɩ tʋʋmdã siglg taoore.
SIDAwã tõe n yõka raopa sẽn ya yʋʋm 20 tɩ ta 39 naana n kʋba.  Yaa neer tɩ b bãng b sẽn na n maan toto tɩ bãaga da yõk ba  wala tɩ bãaga bil da saag neb a taab ye. Yaa neer me tɩ b bãng  b sẽn tõe n zã bãad toto tɩ bãaga da wa yõk b ye.
Rõandã yʋʋmdã, ya a naoor 62 tig-tẽegre.
Nangur waoor la a sẽebo.
B tog n ninga bãg-tabd a yiib a zĩis a yiibã, n tong fuugã taoor ne a poorẽ. Bɩ b kell n sẽ maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã sẽbdga t'a tabend ne fuugã menga, ne sãnem gĩsi la gĩs sẽn yaa miuug masɩ, la sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, ne gĩs-moaama la gĩs-miidu, ne lamd gĩs-bãanegã. 
Pag sẽn tar SIDAwã bãaga bɩ a bilã sãn yẽsemd a biiga, bãaga  bil tõe n tunega a biisĩma n yõk biigã. Yãmb sãn dat n kogel y  biigã, ad soɛ:
Ned sã n peng rũng ned a to nengẽ tɩ rũngã yĩng will sã n kaooge, wall a ki a soab sẽn ka be beenẽ wakate, bɩ sẽn peng-a rũngã yao. La rũngã soab sã n be beenẽ, bɩ a ra yao ye. La b sã n dag n sara ne taab tɩ yẽnda na n yao rũngã soab rũngã tʋʋmdã yĩnga, bɩ a yao rũngã soab a tʋʋmdã yaoodo. 
Neb katɛk n yi zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Gɛpaga la Tapoa porvẽesã pʋg n kotẽ tɩ b lebg n pags b karen-dotã kʋɩlense.
Neb nins sẽn baood n lebg arzegs rãmbã lʋɩta makr pʋgẽ, la kũusr pʋgẽ, datem wʋsg sẽn yaa yalemd la wẽns pʋsẽ, la bõn-kãens kẽesda ninsaalbã sãoong la meneng pʋgẽ. Bala, ligdã nonglem yaa bõn-wẽnsã fãa yẽgre. La neb kẽer sẽn nong ligd wʋsgã menemame n zãag ne tẽebã, la b sɩbga b mens ne tood buud toay-toaya. 
Tɩ Gomtɩʋʋg yeele : « Wẽnnaam sẽn waa na n naan maam wakato, tẽngãongã meng da yaa begdo, tɩ Wẽnnaam yeel tɩ m kẽnd n gũusdẽ la m soosdẽ n da wa salg n lʋɩ ye. Ya rẽ yĩng tɩ m kẽnd n soosd wa m bee gɛl zutu.»
Maam yẽe maana yam n fãag-m-menga ; Fo me bãng  sẽn na n maaneg n yi.
A Abrahaam peega pag a Ketʋra n paase. A Abrahaam leb n peega pag a to n paase. Pʋg-kãng yʋʋr la a Ketʋra. A Ketʋra roga a Abrahaam kamba. Yaa a Zimran ne a Yoksan la a Medan ne a Madiyã la a Yisebak ne a Suwa. 
Rãam yʋʋr tẽga a to bokẽ
Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor soab togsa tẽngã nu-gãaga.
Komindã taoor saob bẽda be, n bool neb nins sẽn deeg zĩisã Wagaẽntɛɛr gaarẽ wã, tɩ b modg n dɩk b zĩisã.
 Tɩ biigã sɩd be ne-a taoor sãagre, n tɩ ta zĩ-peel pʋgẽ, n fãeeg-a be.
Ned fãa togame n bãng a yel-sõm-dãmb la a bẽeb n bake
«Maan fut sẽn welg toor n kõ f kẽem a Aarõ, sẽn na n wilg yẽnda a zĩiga, la a naam. 
 T’a bõnyẽeg kok n lembe, n bas n yeel m ba Soaamba : «Ad Katrã fulfuldã noomame dɛ»!
Dẽ n so tɩ d vɩ ne d yĩngã bɩ d yeeg-a lame n base, d sẽn baood la Wẽnd daab maaneg bala. D sẽn ya a soab fãa, d na n yaasa d kãre bʋʋda raare tɩ ned kam fãa reeg a tʋʋm keoore, tʋʋmd ninga a sẽn tʋme, a sẽn da waa n ket ne a yĩnga, a tʋʋm sõng wala a tʋʋm wẽnga. 
Sa-kẽengã waoongo. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Nowe yaa: «Bɩ foom ne f pagã, la f zakã rãmb fãa kẽ koom koglgã pʋga. Bala, mam gesame, tɩ fo zamaanã nebã sʋka, yaa foom f yembr n yaa nin-tɩrg mam taoore. 
Wʋg fuug ne lamd gĩs-bãanega, la f maan zu-vindg ne lamd gĩs-bãanega. La f wʋg sẽbdg sẽn kãde, t'a yaa neere.» 
A Zozɛf yeela a baaba yaa: «Ka woto ye m baaba! Bala, yaa ada soabã n yaa kẽema! Ning-y y nug-rɩtgã yẽnda zugu.» 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 29 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-saamb a Zãmbatiis BÕNTOOG sega kiba-kɩtbã n wilg t’a yiisa reem paalle, t’a yʋʋrã ya Tẽeg-n-paase.
Sulla neba segd n naaga taab n ges yam-yak paalg bʋg la b na n yãke ned  fãa yĩnga la wẽndooga ne b tẽnga yĩnga.
Sẽn tar-a pãng n tar sugri.
Dẽ, a Koore ne a Meraari kom-dibli nins sẽn yaa rigno-gũudbã ne b sulã la woto. Tʋʋm b sẽn kõ Leevi neb kẽere. Yeyiyɛll buudã neb ne b kom-dibli wã, ne a Zetam ne a yao a Zowɛlle, bãmb n get Wẽnnaam doogã laog yelle. 
A Zakoob yeela a Labã yaa: «Kõ-y maam m pagã tɩ mam tʋʋmdã wakat pidame tɩ m dat n peeg m pagã.» La zĩigã sẽn sobge, a Labã peega a bi-pugl a Leya n tɩ kõ a Zakoobe, la a Zakoob kẽe ne-a. 
A kinkirg zomb reoogo, zu-wees paam taaba.
Nug-bi yang ka wʋkd zom ye.
Woto wã tʋm-y burkĩndlem tʋʋma. Da lʋɩɩs-y burkĩndlema taoore n dɩk menesg sor ye, yɩɩ-y Wẽnd tũudb bala. Waoog-y neb fãa, nong-y y saam-biisi, zoe-y Wẽnde, la waoog-y dĩma. 
Zug sã n põnge, ka pam ye.
Yaa rẽ tɩ Gibo karen-biisã yi n kẽn n wilgi, tɩ b sũur ka noom ne ye.
Zɩɩmã sẽn be rot nins yãmb sẽn be b pʋsẽ wã zutã na n yɩɩ bãnd yãmb yĩnga. La mam sã n yãnd zɩɩmã, mam na n zʋʋg n basa yãmba, la toog sẽn sãamdã ka na n paam yãmb wakat ning mam sẽn na n sɩbg Ezɩptã ye. 
La Edom nanambsã pelens yɩkame.  Moaab pãens rãmbã rigdame. Kana nebã fãa gĩin maagame. Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, rabeem-kãseng  ne yɛɛsg yõka bãmba, yãmb nugã pãn-kãseng yĩnga. Bãmb lebga mugs wa kugri, hal tɩ yãmb nebã looge, hal tɩ yãmb nebã yãmb sẽn da wã looge. 
A Davɩɩd lebga Israyɛll dĩma. Israyɛll nebã fãa tigma taab a Davɩɩd nengẽ Ebrõ n yeel-a yaa: «Tõnd ne yãmb yaa bũmb a yembre. A Sayull sẽn dag n yaa rĩmã wakate, yaa yãmb n dag n luɩt Israyɛll nebã taoor wakat fãa tɩ b kẽnd n zabdẽ, la y lʋɩt b taoor tɩ b lebg n wa.» Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã yeela yãmb yaa: «Foom n na n yɩ Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã pe-kɩɩma. Foom n na n lebg Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã naaba.» 
B na n tõog n baasa b lekollã.
A Izak rag n tara rũm-bãoonego, la rũm-bɛd wʋsgo, la a tar tʋmtʋmdb wʋsgo. Woto kɩtame tɩ Filistẽ-dãmbã maan sũ-kiir ne a Izak paoongã. Filistẽ-dãmbã wʋka tom n yẽd buls nins fãa a Izak ba a Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdbã sẽn dag n tu a Abrahaam wakatẽ wã. 
A ta n dιka a rasaarã n wẽ yolgã la a gomd a yembre: Yaa ãnd soab n yĩm a yolg ka? A Yamyιιd zĩnda yolgã pυg n yeele: Hũmm...! Y maand-m-la pãnga. N yet tι m pa rat n yι naaba, tι y rat n modg-m n kõ naam. Ayo. M pa rat n yι naab ye.
Dao sã n fõgen bũmb a zug n na n pʋʋs Wẽnd bɩ n na n togs b goama, a paoogda a zu-soaba. 
Reezẽo de lɛs nin-buiidã yiime n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b pak b karen-dotã.
M pẽgd-y la y sẽn tẽeg m yell bũmba fãa pʋgẽ la y reeg m noya fãa wala m sẽn wilg-y. M datame tɩ y bãng tɩ rao tara zu-soaba, yaa Krista; la pag me zu-soab la raoa, tɩ Krista Zu-soaba ya Wẽnnaam. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã, la buudã goam taoor kẽnd seb-gʋnd-kaseng a Yɩbrayɩɩm SANO, tɩ kõo sor tɩ yʋʋm 2022 n la yʋʋm 2023 soabã, kaoreng pak a kʋɩlense.
Põng-m tɩ m põng-f pa be keoor ye
La a Salmo yeelame: «A Adoniza sã n maan sẽn yaa sõama, yẽnda zoobg ba a yembr kõn lʋɩ tẽng ye. La a sã n tagsd n dat n maan sẽn yaa wẽnga, bɩ a bãng t'a na n kiime.» Rĩm a Salmo tʋma neb tɩ b tɩ yiis-a tẽn-kugrẽ wã n wa. La a wa n ta n wõgemda rĩm a Salmo taoore. La rĩmã yeel-a lame t'a yik n kuili. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 12 sẽn loogã, sull ning sẽn sigl kẽndã taoor dãmb sega kiba-kɩtbã n wilg b sẽn tagsd bũmb ning Reezẽo de lɛs zugu, la b kos tẽngã taoor dãmb tɩ b puk b nin n ges tɩ karen-biis sõor sẽn ta tus 100000 n be Reezẽo wã pʋg n dat n leb b karen-dotẽ wã.
Bãmb yeela maam yaa: Ad maam! Mam na n kõ-f-la rogem, la m na n kɩtame tɩ f fɩɩg n lebg wʋsgo, la m kɩt tɩ f lebg buud wʋsg ba. Fo loogr poore, mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo yagensã soog tẽn-kãngã wakat sẽn kõn sa. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 6 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso galentẽngã pʋgẽ, kom-bɩɩb ka tɛk n yi n tigim Ɛɛrtebe televisẽo wã zak noore, n wilg b sũ-pa-noaang ne b sẽn wʋm tɩ sodaasã taoor dãmb tigma taaba, la sã n ya ne bãmba, b tigs-taabã yaa sẽn dat n deeg Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE naamã.
B togsa toog piig soabã waoongo. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Mam na n kɩtame tɩ toog a to paam Ezɩpt rĩmã ne a nebã: Dẽ poore, yẽnda na n basa yãmb tɩ y loog n yi zĩ-kãngã. La a sã n wa kong n na n bas yãmb tɩ y looge, a na n diga yãmb tɩ y yi n looge. 
Woto yĩngã, mam kot-y lame, tɩ y fãag maam m kẽem a Ezayu nugẽ! Bala, mam zoeta rabeem t'a na n wa kʋ maam ne m pagbã ne b kambã! Yãmb yaool n yeela maam tɩ: ‹Mam na n maan-f-la neere, n kɩt tɩ f yagensã lebg wʋsg wa ko-kãsengã noor bĩisrã, tɩ b ka tõe n sõd n sɛ ye.› » 
A pag rog y aim kõ n tɩk vjẽela.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 5 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaas nins sẽn deeg Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022, gãnega na-kẽndr ning b sẽn na n dɩk n zã tẽngã t’a tũ sari sore, waoog taaba, la soog-m-meng pʋgẽ.
yaa Ebrõ sẽn be Zʋʋda wã ne a kɩremsã, la Aaza ne a kɩremsã, la Bɛt-Semees ne a kɩremsã, 
La yẽnda maana sãnem sogds pis-nu n sog pɛɛlã ne taab tɩ b lebg roog a yembre. B bogla pɛɛl a nu wã ne taaba, la b bogl a yoobã sẽn kellã me ne taaba. 
Woto, Wẽnnaam  toẽ n maaga b sũyã, la b kɩt tɩ laafɩ la sũnoog lebg n pid sũ-kãense.
Yaa beenẽ la mam na n seg foom. Mam na n goma ne foom bas-taal zĩigã zugẽ, serubẽ-rãmb a yiibã sẽn be kaset koglgã zugẽ wã sʋka, n kõ foom mam noyã fãa Israyɛll nebã yĩnga.» 
Pipi toogo: koom sẽn tek n lebg zɩɩm. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Faarõ sũurã riglmame. Yẽnda zãgsame n ka rat n bas nebã tɩ b loog ye. 
Pipi, b na n zĩniga porze t’a yãag kibayã kũun tʋʋm-noy tɩ b tõoge, n tʋm tɩ b tʋʋma yɩ naana, wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ.
 La rẽ tɛka, rao wã pa le tõe n gũs ye. Tɩ bala, a ra tara tagsg wʋsg a mengã ne a paoongã yĩnga.
Bãmb leokame: «Ayo! D soaala, ka woto ye! Yãmb yembsã wa n na n daa koodo! La a Zozɛf yeel-b lame: «Ka sɩd ye. Yãmb wa n dat n bãnga tẽngã pãn-komsem zĩiga.» 
Tι Pυg-yãangã yeel-a tι yell ka be ye. A sιd loogame n kẽnge, n tι kaoos bilfu, n lebg n wa. Pυg-yãangã kẽeme.
Bɩ neb nins sẽn be yembd pʋgẽ wã ges b mens zu-soben-dãmbã wa neb sẽn zems ne waoogr fãa, tɩ b ra wa n paoog Wẽnnaam yʋʋrã la tẽeb zãmsgã ye. La neb nins zu-soben-dãmb sẽn yaa Kiris tẽedbã, b ka tog n paoog-b n yetẽ tɩ bãmb yaa ba-biis ne taab ye. B tog n tʋma b yĩng sõama n yɩɩda, bala, b yaa tẽedbã, la nin-nongds bãmb sẽn maood tɩ maan-b neere.  Ad bũmb nins fo sẽn tog n zãms nebã la f sagl-b tɩ b sake. 
Gosneer  na n yiisa milyaar 10 n kẽes Sapaol-koobã pʋgẽ.
Dẽ, a Eli talla kug-bãmb n me tẽn-kugr Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋrã yĩnga. Yẽnda tuu bok n gilg tẽn-kugrã. La bokã zulum tõe n deega rʋg-bɛd a yiib koom. La a Eli yeelame yaa: «Pids-y ko-yʋy a naasã koom n wa kiig maoongã ne raadã zugu.» La a leb n yeel tɩ b tall n wa ne yɛsa, la b maana a woto. La a Eli yeelame tɩ b leb n maan a woto naoor a tãabẽ soaba, la b maaname. 
Kʋlg be koom, raad n togsde
Pag ka lub a pʋg-to, la a sõrsg be neere.
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam pʋda tẽn-gãongã yʋʋr tɩ ‹tẽnga›, la b pʋd koomã sẽn tigma yʋʋr tɩ ‹ko-kãsemse.› Wẽnnaam yãame tɩ bõn-kãng yaa sõama. 
Bɩ f tall lol-pollã n wa sɛk roogã noore, la bɩ a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã palg bãmb nus lol-pollã zugu. La f tẽk f nug-bil lol-pollã zɩɩm pʋgẽ n mes tẽn-kugrã. La f raag zɩɩm ning sẽn kellã fãa tẽn-kugrã sɛɛgẽ. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Gʋls gom-kãensã. Bala, yaa ne gom-kãensã la mam maand kaool ne foom, la ne Israyɛlle.» A Moyiis paa ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab rasem pis-naase, n ka rɩ rɩɩbo, la a ka yũ koom ye. La yẽnda gʋlsa kãabg goamã sẽn yaa tõod piigã kug-walsã zutu. 
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab rɩka sĩifã kõbr ning bãmb sẽn yãk ninsaalã sĩifẽ wã n naan pag n tall-a n wa ninsaal nengẽ. La ninsaal yeelame:  «Ade, moasã, yõwã yaa mam kõabã kõbre, la mam yĩngã neongo. B na n boonda yẽnda tɩ paga:  Bala, b yãka yẽnda rao yĩngẽ.» 
Ned sã n do f raag ne kuga, f rooda a raag ne kuga
Wagdr pag yɩɩd a sɩda.
A pẽ naab n tʋkd a zãr-naab waooga
Wa yʋʋmd fãa sapaolg kiuug pipi daare, Bukĩna Faso Sodaasã tẽegda b tʋʋmdã siglgu.
La daar a yembr zaabre, a Izak yiime n na n kẽng we-kɛɛng n kok pemsem. La a Izak sẽn zẽk n gese, a nee yʋgma sẽn wate. A Rebeka me zẽkame n gese, la a yãnda a Izake. Dẽ, a yɩka yʋgemdã zug n sigi. 
Tẽn-bãmb yaa Kɛn nebã, ne Keniiz nebã, la Kadmon-rãmbã, la Amoor-dãmbã, ne Kana-rãmbã, la Girgaaz nebã, la Zebuus nebã tẽmse.» 
Pĩim sã n kẽ koẽeg bɩ b yiis-a koẽega
Rũng sẽn deng n dum bãada sãn n wa rũm yãmba ? (Ayo)
Tẽng sã n zãr, a to n be taoore.
Yeelg f kẽem a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã ne fu-kãense. La f pʋdg kaam bãmb zut n ning tʋʋmdã bãmb zutu, n welg bãmb toor tɩ b maan maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd mam taoore. 
tõnd nengẽ Wẽnd yaa b ye tãa, yaa Wẽnd Ba, bũmb fãa sẽn yit a soab nenge la d sẽn vɩ a soab yĩnga, la d Soaala me yaa a ye, a Zezi Krista, bãmb nengẽ la bũmb fãa yita la bãmb yĩng la tõnd be. 
La bʋko, nin-buiidã gũusame n ges tɩ yellã ket n tara taoor kẽnde.
La no-rɛɛs-poak a Miryam sẽn yaa a Aarõ tão wã rɩka sɩlsãka, la pagbã fãa yii n pʋgla yẽnda n wẽ sɩlsãgs n sao. La a Miryam rag n deesda bãmb yɩɩllã n yetẽ:  «Bɩ y yɩɩl n waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Bala, bãmb wilgame tɩ b yaa na-kãsenga. Bãmb luba wiid ne wed-rʋʋdb ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ» 
Bũmb nins fãa sẽn dag n vɩ dũniyã zugã kiime. Yaa bõn-yɩgdɩ wã, la yir rũmsi, we-rũmsi, la bõn-bãooneg nins fãa sẽn saagd tẽn-gãongã zugã, la ne ninsaalbã fãa. Bũmb nins fãa sẽn vʋʋsd ne yõor n dag n be tẽn-koɛɛngã zugã kiime. 
Kibarã yii Omega.
Ezɩpt nebã rag n pẽdgda Israyɛll nebã. Bãmb dag n datame tɩ Israyɛll nebã loog n bas tẽngã tao-tao, bala, b rag n tẽedame tɩ bãmb sẽn yaa Ezɩpt nebã na n kii zãnga. Israyɛll nebã maana wa a Moyiis sẽn dag n yeelã. Bãmb kosa Ezɩpt nebã wanzuri ne sãnem teedo, la futu. 
Naabã wa n yiisa noor menga, tι biig sã n doge, a yυυrã kũun pa segd n ling yẽ ye. Fo me pag sã n doge, tι yaa pag tι yaa raoa, fo kẽngda na-yirã, n tι  reeg biigã yυυr be.
Dẽ, a Zozɛf sẽn ta a kẽem-dãmbã nengẽ, b yõk-a lame n yeeg a fu-gʋlmã a sẽn dag n yerã. Bãmb yõka a Zozɛf n lob bulgã pʋga. La bulgã rag n yaa bul-koɛɛng sẽn ka tar koom ye. 
la ka rẽ bal ye, yaa kristneba fãa n yãk-a t'a yãag tõnd d so-toaka pʋgẽ, n naag n yãend y vaag-n-kõ zãnga sẽn wat ne Soaala pẽgr ninga la a naag n yãend tɩ yɛla me tũu wa d sẽn date. Ka Wẽnd taoor bal la d baood tɩ d yɛla tũ sor ye, yaa ninsaalba me taoore. 
La a Aarõ leokame: «M zu-soaba, da puug-y y sũur ye. Yãmb meng mii nin-bãmbã sẽn yaa neb ninsi. Bãmb datmã yaa tɩ maan wẽnga. 
Kãar be gũuda, bɩ noor togs a sẽn date
Sapaolg kiuug rasem a 9 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, mooneg koɛɛg la b yiis televisẽo wã zug wakat a 8 kibayã kũun pʋgẽ, a n wilg tɩ gosneerã paama tekre.
Raop a tãabã yikame n na n looge, la b rag n geta Sodom tẽngã sẽnẽ. A Abrahaam yãaga bãmb n na n pʋʋs-b wẽnd-na-taase. A Abrahaam na n lebga bu-kãseng sẽn tar pãnga. Yẽnda zug maasem yĩnga, mam na n ninga dũniyã nebã fãa barka. 
·  Rao ninga sẽn tar SIDAwã bãag bila sẽn yãk yam t’a na n kɩɩsa Wẽnnaam tõodã sẽn kẽed ne lagm taaba wɛengẽ segd n kogla a menga n da wa taas neb a taaba bãaga bil ye.
A soaba yĩnga wɩngdame tɩ yɩɩg kiuugu.
Mam yaa Betɛll Wẽnnaam, zĩig ninga fo sẽn maan tẽn-kugr n ning bark n maan pʋleng ne maamã. Moasã, yik n yi tẽn-kãngã n lebg n kuil fo sẽn dog tẽng ningã.» 
Bãmb n get gosneerã tʋʋma.
Nag-yãan-nobds a yopoe wã mamsda yʋʋm a yopoe, tɩ ka-zu-bɛd a yopoe wã me mamsd yʋʋm a yopoe. Zãmsdã yaa bũmb a yembr bala. La nag-yãan-wag a yopoe wã sẽn ka neebã sẽn yi n pʋgl pipi rãmbã mamsda yʋʋm a yopoe. La ka-zu-faad a yopoe wã yaang sob-tʋʋlgã sẽn wẽ tɩ yõogã wilgda yʋʋm a yopoe kom. 
Maan a wãna, tɩ Liuul sẽn yaa bilf wa kamaan-bilã wa tõog n dɩ liuuli wã fãa naam ?
Zã-y ligd tɩ yɩɩg yãmb sẽn zã pĩndã naoor a yiibu, la y rɩk ligd ning b sẽn lebs yãmb yondã pʋsã n zã. Bala, tõeeme tɩ yɩɩ tudgri. Yik-y n peeg-y y yao wã n lebg n leb raoã nengẽ. 
Siiri rĩm a Bɛn-Hadaad tigma a tãb-biisã fãa, ne a nanambs pis-tã la a yiibã sẽn dag n be ne-a wã, la a rag n tara wiid ne Saar-dãmba. Yẽnda ne a tãb-biisã yiime n tɩ gũbg Samaari tẽngã n na n zab ne-a. Siiri rĩm a Bɛn-Hadaad tʋma neb Israyɛll rĩm a Akaab nengẽ. 
No-rɩkã wilgdame tɩ yaa tɩlae ne gosneem taoor soab fãa, t’a yals depite rãmbã taoore, n wilg tʋʋm nins a sẽn gãneg n na n tʋm tẽnga taoor kẽnd wɛɛngẽ.
A Zetro waa n gesa a rɛɛmb a Moyiisi. A Moyiis rɛɛmb a Zetro sẽn yaa Madiyã maan-kʋʋdã wʋma bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam sẽn maan n kõ a Moyiis ne Israyɛll dãmbã sẽn yaa bãmb nebã. Yẽnda wʋma Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yiis Israyɛll nebã Ezɩpt tẽngã. 
Balbã, poore, yɩɩ wɩdga, sẽn na yɩl tɩ ned kam fãa bãng a sẽn tõe zĩig ninga, la a sẽn ka tõeẽ.
Tõdg-y Sʋtãana zãnga la y tall y tẽeb kẽnkẽ, n mi tɩ yaa namsg a woto buudu bala la saam-biisa namsd zĩig zãnga. 
Ratzãnga ne a Sĩndbal yaa zoodo. Daar a yembre, b ra tũuda taab n kẽnd la b sõsda. B wa n yãa korg sẽn dιg bãmb taoorã. B sẽn dιk n lakã, b yãame tι ligd wυsg n da bé be.
Bal-kãngã yaa sẽn na n segl n gũ nin-sabls tẽng ball wags taabã sẽn na n zĩnd Kodenvoaar yʋʋm 2023 soaba, tʋʋlg kiuugã pʋgẽ.
Ninbuiid katɛk yiime n wilgd tɩ b ratame tɩ kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWARE yɩ tẽnga naaba.
Neb kẽer yel-wẽn yaa vẽenese, baa sẽn deng b sẽn na bʋ b bʋʋdo. La ne neb kẽere, b yel-wẽnã ka pukda, sã n ka b bʋʋdã zugẽ ye. Woto me, tʋʋm‑sõamyã pukdame, la tʋʋm nins sẽn ka-b sõama wã me ka tõe n pa n ka puk ye. 
A Zezabɛll sẽn wʋm tɩ b loba a Nabot kug t'a ki, a yeela rĩm a Akaab yaa: «Yik-y n tɩ reeg-y Yiizreyɛll rao a Nabot pʋʋgã n sooge. Yẽnda sẽn dag n zãgsd t'a ka na n koos a pʋʋgã ne yãmbã, moasã wã, a Nabot ka leb n vɩ ye, a kiime.» Rĩm a Akaab sẽn wʋm woto, a yikame n kẽng n na n tɩ reeg Yiizreyɛll dao a Nabot pʋʋgã n sooge. 
Ãnda n sãad naab pʋʋgẽ tɩ ka bẽdenga
A kɩɩb ka fuug bɩ a belem sõore.
Ned fâa gü a purtre
La, a sẽn wa n zãage, m ba Soaamb roogame, n yals n yeele :
Yĩngr sodaasã zĩigẽ, bãmb pipi sullã bee Waogdgo.
Yaa a Rubɛn ne a Sɩmyõ, a Leevi ne a Zʋʋda, A Zakoob yagensã fãa rag n yaa neb pis-yopoe. Wakat-kãng t'a Zozɛf bee Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
Faarõ sẽn kolgd Israyɛll nebã, bãmb zẽka b neng n yãnd Ezɩpt rãmbã sẽn pʋgd bãmb n watẽ. La rabeem wʋsg yõka bãmba. Dẽ, Israyɛll nebã zẽka b koees n bool Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Israyɛll nebã yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Yaa yaad zĩig n ka be Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋg bɩ, bɩ yaa bõe tɩ yãmb tall tõnd n wa tɩ d na n ki we-raoogẽ ka? Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maan tõnd woto, n yiis tõnd Ezɩpt soolmã pʋgẽ? 
Ned sã n sak lèes bɩ a sak takre
Yaa rẽ yĩnga, la malɛk rãmba waoogr yĩnga, pag zug tog n teeg bũmb sẽn wilgd t'a ka so a meng ye. 
Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor dãmb na n zĩnda ne taab zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15.
La badaare, mam na n welga Gosɛn tẽngã, zĩig ning mam nebã sẽn be wã. La kɛooda wã ka na n tol n ta be ye, tɩ fo bãng tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab la m bee dũniyã tẽn-sʋka. La mam na n welga m nebã ne fo nebã. Yaa beoog la bõn-bãn-kãng na n zĩndi.» 
M ba Katr pagã, wa n na n moka bugum, m ba Soaamb zakẽ wã. 
Bãng-bãnge: Tõnd tũuda taab raar fãa. A zι n loog n bas-ma, mam me zι n loog n bas-a. Yaa bõe ? Leoore : Maam ne m sulunsukã.
Kapitɛnd Sɩdsore Abdul kadɛɛr WEDRAOOG ne a poorẽ dãmb a yiibu.
Ned sã n pa ki, bɩ a ra sõd a yẽn ye
Tɩ bala, sẽn sɩng ne sigr kiuug yʋʋm 2021 sẽn loogã bãmb a pagtɩ wã taoor dãmb ra sɩbga a Edi Kõmbeoogo t’a ka segd n naag pagtɩ wã no-rɩkr pʋgẽ kiis a yoob tõore.
A Moyiis yeela nebã yaa: «Da zoe-y rabeem ye. Yaas-y n ges-y fãagr ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn na n fãag yãmb dũndã wã. Bala, Ezɩpt neb nins yãmb sẽn ne rũndã wã, yãmb kõn leb n yãnd bãmb abada. Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n zaba yãmb yĩnga. Yãmb tɛka, yaa y sĩnd sɩddd...» 
Dẽ, Leevi nebã yãka a Zowɛll biig a Eman, ne a saam-biig a Azaf sẽn yaa a Meraari kom-dibli wã sʋk ned a yembrã, la a Kusaya biig a Etan sẽn yaa a Meraari kom-dibli wã sʋk ned a yembre. 
La tẽngã naab noor deegr yĩnga, rasem a tãab poore, yibeoog pĩnda, b nka na-yirã sore, n na n tι bõs tι b yãk yυυr n kõ biigã. B sẽn  yi wã, b pa yã n zãag ye.
La a Miise leb n yeelame: «Ade, Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ zĩrẽ sɩɩg kẽ yãmb no-rɛɛsdbã fãa, la Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaool n kãaba yãmb kãab-beedo.» Israyɛll rĩmã yeela a tʋmtʋmd a yembr yaa: «Yõk a Miise n tall n tɩ kɩs tẽngã naab a Amo ne rĩmã biig a Zoaase. 
Yaa rẽ, tɩ nin-sabls tẽng wĩndg sẽn lʋɩtẽ sul-kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ CEDEAO wã taoor soaba, a Umaru Sisoko Ãmbalo tʋm sullã no-rɛɛsdb Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 4 yʋʋm 2022 soabã tɩ b wa sõs ne neb nins sẽn deeg naamã, la rog-n-mikã la dĩinã taoor dãmba.
Woto, Malɛgsã tʋma b nus yɩng n tak a Lot n kẽes roogã pʋg n naag b menga, la b lebs kʋɩlengã n page. Malɛgsã lobga neb nins fãa sẽn dag n be roogã noor yɩngã zondo, sẽn sɩng ne kãsem tɩ ta yao-zʋʋga. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ bãmb babl n nams n ka leb n ne roogã noor sẽn beẽ ye. 
Ned sã n gomd bɩ a gom wa Wẽnd sẽn gomde. A sã n deeg taab sõngr tʋʋmde, a sõng wala Wẽnd n kõta noore. Woto bũmb fãa pʋgẽ Wẽnd na paam pẽgre, Krista a Zezi maasmẽ. Bãmb n so naam la ziir sẽn ka sɩng la sẽn kõn zĩnd sɛɛbo. Ami! 
Ba-gãe soab n gãt a zugu.
A Israyɛll sẽn wa n ket n be tẽn-kãngã, a Rubɛn kẽngame n tɩ gãand a ba wã pʋg-rɩkdg a Bila. La a Israyɛll wʋma yellã.  A Zakoob kambã sõor yaa bãmb piig la a yiibu: Ad a Leya kamba: Yaa Rubɛn sẽn yaa a Zakoob pipi biigã, a Sɩmyõ, a Leevi, a Zʋʋda, a Isakaar ne a Zabulõ. 
A Davɩɩd yãka a Salmo t'a led yẽnda zĩigẽ. A Davɩɩd tigma Israyɛll nanambsã fãa Zeruzalɛm: yaa buudã kãsem-dãmba, ne sulã nanambs nins fãa sẽn dag n tʋmd rĩmã yĩngã, la tãb-biis tusr-tusr ne tãb-biis koabg-koabg nanambsã, n paas neb nins sẽn dag n get rĩmã laog fãa ne rĩmã rũmsã la a kom-dibli wã yellã, la a zakã zu-soben-dãmbã ne gãndaadã ne gãnda-sãeemsã fãa gilli. 
Tãrãzisẽo wã Depite rãmb sull b sẽn boond tɩ ALT wã yiisa koɛɛg n wilg tɩ sapaolg kiuug rasem 19 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso gosneema taoor soaba, Metr Apolineer KELEM de Taanbɛɛl na n yalsa Asãmble wã depite rãmb taoor yibeoog wakat 10 sasa n wilg soay nins a sẽn gãneg n na n zã gosneemã.
Segl f meng n dʋ Sinayi tãngã zug beoog zĩ-yẽegr wakate, n yals beenẽ mam taoore. 
Yoob soaba, b tẽngã bee tẽn-gumbr pʋgẽ, la a sɩngda yʋng wakat a 9 n tãag yibeoog wakat a 5.
A Husayi biig a Baana n dag n so Asɛɛr ne Beyalot soolmã. Zʋʋda ne Israyɛll nebã sõor dag n yaa wʋsg wa bĩisrã sẽn be ko-kãsengã noorã. Bãmb dag n dɩtame la b yũuda, la b maand sũ-noogo. 
«Bool f kẽem a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã tɩ b yi Israyɛll nebã sʋk n wa fo nengẽ, n wa maan maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd mam waoogr yĩnga. Yaa a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã, a Nadaabe, ne a Abihu la a Eleyazaar ne a Itamaare.» 
Koom na sa m nifẽ,poend-koɛɛnga.
Beoog woto wẽnde, bãng-y tɩ mam na n tʋma m tʋmtʋmdbã fo nengẽ. Bãmb na n kẽe fo na-zakã n veese, la b vees fo tʋmtʋmdbã roto, n wʋk bũmb ning fãa sẽn tar yõod ne foomã n looge.» Woto, Israyɛll rĩmã boola soolmã kãsem-dãmbã fãa n yeel-b yaa: «M kos tɩ yãmb mengã ges tɩ nin-kãngã baooda tõnd ne wẽnga! Bala, yẽnda tʋma neb tɩ b wa yeel maam tɩ m dɩk m pagbã ne m kambã, la m wanzuri wã ne m sãnemã n kɩs tɩ b wa kõ-a. La mam ka zãgs ye.» 
Kẽndã sɩngrẽ, b kẽnga Waogdg ra-kasengẽ wã n tɩ wilg tɩ rẽndame tɩ lɛɛbdbã pag b koosma zĩisi, la b wa naag tɩ b kẽne.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE tika a nug tãrãzisẽo wã zãab sebr zugu.
Sagb pa sẽgd a yõngd ye
Koom sã n ka gudgi, a ka tisgd ye.
Vẽk-m-beoogo, a ma boola a Poko n togsa kibar sẽn ka noome, sẽn yaa tɩ SIDAwã bãaga bil yõka yẽnda.
A Ezayu yeelame: «Yaa b sẽn pʋd yẽnda yʋʋr t'a Zakoobã yĩng la yẽnda sẽn zãmb maam hal naoor a yiib fãa wã bɩ? Yẽnda reng n deega mam bi-kãsen-pʋɩɩrã, la a leb n deeg mam barkã yɛsa.» A Ezayu soka a baaba yaa: «Yãmb ka leb n tar bark baa bilf mam yĩnga?» 
Kibara pʋgẽ, raagẽwã, biribla ye n gom gomd sẽn ka soãma ne a Poko.  Yãmb tẽnga pʋga neba gomda SIDAwã bãag sẽn tar-b rãmba niisa wãn  wãnã? La b zaksa rãmb yēe gomda a wan wāna?
Yẽnda baoo Israyɛll nebã noore, la a Simeya biig a Zonatã sẽn yaa a Davɩɩd ba-biigã kʋʋ yẽnda. Gat tẽng nin-bãmbã fãa rag n yaa a Harafa yagense. La a Davɩɩd ne a nebã tõoga bãmb n kʋ-ba. 
Silmiigã sẽn wυm a Yamyιιd goamã, a tẽedame tι sιd yaa ned la b yõk n dat n tι kõ naam, t’a soabõ pa rat ye. Tao bala, a loka yolgã noore, t’a Yamyιιd yi. La a yeelame tι sẽn ya woto wã, rẽnd yẽ na n deega biigã zĩigĩ.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Moasã, fo na n yãnda bũmb ning mam sẽn na n maan Faarõ. Yaa nug sẽn tar pãng n na n kɩt tɩ yẽnda bas nebã tɩ b looge. N-yẽe, nug sẽn tar pãng n na n kɩt tɩ Faarõ rig bãmb tɩ b yi n bas a tẽngã.» 
Ezɩpt nebã fãa tuu buls Nill kʋɩlgã sɛɛgẽ n bao ko-yũudum. Bala, bãmb dag n ka tõe n yũ Nill kʋɩlgã koom ye. Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn wẽ Nill kʋɩlgã koomã kaoosa rasem a yopoe tõre. 
B fãa rɩlga b mens ne yĩngr dɩɩb yɛnga. B fãa yũu yĩngr bõn-yũudl a ye; yaa yĩngr pĩig koom la b ra yũuda la pĩiga ra yãagda bãmba la pĩ kãng ra yaa Krista. 
Moasã, yaa foom n na n soog mam yirã, la mam nebã fãa na n saka fo noore. Yaa mam naamã bal n na n yɩɩg foom.» Faarõ leb n yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Gese, mam dɩka Ezɩpt soolmã gill n ning fo nugẽ.» 
B leb n kosame tɩ b zĩnig sull sẽn na sõng tɩ kiba-kɩtbã ne sodaasã tõe n paamd n yẽsd ne taaba.
M ba Katr sãdame n tɩ nek m ba Soaamb n soke : «Fo maanda wãn to-to, n paamd nemdã woto fãa, n wat n dɩt ne f zak-rãmba? » 
Burkĩna Faso ball-tãoodbã tãoo zood ball ne Komoore.
Dẽ, a Zakoob yeela a Sɩmyõ ne a Leevi yaa: «Yãmb baoo yell n kõ maam, n kɩt tɩ tẽngã nebã, ne Kana nebã, la Ferɛɛz-rãmbã na n kisg maam. Mam nebã ka wʋsg ye, b sõorã yaa bilfu. Tẽngã nebã na n tigma taab n wa zab ne maam n sãam maam ne m zakã rãmba.» Bãmb leoka a Zakoob yaa: «Rẽ yĩnga, a zemsame tɩ bãmb maan tõnd tão wã wa pʋg-yoodr sɩda?» 
Wãamb zʋʋr n lèt-a
A Poll Ãari Sãandgo DAMIB ra ka tʋlg n na n sak faag-faag ye.
A Nowe zamaanẽ nebã yel-manesem. Ninsaalbã sẽn wa n sɩng n fɩɩgd n lebgd wʋsg dũniyã zugã, bãmb doga kom-pugli. Wẽnnaam kom-dibli wã gesame tɩ ninsaalbã kom-pugli wã yaa neeba, la bãmb baoo kom-pugli bãmb sʋkã n maan b pagba. 
Bãmb wʋka tẽngã laogã, la b yõg b kambã ne b pagbã, la b wʋk bũmb nins fãa sẽn be rotã pʋsã. 
Ned met-a neer n zems a pag pende.
A Rasmata Yelemu, yaa kɩɩb n be AMPO sullã pʋgẽ.
Kell n yaa yẽ n ya sodaasã fãa taoor soaba.
Ning urim ne tumim yãoog lutgã sẽn wilgd bʋ-kaoorã pʋgẽ, t'a Aarõ sã n wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, bɩ be a yãoogẽ wã. Woto, a Aarõ na n zãa Israyɛll nebã bʋ-kaoor a yãoogẽ daar fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore.» 
A Moyiis yeelame: «Bɩ y rɩ-a rũndã. Bala, rũndã yaa vʋʋsg daar Sẽn-Ka-Saab waoogr yĩnga. Rũndã, yãmb ka na n yãnd mandã weoogã pʋgẽ ye. Yãmb na n wʋk-a-la rasem a yoobe, la rasem a yopoe wã daar sẽn yaa vʋʋsg daarã, a ka na n zĩnd ye.» 
t'a Yotam dog a Akaaze, t'a Akaaz rog a Ezekɩyaas, t'a Ezekɩyaas rog a Manaase, A Yehoyakim doga kom-dibli a yiibu: a yembr yʋʋr yaa a Yekoniya t'a yembr yʋʋr yaa a Sedesiyaase. 
Kɩɩb a Naamde kibare.
Bãmb sẽn mik tɩ yellã rat n zemsame, b yeelame: «A Bɛn-Hadaad yaa yãmb saam-biig wɛ!» La a Akaab yeelame tɩ b tɩ tall-a n wa. A Bɛn-Hadaad yi a sẽn dag n solgẽ wã n kẽng a Akaab nengẽ. La a Akaab kɩtame t'a kẽ n naag yẽnda a saarã pʋga. 
Koom sã n ka rɩ a rugd-a, a ka rɩt-a gɛt ye.
Dakãag-kʋdr kõn mum yĩngr ye, dẽnd tẽng bala
Kãnenkãag roog wẽnda sĩ-vagse, la a ka mi bũmb a to sẽn ka rũmb ye
A Davɩɩd kɩtame tɩ Leevi neb kẽer yals Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã taoore, n yɩɩl n pẽg Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã. Nin-bãmb la woto: B taoor soabã yaa a Azafe, yiibẽ soab yaa a Zakari, sẽn pʋgd yaa a Yeyiyɛlle, a Semiramote, a Yekiyɛlle, a Matitiya, a Eliyaabe, a Benaya, n paas a Yeyiyɛlle. B rag n wẽeda kʋla, ne pendse. A Azaf rag n wẽeda kɛma. 
Nug-tikr a 6 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã, tara sor n tõe n yãk neb tɩ b lʋɩ gosneer tʋʋm-no-bɛdã, sodaarã tʋʋm noya, la tʋʋm noy a taab taoore, wala laloa wã sẽn gãnege.
Zood yõbg yelle.
F pʋgdb sã n tõeem sɩd, bɩ f tõeem deemdo
Nugẽ bãngã tʋʋm-teed ka le kẽnd ye.
Reoog pugl wãagda a nifẽ
A Pok ne a Seeni sɩd kẽe kãadem. Dẽ zugẽ, b paama biiga.
Naor wʋsgo, rasãmba tagsdame tɩ b sɛgdame n kẽ ne kom-pugliwã n wilig tɩ bãmb me sɩd yaa raopa.
Pʋs n segdame tɩ welegr zĩndi, segdame tɩ b tõog n bak sẽn sĩdb ne neera maanego, n bak-b ne neb a taaba. Y sẽn mii n tigim taabã ka le ya Soaala rɩɩba yĩng ye. 
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «A ka neer tɩ ninsaal zĩnd a yembr ye. Mam na n maana sõngd sẽn wẽnd yẽnda n kõ-a.» Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab rɩka tẽngã tom n maan we-rũmsã fãa, la bõn-yɩgdɩ wã fãa. Wẽnnaam talla bãmb n wa ninsaal nengẽ, n na n ges yẽnda sẽn na n pʋd b yʋyã to-to, tɩ bõn-vɩɩsã fãa yembr-yembr tõe n paam yʋʋr wa ninsaal sẽn na n kõ-a wã. 
Yẽnda maana ra-bɩlem ne akasiya raado, n bolg bãmb ne sãnem. La yẽnda maana serubẽ-rãmb a yiib sẽn kud ne sãnem n ning bas-taal zĩigã kɩrems a yiibã. 
Ned bã-kʋdg n kʋʋd-a
Ãnda n yeel foom tɩ f wa kẽ bãg-pɛɛlgã pʋgẽ?
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Eli yaa: «Lebg n tũ we-raoogã sor sẽn teesd Damaas sẽnẽ wã, la fo sã n ta Damaase, bɩ f pʋdg a Azayɛll zug naam kaam t'a lebg Siiri rĩmã. Ned ning sẽn na n põs a Azayɛll sʋʋgã, a Zehu n na n kʋ-a, la sẽn põs-a a Zehu sʋʋgã, a Eliize n na n kʋ-a. 
Tɩ rao wã yeel a wed-moaagã :
Dẽ, a Abimelɛk yeela a Izak yaa: «Yi la f bas tõnd tẽngã. Bala, fo lebga pãng soab n yɩɩd tõndo.» La a Izak yii beenẽ n kẽng n tɩ tilg a zak Geraar ko-soogẽ n zĩnd be. 
 «Ayoo ! Mam sẽn yi ka, badaarã, mam kẽnga keedẽ, n yi keedẽ, n kẽng yõobẽ, n yi yõobẽ, n kẽng bʋdbẽ, n yi bʋdbẽ, n kẽng koobẽ, n yi koobẽ, n kẽng bɛng rɩgsgo, n yi bɛng rɩgsgo, n kẽng kẽebgẽ, n yi kẽebgẽ, n kẽng tigsgẽ, n yi tigsgẽ, n kẽng rɩɩbẽ. 
t'a Azariya rog a Seraya, t'a Seraya rog a Yehosadake. A Yehosadak looga wakat ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn kɩt t'a Nebukatnedzaar yõg Zʋʋda ne Zeruzalɛm nebã n tall n kẽng yembdã. 
Bõn-wẽeng wĩir gãta wooko.
Woto sẽn send-a wã ka fɩ, sẽn zãgsd-a wã ka fɩ, sẽn ya-a bũmbu, yaa sẽn kõta bɩʋʋngã: Wẽnnaam. Sẽn send-a la sẽn zãgsd-a koom yõod zema taaba; ned kam fãa reegda a rolbo, wala a tʋʋmda sẽn yɩ a soaba. 
Lingr sãamda raoodo.
Neb nins b sẽn na n sõdã fãa, sẽn sɩng ne neb nins sẽn tar yʋʋm pisi la sẽn yɩɩd woto wã na n yaoo Sẽn-Ka-Saab b yõor yaoodo. La wakat ning yãmb sẽn na n yao Sẽn-Ka-Saab yãmb yõor yaoodã, arzɛk rãmbã ka na n yao sẽn yɩɩd ye, la naong rãmbã me ka na n yao sẽn ka ta sɩkɛll pʋɩ-sʋk ye. 
A "saam-y" ne a "wõd-y" yaa nug-raoogo
Koom dɩɩ bũmb sẽn são wed-wagre.
Ya woto la pĩnd pʋg-sõma wã sẽn da tẽed-b Wẽndã ra baood b faong la b sakd b sɩdb-rãmba. Woto la a Sara ra sakd a Abraam la a boond-a t'a zu-soaba. Yãmb me lebga yẽ kamba yãmb sã n baood neere n zĩ wɩsa n pa yɛɛsd bũmb ba a ye. 
Wẽnd na vẽ ned fãa pυtẽere, tι d lagem n sõng-sõng tι rog-n-mikã ra menem ye.
M ba Katr tɩ baoo tɩpare, n to, n kẽng n tɩ ning pʋg-yãang kokorẽ.
Neb kẽer reegdame n dɩgendẽ tɩ b wa kõ-b bũmb tɩ b yaool gese.
Sũ-noog la yo-yɩgre.
SIDAwã yaa bãag sẽn kʋʋd neb tus a nii daar fãa dũniyã pʋga. A zoe n  kʋʋ neb miliõ pisi la a nu. Nin-sables tẽng yelbũnd a yembr n yet yaa :  “Waaf sã n kẽ f roogẽ, f ka baood n na n soke a yii yɛ n yaol n kʋ-a ye.”
Ned sã n maan ka-kãngã buudu, wall ned sã n ning-a ned sẽn ka maan-kʋʋd zugu, bɩ b yiis-a a buud sʋk n kʋ.» 
A Israyɛll yaoolem koeese. A Israyɛll zĩnda Ezɩpt soolmã, Gosɛn tẽngã pʋga. La bãmb soog-a lame. La bãmb paama rogem, n fɩɩg n lebg wʋsgo. A Zakoob zĩnda Ezɩpt soolmã pʋg yʋʋm piig la a yopoe. A Zakoob vɩɩmda yʋʋm koabg la pis-naas la a yopoe. 
Kũun-kãngã, yaa sẽn kẽed neFfõndasẽo wã sẽn yãk yam n na n sõngd neb sẽn wat n vʋɩ-b naong pʋgẽ.
Metr Apolineer Kelem lebga Burkĩna Faso gosneer taoor soaba.
Yãmb ka mi tɩ wags taaba zĩigẽ, zoetba fãa zoetame la yaa nin-yend bala n yɩt pipi? Yãmb me mao n lʋɩ taoore n wa paam dolbo. Sẽn wagsd-b taaba tuuba bõn-nood wʋsgo la b tõee rẽnna. La yaool n yaa rolb sɛtga la b baooda. Sã n ya tõndo yaa rolb sẽn kõn sɛ. 
La liuliyã fãa sũur yɩɩ noogo. Bala, ned kam fãa sũur da keema ne a menga. Sã n pa m ba Ligẽneg bal sũur n da pa keeme.
Bɛ wã rag n yetame:  «Mam na n pʋgla bãmba. Mam na n paam-b lame. Mam na n pʋɩɩ te-zɛɛdem n maan m sẽn date. Mam na n wõoga m zabr sʋʋga. Mam nug na n sãamã bãmba.» 
D sẽn zoet tɩ d Soaala waoogr na n wa pa sãoog yĩnga, d modgdame tɩ ninsaalba reegd d saglgo. Sã n ya ne Wẽnde, d miime tɩ d yɛsa d kãr bãmb taoore la d tẽedame tɩ d sũura me rɩga pɛɛlg fas bãmb taoore. Ka lʋɩɩs d meng taoorã la d rat n le sɩng ye, d wilgd-y lame bala bũmb ning sẽn be d nengẽ tɩ y zug tõe n zẽk ne tõndo la woto y na lub sẽn ka baood b meng pẽgre ne sẽn solg sũurẽ, n baood-a ne sẽn puk yɩnga. 
Fo bɛ loalg bɩ a bõang sã n menem tɩ f yãnd-a, bɩ f yõk-a n tɩ kõ-a. Fo sã n yãnd zɩɩb sẽn zɩsg f bɛ bõang t'a lʋɩ bɩ f ra loog n bas-a ye. Sõng-a n sik a bõangã zɩɩbo. 
B wilgame t’a sẽn wa n be lɛɛbdbã lagem-n-taar sull kaseng b sẽn boond tɩ SINAKOMBE wã taoorã, a gõdga lɛɛbdb kẽer ligdi.
La sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ y põs ne yɛl kɛga, bɩ rao tar paga, tɩ pag me tar sɩda. Paga ka so a yĩng ye, yaa sɩdã n so. Botome raoa ka so a yĩnga, yaa pagã n so. 
La Wẽnnaam yeel-a lame: «Mam yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn yaa fo ba wã Wẽnnaam. Ra zoe rabeem tɩ kẽng Ezɩpt ye. Bala, yaa beenẽ la mam na n kɩt tɩ fo lebg bu-kãseng ba. 
Krista pa tʋm maam tɩ m wa so neb ye, b yeel-m lame tɩ m moon Koe-noogo, la m bas ninsaal goam minim sẽn tũud soy niynsã, n pa tõe n puk ninsaalba yam tɩ wʋm Krista kũum pika zug võorã. 
Neb kẽer tagsdame tɩ yaa kãab wẽngã n wat ne SIDAwã bãaga, la tɩ yãmb sãn wa lebg n kẽng tɩɩm soab nẽngẽ y tõe n paama laafɩ. Yõwã ka sɩd ye !
A Davɩɩd pʋʋsgo. Dẽ, a Davɩɩd pẽga Sẽn-Ka-Saab zãma wã fãa taoor n yeele: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd yaab a Israyɛll Wẽnnaam, reeg-y pẽgr zamaan woo zamaane! Arzɛk la ziir yita yãmb nengẽ, la y yaa bũmb fãa soaala. Yãmb tara pãnga, n tõe tɩ ned lebg kãsenga, la y kõ-a pãnga. 
A wilgame tɩ kũunã kɩtame tɩ yẽ kõ sɩd t’a na n paam n kẽnga koarengo.
A lang ka langa, bɩ f bas tɩ bulli kjẽ n saage.
Sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 23 tã n tãag a rasem 24 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, soda-kom-bɩɩb sulli, b sẽn boond tɩ ƐMPESƐƐR n doge, n wẽ a Rok Mark Kiristẽ KABOOR naamã n lubi, la b reeg n na n paam n zab ne bɛɛbã tɩ yõ-koglg kaalmã targ n leb n leb poorẽ.
Rẽ wã, bõe yĩng tɩ tõnd na n tar pʋto, la d kiid yãmb nifẽ? Ra-y tõnd ne d pʋtã, tɩ d paam dɩɩbo, la tõnd na n lebga Faarõ yembse, tɩ b soog tõnd ne d pʋtã, la y kõ-d bõn-buud tɩ d paam n põs n da ki tɩ d pʋtã wa lebg zĩ-vɩɩd ye.» 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Bɩ foom ne neb nins fo sẽn yiis Ezɩpt soolem pʋgẽ wã yi ka n kẽng tẽng ning mam sẽn dag n kãab a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoob n yeel tɩ m na n kõo bãmb yagensã. 
Daar a yembre, a Pok kẽnga raaga. Bee, a yeela a zorãmba t‘a ma na n paama bi-pɛɛlga. Bi-ribla a yembr sẽn wʋm a sẽn yeel bũmb ningawã, a sɩngame n na n yaal-a n yeel-a yaa: “Sɩdawã bãaga na n yõka bi-kãnga wa a baaba.“
Depite rãmbã yãk-a lame t’a lʋɩ b taoore.
Yãmb sãn n pʋʋs bãada ne y nugu, y sãn n sɩɩs-a, n mobg-a wala y mok bãada yɛgdegae ? (Ayo)
A Zozɛf gesa a ba wã ne ba-biisã rɩɩb yelle, la ne a ba wã zak rãmb fãa yelle, wa sẽn zems a kambã sõore. Tʋʋmd ning a Zozɛf sẽn maan komã wakate 
La d sã n mag n gese, d  mikdame tɩ sor kãng ka wom biis sõama ye. SIDAwã bãaga bil kel n  kẽnga taoore n saage. La sãn ya ne tẽng a yembr b sẽn boond tɩ Ougãnda,  sor a yembre b sẽn boond tɩ ABC kɩtame tɩ bãaga bil pãng boog hal  wʋsgo, sẽn yɩɩda kom-bɩtsa sẽn zems yʋʋm piig la a nu n tɩ tãag piig la a  wɛ wã.
A Soball sẽn yaa a Kiryat-Yeyarim ba wã yagens yaa Harowe tẽngã nebã, ne Hatsi-Menuhot tẽngã nebã. A Salma yagensã yaa Betlehɛm ne Netofa la Atrot-Bɛt-Yoaab nebã, ne Hatsi-Manahat tẽngã nebã, la Sora tẽngã nebã. 
La rasem a yopoe wã daare, kẽer yii nebã sʋk n kẽng n na n tɩ wʋk mandã, la b ka yãnd ye. Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Yãmb na n kɩɩsa mam noyã ne m tõodã hal tɩ ta dabʋre? 
Ninbuiid katɛk yiime n wilgd tɩ b ratame tɩ kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWARE yɩ tẽnga naaba.
Bɩ y ra maan wisd a woto buud yãmb mensã yĩng ye. Ne foom, a na n yɩɩ bũmb sẽn welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. Ned sã n maan wisd sẽn wẽnd a woto buudu, n na n kok a yũ-noogã, bɩ b yiis a soab a buudã sʋk n kʋ.» 
Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel-a : «Kẽng-y, tɩ pʋg-yãang sã n tĩs bɩ y wa tɩ d looge».
Sũ-puurã sẽn wa n paam pãnga, yaa sodaasã sẽn leb n yiis mooneg koɛɛg a to n wilg t’a DAMIB zoeeme n kẽng Fãrens sodaasã zĩigẽ, la a rat n lebg n wa zabame n deeg naamã, la nebã yi n sõng-ba.
La, yʋʋm piig loogr poore, a arzɛkã sɩd fɩɩga sõma.
Sẽn yɩɩd fãa Risi.
La bãmb ka kelg a Moyiis ye. Neb kẽer bas-a lame t'a vẽeg beoogo. La a pida ne zũnzũy n tar yũugu. A Moyiis sũurã yika ne bãmba. Dẽ, daar fãa, bãmb wʋkda mandã sẽn zems ned kam fãa rɩɩbo. La wĩndgã sã n bɩ, a boogdame. 
B wilgame tɩ kaorengã sẽn sɩng zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-doog ba a ye nan pa pak ye.
F sã n dat yũug n kʋ, f baooda no-kõbd n bẽ a noore
kibarã yii Polɩɩs Minisipallã nengẽ.
B kõo bãmb Sɩkɛm sẽn yaa weem-tẽngã ne a kɩremsã, n be Efrayiim soolem ning sẽn be tãms sʋkã, Gezɛɛr ne a kɩremsã, Manaase buudã pʋɩ-sʋk pʋgẽ, b yãka Aneer ne a kɩremsã, la Balaam ne a tẽn-kɩremsã n kõ a Kehat kom-dibli a taabã roto. 
Polɩɩs rãmbã taoor soab pẽga kiba-kɩtbã tʋʋmde, b kibaya kũun sẽn ya toto wã.
Ka lub a Pok n yet t'a Raoog na sã?
 Moyiis ne a Aarõ kẽnga Faarõ nengẽ. Dẽ poore, a Moyiis ne a Aarõ kẽnga Faarõ nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a yaa: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yetame: Bas mam nebã tɩ b kẽng n tɩ maan tigr mam yĩng we-raoogẽ wã.» 
Metr Benewẽnd SÃNKAR tɩ gʋls a yʋʋr n na n yɩ VDP.
Ka naana tɩ tek bũmb niisa tõnd sẽn da zoe n tẽedã, sẽn tar yõod  kãseng ne tõnd tɩ d sɩng n maandẽ wã ye.
Sẽn ka lagem-b tõnd ne tẽebo n yaa d saam-biisã, m yɩta wãn n kaood bãmb bʋʋdo? Ka sẽn be-b Tigenga pʋg bʋʋd la y bʋʋd laa? Yɩng rãmbã, Wẽnd n kaood bãmb bʋʋdo.  Wẽng ning sẽn be yãmb sʋka la y tog n menese. 
Nug-tikr 13 soaba: Seb-kãngã sẽn ya ƐPEYƐSƐR taoor dãmbã n gʋls-a n na n tũ n zã tẽngã, b segd n yiis-a-la tẽngã zʋgnall-kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ Zʋgnall Ofisɛllã pʋgẽ.
Tʋʋm-noy a yiibã taoor dãmb pẽga miniisr Bukare ZoungranaA, b yam yãkrã yĩnga.
 La, no-raoog a ye, n yeela no-yãanga, t’a leb pagã goabg nif sẽn ka ne wã sẽnẽ, n liib pagã, t’a peng ki wã ne wamdã, n lub tɩ b paam n dɩ.
Dẽ, a Gaad kẽnga a Davɩɩd nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a yaa: Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame yaa: «To-bãmbã sʋka, bʋg la f yãkda? Yʋʋm a tãab kom bɩ? Bɩ f bɛɛbã sẽn na n dig-f kiis a tãab n kɛ-f ne zabr sʋʋg bɩ? Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn na n zab ne yãmb dasem a tãab ne zabr sʋʋg n kɩt tɩ bã-loangdg kẽ y soolmẽ wã n sãam-a zãnga? Moasã, bɩ f leok tɩ m tɩ taas sẽn tʋm-a maamã.» 
Soaala yĩnga bɩ y sak tẽng zug naama ne a siglsã: sak-y dĩma sẽn ya fãa soaala, Ad-y yaa Wẽnd n dat tɩ y maan neer woto, n pag gãeemsa la zɩtba noore. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Moasã, fo sẽn lebg n lebd Ezɩptã, ges mam sẽn ning bõn-bãn nins fãa fo nugẽ wã, n maan-b Faarõ taoore. Mam na n kɩtame tɩ Faarõ keng a sũurã n ka sak n kõ nebã sor tɩ b loog ye. 
Karen-saamb kasengã yɩɩ mise Ãdma BAARO, kiba-kɩt sẽn dɩk b vʋʋsem, n be Lekoll kaseng b sẽn boond tɩ YISTIKÃ ( ISTIC) n ket n karmd kibaya kɩsg karen-biisi.
A kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ yaa naam wẽ-n-dɩk na-kẽndr la b sẽn maana, rẽ n so tɩ Kɛɛd tẽngã gosneer na n maana a pãng sẽn tõe, tɩ laafɩ lebg n wa b soolmã pʋga.
«Way ! B sẽn yeel tɩ d ra wɩd taab yĩng bɩ, sã n ka rẽ, zu-koeemdã, fo zoobdã bee yɛ, sẽn pãnemde?»
La bãmb sẽn zuk b yondã, b mikame tɩ bãmb ned kam fãa korg ne a ligd saga a yolgẽ. Bãmb ne b baaba wã fãa sẽn yãnd ligdã rabeem kãseng yõka bãmba. Dẽ, bãmb ba a Zakoob yeel-b lame: «Yãmb kɩtame tɩ mam kong m kambã fãa! A Zozɛf ka be ye, a Sɩmyõ me ka be ye, tɩ yãmb leb n dat n deeg a Benzame yɛsa. Woto fãa yaa yɛl sẽn lʋɩt mam zug bala!» 
Sɩda, sã n ya maanda sẽn kʋʋd wẽn-naandsa yĩnga, d fãa yetame tɩ d miime; m deegame. La ade, bãngr wata ne wilg-m-menga. To nonglem bal n zẽkd ninsaala. 
T’a yet tɩ ayoo! «Bɩ, f bao zĩig n zaoonde».
Ãna n get pʋg-kõapa la raop niis pagbã sẽn kiwã yelle ? B segd paama bõe ? Dẽ yĩnga neba gũudame tɩ b le kẽ kãadem bii ? Sãn ya woto, b na n kẽe kãadema ne ãna ?
Ad a Ezayu bi-ribl a Rewuyɛll kamba. Bãmb yaa naab a Nahate, naab a Zeera, ne naab a Hama n paas naab a Miiza. Bãmb yaa a Rewuyɛll kamb sẽn yaa nanambse, n be Edom soolmẽ wã. Bãmb yaa a Ezayu pag a Basmat kamba. 
Sẽn wa pagd-n-tũud sore.
Ned yamleoog tɩɩg la a tãpo
La kaoosg pʋgẽ, a Suwa bi-puglã sẽn yaa a Zʋʋda pagã wa n kiime. La a Zʋʋda sũ-sãangã sẽn wa n sɛ, yẽnda ne a zoa a Ira sẽn yaa Adulam nedã tũu taab n kẽng Timna, zĩig ning b sẽn wõrsd a Zʋʋda rũm-bãoonegã. 
A ba wã sɩd makame n konge, n ya n kʋ a Naamd n mum-a.
Daar a ye, m ba Katr pagã, wa n na n moka bugum, a Soaamb zakẽ wã, tɩ b yãk nemdã n kõ-a.
A Moyiis kɩtame tɩ Israyɛll nebã rɩk sor n yi rudum ko-kãsengã zĩigẽ n kẽng Suur we-raoogã sẽnẽ. La bãmb kẽna rasem a tãab kẽnd we-raoogã pʋgẽ n ka yãnd koom ye. 
net.
Vũnunvũugã sẽn da baooda a meng n date n põs yĩnga a pa leok-a ye.
Yem-pogsã ne b kambã kolgame n wõgemde. La a Leya me ne a kambã kolgame n wõgemde. Rẽ poore, a Zozɛf ne a ma a Rasɛll me kolgame n wõgemde. 
Zĩ kãnga Burkĩna Faso taor soabã wilgame t’a na n maan a sẽn tõe tɩ b sõng taaba.
Ka reng dog n mi wobg ye, yaa gõ-wẽoog n mi wobgo
A Moyiis yii Faarõ nengẽ n tɩ yõk Sẽn-Ka-Saab sɛɛga. 
Bi-rẽeng buudã fãa sẽn deng n yi a ma pʋgẽ yaa maan n so. Yaa fo rũm-daoog fãa sẽn yaa bi-rẽega, rũmsã sʋka, sã n yaa nag-bila, pe-bila wall bulla. 
La zaabre, bɩ f kʋ pe-bil a yiibẽ soabã. La f kõ bõn-koaadl kũun ne bõn-yũudl kũuni wa sẽn maand yibeoogã, t'a lebg yũug sẽn yaa sõama. Yaa maoong sẽn dɩt bugum Sẽn-Ka-Saab waoogr yĩnga. 
Dẽe, fo sãn ka rat SIDAwã bãaga bila, foo  sãn na ka kẽ kãadem, bɩ f yõk f menga hali n tɩ kẽ kãadema.
Sãn ya ne yãmba, a Pok ne a Seeni mõdgame n bool komdibli tɩ b wa zãmsega bii ?
Ned sã n togs yũug n wãb nem-kãado,yũug wat n gõeeme t’a soab getẽ.
Kũum sã n dokd kom-bɩɩsã, nin-kẽembã na n yeelame tɩ bõe
Maan zũud sogds pis-nu n tui loetsã pʋse, n sog-a t'a lebg fu-roog a yembre. 
Sã n yaa pẽk n yiisd pag raagẽ, a yẽg na mode
La badaar bala, a Nowe ne a pagã, ne a kom-dibli a tãabã, a Sɛm, ne a Kam la a Zafɛte, ne b pagb a tãabã kẽe koom koglgã pʋga. La b kẽe ne we-rũmsã fãa wa sẽn zems b buudu, la yir rũmsã fãa wa sẽn zems b buudu, la ne bõn-bãoonegã fãa sẽn saagd tẽn-gãongã zugã wa sẽn zem b buudu, bõn-yɩgdɩ wã fãa wa sẽn zems b buudu, la bũmb nins fãa sẽn tar pɩgs n yɩgdã. 
Badaare, bãmb dɩɩme la b yũ Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor n maan sũ-noogo, la b moon naoor a yiibẽ soab n yeele, t'a Davɩɩd biig a Salmo yaa rĩmã. B pʋdga a Salmo zug rĩung kaam, t'a lebg naab Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga, la b pʋdg a Sadok me zug kaam t'a lebg maan-kʋʋda. A Salmo zaoonda Sẽn-Ka-Saab zaoorẽ wã, n na n led a ba a Davɩɩd zĩigẽ n lebg rĩmã. A paama tõogr wʋsgo, la Israyɛll nebã fãa rag n kelgd-a lame. 
Mam pida yẽnda ne Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã n kõ yẽnda yam ne minim, la bãngre, tʋʋmã buud toor-toor fãa yĩnga, t'a tõe n maan bũmb wʋsg ne sãnem la wanzuri la zũudu, 
Burkĩna Faso paama gosne-paalga.
Ned kam fãa segdame n zoe a to nimbãanega.
Rĩm a Salmo baoo zood ne Ezɩpt rĩm a Faarõ, n peeg a bi-pugl n maan a paga. La a peeg-a lame n kẽng a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋgẽ, n tɩ zĩnd beenẽ n gũ wakat ning a sẽn na n me a na-zakã ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã, la lals nins sẽn gũbg Zeruzalɛmã n sɛ. Wakat-kãnga, nebã rag n maanda b maandã maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ wã. Bala, b rag n nan ka me roog Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋr yĩng ye. 
La a Zozoe tõoga Amalɛk nebã ne sʋʋga. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Gʋls yõwã sebr pʋgẽ tẽegr yĩnga, la bɩ f yeel a Zozoe tɩ mam na n menesa Amalɛk buudã zãnga, tɩ b ka leb n tẽeg b yell saasã tẽngr ye.» 
A ka so kuɩɩma, bɩ f bas a widga. Bala a rɩt a zakẽ.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, zʋgd buud fãa, tara a rolbo.
 La, a Soaamb yeela m ba Katre : «Y sã n ta, bɩ y pʋʋs-b fãa.
Zɩɩma yãkr da ka zabd ye.
T’a yet tɩ ayoo ! «Bɩ, f loog n bao zĩiga, n zaoonde».
Neb la naam
Ned sakda boolle, n zãdg tʋm-tʋmde.
La baa ne b sẽn dag n namsd Israyɛll nebã, Israyɛll nebã rag n tara fɩɩgre, tɩ b sõorã tar paasgo. Bõn-kãng kɩtame tɩ b rag n kis Israyɛll nebã. Dẽ, Ezɩpt nebã modga Israyɛll nebã n kɩt tɩ b maan yembd tʋʋm sẽn yaa toog hal wʋsgo. 
Nanambs pis-tã wã sʋk neb a tãab kẽnga a Davɩɩd nengẽ pĩisã sẽn be Adulam tãngã bokẽ wã sʋka, la rẽ tɩ Filistẽ-dãmbã rag n tilga b tãb-sikã Refayim tãn-longẽ wã. Ko-yũud wa n yõka a Davɩɩd t'a yeele: Ãnda n na n kẽng ko-baoor ning sẽn be Betlehɛm tẽngã noorã n tɩ yõng koom n wa kõ-m tɩ m yũ? 
Vʋʋsg rayã ne ki-paalsã la tigr rayã wakat me, b tog n maana maand sẽn yõogd bugmã fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, wa sẽn zems tõog ning b sẽn kõ bãmbã. Bãmb n na n get sɛk roogã tʋʋm yelle, ne zĩ-sõngã tʋʋm yelle. La b na n naaga a Aarõ kom-dibli wã sẽn yaa b saam-biisã, n maand Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã tʋʋmã. 
La mam miime tɩ ne rẽ fãa, foom ne f tʋmtʋmdbã kell n ka na n zoe Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab ye.» B sãama lamdã ne  orzã  tɩ bala, orzã rag n womame, la lamda rag n ninga puudu. 
Rẽ wã, wuk-m-meng rolb yaa lʋɩɩse
Zĩ yembr soab kʋʋda baag n mè a rẽemba
A pẽg-b lame, la a kos-b tɩ kell n paas raoodo.
A kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ tʋʋma fãa segd n tʋma ne yãgbo, yõ-koglgã, laafɩ wã, la meebã wɛɛngẽ.
Da bao-y n dɩ naam neb zug ye. Bao-y bala n yɩ taoor dãmba sẽn wilgd piisa so-sõngo. Wotoone, Pe-kɩɩm sõma naaba pukr daare y na reeg y pẽgr sẽn kõn sɛ pugla. 
Dẽn yĩnga bɩ Wẽnd sẽn tʋlg b rãmb ne namsgo dɩk b mens n bas ne b Naanda la Sɩd Soaba la b wɩng ne neer maanego. 
Ka segd n yɩ wakat a yembr pʋgẽ bal la karensaamba na n zãms neba  zãmsog a yembr ye. Zãmsog a yembr fãa segd n dɩka lɛɛr a naase n yaol n  tõog tɩ sa.
La a Zozɛf sẽn wa yiri, bãmb kẽe roogã pʋg n kõ yẽnda kũun ning b sẽn tarã, la b wõgemd yẽnda taoore. A Zozɛf pʋʋs-b lame n sok b keelem, n yeele: «Yãmb ba wã, sẽn yaa nin-kẽem ning yãmb sẽn dag n gom ne maam a yellã keemame? Bãmb ket n vɩɩme bɩ?» 
Ned sã n sẽdg-f-poor, bɩ-f-widg-f-nenga.
Raar a ye zoes ka sat kɩgb ye.
Zĩnigrã yɩɩ Peremye ministɛɛrã tʋm-tʋmdb katɛk nifẽ.
B renga polɩɩs rãmbã zĩigẽ, n tɩ kelg b taoor dãmbã koeese.
Faarõ ne a ʋmtʋmdbã, la Ezɩpt nebã fãa yika ne yʋngã, la kelem-kãsems yika Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋgẽ, bala zak ka zĩnd tɩ kũum ka ki ye. Yʋn-kãng bala, Faarõ boola a Moyiis ne a Aarõ n yeel-b yaa: «Bɩ yãmb ne Israyɛll nebã yi la y bas m tẽngã. Kẽng-y n tɩ waoog-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab wa y sẽn dag n yeelã. 
Tẽeg-n-paasã kasɛt pʋga, yaa yɩɩl koe-zut piig n be a pʋgẽ.
Sã n ya ne farendã goamdba, neb kaobg zugu yaa neb a 2 n gomd-a Burkĩna Faso ka.
A Zozɛf sẽn wa n na n kẽng rĩm a Faarõ taoorã, rẽ t'a tara yʋʋm pis-tã. La yẽnda sẽn yi Faarõ nengẽ wã, a tɩ gilga Ezɩpt soolmã zãng n gese. Tɩgrã yʋʋm a yopoe wã pʋga, pʋtã bõn-koaadl woma hal sõama. 
Tẽeb la mansem sẽn be rũnda rũnna sẽn ya sõama la sẽn ka sõama. D segd n teka sẽn ka sõama wã ne sẽn ya sõamawã.
Bõn-vãad buud toor-toor yii tẽn-gãongã zugu, la mood buud toor-toor sẽn womd biis wa sẽn zems b buudã yiime, tɩ tɩɩs buud toor-toor sẽn womd biis yi wa sẽn zems b buudã sẽn yaa to-to wã. Dẽ, Wẽnnaam yãame tɩ bõn-kãng yaa sõama. 
Biig na rat n dι rog-n-mik naam ta ba nan ket n ziẽ? La ayo. Tιιmã soab kell n buka a kosegã, n yeel-ba: Mam tõee tυυmdã, la yel-tũudg a ye n ya toogo. Tι b yeel t’a we n togse.
Koob nokɛɛmd ka wẽed sẽoog ye
Tãoos a ye kɩbare
Yaa rẽ tɩ tẽng-n-biiga a Zʋlyẽ Wẽndoanda Koala sokd a meng n getẽ:» bõe n yɩng tɩ b boond tõnd tɩ Farend goamdba»?.
Neba tẽedame tɩ pɔgloma la raoloma yõod ya bõe ?
Rao wã kẽngame, n sɩd maane, wa pʋg-yãangã sẽn yeelã.
Yaa woto la m wudgda, m pa zoet n tuumnẽ ye, m nug ka vaad vɩʋʋg ye. 
B rag n maana ra-bɩlmã tɩ b yaa wogd n sãde, tɩ ned sã n be zĩ-sõngẽ wã bɩ a tõe n yãnd-ba. La ned sã n be yɩnga, a ka tõe n yãnd-b ye. Bãmb kell n paa beenẽ hal tɩ ta rũndã. Bũmb a to rag n ka be kaoolã koglgã pʋga, n zʋʋg kug-wals a yiibã a Moyiis sẽn ning be Horɛɛb tãngã zugã, wakat ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn maan kaool ne Israyɛll nebã b sẽn wa n yit Ezɩpt yembdã pʋgẽ wã ye. 
Tõnd na n kẽna rasem a tãab kẽnd we-raoogã pʋgẽ n tɩ maan maoong n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã wa bãmb sẽn na n yeel tõndã.» 
A Israyɛll yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Kẽng n tɩ ges f kẽem-dãmbã tara laafɩ, la f bãng bũmb sã n ka tar rũm-bãoonegã! La f lebg n wa togs-ma.» Dẽ, yẽnda zĩnda Ebrõ tãngã longẽ n tʋma a Zozɛfe, la a Zozɛf kẽnga Sɩkɛm. 
A Ezayu yeela a baaba yaa: «Rẽ yĩnga, yaa bark a yembr bal la yãmb tar la? M baaba, ning-y maam me barka.» La a Ezayu zẽka a koɛɛg n yãbe. A ba wã yeela yẽnda yaa:  «Ade, fo yir na zãaga ne zĩ-bʋgsã, la a zãag ne saasẽ la yĩngr meenem me. 
Kugr soonda bẽng n paam kaam
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 15 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tẽngã rãmb maana a Tooma SÃNKAR kũumã yʋʋm 35 tẽegre.
La, a Katr ne, a Weoognaab tõog n yɩkame, n zʋʋg wamdã ne zomã, tɩ bũmb ka maan ye.
Nin-loaagdg wall tʋmtʋmd sẽn deegd yaood ka tar noor tɩ rɩ Pak tigrã rɩɩb ye. Yãmb na n wãba nemdã roog a ye pʋgẽ. Yãmb ka tog n tall neong n yi roogã pʋgẽ, la y ka tog n wõrg kõbr ba a yembr ye. 
Faarõ yeela a Zozɛf yɛsa: «Yaa maam la Faarõ, la sã n ka foom n kõ ned noor t'a maan bũmbu, ned kõn zẽk a nug-bil bɩ a naoor Ezɩpt soolmẽ wã ye.» 
Ka a waoonga bal ye, yaa yẽ me sẽn leok t'a yãenda sũ-noog y sʋka. A wilg-d lame tɩ y gũud-d la ne y sũur fãa; a wilg-d lame tɩ y sũur sãama y sẽn ka yãend tõndã; a wilga y sẽn da rat neer ning fãa ne tõndo, la woto wã mam nengẽ yɩɩ sũ-noog ne sũ-noogo. Sɩda m sebrã sã n sãam y sũuri me, ad-y rẽ pa sek mam lɛɛg n zab ne m meng marsa ye; tõe tɩ m zaba ne m menga a wakatẽ tɩ m mi tɩ sebrã kõ-y la sũ-sãanga, ba sũ-sãanga sã n ka kaoose. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 6 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Kapitɛnd Faruk SORGO, yiisa mooneg koɛɛga.
Noy buud toor-toor mandã wɛɛngẽ. A Moyiis yeela bãmb yaa: «Bɩ ned baa a yembr da bas mandã tɩ beoog vẽeg ye.» 
Yaa ned sãn gãand ne ned a to sẽn tar SIDAwã bãag bila. Yaa so  kãnga la a tuud n yɩɩda.
Tãrãzisẽo tʋʋmd na n yɩɩ kiuug 21, la b segd n tũu ƐMPESƐƐRÃ rãmb sẽn tik bũmb ning n lub naamã, la b reeg n na n lebg n demsã.
Na-tẽngã pʋgẽ, soay kẽer ra paga ne sodaase.
Dẽ, nebã vʋʋsa rasem a yopoe wã daare. Israyɛll nebã pʋda rɩɩbã yʋʋr tɩ mande. A rag n wẽnda wa baninga, n yaa pɛɛlga. La a noosmã wẽnda wa bur-maas sẽn maan ne sɩɩdo. 
Zʋʋda buudã neb maana wẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ, n yɩɩd b yaab-rãmbã sẽn dag n maanã, n kɩt tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sũurã yik ne-ba. Bãmb dag n tara pagb ne raop sẽn be pʋʋsg rotã zĩisẽ n maand yoob n waoogd wẽn-naandse. Bãmb maana tʋʋm-beed buud toor-toore, wa buud nins Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn kɩt tɩ Israyɛll nebã rigã sẽn dag n maandã. 
Dẽ, a Zezabɛll gʋlsa sɛb rĩm a Akaab yʋʋr yĩnga, n ning a Akaab nug-tikr bãndã sɛbã zutu. La yẽnda tʋma sɛbã tɩ b tɩ kɩs kãsem-dãmbã ne kug-zĩidbã sẽn be tẽng ning a Nabot sẽn beẽ wã. La y yãk nin-yaals tɩ b zĩnd n tees-a n dõd-a n yeel t'a tʋʋsa Wẽnnaam, la a tʋʋs rĩmã me. Rẽ poore, yiis-y-yã-a tẽngã kɩreng n lob-a kug t'a ki.» 
Yaa woto tɩ Katr kʋkʋm yaa Ki f ye ! Ki f ye ! Ki f ye !
A Batseba kẽngame n na n tɩ gom ne rĩm a Salmo, a Adoniza wɛɛngẽ. La rĩmã yikame n seg-a n wõgemd a taoore, la a lebg n tɩ zaoond a geerã, la b talla naam geer a to n wa rɩgl dĩmã rɩtg t'a ma zaoonde. Dẽ, a Batseba yeelame tɩ: «M kotame tɩ f rɩk Sunem tẽng bi-pugl a Abisaag n kõ f kẽem a Adoniza t'a maan a paga.» 
Ad sẽn le gʋls zĩig a to: «Wẽnd mii sɩlem dãmba tagsgo la b neeme tɩ yaa yaoolgo.» Dẽn yĩngã, ned da bao a pẽgr ninsaalb nengẽ ye, tɩ bũmba fãa yãmb n so, 
Kʋlg sã n kis rʋʋgre, a pa kis lebgr ye
Dẽe, a Pok gãda a nugã tɩ  b tɩ zĩnd n vʋʋse. A ma yeelame yaa: “Masã, mam ka le tar pãng n tʋmd wa  pĩnda ye“
Tʋʋmdã sɩngrẽ, a Odill WEDRAOOGO/YẼ sẽn be ministɛɛrẽ wã n get kaorengã la buudã goam taoor kẽnde, la segl tɩ b yi so-togs n tɩ bao bãngr la yama, a kosa neb nins sẽn zĩnd tigsgã pʋg tɩ b sak n kõ b mense ne pʋ-peelem, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b seg taaba tõog n wom biisi.
A Abrahaam leoka a Izak n yeele: «M biiga, Wẽnnaam meng n na n ges tɩ peosg sẽn na n maan maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã wa.»  La bãmb b yiibã rag n kell n tũuda taab n kẽnda. La bãmb sẽn ta zĩig ning Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n wilg a Abrahaamã, a Abrahaam maana tẽn-kugri, n dɩk raadã n dogle. La a sẽb a biig a Izak n dogl raadã sẽn be tẽn-kugrã zugã zugu. 
Ade, mam na n yalsa ko-nifã sɛɛga, tɩ pʋg-sad ning sẽn na n wa-a, n wa toog koomã, tɩ mam yeel-a: mam kotame tɩ f sulg n kɩll f yʋʋrã n kõ-m koom bilfã›, t'a leok maam tɩ m yũ wã, la a yeel t'a na n tooga koomã n kõ mam yʋgma wã me wã, bɩ yɩ pʋg-sad-kãng la Sẽn-Ka-Saab yãk yã, n na n kõ mam soaalã bi-ribla! 
La yãmb yeelame: Yãmb yao-zʋʋgã sã n ka tũ yãmb n wa, mam ka na n deeg yãmb ye. Dẽ, tõnd sẽn lebg n leb m baaba sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã nengẽ wã, tõnd togs-a-la yãmb goamã fãa. 
A wilgame tɩ yaa tigsgã baosgẽ la b na n yãk taoor dãmba, la noy nins b sẽn na n tũ n zã tarãzisẽo wã.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab sũur sãama ne b menga, bãmb sẽn maan ninsaal n ning dũniyã zugã, la bãmb sũur sãama wʋsgo. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Mam na n menesa ninsaal mam sẽn maanã dũniyã zugu, la yaa sẽn sɩng ne ninsaal n tall n tɩ tãag rũmsã ne bõn-bãoonegã, la ne bõn-yɩgdɩ wã sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã. Bala, mam sũurã sãama ne mam sẽn naan bãmbã.» 
La d le sɩngdame n lʋɩɩsd d meng taoor bɩ bõe? Sãnd ka wẽnd yaa pakre ne-do, wa sẽn ya pakr ne neb kẽere, tɩ d yiis d tʋʋm-sõnga kaset sɛb n wilg yã, bɩ d deeg d tʋʋm-sõnga kaset sɛb yãmb meng nengẽ? D tʋʋm-sõnga kaset sebr yaa yãmb mense, yaa sebr sẽn gʋls y sũurẽ, sebr ned fãa sẽn zãad la a karemnẽ. 
B reemã a yiib soabã yʋʋr ra yaa Tẽegre 1.
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ b rɩk na-kẽndr n wilg-b polɩɩs rãmbã tʋʋmde, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b tõog n tʋm b tʋʋmdã kibayã kũun wɛɛngẽ t’a tẽeg tɩrga.
Afirik kaa :
Sẽn-Ka-Saab sũur yɩɩ noog ne a Salmo kosgã. mam na n maana wa fo sẽn kosã. Mam na n kõo foom yam ne bãngre. La neb nins sẽn zĩnd sẽn deng foomã, ne neb nins sẽn na n pʋgl foomã kõn tol n wẽneg foom ye. 
Waogdg komindã taoor dãmb yãka yʋʋm 2023 soabã moende.
Neb ka tɛk n yi n wilg b belem ne Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
Burkĩna Faso rãmb maana a Tooma SÃNKAR kʋʋbã yʋʋm35 tẽegre.
B kell n teegame, n wa ta ballã saab sẽn wa n ka le yɩɩd minit a 2 tɩ ball Komoor bal-tãood aFaez Seleman sui Etalõ tɩ lebg yiib ne ye, tɩ ballã be saabẽ.
Dẽ, a Zakoob rɩka kugr n vigli. La a Labã pʋda zĩ-kãng yʋʋr tɩ ‹Yegaar-Sahaduta›,  la a Zakoob pʋda zĩigã yʋʋr tɩ ‹Galɛɛde› . 
A Zozɛf sergame n bas bãmb n tɩ yãbe. La a lebgame n wa gom ne bãmba, la a yiisa a Sɩmyõ bãmb sʋk n tɩ kẽes bi-bees roog bãmb nifẽ. 
Tigsgã rãmb sẽn wa n kʋms fãa tɩ sa, yɩɩ tãrazisẽo wã taoor soab n wa n tik a nug sɛbã zut tɩ b page.
Badaare, bɩ y yeel y kambã a woto: «Yaa bũmb ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn maan tõnd yĩng wakat ning tõnd sẽn yi Ezɩpt tẽngã yĩnga, la d maand woto.» Bõn-kãng na n yɩɩ bãnd yãmb nusẽ, la a yɩ bãnd yãmb rĩirẽ, n yaa tẽegr yãmb yĩnga, tɩ yãmb tõe n togsd Sẽn-Ka-Saab tõogã. Bala, yaa ne nug sẽn tar pãng la Sẽn-Ka-Saab yiis yãmb Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
«Ad noy nins fo sẽn na n wilg nebã: 
Pipi mooneg̃ pʋgẽ, b wilgame tɩ tẽngã tẽn-kugr yalsame.
B zãmsgã sẽn wa n pag a kkʋlense, b kõo taab sɛk yʋʋm sẽn wate, n na n kẽng taoor ne zãmsgã vuk a nu soaba.
La bãmb leokame: «Yãmb tʋmtʋmdã sẽn yaa tõnd ba wã keemame, la b ket n vɩɩme.» La bãmb leb n sulgame n wõgemde. La a Zozɛf sẽn zẽk a neng n yãnd a yao a Benzame sẽn yaa yẽnda ma-biigã, a yeelame: «Yaa yãmb yao ninga yãmb sẽn dag n gom ne maam a yellã la yõwã bɩ?» La a leb n yeele: «M biig sõngo, Wẽnd na ning f zug barka!» 
Sẽn pʋgd-a me sã n wa tar gɩdgre, yaa pʋgdg a yiib n soabã n gete.
Zakẽ baag sã n pa yi ne kõbre, yɩng baag pa paamd ye
Yẽnda leb n naana te-neeb sẽn wẽnd  gernaad  tɩɩg biis ruls a yiib n ning n gilg gãmbã wã n lud pugli a yiibã sẽn be ra-lugdsã zutã. Pugli wã sẽn be ra-lugds a yiibã zutã, b rag n gilg-b-la ne gernaad tɩɩg biis kobessi, la b ra bee yĩngr n pẽ sẽn tʋʋgẽ wã. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Yeel a Aarõ t'a rɩk a dasaarã n tẽeg a nugã tẽngã kʋɩlsã zutu, ne Nill kʋɩlgã ko-soayã, ne bãgsã fãa zutu, n kɩt tɩ lomsã yi n pid Ezɩpt tẽngã.» Dẽ, a Aarõ tẽega a nug Ezɩpt koomã fãa zutu. La lomsã yiime n pid Ezɩpt tẽngã. 
Yaa rẽ tɩ karen-biisã ne b ba rãmb yi n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b karen-dotã, la b yãk taoor dãmb karen-saamb dãmb nins sẽn sak n zĩ porvẽesã pʋgẽ sʋka, tɩ kaorengã tõog n kẽng taoore.
Ned sã n yãnd bũmb a to nengẽ n yeel tɩ yaa yẽnda rẽnda, sã n yaa naaf bɩ bõanga, wall pesgo, wall bʋʋga, bɩ fuugu, wall bũmb sẽn meneme, bɩ bãmb b yiibã fãa tũ taab n wa Wẽnnaam nengẽ, la Wẽnnaam sẽn wilg t'a soab ka tar bʋʋmã na n yaoo a to wã naoor a yiibu. 
Waoog y ba la y ma, n tõog n paam yõ-wok soolem ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã sẽn kõt yãmbã pʋgẽ. Da kɩs kaset sẽn yaa zirẽ n dõd f to ye. 
Ned sã n ka tar a ba-yir pãng, bɩ a tall a ma-yir pãnga
La a Abram sẽn ta Ezɩpt tẽngã, Ezɩpt tẽngã neb yãame tɩ pagã sɩd yaa neer hal wʋsgo. La rĩm a Faarõ kug-zĩidbã sẽn yãnd pagã, b kẽng n tɩ pẽga pagã rĩm a Faarõ taoore. La b peega a Sarayi n wa rĩmã yiri. 
Tɩ kinkirgã sok-a : «M sã n wa, m na n paamame bɩ ?»
Tι   soaamb yeel-a:  M ba Katre, yellã pa zems ye. Mam paama sãmpogre.
Rũndã, yãmb yita bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuugã. Sẽn-Ka-Saab sã n wa kɩt tɩ yãmb kẽ tẽng ning Kana nebã, ne Hɛt nebã, la Amoor nebã, ne Hevi nebã, la Zebuus nebã sẽn beẽ wã pʋga, tẽng ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n kãab n yeel tɩ b na n kõo y yaab-rãmbã, sẽn yaa tẽng sẽn pid ne bĩisim la sɩɩdã, bɩ y maan minin-kãng ki-kãng pʋgẽ. 
kibarã yii libreinfo.
Ãnã n segd n bao n bãng bũmb sẽn kẽed ne SIDAwã  bãaga ?
Ad a Beera saam-biisã b sẽn sõd roog-roogo, tɩ b yʋyã be sõadgã sebr pʋga, wa sẽn zems b buudu: kãsmã yaa a Yeyiyɛlle, tɩ sẽn pʋgd yaa a Zakari. Yaangã sẽnẽ, bãmb dag n bee hal we-raoogã noore, Efrat kʋɩlgã sẽnẽ. Bala, b rũmsã rag n yaa wʋsg Galaad tẽngã. 
B sẽn wa n ta we-raoogã pʋga, saag n kʋɩ, tɩ sebgã sɩng yikri.
Ned nug sã n be baag noorẽ, a beleng n são.
T’a ma leoke: Pa kũum ye, la ne kũum zem taaba. Ad kazẽegã sẽn dιge. Naab n kιs tι m kõg rãam tι yι beoog rãam.
Sɛkã poore, Nizɛɛr tẽngã na-kʋdgo, a Mahamuudu Yisufu, sẽn le ya sug-koat Burkĩna Faso ne CEDEAO sʋkã pẽgame.
Karen-saamb kasengã pʋɩ-b-la sula a nu, tɩ sull fãa maan tʋʋmdã makre, n wa tɩ b zĩnd n bale.
B sẽn yet t’a soab yao wã tog n talla gomdã n kẽng Komsɛɛrya sẽn pẽ n tɩ wilg sebr ning b sẽn kõ-a wã, la a yao yaood ning b sẽn yeel t’a yao wã.
Nug-yẽes soab wilgda sʋʋg soab yam
Yoob soaba, b tẽngã bee tẽn-gumbr pʋgẽ, la a sɩngda yʋng wakat a 9 n tãag yibeoog wakat a 5.
M ba Katr wa n sɩd sɩnga kʋndã wẽebo, tɩ noosã me sɩng saooga, wa yell ka be ye.
Bãng-bãnge: Mam taa tẽngẽ tι tẽngẽ rãmb fãa bugd kamba. Yaa bõe ? Leoore : Kamaanga, tι kamaanã pẽge.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Mam yãame tɩ nin-bãmbã sũyã yaa kegemse. La moasã, bas tɩ mam sũ-kãbrã wɩng n dɩ-ba. Mam na n kɩtame tɩ buud sẽn yaa kãseng yi fo pʋgẽ.» 
Dẽwã, da yaa tɩlɛ tɩ kamba tʋm  wʋsgo n yɩɩd pĩnda.
La wakat fãa, rũn-yãans nins sẽn tar pãngã sã n wa be rʋʋb ratem pʋga, a Zakoob rɩkda rasabã n ning gaolgẽ wã tɩ rũmsã rʋʋd taaba, la b get rasabã. La a rũms nins sẽn yaa wagã sã n dat n dʋ taaba, a Zakoob ka ningd rasabã ye, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ rũm-bãmb yɩ a Labã rẽnda, tɩ rũms nins sẽn tar pãngã yaa yẽnda a Zakoob rẽnda. 
A zagl ne "a zagl" yaa peoog a ye ki
Memoryal Tooma SÃNKAR sullã taoor soaba a Pɛɛr WEDRAOOG yeelame tɩ b saagdame tɩ bug-vɩlensã bãmb sẽn n kõ kom-bɩɩbã, a na n kenga b pelse tɩ b tõog n dɩk a Tooma SÃNKAR naoore, tɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã neb tõog n tall saamb biilim, la b yɩ pʋ-peelem rãmba.
A Zozɛf rɩka zãmsdã n togs a ba wã ne a kẽem-dãmbã. La a baaba zab-a lame n sok-a yaa: «Yaa bõe zãmsd buud la fo sẽn zãmsã? Fo tagsdame tɩ f ma ne f kẽem-dãmbã ne mam mengã na wa n wõgemda tẽng fo taoor bɩ?» A Zozɛf kẽem-dãmbã maana sũ-kiir ne yẽnda. La a Zozɛf ba a Zakoob rag n bĩngda yel-kãensã a sũurẽ. 
la nifu, nif yĩnga, la yẽnde, yẽnd yĩnga, la nugu, nug yĩnga, la naoore, naoor yĩnga, bugum yõogre, bugum yõogr yĩnga, la poglgo, poglg yĩnga, la yĩng bugbu, yĩng bugb yĩnga. 
A Zozɛf zãmsdo. A Zakoob zĩnda Kana, tẽng ning yẽnda ba wã sẽn dag n zĩnd sãandã. 
  B sã n sok teed nins yãmb sẽn zãadã yelle, bɩ y yeel-ba : «Kʋndã, yaa sẽn na n tar n wẽedẽ, tɩ y saoodẽ.
Nug tikrã pʋga, yaa sodaasã reezẽo rãmb sẽn da pʋɩ tɩ ya tẽng fãa pʋgẽ, bãmb b tãab n be wã, sigl-paallã pʋgẽ, lebga reezẽo rãmb a yoobe.
SIDAwã bãag bil sãn na ka yõk yãmba, yãmb tõeeme t’a ka tol  n yõk yãmb ye.
Pondr nong melbo, la zʋʋr kae ye
Pelem-pelem yaa talg yõ-koẽega
D na n bãnga sebrã a wãn wãna ?
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 2 raare, koees wa n yiime n wilg tɩ sẽn tũ ne dĩin taoor dãmb la rog-n-mik nanambs sẽn kẽes b toogo, Letena Kolonell Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB sakame n sigi, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ sodaasã ra wa welg taab ye.
Ned ninga sẽn ka paam-a tẽebã sã n dat n loog bɩ a looge: sã n ya woto saam-biiga sẽn tẽedã yi-la a loɛɛgẽ. Wẽnd bool-y lame tɩ y vɩɩnd laafi vɩɩm. Paga, f mi-la f na fãag f sɩda? Sɩda, f mi-la f na fãag f paga? 
Maam, a Pol, a Zezi Krista Tʋʋm-tʋmd ne Wẽnd daabo, maam ne m saam-biig a Timote, tõnd n pʋʋsd Wẽnd Tigenga sẽn be Korẽnt la d saam-bi sõma wã fãa sẽn be Akayi tẽn-tõre. Bɩ Wẽnd la d Soaal a Zezi Krista Ba, nimbãan-zoeer Ba, toog buud fãa yoalsdã, paam barka! 
Ned pɩɩsda roog n mong nang bʋʋm
Soaamb yika raar a yembr n saada, n saad ka-tυυm saabo. A wa n sega wobgo. A sẽn maag a meng n ges wobgã, a sιd tara pangã. A sẽn loog n ta kυιlgẽ wã n na n yũ koom, a yãa yemde.
Zeruzalɛm nebã yʋya. Israyɛll nebã fãa yʋy rag n gʋlsa Israyɛll rĩm-dãmbã sebr pʋgẽ. B yõga Zʋʋda nebã n tall-b n kẽng Babilonde, b sẽn maan sẽn kis n beeg Wẽnnaamã yĩnga. Zʋʋda ne Benzame la Efrayiim ne Manaase yagensã kẽng n tɩ zĩnda Zeruzalɛm. 
Baag noor ka pit a le dũm ned ye.
Saag n soonda,sũm ka sẽed ye.
Bãmb na n bãngame tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa bãmb Wẽnnaam sẽn yiis bãmb Ezɩpt n na n zĩnd ne bãmba. Mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa bãmb Wẽnnaam. 
A yiib n soaba, yaa tʋm tɩ Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã vɩɩm na-kẽndr kẽng taoore, sẽn na n baase, yaa gosneerã tʋm tɩ tẽngã tõog n paam zã-songo.
