La a Izak leok-a lame: «Fo yao wã wa n maana sɩlem n deeg fo barkã.» 
Reezẽo paal nins tẽnga taoor soab sẽn yãkã, yaa Sayɛll reezẽo wã, yaa Doori sodaasã, sull n get be soolmã.
Wẽnnaam daoã leoka rĩmã yaa: «Baa yãmb sã n dɩk y zakã pʋɩ-sʋk n kõ maam, mam kõn tũ yãmb n kuil ye. Mam ka na n lemb y rɩɩbo, mam kõn yũ y koom me ye. Dẽ, Wẽnnaam daoã rɩka sor a to n kuiisẽ, n ka leb n tũ sor ning yẽnda sẽn dag n tũ n wa Betɛllã ye. 
La bi-vɩɩgã nimbãaneg yõka a ma wã t'a yeele: «N-na, m kot-y lame tɩ kõ-a bi-vɩɩgã, la y ra kʋ-a ye.» La pag a yembrã yeelame: «Pasg-y biigã zĩis a yiibu, tɩ tõnd fãa konge.» Israyɛll nebã fãa sẽn wʋm dĩm a Salmo sẽn kao bʋʋdã to-to wã, bãmb zoee rĩmã. Bala, b yãame tɩ rĩmã tara Wẽnnaam yam n maand a tʋʋmã ne tɩrlem. 
Tẽeb la mansem bʋs n be rũnda rũnna n ya sõama n tõe  n sõng tɩ d zab ne SIDAwã bãag bila ?
Sã n yaa ne Faarõ zãmsdã sẽn yɩlem naoor a yiibã, rat n yeelame tɩ yaa Wẽnnaam meng n yãk yam n na n maan bõn-kãnga, la Wẽnnaam na n pids-a-la tao-tao. Moasã, rẽndame tɩ Faarõ bao ned sẽn tar bãngre, la yam, n kõ yẽnda naam t'a ges Ezɩpt soolmã yelle. 
 A rũm-bãoonegã pa tõe n sõd n sa ye : Niisi, piisi, bʋʋse, noos la kĩini. 
Ad yaa ned kʋɩɩm sẽn ya wa ba-raoog kʋɩɩm
Yaa rẽ n so, tɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã pʋgẽ, sẽn sigl-b tʋʋmdã seg kiba-kɩtbã Waogdgo, SIYAWO wã zak pʋg n wilg-ba, b sẽn paam yãagr ninga.
Zak naabã tɩ paam-b lame, n yeel-b gom-kãensã fãa. Bãmb leoka zak naabã yaa: «Yaa bõe tɩ mam soaalã gomd a woto? Tõnd sẽn yaa yãmb yembsã kõn sak n maan bũmb a woto bada! 
Sãn ya ne neba tagsog sẽn kẽed ne kombɩtsã la raoloma la pogloma wɛɛngẽ ya mãnsem bʋg la neba tagsed tɩ zemsame ? tɩ ya sõama ? wala tɩ ya wẽnga ? Pʋgsadba segd n wilgame tɩ b tõe n dogame n yaol n kẽ kãadem bii ?
Lɛɛbdb kẽer sẽn ka sakã, waa ne kẽ taaba.
La Wẽnnaam goma ne a Israyɛll yʋng vẽnegr pʋgẽ n yeele: «Zakoobe, Zakoobe!» T'a Israyɛll leok tɩ ad maam. 
Nug-tikr 13 soaba: Seb-kãngã sẽn ya ƐPEYƐSƐR taoor dãmbã n gʋls-a n na n tũ n zã tẽngã, b segd n yiis-a-la tẽngã zʋgnall-kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ Zʋgnall Ofisɛllã pʋgẽ.
Ned ka nobd n yɩɩg a gãong yaadem ye
Gosneem seb-gʋnd kasengã rɩka tʋʋmdã sɩngr sebr tẽngã taoor soab yʋʋr yĩnga n ning gosneerã taoor soab nugẽ, la a pʋʋs-a ne a paoongo.
Yãmb sãn n tɩpd-ba, yãmb segd n maana y  sẽn na maaneg tɩ b zɩɩma da sɩɩs yãmb yĩnga ye.
Bãng-bãnge: M tυm-a, a kõn tõdge, la a kẽngr me, a kõn lebg n wa. Yaa bõe ? Leoore : Loaabg kugri.
La yʋʋm a yopoe wã pʋgẽ, a Zozɛf tigsa Ezɩpt soolmã koodã fãa. A Zozɛf tigsa koodã n bĩng tẽng fãa pʋgẽ. Yẽnda tigsa tẽng fãa pʋt bõn-koaadl n bĩng tẽng fãa pʋgẽ. Sẽn deng kom-kãsengã sẽn na n sɩngã, rẽ tɩ On maan-kʋʋd a Poti-Feera bi-pugl a Asnat roga a Zozɛf kom-dibli a yiibu. 
Yʋʋm 2021 soabã, tẽns 41 la b ra pʋgd ãndũni wã tẽns 180 pʋgẽ.
A Potifaar dɩka yẽnda sẽn so wã fãa n bas a Zozɛf nugẽ. Yẽnda ka leb n maand baa fɩ, sã n ka rɩɩbã yẽnda sẽn dɩtã bala.  A Zozɛf rag n yaa ra-sãn-beelle, n yaa neere. 
Gelgr yodga yam
Bala, a pa gɩdg ƐMPESƐƐR sullã sẽn gʋls a na-kẽndrã sebr ninga wã ye.
Tɩ bala, sẽn sɩng ne sigr kiuug yʋʋm 2021 sẽn loogã bãmb a pagtɩ wã taoor dãmb ra sɩbga a Edi Kõmbeoogo t’a ka segd n naag pagtɩ wã no-rɩkr pʋgẽ kiis a yoob tõore.
Pʋg rʋmd ka mi t’a sɩd yaa naab ye.
Reem la yɩɩla
Ka pʋd m yʋʋr zabr yaa toogo
Neb nins sẽn paam kũunã wilga b sũ-noog ne sullã rãmba.
Kâoong ka kö-m zaalem, Kãoong reeg m doore. Door ka m doore, Door a naab a Wënd doore. Naab a Wẽnd ka kõ-m zaalem, Naab a Wẽnd kυυ m ba, n kυ m ma, N keeg roor n kõ-m tι m tar n lobd sυy yee...
Ned ka nong a rataag me, bɩ a pẽg-a t’a ka kood ne a raolem ye.
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 28 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, gosneem yiisa mooneg koɛɛga.
Sẽn sɩng ne rẽ tɛka karenzi ning b sẽn boond tɩ Sipɛɛr 91 lɩtr lebga wakir 133 tɩ gaazoallã lɩtr lebg wakɩr 129.
Sɛg-taabã pʋgẽ, tẽngã taoor soab wilga bũmb nins fãa sẽn pɩʋʋgd Burkĩna Faso, la soay nins b sẽn dat n dɩk n tõog n lebg n deeg tẽnsã nin-wẽnsã nugẽ.
Dẽ, a Aarõ tẽgna yʋʋrã ne mandã kug-walsã sẽn kɩt Wẽnnaam tõodã kasetã taoore, n bĩng a beenẽ wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. 
Zãndarem dãmbã sẽn da tar reezẽo bɛd a tãabã, bãmb me lebga a yoobe.
Dẽ wã, m kot-f lame tɩ f rɩk f rao-teedã moas-moasã bala, f lokã ne f tãpã, n kẽng weoogẽ n tɩ bao we-nemd n wa kõ-ma. Segl rɩ-noog sẽn ta m yam n tall n wa kõ-m tɩ m dɩ, la m ning f zug barka, la m yaool n ki.» 
B sẽn yi be, b rɩka Kambõensẽ sore, n kẽng Farens sodaasã sẽn be zĩig ningã, n na n tɩ kɩs bãmb me sebre.
So-m-meng noaag ka tar kaam ye.
Yɩɩll fãa me, b ra yɩɩnd-a-la ne sik-m-menga.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela yẽnda yaa: «Ned sã n kʋ a Kayẽ, mam na n doka m sũur ne a soab naoor a yopoe.» La Sẽn-Ka-Saab ninga a Kayẽ bãnde, tɩ ned sã n yãnd-a bɩ a ra kʋ-a ye. La a Kayẽ yii Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor n loog n kẽng n tɩ zĩnd Nood  tẽngã sẽn be Edɛn zẽedã zĩig yaangã. 
Sull ning sẽn be Ministɛɛrẽ wã n get buudã goam taoor kẽndã, la sull ning sẽn get kibayã kũun ne buudã goam kaorengo, n paas Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kibayã kũun no-rɛɛsdb sega taab Kʋdg soolmẽ wã n ges rabay nins b sẽn na n dɩk n yãag buudã goam kiba-kɩtb tɩ b tõog tɩ b tʋʋmdã paam pãnga, la a kẽng taoore.
Yaa tigs-kaseng ning sẽn zĩnd zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 soabã, la b yãk-a t’a lʋɩ tẽngã taoore.
La bi-pɛɛlga sẽn be yẽ pʋgẽwã toẽeme n paam bãaga bil me.
A tẽegrã maana wakat ning Burkĩna Faso sẽn be yõ-koglg kaalem pʋgẽ, tɩ rẽ yɩ sabaabo, tɩ naam tekr zĩndi.
A Abrahaam kambã, a Izak ne a Ismayɛll tɩ muma a Abrahaam Makpela tãn-bokã sẽn be Hɛt rao a Sowaar biig a Efrõ pʋʋgã pʋgã, n pẽneg Mamre. Yaa pʋ-kãng la a Abrahaam sẽn dag n da Hɛt nebã nengẽ wã. B muma a Abrahaam ne a pag a Saara beenẽ. 
Tõnd Soaala Zezi Krista Ba a Wẽnde — sẽn so bark yʋʋm tong taab n ka mi sɛɛbã — bãmb miime tɩ m pa yagd ye. La yɩɩ peoog pʋga la b sagl maam n tũnug roog võore n sik-m lal-gũbra poore la woto la m tõog n põs-a. 
A sẽn ta yirã, a basame tι kaoos bilfu. A sẽn wa n tags tι masã t'a katr pagã rυga gεlã tι sek bιιbã, a kιtame tι yẽ meng pagã yi zakã noore, n yãbd woto: wuyy..., wuyy... Gel-yend kẽ m sιd yee..., Gel-yend kυ m sιd Yee...
Dẽ, Faarõ tʋmame tɩ b tɩ tall a Zozɛf n wa. La b tɩ yiisa a Zozɛf bi-bees roogẽ wã tao-tao. B põnga a Zozɛf zugu, n tek a futu, n tall-a n kẽng Faarõ nengẽ. Faarõ yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Mam zãmsa zãmsdo, la ned baa a yembr ka tõog n bilg maam a võor ye! La mam wʋmame tɩ b sã n togs foom zãmsdo, fo tõe n bilga a võore.» 
B tog n maana rulg a yiibẽ soabã ne  ɛskarbukli , la ne  safɩɩre , ne  diyama  kuga. Rulg a tãabẽ soabã tog n yɩɩ ne  opalle , la ne  agate , ne  ametist  kuga. 
La mam maanda sɩd hal tɩ ta zamaan tusri, n kõt neb sugr b beegrã ne b kɩɩsgã la b yel-wẽnã fãa yĩnga. La baoosgo, mam ka na n bas yãmb taal y beegrã yĩng ye. Mam na n kɩtame tɩ ba-rãmbã beegrã sɩbgr zĩnd bãmb kambã zutu, la bãmb yagensã zut hal tɩ ta zamaan a tãabo, la ne a naase.» 
A wakatã, burkĩn bi wã fãa wẽ-a-la nu-poaka, n sɩd ra kõ-a sɩda, n yet tɩ b paama b fãagda.
Tẽegre, yaa zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 21 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, la tẽngã taoor soab yãk Metr Apolineer KELEM t’a zĩnd gosneemã taoore.
Reezẽo a yiib n soabã ket n yaa Bobo Dɩulaso.
Sã n ya yãmba, sɩdb rãmba, zĩnd-y ne y pagba ne wʋm taab yam, wa ne zĩnd-n-taaga sẽn ka tar pãng wʋsg ye. Kõ y pagã a waoogr pʋɩɩre, wa neb sẽn naag taab n dɩt beoog vɩɩma yõodo. Woto bũmb kõn sãam yãmb pʋʋsg ye. 
La kʋɩleng fãa zugu, rĩm a Salmo kɩtame tɩ b gʋl serubẽ-rãmb ne komse, la tɩ-puud sẽn yaa neeba, n kɩt tɩ b bolg-b ne sãnem. 
Ned bʋʋg bɩ a pesg sã n lʋɩ a rũmsã sʋka, a ka le yit ye; yẽ n na n soog-a.
 Biigã sɩd rɩka pʋʋrã, n na n tɩ lobe. A sẽn wa n kolg bokã, la, m ba Soaamb sẽn da be pʋ-bilã pʋgẽ wã, yeel-a : «Da lob yambẽ n ka ye, sãag n kẽng taoore».
A pʋgẽ, tẽngã naab tõe n yɩɩ sodaaga, bɩ nin-zaalga.
A maome n zãa a Yõdɩ sõama wa pag sẽn zãad a biiga
Sẽn kaoos bilfu, wẽndooga rãmb tigma nebã n na n gom ne-b SIDAwã bãag yelle.
·  Sãn tõeeme, bɩ b tal sʋpĩim sẽn ya yɩlemde wala yãmb meng rend bal n vʋdeg yãmba.
La a Moyiis sã n zẽk a nugã, Israyɛll dãmbã tõogdame, la yẽnda sã n sik a nugã, Amalɛk rãmbã tõogdame. La a Moyiis nusã sẽn yɛ wã yĩnga, a Aarõ ne a Ʋʋr dɩka kugr n kõ yẽnda t'a zaoonde. La a Aarõ ne a Ʋʋr gãda yẽnda nusã, a yembr dɩtgo, a yembr goabga. Woto, a Moyiis nusã kengame hal tɩ ta wĩndgã kõom. 
Bãng-bãnge: Bõe n yit tẽngẽ n tat tẽng a to t’a pa tol n yẽrge ? Leoore : Sore
A sẽn kolg n gok kũumã, la, a sẽn rok n lʋɩ, n ki. 
La a Moyiis leoka rĩmã yaa: «Mam sã n wa n yi tẽngã, mam na n zẽka m nus n tees Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, la sa-kelemsã ne sapɩlmã na n yalsame. Woto, fo na bãng tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab n so dũniyã. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab leb n goma ne yẽnda n yeele: «M kotame tɩ f tʋm f nugã f yãoogẽ wã.» Dẽ, yẽnda tʋma a nugã a yãoogẽ wã. La a sẽn yiis a nugã, wãood n dag n yõk a nugã t'a lebg pɛɛlg wa  neeze . 
La ra-bãmb ra palga ra-lugdsã zutu. Ra-paadsã sõor dag n yaa bãmb pis-naas la a nu, la b pʋɩ-b-la ruls a tãabo, tɩ rulg fãa yaa ra-paads piig la a nu. Roogã yĩngrã paga ne sɛɛdr tɩɩs raado. Rignoyã ne võ-yalemsã fãa maaname tɩ yaa mags-magse, la bãmb me rag n tota taaba. La võ-yalemsã rag n tonga taab zĩis a tãabo. 
Sãan pʋʋsem la a zɩɩbo
Mo-ka-tĩidga, n leokd nifu.
A Polle, a Zeezi Kiris tẽn-tʋmda, a wa sẽn zems ne Wẽnnaam sẽn yaa tõnd fãagdã raabo, la sẽn zems ne a Zeezi Kirisã, tõnd tẽeb sẽn be ne a soabã noore, A wa mam sẽn dag n sagl foom wakat ning mam sẽn loogd n dabd Masedoannã, kell n pa Efɛɛs n sagl neb kẽer tɩ b ra zãms nebã koɛɛg a to ye, 
F sã n pa na n zɛ n bas ned bɩ f ra rɩ n bas-a ye
Sẽn ketã yaa komindã n segd n yiisi.
Nin-feoog sã n pa seg zõang a pa mi tɩ wẽnd nong-a lame ye
B mee roogã ne kug b sẽn dag n zoe n peese. Woto, roogã meeb wakate, b ka tol n dɩk zãar n wẽ bũmbu, wall b tall lar bɩ kut buud n kɛ wall b pesg bũmb ye. Sʋk rotã noy rag n bee Wẽnd doogã nug-rɩtgo, la b rag n tũuda rʋʋdg n dʋʋd yĩngr dotã. 
Pa rat noaag nemd n fʋrsda a bɩɩm
Yɩ wakat ba-yãkdgã sẽn bool lɛbdba faa tɩ b kõ b zɩɩma sẽn na n yɩlẽ n tõog n sõng b saambiisã, tɩ bala zɩɩm kũun tara nafr wʋsgo, a yaa yelsõmde, n tõe n le wa naf fo menga, f paga bɩ f kamba.
Tι Pυg-yãangã yeel-a tι yell ka be ye. A sιd loogame n kẽnge, n tι kaoos bilfu, n lebg n wa. Pυg-yãangã kẽeme.
Ned sã n ka pẽ noaaga a ka mi t’a sẽedamẽ ye
Dasma noorã, a baaba vʋʋsdame bala, a ka le tʋmd ye. A waglame n ka le tar pãng ye. Dẽ, zaka rãmb fãa maanda yɩɩr a yĩnga.
 Koom dɩt a mit-a.
 La, b sẽn na n maan bũmb ning marsã, n bãng ned ning sẽn dɩ-a ki wã, b rɩka ka-kellã, n pãb n yelge, n maan zom-pãrga, n ning wamd pʋgẽ, n dɩk n doglg nobg wɛɛsẽ n yaool yeel ned fãa, t’a yɩk n zʋʋg zomã ne wamdã.
Saag niida yaar la koom zoeta neng-nenga.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE wilgame tɩ seg taabã yaa sẽn tũud ne Burkĩna Faso tẽngã sẽn tar tʋʋmd-n-taar ne sullã.
Kapitɛnd Yibrayɩɩm TARWAR kota nin-buiidã tɩ b ra yi n gɩdg CEDEAO sẽn tʋm b rãmbã ye.
Bɩ y ra maan mam tẽn-kugrã tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ b tũud rʋʋdg n dʋʋd a zug ye, tɩ b ra wa yãnd yãmb zaalã ye.» 
Sãan-pĩ-tõatg la pĩ-gãandga.
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ bb yãk yam nna n sõng-ba.
Tẽnga neba segd n goma SIDAwã bãag yell vẽeneg vẽenega n tõog n zab ne-a.
Bɩ Wẽnnaam d Ba la d Soaal a Zezi Krista bark la laafi sig y zutu! Krista a Zezi pidsa yãmb ne Wẽnd kũuni tɩ m ka vʋʋsd ne bark pʋʋsg ye. Yaa wakat buud fãa la m pʋʋsd Wẽnd bark y yĩnga tɩ b tũnuga a Zezi Krista n kõ-y kũuni. 
A Atsɛll paama kom-dibli a yoobe. B yʋyã la woto: Yaa a Aazrikam, a Bokru, a Ismayɛlle, a Sehariya, a Abdyaase, n paas a Hanan. Bãmb n yaa a Atsɛll kom-dibli. 
Lagd   nins rĩm a Salmo sẽn dag n tar n yũudã maana ne sãnem, la teed nins fãa sẽn dag n be roog ning b sẽn boond tɩ Libã tɩɩs roogã pʋgẽ wã maana ne sãnem halaale. Bũmb dag n ka be beenẽ sẽn maan ne wanzuri ye. Bala, rĩm a Salmo zamaanẽ wã, b rag n ka geelgd wanzuri wa bũmb sẽn tar yõod wʋsg ye. 
Dẽ, bãmb maana kaool ne taab Bɛɛr-Seba. Rẽ poore, a Abimelɛk yika ne a tãb-biisã naab a Pikoll tɩ b lebg n leb Filistẽ-dãmbã tẽngẽ. A Abrahaam zĩnda sãand Filistẽ-dãmbã tẽngẽ n kaoos wʋsgo. 
Yaa Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
Dũni yaa wa raaga tɩ f sã n kẽ bɩ f yi
Sosoaag na yɩ neer bãngd-a zomẽ.
A Abimelɛk yeela a Abrahaam yaa: «Ade, foom la sẽn ne mam soolmã zãng la. Kẽng n bao zĩig ning sẽn noom foom n zĩndi.» La a Abrahaam pʋʋsa Wẽnnaam a Abimelɛk yĩnga, la Wẽnnaam maaga yẽnda ne a pagã, la a yem-pogsã n kõ-b rogem. 
B paama koabg zug wakɩr 86.
Rasem a wãn rẽ poore, A Kazẽeg me yikame n na n tι peeg a pυg-bila. Yẽ me ne a nebã sẽn dιk sorã n tar kẽn n tar kẽnã, bãmb me sεga kinkirgã. Kinkirgã yãag-b lame tι b tι peeg pagã.
 La ne rẽ fãa, rao wã kell n talla raoodo, n kẽng n tɩ yãnd arzɛkã soaba n yeel-a :
La yɛɛne la yẽ toẽ n paam tɩɩm sẽn na n sõng tɩ SIDAwã bãaga bil da yõk a biigã?
T’a Katr wõog a rẽ wã n mik t’a kiime.
F sã n dat wagdr n yõke, kɩt-a-la f kʋlen-biiga
Yaa yʋʋm a yopoe woto masã tõnd sẽn be namsga pʋgẽ, d pa tol n yã Zeenerall ba a ye zabrã pʋg ye.
Permye miniisr Albɛɛr WEDRAOOG kẽnga taoor n paase, tɩ ba Koviid 19 bãag sã n komsa kaorengã ãnduni wã fãa gill pʋgẽ, Burkĩna Faso, yõ-koglg kaalmã sẽn be wã koms-a-la wʋsgo.
Soaamb le wa n tool n yeelame: M ba Katr bι bõe? A bee ka.  La sasa-kãngã, rabeem yõka katre, t'a sok tι yaa bõe. Tι soaamb yeel-a: Yaa yelle. Kυυrã rãmb sẽn pa paam yãmb kυ yirã, b yiisa kom-bi-bιιs tι b wat ka sẽnẽ. Ade: goabga, yaa bugraad rãmba, rιυtgo, yaa kãna. sẽn são-são, yaa tιrga.
La a biig a Yamyιιd le yeela a baaba t’a ra yaees ye. Tι Wẽnd sa n sake, yellã na n manegame.
Sã n yet tɩ kʋdem,dẽ tɩ kʋdẽn-kam dɩkame.
Mooneg koɛɛgã pʋgẽ, a wilgame tɩ ƐMPESƐƐR dãmb ket n be b na-kẽndrã sẽn ya zab ne yõ-koglg kaalmã t’a sa, la b mao tɩ tẽngã paam zã-sõngo.
Dẽ, a Sɛm ne a Zafɛt rɩka fu-goabg n palg b bãgdo, n tar po-tula n tɩ lud b ba wã sẽn dag n gãe a zaalã. Bãmb sẽn dag n wẽnemd b nensã n get kɛɛngã yĩnga, bãmb ka yãnd b ba wã yãndã ye. Dẽ, a Nowe yeelame: «Bɩ kãab-wẽng zĩnd a Kana zugu! Yẽnda na n yɩɩ a ba-biisã yembsã yamba.» 
Mam deega naamã a Davɩɩd buudã nugẽ n kõ foom. La fo ka sak n maan wa mam tʋmtʋmd a Davɩɩd sẽn sak mam tõodã, n tũ maam ne a sũur fãa, n ka tol n maan bũmb sẽn ka tat mam yamã ye. Fo maana wẽng n yɩɩd rĩm-dãmb nins fãa sẽn deng-b foomã. Fo wẽnemd n basa maam, n maan f meng wẽn-naandse, n kɩt tɩ m sũurã yiki. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Yaa ned ning sẽn beeg maamã yʋʋr la m na n yẽes m sebrã pʋga. Moasã, kẽng n tɩ tall nebã tɩ b ta zĩig ning mam sẽn wilg foomã. La ade, mam malɛɛkã na n lʋɩɩ fo taoore. Baoosgo, mam sũ-kãbrã daare, mam na n sɩbga bãmb b kongrã yĩnga.» 
A Moyiis ne a Aarõ maana wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel bãmbã. Yẽnda zẽka a rasaarã Nill kʋɩlgã koom zug Faarõ ne a tʋmtʋmdbã nifẽ, la Nill kʋɩlgã koom fãa lebga zɩɩm. La zĩmã sẽn be Nill kʋɩlgã pʋgẽ wã kiime, la Nill kʋɩlgã koom lebga yũugu, tɩ Ezɩpt nebã ka tõe n yũ Nill kʋɩlgã koom ye. Zɩɩmã zĩnda Ezɩpt soolmã fãa pʋgẽ. 
Rɩk bõn-kãens fãa n maan nug-tikr kaam sẽn welg toore, n yaa kaam buud toor-toor sẽn kalem taaba, t'a yɩ wa parfẽ maand sẽn maand to-to wã. A na n yɩɩ nug-tikr kaam b sẽn tar n maand welg toor tʋʋmdã. 
Yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ ba zu-loees sã n wa beẽ bɩ a ra tiis kaorengã ye.
VDP rãmbã me rɩka koɛɛg n pʋʋs tẽngã taoor soab la b kos tɩ b sõng-b ne tʋʋm-teedo.
M ka tõe n ko ki, la m ko zẽk-zẽk ye.
Tao bala, a Sĩndbal yeelame: Ligd wã fãa! Ad tõnd zug nooma. T'a Ratzãng wẽneg n soka : bõe? Mam zug noom bι tõnd zug nooma ? Ãnd n yã korgã n dιke? Pa maam la ? La a Sĩndbal pa bao n na n kιιs ye.
b sẽn wʋm tɩ yãmb yʋʋrã yaa kãseng n tar pãngã, la y maanda tʋʋm-kãsemsã yĩnga, b sã n kẽ ro-kãngã pʋg n pʋʋs yãmba, bɩ y zĩnd y zĩigẽ yĩngr n kelg-ba, la y leok-ba, tɩ buudã fãa sẽn be dũniyã zugã tõe n bãng yãmb yʋʋrã la b zoe yãmb wa Israyɛll nebã sẽn zoet yãmbã. La b tõe n bãng tɩ yãmb yʋʋrã bee ro-kãngã me sẽn me wã pʋga. 
A Pok ma bãaga wɩngdame n paasdẽ; SIDAwã bãaga biis lebgda wʋsgo a yĩnga pʋgẽ.
Yẽ n segd n ges tɩ gosneer tʋʋma fãa kẽn wa sẽn segde.
B sẽn tão ne Kongo rãmb n tõo n sui bi a ye ne zaalem loogr poore, Etalõ rãmb le sega Komoor dãmbbõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 27 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, n tão zood balle.
La m ba Katr yɩɩ tao tao n yeel Naafã t’a sõng-a ne rɩɩb tɩ kom n tar yẽ.
A wilgame tɩ rog-n-mikã la dĩinã taoor dãmb sɩd kẽesa b toog n sõng tɩ yellã paam tɩɩm.
Kẽnd n bʋt yaa beem tẽnga
Sʋʋg ka wãag a wʋʋgo, a ka wãagd bũmb ye
Rasem a wãn poore, a pẽe bĩisim zembala, n tυk n kẽng na-yirã, n na n tι kõ naaba. Nebã sẽn ya-a wã, b pεleng yιkame. B ra bυgsdame: hãnd pa biigã kιιm n wa n na bugs bãmba?
Yaa Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
A kell n le pʋʋsa neb nins fãa sẽn sak n zẽk b naoore, n wa naag tigsgã pʋgẽ wã.
Kĩnkirs roog rat wãabo, tɩ b kẽnd n sõsd kɩparengẽ
A Zozɛf kõo noor n yeel tɩ b sui bãmb yondã ne kood tɩ pidi, la b lebs ned ka fãa ligd a yolgẽ, la b bao rɩɩb n kõ bãmb b kẽnda yĩnga. La b sɩd maana bãmb woto. La bãmb sẽn ta sik zĩigẽ wã, bãmb ned a yembr sãrga a yolg n na n yãk ki n kõ a bõanga, la a mikame tɩ yẽnda ligdã be a yolgã noore. 
La a Izak mee tẽn-kugr beenẽ n pʋʋs ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋre. La a tilga a fu-roogã beenẽ, la yẽnda tʋmtʋmdbã tuka bulg be. A Izak maana kaool ne a Abimelɛke 
Kũun Wẽnd doogã meeb yĩnga. Rĩm a Davɩɩd yeela zãma wã fãa yaa: Yaa mam biig a Salmo a yembr bal la Wẽnnaam yãk yã, la a yaa bi-bilfu, n nan ka mi bũmb ye. Tʋʋmdã yaool n yaa kãsenga. Bala, ro-bed-kẽen-kãngã ka ninsaal doog ye. Yaa Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogo. 
Bɩ Pãng-Soab a Wẽnnaam ning f zug barka, la b kõ-f rogem, n kɩt tɩ f fɩɩge, n lebg buud wʋsgo! Bɩ Wẽnnaam kõ foom ne f yagensã fãa a Abrahaam barkã, n kɩt tɩ f soog tẽng ning fo sẽn yaa sãan a pʋgẽ wã. Wẽnnaam dag n dɩk-a lame n kõ a Abrahaam!» 
Katr wa n nee soaamb sẽn sẽbd a naoã sẽba. T’a le soke: Wã me le yaa bõe yεsa? Tι soaamb yeel-a tι yaa sẽn na n lugemd yẽ lυgã. Rιιbã tẽeb sẽn be yalem-daoogã zugẽ wã, a pa ne tι soaamb mams-a-la ne wed-moaag ye.
Ned gesda soaamb la f pʋɩ a nemdo
Maam n yet yã, m saam-biisi: wakata ka zɛɛd ye. Sẽn tar-b pagb vɩɩnd wala b sã n da ka tarẽ ye. Sẽn daagd-b nintãm wala b ka yãbd ye; sẽn langd-b sũ-noogo wala b ka kɩdemd ye; sẽn maand-b leebgo wa b pa tar fɩ ye; 
 Tɩ, kinkirgã gõms a zugu.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE tika a nug tãrãzisẽo wã zãab sebr zugu.
Soaamb bãnga masã tι pa gũusi, yẽ pa na n kul ne gelyend mengã ye. Woto, a sã n yã vak ne gεla, a sokda katre: M ba Katre! Gεl n be ka. Hãnd pa yãmb yεsb a Sepãar sẽn wa n dυυgã?
Gosne-paallã miniisr dãmb sega taaba.
Ad na-kẽnda nins sẽn be sebrã pʋga: Pipi gom-zugu: na-kẽndrã zu-raado Pipi nug tikri: nand tɩ tẽngã taoor dãmb wa naag taab n zĩnd n gʋls tãrazisẽo wã zãab na-kẽndr sebre, yaa na-kẽnd-kãngã la b tik Burkĩna Faso tẽngã zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Tι naabã sũur puugi, t’a leok tι kãand kõn bυd rũndã, t’a yi rũndã, n wom dũndã, tι b paam wam ye.
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Lebg n sigi. Bala, fo nebã fo sẽn yiis Ezɩpt tẽngã sãama b mense. Bãmb basa sor ning mam sẽn wilg bãmbã tao-tao. Bãmb maana sãnem nag-bila, n wõgemd a taoore, n maan maand a yĩng n yeele: ‹Israyɛll nebã, wẽnnaam-dãmb nins sẽn yiis-b yãmb Ezɩpt tẽngã la woto.› » 
La a Zakoob rɩka raadã yẽnda sẽn pẽegã n los gaolgã pʋga, tɩ rũmsã sã n wa na n yũ koomã, bɩ b rʋʋd taaba, tɩ b nensã get raadã. Rũmsã sẽn dag n dʋʋd taab la b get raadã yĩnga, b rogda kamb sẽn yaa pẽrem-pẽrem ne wad-wada. 
Kapitɛnd Yɩbryɩɩm TARWAR yãka zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15 sẽn watã raare, tɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor dãmb na n seg taab n dɩk noy tãrãzisẽo wã zãab wɛɛngẽ tɩ b boond tɩ Asɩɩsnasnalle.
Mam tʋmtʋmd a Davɩɩd mam sẽn yãkã sẽn sak maam, n kẽn wa sẽn zems mam tõodã ne m noyã maasem yĩnga, mam ka na n deeg soolmã zãng n bas a Salmo ye. Yẽnda na n kell n yɩɩ rĩm a vɩɩmã tɛka. La yaa a Salmo biig nugẽ, la m na n deeg naamã, la m na n kõo foom a Zeroboaam buud piig tɩ f sooge. 
A sa-pugli lagem koabga kõ n tees bugum.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ b yi n zãag ne beenẽ n sãeeg n kẽ dũniyã gill fãa. La bãmb basa tẽngã meebo. Yaa woto n kɩte, tɩ b pʋd zĩ-kãng yʋʋrã tɩ ‹Babɛlle›, bala, yaa beenẽ la Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩt tɩ dũniyã nebã fãa goam gẽdg taaba. La yaa beenẽ la Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩt tɩ b sãeeg n be dũniyã zĩigã fãa. 
la b ra sak soalma, ne roog yɛl sẽn ka saabo, la sẽn ka wat ne Wẽnnaam tʋʋmd tẽeb pʋgẽ la yaa no-koɛɛm balã ye. Bãmb dat n yɩɩ a Moyiis tõog karen-saam-dãmba, n yaool n ka wʋmd b sẽn gomdã, la b sẽn yetã võor ye. 
A Labã sẽn yãnd tʋb-londã ne zũyã sẽn be a yao a Rebeka nugẽ wã, la a sẽn wʋm a Rebeka sẽn dag n gomd n togsd raoã sẽn yeel bũmb ninsã, yẽnda zoeeme n babs raoã, n mik-a t'a yas ne a yʋgma wã ko-nifã sɛɛga. 
 La, m ba Kãoong leok-a lame : «Mam tʋka kaam ne rʋko, n dabd n na n tɩ pãnem m zugu.»
Sẽn-Ka-Saab sũur yika ne a Salmo, yẽnda yamã sẽn wẽnemd n bas bãmbã yĩnga. Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yaool n dag n vẽnega b meng ne a Salmo naoor a yiibu. Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Salmo yaa: «Fo sẽn maan yel-kãngã n ka sak mam kaoolã ne m tõodã mam sẽn dag n kõ foomã yĩnga, mam na n welga f rĩungã n dɩka n kõ f tʋmtʋmda. 
Asɩɩsnasnallã paka a kʋɩlense.
Maryam, la kom-yaoobã vɩɩm.
Reem sẽn lebg n pʋgle, ket n yaa Tẽegre.
Tɩ bala, b miime tɩ mobila nins b sẽn boond tɩ Pikap rãmb la b rɩglg tɩ pa le tʋmdẽ ye.
A Rasɛll sẽn mik tɩ yẽnda ka rog a Zakoob biigã, a maana sũ-kiir ne a kẽem a Leya. A Rasɛll yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Kõ-y maam kamba, sã n ka rẽ, mam na n kiime!» A Zakoob sũurã yika ne a Rasɛll t'a yeel-a yaa: «Mam bee Wẽnnaam ning sẽn gɩdg-a fo rogmã zĩigẽ la?» 
Tɩɩg sã n dat kũum, a poda yogdo.
La Faarõ yeela bãmb yaa: «Yaa kʋɩɩm n tar yãmba! Y yaa kʋɩɩmb bala! Yaa woto n kɩt tɩ yãmb yetẽ tɩ y rat n kẽngame n tɩ maan maoong n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. 
Yẽ yira da pẽe wẽndoogã la zẽeda zĩigẽ. Kambã sɩd kẽngame n tɩ zĩnd ne-a.
Mam sigame n na n fãag bãmb Ezɩpt nebã nusẽ, la m yiis bãmb soolem-kãng pʋgẽ n tall bãmb n kẽng tẽn-sõng sẽn yaa bedr pʋgẽ. Yaa tẽng sẽn pid ne bĩisim la sɩɩd wʋsgo. Yaa tẽng ning Kana-rãmbã ne Hɛt-dãmbã la Amoor-dãmbã ne Ferɛɛz-rãmbã la Hevi-rãmbã ne Zebuus-rãmbã sẽn be wã. 
Wẽnnaam sẽn dig ninsaal n yiis zẽedã zĩig pʋgẽ wã loogr zugẽ, b ninga  Serubẽ-rãmb  Edɛn zẽedã zĩig yaanga, ne sʋʋg sẽn wit bugum t'a wẽnemded zĩigã fãa, n gũud zẽedã zĩigã sor ning sẽn dabd tɩɩg ning biis sẽn kõt vɩɩmã sẽnẽ wã. 
Seg-taab kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ Asɩɩsnasnallã paka a kʋɩlense rũnda yibeoogã Wagademill sallde kõnferãasã pʋga.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE wilga woto Burkĩna Fso televisẽo zugu, yʋng wakat a 8 zʋgnallã pʋga.
Raar a ye sũ-noog são yõ-wog zaalle
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yãmb welga Israyɛll nebã toor ne dũniyã neb a taabã, n kɩt tɩ b lebg yãmb pʋɩɩre, wa yãmb sẽn dag n yeel y tʋmtʋmd a Moyiis wakat ning yãmb sẽn yiis tõnd yaab-rãmbã Ezɩpt tẽngã.» n zẽk a koɛɛg n ning Israyɛll nebã fãa zut bark n yeele: 
Sor  ninga sẽn ya vẽenga tɩ f mii n tɩ bãaga ka na n yõk fo, yaa f sẽn  na n yõk f menga n da lagm pag sẽn deng f kãadema ye.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE sega VDP  rãmbã.
Ned sã n ka so misgu, a ka wãdgd-a sʋk ye.
Katr tɩ maka gõeem, n kong n yik n yõgneg bugum n wa yeel m ba Soaamba, tɩ beoogã vẽegame, la, a yik tɩ b looge. 
Yẽnda wõgemda Baall taoor n waoog-a, wa yẽnda ba wã sẽn dag n maanã, n kɩt tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã sũur yiki. 
Tɩ pondrã yeel-a : « Maam ne foo »
La b maana wanzuri nao pis-naas sẽn na n ning ra-pegd pisi wã tẽngre. Yẽnda ninga ra-peok fãa nao a yiib a sogds a yiibã yĩnga. La b maana ra-pegd a yiib sɛk roogã lals gõdgr zĩis a yiibã sẽn be roogã yaangã yĩnga. 
Fãob pa lubd lolg ye
A Zakoob yeela a Ezayu yaa: «Bɩ f reng n koos f bi-kãsen-pʋɩɩrã ne maam nanda.» La a Ezayu leokame: «Gese, mam dat n kiime, dẽ wã, bi-kãsen-pʋɩɩrã yõod ne maam yaa bõe?» 
Tõnd sã n mi ned SIDAwã bãag sẽn tar-a, tɩ d mii t‘a na n  kiimi, d na n maana a wãn n sõng-a?
A Labã leb n yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Ad kug-rʋrã ne tẽn-kugrã mam sẽn ning maam ne foom sʋkã. Kug-rʋrã yaa kaseto, la tẽn-kugrã me yaa kaset tɩ mam ka na n yõsg kug-rʋrã n kẽ fo toadgẽ ye, la fo me ka na n yõsg kug-rʋrã ne tẽn-kugrã n kẽ mam toadgẽ wã n maan wẽng ye. 
Zoa-sõng são ma-biiga
A Abrahaam bi-ribl a Izak sẽn wa n tar rasem a nii, a kẽes-a-la bãongo, wa Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n yeel yẽnda t'a maanã. A Saara leb n yeelame: «Ãnda n dag n na n yeel a Abrahaam t'a Saara na n yẽsma kamba? La baoosgo, mam doga a Abrahaam bi-ribl a kʋʋlem wakate.» 
M kom-sõma, zãag-y y meng ne wẽn-naandsa waoogre. M gomda ne yã wa neb sẽn tar yam. Wʋm-y m sẽn dat n togsã. 
B togsa Ezɩpt rĩmã tɩ nebã zoeeme. Dẽ, Faarõ ne a tʋmtʋmdbã teka yam Israyɛll nebã yell poorẽ, la b yeelame: «Yaa bõe la tõnd sẽn maan woto wã, n bas Israyɛll nebã tɩ b loog n bas tõndo, tɩ b yaool n dag n tʋmd n kõta tõndo?» Faarõ kɩtame tɩ b segl yẽnda saarã, la yẽnda peega a nebã tɩ b tũ yẽnda. 
Yẽnda gãnega sʋk roogã ne ro-taoorã tẽngã ne sãnem. La b rag n maana kʋɩlems a yiibã ne weoogẽ oliiv tɩɩs raado. La b naan serubẽ-rãmb ne komse, la tɩ-puud sẽn yaa neeb kʋɩlemsã zutu, n bolg-b ne sãnem. La b bolga serubẽ-rãmbã ne komsã me sãnem. 
Yɩɩl a 8 wã fãa yaa Tiugung Katolik sõng yɩ-n-kʋdã, la a lebg n maneg-b n yɩɩle.
B sẽn tar a rigbã, b wa tɩ n yãa nob-miidu, la, m ba Soaamb yɩɩ tao-tao, n yeel-ba :
Yɩɩlgã poore, b boola neb 37 wã nins sẽn maan kaalmã yʋya.
A Zozɛf kũum. A Zozɛf ne a yirã rãmb zĩnda Ezɩpt tẽnga. A Zozɛf vɩɩmda yʋʋm koabg la piiga. A Zozɛf yãnda a Efrayiim kambã, ne a yagense, la a yãnd a yagensã kamba. La a Manaase biig a Makɩɩr kambã roga a Zozɛf nifẽ, la a reeg-b-la a naoẽ. 
La sẽn na n yɩlẽ n paam zu-loe-kãnga tɩɩm, rẽndame tɩ Burkĩna Faso Lekollã na-kẽndre, b lebg n sigl-a n tũnug na-kẽnd paall ning b sẽn dat n sigla, t’a sõng karen-biisã tɩ b fãa paam zu-noog a ye.
Yãmb na n dɩɩ bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩll dasem a yopoe. La rasem a yopoe soabã daare, bɩ y maan tigr Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. Rasem-kãens pʋse, bɩ y rɩ bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle. Yãmb soolmã pʋgẽ, b ka tog n yãnd rã-bɩll beenẽ ye.» 
 La, Katr sɩd yɩɩ tao-tao, n kaoog a rẽ wã zugu.
Sebr ning y sẽn gʋlsã la m na n ges marsã. La y yeta y sebra pʋgẽ tɩ yaa sõmbo rao ne pag sã n zãr taaba. 
B yiibã fãa talla woto, tι wĩndgã wa rat n tι lυι. Katr waoogã yẽ pida pãb! Yẽ gεl baoob lokame, t'a kẽnd lυυ, lυυ, n kuiisẽ. Soaamb yẽ wa n yεsa ne gel-yend bala. Tι yẽ me lamsd n kuiisẽ.
Mik bokã yaa m ba Weoognaab roogo.
Ned na zè boẽeg nif tɩ tẽn-kugr rɩ-fo? 
Pʋ-tẽer soab n nigd no-sar koom sẽoogo.
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 26 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE reega Nizɛɛr na-kʋdr a Mahamadu YISUFU, CEDEAO sullã sẽn yãk t’a get Burkĩna Faso ne bãmb yẽsd-n-taarã yelle.
Bala, a Wobg sã n kʋ-a, a laadame, n bas a yẽdgã tɩ yaage, tɩ m ba Soaamb kẽedẽ, n tõsda a nemdã n kuiis ne, tɩ kõt a pagã, t’a rʋgd tɩ b wãbdẽ.
Dẽ, rĩm a Salmo riga a Abiyataar n yiis Sẽn-Ka-Saab maan-kʋʋrã tʋʋmd pʋga, tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n gom a Eli roogã wɛɛngẽ Sɩlo wã paam pidsgu. La a Zoaab sẽn wʋm woto, yẽnda zoee n kẽnga Sẽn-Ka-Saab sɛk roogẽ wã, n tɩ gãd tẽn-kugrã yɩɩla, bala, a Zoaab tɩ kẽ a Adoniza n yaool n da ka kẽ a Absalom ye. 
M ba Soaamb sok-a lame: «Yaa noog ne rʋko?»
Bala, yaa kiuug a 3 bal n kete, la b segd n sõda tʋʋmdã wa kiis 12 tʋʋmde, b sẽn da segd n tʋma.
A Abrahaam rɩka bũmbã fãa n kõ a biig a Izake. Sẽn deng a Abrahaam kũum, a baoo kũun n kõ a pʋg-rɩkdsã kambã, la a kɩt tɩ b yi n kẽng tẽms nins sẽn be yaangã n zãag ne yẽnda biig a Izake. 
Soolmã tãb-biis ne b sula. Ad Israyɛll buudã kãsem-dãmba, ne b tãb-biis tusr-tusr la b tãb-biis koabg-koabg nanambse, ne b seb-gʋlsdbã sẽn dag n tʋmd rĩmã yĩnga, la b get sul toay-toayã sẽn let taab kiuug-kiuugã yell yʋʋmdã pʋgẽ wã sõore: Sull fãa yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. Pipi kiuugã pʋgẽ, yaa a Zabdiyɛll biig a Yasobeyam n get pipi sullã yelle. Yẽnda sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. 
La yʋʋmd fãa, nin-kãensã ned kam fãa sã n dag n watẽ, a zãada a kũuni. Yaa wanzuri teedo, sãnem teedo, futu, zab-teedo, parfẽ-rãmb sẽn tar yũ-noogo, la wiid ne bõense. Rĩm a Salmo tigma saar-dãmb ne wiid wʋsgo. A Salmo rag n tara saar-dãmb tusr la kobs-naase, la wed-rʋʋdb tus piig la a yiibu. Rĩm a Salmo yãka tẽms tɩ yaa saar-dãmbã ne wiidã bĩngr zĩiga, la a ning kẽer Zeruzalɛm pʋgẽ n pẽneg a menga. 
A pʋʋsa kapitɛnd Tarware ne tẽngã taoor dãmb barka, b sẽn deeg-b ne waoorã yĩnga.
Sapaolg kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso gosneerã ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kibayã kũun yiisa mooneg koɛɛg n wilg b sũ-pa-noaang ne ƐREFI la Zend afirik rãmb sẽn togs kibay ninsã ka tũ sor ye.
M kot-y lame tɩ y maan zood ne a n yɩɩge. D da bas tɩ Sʋtãan belg-do tɩ d mi a geelsa fãa. 
Zãmsgã saab poore, b paama bãngr kaset sɛba.
La yõwã sẽn  tõe n maaneg yaa tɩ boog bãaga bil yõkr pãnga. Suuda  ka kogen zãng fasɩ ye.
Nin-kẽem a yembr n wa n yik a zak pʋgẽ, n na n tɩ gõ weoogẽ.
«Yeel Israyɛll nebã tɩ b tog n tũu mam vʋʋsg rayã. Yõwã na n yɩɩ bãnd maam ne yãmb sʋk zamaan nins sẽn watã pʋgẽ, tɩ yãmb tõe n bãng tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, sẽn welg-a yãmb tɩ y yɩ toorã. 
Dẽ, a Moyiis ne a Aarõ kẽnga Faarõ nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Ebre nebã Wẽnnaamã sokdame yaa: «Fo na n zãgsame tɩ f ka na n sik f meng mam taoor hal tɩ ta dabʋre? Bas mam nebã tɩ b kẽng n tɩ waoog maam. 
Dẽ, a Davɩɩd basa Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã ne a Azaf la a ba-biisã, tɩ b tõe n maan b tʋʋmd koglgã taoor wakat fãa, wa sẽn zems daar fãa tõogã. tɩ wakat fãa bɩ b maand maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã beenẽ yibeoog la zaabr Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga, la b maand bũmb nins fãa sẽn gʋls tõog ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn vigl Israyɛll nebã yĩngã. 
M ba Soaamb da mi n kẽnd n tãooda ware, ne m ba Wobgo.
 (Bala, a sã n togse, a na n kiime).
M ba Katr kvoongo
M saam-biisi, yaa yãmb yĩng la m dɩk maam ne a Apolos makre; m tʋlgame tɩ y ges tõndo n wʋm yelbũnd kãnga võore: Makr sẽn ya mak faoogo la sẽn ka yiis Sebr sõng pʋgẽ. M dɩka maam ne a Apolos makrã tɩ y ra wa wuk ne nagre n kẽ nin-yend n bas a to ye. 
MPP sẽn yaa pagtɩ ning sẽn da be naame wã taoor dãmb yɩsa moneg koɛɛg sẽong kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, n wilg tɩ tẽnga taoor dãmb sẽn yis moneg koɛɛgã n wilgdẽ t’a Rok KABOORE paama pemsema yaa vẽnega.
A Sayull doga a Salum, t'a Salum dog a Mibsam, t'a Mibsam dog a Misma. Betuwɛlle, Orma, Siklaage, 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag lʋɩta bãmb taoor sawad-taok pʋgẽ wĩntoogo, n yãagd bãmb sorã zugu. La yʋngo, sawad-taokã lebgda bugum n kõt bãmb vẽenem, tɩ b tõe n kẽnd wĩntoog ne yʋngo. La sawad-taokã rag n ka sergd n bas nebã wĩntoogo, la bugmã me ka basd bãmb yʋng me ye. 
A kɩɩb ta tʋʋma, ti a rateb lebg koabga.
Yaa rasem 14 poore, b sẽnda yãk-a, t’a lʋɩ leebgã ministɛɛr taoore, la a sẽn lebg sigã.
Bãmb togsa a Zakoob a Zozɛf sẽn yeelã fãa. La a Zakoob sẽn yãnd terok-rãmbã a Zozɛf sẽn kɩs tɩ b wa rɩk-a wã, a pɛlengã lebame. La a Israyɛll yeelame: «A sekame! Mam biig a Zozɛf ket n vɩɩme! Mam na n kẽng n tɩ yãnd-a lame la m yaool n ki.» 
Dẽ, bãmb pʋɩɩ tẽngã, n welg taab n na n gilgi. Rĩm a Akaab rɩka sor a yembre, t'a Abdyaas rɩk sor a yembre. A Abdyaas yeela a Eli yaa: «Mam beega bõe tɩ y rat n yõk-m n kõ rĩm a Akaab t'a kʋ-ma? 
T’a yãk fũugã, n dɩglge, n le mak t’a na n yɩke, n ka tõog ye, n le yeele : 
Tẽeb la mansem sẽn be rũnda rũnna sẽn wat ne SIDAwã bãag bil saagre. Bãmb ka sõma la neba segd n mẽnes-b la me la b bao sẽn ya sõama n teke.
A Davɩɩd pʋɩɩ Leevi nebã ne b sagse. A Davɩɩd sẽn dag n kʋʋl wʋsgã yĩnga, yẽnda kɩtame t'a biig a Salmo lebg Israyɛll dĩma. A Davɩɩd yeelame: «Yãk-y neb tus pisi la a naas sẽn na n get Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã tʋʋm yelle, la y yãk neb tus a yoob sẽn na n yɩ seb-gʋlsdb ne bʋ-kaoodba, la neb tus a naas sẽn na n yɩ rigno-gũudba, 
A wilgame tɩ yaa karenzi wã ligd sẽn dʋ wã n wa ne teed a taabã fãa ligd paasgã.
A ka nong m kõ n dʋg m sẽbdo.
Dẽ zugẽ, y segd n naaga vɛrse kãens sebra pʋga.
La, b yãka m ba Soaamba, t’a lʋɩ b taoore, n gese, tɩ rũmsã fãa tũ noorã.
La, m ba Katr wa n yikame, n dɩk koomã, n walge.
Koom dɩta a mita
Yʋʋm 1993 soabã, a Zãmbatiis BÕNTOOG bee Zĩyãare, n tʋmd meebã tʋʋma, la a ket n tũud Wẽnnaam sorã.
A Zʋʋda yeela a ba a Israyɛll yaa: «Bas-y-yã a Benzame t'a tũ maam. Tõnd na n yikame n kẽnge, n da wa ki ye. Yaa yãmb ne tõnd kambã, la tõnd mens yĩnga. Yaa mam meng n dɩkd sard n na n yɩ a Benzame gũuda. Mam na n lebg n tall-a lame n wa lebs yãmba. Mam sã n ka tall-a n wa lebs-yã, la m kɩt t'a yals yãmb taoor ka, bɩ mam kell yɩ koangd yãmb taoor m yõor tɛka. 
 Ned sã n da a bũmbu, t’a ligd pa a nengẽ, a soab pa tõe n le paam ligd-kãng ye.
Zõang yoor tabda vugri
Yaa rẽ n so tɩ bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 27 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Bamako, nebã yii wʋsg n deeg Kolonell Abdulae Mayga ne waoore.
Zug peoog maasem pa basd a soab ye
B yãba a Zakoob kũumã. A Zozɛf vãbnega a nengã a ba wã neng zug n yãbe, la a mogsd-a. 
Wagda nong taaba,tɩ bõos-rãmb kis-taaba.
Yɩɩ wakat a sẽn kell n bool nin-buiidã tɩ b bas b yam n tʋm b tʋʋma, la b gũus b mens ne kibay kẽer sẽn yit ẽntɛrnetã zugã.
A Pok yeela a Seeni yaa: “M barãmba sẽn wa n kiwã, mam da tẽedame tɩ tõnd fãa me da na n kiime. Vɩɩma ket n yaa toog yaa sɩda, la masã, m tẽedame tɩ na n zemsame.“
La rĩmã tʋmtʋmdbã yeela rĩmã yaa: «Rao-kãngã na n yɩɩ bẽdg tõnd yĩng hal tɩ ta dabʋre? Bas-y nin-bãmbã tɩ b kẽng n tɩ waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa bãmb Wẽnnaamã. Yãmb ket n nan ka mi tɩ Ezɩpt tẽngã sãamdame?»

Lɔgtor poaka yeela a ma yaa: “Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ fo wa lɔgtor yiiri, tɩ b mak n gese, fo sãn ka tar bãaga bilã
Ned sã n maan a meng bõang bɩ katr yõk-a
Wĩir sã n kao tɩ b tõke, a lebga yodre.
Sõs-kãng pʋga, a ra wilgame t’a pẽnega tʋʋm noor ning sẽn zabd ne ninsaal yam daabã la wẽgbã tɩ b maan vaeesg a Rok Donasẽ Nagalo, la a Yakuba Diye zugu, la bũmb pa be sẽn wilgd tɩ b kẽesa b mens ninsaal yam daab la wẽgb pʋgẽ ye.
Baag ka kiid tɩ ãbs laadẽ n ye.
Rẽ wã, pẽdgr yiisda yam, n tõe kɩte, t’a soab kẽ moogo, t’a baasg lebg sũ-sãanga.
La rao wã yeela a biigã t’a sã bĩndu.
Dẽ, bãmb sẽn yi Faarõ nengẽ wã, b sega a Moyiis ne a Aarõ sẽn dag n yas n gũud bãmba. B yeela a Moyiis ne a Aarõ yaa: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab ges yãmb yell n bʋ yãmb bʋʋdo. Yãmb n maan tɩ Faarõ ne a tʋmtʋmdbã tugd beem ne tõndo. Yãmb dɩka zabr sʋʋg n ning b nugẽ tɩ b na n kʋ tõndo.» 
Dedugu logtor yi- kasengã me na n paama teedo, sẽn na n sõng bãad rãmbã b laafɩ wã wɛɛngẽ.
M tagsdame tɩ ned sã n pa wa m sẽn wilgã n sãoẽ, d sã n get d rũnna-rũnna pɛtã. F kẽe kãadem ne paga, da bao welgr ye. F ka kẽ kãadem ne-a, ra bao kãadem ye. 
Kãadba a yiiba segd n le pʋlma taab tɩ b na n maana sɩd ne taaba.
A Abram rag n yaa arzɛg-kẽeng soaba. A rag n tara rũms ne wanzuri la sãnem wʋsgo. zĩig ning yẽnda sẽn dag me tẽn-kugr sɩngrẽ wã. La a Abram pʋʋsa ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋr beenẽ. 
B sã n dõd ned n yeel t'a beega a to, tɩ b kɩt t'a wẽen ro-kãngã pʋg yãmb tẽn-kugrã taoore, Israyɛll sẽn yaa yãmb nebã bɛɛb sã n tõog bãmb b sẽn beeg yãmb yĩnga, b sã n lebg n wa yãmb nengẽ, n wa waoog yãmb yʋʋrã, la b pʋʋs yãmb ro-kãngã pʋg n kose, 
la wisd yõogr tẽn-kugrã ne a ra-tuiidsã, la nug-tikr kaamã ne wisd sẽn tar yũ-noogã, la sɛk roogã rignoor fu-lillidgã, ne zakã pɛɛlã la a ra-lugdsã ne b naoã, la zakã rignoor fu-lillidgã, 
Kell n yaa yẽ n ya sodaasã fãa taoor soaba.
Sẽn sɩngd ne bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuugrasem 15 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, yaa karen-bi-bãoonesã, la karen-bi-bɛdã karen-saam-dãmb n na n sɩng b tʋʋma.
Kãnkãn-dɩgr n dog ligdi, n na n malg zɛns la wãooba
Soaala yãmb yaa tõnd pe-kɩɩma.
A Miise leok-a lame: «Mam wẽenda ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn vɩ wã, tɩ yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn na n togs maam bũmb ningã bal la m na n togse.» Woto, rĩmã yeela a Miise yaa: «Miise, fo ratame tɩ mam yeel foom naoor a wãna, tɩ f wẽen tɩ f ka na n leb n togs maam bũmb ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋre, tɩ yaool n ka sɩda?» 
Dẽe, a Pok yeelame yaa: “Sãn ya woto, bɩ y tal a Maryam ne a Yõdɩ tɩ y tũ taab n kẽnge. Maam ne a Ãdam na n paa yiir n tʋme.“
Rẽ yĩnga, zĩis nins fãa mam sẽn tũ Israyɛll nebã fãa n kẽngã, mam tol n yeela Israyɛll bʋ-kaoodb nins mam sẽn kõ noor tɩ b ges m nebã yellã ned ba a yembre, tɩ yaa bõe tɩ b ka maand sɛɛdr doog n kõ maam?› Dẽ wã, yeel m tʋmtʋmd a Davɩɩde, tɩ Saasẽ-Pãng-Soabã yetame yaa: ‹Yaa mam meng n yãk foom wakat ning fo sẽn wa n gũud rũmsã, n kɩt tɩ f lebg Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã naaba. 
Nin-vẽen-dãmb a yiib ka tõe n kẽ ne taab wintoog ye.
Gom-zug a yiib soaba: ƐMPESƐƐRE Nug-tikra 2 soaba: yaa ƐMPESƐƐR sodaasã n get tẽngã zãab yelle hal n tɩ ta wakat ning b sẽn na n yãk neb nins sẽn na n lʋɩ tãrãzisẽo wã taoore.
Tɩ b le tar kẽn n tar kẽna.
A Moyiis leokame yaa: «Yaa tõnd ne d kom-bɩɩsã, la d nin-kẽemsã, ne d kom-dibli wã la d kom-pugli wã, ne d rũm-bãoonegã, la d rũm-bɛdã n na n kẽnge. Bala, yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab tigr tõnd yĩnga.» 
Wagdr sã n poog lalg n dat n kẽ tɩ ned ling-a n wẽ n kʋ, yẽnda zɩɩmã raagr taal ka na n zĩnd ned ning sẽn kʋ-a wã zug ye. 
Ned zoa n kʋʋd-a t'a bẽ gʋse
Bɩ Israyɛll buudã neb fãa maan Pak tigrã. Nin-loaagdg sã n be yãmb sʋkã n dat n maan Pak tigrã n waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, bɩ a raopã ne kom-dibli nins fãa sẽn be yẽnda zakẽ wã reng n kẽ bãongo. Dẽ poore, a na yaool n naag Israyɛll nebã n maan Pak tigrã. La rao sẽn ka kẽ bãong ka tog n dɩ tigrã rɩɩb ye. 
Dẽ, bãmb yii Sukot n kẽng n tɩ tilg b sik-zĩigã Etam sẽn be we-raoogã kɩrengã. 
Burkĩna Faso rãmb maana a Tooma SÃNKAR kʋʋbã yʋʋm35 tẽegre.
Asɩll Tãpsoab gʋlsa sebr n wilg t’a Edi Kõmbeoog ka segd n tɩ zĩnd Asɩɩsnasnallã SEDEPE wã yʋʋr yĩng ye.
Kibarã yii ministɛɛrã kiba-kɩtb nengẽ.
Ad a Ezayu pag a Oholibama kamba. Yaa naab a Yewuki, naab a Yalam ne naab a Koore. Bãmb yaa a Ana bi-pugl a Oholibama sẽn yaa a Ezayu pagã kambã nanambse. Woto n yaa a Ezayu kambã ne b kambã sẽn yaa nanambsã. Yaa a Ezayu la b sẽn boond tɩ Edomã. 
Dẽ, a Zetro yeelame: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab paam pẽgre, bãmb sẽn fãag yãmb Ezɩpt nebã ne Faarõ nugẽ wã yĩnga, la b sẽn fãag b nebã Ezɩpt nebã nusẽ wã yĩnga. 
La we-baag soka katre: La saagã? Yãmb pa zoet saagã ? Y pa na n yaas t'a yooge ?
Tɩ rao gāand paga yaa bũmb sẽn zemse tõnd vɩɩma pʋga.
Woto, sẽn sɩng ne badaare, a Efrõ pʋʋgã sẽn be Makpela n dabd Mamre sẽnẽ wã, pʋʋg ning tãn-bokã sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã, ne tɩɩsã sẽn gũbg pʋʋgã fãa, lebga a Abrahaam soolem. La yaa Hɛt nebã fãa, ne neb nins sẽn dag n kẽed tẽngã rignoorẽ wã taoore. 
Kʋlg-bas-m-yam, la koɛɛnga.
Ned kõn kẽ gõos n los koomẽ n kẽ n tab ye
Saaga ? Saag kυυda katr la ? Foom a we-baag mengã waa... Rẽndame tι fo mengã yik n yãag a yir baaga, tι y maan tao-tao. Modg-y tι naaf ba a ye ra pa ye. Peeg-y ne nag-bi wã fãa. Haya! Wudg-y n kẽng-y la y wa. Ra kaoos-y ye.
Pa nong m woglem yetame tɩ m yaa songlgo
Yẽnda maana fɩtl-doagendgã fɩtl-dãmb a yopoe wã ne yʋʋse, la bug-zẽend laasã ne sãnem halaale. Yẽnda maana tẽn-kugr ne akasiya raado, tɩ b na n yõog wisd a zugu. A yaa maoko. A woglem yaa kãntɩɩg a yembre, a yalmã me yaa kãntɩɩg a yembre, la a zãntlmã yaa kãntɩɩg a yiibu. A yɩɩlã naaga ne a mengã. 
A Rubɛn goma ne bãmb n yeele: «Mam dag n ka reng n togs yãmb sɩda? Mam ka yeel tɩ d ra maan biigã wẽnga? La yãmb ka kelg maam ye. La moasã, ade, yẽnda zɩɩmã yell bee tõnd zugu.» La bãmb dag n ka mi t'a Zozɛf wʋmda bãmb goamã ye. Bala, no-rɛɛs n dag n deesd a Zozɛf goamã n togsd bãmba. 
A Yedutun kom-dibli wã yaa bãmb b yoobe: yaa a Gedaliya, a Seeri, a Ezayi, a Simeyi a Aazabiya, la a Matitiya. Bãmb ba wã n dag n lʋɩt taoor n maand no-rɛɛsdb manesem, la a wẽed pɛndg n pẽgd la a waoogd Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. 
Israyɛll nebã maana a woto. La neb kẽer wʋka wʋsgo, tɩ neb kẽer me wʋk bilfu. La bãmb sẽn dɩk wam-makdgã n mak mandã, b mikame tɩ neb nins sẽn wʋk wʋsgã ka paam n yɩɩd sẽn zems ye. La neb nins sẽn wʋk bilfã me, ka paoog-b ye. Bãmb ned kam fãa sẽn wʋkã rag n zemsda ne a sẽn date. 
Yaa woto tɩ mam me  roog sẽn tar ziir n na n kõ yãmba. Tɩ yãmb tõe n zĩnd be wakat sẽn kõn sa yĩnga.» Rĩm a Salmo yeelame yaa: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yʋʋr paam waoogre. Bala, yãmb pidsa kãab-noog ning yãmb sẽn dag n kãab m ba a Davɩɩd n yeel tɩ: 
A kell n pʋʋs-b-la Wẽnd na kõ-b yʋʋm-sõngo.
Bɩ y kɩt tɩ y belmã zĩnd ro-kãngã pʋg wĩndg la yʋngo, bala, a yaa zĩig yãmb sẽn dag n yeel tɩ y yʋʋrã na n zĩnda a pʋgẽ! Moasã, bɩ y kelg y tʋmtʋmdã sẽn be ro-kãngã pʋg n pʋʋsd yãmbã. N-yẽe! Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, bɩ y kelg y tʋmtʋmdã kosgã. La Israyɛll sẽn yaa yãmb nebã sã n tees zĩ-kãngã n kos yãmba, bɩ y kelg-ba. Bɩ y zĩnd yĩngr yãmb sẽn beẽ wã n kelg tõnd zĩ-kãngã, la y kõ-d sugri. 
A sẽn wa n yã-a wã, la a sẽn  teem a kẽndã, n tar lama, lama, lama, wala nimbãan-neda. Wobg sẽn yã-a wã, a ka bang tι yaa soaamb ye.
 B sẽn le yi, n dabd kʋɩlg yasa, nebã yetame, tɩ kɩɩb a Naamd be neere.
Zãmsd ka yam la a soab be yam
A Faarõ tʋmtʋmdb kẽer sẽn dag n zoet Sẽn-Ka-Saabã kɩtame tɩ b tall b tʋmtʋmdbã ne b rũmsã n wa kẽes rotẽ. La neb nins sẽn ka geelg Sẽn-Ka-Saab goamã basa b tʋmtʋmdbã ne b rũmsã weoogẽ wã. 
Yãmb wẽndooga pʋga, dẽ yĩnga b zãmsda kombɩɩsã yõk-m-meng  n kẽ kãadem n yaol n bãng taab yõod sẽn ya a soab bii?
A Ãdem sẽn wa n tar yʋʋm koabg la pis-tã, a roga bi-ribl n wẽneg a menga, wa yẽnda yalẽ wã sẽn yaa to-to wã, la a pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Sɛte. A Ãdem vɩɩmd n kaoosa yʋʋm kobs-nii a Sɛt rogmã zugẽ. La a roga kom-dibli la kom-pugli. 
Sodaas nins sẽn nan kẽed zabrã pʋgẽ pipi wã, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE kosame tɩ b tall su-keelem la raoodo, la b rɩk zãmsg ning b sẽn paamã n ning-a na-kẽndr pʋgẽ, tɩ boto, b tõogdame.
 T’a zoa a ye, tõdge, n deeg kũumã, n dɩk-a, n kẽ weoogã, n bao zĩig n bĩng-a, n yaool n bao zĩig n solge, n get kũumã.
A wilgame tɩ sẽn ta yʋʋm a yiibã, sodaasã yãa namsg wʋsg buud toor-toore, la a na n gesame, tɩ wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ, bɩ b paam sor n tɩ vʋʋs bilfu, la b yaool n lebg n kẽ zabrã pʋgẽ.
Sẽn paase, b minimda kʋɩʋʋngo, n zãmsd yiy saabo. Ka b sẽn ka tʋmdã bal ye, b yɩta yel-kãnesdba, n kẽed goam sẽn ka pak-ba, la b gomd goam b sẽn ka tog n gom ye. Tẽed sã n tar pʋg‑kõor a zakẽ, bɩ a ges a yelle, tɩ da yɩ tɩlɛ tɩ wẽnd doogã tʋk a zɩɩb ye. Woto, b na tõog n ges b rãmb sẽn yaa pʋg‑kõap sɩd-sɩdã yelle. 
M ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katr wa n zemsa taaba, n tuk bɛng pʋʋg ned kam fãa, n na n ko. 
Rasem 99 loogr poore, sa-sik kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, gosneer le yeelame, tɩ karenzi wã ligd le paasa Sipɛɛr 91 lɩtr zug wakɩr a 7.
Yʋʋmd fãa pʋgẽ, bɩ a Aarõ yãk yel-wẽnã maoong zɩɩm vugr n ning tẽn-kugrã yɩɩlã zut n maan paoosg a yĩnga. Yaa vugr yʋʋmd pʋgẽ la yẽnda na n maan paoosg a zugu, yãmb zamaan-dãmbã fãa yĩnga. Bõn-kãng na n yɩɩ bũmb sẽn welg toor meng-meng Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. 
Wẽnd na kõ-d nindaare.
Mam na n kɩtame tɩ yẽnda zĩnd mam doogã ne m soolmã pʋg wakat fãa, la yẽnda rĩungã na n paama pãng wakat fãa.› » Rĩm a Davɩɩd kẽng n tɩ yalsa Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor n yeele: «Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, mam yaa ãnda, la m doogã bee yɛ tɩ y tall maam hal n ta zĩig ning mam sẽn beẽ dũndã wã? 
Minisrã pẽga sull ning sẽn yãk yam n siglg tʋʋmdã, la a wilg tɩ bãmb ne sull ning sẽn get zɩɩma kũun yel sũur yaa noogo, la b na n kell n yãaga tʋʋmdã, sẽn yɩɩd fãa wakat ning tõnd sẽn be a soab pʋgẽ wã zɩɩma raab sẽn yaa wʋsg logto-yiyã pʋsã, sẽn tũ ne weooga bãaga.
Gã-vuk ka sãamd pend ye.
La bãmb kẽnga a Moyiis nengẽ n tɩ reeg kũun nins fãa Israyɛll nebã sẽn tall n wa sɛk roogã meeb yĩngã. La yibeoog fãa nebã ket n tallda kũunã n wat yẽnda nengẽ ne yamleoogo. n wa yeel a Moyiis yaa: «Nebã wata ne bũmb wʋsg n yɩɩd sẽn zems tʋʋm nins fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel tɩ b maanã.» 
Toẽeng wẽng yaa sẽn yi kãarẽ
Woto yaa a Ezayu sẽn yaa Edom buudã yaabã sẽn be soolem nins sẽn be tãmsã sʋkã yagense. A Elifaaz kamb yaa a Teman, a Omaare, a Sefo, a Gatam ne a Kenaaze. 
Babɛll gãosg meebo. Dũniyã gill fãa rag n gomda gom-bu-yende, tɩ gom-biisã yaa bũmb a yembre. Bãmb sẽn yik yaangã, b tɩ yãnda zĩ-long sẽn be Sineyaar soolmẽ wã, la bãmb tii beenẽ n kẽ. 
Israyɛll nebã ne Siiri nebã yalsa beenẽ rasem a yopoe tɩ b nensã tees taaba. La rasem a yopoe wã daare, bãmb yika zabrã, la Israyɛll nebã kʋʋ Siiri tãb-biis tus koabg daar a yembr pʋgẽ. La sẽn kell-bã zoe n tuda Afɛk tẽngã sẽnẽ. La lalgã lʋɩ n põda neb tus pisi la a yopoe n kʋ.  Wakat-kãnga, rẽ tɩ rĩm a Bɛn-Hadaad dag n zoeeme n kẽ tẽngã pʋga, n tɩ kẽ roog yaang ro-pʋgẽ n soonde. 
Fo meng mii pag a Seruza biig a Zoaab sẽn maan maam bũmb ningã. Yẽnda kʋʋ a Neer biig a Abneer ne a Yetɛɛr biig a Amasa sẽn yaa Israyɛll tãb-biisã nanambs a yiibã. Yẽnda kʋ-b-la wakat ning sẽn yaa laafɩ wakatã. Yẽnda maana zabr n daag zɩɩm tɩ mad a sẽbdgã a sẽn dag n sẽbg a sɛɛgã, ne a neooda wã a sẽn dag n pidã. Bɩ f maan wa sẽn zems yam ning fo sẽn tarã, la f ra bas-a t'a kʋʋl n ki ye. 
Minim são pãnga, Yam soab zug zẽkdame.
M sẽn wa y nengẽ, m saam-biisi, m pa wa n na puk sẽn solg Wẽnd nengẽ ye, m pa wa ne goam minim, m pa wa ne sɩlem baaf ye. M meng wa-la y nengẽ wa koamsa, wa rabɛɛma, wa ned sẽn digda. 
Sayɛll soolmã karen-biis yiime n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b pak b karen-dotã.
A Eleyazaar buudã sʋka, kom-dibli nins sẽn dag n yaa kãsem-dãmbã sõor dag n yɩɩda a Itamaar kom-dibli wã. Yaa rẽ yĩng tɩ b pʋɩ a Eleyazaar yagensã sul piig la a yoobe, la b pʋɩ a Itamaar yagensã sul a nii. B maana poeer n yãk ned fãa ne a sulli, bala, yaa a Eleyazaar ne a Itamaar kom-dibli wã n dag n yaa zĩ-sõngã nanambse, n yaa nanambs Wẽnnaam sẽn yãke. 
Zɩll KAFAANDO.
B leb n paamame tɩ b sull ning sẽn banda kibaya rat yeel tɩ SEYƐSE wã, no-gãnegdɩ tɩ sebr b sẽn boond tɩ Sartã n wegs-a n kõ-b vẽenem.
Rig-rig raada baag zugu
Yãmb sãn saagdẽ n na n kẽ kãadem, ned fãa segd n makame n ges la  a wa wilg a to wã lɔgtora sẽn yeel bũmb ningã sẽn deng tɩ y kẽ y  kãadema. Da n wa –y kẽes-y bãaga bil y kãadema pʋgẽ n ka bãng ye!
M dɩdgda m yĩngã, m talld-a-la toogo tɩ m zoeta m na n moon m taab Koe-noogã n yaool n wa rõb vɩʋʋgẽ. 
Yãmb tẽega y rɩtg nugã, la tẽngã vela bãmba. Nebã wʋmame n digda.  Toog tara Filistẽ-dãmbã soolem nebã wa pag sẽn kũmd rogem. 
La a Moyiis togsa a rɛɛmbã bũmb nins fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn maan Faarõ ne Ezɩpt rãmbã Israyɛll nebã yĩngã, la namsg nins fãa sẽn paam bãmb sorã zugã, la Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn fãag bãmb to-to. La a Zetro sũur yɩɩ noog wʋsg ne maan neer ning fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn maan Israyɛll nebã, n fãag bãmb Ezɩpt rãmbã nusẽ wã. 
·  Da n dɩk-y ned a to sẽn zoe n tʋm ne bõn-wãagdga sãn ya sʋuga, barga, bɩ lamẽnde sãn kaa tɩ b reng n dʋg-a la me wala b yɩlg-a la me ye.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Togs Israyɛll nebã tɩ b bao kũun n kõ maam. Reeg kũun ned kam fãa nengẽ sẽn kõt ne yamleoogo. 
We-rũmsã fãa wa n naaga taab n wa gũbg roogã, n na n gese.
Yaa no-rɩkds 27 n be sebr ning b sẽn gʋlsã pʋgẽ.
La, pagã sɩd ra zĩime, n tar laado.
La ayɛy! Ka woto la y maand ye; yãmb n lɛɛg n maand y taab kɛga la y fãad-ba, la yaool n yaa y saam-biisi! 
Kell n yɩɩ wakat me, b sẽn dɩk bug-vɩlens 12 n kɩs kom-bɩɩb tɩ b paas n yãag tẽngã taoor soaba.
Rĩm a Omri saka a saam-dãmba, la b mum-a-la Samaari. La yẽnda biig a Akaab leda yẽnda zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. A Omri biig a Akaab maana sẽn yaa wẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ n yɩɩd rĩm-dãmb nins fãa sẽn deng-b yẽnda n zĩndã. 
A keeg-vũkã bala, kυka sεεg pasgame t'a vũ n wa tẽnga: sabrga! Tι Kinkirgã le yek sorã tι b le sιng kẽna.
F sã n tẽeg f bẽ yell bɩ f bugl loko
Maan tẽn-kugr sẽn na n yõogd wisd a zugu. Maan-a ne akasiya raado. A woglmã na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg a yembre, a yalmã me kãntɩɩg a yembre, a tog n yɩɩ maoko, a zãntlmã na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg a yiibu. Maan yɩɩl n ning-a. 
Bãng-bãnge: Bõe n be n tõe n kẽ bulgẽ n yaool n pa tõe n kẽ roogẽ? Leoore: Laalga.
La ninsaal sã n daag a to zɩɩm, ninsaal me n na n daag yẽnda zɩɩm. Bala, Wẽnnaam naana ninsaal wa bãmb mengã wẽnego. «Ade, mam maanda m kaool maam ne yãmb sʋka, la yãmb yagensã sẽn na n pʋgl yãmbã sʋka. 
Lɛɛbdbã, la ra-biisã wa n kõ b zɩɩm b taaba yõy fãagr yĩnga.
Badaare, rĩmã welga Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã samand toore, n maan maand sẽn yõogd bugum la b kõ bõn-koaadl kũunã, la b yõog zems-n-taar maandã kaam beenẽ, bala, zũud tẽn-kugrã sẽn dag n be Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã neng taoorã yaa bilf n ka tõe n deeg maan-kãens fãa ye. 
Yaa Kapitɛnd Yibrayɩɩm TARWARE, la b rɩ Revolisẽko wã bug-vɩleng n kɩse.
Bɩ yãmb ned kam fãa tũ a sũur yalem n kõ a sẽn tare la a ra maan wala a ka kõt ne yamleoog ye, wala yaa moadeg ye. Sẽn kõt-a ne yamleoog la Wẽnnaam nonga. Yaa woto la b gʋls yã: «Zĩis fãa b maanda sõm bala, b kõo naong rãmba, b sõmblem kõn sɛ abada.» 
ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soab paalã wilgame tɩ sɛbã yaa wʋsg n ket n be ministɛɛr dãmbã pʋs n dat gesgo, bala, b reesda sɛb n zamdẽ tɩ b pa paamd gesg ye.
La bʋko, nin-buiidã gũusame n ges tɩ yellã ket n tara taoor kẽnde.
Kɩɩm sã n pãb ned yʋngo, a ges-a-la wĩntoogo.
F sã n yã tɩ weef zɛt ne gaar bɩ f bãng t'a luba neda
Bɩ a Aarõ yeelg fu-kãng wakat ning fãa yẽnda sẽn maand maan-kʋʋr kãsem tʋʋmdã, tɩ b wʋm buglã rãamd yẽnda sẽn wat n kẽed Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor sɛk roogã pʋgẽ, la yẽnda sẽn wat n yit wakate. Woto, yẽnda ka na n ki ye. 
La leb poorẽ wã, a ka lingr ye, tɩ bala, yaa tẽngã sẽn ka gãe bãanã, n paas tẽngã politikã na-kẽnda buud toor-toor n wa ne rẽ.
Ned sã n maan f neere, ba fo wa n be zu-loeeg ning pʋgẽ, bɩ ra lebs-a wẽng ye.
A Moyiis tẽega a dasaarã Ezɩpt tẽngã zugu, la Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ sobg yi yaang n wa, la a fuga badaar wĩntoogã ne a yʋngã tõre. La vẽkembeoog yibeoogo, sobg yii yaang n wa ne sʋyã. La sʋyã siga Ezɩpt tẽngã zĩig fãa. B zɩ n yãnd sʋy sõor sẽn ta a woto, la b kõn tol n yãnd a buud me ye. 
La, b fãa kẽe nob-miidã wãbre, n bas tɩ m ba Soaamb zoe n solge.
A Roboaam sẽn deeg naam tɩ yʋʋm nuunẽ, la Ezɩpt rĩm a Sɩsak yik zabr ne Zeruzalɛm. Rĩm a Roboaam maana zũud gãndo, n ledg sãnem gãndã zĩigẽ, la a rɩk-b n gũnug tãb-biis nins sẽn yaa rĩmã gũudbã nanambsã sẽn gũud rĩmã zak noorã. 
Dẽ, waafã yeela pagã yaa: «Yãmb ka na n tol n ki ye! La yaa tɩ Wẽnnaam miime, tɩ yãmb sã n dɩ tɩɩgã bil daare, yãmb yamã na n wekame tɩ yãmb lebg wa Wẽnnaam, n mi sõama ne wẽng n bake.» 
Wao! Ad wã yaa dũni yel-soalma! Rasem a tãab biig sẽn gomde ? Rẽ me, a pipi goam yaa naab noor kιυυsgo. Biigã ba ne a ma sẽn wυm woto, rabeem kẽ-b lame.
·  Sẽb-y yãmb noãdã ne bãada noãd ne pɛɛla.
A Rebeka soka a Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdã tɩ yaa yɛɛnẽ dao la sẽn kẽnd n segd bãmbã. 
Kãadba segd n pʋloma taab tɩ b na n nonga taaba la b teben  taaba.
A Semeer ba-biig a Helɛm kom-dibli yaa a Sofa, a Yimna, a Selɛɛse, ne a Amalle. A Ula kom-dibli yaa a Aara, a Haniyɛlle, ne a Ritsiya. 
Badaare, Sẽn-Ka-Saab fãaga Israyɛll nebã Ezɩpt rãmbã nugẽ. La Israyɛll nebã yãnda Ezɩpt rãmba kũum ko-kãsengã noore. Israyɛll nebã yãnda Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn zab ne Ezɩpt nebã ne pãn-kãseng ningã. La nebã zoee Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, la bãmb tẽe Sẽn-Ka-Saab ne b tʋmtʋmd a Moyiisi. 
Bãens a yiib sãgs yaa noogo.
La b sẽn ket n zĩ n dɩtẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kʋdrã sẽn yit Betɛllã. Fo sẽn lebg n wa rɩ la f yũ tẽn-kãngã wã, tɩ b yaool n dag n yeela foom tɩ f ra rɩ tẽn-kãngã rɩɩbo, la f ra yũ a koomã, fo na n kiime, la b ka na n mum fo kũumã f saam-dãmbã yaadẽ ye.» 
La, sẽn yaa m ba Soaamb n deng yeelã yĩnga, a kiime, t’a Laab rɩk-a, n tɩ maneg n dʋge.
Yẽ yeelame yaa: “Yãmb sẽn ya kɩɩbsa yĩnga, raop kẽer na n maome n kõ yãmb rɩɩbo wala kũun toɛtoɛya, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n paam n gãand yãmba.
Tʋʋmdã sɩngre, yɩɩ Kapitɛnd Marsɛll MEDA n deeg Kapitɛnd Tarwar zĩiga, n pak tʋʋmdã kʋɩlense.
La, a biigã tõdgame, n tũ-a n looge.
Yaa roog sẽn pid pʋgẽ, la nin-buiidã ra zĩ n gũud bʋ-kaoodbã tɩ b wa sɩng b tʋʋmdã.
Bãmb tog n dɩɩ b sẽn dɩk bũmb ning n maan paoosg tʋʋmd bãmb yĩnga, n ning maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd bãmb zut n welg bãmb toorã. Yaa bãmb bal n na n dɩ bõn-kãense. Ned sẽn ka maan-kʋʋd ka tog n dɩ-a ye, bala, bõn-kãens yaa bũmb sẽn welg toore. 
Loalg guglumda bãoogẽ la a zug bee koaas taoore
M goama la m moonegã ka yɩ sɩlem dãmba rẽnd sẽn vẽnegd yam ye. A yɩɩ a Vʋʋsem Sõng kaseto la b pãnga, Tõnd sẽn wʋm-b neerã, tõnd me goama yaa sɩlem la d sɩlma ka zamaana rẽnda, ka zamaana na-biisa rẽnd ye, tɩ fãa na n loogame. 
«Maan-y tẽn-kugr ne akasiya raado. Maan-y-yã-a t'a woglmã yɩ kãntɩɩg a nu, t'a yalmã me yɩ kãntɩɩg a nu. Maan-a maoko. Maan-a t'a zãntlmã yɩ kãntɩɩg a tãabo. 
T’a Kãoong le rɩk sore.
Moasã, mam Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yaa yãmb n yãk mam sẽn yaa y tʋmtʋmdã, n kɩt tɩ m led m ba a Davɩɩd zĩigẽ, n lebg rĩmã, la mam yaa yãaga, n ka mi m sẽn na n zã nebã to-to ye. Bɩ y kõ y tʋmtʋmdã yam, t'a tõog n zã y nebã, la a bãng sõama ne wẽng n bake. Sã n ka rẽ, ãndã n tõe n zã yãmb nebã sẽn yaa wʋsg a woto wã?» 
Nasẽozini rãmba, la sull ning b sẽn boond tɩ Amnisti ẽntɛrnasẽonallã wilgame tɩ b sẽn wẽ bug-raadã nin-buiidã zugã pa zems ye.
Wẽnnaam maana pʋg-roagsdbã neere, la Ebre nebã fɩɩgame n paam pãng wʋsgo. Dẽ, Faarõ yeela a nebã fãa yaa: «Kom-dibli nins fãa sẽn na n dogã bɩ y lob-b Nill kʋɩlgã pʋgẽ, la y bas kom-pugli wã fãa tɩ b vɩɩmde.» 
Rãam yũuda f na gãeeme
Dẽe, a ma sɩd kẽnga lɔgtorã yir t‘a tɩ yãk a zɩɩma.
Tẽeb la mansem bʋs n be rũnda rũnna tɩ kēer ya sõama  tɩ kēer ka sõama?
Yẽnda sã n dag n wa a yembre, yẽnda na n leb n yi a yembr bala. La a sã n dag n waa ne a paga, a pagã na n tũ-a lame n yi. Yẽnda zu-soabã sã n kõ yẽnda paga, t'a pagã rog kom-dibli la kom-pugli, pagã ne a kambã yaa yẽnda zu-soabã n so, yẽnda na n yi a yembr bala. 
La a sũur sãamda ne kibay kũun ro-kãensã b yiibã sẽn naan kibar sẽn ka tar tikr zĩig n yiisi, t’a tõe n wa ne zu-loees buud toor-toor n kẽes tẽngã neb ne taab sʋkã.
Kãab-noog a Davɩɩd ne a yagensã yĩnga. Wakat ning rĩm a Davɩɩd sẽn kẽ a na-yirã, a yeela Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Natã yaa: «Ade, mam sẽn be roog ning pʋgã maana ne sɛɛdr daado, tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã yaool n be fu-roog tẽngre.» Badaar yʋng bala, koɛɛg n yi Wẽnnaam nengẽ n yeel a Natã yaa: 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã yãnda a Agaar ko-bundum zĩig sɛɛg we-raoogã pʋga. Yaa ko-bundum zĩig ning sẽn be Suur sorã noorã. Malɛɛkã yeela a Agaar yaa: «A Sarayi yem-poak a Agaare, fo yii yɛɛnẽ woto, la fo rabda yɛ?» A Agaar leokame: «Mam zoetame n na n zãag ne m zu-soben-poak a Sarayi.» 
Dẽ yĩnga yam yãk kãng geelgda f to na yɩ neer sɩda?
B leb n dɩka noor n paas Laboratoaar nasnallã tʋʋm a taaba, t’a na n get rɩɩbã, wen-vɩʋʋgã, la tʋʋma yelle.
A Lotan kamb yaa a Hori ne a Eman. A Timna n yaa a Lotan tão-poaka. Ad a Sɩbeyõ kamba: Yaa a Ava, ne a Ana. Yaa Ana-kãng n yãnd ko-bundum sẽn yaa tʋʋlg weoogã pʋga, wakat ning a sẽn wa n gũud a ba a Sɩbeyõ bõensã. 
Sẽn sɩng ne kaorengã sẽn sɩng Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-dotã ket n paga b kʋɩlens Sũm soolmã, tɩ bala, karen-saamb ba a ye ka be a tʋʋmd zĩigẽ ye.
Y ka mi tɩ ba malɛgsã, tõnd n na n bʋ-b laa? Tɩ b pa gomd vɩɩm kãnga yɛlã! Y sã n tar no-koɛɛm ne taab tẽng zug yɛla poorẽ, bõe yɩng la y paasdba na n yɩ Tigengu sẽn ka pẽgd b rãmba? 
Ned sã n sẽdg f poor bɩ f me sẽdg f nenga
Dẽ, bãmb taa Elim, la ko-bunds piig la a yiib ne koms tɩɩs pis-yopoe n dag n be beenẽ. Bãmb tilga b sik-zĩigã koomã noor beenẽ. 
Lugl da-lugds pisi zũud nao pisi wã zutu, n maan da-lugdsã yagends ne b bãensã ne wanzuri. 
Rẽnd segdame tɩ nebã bas welgr buud toor-toore, la b naag taab yam a ye, la sũur a ye, n tõog n tedg Burkĩna Faso nenga, t’a nin-buiida sak n dɩk b beoog neerã sore, la b me zamaan sẽn ya yõ-koglgo, la taoor kẽnd zamaana.
Yʋʋm 35 loogr poore, b rɩka Revolisẽo wã bug-vɩleng n ning kom-bɩɩbã nugẽ, tɩ b kell n kẽng taoor ne a Tooma SÃNKAR sẽn da tʋmd bũmb ninsi, Burkĩna Faso soog-m-mengã la a taoor kẽndã wɛɛngẽ.
A Odiya pag ning sẽn yaa a Naham tão-poakã kom-dibli yaa a Keyila ba wã sẽn yaa Garmi nedã, ne Maakat rao a Ɛstemoa. 
Mugs sã n zãr laaba, b lobda taab kuga
Bi-bɩɩgã yõor yɩɩ koɛɛga, bala, a ka le tõe n vɩɩmde, wa a sẽn da tar ligda wakat ye.
Pek-y nusa ne koom la safãnd.
A Aarõ bi-ribl ning sẽn na n led-a yẽnda zĩigẽ wã na n yeelga fu-kãens rasem a yopoe, n yaool n kẽ sɛk roogã pʋgẽ n maan sɛk roogã tʋʋmde. Rɩk pe-raoog ning b sẽn maan maoong wakat ning b sẽn ning maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd bãmb zutã n dʋg a zĩig sẽn welg toor pʋgẽ. 
B wilgame tɩ kaorengã sẽn sɩng zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-doog ba a ye nan pa pak ye.
B yaop a Aminat ne a Mariyam n paas b yao a Adama sẽn wʋm b laadã, bãmb fãa zoeme n wa kolg b ma; tɩ b ma yeel b yaa: “Basɩ y bʋrgã; y baaba rat n gũsame!” Dẽ, b ma tall b lame n sereg rooga noorẽ.
Rãam yũuda f neng na yilme
La wed-moaagã le kʋmame, tɩ rao wã yik n wudg n tɩ ta, n yɩk n zomb wed-moaagã, n na n zoe n kuili.

La a Abrahaam yeelame yɛsa: «Mam maana raood n gom ne m Zu-soabã. La tõeeme tɩ nin-tɩrs pisi bee beenẽ.» La Zu-soabã yeelame: «Nin-tɩrs pisi sã n be beenẽ, bãmb maasem yĩnga, mam ka na n sãam tẽngã ye.» 
«Wẽnnaam yaa m kaset soaba. Foom, la m kaset a yiib-n-soaba.
Karen-biisã rɩka b karen-dot sore.
B maana poeer buud fãa pʋgẽ, sẽn sɩng ne kãsem n tãag yao-zʋʋga, n wilg buud fãa sẽn na n gũ rignoor ninga. Poeerã wilgame t'a Obɛɛd-Edom n na n gũ rignoor ning sẽn be-a goabg sẽnẽ wã, tɩ yẽnda kom-dibli wã gũ teedã bĩngr doto. 
Wẽnnaam vẽnega a Moyiis b pãngã. A Moyiis yeelame: «Israyɛll nebã ka na n tẽ maam, la b ka na n kelg maam ye. Bãmb na n yeelame tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab ka vẽneg b meng ne maam ye.» La Sẽn-Ka-Saab soka yẽnda yaa: «Yaa bõe n be fo nugẽ wã?» Yẽnda leokame: «Yaa dasaare.» 
Wakat 12 sasa b na n maana pʋsg Zãn vẽntʋrwa Parwasẽ wã, n yaool n tɩ solg-a Guʋngẽ yaadã.
La mam ka na n dig bãmb fãa tɩ b zoe yʋʋmd-yɛng pʋgẽ ye, tɩ tẽngã ra wa lebg we-raoogo, tɩ we-rũms lebg wʋsgo, tɩ wa lebg toog ne yãmb ye. La mam na n diga bãmb bilf-bilf hal tɩ wakat ta tɩ yãmb nebã wa rog n lebg wʋsgo, tɩ yãmb pãngã sek tɩ soog soolmã. 
Rẽnd segdame tɩ nebã bas welgr buud toor-toore, la b naag taab yam a ye, la sũur a ye, n tõog n tedg Burkĩna Faso nenga, t’a nin-buiida sak n dɩk b beoog neerã sore, la b me zamaan sẽn ya yõ-koglgo, la taoor kẽnd zamaana.
Rɩk bõn-kãens n maan wisd sẽn tar yũ-noogo, wa sẽn maand-a parfẽ wã sẽn maand to-to wã. Maan-a t'a tar yamsem, n yaa sõama zãnga, n welg toore. Yãk-a n to t'a lebg bãanega, tɩ f yãk-a n ning kaset koglgã taoor sɛk roogã pʋgẽ, zĩig ning mam sẽn na n seg foomã. A na n yɩɩ bũmb sẽn welg toor wʋsg yãmb yĩnga. 
Yãmb kɩtame tɩ Israyɛll nebã lebg yãmb neb wakat fãa yĩnga, tɩ yãmb a Sẽn-Ka-Saab lebg bãmb Wẽnnaam. Bɩ y pids y gomdã, tɩ y yʋʋrã yi wakat fãa tɩ nebã yeele: ‹Saasẽ-Pãng-Soabã yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaam!› Bɩ maam a Davɩɩd sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã roog paam pãng yãmb taoore! 
La bɩ f ra peeg bãmb kom-pugli n kõ f kamb tɩ b maan b pagb ye, tɩ bãmb kom-pugli wã sẽn maand yoob ne b wẽnnaam-dãmbã, ra wa kɩt tɩ fo kom-dibli wã maan yoob ne bãmb wẽnnaam-dãmbã ye. 
Y sã n paam n nams bilfu, ad-y Wẽnd sẽn ya kũuna fãa kõatã la bãmb n bool yãmb tɩ y wa rɩ vɩɩm sẽn kõn sɛ yõodo ne Krista a Zezi, Bãmb meng b toore n na n le yals yãmb y nao zutu la b kõ-y keelem la pãnga tɩ b mak y mimsg n konge. B soog pãng la ziir daar fãa. Ami! 
Badaare, Sẽn-Ka-Saab maana kaool ne a Abram n yeele: «Mam kõta fo yagensã tẽn-kãngã tɩ b sooge. Yaa sẽn sɩng ne Ezɩpt kʋɩlgã, n tall n tɩ tãag Efrat kʋɩl-kãsengã. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ ko-kãsengã welge. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab soka a Moyiis yaa: «Bõe yĩng tɩ fo zẽkd f koɛɛg n boond maam? Yeel Israyɛll nebã tɩ b yik n dɩk sore. 
Rẽ, Wẽnnaam yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Bɩ foom ne a Aarõ la a Nadaab ne a Abihu la Israyɛll kãsem-dãmb pis-yopoe wã kolg tãngã n wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽnẽ. La bɩ y yaas yɩɩg n wõgemde. 
Reem
Rigno-gũudbã nanambs a naasã sẽn yaa Leevi buudã n dag n be beenẽ wakat fãa. Bãmb n dag n get Wẽnd doogã ro-pʋsã la laogã bĩngr yelle. A taab me rag n geta zĩ-sõngã lagdã fãa, ne zomã, la  reezẽ  rãamã ne kaamã, la wisdã ne  parfẽ-rãmbã  yelle. 
kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtba nengẽ.
Yɩɩ wakat b sẽn bẽde, n kõ rabaya, la soay nins b sẽn tõe n tũ, n tõog n woog zãmb buud toor-toore, b sẽn dɩkd n kẽesd karenzi wã leebg pʋgẽ.
A leb n dɩka pʋg n dog bi-ribl yɛsa. La a yeelame: «Moasã wã yẽ, mam sɩdã sũur na yɩ noog ne-ma. Bala, mam doga kom-dibli a tãab n kõ-a.» Yaa rẽndã yĩng n kɩt tɩ b pʋd bi-kãng yʋʋr t'a Leevi . 
Beoogã sẽn vẽegã, a kẽngame n tι yã m ba Katre, n yeel-a: M ba Katre, yãmb nee rõandã komã la, tõnd sã n pa tall yam fãa, tõnd pa na n yi sẽoogã ye. T'a Katr yet tι yaa Sιda.
Yaa Kapitɛnd Yibrayɩɩm TARWARE, la b rɩ Revolisẽko wã bug-vɩleng n kɩse.
A Zoaab yao a Abisayi n dag n yaa neb a tãabã taoor soaba. Yaa yẽnda n dag n dɩk a kãnd n kʋ neb kobs-tã daar a yembre, t'a yʋʋrã yi n yɩɩg neb a yiibã. A Zoyiyada biig a Benaya sẽn yaa Kabtseyɛll tẽng raoã rag n yaa nin-kãsenga. Yẽnda maana bõn-kãsems wʋsgo. Yẽnda n dag n kʋ Moaab gãndaad a yiibã. Leb n yaa yẽnda n sig tãng bokẽ n kʋ gɩgemd sapɩlem daarã. 
Ka-koaad rogda kʋɩɩma
La ãnd n pa mi soaamb ne a sιlmã. A kẽndame la a tagsd yẽ sẽn na n maan to-to, n paam yalem-zaal a katr gεlã n wãbe.
«Foom, bɩ f yeel Israyɛll nebã tɩ b tall oliiv kaam bãmb sẽn wõd n wa kõ foom, tɩ f ning fɩtlã tɩ vẽenem zĩnd daar fãa. 
A Sayull rĩungã wakate, a Rubɛn yagensã zaba ne Hagaar nebã n tõog-ba. Bãmb deega b fu-rotã n kẽ n zĩndi, n soog Galaad soolmã yaang tẽmsã fãa. A Gaad yagense. A Zowɛll n dag n yaa naabã, t'a Safam pʋgda, t'a Yanayi ne a Safat sẽn be Basandã pʋgda. 
F sã n pa na n zɛ n bas ned bɩ f ra rɩ tĩig-tɩɩm n bas-a ye

Kasem yaa tãnpʋʋr sagdo
Gom-kãnga yaa sɩda: Ned sã n dat n yɩ karen-saamba, yaa tʋʋm-sõng la a rata. A ka tog n yɩ rã-yũuda, wall zabr soab ye. A tog n yɩɩ ned sẽn baood laafɩ. A ka tog n yɩ ned sẽn nong ligd ye. 
B wa n togsa a Davɩɩd bũmb ning b sẽn maan nin-bãmbã wã, la yẽnda tʋma ned t'a kẽng n tɩ seg-ba, bala, nin-bãmbã sɩd dag n bee yãn-kẽeng pʋga. Rĩmã tʋmame tɩ b tɩ yeel-b yaa: «Pa-y Zeeriko hal tɩ y toeemsã yi, tɩ y yaool n wa.» Zabr ne Amo nebã la Siiri nebã. Amo nebã yãame tɩ b beega a Davɩɩde. Dẽ, a Hanun ne Amo nebã baoo wanzuri ligd-koeems tusri, n tʋm tɩ b tɩ bao saar-dãmb ne wed-rʋʋdb Siiri nebã sẽn be Mezopotami wã nengẽ, la sẽn be-b Maaka ne Soba wã nengẽ me. 
A yaa bũmb sẽn be Burkĩna Faso tẽn-kugrã no-rɩkr 63 soabã, pʋgẽ.
A Ousmane BOUGOUMA ra yɩɩ deptte tʋʋlg kiuug n tãag bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Asãmble ning sẽn lʋɩ wã pʋgẽ, n da get ninsaal yalẽ wã yelle.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kʋdrã sẽn wʋm woto, a yeelame: «Yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ning sẽn kɩɩs-a Wẽnnaam noorã, la Wẽnnaam bas tɩ gɩgemd yõk n kʋ, wa bãmb sẽn dag n yeel yẽnda wã.» Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kʋdrã kẽngame n tɩ mik tɩ kũumã rɩga, tɩ bõangã ne gɩgemdã yas n yeg kũumã. La gɩgemdã ka wãb kũumã, la a ka yõk bõangã me ye. 
A Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã sã n wa na n kẽ sɛk roogã pʋgẽ, wall b sã n wa na n kolg tẽn-kugrã n maan sɛk zĩigã tʋʋmde, b tog n sẽgna kur-bãmba, tɩ yel-wẽnã ra zĩnd bãmb zut tɩ b wa ki ye. Bõn-kãng na n yɩɩ no-tũudg sẽn ka sɛta, a Aarõ ne a yagensã sẽn na n pʋgl yẽnda wã yĩnga.» 
D sã n bʋd yĩngr kũuna y sũurẽ, bõe n ka zemse d sã n tigsd sẽn wom y pʋtẽ? Neb sã n beẽ n tar sor n dɩ y yõodo, ka tõnd n yɩɩde? D yaool n ka sak n maan boto ye. D sẽn mi yaa d sak toog buud fãa, tɩ d pa rat n kẽes gɩdgr Krista Koe-nooga moonegẽ ye. 
Rẽ n kɩt tɩ b tus b taoor soabã n lubi, la b na n maneg n kẽng ne b yãabã taoore.

M ka na n beelg m dɛɛmb tɩ m na n kõ-a-la gɛla, la m ka noaag-n-lobd-m-toor ye.
A Zakoob yeel-b lame: «Ad yãmb sẽn na n yeel m soaal a Ezayu tɩ bũmb ninga: ‹Yãmb tʋmtʋmd a Zakoob yeelame yaa: ‹mam zĩnda sãand a Labã zakẽ n kaoos be n tãag rũndã. Mam tara niigi, bõense, ne rũm-bãoonego, la m tar yem-daado la yem-pogse. Yaa rẽ tɩ mam tʋmd neb tɩ b wa togs m soaalã, n kos-a t'a sak n deeg-ma.› » 
Vẽeneg fas, yãmb yaa Krista sebre b sẽn kõ-do. Ka sebr sẽn gʋls wa sɛb a taaba ne gʋlsg ko-sablg ye, gʋlsa ne Wẽnd Vɩɩga Vʋʋsem; pa gʋls kug peesem zug ye, yaa yĩn-gãongẽ, yaa sũurẽ. Tõnd meng ka tõe n yeel tɩ bũmb tol n beeme n yit tõnd nengẽ ye, ayoo! D tõog buud fãa yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ. 
A Ãdem pʋda a pagã yʋʋr t'a Hawa, sẽn dat n togs t'a ‹vɩɩm›, yẽnda sẽn yaa nin-vɩɩsã fãa ma wã yĩnga. Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Moasã, ninsaal lebga wa tõndo, n mi sõama ne wẽng n bake, rẽ wã, bɩ d gũus t'a ra wa yãk tɩɩg ning biis sẽn kõt vɩɩmã me n dɩ, n kell n vɩ n ka kiidẽ ye.» 
Dẽ, Ezɩpt rĩmã boola pʋg-roagsdbã tɩ b wa, la yẽnda soka bãmb yaa: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maan a woto? Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb basd kom-dibli wã n ka kʋʋda?» Pʋg-roagsdbã leoka Faarõ n yeel yaa: «Ade, yaa tɩ Ebre nebã pagb ka wẽnd Ezɩpt pagbã ye. Bãmb yaa pagb sẽn tar pãnga, dẽ, bãmb dogda tao-tao tɩ pʋg-roagsã nan ka wa ye.» 
Bãmb n ning b bãnd tõnd dĩirẽ la b pids tõnd sũuri ne a Vʋʋsem Sõng kũuni. Ka yet tɩ d da ratẽ lame n dems y tẽeba ye. Ayoo! Y sũ-noog la d baooda; d miime tɩ sã n ya y tẽeba, y wɩk n yɛsa y nao zutu. 
La, a bi-bilf a yembr yikame, t’a na n tũ-a lame.
Sẽn pʋgd-a me sã n wa tar gɩdgre, yaa pʋgdg a yiib n soabã n gete.
Naas soaba, Tãrãzisẽo wã depite rãmb tʋʋmd yalsame.
wa neb sẽn zĩ ne sũ-sãamse, tɩ d noor yõgemd daar fãa; wa naong rãmba tɩ wʋsg yaool n tũud tõnd n lebgd arzɛk rãmba; wa nug sẽn ka zãad rãmba, tɩ d yaool n tar fãa. Lebs-y tõnd d yel-sõmde; m gomda ne yãmb wala m kamba, m kot-y lame tɩ y pak y sũura yalengo. 
Yeel neb nins sẽn tar arzegs dũni‑kãngã pʋgẽ wã tɩ b ra maan wilg-m-menga, la b da rɩk b teegrã n teeg arzegs b sẽn ka tar a hakɩɩk ye. Bɩ b teeg Wẽnnaam, tɩ b kõta bũmb fãa tɩ seke, tɩ tõnd tõe n tall n maan sũ-noog ne. Woto, bãmb na n bĩnga paoong wakat sẽn watã yĩnga, wa yẽbgr sẽn tar pãnga, tɩ b tõe n paam vɩɩm hakɩɩkã tɩ yɩ b pʋɩɩre. 
La foom m biig a Salmo, bɩ f bao tɩ bãng f ba wã Wẽnnaam. Maan bãmb tʋʋmdã ne f sũur fãa zãnga, maan-a ne yamleoogo. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab feesda ned kam fãa sũuri, la a tagsgo. Fo sã n bao bãmba, b na n basame tɩ f yã bãmba. La fo sã n bas bãmba, bãmb me na n basa foom wakat sẽn ka sɛt yĩnga. Gese, moasã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yãka foom, tɩ f tõe n me roog sẽn yaa zĩ-sõngo. Paam daood n tʋme. 
Miniisr paallã kell n bẽdame n pẽg miniisr dãmb nins sẽn deng-a tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ wã.
la f maan wanzuri nao pis-naas n ning bãmb yiib-yiib ra-peok a yembr fãa tẽngre. La f maan da-pegd a yiib sɛk roogã kɩreng ning sẽn teesd nin-taoor lalsã gõdgr zĩis a yiibã yĩnga. 
Yʋʋmd a ye zugĩ, a Pok goma ne a Seeni daar a ye n yeel yaa: “Wẽndooga rãmb yaa n sõnga tõnd wʋsgo; b kõo tõnd zĩig tɩ d ko, b zãmsa tõnd d sẽn tog n vɩɩmd toto, b sɩd yaa tõnd zo-rãmb meng menga. Mam ka mi m sẽn na n maan toto n pʋʋs-b barka, b sẽn maan bõnnẽebã n kõ-da yĩng ye.“
B wilgame tɩ b pa na n lebg n kẽ zagsẽ t’a DAMIB sã n ket n tagsdẽ t’a tõe n wõra nebã n pa naamẽ wã ye.
Kugr sã n yi yĩngri, ned fãa pĩid a zugu.
A Zakoob ninga a kambã barka. A Zakoob boola a kambã n yeel-b yaa:  «Tigm-y taab tɩ m wilg-y bũmb ning sẽn na n paam yãmb wakat sẽn wate. 
A Zozɛf kẽem-dãmbã waa Ezɩpt tẽnga. La a Zakoob mikame tɩ kood bee Ezɩpt soolmẽ wã. Dẽ, a Zakoob yeela a kom-dibli wã yaa: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb zĩ n get taab woto?» La a yeel-b lame yaa: «Mam wʋmame tɩ kood bee Ezɩpt tẽnga, kẽng-y beenẽ n tɩ ra kood n wa, tɩ d paam n põs n da ki ye.» 
B ra yãka a Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB n lʋɩɩs b taoore.
Rasem a yoobã daare, bɩ b wʋk wʋsg n wa segl n yɩɩd bãmb sẽn mi n wʋkd daar fãa wã, sẽn na zems rasem a yiib rẽnda.» La beoog yibeoogo, yãmb na n yãnda Sẽn-Ka-Saab ziiri. Bala, bãmb wʋma yãmb sẽn yẽgemd ne bãmbã. La tõndo, tõnd yaa bõe tɩ yãmb yẽgemd ne tõndo?» 
La a Seeni gomda ne-a a woto wakat fãa, hal tɩ daar a yembre, a Ãminat wa yeel-a yaa: “Mam na n tũ n kẽngame; daarninga, m na tɩ bãng bũmb n paase.“
Yaa gosneema miniisr dãmb kẽere, la tẽngã rãmb zĩnda sʋka.
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Lebg n kuil f ba-yirã, f buudẽ wã, la mam na n zĩnda ne foom.» Yẽnda yeel-b lame: «Mam neeme tɩ yãmb ba wã neng ka leb n wẽnd a zaamẽ ne maam ye. La mam ba wã Wẽnnaam zĩnda ne maam. 
Kapitɛnd Marsɛll MEDA wilgame tɩ sẽn tũ ne naam wẽ-n-dɩkã sẽn zĩnd yʋʋm vẽkr kiuug rasem 24 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, tɩ ƐMPESƐƐR sẽn ya sodaas sull reeg naamã, Burkĩna Faso neb wʋsg sũur ra yaa noogo, tɩ bala, b ra tara tẽeb la saagre, tɩ yõ-koglg kaalmã na leb poorẽ.
Yãmb sãn n mii n tɩ yãmb tara taoora bãag wa sõ-piisã, bɩ y da  yãas ye; zoe n tɩ mak-y lɔgtor yir n ges SIDAwã bãag bil ka zoe  n be yãmb yĩng n wã; bã kãnga pakda sor naana naana  SIDAwã bãag bil yĩnga.
Y zɩ tɩ y yĩnsa yaa Krista yĩnga wilsi? La maanda a wãna tɩ Krista yĩnga n wa lebg woto n ka bak ne pʋg-yoodr yĩnga? Dẽ ka tõe ye. Y zɩ tɩ ned ning sẽn lagemd ne pʋg-yoodre lebgda yĩng a ye ne a? Woto la gʋls yã: B yiiba na n lebga yĩng a ye. 
La raoã rag n sĩndame, la a sokd a meng a Rebeka wɛɛngẽ n na n bãng sã n yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dat n maneg yẽndã sorã la woto. Yʋgma wã sẽn yũ n sɛ, raoã yãka sãnem tʋblond zɩslem sẽn ta wakɩ-koɛɛng pʋɩ-sʋk zɩslem, la a bao zũy a yiibu, b zɩslem sẽn zems wakɩ-koeems piig zɩslem, n kõ pʋg-sadã. 
Tʋʋmdã sẽn wa n pag a kʋɩlense, b wilgame tɩ b na n zĩniga gosneere, la depite rãmb tɩ b sõng taab tẽngã zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Y saam-biisa sã n ket n ya koms rãmb b tẽebẽ tɩ yãmb manesma lub-b wẽng pʋgẽ, ad-y yaa Krista meng la y beg yã. Woto wã m sã n ne tɩ rɩɩb na n luba m saam-biiga, m na bas nemd kãng zãng-zãnga, n da wa lub m saam-biiga ye. 
B segd n gʋlsa yam-yãk kãens  waleg zugu wala seb kãseng zugu n wilig ned ninga sẽn na n maan bũmb  ninga la wakat ninga a sẽn segd n maan-a.
Yɩɩ sẽn tũ ne mooneg-koɛɛg b sẽn yiis Ɛrtebe televisẽo wã zug zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 8 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, la Kapɩtɛnd TARWAR wilg tɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, b na n zĩniga seg-taab-kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ asiiznasẽonalla.
Yaa lagem-n-taar sula, Pagtɩ politik rãmba, la sula buud toor-toor no-rɛɛsdb la b yãk yã, tɩ b na n naag n zĩnd n bale, la b pʋɩ taab yam dãmba, tẽngã na kẽng taoor yĩnga.
Woto, b baoo zabr saar-dãmb tus pis-tã la a yiibu, n paas Maaka rĩmã ne a nebã, tɩ b kẽng n tɩ tilg b tãb-sik Medba sɛɛgẽ. Amo nebã yii b tẽmsẽ wã n tigim taab n na n tɩ zabe. Woto, Amo nebã boba b zab-teed n yi n yals tẽngã noore. Wakat-kãnga, rĩm-dãmb nins sẽn wa n na n sõng bãmb n zabã yalsa weoogã pʋga. 
Burkĩna Faso tãrãzisẽo wã taoor soab toeema gosneerã bilfu.
Ka so m meng yoob yaa toogo
F sã n sak pidbu bɩ f saak tẽebo
Lebend pa kis yerem ye
Sẽn-Ka-Saab kõ a Eli pãnga, la yẽnda rɩka a sẽbdg n sẽbg a sɛɛg n lʋɩ a Akaab taoor n zoe n ta Yiizreyɛll tẽngã noore. 
A Nowe mee tẽn-kugr Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. A Nowe yãka rũm-sõama wã buud fãa, la bõn-yɩgdɩ nins fãa sẽn yaa sõama wã, n kʋ n maan maoong sẽn yõogd bugum tẽn-kugrã zug Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. 
Yaa bõe tɩ ya sõama tɩ buud fãa tõog n lebg seb kãensa sẽn gomd SIDAwã bãag yella ne a buuda goama ?
Bɩ bãmb dɩk sãnem gĩsi, ne gĩs sẽn yaa miuug masɩ, la sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, ne gĩs-moaama la gĩs-miidu, ne lamd gĩs-bãaneg n maan-ba.» 
A sɩngrẽ wã b ra wilgame tɩ yaa kibay la b na n pʋɩt taaba, la b rɩkd zãmsg n taas sodaasã, la b tʋmd-b tɩ b tɩg n zĩndid tẽnsã ne taab toosẽ, la yaa yʋʋm a 5 loogr poore, la tʋʋmdã yaool n tõoge, n na n sigli.
Ned fãa tara a wakat n kẽed daagã, n le tar a wakat n yita
Rĩmã yeela bãmb yaa: «Yãmb sã n wa rogsd Ebre nebã pagbã, yãmb sã n ges b rogmã zĩigẽ n mik tɩ bi-pɛɛlgã yaa bi-ribla, bɩ y kʋ-a, la a sã n yaa bi-pugla, bɩ y bas-a t'a vɩɩmde.» La pʋg-roagsdbã zoee Wẽnnaam n ka maan wa Faarõ sẽn yeel bãmbã ye. Bãmb basa kom-dibli wã n ka kʋ ye. 
Bãmb kɩtame tɩ Israyɛll nebã maan yembd tʋʋm sẽn yaa toogo, n kɩt tɩ b vɩɩmã lebg toogo: Yaa tãnd buiibu, tãn-koɛɛm wẽebo, la pʋt pʋsẽ tʋʋm buud fãa. Woto n dag n yaa yembd tʋʋm nins fãa b sẽn dag n modgd bãmb tɩ b tʋmdẽ wã. 
Lɛ f meng sor noor tɩ b sã n loogdẽ bɩ b lok-fo
A sa-rigdeb lagm koabga, kõ n dig a yẽgbo.
A ka zɛt ned nin bãaneg ye
Zaabr la yibeoog zĩndame. Rẽ yaa rasem a tãab daarã. La Wẽnnaam yeelame tɩ ãdsã zĩnd sa-gãongẽ wã, n tõog n welg wĩndgã ne yʋngo. Bãmb na n yɩɩ bãn n wilg wakate, rayã, la yʋʋmã. 
Koadeng rɩta ki tɩ be neere, la yã pʋʋg soab n zɛtẽ wã võore
Dẽ, b yãka yembd tʋʋm taoor dãmba, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b modg Israyɛll nebã n kɩt tɩ b tʋm tʋʋm-wɛgla. Yɩɩ woto tɩ b me teed bĩngr tẽmse, Faarõ yĩnga: Yaa Pitom ne Ramsɛɛse. 
La bãmb sẽn gom to-to wã yɩ a Hamoor ne a biig a Sɩkɛm noogo. Bi-bɩɩg a Sɩkɛm ka yals n kaoos n maan bõn-kãng ye, bala, yẽnda rag n nonga a Zakoob bi-puglã ne a sũur fãa. B rag n nanda a Sɩkɛm n yɩɩd a ba wã zakã rãmb fãa. 
Wãamb yeelame tɩ yaa a maneg toogã la a biigã zug sẽn yaa wẽkã
Togs Israyɛll nebã tɩ kaam bu-kãng sẽn pʋdgd maan-kʋʋdbã zutã welga toor mam yĩnga, yãmb zamaan-dãmbã fãa yĩnga. 
La tigsgã wakate, yãmb na n yãka y bõn-koaadlã sẽn pʋɩ zĩis a nu pʋɩɩr a yembr n wa kõ Faarõ, la yãmb tall pʋɩɩr a naasã sẽn kellã, n paam bõn-buud n bʋd y pʋtã, la y paam dɩɩb n dɩlg y mens ne y pagbã, la y kambã.» 
La a Zakoob rag n nonga a Rasɛlle. Dẽ, a Zakoob yeelame: «Mam na n tʋma yʋʋm a yopoe n kõ yãmba, yãmb bi-pugl-yao a Rasɛll yĩnga.» Woto, a Zakoob tʋma yʋʋm a yopoe a Rasɛll yĩnga. Yʋʋm a yopoe wã looga tao-tao wa rasem bilf a Zakoob nifẽ. Bala yẽnda rag n nonga a Rasɛlle. 
Tẽngã taoor soab wilgame tɩ ned kam fãa tog n kẽes a toog tẽngã fãagr pʋgẽ.
Pa sẽn dob n sãad ye
Gom-zug a tãab soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã tʋʋmd sẽn ya a soaba Nug-tikr a 4 soaba : yaa ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã n ya tẽngã taoor soaba, la sodaasã fãa taoor soaba yẽnda n get sari roogã soog-m-meng yelle.
Kurkur kaoogr sẽga a Bedaar yaamse
Pĩnd-n-togs-m-bãag ka basd-a soab ye.
Talla woto, tɩ rao wã, ka paam ki yʋʋm-kãng ye.
Bãmb leokame n yeele: «Tõnd yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdba! Ade, tõnd ba wã roga tõnd piig la a yiibu. Tõnd fãa yaa rao a yembr sẽn be Kana tẽngã kamba. La tõnd yao a yembr n pa yir ne tõnd ba wã, la a yembr n ka be.» A Zozɛf yeel-b lame yaa: «Yaa wa mam sẽn yeel yãmbã bala. Yãmb yaa tẽn-gũusdba. 
La Pυg-yãangã sιd pa kιιs ye. A maana wala bõnyẽegã sẽn wilgã. Zaabr sẽn wa n ta, tι zĩigã lebg lib-libi, wala baag-bãng-m-soabã sasa, katr sιd le waame, n le sιnge: Baag rι samde, a zu-soab n yaoode. Wãb kãoong ronda peosgo.
A yiibã yaa yẽ meng n naane.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-biis katɛk yii Gibo tẽngã pʋg n kẽn n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ Gosneer lebg n pak b karen-dotã tɩ b paam n karem.
La, pond-bilã yeelame: «M ba Katr sẽn yã tʋʋmdã woto wã pa zems ye la b fãa gãand zãmpɛɛl yiib yiibu gũ a waoonga.» La yẽ yaool n dʋ naafã zug n zaoonde.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã, la buudã goam taoor kẽnd seb-gʋnd-kaseng a Yɩbrayɩɩm SANO, tɩ kõo sor tɩ yʋʋm 2022 n la yʋʋm 2023 soabã, kaoreng pak a kʋɩlense.
tʋʋmda ba-yãkdg yɩɩ lahagi Hammid WEDRAOOG tɩ b boond t’a Hamiid kaaro.
Bõn-kãensã loogr zugẽ, ad bũmb ning sẽn zĩndi. Yiizreyɛll rao a ye yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Nabot n dag n tar a reezẽ tɩɩs pʋʋgo, la pʋʋgã rag n pẽe Samaari rĩm a Akaab na-yirã. Dẽ, a Akaab yeela a Nabot yaa: «Kõ maam f reezẽ tɩɩs pʋʋgã tɩ m maan m zẽed zĩiga, bala, a pẽe ne mam zakã. La mam na n kõo foom  reezẽ  tɩɩs pʋ-sõng a to n led a zĩigẽ. Fo sã n leb n dat me, mam na n yaoo foom ligdi, wa sẽn zems pʋʋgã ligd sẽn yaa to-to.» 
Yaa politik taoor dãmba, nin-zaals lagem-n-taar sula, rog-n-mik taoor dãmba, dĩin taoor dãmba, sodaas buud toor-toor taoor dãmba, la guvɛgneer rãmbã sẽn be Reezẽo rãmbã zãadbã pʋsẽ wã.
Woto, a Zozɛf soka Faarõ sõgen-kambã sẽn be ne yẽnda bi-bees roog a soaalã zakẽ wã n na n bãng a võore. Yẽnda sok-b lame yaa: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb nensã gãnem dũndã a woto?» Bãmb leoka yẽnda yaa: «Tõnd zãmsa zãmsdo, la ned ka be sẽn na n bilg tõnd a võor ye.» A Zozɛf yeela bãmb yaa: «Ka Wẽnnaam n so bũmbã fãa bilgr la? Togs-y maam yãmb zãmsdã.» 
M kɩtame t'a Silvẽ gʋls-y sebr bil kãngã. Yẽ la m get wala m saam-biiga sẽn ka tol n bak ne m ye. M sagend-y lame la m wilgd-y lame tɩ kũun ning y sẽn paama, yẽ la Wẽnd kũun menga la tall-y kũun a woto buud neere. 
 Tɩ noosã zoe n kẽ roogã pʋga, n yɩ tao-tao, n pak fenetrã, n bas vɩʋʋgo.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 20 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Kɛɛd soolmã pʋga, a tẽns kẽer neb n yi n maan zũnglgu, n wilg tɩ b sũur ka noom ne b sẽn wilg tɩ tãrazisẽo wã na n kell n woglga yʋʋm a yiib n paasã ye.
Nebã a yiiba sãn n tara bãaga  bila, b sã n maan woto, kɩtedame tɩ bãaga bil da paam  pãng taotao ye.
Yẽnda wʋga maan-kʋʋr fuugã fu-wokã fãa ne gĩs-kẽega. B maana bugla me ne sãnem halaal n ning gernaad-dãmbã sʋk n gilg fuugã noore. 
Boẽ yĩng tɩ neba zoet rabeem n ka rat n yeel b taaba tɩ  SIDAwã bãaga wala a bãaga bil tara bãmba?
A kẽnga taoor n togs tɩ b rɩka na-kẽndr sẽn na yɩl n yẽs ne rũmsã koaasdb sẽn be be wã tɩ b yik la b bas zĩigã tɩ mobillsã rãmb paam vɩʋʋgã.
La a Akiya yeela a Zeroboaam yaa: «Reeg peen-gɩrs piigã n sooge. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yetame: Mam na n deega naamã a Salmo nugẽ, la mam na n kõo foom buud piig tɩ f sooge. La mam tʋmtʋmd a Davɩɩd maasem yĩnga, ne Zeruzalɛm sẽn yaa tẽng mam sẽn yãk Israyɛll tẽmsã sʋkã yĩnga, a Salmo biig n na n soog buud a yembr bala. 
Neba fãa sãn da tõe n kõ neb niisa sẽn maan b yelwẽna tɩ SIDAwã  bãaga wa yõk-bã wa Wẽnnaam sẽn kõt b sugr b yelwẽna yĩngã n  são.
Guugã, yaa sẽn na n tall n kẽ n pãb yãmb n kʋ».
Zug pa yɩt noog n le yɩ beed ye
A Zakoob kambã talla yẽnda n kẽng Kana tẽng n tɩ mum Makpela pʋʋgã pʋg tãn-bokã pʋgẽ, sẽn yaa a Abrahaam pʋʋg a sẽn dag n deeg Hɛt ned a Efrõ nengẽ n da tɩ yaa a meng rẽnda, n lebg yaad zĩigã. Zĩ-kãng rag n pẽe Mamre. A Zozɛf sẽn tɩ mum a ba wã n sɛ, yẽnda ne a kẽem-dãmbã, la neb nins fãa sẽn tũ yẽnda n na n tɩ mum a ba wã, lebg n leba Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
A Izak pʋʋs n kosa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, a pag a Rebeka yĩnga. Bala, a rag n ka tar dogem ye. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab wʋma a kosgã. La a Izak pag a Rebeka rɩka pʋga. La kambã sẽn dag n bee a Rebeka pʋgẽ wã rag n zabda taaba, t'a Rebeka mi n yetẽ tɩ: «Yaa bõe tɩ yel-kãngã paamd maam?» A Rebeka kẽngame n tɩ sok Sẽn-Ka-Saab n na n gese. 
Nebã pema a Ratzãng n tall-a n kẽng na-yiri, n yaoo! N bas a Sĩndbal tι yẽ loog a loogre. Kiba-kãngã wilgdame tι ned pa sedg n yã ligd n yĩm zood ye.
Kom-bɩɩb nins sẽn yi wã sʋka, a Gebrĩin WEDRAOOG wilga woto: «tõnd pa rat ned a to tɩ pa Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE ye.
Sãan-sõng yaa yir soab yɛsba.
Terok fãa rag n tara zũud nao gils a naase, b sẽn ning zũud tebends zutu. La terokã sogs a naasã zĩisẽ, b rag n ninga zũud gãts sĩngã tẽngre, la gãtsã rag n bee nag-teedã zugẽ. 
Gʋrendã goama, neb kobag pʋga, yaa neb a 3 n wʋmd-a la b gomd-a.
Sɛbã reesg sɩngda sapaolg kiuug rasem a 4 yʋʋm 2022 sẽn watã.
La ligd sõor sẽn yɩɩd milyaar 10 la b n kẽes sapaolg koobã pʋgẽ.
A Abrahaam ne a Abimelɛk kibare. A Abrahaam yii beenẽ n kẽng Negɛɛve. La yẽnda zĩnda Kadɛɛs ne Sʋʋr sʋka. La a leb n zĩnda Geraare. A Abrahaam dag n yetame t'a pag a Saara yaa yẽnda tão. Geraar naab a Abimelɛk kɩtame tɩ b tɩ peeg a Saara n wa. 
A Zozɛf sẽn yãnd a ba-biisã, a bãng-b lame, la a maana a meng wa yẽnda ka mi-b ye, n gom ne bãmb ne nen-keglem n yeele: «Hey! Yãmba! Yãmb yita yɛɛnẽ?» La b leokame: «Tõnd yii Kana soolem n wa n na n da koodo.» 
Ned kam ne waood fuugu
Wẽnnaam yeelame: «Woto yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ nebã tẽ tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa bãmb yaab-rãmbã Wẽnnaam, n yaa a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoob Wẽnnaamã n vẽneg b meng ne foom.» 
A yeelame t’a mii tʋʋm nins fãa, a sẽn segd n tʋma tiiri.
A Abrahaam lebg n leba kom-bɩɩsã sẽn yaa yẽnda tʋmtʋmdbã nengẽ, la bãmb tũu taab n leb Bɛɛr-Seba, bala, a Abrahaam rag n bee Bɛɛr-Seba. A Nakoor kamb ne a yagense Bõn-kãensã fãa loogr zugẽ, b yeela a Abrahaam tɩ yẽnda yao a Nakoor pag a Milka me rog a Nakoor kamba. 
F sã n yẽ zĩm n da bʋʋg tɩ yẽbg yõke, a leba a zĩigẽ
Rasem a tãabã daar sẽn ta, a Zeroboaam ne Israyɛll nebã fãa lebg n waa rĩm a Roboaam nengẽ, wa yẽnda sẽn dag n yeelã. A Roboaam reega a kom-bɩɩsã sẽn yaa yẽnda reed-n-taasã sagls n yeele: «M ba rag n namsa yãmba, la mam na n paasa yãmb namsgã n yɩɩda, m ba dag n sɩbga yãmb ne kalwaase, la mam na n sɩbga yãmb ne kalwaas sẽn tar gõose.» 
Pʋg-sadã leb n yeelame: «Tõnd tara kãenkãe la yamd wʋsg yiri, la zĩig me bee yãmb sẽn tõe n gãand yʋngã.» Yẽnda pʋʋsa a woto: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam soaal a Abrahaam Wẽnnaamã paam pẽgre! Bãmb wilga b nonglem ne b pʋ-peelem mam soaalã yĩnga. Sẽn-Ka-Saab talla maam n wa kẽes mam soaalã roagdb zakẽ.» 
La wakat wʋsg loogr zugẽ, warã sẽn sɩng tɩ yʋʋm tãablẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Eli yaa: «Kẽng rĩm a Akaab nengẽ, tɩ mam na n kɩtame tɩ saagã ni tẽn-koɛɛngã zugu.» Komã rag n paama pãng Samaari tẽngã pʋgẽ. Dẽ, rĩm a Akaab kɩtame tɩ b bool a balem-naab a Abdyaas t'a wa. La a Abdyaas yaool n dag n yaa ned sẽn zoet Sẽn-Ka-Saab wʋsgo. 
Bobo soabã geta Sɩɩd wɛse, Kaskaade, Obaasẽ, la Bukl di Muhund soolmã.
Taan-bil sã n reeg a ma wombo a na wom ne yẽgna
 n paam tɩ f paoong yalse, n fɩɩg n tall barka.
ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soab paalã wilgame tɩ sɛbã yaa wʋsg n ket n be ministɛɛr dãmbã pʋs n dat gesgo, bala, b reesda sɛb n zamdẽ tɩ b pa paamd gesg ye.
Wẽnnaam, rẽ ket n ka sek ye, tɩ y leb n gomd y sẽn tar saagr ning ne mam sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã yagens wɛɛngẽ, wakat sẽn wat yĩnga? Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, y get-m-la wa nin-kãsenga! Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yaa maam, yãmb tʋmtʋmdã sẽn ta yãmb yamã yĩng la y sẽn maan bõn-kãsems a woto n na n kɩt tɩ nebã yãndã. 
Dẽ poore, bãmb zĩndame n na n dɩ b rɩɩbo. Bãmb sẽn zẽk n gese, b yãnda Ismayɛll buudã neb sẽn yi Galaad n tũud taab wʋsg n watẽ. Bãmb yʋgma wã rag n zɩlga tɩdare, ne kaam sẽn tar yũ-noogo, la wisdu, n tar n dabd Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
F ka tõe wagdr bɩ f tʋk n yãag-a
Rĩm a Salmo leoka rĩm-poakã sokdsã fãa.
