La sokr baa a yembr ka zĩnd rĩm a Salmo sẽn ka tõog n leok ye. ne rɩ-nood nins sẽn be rĩmã taabl zugã, la rĩmã tʋmtʋmdbã rotã sẽn yaa to-to wã, ne sõgen-kambã sẽn tʋmd to-to wã, la b yer fut ninsã, ne b sẽn get rĩmã bõn-yũudlã yell to-to wã, la maand sẽn yõogd bugmã rĩmã sẽn maand Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã pʋgã, a maka goam n konge. 
Yaa sõama tɩ neb niisa SIDAwã bãaga sẽn tar b rãmba tõog n kɩt tɩ neb a  taaba bãnge.
Pag n baood a ki t'a sɩd sãrge
Woto, a Zakoob yeela raoã yaa: «Mam kota yãmb tɩ y togs maam yãmb yʋʋre.» La raoã yeelame: «Bõe yĩng tɩ fo sokd n dat n bãng mam yʋʋre?» La yẽnda ninga a Zakoob zug bark zĩ-kãngã. A Zakoob boola zĩ-kãng yʋʋr tɩ Peniyɛlle . Bala, yẽnda yeelame tɩ yẽnda yãnda Wẽnnaam neng n ket n vɩ. 
Bala, bãmb laogã rag n yaa wʋsg tɩ bãmb ka tõe n zĩnd ne taab ye, sẽn paas me, tẽngã pʋg bãmb sẽn yaa sãamb a pʋgẽ wã rag n ka leb n sekd bãmb rũmsã sẽn yaa wʋsgã ye. Dẽ, a Ezayu tɩ zĩnda Seyɩɩr soolem ning sẽn be tãms sʋkã pʋga, la yaa a Ezayu n yaa Edom. 
Walemdb n dũmd taab tʋba
Sẽn sɩng ne wakat-kãnga, zabrã wa n lebga a Sayull bal la b baooda. Tãb-tãoodbã yãnd-a lame, la rabeem yõk-a lame t'a rigda. La a Sayull yeela bi-bɩɩg ning sẽn dag n zãad-a yẽnda zab-teedã yaa: «Wõog f sʋʋgã n kõs-m n kʋ, tɩ nin-bãmbã sẽn ka kẽ bãongã ra wa yaal-m n yaool n kʋ-m ye.» La bi-bɩɩg ning sẽn dag n zãad-a yẽnda zab-teedã ka sak ye. Bala, rabeem dag n tar-a lame. Dẽ, a Sayull dɩka a sʋʋgã n tilg n bas a meng n lʋɩ a zugu. 
Sẽn yɩɩd fãa yõ-koglg kaalmã wɛɛngẽ.
La f sẽbg a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã sẽbdse, n fõgen bãmb pugli. La maan-kʋʋrã tʋʋmd na n yɩɩ bãmb dẽnda, n yaa no-tũudg sẽn ka sɛta. Yaa woto la fo na n ning tʋʋmdã a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã zutu. 
La marsã m sũur noomame. Ka y sũ-sãangã n wa ne mam sũ-nooga ye, yaa m sẽn yãe t'a waa ne y tuubgu. Yãmb sũ-sãangã yaa Wẽnd sẽn dat a soaba buudu; tõnd ka maan bũmbu n wa ne-a ye. Sũ-sãang wa Wẽnd sẽn dat a soaba buudu wata ne tuubgu n manegd yelle la woto wã a ka bõn-wẽng ye. Yaa sũ-sãang wa zamaana rãmb sẽn mi a soabã n wat ne kũum. 
A tι mika we-baag be, n yõg zood ne-a, tι b yiibã be be, n yõgd rũmsã n wãbdẽ, tι b vιιm ya-b noogo. Daar a yembre, b wa n nee saagã sẽn kυι n limsi, tι b tar sẽm-sẽm-sẽme, n baood zĩig n na n soonde.
Ad a Rasɛll kamba: Yaa a Zozɛf ne a Benzame. Ad a Leya yem-poak a Zilpa kamba: Yaa a Gaad ne a Asɛɛre. Bãmb yaa a Zakoob kom-dibli nins a sẽn dog Padan-Aram soolmẽ wã. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 12 sẽn loogã, sull ning sẽn sigl kẽndã taoor dãmb sega kiba-kɩtbã n wilg b sẽn tagsd bũmb ning Reezẽo de lɛs zugu, la b kos tẽngã taoor dãmb tɩ b puk b nin n ges tɩ karen-biis sõor sẽn ta tus 100000 n be Reezẽo wã pʋg n dat n leb b karen-dotẽ wã.
Vʋʋsg raarã na n yɩɩ bãnd maam ne Israyɛll nebã sʋk wakat sẽn ka sɛt yĩnga. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab naana yĩngr la tẽngã rasem a yoob pʋgẽ, la rasem a yopoe wã daare, bãmb basa b tʋʋmã n vʋʋse.» 
Fo tog n paga a yĩngrã, la pagdgã zãntlem tog n zẽk n taa kãntɩɩg a yembre, fo tog n paga koglgã yĩngri, t'a tẽn-sʋkã zẽk n ta kãntɩɩg a yembre, la f ning koom koglgã noor koglgã kɩrenga. Maan koglgã t'a yɩ ro-tomdem sẽn doglem taab a tãabo. Tẽngr roto, yiibẽ doto, la tãabẽ doto. 
Ra-lugds nins fãa sẽn gũbgd zakã tog n tonga taab ne wanzuri bãense, tɩ yagendsã yaa wanzuri, tɩ b naoã yaa zũudu. 
Kʋ pe-bil a yembre, n maan maoong yibeoogo, la f kʋ pe-bil a yiib soabã n maan maoong zaabre. La ne dẽenem pe-bil a yembrã, bɩ f paas zom-bãaneg wũmbl a tãab la pʋɩ-sʋka, la bɛka sẽn kalem ne oliiv kaam yãmb sẽn wõde, litr a ye la pʋɩ-sʋk la bɛka, la  reezẽ  rãam litr la pʋɩ-sʋk la bɛka, tɩ yɩ bõn-yũudl kũun maoongo. 
Bãmb n maasd tõnd sũuri d namsga pʋgẽ, la b meng sẽn maasd d sũurã, bãmb n sõngd tõndo tɩ d me maasd d taab sũuri, b sẽn zĩ ne toog ning fãa. D sã n namsdẽ, yaa yãmb sũur bʋkr yĩnga la y fãagre. D sũura sã n bʋke, yãmb me rẽnda na bʋke tɩ y sak wakat fãa, namsg niyns tõnd me sẽn namsde. 
M wẽenda ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã sẽn vɩ wã, tɩ zĩiga, bɩ soolem ka be mam soaal a Akaab sẽn ka tʋm tɩ b tɩ gẽes yãmb ye. La nebã sã n yeel tɩ yãmb ka be beenẽ, rĩmã kɩtdame tɩ tẽngã bɩ soolmã nin-kãensã wẽene, n yeel tɩ b sɩd ka yãnd yãmb ye. Yãmb sẽn yeel maam tɩ m kẽng n tɩ yeel m soaalã tɩ yãmb bee ka wã, 
Kaoosg pa rigd yãab ye
Ned sã n kẽnd kiu-kiu, bɩ a tẽeg lama-lama yelle.
Neb nins sẽn dag n be beenẽ ne bãmb yaa a Eman ne a Yedutun, n paas neb a taabã b sẽn dag n yãk tɩ b yɩɩl n pẽg Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, b nonglmã sẽn paad wakat fãa wã yĩnga. Dẽ poore, ned fãa kuila a yiri, la a Davɩɩd me lebg n kuila a yir n na n tɩ ning a yirã rãmb barka. 
Sãn ka woto, yãmb tõe n  karma vɛrse kãens ne buud a to goama b sẽn lebg Wẽnnaam sebra ne. Y  na yaol n kẽng taor n sõs ne taaba ne y buuda goam.
La, b sẽn lɩk baoorã pʋga, b mikame, tɩ ki wã kella kɩdga.
A Koore kom-dibli yaa a Asɩɩr ne a Ɛlkana la a Abiyazafe. Bãmb yaa a Koore yagense. A Aarõ bi-ribl a Eleyazaar peega a Putiyɛll bi-pugl a yembr n maan a paga. La yẽnda roga a Fineyaase. Bãmb fãa yaa Leevi buudã kãsem-dãmbã, ne b roto. 
La a Aarõ yeela bãmb yaa: «Bɩ y yãgs sãnem tʋb-londã sẽn be yãmb pagbã tʋbẽ wã, la yãmb kom-dibli wã ne y kom-pugli wã tʋbẽ wã n wa kõ maam.» Nebã fãa yãgsa sãnem tʋb-londã sẽn be bãmb tʋbẽ wã n wa kɩs a Aarõ. 
N kõtẽ tɩ f raadẽ? 
Kibarã yii wakat sera.
La m ba Yõngr sẽn wa n tar lamsg n dabd n na n gese, la biigã sẽn yã-a, n wẽ-a n kʋ.
 La, b sã n kõ-a, a sã n le ta sorẽ wã, a wãbda nemdã yasa, la, a rʋʋd n kiis bugmã n lebg n wa.
Y ka mi tɩ y yaa Wẽnnaam doogo, t'a Vʋʋsem Sõng be y pʋsẽ laa? Sẽn wãad-a Wẽnd doogo, Wẽnd me na n wãa a soaba; Wẽnnaam dooga yaa bõn-sõngo la yaool n yaa yãmb la ro-kãnga. 
A Davɩɩd segend n na n toeema kaoolã koglgã zĩiga. A Davɩɩd kɩtame tɩ b me rot a mengã yĩnga, a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋga. Yẽnda kɩtame tɩ b maneg zĩig n ti fu-roog Wẽnnaam kaoolã koglgã yĩnga. Dẽ, a Davɩɩd tigma Israyɛll nebã fãa Zeruzalɛm, n na n kɩt tɩ b rɩk Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã n kẽng zĩig ning yẽnda sẽn dag n segl a yĩngã. 
Wẽnd nifẽ, zamaana sɩlem yaa gãeemdo; dẽ me yĩng la b gʋls woto Sebra pʋga: «Yaa bãmb n leebd sɩlem dãmba n lubd b sɩlmẽ.» 
Wẽnnaam kɩtame t'a Salmo leb n paam bɛ a to. Yaa a Elyada biig a Reezõ. Yẽnda rag n zoe n basa a soaal a Hadadezɛɛr sẽn yaa Soba rĩmã. Wakat ning rĩm a Davɩɩd sẽn dag n kʋ a soaal a Hadadezɛɛr tãb-biisã zãngã, a Reezõ tigma neb n lebg b tãb-biis naaba. Dẽ, bãmb zoe n kẽnga Damaas n tɩ zĩnd be n dɩ naam. 
La a Moyiis ne a Aarõ sẽn yi Faarõ nengẽ, a Moyiis zẽka a koɛɛg n kos Sẽn-Ka-Saab loms nins bãmb sẽn tʋm tɩ b wa nams Faarõ wã wɛɛngẽ. La nebã wʋka lomsã n zame, t'a yũugã kell n piuug ne tẽngã. 
A Dan na n yɩɩ wa waaf sẽn be sor zugu,  la wa põeer sẽn be sor zugu, n dũmd wed-moaag nao-bendo, t'a wed-rʋʋdã lʋɩt zãmbɛɛla. Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, mam gũuda yãmb fãagrã! 
Sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm 1987 soabã, a kẽe Dõosẽ Parwaasã Koralle, b sẽn boond tɩ Korallrĩmlawẽnde.
Lud bĩndu, n dɩ rõodo
La, rao wã, yɩɩ tao-tao, n kẽng n tɩ rɩk zʋʋrã, n tɩ pĩng kũumã n yeele :
Ki na yɩ neer bãngda a vãadẽ
Pag noor la a loko
Ned yã gãeeng la a põng a zugu
A Abram ne a Lot welga taaba. A Abram yii Ezɩpt tẽngã ne a pagã, la ne bũmb nins fãa yẽnda sẽn so wã, n lebg n leb Negɛɛve sẽnẽ, la a Lot dag n tũuda yẽnda. 
Yʋʋng-kãnga, a Ãminat soka a Pok yaa: “Tõnd na nyiimi bii?“
Ned a ye, n wa n na n tog sore.
A yeelame: “Pĩndã, mam da minim n zĩnda ka ne m ma tɩ d sõsda.“
Rẽ zugẽ masã, a kẽeme n maneg n ning fu-paala, n wa yi n yιk n zomb katre, n yet tι b loog masã, tι katr sιd dιk sore. B sẽn wa n poog tẽnga, soaamb ninga katr sẽba, t’a kυι tĩiga, n ya burga-burga-burga, n pasgd tẽngã, n dabd kυ-yira.
Karensaamba segd n zãmsa nebã bũmb niisa sẽn be seb kãnga pʋgẽwã tɩ ned fãa wʋm sõama. Wakat kẽere, y tõe n wiliga yãmb sẽ yet bũmb  ninga sẽn loe ne kibara toto.
B boond-b lame tɩ BIR, Bɩɩrã bee Waogdgo, la raab sẽn wa be tẽngã baobg ning fãa, b kẽndame.
Yaa woto, la biigã maan n fãag a ba wã, la a menga. 
la a yalsa Ezɩpt nebã ne Israyɛll nebã sʋka. Sawaodgã lebga libsg yʋngã tɛka. La yʋngã tɛka, Ezɩpt rãmbã ne Israyɛll dãmbã ka tõe n kolg taab ye. 
A sιd kẽe : yolgẽ wã, t’a Yamyιιd maneg a noorã n sẽbg sõama, la a bas n peeg a niigã n looge. Nebã a yiibã me riga yĩisrã, n wa mik tι b pa na n paam-a ye.
Wãagr kʋʋda pag la kõsb pa maand pag bũmb ye
Yaa rẽ n so t’a wa sõs ne Mali tẽngã taoor dãmba, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b tʋm ne taab sodaar wɛɛngẽ, tɩ b nin-buiidã yõy paam koglgo.
Ad maoong ning fo sẽn na n maan tẽn-kugrã zug wakat fãa: Daar fãa, yaa pe-bi a yiibu sẽn tar yʋʋmde. 
La a Izak leoka a Ezayu yaa: «Ade, mam kɩtame t'a na n lebg fo soaala, mam kõo yẽnda a saam-biisã fãa tɩ b na n yɩ yẽnda tʋmtʋmdba, la mam yeelame t'a paam koodo, la reezẽ rã-paalga. Dẽ wã, m biiga, bõe la mam tõe n leb n maan n kõ foom?» 
 La, m ba Soaamb sã n mak t’a na n yɩk fãa, a ka tõe ye, t’a yetẽ:
Tɩɩm ka be n toẽ n maag SIDAwã bãag ye, la tõnd n toẽeme t’a bãaga bil  da yõk d ye. Wa-y tɩ d kʋ waafã t’a ra wa reng n kʋ-d ye !
Bugvãr yeelame t’a bee bokẽ a ye, la a ka be tɩɩg tẽngr a ye ye.
Pʋg-sadã sẽn kõ tʋmtʋmdã koomã t'a yũ n sɛ, pʋg-sadã yeelame: «Mam na n wii koomã n yũnug yãmb yʋgma wã me hal tɩ b yũ n tɩge.» Pʋg-sadã wudga tao-tao n kiig a yʋʋrã koom gaolgã pʋga, la a wudg n kẽng bulgẽ wã n na n tɩ toog koomã yɛs n wa. La a wii koomã n yũnug yʋgma wã fãa. 
La biigã ne a ba wã sẽn da solg pĩirã poorẽ wã, rɩka rɩɩbã n dɩ tɩ yɩ-b noogo, hal tɩ zẽedã wa sa.
Pag ya a sɩdã pipi sõngda. Rẽ yĩnga, pag sẽn tar yam, yɩɩda ligd la sãnem.
A wakatã, burkĩn bi wã fãa wẽ-a-la nu-poaka, n sɩd ra kõ-a sɩda, n yet tɩ b paama b fãagda.
Ned ka tõe n bãng wag-yẽn-feed bokẽ ye.
Kũnd soab n mi a kũnd gãaga
A kell n togsame tɩ Farens rãmb na n yãaga Burkĩna Faso tɩ taoor dãmbã sã n wa mik tɩ raab ket n beeme.
F sã n kẽ saoog n pa yã kilsg bɩ f lok kalle
Koe-nooga mooneg ne maam ka m zu-zẽkr bal ye, a yaa tʋʋm pakre n loe m zugu. N ye! Yell bela m zug, m sã n ka moon Koe-noogã! 
Kapitɛnd TARWAR wilgame, t’a wʋma b koeesã, la a na n tagsame n ges soay nins b sẽn tũ, tɩ b naag taaba, n kẽes b mens tẽngã reegr wɛɛngẽ.
B sẽn tall Wẽnnaam kaoolã koglgã n wa wã zugẽ, b ning-a-la fu-roog ning a Davɩɩd sẽn dag n segl a yĩnga pʋgẽ, la b maana maand sẽn yõogd bugum ne zems-n-taar maand Wẽnnaam taoore. Dẽ zugẽ, a pʋɩɩ Israyɛll nebã fãa rɩɩbo. Pag ne rao fãa paama bur-gilg a yembre, tamaaro-gilg a yembre, la reezẽ-koeem-gilg a yembre. 
Neb ka tɛk n yi n wilg b belem ne Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
Yιι woto t'a Kazυr kul ne a paga, n ta tι b pυυsd-a tι Wẽnd na kιt tι yι buud paga.
Mam pa rũngd m biig la m yaool n kẽ reemẽ ye
Kom-kãsemsa tõe n paama zunoog tɩ ges barãmba SIDAwã  bãaga sẽn kʋ n bas b kɩɩbs niisa yelle.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 25 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, gosneerã taoor soab yiisa mooneg koɛɛg n wilg neb nins a sẽn yãk tɩ b zĩnd ministɛɛr dãmbã taoorã.
Sẽn na n baase, a yeelame tɩ b na n maoome n deeg tẽngã, n lebs a toosã zugu.
Ad-y m pa rata, m saam-biisi, tɩ y yĩm tɩ sawadgo n bui d yaab rãmba fãa la b fãa rʋʋga mogr a ye. Wẽnd maag a Moyiiz, b reega soob sawadg tẽngr la Mogr pʋga. 
Wa tɩ d zĩnd yaa wa tɩ d zabe
A Hiram lugla ra-lugds a yiib Wẽnd doogã noore. La yẽnda pʋda nug-rɩtg soabã tɩ Yakĩn,  la a pʋd nug-goabg soabã tɩ Boaaze. A Hiram yẽnega zũud n maan sĩn-bedre. La sĩn-bedrã noorã yalem yaa kãntɩɩg piiga. La a rag n yaa gilga, a zãntlmã yaa kãntɩɩg a nu. La yaa wĩir woglem sẽn tat kãntɩɩg pis-tã n tõe n gilg-a n sege. 
Zuk noaag ronda bʋʋga
Katr n wat n yõgd m noos la m piis tι m pa mi m sẽn kẽedẽ ye. A sẽn togs yellã n sa, la bõnyẽegã sẽn yeel-a - - Ad d sẽn na n maan a soaba...
Dẽ, a Moyiis yeela nebã yaa: «Tẽeg-y daar ning yãmb sẽn yi Ezɩptã, daar ning yãmb sẽn yi yembd pʋgẽ wã yelle. Bala, yaa ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab nug sẽn tar pãngã la b yiis yãmb beenẽ. Bɩ ned da rɩ bũmb sẽn ning rã-bɩll ye. 
n miẽ tɩ sẽn vʋʋga Soaal a Zezi wã na n vʋʋga tõnd me ne bãmba la b yals tõnd ne yãmba b sɛɛgẽ. La rẽ fãa yaa yãmb yĩnga, tɩ wʋsg gale ne Wẽnd kũuni, tɩ bark pʋʋsga gale neb wʋsg nengẽ, Wẽnd pẽgr yĩnga. 
Bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 10 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sũ-sãn-kaseng n kẽ Burkĩna Faso kiba-kitbã tʋʋm pʋgẽ.
A Zakoob kom-dibli wã ne a kom-pugli wã fãa yikame n bels a Zakoobe, la a ka sak belsgã ye. Yẽnda yeelame: «Mam na n yãbame n ki n bʋʋg m biig a Zozɛf kɩɩm-kulgu.» La yẽnda yãba a biigã yĩnga. Madiyã nebã tɩ koosa a Zozɛf Ezɩpt tẽng ne a Potifaar sẽn dag n yaa Faarõ sõgen-kãsengã, n yaa gũudbã naabã. 
Biigã talla yιbrgã n leb tιιmã soab nengẽ n na n tι kιs-a. La tιιmã soab yeel-a lame t’a togs yẽ yellã sẽn yι to-to.
Pag-zug wogmame, la a pa so zak ye
Tõnd sẽn paam kãab nood a woto fãa, m kom-sõma, d sõng tɩ d yĩnga la d yama lak ne rẽgd buud fãa, d zoe Wẽnnaam la d baas d tʋʋmna, d sõmblem baoob tʋʋmna. M pa gomd woto n dat n ning y taal ye. M zoe n togs-y lame tɩ y vɩ bɩ y ki yã, y paada tõnd nonglem pʋgẽ. 
A Yoksan n dog a Seba ne a Dedan. A Dedan yagens yaa Asʋʋr-dãmbã la Letʋʋs-dãmba, ne Lewum-dãmbã. A Midiyã kamb yaa a Efa, a Efɛɛre, a Henoke, a Abida ne a Ɛldaa. Bãmb fãa rag n yaa a Ketʋra kom-dibli. 
Zõang zĩ wa a zug pa na n tã lals ye
A kell n bẽda be n wilg t’a saagdame tɩ wakat sẽn wate, yaa nin-buiidã n na n yi n maan vot n yãk naaba, ka na n le tũ ne wa yals bʋ-kaood ro-kasengã taoor n wẽene, tɩ ya naam wẽ-n-dɩk karg ye.
B sõasgã pʋgẽ, a kõo kibay wʋsg sẽn kẽed ne gosneema zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Gosneem taoor soabã na n yalsa depite rãmbã taoore, sapaolg kiuugã rasem 19.
Ad-y wakata taame tɩ bʋʋda na n sɩnge ne Wẽnnaam meng zaka neba; la sã n ya ne tõnd la bʋʋda na n sɩnge, sẽn tõdg b Wẽnnaam Koɛɛga reegrã, bãmb dãmb baasg na n yɩɩ wãna? Nin-sõng paam n põs sã n ka naana, nin-wẽng la yel-wẽn-maand na n kẽe yɛ? 
A Suwa ba-biig a Keluub roga a Meyɩɩr sẽn dag n yaa a Ɛston ba wã. t'a Mewonotayi rog a Ofra, t'a Seraya rog a Zoaab sẽn dag n yaa nus-tʋʋm dãmbã tãn-long ba wã. Bala, nin-bãmb dag n yaa nus-tʋʋm dãmba. 
Woto, maan-kʋʋd a Sadok kẽe sɛk roogẽ wã, n dɩk yɩɩllã ne kaamã n pʋdg a Salmo zugu. La b peeba baorgo, la nebã fãa kaasame n yeele: «Wẽnd na kaoos rĩm a Salmo.» La a Adoniza ne a sẽn dag n bool-b rãmbã sẽn dɩ n sɛ, b wʋma kelemse. La a Zoaab sẽn wʋm baorgã peebg rãamdã, a yeelame: «Yaa bõe bʋrg la sẽn maand tẽngã pʋgẽ wã?» 
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab bugmã sigame n dɩ maoongã ne raadã la kugã, ne tomã, la a fõog koomã sẽn dag n pid bokã. A Eli yeelame tɩ b yõg Baall no-rɛɛsdbã, la b ra bas tɩ b ned ba a yembr põs ye. Dẽ, b yõg-b lame, la a Eli tall-b lame n sig tãngã n kẽng n tɩ kood Kizõ ko-soogã noore. 
Bãmb sẽn ta b ba a Zakoob nengẽ Kana tẽnga, bãmb togsa yẽnda bãmb sẽn paam yɛl ninsã fãa. Bãmb yeelame yaa: «Rao ning sẽn so soolmã goma ne tõnd ne nen-keglem, a yeela tõnd tɩ d wa n na n gũusa tẽngã. 
Fo sã n vʋʋg ned yoore, a baooda f paga
A kẽnga taoor n paas t’a ka na n dɩk vɩʋʋg tɩ ya tigsg katɛk maaneg ye.
Kʋɩɩm ra-kil yẽng n kʋʋd-a
A Davɩɩd talla kaoolã koglgã n kẽng Zeruzalɛm. A Davɩɩd tigma tãb-biis tusr-tusr ne tãb-biis koabg-koabg nanambsã, ne kãsem-dãmbã fãa. La a Davɩɩd yeela Israyɛll nebã fãa yaa: «Sã n nooma yãmba, la sã n taa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã yam, bɩ d tʋm neb tɩ b tɩ bool tõnd ba-biis a taabã sẽn ket Israyɛll ween-vɩɩs a naasã pʋgẽ, n paas maan-kʋʋdbã ne Leevi nebã sẽn be bãmb tẽn-kɩremsã, tɩ b wa naag tõnd n tigme. 
La mam kota yãmb tɩ y sã n wa n be y sũ-noogã pʋga, bɩ y tẽeg mam yelle, n maan-m neere, n gom ne Faarõ mam yelle, n kɩt tɩ b yiis-m do-kãngã pʋga! Bala, b yõka maam Ebre nebã tẽngẽ tall n wa ka, la kaanẽ wã me, b kẽesa maam bi-bees roog tɩ m yaool n ka maan baa fɩ ye!» 
Badaar bala, Wẽnnaam daoã wilga a Zeroboaam bũmb ning sẽn na n maanã n yeele: «Ad bãnd ning sẽn wilgd tɩ yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n gome. Tẽn-kugrã na n wãame tɩ tompeglmã sẽn be a zugã sãeege.» Wakat-kãnga, rĩm a Zeroboaam sẽn wʋm kãabg ning Wẽnnaam daoã sẽn kãab tẽn-kugrã, a tẽega a nug n zʋʋg tẽn-kugrã n tees Wẽnnaam daoã n yeel tɩ b yõk-a. La nug ning rĩm a Zeroboaam sẽn dɩk n tees Wẽnnaam daoã kʋɩɩme n tɩre, n ka leb n tõe n sik ye. 
Ra sak n maan kaool ne bãmba, wall ne bãmb wẽnnaam-dãmbã me ye. Bɩ y ra sak tɩ bãmb zĩnd yãmb soolmã pʋgẽ ye. Sã n ka rẽ, bãmb na n wa kɩtame tɩ yãmb maan yel-wẽnd n beeg maam. Bala, yãmb na n waooga bãmb wẽnnaam-dãmbã, la, yõwã na n yɩɩ bẽdg yãmb yĩnga. 
Ned pa tõe n deng a sulunsuk n kẽ maasmẽ ye
Tι sãyã yãk wãk a ye n kõ-a. A sẽn deeg wãkã, la a sẽn Ie rιk a sore, n tutẽ.
 Daar a yembre, rao wã ne a pagã wa n bee pʋʋgẽ wã n bʋtẽ, la b tar sõasga.
A Sefoora roga bi-ribla, la a Moyiis pʋda yẽnda yʋʋr t'a Gersom, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹sãando.› Bala, yẽnda yeelame: «Mam yaa sãan tẽn-kãngã pʋgẽ.» Sẽn kaoos wʋsg rẽ zugẽ, Ezɩpt rĩmã kiime. La Israyɛll nebã rag n yãbdame la b kelemd b yembdã pʋga. Bãmb sẽn dag n kelemd n baood sõngr b yembdã pʋgẽ wã zẽk n taa Wẽnnaam nengẽ. 
Ziri sã n tũud sore, bʋʋm baooda moogo
A Adoniza maana maoong ne lolse, la nag-nobdse, ne rũm-bãooneg wʋsgo. Yẽnda boola rĩmã kambã fãa, la a bool maan-kʋʋd a Abiyataar ne tãb-biisã naab a Zoaabe, n yaool n ka bool yãmb tʋmtʋmd a Salmo ye. Sã n ka rẽ, yãmb loogr poore, b na n gesa maam ne m biig a Salmo wa nin-wẽnse.» 
A sẽn loog be, a tι moona gυga, la a yeel nebã tι yẽ tara tão-tι põog tιιm. Gυgã raar yibeoogo, yẽ n lυι taoor n tar faoodg faoodg, tι nebã pυgda. A sẽn wa n kolg katr sẽn kiẽ wã, a kιtame tι kẽer kẽng rιυtgo, tι kẽer kẽng goabga.
 La, kinkirgã yeela rao wã : «Fo ka tõe n zã bãngrã ye.»
B kell n bẽdame n kos-a t’a rɩk na-kẽnda buud toor-toore, sẽn na yɩlẽ n sõng-b tɩ b tõog n kõ kibaya wala sẽn segde.
Pʋg-yãang kõsdg sãoa ro-vɩʋʋgu.
La fo sẽn yaa Wẽnnaam nedã, zãag f meng ne bõn-kãense, la f bao tɩrlem, la Wẽnnaam sakre, la tẽebo, la nonglem, la sũ-mare, la sũ-bʋgsem. Mam yeta foom, Wẽnnaam sẽn kõt bõn-vɩɩsã fãa vɩɩmã taoore, 
Ned ninga fãa SIDAwã bãag sẽn yõk-a na n kii ne-a.
La b gesa a Abram yell neere, a Sarayi zug maasem yĩnga. Dẽ, bãmb kõo a Abram rũm-bãooneg ne rũm-bɛda. Bõense, ne yem-daoodo, la yem-pogse, ne bõn-yãanse la yʋgma. Dẽ, rĩm a Faarõ boola a Abram n yeele: «Yaa bõe tɩ fo maan maam a woto? Bõe yĩng tɩ fo ka togs maam tɩ pagã yaa fo paga? 
Yυng sẽn  ta tι b rι n sa, b kẽeme n na n gũsi. Pυg-yãangã ra tara kamb a naase, t'a gãneg bãmb roogã kιreng a ye, n yaool n gãneg kom-pugli wã me kιreng a ye.
La, m ba Soaamb tʋmame, n kaoog ka-zẽegã zugu tɩ sak põra, tɩ m ba Katr tẽ, tɩ yaa sɩda.
Dẽ, yẽnda mee maoong kʋʋb zĩig tãng ning sẽn tees Zeruzalɛm tẽngã n kõ Moaab-rãmbã wẽn-yook a Kemoose, la a me maoong kʋʋb zĩig n kõ Amo nebã wẽn-yook a Moloke. A Salmo rag n maanda a woto n kõt a pagb nins fãa sẽn yaa bu-zẽmsã. Pʋg-kãens dag n yõogda wisdu, la b maand maand n kõt b wẽn-naandsã. 
Kom-bi sã n mogd pusa, nin-kẽemb noy wãedame
Kiba-kɩtbã wags-taab kaseng b sẽn boond tɩ galyã wã, a vuk 25 soabã sẽn da segd n zĩnd zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 21 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, b toeema a raarã.
A kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ sɩngrã bãmb raabã ra yaa toand 100, la b sũur yaa noogo, tɩ bala, b raaba pĩdame.
A Aarõ maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmdã fut sẽn welg toorã na n yɩɩ yẽnda kom-dibli wã sẽn na n led yẽnda wã rẽnda. Bãmb na n yeelga fu-bãmb wakat ning b sẽn na n tik bãmb ne kaam n ning maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd bãmb zutã. 
Ned kõn paam gãag n baood mobgr ye.
a Zozɛf segla a saar n kẽng Gosɛn tẽngã n na n tɩ seg a ba a Israyɛlle. La a Zozɛf sẽn yãnd a baaba, a mobg-a lame, n yãb n kaoose. 
Tʋʋmdã sẽn wa n pag a kʋɩlense, b wilgame tɩ b na n zĩniga gosneere, la depite rãmb tɩ b sõng taab tẽngã zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Faarõ yeela a Moyiisi: «Yi m zakẽ wã! Da leb n saag n bao tɩ wa mam taoor yɛs ye. Daar ning fo sẽn na n wa mam taoorã, badaar na n yɩɩ f kũum daare.» La a Moyiis leoka yẽnda yaa: «Yaa yãmb n yeele, la mam kõn tol n leb n wa yãmb taoor yɛs ye.» 
Israyɛll rĩm a Akaab me tigma a tãb-biisã, n kõ-b rɩɩbo, tɩ b yi n na n seg Siiri nebã. Israyɛll nebã tãb-sik rag n bee Siiri rãmbã neng taoore. La Israyɛll nebã ka wʋsg ye, b sõorã rag n ka yɩɩd bʋʋs bãg a yiib ye, tɩ Siiri nebã yaool n yɛdg n pid zĩigã. Wẽnnaam daoã leb n waa Israyɛll rĩmã nengẽ n yeele: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame: Siiri nebã yetame tɩ mam yaa tãms Wẽnnaam, tɩ m ka tãn-lond Wẽnnaam ye. Woto yĩngã, mam na n kɩtame tɩ f tõog kʋʋn-kãngã yãmb sẽn ne wã, la yãmb na n bãngame tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» 
 La m ba Soaamb sẽn yã rẽ, a talla sũ-kĩiri, ne m ba Katre, a bɛngã yĩnga.
La, moos maana b yel-bũndi : «Lar sã n noome, a to n kɛ a saala». 
Kom-bɩɩb nins sẽn siglg tʋʋmdã taoor soab a Alẽ TARWAR tɩ boond t’a Alino Faso wilgame tɩ yaa kood toand 400 la futu la b paam yã.
Fo sã n zãgs n ka bas bãmb tɩ b looge, fo sã n ka kõ-b sore, Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n tẽega b nug n kɩt tɩ bã-loangdg sẽn tar pãng wa kʋ fo rũmsã sẽn be weoogẽ wã, ne f wiidã, la f bõensã, ne f yʋgma wã, la f niigã, ne f rũm-bãoonegã. 
M sã n ka tʋʋm-tʋmd neb a taab yĩnga, ne yãmb sẽ, m yaa tʋʋm-tʋmda, tɩ Soaala sã n baood m tʋʋmda kaseto, yaa yãmb la b ne yã. M sẽn tar n na n leok sẽn dõt-b maama la woto: 
A Moyiis ne a Aarõ yeelame: «Ebre nebã Wẽnnaamã waa tõnd nengẽ. Tõnd kotame tɩ y bas-d tɩ d kẽng n tɩ kẽn dasem a tãab kẽnd we-raoogẽ wã n maan maand n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã, tɩ b ra wa wẽ tõnd ne bã-loangd wall ne zabr sʋʋg ye.» 
A tag baag n bãng a soaba.
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, tãrãzisẽo wã depite rãmb sega taab Asãmble nasnall wala, b sẽn gʋls n wilg tãrãzisẽo wã sẽn segd n zã toto wã pʋgẽ.
La Faarõ dag n nonga a Hadaad hal wʋsgo, n tol n dɩk a na-pʋg-rʋmd a Tapenes yao-bi-pugl n kõ-a t'a maan a paga. A Tapenes yao-bi-puglã roga a Hadaad bi-ribl t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Genubate. A Tapenes kɩtame tɩ b wub biigã Faarõ zakẽ wã. Biigã naaga Faarõ kambã n be na-yirã. 
Yaa wĩndg sẽn wa n lʋɩ, la b yiis koees n wilg tɩ b luba Letena Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB naamã, la ket n yaa ƐMPESƐƐR n na n zã tẽngã.
Korg bob-n-pɩʋʋg bõak yam wa yã, la rẽ tɩ korg menem yã.
La nin-kãngã ra yĩmame, tɩ yẽ sẽn wẽgd nebã, tõe n leba a menga, tɩ b ka gomd a kambã ye.
La b boolã ka lʋɩ muk tʋbrẽ, tɩ bala, nebã sakame n kẽes b toogo.
Wẽnnaam goma gom-kãensã fãa n yeele: «Mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n yaa fo Wẽnnaam, la yaa maam n yiis foom Ezɩpt soolem yembdã pʋga. 
Sẽn leb n paasdẽ me, rẽndame tɩ b tʋm sodaas wʋsg zĩis nins nin-wẽnsa sẽn be wã sẽn na n yɩlẽ n sõng-b tɩ b tõog n paam n tʋm wa sẽn segde.
La zaabr sasa, manwallã lebg n waame, la ade, b mikame t'a yãka oliiv tɩɩg vãoog n zãad a noorẽ. Dẽ, a Nowe bãngame tɩ koomã yõbga dũniyã zugu. A Nowe leb n yaasa rasem a yopoe n paase, n yaool n leb n bas manwallã t'a yi. La wallã ka lebg n wa yẽnda nengẽ yɛs ye. 
Wãoorã leok-a lame: « Dẽ pa yell ye. Rõogã sẽn be kʋl-kasenga sʋkã woma biisi. Bool-a n tʋm t’a kẽng n tɩ yãk rõogã bil n wa ne, a sã n tõdg bɩ f maan-a wa f sẽn date. » La naaba sɩd boola a Ka-yelle n tʋme.
Polɩɩs Minisipallã paga baar dãmb kẽer Waogdgo.
Ne neba tagsgo, SIDAwã bãag yõkda ned wãn wãna ? Dẽ yĩnga b tẽedame tɩ bãaga tõe n tɩpame bii ? Wãn wãn to ? Lohorom beeme tɩ neba gom b pãnkomsema yell bii ?
La a Nowe paama Sẽn-Ka-Saab nimbãan-zoeere. A Nowe koom koglg maanego A Nowe yagensã la woto. A Nowe zamaanã neb fãa sʋka, yẽnda rag n yaa nin-tɩrga, n yaa burkĩna. A Nowe rag n tũuda Wẽnnaam. 
Dẽ yĩnga, Wẽnnaam sɩd tõe n zĩnda dũniyã zug la? Yĩngr ne a yalmã, a ka tõe n deeg yãmb a Wẽnnaam ye. Dẽ, roog ning mam sẽn me wã na n maana a wãn n tõog n deeg yãmba? Woto yĩngã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam Wẽnnaam, bɩ y wʋm mam sẽn yaa y tʋmtʋmdã pʋʋsgã, ne m kosgã, la y kelg m sẽn kelemd n boond yãmb rũndã wã. 
F sã n pa tõe n zomb f ba tɩɩga, bɩ f kolg n sɩɩs-a
A Ãminat sɩngame tɩ na n sɛgl maasem buud toor toore la a lebg zãmsga ne moore sẽn na n sõng neba zãmsega wakate.
Dẽ, a Moyiis yiime n seg a rɛɛmbã, n wõgemd a taoore, la a mok-a. La bãmb soka taab kibare, la b tũ taab n kẽ a Moyiis fu-roogẽ wã. 
 La, a pagã sɩd vaaga baag bɛndã, n lobe.
Soaala Zezi Krista Ba paam pẽgre! B nimbãan-zoeer n waooge tɩ b le kõ-d vɩm paalga, ne a Zezi Krista sẽn vʋʋg kɩɩms sʋka. Bãmb yĩng la y vɩ la y saagdẽ, tɩ y na paam n dɩ b yõod sẽn kõn sɛ, sẽn kõn wooge menga, b sẽn bĩng yãmb b arzãnẽ. 
La gese, mam mengã bee ne foom. Mam na n gũu foom zĩig ning fãa fo sẽn na n kẽnge, la mam na n talla foom n lebg n wa soolem-kãngã pʋga. Bala, mam ka na n tol n bas foom ye, mam na n pidsa bũmb ning mam sẽn yeel foomã.» 
Baas neer sãoa sɩng neere.
Kɩpar-n-koaasa, kɩpar n leood a nini
Bãmbã me sẽn wυm dẽ, b vaaga b sor n tar yõarg n dabd mogrẽ wã, n nan tι lob a Yamyιιda.
Zõang land ka tabd noor a yiib ye
Maan fu-lillidg ne gĩs sẽn yaa miuug masɩ, la sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, ne gĩs-moaama la gĩs-miidu, ne lamd gĩs-bãanegã, tʋʋm-mitbã sẽn maandã, fu-roogã noor yĩnga. La f maan akasiya ra-lugds a nu fu-lillidgã yĩnga, n lud-b ne sãnem, n ning sãnem yagendsã b zutu. La f rõog zũud nao a nu bãmb yĩnga.» 
Koom pida kʋɩlg n lẽngdẽ , yẽedb laada, la zĩm-bi ka laad ye
Bɩ ned ba a ye da bao sẽn manegd a meng ye; a bao sẽn manegd a taaba. tɩ tẽnga ne a pʋgẽ teed fãa yaa Soaalã n so. 
Soolmã kombɛɛmb piig la a yiibã ned kam fãa n dag n dɩlgd rĩm a Salmo ne neb nins sẽn dɩt na-yirã kiuug fãa, la b ka basd tɩ bũmb paoog ye. Kombɛɛmbã dag n baooda koodo, la yamdo, wiidã, la wed-kɩɩmbã yĩnga, n tall n kẽng n tɩ bĩng zĩig ning rĩmã sẽn be wã, la ned kam fãa maanda wa sẽn zems a tʋʋmde. 
Ned rogda biig la f pa rogd a zʋug ye
Mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo yagensã fɩɩge n lebg wʋsg wa yĩngr ãdse. Mam na n kõo fo yagensã tẽn-bãmbã fãa. La dũniyã nebã fãa na n paama bark fo yagensã zug maasem yĩnga. Woto kɩtame t'a Izak kell n pa Geraar tẽnga. 
Kũun-kãngã, yaa sẽn kẽed neFfõndasẽo wã sẽn yãk yam n na n sõngd neb sẽn wat n vʋɩ-b naong pʋgẽ.
A zãmboɛɛg land kɩglemd kõ n zok tẽnga.
A Zʋʋda ne a Tamaar kibare. Wakat-kãnga, a Zʋʋda zãagame n bas a ba-biisã n kẽng Adulam tẽng rao a yembr yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Ira nengẽ. 
 Tɩ b rɩk n kõ-a t’a reeg n vole.  
Ra rõog kut bõn-naandg baa a yembre tɩ yɩ fo wẽnnaam ye. Maan bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll tigrã. Rɩ bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll dasem a yopoe b sẽn yãk bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuugã pʋgẽ wã, wa mam sẽn yeel foomã. Bala, yaa bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuugã pʋgẽ la fo yi Ezɩpt tẽngã. 
Yãmb tẽnga pʋga, neb kẽer beeme n tõe n kõ rao-sãmb la kompugli  kuuni, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n paam n gãand-ba.
La, m ba Katr me, zĩnda boka pʋga, n kok n lebs n puus-ba.
Sɛbã sʋka, a Daabo Bukari la a Wʋsmaan Gɩɩrʋ sɛbã naaga sʋka.
 «Yaa fũugã n liib maam».
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ b kot nin-buiidã tɩ b kõ-b sɩda, tɩ bala yaa bũmb nins fãa sẽn sõngd tẽngã t’a kẽnd taoor la bãmb rata.
Rẽ poore, a kos-b lame tɩ b kell n gãd taab nus la b sak n tʋm ne sodaasã, la b sak n pʋɩt b bãngrã ne neb nins b sẽn nan na n yãk tɩ b wa naag tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ wã̃.
Ned ka be zakẽ ka, n yaa nin-kãseng n yɩɩd maam ye. La m soaalã ka gɩdg maam ne bũmb baa a yembre, sã n ka foom bala. Bala fo yaa bãmb paga. Rẽ wã, mam na n yɩɩ a wãn n maan yel-be-kẽen-kãngã n beeg Wẽnnaam?» 
La, sẽn wa n beẽ n beẽ, kinkirg n lebg pʋg-neere, n wa rɩk-a n maan a sɩda, tɩ b be ne taaba. 
La a Moyiis peesa kug-wals a yiib sẽn zems wa pĩnd-dãmbã. La yibeoog pĩnda, yẽnda zãa kug-wals a yiibã a nugẽ n dʋ Sinayi tãngã zug wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel yẽnda wã. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab siga sawaodgã pʋgẽ n yals beenẽ ne yẽnda. Yẽnda pʋʋsa ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋre. 
A Moyiis rʋʋ tãngã n kẽng Wẽnnaam nengẽ. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab zĩnda tãngã zug n bool a Moyiis n yeele: «Ad bũmb ning fo sẽn na n togs a Zakoob buudã. Ad fo sẽn na n wilg Israyɛll yagensã bũmb ninga: 
Bɩ mam da kẽes m toog bãmb yellẽ ye.  Mam kõn tol n paam yam a yembr ne bãmb b tiging pʋgẽ ye. Bala, bãmb sũ-puugrã pʋga, b kʋʋ nebã, la bãmb maana pʋ-toog n pas niig nao-gĩina. Bɩ kãab-wẽng paam bãmb sũ-puugrã,  bala, yaa nen-keglem tʋʋmde. La m kãabd bãmb sũ-yikrã, bala, a yaa nin-kʋʋre. Mam na n weela bãmb a Zakoob kambã sʋka, la m na n kɩtame tɩ b sãeeg n kẽ Israyɛll buudã sʋka. 
Karensaamba yeel yaa: “Wakat bilf zugĩ, “bãaga bil” sɩngame tɩ  lebg wʋsgo.” “Bãaga bila” a yiib soab waame tɩ b naag taab n kʋ  “Sodaasã” a yembr t’a lʋɩ tẽnga.
Ned kʋʋd-a-ma-bʋʋga, n zãms sɩɩbo.
 La, a sã n wa raag fãa, b bee ne taaba.
A Adoniza sẽn dag n bool neb ninsã fãa yɛɛsame n digda. La ned kam fãa yikame n dɩk a sor n teese. La b kẽng n tɩ togs a Salmo n yeele: «Ade, a Adoniza kẽng n tɩ gãda tẽn-kugrã yɩɩl n yeele: Bɩ rĩm a Salmo wẽen dũndã tɩ yẽnda ka na n kʋ a tʋmtʋmdã ye.» 
Nin-kẽem tʋʋd la a yẽta
A boola Burkĩna Faso yagsã tɩ b gãd taab nus n tʋm ne taaba, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n tʋm tɩ laafɩ lebg n wa nin-sabls tẽns nins sẽn be zu-loees pʋgã.
Sã n yaa ne a Gaade, tãb-bi-sull n na n  tigim n zab ne yẽnda, la yẽnda na n tõog-b lame n dig-ba! Sã n yaa ne a Asɛɛre, yẽnda tẽngã  bõn-koaadlã na n woma biis wʋsgo. Yẽnda na n yãka rɩ-nood n kõ rĩm-dãmba. 
Tẽngã taoor soab ratame tɩ noy nins b sẽn na n dɩk tigsgã pʋgẽ wã, bɩ welgr buud ba a ye, ra tol n zĩndi, la b rɩk noy sẽn na n zemes ne nin-buiidã raabo.
B maana ra-bɩlemd ning sẽn na n zĩnd sʋkã n pɩʋʋg ra-pegdã fãa sẽn sɩng ne lalgã noor a yembre, hal tɩ ta a noor a to wã. B wʋga fu-lillidg ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miidu, la lamd gĩs-bãanega, yẽnda maan-a-la wa tʋʋm-mit sẽn maande, n gʋl serubẽ-rãmb a zugu. 
A Ãdem bãnga a pag a Hawa, la a rɩka pʋg n dog biig n pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Kayẽ. Pagã yeelame: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sõnga maam tɩ m dog raoa.» Rẽ zugẽ, yẽnda roga a Kayẽ yao a Abɛlle. La a Abɛll lebga rũm-kɩɩmda rũm-bãoonego, t'a Kayẽ yaa ka-koaada. 
La ra-bɩlemd ning sẽn na n zĩnd-a sʋkã na n pɩʋʋga ra-pegdã fãa sẽn sɩng ne lalga noor kɩreng a yembre, n tãag a noor a to wã. Bɩ f bolg ra-pegdã ne sãnem. La f maan sãnem tuiids sẽn yaa gils ra-bɩlmã yĩnga. La f bolg ra-bɩlmã ne sãnem. 
A Arpaksaad sẽn wa n tar yʋʋm pis-tã la a nu, a roga a Sela. A Hebɛɛr dogma zugẽ, a Sela vɩɩmda yʋʋm kobs-naas la a tãabo, la a roga kom-dibli, la kom-pugli. 
Noor tooll pa zɩɩb n yaad ned ye
B kell n yãk a Mikayilu SIDBE, t’a reeg a Yakuba DIYE zagsã la tẽngã meeb ministɛɛrẽ.
Rɩ-n-ka-namse,yaa ki-n-ka-bẽ.
Rĩm a Salmo sẽn me Wẽnd doogã n sɛ, a kɩtame tɩ b bao sɛɛdr ra-paads ne ra-lugdsi, n lud a yĩngrã fãa. Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Salmo n yeel-a yaa: 
 T’a pʋʋse, tɩ gãeengã leok-a.
 Tɩ b naabã sok-a : «Fo sẽn dog tɛka, fo rɩɩ kũum ne dasãare ?»
Kell n yɩɩ yʋʋm 2019 soabã, la a yãk yam n dɩk yɩɩl nins b sẽn da yɩɩnd Wẽnd dotã pʋsẽ yʋʋm 1900 soabã n lebg n yɩɩl-ba.
B maana naoã tɩ yaa wa saar nao. B gãtsã ne b zãnt-rãmbã  ne b reyõ-rãmbã,  n paas b moyo-rãmbã  fãa maana ne kutu. La terokã zugu, tẽgdg sẽn yaa gilg n dag n be be, t'a zãntlmã zems kãntɩɩg pʋɩ-sʋka. La terokã zugu, b naaga tebendsã ne a kud-paklsã n yõge. 
Maan-y tãnd tẽn-kugr mam yĩnga. Yãk-y y rũm-bãoonegã ne y rũm-bɛdã n maan maand sẽn yõogd bugum ne zems-n-taar maoong a zugu. La zĩig ning fãa mam sẽn na n kɩt tɩ nebã tẽeg mam yʋʋrã yellã, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ n wa ning yãmb zug barka. 
Madiyã tẽng maan-kʋʋdã rag n tara kom-pugli a yopoe. La bãmb waame n na n toog koom n ning kogendẽ wã n yũnug b ba wã rũmsi. Bãmb sẽn lebg n kẽng b ba a Rehuwɛll nengẽ, yẽnda soka bãmb yaa: «Maana a wãn tɩ yãmb lebg n wat tao-tao a woto rũndã?» 
Rẽ la a Yamyιιd na n yeel naaba : Ad yaa rẽ sẽn pa tõe wa, la m ma me sẽn pa na n tõog : tι kazẽegã lebg kae rũndã, t’a kõg rãam zĩig pugẽ wã. Naab sẽn wυm dẽ, a tυmame tι b tι reeg kazẽegã n wa.
Nebã yalsa yɩɩga. La a Moyiis kolga sawad-taokã, zĩig ning Wẽnnaam sẽn be wã. 
Nong n sõs roodame
 La, b naaga taab n tar kẽna marsã.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Faarõ ka na n kelg yãmb goamã ye. La yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ mam leb n maan bõn-yɛɛsds a taab n yɩlem Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋga.» A Moyiis ne a Aarõ rag n maana bõn-yɛɛsds-kãens fãa Faarõ taoore. Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ Faarõ keng a sũuri, n ka sak n bas Israyɛll nebã tɩ b yi a tẽngẽ wã n loog ye. 
 La gãeenga yeel-a lame : «Fo pa ne toɛɛgã sẽn be taoorã sɩda ? »
Nong-m zaalem sẽn be zĩig ningã,kis-m-zaalem bee be.
Sã n mikame tɩ b rɩka noor n wilg tɩ b na n sõng neb nins sẽn paam zu-loeesã, rẽndame tɩ b mao tɩ noorã paam pidsgu.
Mam na n kɩtame tɩ Ezɩpt nebã nong nin-kãensã. Yãmb sã n wa na n looge, y ka na n loog zaalem ye. Pag fãa na n kos a yaka, ne pag ning sẽn be yẽnda zakẽ wã wanzuri teed ne sãnem teedo, la futu, tɩ y yeelg y kom-dibli wã ne y kom-pugli wã. Yaa woto la yãmb na n pɩɩs Ezɩpt nebã paoongã. 
Yẽ mii n watame n get a Poko; a yao n minim n tũud-a n watẽ.
A wilgame tɩ tẽngã beoog neer bee ned kam fãa nugẽ, la zu-bʋkã, neb wʋsg pa rɩk tẽngã sẽn vʋɩ nug ningã tɩ ya b zuloees ye.
Kell n yɩɩ wakat me, b sẽn dɩk bug-vɩlens 12 n kɩs kom-bɩɩb tɩ b paas n yãag tẽngã taoor soaba.
Yɛla taab n kete, la ka Soaala n gomd ye, yaa maam: saam-biig sã n tar paga sẽn nan ka tar tẽebo la sẽn sak n na n zĩnd ne-a, bɩ a ra yiis-a ye. 
La Faarõ bõn-yũudlã wamd dag n bee mam nugẽ. La mam dɩka reezẽ-gĩnã n wẽk a koomã n ning Faarõ bõn-yũudlã wamdẽ, n dɩk wamdã n kɩs Faarõ t'a reege.» A Zozɛf yeela yẽnda yaa: «Ad yãmb zãmsdã bilgri: Wil a tãabã wilgda rasem a tãabo. 
Warb ka neer paka a gẽtba
Karensaamba yeel yaa: “Mẽooga yõk a Abdu.” Ned ninga  sẽn tara “Mẽooga” bãnda kẽ tẽn-sʋka n zab ne sodaasa wakat bilifu, tɩ sodaasa wa lob-a yɩnga.
La a Moyiis ne a Aarõ kẽnga Faarõ nengẽ n tɩ maan wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel bãmbã. A Aarõ loba a rasaarã tẽng Faarõ ne a tʋmtʋmdbã fãa taoore, la rasaarã lebga waafo. La Faarõ me boola yam dãmba ne tɩtã-rãmbã. Dẽ, Ezɩpt tɩtã-rãmb me maana woto ne bãmb tɩɩmã. 
Moog pa yit zĩ-peen-daagẽ ye
La pagã sẽn ta roogã noore, a Akiya wʋma a naoã rãamd n yeel-a yaa: «A Zeroboaam paga, wa kẽ wɛ. Yaa bõe tɩ f solgd f meng n ka rat tɩ b bãng tɩ yaa foom? Fo sẽn maaneg me, b tʋma maam tɩ m togs-f koe-beedo. Lebg n kẽng n tɩ yeel a Zeroboaam tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yeetame: ‹Fo rag n yaa nin-zaalg n be Israyɛll nebã sʋka, tɩ mam sẽn zẽk foom n kɩt tɩ f lebg Israyɛll nebã naaba. 
Baorgã peebg rãamd rag n paasdame. A Moyiis gomdame tɩ Wẽnnaam leokd yẽnda ne sa-kɛlenga. Sẽn-Ka-Saab siga Sinayi tãngã zugu. Sẽn-Ka-Saab boola a Moyiis t'a wa tãngã zugu. La a Moyiis rʋʋ tãngã. 
Wẽnnaam boonda tõnd tɩ d tal yam. Wẽnnaam Sebra pʋga, B wiligda  tõnd d sẽn tõe n vɩɩnd toto tɩ SIDAwã bãag bil da yõk-do wala tɩ tõnd  maasem yĩng bɩ a bila da yõk neb a tãab ye.
Gomd gomda ne pagd tɩ sẽn tara yam wek
Yaa woto tι nebã mi n yetẽ tι kιιb rιt medga, tι Wẽnd pund bιιm.
Yaa no-rɩkds 27 n be sebr ning b sẽn gʋlsã pʋgẽ.
«Sã n yaa m ba ne m ma n da foo n kõ maam, bɩ f ra sak tɩ yãnd paam maam ye».
Rogem daar pa yãnd ye
Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ Ezɩpt nebã nand Israyɛll nebã, la Ezɩpt nebã kõo bãmb bũmb nins b sẽn kosã. Dẽ, bãmb reesa Ezɩpt nebã sẽn dag n tarã fãa. 
Pipi kiuugã rasem piig la a naasã daar zaabre, yãmb na n dɩta bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle, n tãag a rasem pisi la a yembrã daar zaabre. Rasem a yopoe tõre, b ka tog n yãnd rã-bɩll yãmb dotẽ wã ye. Bala, ned ning fãa sẽn na n dɩ-a bur sẽn ning rã-bɩlle, b na n yiisa a soab Israyɛll buudã neb sʋk n kʋ, sã n yaa sãana, wall tẽng-n-neda. 
 B sẽn wa n pas-a n sa, b kõo biig pʋ-bilã, t’a tɩ lob bok pʋga.
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kʋdrã rɩka kũumã n palg bõangã n tall n kuili. Nin-kẽemã talla kũumã n kuil Betɛll n na n tɩ yãb a kʋʋrã la a mum-a. A sẽn mum kũumã n sɛ, a yeela a kambã yaa: «Mam sã n wa n ki, bɩ y mum maam n naag Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã. Gãneg-y maam n yegl a kõabã. 
Saag sã n nag noaaga, mitb n daad-a
Rɩk bãmb n sagl peoog a yembr pʋgẽ n tall n wa. La f tall loalgã ne pe-raad a yiibã n wa. La f rɩk futã n yeelg a Aarõ. Yeelg yẽnda maan-kʋʋr fuugã fu-bilã, la maan-kʋʋr fuugã, ne yãoog lutgã, n dɩk maan-kʋʋr fuugã sẽbdg n sẽbg n naag ne a mengã. 
Ministɛɛrã tʋm-tʋmdb zĩnda ne taab n  gom buudã goam taoor kẽng yelle.
Tẽngã taoor soab ratame tɩ noy nins b sẽn na n dɩk tigsgã pʋgẽ wã, bɩ welgr buud ba a ye, ra tol n zĩndi, la b rɩk noy sẽn na n zemes ne nin-buiidã raabo.
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sũur puuga ne a Moyiisi, la b yeelame: «Fo ba-biig a Aarõ sẽn yaa Leevi buudã nedã ka be la? Mam miime tɩ yẽnda tõe n goma naana-naana. Ade, yẽnda wat n na n sega foom. La yẽnda sã n yãnd foom, a sũur na n yɩɩ noogo. 
La Israyɛll nebã rɩɩ mandã hal tɩ ta yʋʋm pis-naase, hal n wa n ta tẽng neb sẽn be. Bãmb dɩɩ mandã hal n ta wakat ning bãmb sẽn ta Kana soolmã toadgẽ wã. Wam-makdgã noor piig yaa peoog a yembre. 
Zĩig sẽn wa n maag zãnga, soaamb dιka sor n fιιndẽ la a kuiisẽ. A sẽn wa n ta katr sẽn da be zĩig ningã, katr yeka lame, n modg-a t'a rυ tιιga, n yeel-a t'a kao raad n wa t'a sẽ-a. Sẽn maand n be bι ? Tι soaamb sιd dυ n tar raadã kaoobo.
Nif yãab ka rɩɩb tɩ baag gãe kom ye.
Bɛt-Markabote, Atsaar-Susim, Bɛt-Bireyi, ne Saarayim. Yaa tẽn-bãmb pʋs la bãmb zĩnd hal n tãag a Davɩɩd rĩungã wakate, n paas ne tẽn-bãooneg nins sẽn dag n karg n gũbg tẽn-kãensã, hal n tãag Baalle. Tẽms nins bãmb sẽn zĩndã, ne b buudã neb nins yʋy sẽn be sõadgã sɛb pʋsẽ wã la woto. 
Kẽega, Pondr ne Gomtɩʋʋgo
Yãmb yõ-bogdã pemsem kɩtame  tɩ koomã yiki. Koomã wa n sama taaba. Ko-zoetem yalsa yĩngr wa lalga. Ko-kãsengã zĩ-zulums koom gĩsa ko-kãsengã sʋka.» 
Tẽngã taoor soab tũnuga be n wilg miniisr dãmbã tɩ bũmb ning sẽn ya zu-loɛɛg tɩ b segd n deng n gese, yaa yõ-koglgã.
Yãmb sãn n dɩk a wamdã bɩ a laagã n yõng koom n yũ ? (Ayo)
La yẽnda yãnda bulg sẽn be pʋʋg pʋga, tɩ rũm-kʋʋng sul a tãab sẽn yaa rũm-bãooneg gũm bulgã sɛɛga. Bala, rag n yaa bulgẽ be la b wat n yũnugd rũmsã. La mikame tɩ kugr ninga b sẽn tar n pagd bulgã noorã yaa bedr wʋsgo. 
Maan laase, la wũmbli, ne tʋgdo, la laas maandã pʋdgr yĩnga. Maan bãmb ne sãnem halaale. Fo na n dogla burã b sẽn kõt maamã taabl ning sẽn be mam taoorã zug wakat fãa. 
Yãmb tẽnga rãmb sãn n bãng tɩ ned  tara SIDAwã bãaga, ned a to tõe n tɩ ges-a  la me bii? Bõe yĩng tɩ toẽ wala ka toẽ?
Toog a nii soaba: Sʋyã. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Kẽng Faarõ nengẽ, bala, yaa maam n kɩt tɩ yẽnda ne a tʋmtʋmdbã sũy kenge, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ mam bõn-yɛɛsdsã puk bãmb sʋka. 
Kedmot ne a kɩremsã, n paas Mefaat ne a kɩremsã. Hɛsbon ne a kɩremsã, la Yazɛɛr ne a kɩremsã. 
Sʋʋg pa wãag a tãoogo, a pa wãagd bũmb ye
·  A soaba pãnga satame t’a wagend wʋsgo.
Bãmb ba a Efrayiim yãba b kʋʋr n kaoos wʋsgo, la a ba-biisã waame n na n bels a sũuri. A Efrayiim doga bi-pugl me, t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Seera. A Seera n me Bɛt-Horon sẽn be longẽ wã, ne Bɛt-Horon sẽn be tãmsã zĩisẽ wã, la Uuzen-Seera. 
Bala, beoog sẽn da vẽeg fãa, wẽngã tara taoor kẽnde.
Nebã fãa rag n nee sawad-taokã sẽn sigd n yals sɛk roogã rignoorẽ wã. Dẽ, bãmb yikdame, tɩ ned kam fãa wõgemd a fu-roog noore. Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n gomda ne a Moyiis neng ne neng wa ned sẽn gomd ne a zoa. La a Moyiis sã n wa lebg n lebd sik zĩigẽ wã, bi-bɩɩg a Zozoe sẽn yaa yẽnda sõangda, n yaa a Nun biigã ka yit fu-roogẽ wã ye. 
Y sã n tõe n sak tɩ m maan wa gãeeng bɩ y sak waare! La rabeem tar-m lame, m zoeta y na n wa maan wa a Awa sẽn sak waafa sɩlem goama, tɩ y sũya wa rẽgem, tɩ y sãam y pʋ-peelem ne Krista. 
F tõe tɩ baag gãand la f pa tõe t'a mum a nin ye
 A sẽn ta a yiri, a yeela a pagã : «Vaag baag bɛndã, n lob tãmpʋʋrẽ, tɩ rɩ-bɛd waame».
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Ade, mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo yɩ wa wẽnnaam Faarõ nifẽ. La fo saam-biig a Aarõ na n yɩɩ fo no-rɛɛsa. Fo na n togsa yẽnda bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn na n yeel foomã. Fo saam-biig a Aarõ na n goma ne Faarõ t'a bas Israyɛll nebã tɩ b yi yẽnda tẽngẽ wã. 
Wẽnnaam leb n yeelame: «Bɩ bõn-vɩɩs buud toor-toor zĩnd dũniyã zugu. Yaa yir dũmsi, bõn-vuudsi, la we-rũmsi, bãmb fãa, buud toor-toore.» La a yɩɩ woto. 
Yaa rẽ n so, tɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã pʋgẽ, sẽn sigl-b tʋʋmdã seg kiba-kɩtbã Waogdgo, SIYAWO wã zak pʋg n wilg-ba, b sẽn paam yãagr ninga.
Ned na n maana a wãn n bãng tɩ SIDAwã bãag bil tar-a  lame?
Ned kam zagem sẽn dũmẽ yaa
Kũum sã n kʋ n nan pa kʋ f bẽya, a nan pa kʋ ye
Sigr kiuug yʋʋm 2022, CEDEAO rãmb penga Burkĩna Faso kood sẽn ta toand 6579 la zaka, yɩɩ kamaana, mui, la ki.
Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor soab paama sɛk ne Nasẽo zini sullã seb-gʋnd-kasenga.
A Sɩmyõ buudã neb kobs-nu me rag n kẽnga Seyɩɩr soolem ning sẽn be tãms sʋkã. A Yiseyi kom-dibli wã n dag n yaa bãmb taoor dãmba: yaa a Pelatiya, a Neyariya, la a Refaya ne a Uziyɛlle. Bãmb kʋʋ Amalɛk yagens nins sẽn dag n põsã, la b reeg b tẽngã n zĩnd be hal tɩ ta rũndã. 
A Pok yãka yam tɩ yẽ me na n tũu nindaare.
A Hiram sẽn wʋm rĩm a Salmo sẽn gom goam ninsã, a sũurã yɩɩ noog wʋsgo, la a yeelame yaa: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋrã paam pẽgr rũndã daarã, bãmb sẽn kõ a Davɩɩd bi-ribl sẽn tar yam a woto t'a na n soog bu-kãsen-kãngã wã yĩnga.» A Hiram tʋmame tɩ b tɩ yeel a Salmo yaa: «Yãmb sẽn tʋm tɩ b wa togs maam koɛɛg ningã ta-m lame, la m na n maana bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn date. Yaa sẽn kẽed ne sɛɛdr tɩɩsã ne sɩprɛs tɩɩsã raad wɛɛngẽ wã. 
A Zozɛf sẽn yãnd a Benzame sẽn tũ bãmb n wa wã, a yeela a zakã naab yaa: «Tall nin-bãmb n tɩ kẽes mam zakẽ wã, la f bao rũms n kʋ n segle, tɩ mam na n dɩɩ ne bãmb rũndã!» Raoã maana wa a Zozɛf sẽn yeelã, n tall-b n kẽng a Zozɛf yirã. 
A Bɛn-Hadaad kug-zĩidbã yeel-a lame yaa: «Tõnd wʋmame tɩ b yetẽ tɩ Israyɛll rĩm-dãmbã tara nimbãan-zoeer wʋsgo. Rẽ wã yĩnga, wa-y tɩ d sẽgen sũ-sãang futu, la d loe d zutã ne tãando, n yi n kẽng Israyɛll rĩmã nengẽ, tɩ daar ninga, a na bas yãmb n ka kʋ-y ye.» 
Wẽnd bɛ ka Wẽnd meng ye.
B ka tog n dɩk ka-kãngã n sõog ned yaar ye. La yãmb ka tog n maan kaam sẽn wẽnd ka-kãng buudu, wa sẽn zems teed nins yãmb sẽn tall n maan-a wã ye. Ka-kãng yaa bũmb sẽn welg toore, la a na n yɩɩ bũmb sẽn welg toor yãmb yĩnga. 
Kug nins b sẽn tall n yẽbg roogã rag n yaa kug-neeba, n yaa bɛda. Kug kẽer woglem yaa kãntɩɩg piig-piiga, tɩ kẽer yaa kãntɩɩg a nii-nii. B mee zag-kãsengã lalg ne kug-bɛd ruls a tãab sẽn dogl taaba, ne sɛɛdr tɩɩs raad rulg a yembre, tɩ kell n yaa wa zak ning sẽn be pʋgẽ n gũbg Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã ne a noorẽ doogã sẽn me to-to wã. 
Boto, wilgdame tɩ b fãa yaa Burkĩna kamba.
Bi-kãng na n yɩɩ wa we-bõanga,  yẽnda na n zabda ne nebã fãa, la nebã fãa na n zabda ne yẽnda, La yẽnda na n vɩɩmda toor ne a ba-biisã fãa.» A Agaar pʋda Wẽnnaam ning sẽn gom ne yẽndã wã yʋʋr tɩ: Ata-Ɛll-Royi. Sẽn dat n yeele: «Bãmb yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn ne maam!» Bala, a yeelame: «Mam yãnda bãmb n ket n vɩ.» 
Miniisrã paasame tɩ b sã n tõog n kõ zĩis nins a sẽn wilgã, a na n sõngame tɩ neb nins sẽn zoe n bas b tẽnsã tõog n paam tʋʋma.
La Sẽn-Ka-Saab maana wa a Moyiis sẽn kosã. Kɛooda wã loogame n bas Faarõ ne a poorẽ dãmbã la a nebã. Keoodr baa a ye ka kell ye. La wakat-kãngã, Faarõ leb n kenga a sũur n ka bas nebã tɩ b loog ye. 
A Pok da ka wʋmd a gomda võor ye. Dẽ, a Pok tagsame yaa: “Sidawã bãaga ka tar m baaba ye; bɩ boẽ?“ A zorãmba yeel-a lame yaa: “Ra kelg-a ye; bas-a.“
Nin yend pa wʋrd wobg yamd ye
Karen-saamba Zãmbatiis BÕNTOOG roga zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 1963 soabã, Goe sẽn be Lʋmbil Kominda pʋgẽ.
Nin-bãmb ka tʋʋm-tʋmdb akɩk ye, yaa rɩ baoodb sẽn belg tɩ b yaa Krista tʋʋm-tʋmdba. M le yet-y lame, da mams-y maam wa gãeeng ye; la rẽ sã n noom-y bɩ y bas tɩ m sɩd yɩ gãeenga n tõog n maan wakr bilfu. 
La d sã n gomd b yelle, ka ne goam biis d sẽn zãms ninsaal nengẽ ye, yaa ne Wẽnd Vʋʋsem tɩ bãmb n tar yĩngr goam biisi n na n puk yĩngr yɛla. 
Sẽn na n yɩlẽ, tɩ b raabã paam pidsgu, gosneem rɩka koob la gʋʋlg teedo, la teed a taab n kõ-ba.
 Tɩ biigã zĩẽ n zĩẽ, n wa kelme, n yeele : «Pʋg-yãanga, m kota zẽedo!»
Dẽ, Faarõ kɩtame tɩ b tɩ bool a Moyiisi, la yẽnda yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Yãmb tõe n kẽng n tɩ waooga Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. La y rũm-bɛdã ne y rũm-bãoonegã ka na n tũ yãmb ye. Yaa yãmb zakã rãmb bal n tõe n tũ yãmb n looge.» 
Bãmb yaa a Zakoob kamb nins a Rasɛll sẽn dogã. Bãmb fãa yaa neb piig la a naase. Bãmb yaa a Bila kamba. A Bila yaa bi-pugl ning a Labã sẽn dag n dɩk n kõ a bi-pugl a Rasɛllã. A Rasɛll kambã fãa yaa neb a yopoe. 
Goam n sat goam
Nug yend ka wʋkd zom ye
Yɩng baag sã n wa zãad kõbre,zakẽ n baag n yi ne-a.
Rigno-gũudbã ne b sula. Rigno-gũudbã sul nebã yʋy la woto:  Koore buudã pʋga, yaa a Koore biig a Meselemiya sẽn yaa a Azaf yagensã sʋk ned a yembrã. naasẽ soabã yaa a Yatiniyɛlle, nu soabã yaa a Elam, yoobẽ soabã yaa a Yohanan, tɩ yopoe soabã yaa a Eliyoenayi. 
Peendã fãa woglem tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg pisi la a nii, la a yalmã tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg a naase. Pɛɛlã yalem ne b woglmã fãa tog n zemsa taaba. Bɩ y bogl a pɛɛl a nu ne taaba, la y bogl a nu wã sẽn ketã me ne taaba. 
Sũud bogd wʋsg n dag n be Sidim longã pʋga, la Sodom dĩmã ne Gomoor dĩma zoeeme n tɩ lʋɩ bog-bãmb pʋse. La neb nins sẽn ket-bã zoeeme n tees tãngã sẽnẽ. Neb nins sẽn tõog bãmbã wʋka Sodom ne Gomoor nebã paoongã ne b rɩɩbã n tall n looge. 
Gʋls Israyɛll buudã yʋy onigs kug a yiib zut ne kɩtga. Gʋls yʋy a yoob kugr a ye zugu, la f gʋls yʋy a yoobã me kugr a to zug wa sẽn zems kãsem pʋgdg-pʋgdga. 
Daar a yembre, yʋn-yɛng pʋgẽ, Ezɩpt rĩmã bõn-yũudl kɩtã ne a rɩɩbã yel-gɛtã sẽn dag n be bi-bees roogã, zãmsa zãmsdo. La ned kam fãa zãmsd yaa toore, t'a bilgrã me yaa toore. La vẽkembeoog yibeoogo, a Zozɛf waa bãmb nengẽ, la a mikame tɩ bãmb nensã gãnemame. 
A Zozɛf kɩtame tɩ b yãk rɩɩbã yẽndã taoorã n kõ-ba, la b kõo a Benzame n yɩɩg bãmb fãa rẽndã naoor a nu. Bãmb naaga a Zozɛf n yũ n tɩg tɩ b nensã yilme. 
Kʋlg yɛgb são tãng yɛgbo.
Yυυm wa n loogame. T’a Yamyιιd zẽk bιυυngo, n sing  zoet n deemd ne a taaba. T’a ba rãmb mi n tυm-a, t’a ya lomb-lomb-lombe, n kẽnd la a watẽ. Talla woto t’a yυυrã wa lυι  tẽngã naab tυbrẽ. Tι naab sũurã yiki.
La Faarõ goma ne a Zozɛf n yeele: «Ad fo sẽn na n yeel f kẽem-dãmbã tɩ b maan bũmb ninga: Yeel-b tɩ b tɩ zɩlg b bõensã, n yik n kẽng Kana tẽnga, 
Ad yaa yã kom n zãms bagre
 «Yãmb basa rɩɩbo, n digd maam zaalem ».
Rĩm a Akaab sokame: «Na n tũu ne ãnda nug tɩ d paam tõogre?» La no-rɛɛsã leokame tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame: «Yaa soda-kom-bɩɩsã soolem nanambsã sẽn yãkã, la mam na n tũnug n kɩt tɩ y tõoge.» Rĩm a Akaab sokame: «Ãnda n tog n deng n sɩng zabrã?» No-rɛɛsã leb n leokame: «Yaa yãmba!» Woto, Israyɛll rĩm a Akaab tigma soda-kom-bɩɩsã n sõde, la b sõorã rag n yaa neb kobessi la pis-tã la a yiibu. Dẽ poore, yẽnda tigma Israyɛll tãb-biisã fãa n sõd n mik tɩ b sõorã yaa tãb-biis tus a yopoe. 
La rulg a naasẽ soabã tog n yɩɩ ne  kirzoliti , ne  onigsi , la ne  zaspe  kuga. B na n ninga bãmb sãnem gãtsã pʋsẽ. 
Yɩɩn-yɩɩndbã ne b sula. A Davɩɩd ne a tãb-biisã nanambs welga a Azaf ne a Eman la a Yedutun kom-dibli wã toore, tʋʋmdã yĩnga. Nin-bãmb dag n yɩɩnda ne kʋl la pends ne kɛma, n togsd pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã. Neb nins sẽn dag n tar tʋʋmã yʋy la woto: A Azaf kom-dibli wã sʋka, yaa a Zakʋʋre, a Zozɛfe, a Netaniya, ne a Azareyela. Bãmb ba a Azaf n dag n lʋɩt bãmb taoor n togsd pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã, wa sẽn zems rĩmã sẽn datã. 
Kõ-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab  yʋʋrã waoogre! Tall-y kũun n wa bãmb taoore. Wõgemd-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, b sõmblmã sẽn wat n pukdẽ wã. Bɩ ko-kãsengã ne  bũmb nins fãa sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã maan dãamde! Bɩ weoogã ne bũmb nins fãa sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã kɩdme! 
Rabeem tara sẽn ka tara bʋʋm
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa mam pãnga,  la b yaa mam pãn-kãsenga, n yaa mam pẽgr yɩɩlle. Bãmb yaa mam fãagda. Bãmb yaa mam Wẽnnaam, la mam na n waooga bãmba. Bãmb yaa mam ba wã Wẽnnaam, la mam na n pẽga bãmba. 
Ka koosd bõang n da bõang ye
Wẽnd n kɩt tɩ d lebg b Zood paalga tʋʋm-tʋmda. Zooda yaool n ka zood ning sẽn tar-a a kaset sebr zuga ye, zooda yõga ne Wẽnd Vʋʋsem. Sebra waa ne kũum tɩ Vʋʋsma wat ne vɩɩm. Zood ning sẽn yõg ne Wẽnd Vʋʋsma, zood kãng Siginda ziir kõn yɩɩg sɩda? 
La f yeel-b tɩ rĩmã yeelame tɩ b kẽes rao-kãngã bi-bees roogo, la b ra kõ-a rɩɩb tɩ sã n ka bur-koeems ne koom bala, hal tɩ m kẽng la m lebg n wa ne tõogre.» Israyɛll rĩm a Akaab ne Zʋʋda rĩm a Zozafat kẽng n na n tɩ zaba ne Ramot sẽn be Galaadã. 
Rẽ wã, Wẽnnaam deegda ka-pãng soab zĩig n zabe.
A Moyiis pʋda zĩigã yʋʋr tɩ Masa, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹no-baoodem›, la Meriba, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹zabre.› Bala, Israyɛll nebã zaba ne Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, la b bao bãmb noor n yeele: «Rẽ yĩnga, Sẽn-Ka-Saab bee tõnd sʋk bɩ, bɩ b ka be?» 
La wakat-kãng tɩ Israyɛll rĩmã ne Zʋʋda rĩm a Zozafat yeelga b naam futu, tɩ b ned kam fãa zao a naam geere, n zĩ zĩ-vɩʋʋg ning sẽn pẽ Samaari tẽngã noorã, tɩ no-rɛɛsdbã fãa togsd pĩnd-n-bãngr goam bãmb taoore. No-rɛɛsdbã sʋka, no-rɛɛs a Sedesiyaas sẽn yaa a Kenana biigã rag n kɩtame tɩ b maan kut yɩɩl n kõ-a, la a yeelame: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame: Fo na n talla yɩɩn-bãmbã n tã Siiri nebã n kʋ zãnga.» 
A Akboor biig a Baall-Hanaan kiime t'a Hadaar reeg yẽnda zĩig n dɩ naam. Yẽnda tẽngã yʋʋr dag n boondame tɩ Pawu, t'a pagã yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Mehetabeyɛlle. Yẽnda yaa a Mezahaad bi-pugl a Matrɛɛd bi-pugla. 
A fulfut ka yel ye, zoe a lalla.
Dẽ wã, bɩ y sak n deeg mam kũunã mam sẽn yãk n kõt yãmbã, tɩ bala, Wẽnnaam ninga mam zug bark hal tɩ mam tar mam sẽn dat fãa.» La a Zakoob pẽdga a Ezayu hal t'a wa sak n deeg a kũunã. A Ezayu yeelame: «Yik tɩ d looge. Yik tɩ d sɩng kẽna, la maam n na n lʋɩ taoore.» 
A modg t’a sã n na n n yiis kibare, bɩ a reng n paam yellã kaseto, n yaool n dɩk-a n taas nin-buiidã.
La, ne rẽ fãa, nebã fãa sã n loogdẽ, b yetame, tɩ biigã yaoogã be neere.
Bãmb me sεga kinkirgã, la kinkirgã yãag-b lame. B sẽn wa n dabdã, kinkirgã tek n keega kυg-kẽenga, wala a sẽn maan ne a Baning la a Kazẽegã. La b sẽn tar kẽn n tar n kẽnã, b wa n tι yãnda pĩigã.
T’a kolg n na n lɩk n gese, la ned ba a ye ka be ye.
Yẽnda rɩka pagb nins sẽn tʋmd sɛk roogã noorã nin-getsã n maan zũud pekr sĩngã ne a naoã. B lugla ra-lugds pisi zũud nao pisi wã zut pɛɛlã yĩnga, la a maana ra-lugdsã yagendsã ne b bãensã ne wanzuri. 
Pipi daarã ne rasem a yopoe daarã, bɩ y maan tiging sẽn welg toore. La ned ka tog n tʋm dasem-kãens daarã, sã n ka tɩ segl rɩɩb n kõ yãmb ned kam fãa bala. 
Ssã n ya ne neb nins sẽn da yti n wilgdẽ t’a pa segd n lʋɩ ministɛɛrã taoorã, a Donasẽ Nagalo pʋʋs-b-la barka, ne rõadg ning b sẽn dɩk n dogl-a wã.
Votã pʋgẽ depite rãmbã yãka a Ousmane BOUGOUMA t’a lʋɩ b taoore.
Babilon Tigenga Wẽnd sẽn tũusi wala b sẽn tũus yãmbã tɩ b pʋʋs yãmba. Pʋʋs-y taab ne saam-biis sẽn nong taab pʋʋsgo.  Laafi zĩnd ne y fãa sẽn vɩ Krista maasmẽ! 
Ad na-kẽnda nins sẽn be sebrã pʋga: Pipi gom-zugu: na-kẽndrã zu-raado Pipi nug tikri: nand tɩ tẽngã taoor dãmb wa naag taab n zĩnd n gʋls tãrazisẽo wã zãab na-kẽndr sebre, yaa na-kẽnd-kãngã la b tik Burkĩna Faso tẽngã zãab wɛɛngẽ.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Pees kug-wals a yiib sẽn zems wa pĩnd-dãmbã. Mam na n gʋlsa m goam nins sẽn dag n be dẽenem kug-wals nins fo sẽn wã wã zutã b zugu. 
A Haran kiime t'a ba a Teera ket n vɩ, la yaa yẽnda sẽn dog tẽng ningã pʋgẽ, yaa Ʋʋr sẽn be Kalde rãmba soolmẽ wã. A Sarayi rag n yaa kiiri, n ka tar biig ye. 
M lebga Zʋɩf ne Zʋɩf rãmba, n na n paam Zʋɩf rãmba; m lebga Noora tũuda ne sẽn tũudb Noorã — la Noora tũub yaool n da ka le pak-m ye — n na n paam sẽn tũud-b Noora rãmba. 
A kell n le pʋʋsa neb nins fãa sẽn sak n zẽk b naoore, n wa naag tigsgã pʋgẽ wã.
La sapɩlmã naaga ne bugum, la Ezɩpt tẽngã kibar pʋgẽ, Ezɩpt nebã zɩ n yãnd sapɩlem a woto buud ye. 
Dẽ, a Labã ne a Betuwɛll leoka yẽnda n yeele: «Yel-kãngã yita Sẽn-Ka-Saab meng nengẽ, tõnd ka tar koɛɛg n na n yeel yãmb ye. Tõnd ka tõe n yeel tɩ n-yẽe, d ka tõe n yeel tɩ ayo. 
M sẽeg pa paood ne god sẽgeng ye 
Tɩ b na n dig-a.
Ad-y y tẽeba yĩnga, Wẽnd ne b pãnga segla y yĩnga fãagr sẽn na n puk a meng a toore yaoolem daarã. 
La a leb n dɩka pʋg yɛsa, n dog bi-ribla. La a yeelame: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab wʋmame tɩ b ka nong maam ye. Dẽ, b kõo maam bi-kãngã.» La a pʋda bi-kãng yʋʋr t'a Sɩmyõ . 
kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbẽ wã.
Ned ka yalsd bõanga, n tuk bulg ye.
La f rɩk mam wũmblã, wanzuri wũmblã n ning yao-zʋʋgã yolgẽ n naag ne a koodã ligdi.» Zak naabã maana bũmbã fãa wa a Zozɛf sẽn yeelã. La vẽkembeoogã yibeoogo, b basa nin-bãmbã tɩ b loog ne b bõensã. 
Ned sã n dɩ n tẽge, lengr lebga la-zaoko
Sã n ya Krista yʋʋr yĩng la b yaand yãmba, yãmb zug yaa noogo. Ad-y yaa Wẽnd Vʋʋsem ne b zɩiri, Wẽnd Vʋʋsem n sig yãmba. 
A Ezayu mikame t'a Izak ninga a Zakoob zug barka, la a tʋma t'a kẽng Padan-Aram n tɩ bao pag beenẽ. La a ning-a bark n yeel-a t'a ra bao Kana tẽng pʋg-sad n maan a pag ye. La a Zakoob saka a baaba ne a ma noore, la a loogame n kẽng Padan-Aram tẽnga. 
Peoog na ki m zugẽ
A Izak sẽn wa n na n peeg a Rebeka n maan a pagã t'a tara yʋʋm pis-naase. A Rebeka yaa Aram tẽng ned a Betuwɛll sẽn be Padan-Aramã bi-pugla, n yaa a Labã sẽn yaa Aram tẽng nedã tão-poaka. 
A talla woto n wa mik t’a ka na n paam-a ye, t'a maneg n fo a kalle, n na n dυ tιιgã n babs-a. A Yamne basame tι pũg-yãan-sõya ta toεεgã yĩngr, t’a yι tao-tao n sigi, n dιk a bendrã n wẽ woto:  Pimpindim pindim-pindim, pũg -yãan-wεεg yãk n lυι lυι m dιk n kõ m kẽem-dãmba, pidgim pindim.
Sapoalg kiuug rasem a 2 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor soaba, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE kẽnga Mali tẽngã taoor soaba a Asimi GOETA nengẽ, tɩ b zĩnd ne taaba, n gom tẽns a yiibã yõ-koglgã yelle.
Rẽ wã, sɩlem-wẽng soab sã n be sull pʋgẽ, sullã neb raabo, ka baasd neer ye.
Wa kamb sẽn mi sakre, lak-y y yam ne pĩnd tʋls wẽns sẽn da be y sũurẽ, y sẽn waa n da ket likĩ. tɩ yaa woto la b gʋlsyã: Yɩ-y sõma tɩ mam menga yaa sõngo. 
A silmi wãore : ka tõe n pẽ bĩisem lɩ a tõe n tus n daage.
Ka keegd pondr sãbsg n solg ye.
Bala, neb nins sẽn paam zu-loees tɩ b segd n ges b yellã sõor taa neb 600.
Fãagr kãng poorẽ, bãngdba yõka vɛɛsgo la baoobo, bãngdb niyns sẽn gom Wẽnd sẽn bĩng-y kũun ninga yelle. B baoome n na n bãng yaa wakat bʋgo la bõe taki la Krista Vʋʋsma b sẽn paama ra zoe n neẽ, bãmb sẽn waa n gomd Krista namsgã la pẽgr ning sẽn na n pʋgã. 
Yaa wakat ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã y seb-gʋnd kaseng sẽn bẽd n pʋʋs karen-saamb dãmbã, karen-biisã, la neb nins fãa sẽn kẽesd b toog kaorengã pʋgẽ wã.
Mali tẽngã taoor dãmb pa wa naag tigsgã sẽn zĩnd Ãkara soolmẽ wã Sapaolg kiuug rasem 22 yʋʋm 2022 soabã ye.
La, m ba Soaamb gõdga ne a Laabo, n lebg n wa ta gɛlã zĩigẽ, n yeel-a :
Yaa rẽ tɩ buudã goam kiba-kɩtb segd n kẽes b toogo, ne rabay buud toor-toore, n sõng-b tɩ b tõog n mogb taab n vʋɩɩmde, la b ra welg taab tɩ rẽ me le wa wa ne zu-loees a taab ye.
Koomã zoeeme n gilg tẽn-kugrã, la b pidsa bokã me ne koom. Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, leok-y-ma! Leok-y-m tɩ nin-bãmbã bãng tɩ yãmb yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab bal n yaa Wẽnnaam, la yaa yãmb n tõe n kɩt tɩ b tek yam.» 
Ned ka toẽ n ges a to n bãng a tara SIDAwã bãag bil ne a ka tar-a ye. Ayo!
Nanambsã fãa ne gãndaadã, la baa ne rĩm a Davɩɩd kom-dibli a taabã fãa sulga b mens rĩm a Salmo taoore. Yẽnda sẽn dɩ naamã Israyɛllã yɩɩ yʋʋm pis-naase: Ebrõ yʋʋm a yopoe, Zeruzalɛm yʋʋm pis-tã la a tãabo. 
Tι b yeel-a: Fo rat n yιι naaba? Ka ne bilf bala, d sã n lob-f mogrã pυga, f kõn tι rι naam be ne zĩmã, rendeedã la yẽbsã? Silmiigã bee yolgã pυg n tar gõgneng la gãgnengo, la nebã a yiibã ra ka le kelgd-a ye.
Gõos ne mo-gõos na n yii  tẽn-gãongã zugu. Weoogã moodã na n yɩɩ fo rɩɩbo. La fo na n kaaga f rĩir tʋʋlg n yaool  n paam dɩɩb n dɩ. Hal tɩ ta daar ning fo sẽn na n lebg n leb tẽng tomẽ wã. B sẽn yãk tẽng tom n maan foomã yĩnga. Bala, fo yaa tẽng tom, la fo na n leb n leba tẽng tomẽ.» 
Ra wa-m yiri, yaa ra wa-m yiy a yiibu.
Asɩɩsnasnallã paka a kʋɩlense.
Yẽ ne a zĩnd-n-taasã, la tẽngã nebã, ra yaa beem.
Yẽ ra ka wʋmd a sẽn gomda fãa võor ye; la baoosgo, a wʋmame t‘a baaba ka maan sɩd ne a ma ye.
A soaba sũur sãamda zãnga t’a ka mi a sẽn beẽ ye.
Mam malɛɛkã na n lʋɩɩ fo taoor n yãag foom tɩ f ta tẽng ning Amoor-dãmbã ne Hɛt-dãmbã la Ferɛɛz-rãmbã ne Kana-rãmbã la Hevi-rãmbã ne Zebuuz-rãmbã sẽn be wã. La mam na n menesa bãmb zãnga. 
Rẽ maneg n puuga b sũurã, tɩ b yi n wilg tɩ rẽndame tɩ Farens loog la a bas Burkĩna Faso.
«Da rɩk zĩrẽ koɛɛg n saag ye. Ra naag ne nin-wẽng n kɩs zĩrẽ kaset ye. 
F sã n wa tɩ lubd gomtɩʋʋg n yeel tɩ yaa wiuugu fo n bao bũmb fãa yaa gũusgu
Toog a yopoe soaba: Sapɩlma. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Yik tõdbeoog n kẽng Ezɩpt rĩmã nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a tɩ maam a Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Ebre nebã Wẽnnaamã yetame yaa: Bas mam nebã tɩ b kẽng n tɩ waoog maam. 
 «Mam yãbr a tãab-n-soabã sã n mik tõnd ka, b na n kʋʋ tõndo».
Rʋg-bɛd a yiib ka fũgund taab ye.
Nin-bãmbã fãa yaa Asɛɛr yagens nins sẽn dag n yaa b buudã kãsem-dãmba, neb b sẽn tũusi, la gãndaado, la nanambs taoor dãmba. B sõda bãmb n kõ-b zab-teed zabr yĩnga, la b sõorã yaa neb tus pisi la a yoobe. 
M ba Laabo kibare.
Pag pa mi t'a sɩd yaa naab ye
Dẽ, Faarõ boola a Moyiis ne a Aarõ n yeel-b yaa: «Yõk-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab sɛɛga, tɩ b kɩt tɩ lomsã loog n bas maam ne m nebã, la mam na n basa Israyɛll nebã tɩ b kẽng n tɩ maan maand n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» 
Goam ka yõod belgda muk ma
M yaool n ka rɩ b sẽn da segd n kõ-ma ye. La m ka gʋlsd-y wa m datame n paam n dɩ-y ye. Ayɛy! M sẽn kiid n são. Dẽ la m zu-zẽkre la ned kõn deeg-a n bas m zaalem ye. 
Sapoalg kiuug rasem a 2 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor soab maana a pipi tʋʋmd ne a miniisr dãmbã.
Bĩng tɩ maag gũuda a-rɩtba.
Zʋʋda nebã yaa a Amihuud biig a Utayi, sẽn yaa a Omri biiga, n yaa a Imri yagenga, la a Bani yagen-tʋbrakẽega, Perɛɛz buudã sʋka. A Benzame kom-dibli yaa a Mesulam biig a Salu sẽn yaa Odaviya yagenga, la a Senuwa yagen-tʋbrakẽega. 
A Kots roga a Anuub ne a Hatsobeba, n paas a Harum biig a Aharɛll roogã nebã. A Yabɛɛs pʋʋsame n kos Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã tɩ b ning a zug bark n yalg a soolmã, la b tẽeg b nug n kogl-a, la b zãag-a ne toog la namsg buud fãa. Dẽ, Wẽnnaam maana a sẽn kosã n kõ-a. 
La a ro-pʋg ning sẽn be-a noorẽ wã woglem yaa kãntɩɩg pisi, n zems wa roogã woglmã, la a ro-yɩngã ne a pʋgẽ dotã yaa kãntɩɩg piig-piiga. Rĩmã mee rot n dogl taab n dɩdg Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã ne zĩ-sõngã, n tong ne ro-pʋs n gilgi. 
Silmiirindã goama, neb koabg pʋga, yaa neb a 8 n wʋmd-a la b gomd-a.
M saam-biisi, d wilgd-y la kũun ning Wẽnd sẽn kõ Masedoan Tigengu. B kõome tɩ yɩɩg d sẽn da tẽeda tɩ yaa b mens la b reng n dɩk n kõ Wẽnde, la tõnd me, Wẽnd poore, ne Wẽnd sõngre. 
la b sã n sõng maam tɩ mam tõog n lebg n leb n ba wã zakẽ ne bãane, Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n yɩɩ mam Wẽnnaam. Kug-kãngã mam sẽn vigl tɩ yaa tẽn-kugrã na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam doogo. Mam na n yãka bũmb nins fãa yãmb sẽn na n kõ maamã piig pʋɩɩr n kõ yãmba.» 
Sorã kũun yɩɩ Tãngẽwoodo Sabu komindã Reezẽo de Sãntr wɛstã pʋgẽ.
Yaa yʋʋm a yopoe woto masã tõnd sẽn be namsga pʋgẽ, d pa tol n yã Zeenerall ba a ye zabrã pʋg ye.
Dẽ yĩnga yãmb wẽndoog n wã ned beeme sẽn tõe n sõng neb tɩ b  gʋls bʋʋd sɛb bii?
La a Zʋʋda sokame: «Bõe la fo rat tɩ mam gãneg ne foom?» La pagã yeelame: Mam datame tɩ yãmb rɩk y nugbĩngã, y sẽbdgã ne y rasaarã y sẽn zãadã n gãneg ne maam la y yaool n kẽ ne maam.» A Zʋʋda sɩd gãnega bõn-kãens fãa ne-a, la a kẽ ne-a, la a rɩka a Zʋʋda pʋga. 
Zug n be la nin-zabr be
Pondr sã n yi n yeel tɩ yẽbg nin n zabde, pa tõe n kɩɩs ye, bala b fãa bee koomẽ
A kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ sɩngrã bãmb raabã ra yaa toand 100, la b sũur yaa noogo, tɩ bala, b raaba pĩdame.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 2 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, ƐMPESƐƐR sodaasã sẽn lebg n deeg naamã taoor soaba, a KapitɛndYɩbrayɩɩm TARWAR talla a pipi sɛk ne ministɛɛr dãmbã pʋs seb-gʋndba.
Sɩda bãmb maasem yĩnga, y paama kũun buud fãa: goam wɩlengo la bãngr kũuni. Yaa rẽ me yĩng la y zĩ n gũud d Soaal a Zezi Krista Ypkri tɩ bũmb ba a ye ka na n paoog yã. 
Ad a Ezayu yagensã nanambs yʋy wa sẽn zems b rotã, la wa sẽn zems b soolmã, la wa b yʋyã sẽn yaa to-to wã. Yaa naab a Timna, naab a Alva, naab a Yetete, naab a Oholibama, naab a Ela, naab a Pinon, 
A yɩɩ sabaab n paas zu-loees a taab wala sa-paowã, la birgã kaalem n kɩt t’a ligdã lebg toogo.
Pag sor kõ n kjẽng tɩrga. A ba-yir sor be bee, a rol yir sor be be.
Kapitɛnd Yibrayɩɩm TARWAR kota nin-buiidã tɩ b ra yi n gɩdg CEDEAO sẽn tʋm b rãmbã ye.
Rao n wa n kẽng bagre.
Bɩle wã tigsg wakate, a Rubɛn yiime n tɩ yãnd mandragoor weoogã pʋga. La a yãk-a lame n tall n wa kõ a ma a Leya. Woto, a Rasɛll yeela a Leya yaa: «M kotame tɩ f yãk f biigã mandragoorã n kõ-m wɛ.» 
Ned pa bãngd a zɩɩb tĩir tɩ tʋʋsg paoog-a ye
Ya rẽ n kɩt tɩ goamã ra ya wʋsgo.
«Bɩ bãmb maan koglg ne akasiya raado. A woglmã na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg a yiib la pʋɩ-sʋka, la a yalmã na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg la pʋɩ-sʋka, la a zãntlmã na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg la pʋɩ-sʋka. 
Rẽ yĩngã, ad yãmb sẽn na n maan bũmb ninga: Reeg-y nanam-bãmb fãa naamã, la y kɩt tɩ kombɛɛmb led b zĩisẽ. La yʋʋmdã sẽn vẽke, rĩm a Bɛn-Hadaad tigma Siiri rãmbã n kẽng Afɛk n na n tɩ zab ne Israyɛll nebã. 
La b boolã ka lʋɩ muk tʋbrẽ, tɩ bala, nebã sakame n kẽes b toogo.
A tẽegrã maana wakat ning Burkĩna Faso sẽn be yõ-koglg kaalem pʋgẽ, tɩ rẽ yɩ sabaabo, tɩ naam tekr zĩndi.
A gʋlsa sebr a ye gomd a Tooma SÃNKAR ne Burkĩna Faso Revolisẽo wã yelle.
 A sã n roog zaabr n kuili, vẽkembeoogo, a sã n leb n ta pʋʋgẽ wã, a mikdame, tɩ bʋd-bogdã fãa le gaasame.
Rĩm a Aaza tʋʋm a taabã, ne a gãndaalmã fãa, la bũmb nins fãa a sẽn maanã, ne tẽms nins a sẽn me wã gʋlsa Zʋʋda rĩm-dãmbã kibay sebr pʋga. La rĩm a Aaza sẽn wa n kʋʋlã, a bẽe nao bãaga. A Aaza saka a saam-dãmba, la b mum-a-la a yaab-rãmb yaadẽ, a yaab a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋga. La yẽnda biig a Zozafat n led a zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. 
Yaa sẽn kẽed ne kiba-kɩt sẽn segd n zã a meng toto, a tʋʋmdã wɛɛngẽ, n da wa ne welgre, la zũnglg tẽng pʋgẽ ye.
La a Katr sιnga a Koaamb goam woto:  Ad fo mengã sιd yaa yelle! Wĩ-kãngã yaa sẽn na tall n pid f ma t'a pa kaooge? La f yalemdã yaa, f pa yεs zaalem masã? Woo, ay'. Lebg n kul wε! Ned kẽng tao-tao n tι koos f ma yaa…!
La Ezɩpt rĩmã yeela bãmb yaa: «Moyiis ne a Aarõ, yaa bõe tɩ yãmb dat n kɩt tɩ nebã bas b tʋʋmã? Kẽng-y n tɩ maan-y y tʋʋm-wɛglã!» Faarõ yeelame: «Tẽngã nin-kãensã sẽn lebg wʋsg moasã wã la yãmb dat n kɩt tɩ bãmb bas b tʋʋm-wɛglã?» 
Wẽnnaam naana tõnd yĩnga t’a toẽ n zab ne bãasã n kogel a menga.  Tõnd tara bõn-vɩɩli d yĩngã pʋgẽ tɩ d toẽ n mak-b ne sodaase. Bõn-vɩɩli  kãens bee zɩɩma pʋgẽ tɩ b tʋʋmd yaa tɩ zab ne bãasã.
Rĩm a Salmo dag n tara kug-zɩtb tus pis-yopoe, la kug-pɛɛsdb tus pis-nii tɩ b tʋmd tãmsã zutu. Rĩm a Salmo ne rĩm a Hiram tʋmtʋmdbã ne Gibal nebã peesa kugã, la b segl raadã, roogã meeb yĩnga. 
Rakõor naoor n bɩɩsd a bɛnga.
B goama pʋgẽ ƐREFI kiba-kɩtbã wilgame tɩ neb nins b sẽn na n dɩk tɩ b sõng sodaasã n zabã pʋgẽ, yaa moosã la b yãkda, tɩ bala, nin-wẽnsã, yaa silmiisã la b rɩkd tɩ sõngd-b zabdẽ.
Maanda pʋg-beoog kʋʋr tɩ rʋmd na n wa ki
Naab tʋʋd la a yẽta
Israyɛll nebã yãnda Sẽn-Ka-Saab ziirã sẽn wẽnd bug-kãseng sẽn dɩt tãngã zugu. La a Moyiis kẽe sawaodgã pʋgẽ n dʋ tãngã zugu. La a Moyiis paa tãngã zug rasem pis-naase, la yʋnd pis-naase. 
A tog n yɩɩ ned sẽn get a zak yell neere, n kɩtdẽ t'a kamb yɩ kom-sakds wa sẽn zems pẽgre. A togame n paam tɩ kɛɛng-rãmbã kɩt a kaset-sõngo, tɩ nebã da wa n ka nand-a, la tɩ sʋtãanã bẽdg ra yõk-a ye. 
Bãmb zaba ne a Kedorlaomeer sẽn yaa Elam dĩma, la ne Goyim dĩm a Tideyalle, la Sineyaar rĩm a Amrafɛlle, la ne Elasaar dĩm a Arzoke. Yaa rĩm-dãmb a naas sẽn na n zab ne rĩm-dãmb a nu. 
Zakã woglem tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg koabga, la a yalmã tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg pis-nu, t'a zãntlmã yaa kãntɩɩg a nu. Wʋg a pɛɛlã ne lamd gĩs-bãanega, la f maan a naoã ne zũudu. 
La sã n yaa ne maam, mam na n yalsa fo taoor beenẽ, pĩig ning sẽn be Horɛɛbã zugu. La fo na n wẽe pĩigã tɩ koom yi a pʋgẽ tɩ nebã yũ.» A Moyiis maana woto Israyɛll nebã kãsem-dãmbã nifẽ. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã Reezẽo de lɛs soolmã, karen-biisã ne b ba rãmb kẽname, n wilg b sũ-pa-noaanga, ne b tẽnsã pʋsẽ karen-dotã sẽn ket n pag b kʋɩlẽnse, b soolmã pʋga.
Wand sẽn zindẽ kõn kong kõbd ye
Gosneem pʋʋsa logtoɛɛmb nins sẽn paam sãmpogrã , Wẽnd na kõ laafɩ la a kos-b tɩ b kell n gãd taab nus la b tʋm b tʋʋma sõma.
Kell n yɩɩ wakat me, b sẽn dɩk bug-vɩlens 12 n kɩs kom-bɩɩb tɩ b paas n yãag tẽngã taoor soaba.
Yãmb toẽeme n ka yã tɩ-kãensa zĩiga fãa ye; wala y sã n yã me, a  ligda toẽeme n ya toog wʋsgo. Zĩis kẽere, yãmb toẽ n paama tɩkãense  tɩ b ligda ka toog ye; la zĩis kẽer me b kõt b la zaalem.
A Zozɛf soaalã sẽn wʋm pagã sẽn togs yẽnda yem-daoogã sẽn dag n dat n maan bũmb ningã, La Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n bee ne a Zozɛfe, la b wilga a Zozɛf b nonglem. Bãmb kɩtame tɩ bi-bees roog gũudbã naab nong a Zozɛfe. 
n tɩ tall y baaba wã ne y yirã rãmb n wa mam nengẽ. Mam na n baoo Ezɩpt tẽngã zĩig sẽn welg toor n kõ yãmba, la yãmb na n dɩɩ tẽngã bõn-sõama wã. 
Yaa ligd sõor sẽn ta milyaar 36 la Waogdg komindã taoor rãmb segd n dɩk n tʋm yʋʋm 2023 soabã.
Dẽ poore, rĩmã leb n yãndame tɩ ka-zu-faad a yopoe, sẽn wẽnd yaang sob-tʋʋlgã sẽn wẽ tɩ b faage, n pʋgl pĩnd dãmbã n yi. La ka-zut nins sẽn faagã rɩɩ ka-zu-bɛd nins sẽn bɩ sõama wã. Dẽ, Faarõ nekame. Rag yaa zãmsdo. 
Maan-y sɛk roogã sẽn yaa fu-roogã ne a lutgã, la a yagendsã ne a ra-pegdã la a ra-bɩlmã ne a ra-lugdsã la b naoã, Ne fɩtl-doagendgã ne a teedã fãa la fɩtl-dãmbã ne kaamã sẽn na n ning n widgã, 
Bala, tẽns koabg zugu, 80 bɩ 90 fãa birg yita tẽns nins be zab pʋgẽ wã.
Rẽnd pa segd tɩ karen-biis kẽer sɩng kaorengo, tɩ kẽer zĩ n pa mi b sẽn maand a soab ye.
A wilgame tɩ sã n ges kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm na-kẽndrã, wilgdame tɩ yaa ned sẽn nong a tẽngã la a tõe n sɩd zab tẽnga poorẽ.
La mikame tι yaa sẽn solem tι ta maamã la m sẽn ket n tar n tẽegdẽ wã. Seb-kãngã me sẽn gẽegd bũmb ningã, yaa a yι sabab tι soalmã tolem n ta kamb la yagense.
A Davɩɩd zẽka a nenga, n yãnd Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã sẽn be yĩngr ne tẽng sʋka, n wõog a sʋʋg n tees Zeruzalɛm tẽngã sẽnẽ. La a Davɩɩd ne kãsem-dãmbã pila boto, n lʋɩ n fõgneg b neng tẽnga. A Davɩɩd yeela Wẽnnaam yaa: «Ka maam n yeel tɩ b sõd nebã la? Yaa maam n maan yel-wẽnde, n maan sẽn yaa wẽngã. La nin-bãmbã maana bõe? Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam Wẽnnaam, m yõkd-y-la sɛɛga. Bɩ y sɩbg maam ne m yirã rãmb bala, la y ra kɩt tɩ toog paam y nebã ye!» 
A kosa sodaasã buud toor-toor tɩ b gãd taab nusi, sẽn na n yɩlẽ, tɩ b tõog n pids tʋʋmdã wala sẽn segde.
Yel-gɛtb me tog n yɩɩ neb sẽn zems waoogre, la sɩd dãmba. B ka tog n yɩ neb sẽn yũud rãam wʋsgo, wall sẽn maand zãmb n baood ligd ye. Yel-gɛt tog n yɩɩ pʋg-yend sɩda, la a tog n gesa a kambã ne a zaka rãmb yell sõama. 
A Benzame rogem, la a Rasɛll kũum. Bãmb yii Betɛll n na n looge, la bãmb sẽn kolg Efrate, a Rasɛll rogame. A Rasɛll rogmã yɩɩ toog wʋsg ne-a. La a Rasɛll sẽn wa n kʋmd rogmã wakate, pʋg-roagsã yeel-a lame yaa: «Da zoe rabeem ye, fo leb n paama bi-ribla!» 
Sẽn paasde, Gɛapaga Kolɛɛs kasengã taoor soab basa kolɛɛsã sẽn zems yʋʋm a tãabo.
Burkĩna Faso tãrazisẽo wã naab tɩ kaaga Nizɛɛr tẽngã naaba.
A Uts n yaa pipi biiga, t'a Buuz pʋgda, a Kemuwɛll yaa a Aram ba, ne a Kesɛɛd la a Haazo, ne a Pildaase, la a Yildafe, ne a Betuwɛlle. 
Noaag neer wẽ, la a rɩgrã? 
A Abrahaam yeela a zakã tʋmtʋmd ning sẽn yaa kãsem n kaoos yẽnda zakẽ wã, n dag n get yẽnda laogã fãa yellã yaa: «Tik mam gerã, tɩ m na n kɩtame tɩ f wẽen ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa saasẽ la dũniyã Wẽnnaamã yʋʋre, tɩ f ka na n bao Kana soolmã mam sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã bi-pugl n kõ mam bi-riblã ye. 
Pak tigrã seglgo. A Moyiis boola Israyɛll kasem-dãmbã fãa n yeel-b yaa: «Kẽng-y n tɩ bao-y rũm-bãooneg yãmb yirã rãmb yĩnga, n kʋ n maan Pak tigrã. Dẽ poore, bɩ y bao izop vãado, n suk zɩɩmã sẽn be laagẽ wã n mes y rignoorã zugu, la y lug a yiibã. La bɩ yãmb ned ba a yembr da yi a roogẽ tɩ beoogã ka vẽeg ye. 
Sig-noy kiuug yʋʋm 2019 soabã, a lebg Katolikã karen-saamba.
A Davɩɩd sũur sãamame, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn kɩt t'a Uuza ki wã yĩnga. Yaa rẽ n so tɩ b boond zĩ-kãng tɩ Perɛɛz-Uuza, sẽn dat n togs t'a Uuza kũum zĩiga, hal tɩ ta rũndã. Dẽ, a Davɩɩd ka tall koglgã n kẽng a zakẽ wã, a Davɩɩd tẽngẽ wã ye. A kɩtame tɩ b tall-a n kẽng Gat rao a Obɛɛd-Edom yirã. 
La b sã n kʋ-a sõor pukr zugẽ, wagdrã zɩɩm daagr taal na n zĩnda ned ning sẽn kʋ-a yẽnda wã zugu. Wagdr sã n zuk bũmb tɩ b yõk-a, wagdrã tog n lebsa bũmb ning a sẽn zukã, la a sã n ka tar baa fɩ, b tog n koos-a lame n yao a sẽn zukã. 
Tʋʋmdã kʋɩlens pagbẽ, b yãka Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE t’a lʋɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoore.
Sapaolg kiuug rasem a 5 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor soaba, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE zẽk a naoor n kẽng Gibo sodaasã zakẽ.
Katr yet f tõog ne f tõog me, zãnkit yaa n wa kẽ f noorẽ tɩ b yet tɩ foo n be yãoodo?
kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbã nengẽ.
La a Izak maana tigr bãmb yĩnga, tɩ b rɩ, la b yũ. La bãmb sãda beoogo, n yik n maan pʋleng ne taaba. La a Izak bas-b lame tɩ b looge, la bãmb yii beenẽ ne bãan n looge. 
Yaa badaar la a Abrahaam ne a bi-ribl a Ismayɛll kẽ bãongo. Baa ne yembs nins sẽn dog a Abrahaam zakẽ wã, ne yẽnda sẽn da yembs nins ne ligd sãambã nengẽ wã fãa naaga yẽnda n kẽ bãongo. 
La rẽ poore, yao wã pʋgl n yiime, la a nugã rag n gãda a Ezayu nao-kãsenkãarã. La b pʋda yẽnda yʋʋr t'a Zakoobe. Bãmb sẽn wa n na n dogã, t'a Izak rag n tara yʋʋm pis-yoobe. A Ezayu koosa a rogem pʋɩɩre 
A zagl yaa wẽlg zʋʋre
Wẽnnaam sẽn naan bũmb ninsã fãa yaa sõama, b sã n dɩt-b ne bark pʋʋsgo. Zãag f meng ne kibay sẽn ka kẽed ne tẽeb yelle, la ne soalem pʋg-yãans sẽn tãoodã. 
F sã n kĩ ne bʋẽega, f nintãm sata raagẽ
A Rewu sẽn wa n tar yʋʋm pis-tã la a yiibu, a roga a Seruugi. A Nahoor dogma zugẽ, a Seruug vɩɩmda yʋʋm kobessi, la a roga kom-dibli, la kom-pugli. 
Kẽndbã taoor soab a Yamba Tãnkoaano yeelame tɩ sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm 2021 la yʋʋm 2022 soabã, lekols wʋsg taoor dãmb pa le be Tapoa porvẽesã pʋg ye.
La ned sũur sã n gãd kẽnkẽ, tɩ moadg ka lʋɩ sʋka, t'a sed ne yamleoogo t'a kõn yi kãadem ne biig ning a sẽn da pʋlem a menga, a maanda neere. Dɩlla sẽn kẽeda kãadem ne bi-pugl ning a sẽn da pʋlem a menga, maanda neere, la sẽn ka kẽeda kãadma n maand neer n yɩɩda. 
La Wẽnnaam yeelame: «Bɩ bõn-vãad buud toor-toor yi: Mood sẽn womd biisi, tɩɩs sẽn womd b biis wa sẽn zems b buudã sẽn yaa to-to dũniyã zugã.» La a yɩɩ woto. 
Wãbr ne fɩɩlg ka naagd taab ye.
Rat-n-kʋ-yalma, t’a yet tɩ b rãmsd-a nodre.
Karen-dot sẽn pag sõor taa bãmb 4000.
A Akaab peesa ra-lugdg wẽn-poak a Aseera yĩnga. A Akaab maana yɛl a taab sẽn yaa wẽng n yɩɩd Israyɛll rĩm-dãmb nins fãa sẽn deng-b yẽnda n zĩndã. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã sũur yiki. 
Kãnkã-wɩɩsdb yẽsda ne taab tɩ sebg pa yi ye
La a rag n kɩtame tɩ b bolg roogã zãng fãa ne sãnem, n kɩt tɩ b bolg tẽn-kugrã sẽn be ro-taoorã noorã me ne sãnem. Rĩmã kɩtame tɩ b bao oliiv tɩɩg raad n naan serubẽ-rãmb a yiib n ning ro-taoorã sẽn yaa zĩig sẽn welg toor n yɩɩdã pʋga. La serubẽ a ye fãa zãntlem dag n yaa kãntɩɩg piiga. 
Yelbund a ye n yet yaa : « Nug yend ka wʋkd zom ye. » Yaa d sẽn na n  naag taab n tʋma n na n kɩt tɩ Afirik wẽndota tõog n maneg yellã !
A Teera peega a biig a Abram ne a yageng a Lot sẽn yaa a Haran bi-riblã, ne a bi-pag a Sarayi sẽn yaa yẽnda bi-ribl a Abram pagã, la bãmb tũu taab n yi Ʋʋr sẽn be Kalde rãmba soolmẽ wã, n kẽng Kana tẽnga. Bãmb sẽn ta Haran tẽngã, bãmb zĩnda beenẽ. A Teera vɩɩmda yʋʋm kobessi la a nu, la a kii Haran tẽngã pʋga. 
A Labã kẽe a Zakoob fu-roogẽ wã, la a kẽ a Leya fu-roogẽ wã, la a kẽ yem-pogs a yiibã fu-roogẽ wã. La yẽnda ka yãnd bũmb ye. La a sẽn yi a Leya fu-roogẽ wã, a kẽe a Rasɛll fu-roogẽ wã. A Rasɛll rɩka wẽn-naandsã yẽnda sẽn dag n zu wã, n ning yʋgemdã gaar tẽngre, n zomb a zugu. Dẽ, a Labã veesa fu-roogã zãnga, la a ka yãnd bũmb ye. 
N-ye! Sẽn kot-a yãmbã, Krista sẽn bʋgs la b ya nin-noang yĩngã, yaa mam meng a Pol, rao ninga sẽn ka tar võore a sã n be yãmb sʋka, t'a sã n yaool n zãr bɩ a ya nin-toaaga, maam n kot-y: sõng-y tɩ m sã n wa bɩ m da yik zʋg toaag ning m sẽn dat yik ne neb kẽera ye. Bãmb dãmb tẽedame tɩ m manesma tũuda ninsaalb rẽnna. 
Yẽnda yalsa sikã zĩig noor n yeele: «Neb nins fãa sẽn dat Sẽn-Ka-Saabã, wa-y mam nengẽ ka.» La Leevi buudã fãa wa n tigma taab yẽnda nengẽ. 
Yaa rẽ poore, la b yãk neb nins sẽn na n lʋɩ depite rãmbã taoore.
Nao-kãar (nao-kãsenkãare) yãgd me, a kõn deng nao-bi-taor ye.
 La, b yãka nemdã n kõ-a, t’a kuil n tɩ wãb ne a sɩda.
Bɩ rĩm ning sẽn be-a wakat sẽn kõn sa, n ka tõe n ki, la ned nin sẽn ka tõe n yã, n yaa b yembr tãa n yaa Wẽnnaamã soog waoogre, la ziiri, wakat sẽn ka sɛt ye. Ãmina! M biig a Tɩmote, koɛɛg ning mam sẽn yet foom, a wa sẽn zems bãngr gomdã sẽn gom a yellã, yaa tɩ f zab zab-sõngã wa b sẽn yeelã, 
Mamsego: yãmb tõe n gãe furoog sẽn ning rũmsa tɩɩm tẽngre, tɩɩma na n  diga rũmsa tɩ b ka wãb yãmb ye.
Kasɛt ning b sẽn pʋd tɩ Tẽeg-n-paasã bee Radyo Ave Marya, la Katolikã Radyo rãmb a pʋs Burkĩna Faso wen-vɩɩs a naasã pʋsẽ.
Wẽnnaam yãaga b nebã. Faarõ sẽn bas nebã tɩ b loogã, Wẽnnaam ka tall bãmb n dɩk sor ning sẽn tũud Filistẽ-dãmbã soolmẽ wã ye. Baa ne so-kãng sẽn pẽ n yɩɩdã. Bala, Wẽnnaam yeelame tɩ nebã sã n yãnd zabrã, b tõe n wa maana b bãngẽ, n tek yam n lebg n leb Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
A Davɩɩd rɩka yɩng roogã ne a meng rotã naande, la laogã bĩngr dot ne yĩngr do-gãasã, la pʋgẽ dotã ne yel-wẽnã sugr kũun doogã naande, n kõ a biig a Salmo. A Davɩɩd rɩka Wẽnd doogã naand n kõ a Salmo. A kõ-a-la bũmb nins fãa sẽn kẽed ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab zakã meebã naande, ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab laogã la teed nins sẽn welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩngã bĩngr dotã naand me. 
M ba Katr me, sẽn lemb n mik tɩ ya noogã, a maka gõeem n kong n yik n sok a pagã: «Ãnd n kõ foo nemdã?»
Bũmb sã n yɩɩd-fo, a gãong vuud-f lame.
A Katr pẽga a Soaamb sõama, n yetẽ t'a yaa kurkĩna. A sẽn ta yiri, tao bal t'a sιnga raagã kẽnd seglse. A baoo wĩir sẽn ya bedre, n tar pãnga, n pid a ma wã, n le ninga kadr n paase, t'a tirsdẽ.
A  rɩka biigã n kẽng n tɩ zĩnd tɩɩga tẽngr n yeel  yaa: “Fo ka na n yɩ kɩɩb ye; Maam la fo ma  masã.“
A wilgame tɩ rẽ fãa segd n saame, bala, ned sã n wa tʋʋm zĩigẽ yibeoogo, n na n tʋʋm n tãag zaabre, pa segd tɩ sɛbã ket n zamd taab n pa paamd gesg ye.
La bũmbã fãa kell n yɩɩ wa yẽnda sẽn bilg zãmsdã to-to n kõ tõndã. Bala, Faarõ leb n lebsa maam m tʋʋmdẽ, la b kɩt tɩ b luul ned a to wã sẽn yaa rɩɩbã seglg taoor soabã.». A Zozɛf bilga rĩm a Faarõ zãmsdo
