Nin-sabls wĩndg sẽn lʋɩtẽ tẽnsã yãka sodaas sull tɩ b na n sõng Burkĩna Faso.
Burkĩna Faso miniisr ning sẽn get tõnd ne zamaan-zẽns zoodã wilgame tɩ tẽngã taoor soab kell n togsa tãrãsisẽo wã zãab sẽn ya toto, la a kell n kos Nasẽo zini sula wã tɩ b yãag-a.
Kibarã yii wakat sera.
Dẽe, pastɛɛrã karemda Wẽnnaam Goama, n zãmsd-b b sẽn sɛgd n vɩɩmd toto.
Rẽ poore, mam wõgemda Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor n pẽg mam soaal a Abrahaam Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, bãmb sẽn maan pʋ-peelem n yãag maam tɩ m na n tõog n peeg mam soaalã roagd bi-pugl n tɩ kõ m soaalã bi-riblã yĩnga. Moasã, yãmb sã n na n wilga y nonglem ne y sɩd mam soaalã yĩnga, bɩ y togs maam, la y sã n ka na n maan woto me, bɩ y togs maam tɩ m tõe n bãng m sẽn na n maanega.» 
La, m ba Soaamb yeela a Katre : «D kao bõnyẽegã kamb zutu».
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 14 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE tika a nug sebr zug n wilg tɩ sodaarã tʋʋmde, a lebg n sigl-a Burkĩna Faso, la a le yãka kom-bɩɩb tɩ b na n lʋɩ sodaasã sula taoore.
Wagr ka ki a na nobe
La pʋg‑kõor ning sẽn yaa-a pʋg‑kõor meng-menga, n vɩ a yembre, a teegrã fãa bee ne Wẽnnaam, n modgd ne bõosg la pʋʋsgo, yʋng la wĩntoog fãa. Ned sã n ka get a neb yelle, sẽn yɩɩd fãa yaa a zaka rãmba, yẽnda basa a tẽebã, la a yaa wẽng n yɩɩd ned ning sẽn ka-a tẽedã. 
Tɩɩm ka tɩɩm sãamda tɩɩm
A mi ned são-a a mi tẽnga.
Ka rẽ Masedoan dãmba sã n tũ maam n wa ling yãmba, m sẽn tãoosd raooda na n lebga yãnde; na yɩ yãmb dẽnd n yɩɩda. Gese, kʋɩɩm sã n zoe bʋdb toogo, a na n tigsa ka-faado la ned ning sẽn bʋta ne sũuri yaa bark buud fãa la a tigsda. 
La, a yao wã wa n pɩʋʋgame, t’a kẽemã kell n tees bug-raoogã, ned ning sẽn pʋgdã zugu, n wẽ, tɩ kinkirgã yak n lʋɩ n ki.
Nebã fãa wʋma sa-kelemsã la b yãnd sa-yãgbã, la b wʋm baorgã peebg rãamde, la b yãnd tãngã sẽn nukd bug-zõosã. Nebã sẽn yãnd bõn-kãnga, rabeem yõka bãmb tɩ b rigda, la bãmb yalsa yɩɩga. 
Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã maana sõng taab tʋʋmde.
Sã n ya rooga sɩngre, d ka tõe n sɩnga ne Kugr a to tɩ ka sẽn zoe n dɩgl a soaba, a Zezi Krista. Kug kãng zug marsã ned sã n wa rogl sãnem, bɩ wanzurfu, bɩ kug nɛɛba, bɩ raado, bɩ kãnkẽ bɩ moodo, 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n welga Israyɛll rũmsã toor ne Ezɩpt rũmsã. La Israyɛll rũng ba a yembr ka na n ki ye. La badaar vẽkembeoog bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sɩd maana wa b sẽn dag n yeelã. Bãmb kɩtame tɩ Ezɩpt rũmsã fãa ki, la Israyɛll rũng ba a yembr ka ki ye. 
Polɩɩs Minisipalã wilgame tɩ b yagsã togsa bãmb naoor katɛka, tɩ b tiisda b gõem la b rɩk na-kẽndre.
Daar a yembre, wẽndooga pagb a yiib n wa n na  n ges-ba. Ned a yembrã yaa lɔgtor-poaka, t‘a  towã mi kibay wẽebo.
Tɩ bʋʋgã tõsga a wĩirã, n kẽng n tɩ lagem a rũmsã.
A Abrahaam leokame: «Mam tagsame tɩ zĩ-kãngã nebã ka zoet Wẽnnaam ye, la b tõe n kʋʋ maam m pagã yĩnga. La sẽn paasd yõwã, yaa sɩd tɩ yẽnda yaa mam tão. Bala, yẽnda yaa mam ba-biiga, la yẽnda ka mam ma-biig ye, la yẽnda lebga mam paga. 
La b sẽn yãk daar ning b sẽn segd n tɩ pãb m ba Soaamb bengã sʋʋga daare, m ba Soaamb sãda yibeoog pĩnd n kẽng tɩ solg sorã noor Pidimd poore. M ba Katr sẽn wa n loogdẽ, m ba Soaamb yii purs n yi tɩ m ba Katr yaeng n lebg n zoe n kuli.
Wʋm tɩ lar kʋʋd yẽbga, ka rɩkd n lob koomẽ ye.
Naafã sɩd zoe m ba Katr nimbãaneg n kolg boka noor n dɩk a zʋʋrã n tees Katr sẽn be bokã pʋgã, tɩ m ba Katr gãd naafã zʋʋrã n tak-a n yiisi.
Ned sã n wa rigd n yĩida, rɩ tɩ gãe n yĩid n kae.
Yaa koe-noog ning sẽn tar ziirã, Wẽnnaam sẽn yaa bark soabã koe-noogã, koe-noog ning b sẽn ning mam noorẽ wã n yet a woto. tɩ mam yaool n dag n yaa ned sẽn paoogd Wẽnnaam, la sẽn namsd Kiris tẽedbã, la ned sẽn maand a taab pãnga. La b zoee mam nimbãanega, bala, dag n yaa zɩɩlem la ka-tẽeb pʋgẽ la mam dag n maand rẽnda. 
ISRAYƐLL NEBÃ YEMBD YIIBU. Israyɛll nebã namsgo. Ad a Israyɛll b sẽn boond t'a Zakoobã kamb nins sẽn tũ a yẽnda n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽngã yʋyã, la yaa ned kam fãa ne a zak rãmba: 
Woto, karensaamba na n tõog n sõnga karembiisa tɩ b bãng zĩig  ninga b sẽn bewã.
Ko-sor a tãabẽ soabã yʋʋr boondame tɩ ‹tɩɩgre.› Ko-so-kãng zoetame n teesd Asiiri tẽngã yaanga. La yaoolem ko-sorã sẽn yaa naasẽ soabã yʋʋr boondame tɩ Efrate. 
Wakat-kãnga, la biigã yeel a ba wã : «Yik tao-tao n dɩk yir sore».
Yʋyã boolg poore, gosneerã taoor soab rɩka tɩ-puud n tɩ rɩlg Monima wã taoore, la a ka rɩk koɛɛg ye.
Gosneerã seb-gʋnd tẽega miniisrã tẽngã taoor soaba, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE sẽn dat bũmb ning tẽngã na tõog n tik n yi yõ-koglg kaalmã pʋgẽ wã.
Woto, Wẽnnaam yeela a Nowe yaa: «Mam yãka yam n na n menes bõn-vɩɩsã buud fãa. Bala, bãmb kɩtame tɩ dũniyã pid ne tʋʋm-beedo. Woto yĩngã, mam na n naag-b-la ne dũniyã n sãame. 
SIDAwã bãag ya boẽ? La a maanda a wãn n kʋʋd nebã?
Yẽ sẽn loogã, la a to me sẽn sigi. Ve soabã me kolgame n dong a yublã n gese, n bas n yeele: Mam tara yυυm pis-naase. La mam sẽn yi m ma gellẽ tεka, mam nan pa nι yãoã buud ye. Pa rũndẽ la m na n sιng ye.
Karensaamba yeele: “Bãaga bil ket n lebgda wʋsgo.” “Bãaga bila” a  tãab soab le wa kẽ n naag a yiibã tɩ b naag taab n kʋ “sodaasã”  ned a yembre.
Yaa rẽ yĩng la Baag sẽn pa tõe n vʋʋs ne a yõbogdã balã. Yẽ ne Yũug me yaa beem.
A Zʋʋda kamb la woto: yaa a Ɛɛr ne a Onan la a Sela. Bãmb b tãabã fãa ma yaa a Suwa sẽn yaa Kana bi-puglã. A Zʋʋda bi-kãseng a Ɛɛr maana sẽn yaa wẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ, tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩt t'a ki. Dẽ zugẽ, a Zʋʋda bi-pag a Tamaar doga a kom-dibli a yiibu: a Perɛɛz ne a Zeera. A Zʋʋda kom-dibli wã fãa sõor yaa bãmb b nu. 
b yõk-b lame, n vaees b futã, n yã korgã ne ligdã. Mik yaa wagdr n sιd da zuk korgã, tι b sẽn digd-a wã t’a lobg la a zoe. Wã masã la Ratzãng yeel yã: Ad yell paam tõndo!
A wilgame t’a tara saagr tɩ Burkĩna Faso taoor dãmbã na n kẽnga taoor ne yẽsgã sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ tʋmd-n-taarã kẽng taoore.
Dẽ, nebã leb n yika zabr ne a Moyiis n yeele: «Kõ-y tõnd koom tɩ d yũ.» La a Moyiis soka bãmb yaa: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb zabd ne maam? Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb baood Sẽn-Ka-Saab noore?» 
A Agaar ne a Ismayɛll kibare. A Abram pag a Sarayi rag n ka tõog n dog biig n kõ a Abram ye. A Sarayi rag n tara a yem-poak a yembr sẽn yaa Ezɩpt tẽng bi-pugla, t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Agaare. 
Noaag vuud a to yãad t'a rẽeg vuud beoogo
 Soaamb wa n baas n yeela m ba Laabo, t’a yeel tɩ : «Ad m gɛla.» 
F sã n pa tõe n zomb f ba tɩɩga, bɩ f kolg n sɩɩs-a
net.
n dιk sore, n dabd Pυg-yãangã yiri. A sẽn ta wã, a pυυsa Pυg-yãangã sõama-sõama, n yaool n yeel-a: - M ma sõngo, ad m dat n bõs-y lame yaa, tt y reeg m bũmbã n bĩng-m tιm kẽng la m wa.
La bãmb yeelame: «Fo ka tõe n yãnd mam nengã ye. Bala, ninsaal ka tõe n yãnd maam n ket n vɩ ye.» La mam ziirã sã n tũud beenẽ n loogdẽ, mam na n kẽesa foom pĩig bokẽ. La mam sẽn wat loogdẽ wã wakate, mam na n luda foom ne m nugu. 
Pʋg-n-zãad bãgdo.
Nin-kẽem yaa tɩɩm
Be me, b koeesã le yaa wa a sẽn loogã.
soab ning sẽn kõ a meng tɩ ra nebã fãa wã. Yõwã yaa kaset sẽn kɩs a wakate. Dẽ, mam datame tɩ nebã zẽk nus sẽn yaa yɩlma, n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam zĩig fãa, tɩ sũ-kiiri la no-koɛɛm kaẽ ye. 
Lomsã na n pida Nill kʋɩlgã. La b na n yii be n wa kẽ fo yirã. B na n waa hal fo ro-gãagẽ wã, n dʋ baa fo gãagã zugu. Lomsã na n kẽe fo tʋmtʋmdbã ne f tẽngã neb fãa rotẽ. B na n kẽe baa wʋmsã ne sĩn-bi wã pʋse. Lomsã na n dʋʋ fo mengã zugu, la fo nebã ne f tʋmtʋmdbã fãa zutu.» 
Pag n baod-a ki tɩ neb sãre.
Zug sã n põnge, a pa pam ye
Nin-wẽnga, bã-wẽng n kʋʋd-a
Wakat kẽere, rɩɩb paoog-b lame; la baoosgo, a Pok maoda b fãa yĩnga.
Bi-pɛɛlga me tõe n paam-a la me. Kãadbã a  yiiba loogr zugĩ, b kamba na n yɩɩ kɩɩbse.
Tẽngã gosneer taoor soab a Sale Kebzabo wilgame tɩ yaa neb 50 la zak n maan kaalem, tɩ neb 300 paam sãnpogr kẽna pʋgẽ.
Yẽnda rɩka saar-dãmb kobs-yoob sẽn yaa sõama wʋsgã, n paas Ezɩpt soolem saar-dãmbã fãa. La tãb-biis a tãab n dag n be saar fãa pʋgẽ. 
Sẽn sɩng ne kaorengã sẽn sɩng Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-dotã ket n paga b kʋɩlens Sũm soolmã, tɩ bala, karen-saamb ba a ye ka be a tʋʋmd zĩigẽ ye.
Bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 13 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
Yãmb me, pagba, sak-y y sɩdb-rãmba. Sɩdb-rãmba kẽer pa rat n deeg Koe-nooga ye la b pagba vɩɩm sõngã n na n tak-ba tɩ pa tũ ne b noor gomd ye. Rẽ yaa b sã n ne tɩ y zãaga y mense ne yoob n tog ne waoogre. 
La koglegã sẽn da yaa bilf yĩnga, a pa tõe n tall b fãa vugr n pɩʋʋg koomã ye. La raoã da pa mi a sẽn n na n maaneg ye. T’a yeel a menga : Mam sã n loog ne Baagã, Bʋʋgã na n wãba ki wã, n sã n bas Baagã n loog ne ki wã, baag na n yõdg n wãba Bʋʋgã. A ! m maand a wãna ?
La a Zʋʋda kolga a Zozɛf n yeel yaa: «M soaala, y sugri! Y kabre, mam kotame tɩ y sak tɩ y tʋmtʋmdã gom ne-yã, la y ra yik y sũur ne-m ye! Bala, yãmb yaa wa Faarõ meng bala! M soaala, yãmb dag n soka y tʋmtʋmdbã n ges b sã n tara baaba bɩ ba-biig a to. 
Dẽ poore, m ba Soaamb baoo ki ne bʋdb koore, n tɩ be sor noor pĩig zugu, n bʋtẽ.
A Ezayu sẽn wa n tar yʋʋm pis-naase, a peega pagba. Yaa Hɛt ned a Beeri bi-pugl a Zehuditi, ne Hɛt ned a Elon bi-pugl a Basmate. La a Izak ne a pag a Rebeka paama sũ-toog pʋg-bãmbã yĩnga. 
Zãmsgã wa n tɩ paga a kʋlens ne Fot rãmb yõgbo la b pʋʋs taaba, tɩ ned kam fãa rɩk a yir sore.
Tɩ ba Katr yeel-a : « Fo sã n na n tɩ yuglig bɩ f yuglig bilf-bilfu tɩ tõnd fãa bĩndã kalma taaba.»
F sã n ta tengẽ n yã tɩ b pãbd gãngãad ne gɛt bɩ f me sao n kẽ gõosẽ
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE yalsa bʋ-kaod-ro-kasengã taoor rãmb taoor n wẽene.
A togsame tɩ b kiisa noor ning b sẽn da rɩk tʋʋl-nif kiuug yʋʋm 2022 soabã, n paas gosneerã miniisr dãmb ligdã, la b rɩk nug tikr ning b sẽn da gãneg yʋʋm 2008 soabã kiuugã yaood wɛɛngẽ.
La Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã vẽnega a meng ne a Moyiis bug-witim pʋgẽ tuug sʋka. A Moyiis rag n getame, la ade, bugum n dag n wit tuugã sʋka, la a ka rɩt tuugã ye. A Moyiis yeelame: «Mam na n bʋdg n gesa yel-solem-kãngã. Yaa bõe tɩ bugmã ka rɩt tuugã?» 
Sẽn paase, yaa ned kam fãa kell n vɩɩnd wa Wẽnd boolla sẽn mik-a zĩig ninga. Yaa woto la m zãmsd saam-biisa fãa Tigeng pʋgẽ. Wẽnd boolla mik-f lame tɩ f ya zũnga, pa zũnga; boolla mik-f lame tɩ f ka kẽ bãongo, bas bãong kõom. 
Dẽ, a Davɩɩd kõ a Ornan sãnem kɩlo piiga, la a reeg zĩigã. Wakat-kãnga, a Davɩɩd sẽn mik tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab leoka yẽnda pʋʋsgã Zebuus rao a Ornan zɛɛgẽ wã, a maana maand beenẽ. 
Memoryal Tooma SÃNKAR sullã taoor soaba a Pɛɛr WEDRAOOG yeelame tɩ b saagdame tɩ bug-vɩlensã bãmb sẽn n kõ kom-bɩɩbã, a na n kenga b pelse tɩ b tõog n dɩk a Tooma SÃNKAR naoore, tɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã neb tõog n tall saamb biilim, la b yɩ pʋ-peelem rãmba.
Wãamb bi-beelem sɩnga a yãadmẽ
Sẽn sɩng ne tẽngrã, bãmb bogla a yiibu, la bãmb zutã tɩ teeg taab yĩngr tuiidgã zĩigẽ. Lals a yiibã fãa gõdgr zĩis yɩɩ woto. la ra-bɩlem a nu a kɩreng a yiib soaba me ra-pegd yĩnga. La b maana ra-pegd a nu me sɛk roogã yaang sẽn teesd taoorã yĩnga. 
Yʋʋm 35 loogr poore, b rɩka Revolisẽo wã bug-vɩleng n ning kom-bɩɩbã nugẽ, tɩ b kell n kẽng taoor ne a Tooma SÃNKAR sẽn da tʋmd bũmb ninsi, Burkĩna Faso soog-m-mengã la a taoor kẽndã wɛɛngẽ.
Ned sã n ka na n ning la-wɛdgẽ n dɩ, bɩ a ra ning n kõ a to ye.
ne b ba-biisã sẽn yaa b buudã kãsem-dãmbã. Nin-kãsems nins sẽn dag n tʋmd Wẽnd doogã tʋʋmã sõor yaa neb tusr la kobs-yopoe la pis-yoobe. A Bakbakaar yaab-rãmb yaa a Herɛɛse, a Galalle, a Mataniya, a Miise, ne a Zikri, la a Azafe. 
Zig-wãad biig kiida ne zigri
A Yamyιιd kibare
La a ra ket n wẽendame bal tι yẽ na paam nin-bãmbã. Rasem a wãn yel-kãensã fãa loogr poore, naab kιtame tι! b tall loalg n tι kιs a Yellpagindma, t’a reeg-a n wubi.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kʋdrã tɩ paam-a Wẽnnaam daoã sẽn yit Zʋʋda wã t'a zĩ tɩɩg tẽngre, t'a sok-a yaa: «Yaa foom la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ning sẽn yi Zʋʋda n wa wã bɩ?» T'a leok tɩ: «N-yẽe! Yaa maam!» La Wẽnnaam daoã yeelame yaa: «Mam ka tõe n tũ yãmb n kuil ye! Mam ka tog n lemb rɩɩbo, wall m yũ koom tẽn-kãngã ye!» 
Neb sẽgda taab la tãms pa sẽgd taab ye
Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd yaab-rãmb a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoob Wẽnnaam, bɩ y kɩt tɩ tagsg a woto kell n zĩnd y nebã sũy pʋse, tɩ b yam kẽ yãmba. Kõ-y mam biig a Salmo sũur sẽn pid ne ratem, t'a tõe n sak yãmb tõodã ne y zãmsgã la y noyã, la a rɩk b fãa n ning b nao-kẽndr zugu, n tõog n me roog ning mam sẽn segl bũmb fãa a yĩngã.» 
Fõndasẽo EBOMAF nooga karen-biis 1500 sũuri.
A kell n wilgame tɩ sɛkã pʋgẽ, b togsa CEDEAO sullã sẽn dɩk na-kẽnda nins n na n yãag Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã, tɩ b tõog n zã tãrazisẽo wã t’a tũ sore.
Naab nong talg bɩ a tall a zɩlemde
t'a Abisuwa rog a Buki, t'a Buki rog a Uuzi, t'a Uuzi rog a Zeraya, Ad tẽngã zĩis nins a Leevi yagensã sẽn zĩndi, wa sẽn zems b sik zĩisã ne b soolmã.  Ad tẽms nins b sẽn maan poeer n yãk n kõ a Aarõ kom-dibli wã sẽn yaa a Kehat roogã nebã: 
Nin-kẽem yam kuuda a to taoore
Yaa rẽ t’a kot nin-buiida tɩ b gãd taab nus tɩ rẽ, la b na n tõoge.
Mam na n tʋma mam yɛɛsg tɩ reng yãmb taoore, la m na n kɩtame tɩ rabeem kẽ neb nins fãa yãmb sẽn na n kẽng b sʋkã, la m kɩt tɩ y rig y bɛɛbã fãa tɩ b zoe. Mam na n tʋma kãnenkãas tɩ b reng yãmb taoor n dig Hevi-rãmbã ne Kana-rãmbã la Hɛt-rãmbã tɩ b zoe. 
F ba sã tall-f tɩ f yẽn yi, bɩ f tall-a t'a yẽn vigi
Karen-biisã ba-rãmb kẽer wilgame tɩ b bee kambã poorẽ, tɩ bala, yaa bũmb sẽn segde.
Nug-tikr 12 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR sullã sẽn gʋls tẽngã zãab na-kẽndr seb-kãnga wã, a bee na-kẽndr pʋgẽ, hal sẽn sɩng ne bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
Nin yend tar yam me, yiib n yɩɩda
Sẽn na yɩl tɩ tõnd buudã goam tõog n piuug la a kẽng taoore, b zĩnig na-kẽnda, n na n yãag-a.
La a Zʋʋda yeela a ba a Zakoob yaa: «Ade, Ezɩpt soolmã naab keooga tõnd vẽeneg n yeele: yãmb yao wã sã n ka tũ yãmba, mam ka na n deeg yãmb ye. Dẽ wã, yãmb sã n sak n na n bas tɩ tõnd yao wã tũ tõnd n kẽnge, d na n lebg n lebame n tɩ ra koodã n wa kõ-yã. 
A kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ tʋʋma fãa segd n tʋma ne yãgbo, yõ-koglgã, laafɩ wã, la meebã wɛɛngẽ.
Soaamb sũ-noog raare, a zug kẽeda waoogẽ.
Sɩɩg-sõng togsa vẽeneg tɩ yaoolem wakate, neb kẽer na n basa tẽebo, n pʋg belgr sɩɩse, la zãmsg zĩn-dãmb sẽn kõta. B yeta nebã tɩ b da yi kãadem ye, la b bas rɩɩb kẽer n da rɩ ye, tɩ Wẽnnaam yaool n naan rɩ-kãens tɩ neb nins sẽn maand sɩda la sẽn mi sɩdã na rɩ ne bark pʋʋsgo. 
La a Israyɛll pɩʋʋga a nusã taaba, n dɩk a nug-rɩtgã n tik a Efrayiim sẽn yaa yao wã zugu, la a rɩk a nug-goabgã n tik a Manaase sẽn yaa kãsma zugu. A Zakoob ninga a Zozɛf zug bark n yeele:  «Bɩ Wẽnnaam ning mam yaab a Abrahaam ne m ba a Izak sẽn dag n tũudã, soab ning sẽn yɩ-a mam pe-kɩɩm hal m dogmã daar n tãag rũndã wã, 
Maan sãnem halaal sogle, n kal-a wa wĩir n ning yãoog lutgã zugu. Tong sãnem wĩy a yiibã ne tuiids a yiibã sẽn be yãoog lutgã kɩrems a yiibã gõdgr zĩisẽ wã. 
sãnem, sãnem teedã yĩnga, ne wanzuri, wanzuri teedã yĩnga, la ne tʋʋm nins fãa tʋʋm-mitbã sẽn na n maanã yĩnga. Moasã, ãnda yãmb sʋkã n na n yãk a sãnem ne a wanzuri n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab ne yamleoog rũndã? Dẽ, buudã kãsem-dãmba, ne Israyɛll buudã nanambse, la tãb-biis tusr-tusr ne tãb-biis koabg-koabg nanambsã, n paas ne rĩmã tʋʋmã taoor dãmb yãka yam, n na n kõ kũun ne yamleoogo. 
La sẽn ya SIDAwã bãag n kʋ a mawã yĩngã, pagb a taaba ra zoeta rabeem, n tagsdẽ tɩ bãmb sãn yẽsm biigã, SIDAwã bãag na n tũnga biigã n yõk bãmba.
la tẽn-kugr ning b sẽn na n yõog maand bugum a zugã ne teedã fãa, la sĩngã me ne a tɛbendgã. Welg-y bãmb tɩ b lebg bũmb sẽn welg toor wʋsgo. La bũmb sã n sɩɩs bãmba, bõn-kãng me na n welga toore. 
La a Israyɛll kom-dibli wã tũu neb a taabã n wa n na n da kood wa nebã fãa. Bala, komã rag n kẽe Kana soolmã gilli. La mikame tɩ yaa a Zozɛf n dag n yaa Ezɩpt soolmã balem-naaba. La yaa yẽnda n kõt noor tɩ b koosd koodã ne nebã fãa. Dẽ, a Zozɛf kẽem-dãmbã wa n wõgemdame, n fõgen b nens tẽng yẽnda taoore. 
Nin-bãmbã fãa sẽn tõe n bob zab-teed n kẽng zabr zĩigẽ wã waa Ebrõ ne yam a yembre, n na n pʋdg a Davɩɩd zug rĩung kaam t'a lebg Israyɛll soolmã fãa rĩmã. La yɩɩ ne yam a yembr la Israyɛll neb a taabã fãa pʋdg a Davɩɩd zug rĩung kaam t'a lebg rĩmã. Bãmb zĩnda Ebrõ ne a Davɩɩd rasem a tãabo, n dɩtẽ la b yũuda, bala b ba-biisã rag n segla rɩɩb bãmb yĩnga. 
Yẽnda bolga a zugã ne a kɩremsã fãa ne a yɩɩlã ne sãnem, n maan sãnem kogr n gilg-a. Yẽnda maana nug-tikr kaam sẽn welg toore, ne wisd halaal sẽn tar yũ-noogo, wa parfẽ-maand sẽn maand to-to wã. 
Ka rẽ bι: Woto pa yãmb pυgdb a Kayam sẽn bĩngã? La katr sẽn pa mi tι soaamb tũnugda gεlã baoob n tυυd-a wã, a wudgda fulll... n tι wυke, la a maandẽ tι. – Fo sιd bãngame. Yaa m yεsb a Sepãar n dυυge. Yaa sιda, woto me yaa m pυgdb a Kayam n bĩngi.
B kõo yẽnda ne a Ayisamak biig a Oholiyaab sẽn yaa Dan buudã nedã yam tɩ b zãms neb a taabã me. Bãmb kõo bãmb yam tɩ b maan tʋʋmã buud fãa tɩ yɩ neere: Yaa kug peesg tʋʋmde, la sʋnd wʋgbo, la sẽn bokd peend tɩ yɩ gʋlma ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miidu la lamd gĩs-bãanega. Yaa tʋʋm buud nins fãa tʋʋm-mit sẽn maandã.» 
Gom-zug a naas soaba: sari wɛɛngẽ Nug-tikr a 8 soaba: sari wã roog so a menga, yaa bʋ-kaood rotã rãmb n gãnegdb na-kẽnda n tũudẽ.
M kom-sõma, da yɛɛs-y bugum ninga sẽn wulumd yãmb sʋka wa bõn-lingdem ye tɩ yaa Wẽnd n dat n fɛɛs yãmba. Y sã n naag Krista n namsdẽ bɩ y noog y sũuri tɩ b ziira pukr daare y na naag n lang la y kɩdem sũ-noogo. 
Ned ka mi a sẽn sɛgd n kogel a meng ne SIDAwã bãag n yɩɩd yãmb ye. Yãmb y tãaba mii kaorengo; neba me  miimi tɩ yãmb mii bũmb niis fãa sẽn kẽed ne SIDAwã bãaga yelle.“ B sakame.
Dẽ, rĩm a Hiram yeela rĩm a Salmo yaa: «M saam-biiga, yaa bõe tẽms la fo sẽn kõ maamã?» La a pʋda tẽmsã yʋʋr tɩ Kabulli, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹ka võor ye›, la b ket n boonda tẽn-bãmb a woto hal tɩ ta rũndã. Ad tʋʋm-wɛgl nins rĩm a Salmo sẽn modg nebã tɩ b tʋmã: Yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã ne a na-yirã meebo, la Milo ne Zeruzalɛm lalgã, la Hatsoor ne Megido, la Gezɛɛr tẽmsã meebo. 
Pa reng n dog la wobg yãab ye
La a Zakoob welga rũmsã buud fãa toor-toor n dɩk-b fãa n kɩs a tʋmtʋmdbã, la a yeel-b yaa: «Bɩ yãmb lʋɩ mam taoore, la y bas vɩʋʋg rũm-sull ne a to sʋka.» A Zakoob yeela pipi tʋmtʋmdã yaa: «Mam kẽem a Ezayu sã n seg foom n sok-f tɩ fo yaa yɛ neda, la f rabda yɛɛnẽ, tɩ la yaa ãnda n so rũm-kʋʋngã sẽn be fo taoorã, 
Nin yend maanda yell tɩ pak nebã fãa
Fo yagensã sõor na n yɩɩ wʋsg wa tẽng tom. Fo yagensã na n saag n pida poorẽ la taoore, ne goabg la rɩtgo. Dũniyã nebã fãa na n paama bark foom ne f yagensã zug maasem yĩnga. 
A Moyiis yeela Israyɛll nebã yaa: «Ade, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yãka a Ʋʋr biig a Uuri biig a Betsaleyɛll sẽn yaa Zʋʋda buudã nedã. la a pees kug ne litla, n ning gãtsã pʋse, la a pees raad n tʋm tʋʋm-minim tʋʋm buudã fãa. 
Na-kẽnd-kãens buudã lebsda kibaya kũuni, la mao tɩ nin-buiidã pẽneg taabã poorẽ.
Yɩɩ SENAZA wã pʋgẽ, la ministɛɛrã tʋm-tʋmdb ka tɛk zẽk b naoor n tɩ zĩnd n maan kaset tɩ b zĩnig-a.
Rẽ wã, ad ka yãmb n kɩt tɩ mam wa kaanẽ ye, yaa Wẽnnaam n tʋm maam! La yaa Wẽnnaam n kɩte, tɩ mam lebg wa Faarõ ba, la m soog a yirã fãa, la m yɩ naab n soog Ezɩpt soolmã zãnga. 
M lebga no-kɩɩsa ne Noora tõatba — m yaool n pa ned sẽn yiis a meng Wẽnd Noora tũudmẽ ye, tɩ m deegda Krista Noore — n na n paam sẽn ka tũud-b Noora rãmba. 
kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbã nengẽ.
A Meraari yageng a Ooza rag n tara kom-dibli a naase: Pipi soabã yaa a Simri. Baa ne yẽnda sẽn dag n ka bi-kãsengã, a ba a Meraari kõ-a-la naamã. Rigno-gũudbã sul-kãens sẽn yaa nanambs wa b ba-biisã rag n be b zĩigẽ n maand b tʋʋmd Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã pʋgẽ. 
Tι naabã yeel-a: Kelg ka biigã! Ra yaal maam koe! Yaa bõe goam la woto? Fo sẽn dogã tεka yaa, fo zoe n wυmame tι rao rog yã?
Yaa rẽ n so t’a Bertrã Tarwar wẽ n sui tɩ Etalõ paam bi a yiibu, tɩ Komoor rãmb pa zaalem.
Bãmb sõnga a Davɩɩd tãb-biisã, bala, b rag n yaa gãndaado, la b lebga tãb-biisã nanambse. A Zuʋda yagensã sẽn dag n zãad gãn-bedrã ne kãndã sõor yaa tãb-biis tus a yoob la kobs-nii. 
A kẽndã võore, yaa sẽn na n keng b raoodo, b sẽn sak n kẽes b mens n zabd tẽngã yĩnga.
Mam paooda wʋsgo, dẽ, mam ka zems tɩ paam maan-neer ning ne pʋ-peelem ninga yãmb sẽn maan mam sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã yĩngã ye. Bala, mam sẽn wa n na n dʋʋg Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlgã, rag n yaa dasaar bal la mam tara. La moasã, mam lebga sul a yiibu. 
A Rãamd kiba-kɩtbã.
Gedɛɛr tẽng rao a Baall-Hanan n dag n get oliiv tɩɩsã ne wom-seesã sẽn be tẽngã nug-goabgã yelle.  A Yoaas n dag n get kaamã bĩngr yelle. Ismayɛll buudã ned a Obill n dag n get yʋgma wã yelle.  Meronot tẽng rao a Yekdeya n dag n get bõensã yelle. 
Da bas-a n ka sɩbg ye. Bala, fo tara yam, la fo mi f sẽn na n maan-a bũmb ninga. Bɩ f kɩt t'a zoob-peendã monem ne zɩɩm n sig kɩɩm-kulgu.» Dẽ, a Salmo leda a ba a Davɩɩd zaoorẽ, la a naamã paama pãng wʋsgo. 
Mam meng na n yãaga foom n kẽng Ezɩpte, la mam mengã n na n leb n tall foom n wa. Yaa a Zozɛf meng nug n na n mum fo nin f kũum daare.» A Zakoob yii Bɛɛr-Seba. A Israyɛll kambã talla b ba a Zakoob ne bãmb kambã ne b pagbã ne terok-rãmb nins Faarõ sẽn dag n kõ tɩ b tɩ rɩk-b n wa wã. 
Salensaag yet tɩ tigem taab n dɩkd kõbre
Yãmb sẽn nong Sẽn-Ka-Saab ne y sũyã fãa to-to rũndã wã, bɩ y kell n nong bãmb woto wakat fãa, la y sak bãmb noyã, n kẽn wa sẽn zems bãmb tõodã.» Rĩm a Salmo maana zems-n-taar maando. Yẽnda rɩka rũm-bɛd tus pisi la a yiibu, ne rũm-bãooneg tus koabg la pisi n maan maoong Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga. La rĩmã ne Israyɛll nebã fãa ninga Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã barka. 
Dẽ yĩngã, bɩ f kɩt tɩ b kẽes fo rũmsã ne bũmb nins fãa fo sẽn so tɩ be weoogẽ wã roogẽ. Rũms nins fãa ne neb nins fãa b sẽn ka kẽes roog pʋgẽ wã, sapɩlmã na n pãb bãmb tɩ b ki.» 
A Salmo rag n nonga Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, n maand bũmb nins a ba Davɩɩd sẽn dag n wilg yẽnda wã. La yaa maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ wã la yẽnda me rag n maand a maandã, la a yõogd tɩdarã. Rĩm a Salmo kẽnga Gabawõ n na n tɩ maan maoongo, bala yaa beenẽ n yaa maoong kʋʋb zĩisã zĩ-kãseng n yɩɩda. La beenẽ, rĩm a Salmo maana maand tusr sẽn yõogd bugum tẽn-kugrã zugu. 
La maan-kʋʋdbã sẽn wa n yit zĩ-sõngẽ wã, sawaodg n wa n pid Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã. Dẽ, rĩm a Salmo zẽka a koɛɛg n yeele:  «Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yãmb yeelame tɩ y rat n zĩnda zĩ-libsgẽ. 
A Supim ne a Oosa n na n gũ rignoor ning sẽn be-a nin-taoor sẽnẽ, n tees Salekɛt sor ning sẽn dʋʋd tãngã. Sull fãa rag n tota a to. Ro-bilã sẽn be nin-taoorã sẽnẽ, yaa Leevi neb a naase, tɩ sorã sẽnẽ yaa neb a naase, tɩ ro-bilã sẽnẽ yaa neb a yiibu. 
Dũni yaa yʋgemde, a sã n gãand bɩ f pĩnd n zomb-a
A talg yel-sõmd ka tat naaba, kal a yel-beedo.
Fo sã n pa tar ligd me, f ka tõe n paam bũmb a nengẽ ye.
gũud m ba Katr lebgre. A sẽn wa n tool n yã a sẽn watã, a gãanda sorã zugu, n maan wala a kiime. A Katr sẽn wa n yã-a, la a sẽn gom a pυgẽ woto: M mi tι yaa komã n kυ yãoã wε! Sẽn pa tar-a rabaar kõn yi sẽoogã ye. La a tutẽ.
Ned fãa tãn-beok la Gãmb tãnga
Yaa sẽn ta yʋʋm a 2 woto, la b tʋm sodaas kẽer Gibo.
n lebg n leb a yaopã nengẽ n tɩ sok-b yaa: «Mam na n kẽe yɛ? Biigã ka leb n be bulgẽ wã ye!» La bãmb dɩka fuugã n tʋm tɩ b tɩ kɩs b baaba n yeele: «Tõnd yãnda woto n dɩke, reeg-y n ges-y yaa yãmb biigã fuugã bɩ, bɩ ka rẽnda?» 
«Mam da rabda weoogẽ wã, tɩ bũmb tek n dig maam, tɩ tõnd mao ne taaba, t’a sã bĩndu.»
La a Rebeka rag n kelgda a Izak sẽn dag n gomd ne a biig a Ezayu wã. La a Ezayu yiime n loog weoog n na n tɩ bao we-nemd n wa. A yeel-a lame t'a tɩ bao we-nemd n wa segl rɩ-noog n kõ-a t'a rɩ, la a ning-a bark Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, la a yaool n ki. 
Sɩda d sã n gomame waa d yika gãeemdo, yaa Wẽnd yĩnga; d sã n gomd tɩ tũudẽ, yaa yãmb yĩnga. B sẽn ki fãa gill yĩngã, yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ sẽn vɩ-ba da le vɩɩnd d mens yĩng ye, b vɩɩnd sẽn ki-a la sẽn vʋʋg-a b fãa yĩnga. 
Faarõ leokame: «Beoogo.» La a Moyiis yeelame: «A na n yɩɩ wa yãmb sẽn yeelã, tɩ yãmb tõe n bãng tɩ bũmb a to ka be sẽn zem Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã ye. 
Ya wẽndo-kãng taor soaba  bala n wa n ges a Pok baaba sẽn deng b kũuma
Wẽnnaam kõ a Salmo yam ne bãng-kãsenga. La yẽnda minimã rag n yaa wʋsg wa bĩisrã sẽn be ko-kãsengã noorã. A Salmo yamã rag n yɩɩda nebã fãa. Yẽnda yamã rag n yɩɩda Ezrak rao a Etãn, ne a Maholl kambã: yaa a Eman, a Kalkolle, ne a Darda. La rẽ kɩtame t'a Salmo yʋʋrã yi n saag soolem nins fãa sẽn dag n gũbg bãmbã. 
B maana, gilgri, la b gilgrã pʋgẽ, b yãa kamb sẽn be ninbãaneg pʋgẽ.
Bãmb tõeeme n kẽng lɔgtor yir n tɩ mak n gese b ka tar  SIDAwã bãag bila.
gãndaadã fãa tɩ rɩka a Sayull ne a kom-dibli wã kũumã, n tall n kẽng Yabɛɛs tẽnga. Bãmb muma b kõabã terebẽnt tɩɩg tẽngr Yabɛɛse, la b loe noor dasem a yopoe. Yẽnda sẽn ka bao Sẽn-Ka-Saab sõngrã yĩnga, Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame t'a ki, la b kɩt t'a Izayi biig a Davɩɩd led a zĩigẽ n lebg rĩmã. 
A Rebeka yika ne a tʋmtʋmd-pogsã n zomb yʋgma n tũ raoã tɩ b na n looge. A Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdã peega a Rebeka n tall n looge. Wakat-kãnga, rag n nan yaa a Izak sẽn yi Lakayi-Royi bulgã n wa. Bala, yẽnda rag n tɩ tilga Negɛɛv soolem. 
T‘a Pok yeel-a yaa: “Ai! D sɛgd n maana d sẽn toẽ bal n vɩɩmde.“
La Sẽn-Ka-Saab sɩbga nebã, nag-bil ning bãmb ne a Aarõ sẽn maanã yĩnga. 
La wakat-kãng t'a Hadaad dag n yaa bi-ribl-bilf bala, la yẽnda tũu Edom neb kẽer sẽn dag n yaa yẽnda ba wã tʋmtʋmdb n zoe n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽnga. Bãmb yii Madiyã n kẽng Paarã we-raoogẽ wã. La b peega Paarã raop kẽer tɩ b tũ bãmb n kẽng Ezɩpt rĩm a Faarõ nengẽ. La Faarõ kõ a Hadaad roogo, n ges a rɩɩb yelle, la a kõ-a pʋʋgo. 
A Zozɛf kosgo. A Zozɛf kẽngame n tɩ togs Faarõ yaa: «Mam kẽem-dãmbã ne m ba wã yii Kana tẽng n wa. B waa ne b rũm-bãoonego, la b rũm-bɛda, ne bũmb nins fãa b sẽn so wã, la b tɩ bee Gosɛn tẽngã pʋga.» 
Wam-zaok n be tɩ wam-sãag põaasa.
A Yisakaar yagense. A Yisakaar doga kom-dibli a naase: yaa a Tola, a Puwa, a Yasuubi, ne a Sɩmron. A Tola kom-dibli yaa a Uuzi, a Refaya, a Yeriyɛlle, a Yamayi, la a Yibsam ne a Sãmwɛlle. Bãmb n dag n yaa a Tola buudã kãsem-dãmba. B rag n yaa gãndaado, wa sẽn zems b roto. A Davɩɩd zamaanẽ wã, b sõorã rag n yaa neb tus pisi la a yiib la kobs-yoobe. 
Togs sɩd pa sãamd zood ye
A kos -b lame tɩ b modg tɩ b sã n na n kõ kibay bɩ yɩ kibar sẽn nafd nin-buiidã, la b gũusi, n da wa kõ kibay sẽn paasd bɛ wã pãnga, a tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ ye.
Dẽ me n makd sooba sẽn fãagd yãmb me marsã. Ka yĩnga rẽgd la a pekd ye, a kɩtame tɩ ned kam fãa rɩk a menga n ko Wẽnd ne pʋ-peelem, A Zezi Krista sẽn vʋʋga yĩnga. 
A Zakoob paa beenẽ n gãand yʋn-kãnga. A Zakoob yãka bũmb nins yẽnda sẽn so wã n na n kõ a kẽem a Ezayu. la a yãk yʋgem-yãans pis-tã ne b kamb sẽn ket n yẽsemdẽ, la a yãk nag-yãans pis-naase, ne lols piiga, la a yãk bõn-yãans pisi ne bõn-daad piiga. 
A sẽn loog be, a tι moona gυga, la a yeel nebã tι yẽ tara tão-tι põog tιιm. Gυgã raar yibeoogo, yẽ n lυι taoor n tar faoodg faoodg, tι nebã pυgda. A sẽn wa n kolg katr sẽn kiẽ wã, a kιtame tι kẽer kẽng rιυtgo, tι kẽer kẽng goabga.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Eli yaa: «Yi tãngã bokẽ n tɩ yals maam a Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor tãngã zugu, n ges mam sẽn na n looge!»  Dẽ, sob-kãseng n yiki, n pãrg tãmsã n kɩt tɩ pĩisã wãad Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore. Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n ka be sebgã pʋg ye. Sebgã loogr poore, tẽn-digimdg n zĩndi, la Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n ka be tẽn-digimdgã pʋg ye. La tẽn-digimdgã loogr poore, bugum n pʋgle, la Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n ka be bugmẽ wã ye. Bugmã loogr poore, a Eli wʋma pemsem sẽn fʋʋsd rãamde. 
A Izak yeela a biig a Zakoob yaa: «Ad f paama nemdã tao-tao wɛ m biiga!» La a Zakoob leokame: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã kɩtame tɩ we-rũmsã wa mam sẽn beẽ wã.» La a Izak yeela a Zakoob yaa: «M biiga, bɩ f kolg tɩ m saag-f n ges fo sã n sɩd yaa mam biig a Ezayu.» 
 La, a sok-a lame t’a yeele : «Mam kẽngame, n na n tɩ bao m yɛl võore, bagr soab nengẽ, t’a yeele, tɩ m bao yɩbrg-vɩɩg n bil m yĩngã, n maan maoongo.
Sãan la koom
Yaa rẽ n so tɩ b segd n sõd b fãa n togse, tɩ b tara b tʋʋmde.
Lar sã n noomẽ, a to n ke a sãala.
Ka zu-sõng pa tat zẽegẽ ye
Rĩmã yeela a Simeyi yaa: «Fo mengã mii wẽng ning fãa fo sẽn maan m ba a Davɩɩdã. Dẽ wã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n kɩtame tɩ f wẽnemã fãa leb-fo. Dẽ, rĩm a Salmo yeela a Zehozada biig a Benaya t'a kʋ a Simeyi. La a Benaya yiime n kʋ-a. Woto kɩtame t'a Salmo naamã tall pãnga. 
Nin-kãng yĩnga, mam da tõeeme n zẽk m menga, la sã n ya maam, m komsma bal la m na n lʋɩɩs taoore. Sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ m zu-nooga ra wa ne m nagre, m paama namsg sẽn wẽnd moog n sorg m yĩngã, wẽnd Sʋtãan n gõod n laand-m pegse — tɩ m da maan nagr ye! 
La rẽ, tɩ Farens sodaasã ra zoe n bee zĩigẽ wã.
A Moyiis zoeeme n kẽng Madiyã. Wakat-kãnga, a Moyiis sẽn wa n lebg bi-kãsenga, a yiime n kẽng n na n tɩ ges a saam-biisã, la a yãnda tʋʋm-wɛglã b sẽn tʋmdã. Yẽnda yãnda Ezɩpt ned a yembr sẽn pãbd Ebre ned sẽn yaa yẽnda saam-biiga. 
Tι kinkirgã yet t'a Kazυr sã n pa sake, a na n keeg-a-la wala a sẽn keeg kυkã. T 'a Kazυr me yeel-a t'a sã n pa maan gũusgu, yẽ na n tão-a-la wala a sẽn tão piigã. Kinkirgã sẽn ges yĩngr n ges tẽngre, a sẽn basd a Kazυr sιι... ne a pagã n na n sãoog a yĩnga.
A zagl sã n kʋ waafo, bɩ f ra gãndg-a ye
·  Kõsog yõkda a soaba tɩ yɩɩg kiuugu.
Mam soaal a Abrahaam pag a Saara roga mam soaalã bi-ribl a kʋʋlem wakate. La b rɩka b paoongã fãa n kõ bi-ribl-kãnga. Mam soaalã kɩtame tɩ mam wẽene.» Bãmb yeelame: «Wẽen tɩ f ka na n bao pag Kana soolmã pʋga, tẽng ning pʋg tõnd sẽn beẽ wã kom-pugli sʋka, n kõ mam biigã ye. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ rĩmã sũur kenge. La rĩmã ka kelg bãmb ye. Yɩɩ wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. 
Neba tẽeda bõe sẽn kẽed ne pagba la raopa bãoong kõom ? Ya a nẽng bʋg n tõe n kɩt tɩ SIDAwã bãag bil paam pãnga ? Dẽ yĩnga d tõe n teka nẽm bʋse ? D na n maana a wãna ?
Nug-tikr a 3 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR sullã sigla wa sẽn pʋgdã; a tara taoor soaba, taoor soab pʋgdga, la taoor soab pʋgdga a yiib n soaba, ned sẽn get sullã siglg yelle, la yaa sull-kasens a yiib n be a pʋgẽ.
A paasame tɩ sodaasã sula kẽera ra kẽesa mens politikã tʋʋm pʋga.
A Moyiis yãka bʋ-kaoodba. Vẽkembeoogo, a Moyiis zĩndame n na n kao nebã bʋʋdo. Nebã yalsa a Moyiis taoor yibeoog hal tɩ ta zaabre. 
Sãn n ka  woto, dẽ yĩnga yãmb tagsdame tɩ ned segd n kõo zãms kãnga bii?
A Pok yɛɛsame n yeel-a yaa: “La tõnd na n maana a wãnã? Tõnd na n kẽe yɛɛne?“
Al naoor a tãabo mam yõka Soaala sɛɛga tɩ b fãag maam, Yaa rẽ me yĩng la m pid ne sũ-noogo m sẽn sak Krista yĩnga, komsma, paoogrã, naongã, namsgã, yɩɩrã. La m sẽn waa n lebg koams zãnga la m lebg pãng soaba. 
La f kɩt tɩ yẽnda kom-dibli wã kolg tɩ f yeelg bãmb b futu. A Moyiis maana wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel yẽnda wã kɛpɩ. A maana a woto. 
 Guugã, yaa sẽn na n tall n kẽ n pãb yãmb n kʋ».
La wa n tɩ yɩɩd fãa yʋʋm 2022 soabã pʋgẽ.
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbã nengẽ.
«Yãmb ba wã dag n namsda tõnd wʋsgo, dẽ, tõnd kot-y lame tɩ y yols tõnd ne namsg ning y ba sẽn dag n namsd tõndã, woto, d na n yɩɩ yãmb tʋmtʋmdba.» Woto, rĩm a Roboaam soka nin-kẽemb nins sẽn dag n zĩnd ne yẽnda ba a Salmo wã yaa: «Ne yãmba, y sagenda maam tɩ m maan a wãna?» 
Polɩɩs rãmbã taoor soab a Rooze WEDRAOOG wilga miniisrã tɩ bãmb me na n maana b pãng sẽn tõe fãa, tɩ ne sodaasã taabã sõngre, bɩ b tõog n tʋm tɩ yõ-koglg meng-meng zĩnd tɩ nin-buiidã vɩɩmd ne bãane.
Kapitɛnd Yɩbryɩɩm TARWAR yãka zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15 sẽn watã raare, tɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor dãmb na n seg taab n dɩk noy tãrãzisẽo wã zãab wɛɛngẽ tɩ b boond tɩ Asɩɩsnasnalle.
Fo sã n ka bas mam nebã tɩ b looge, mam na n tʋma kɛooda foom ne f poorẽ dãmbã la f nebã nengẽ la fo rotã pʋsẽ. Ezɩpt nebã rot na n pida ne kɛooda, la tẽngã nebã sẽn yas a zugã me na n pida ne kɛooda. 
B kell n tall b burkĩndã, la b vɩɩmd-n-taarã.
Ba ne b sẽn deeg bi a yiibã Komoor rãmb ka bas raood ye.
B wʋga fut nins maan-kʋʋdbã sẽn na n yeelg n maan sɛk roogã tʋʋmdã ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miidu la lamd gĩs-bãanega. B maana a Aarõ fu-sõama wã wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. B maana maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã ne sãnem gĩsi, la gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo ne gĩs-moaama, la gĩs-miid ne lamd gĩs-bãanega. 
 La, pagã soka a sɩdã, a laadã võore, t’a sɩdã yet tɩ ka bũmb ye.
La Wẽnnaam waa a Abimelɛk nengẽ yʋng zãmsd pʋg n yeel-a yaa: «Fo na n kii pag ning fo sẽn peegã poorẽ. Bala, yẽnda tara sɩda.» Wẽnnaam leoka yẽnda zãmsdã pʋg n yeele: «Mam miime tɩ yel-kãngã pʋgẽ, fo bee f pʋ-peelem zugu. Rẽ n kɩte, tɩ mam mengã gɩdg foom tɩ f ra wa beeg maam ye. Yaa rẽ yĩnga, tɩ mam ka bas tɩ fo sɩɩs pagã ye. 
Bɩ Pãng-Soab a Wẽnnaam kɩt tɩ raoã zoe yãmb nimbãaneg n bas tɩ yãmb ba-biig a yembrã ne a Benzame tũ yãmb n wa. La sã n mikame tɩ mam na n konga m kambã, bɩ kong-ba!» Dẽ, bãmb dɩka kũunã, la b bao ligdã b sẽn tarã naoor a yiibu n zã, la b peeg a Benzame ta tũ. La bãmb loogame n ta Ezɩpt tẽnga, n kẽng a Zozɛf nengẽ. 
Yɩɩ Gʋngẽ Lekoll C wã pʋg la Kolɛɛs Wẽndmanegda, la reezẽo di sãntrã guvɛgneer a Abdulae Basenga n wa n yãag ministɛɛrã seb-gʋnd tɩ b kõ sor tɩ tʋʋmdã sɩnge.
Dũni me yaa boto
La yẽnda soka tẽngã neb yaa: «Wẽn-naands zĩigẽ pʋg-yoodrã sẽn dag n be Enayim tẽngã noor n zĩ sorã kɩrengã bee yɛɛnẽ?» Bãmb leoka yẽnda tɩ wẽn-naands zĩigẽ pʋg-yoodr ka be beenẽ ye. La a lebg n leba a Zʋʋda nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a: «Mam ka yãnd pagã ye. Zĩ-kãng nebã meng yeelame tɩ bãmb ka yãnd wẽn-naands zĩigẽ pʋg-yoodr beenẽ ye.» 
A Israyɛll vɩɩmã sẽn wa n dabd a sɛɛb zĩigẽ, yẽnda boola a biig a Zozɛf n yeel-a yaa: «Fo sã n nonga maam, mam kot-f lame tɩ f rɩk f nug n tik mam gerã, n wẽen tɩ f na n maan-m-la neere, la f na n maana sɩd ne maam, la f ka na n mum maam Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋg ye! 
Yãmb sãn n lagm ne ned sẽn tar SIDAwã bãag bila ? (Nyẽe)
Pondre ne m Ba Katr kũm-kũm sɩngre
Kugr sã n yit yĩngr n watẽ, ned fãa pĩida a zugu
Gʋɩɩn-n-vãoog sẽn tar a bugum samde,sam-kõn-sʋke.
A Israyɛll yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Ade, mam yẽ na n kiime! La Wẽnnaam na n zĩnda ne yãmba, la b na n kɩtame tɩ y lebg n leb y yaab-rãmbã tẽngẽ. Mam kõta foom pʋɩɩr n yɩɩd f kẽem-dãmbã. Yaa bũmb ning mam sẽn dag n zab ne sʋʋg la tãp n deeg Amoor-dãmbã nengẽ wã.» 
Ta a Ka-yell yaool n na n paam a meng n vʋɩɩnd ne laafɩ.
M pa na n nams n gʋls yãmb saam-biisa sõngra poorẽ ye. M na n deng n tʋma m saam-biisã tɩ mam sẽn pẽg yãmba da wa yɩ zirẽ-beedo la b mik tɩ yãmb segl n sɛɛme wa mam sẽn yeelã. 
Gosneem wilgame tɩ b na n mee logto-yi reezõ de Wobasẽ wã soolmẽ.
Mam kota foom Wẽnnaam taoore, la a Zeezi Kiris taoore, la maleg-tũusdsã taoore, tɩ f tũ no-kãens n da tũus nebã, wall f bak neb kẽer n na n sõng ye. Da yũudẽ koom yeyn-yeyn bal ye. Mi n yũ  reezẽ  rãam bilfu, f pʋ-zabrã ne f yĩn-pa-noomã sẽn wat wakat wʋsgã yĩnga. 
A kosa tẽngã taoor soab t’a tʋme, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ nebã wa tẽegd n pẽgd-a.
A sẽn ges yemd me, yẽ me wẽnda a tara pẽnga. T’a bugsdẽ : ãndã pãng yιιd a to menga? La maanda a wãn nl bãnge? A soaamb yẽ na bãnge.
Dẽ yĩnga, yãmb tẽngẽ lɔgtor yiyã geta ned sãn tara SIDAwã bãag  bila a yĩnga pʋg bii? Dẽ yĩnga b tara tɩ-biis sẽn zabd ne SIDAwã  bãag bii? Dẽ yĩnga b tara tɩ-biis sẽn tõe n sõng tɩ pʋsa rãmb da kõ  b kom-peelsa SIDAwã bãag bil bii?
Kug-walsã yaa Wẽnnaam n maane, la gʋlsmã yaa Wẽnnaam n gʋlse, tɩ wẽnd wa ned sẽn gʋls ne kɩtg kug-wals zutu. A Zozoe sẽn wʋm nebã sẽn kaasdã, yẽnda yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Zabr kelems n be nebã sik zĩigẽ wã!» 
Wẽnnaam ka kõt nag-tãadg yɩɩl ye.
A Davɩɩd gãndaadã. A Davɩɩd dag n paamda pãng n paasdẽ, la Saasẽ-Pãng-Soabã rag n bee ne yẽnda. A Davɩɩd gãndaadã la woto:  Yaa a Hakmoni biig a Yasobeyam sẽn yaa gũudbã naabã. Yaa a Yasobeyam n dag n dɩk a kãnd n kʋ neb kobs-tã wakat a yembrã. 
SIDAwã bãag sãn yõk foom, fo tõe n le paama laafɩ bii?
La tõnd ba wã yeelame: Lebg-y n leb-y n tɩ ra bɩle n wa. La tõnd yeela d ba wã tɩ tõnd ka tõe n lebg n lebe, tɩ tõnd yao-zʋʋgã ka tũ ye. Bala, raoã yeelame tɩ tõnd yao wã sã n ka tũ tõndo, bãmb ka na n deeg tõnd ye. 
Woto, rĩm a Aaza wʋka wanzuri wã ne sãnemã gill sẽn be Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã laog bĩngr zĩigẽ wã, la a wʋk na-yirã laogã, n kɩt t'a tʋmtʋmdbã tall n tɩ kɩs a Heziyõ biig a Tabrimo biig a Bɛn-Hadaad sẽn yaa Siiri rĩm n be Damaasã, la b yeel-a yaa: 
Gosneer kõo sor tɩ b sɩng sapaol-koobã.
La a Abram rũm-kɩɩmbã ne a Lot rũm-kɩɩmbã rag n zabda taaba. Wakat-kãng tɩ yaa Kana nebã ne Ferɛɛz-rãmbã n dag n be soolem-kãng pʋga. A Abram yeela a Lot yaa: «Mam kotame tɩ zabr da zĩnd maam ne foom sʋka, wall fo rũm-kɩɩmbã ne mam rũm-kɩɩmbã sʋk ye. Bala, tõnd yaa rogem. 
Gomd yaa wa sugr moogo, f sã n foog-a a lebsga yaa toogo
A Abrahaam ne a Saara rag n kʋʋlame, la b yʋʋmã rag n yaa wʋsgo. La a Saara rag n ka leb n yaa pag sẽn yãt a pekr ye. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Abrahaam yaa: «Bõe yĩng t'a Saara la, n yetẽ tɩ yẽnda yaa pʋg-yãang n ka leb n tõe n dog biiga? 
La, m ba Soaamb leok-b lame : «Kʋndã, yaa sẽn na n tar n wẽedẽ, tɩ y saoodẽ.
Gom-zug a nu soaba: nug tika , la zood ne zamaan-zẽnse Nug-tikr a 9 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã tara sor n tõe n yẽs ne tẽns a taab rãmba, la a tar sor n tõe n tall tʋmd-n-taar nug tikr ne-ba.
M kotame tɩ y yɩ bãgr ninga Wẽnd sẽn gũnug yãmba pe-kɩɩmba. Gu-y piisã la ra yɩ rok-m-zug tʋʋmd ye, a yɩ yamleoog tʋʋmde wa Wẽnd sẽn date. Da yɩ rolb yooda yĩng ye, a yɩ taab sõngr yamleoog bala. 
B tog n maana sɛk zĩigã tʋʋm teed fãa ne a biili wã fãa, la zakã biili wã fãa ne zũudu.» 
Gosneer tʋʋm noor ning sẽn get kaorengã yell sẽn be porvẽesã pʋgẽ wã pa le tʋmd ye.
 M ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katre kibare.
rẽ tɩ tɩɩg baa a yembr ka be tẽn-gãongã zugu, la mood me rag n nan ka yi wetã pʋs ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n nan ka kɩt tɩ saag ni dũniyã zug ye, la ninsaal me rag n ka be dũniyã zug n na n ko-a ye. 
Gom-zug a yoob soaba: tẽngã zãab na-kẽndr lebg n gese Nug-tikr 10 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR sullã rãmb tõe n dɩka na-kẽndr n lebg n ges b na-kẽndrã sebre, la rẽnda tũuda ne sullã neb pʋsʋk sẽn na n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b lebg n ges-a.
Nin-bãmbã fãa yaa a Eman kom-dibli. A Eman dag n yaa rĩmã bãngda, sẽn kẽed ne Wẽnnaam yɛlã wɛɛngẽ, sẽn na yɩl n wilg bãmb pãn-kãsengã. Wẽnnaam dag n kõ a Eman kom-dibli piig la a naase, la kom-pugli a tãabo. Nin-bãmbã ba wã n dag n lʋɩt b fãa taoore, tɩ b yɩɩnd Wẽnnaam doogã yɩɩla, la b wẽed kɛm ne pends la kʋl Wẽnnaam doogã pʋgẽ tʋʋmd yĩnga.  A Azaf ne a Yedutun la a Eman dag n tʋmda rĩmã yĩnga. 
 La, a pagã sũur puugame t’a yeel-a  : «Fo ka bark ye. Fo taaba fãa wat n kõta b pagbã rɩɩbo, tɩ b rɩtẽ. La fo zɩ, n wa ne rɩɩb ka ye».
‹Hal daar ning mam sẽn yiis Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã Ezɩpt tẽngã tɩ ta rũndã, mam ka yãk tẽng ba a yembr Israyɛll buudã tẽms sʋk n yeel tɩ b me roog mam yʋʋrã sẽn na n zĩnd a pʋgẽ ye. La mam yãka a Davɩɩd t'a yɩ Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã naaba.› La Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela m ba a Davɩɩd yaa: ‹Fo sẽn tags n dat n me roog mam yʋʋrã yĩngã, fo maana neere. 
 Nemdã yĩnga, zẽedã sɩd yɩɩ noog tɩ looge.
Manesem-kãng kẽesa a Zeroboaam ne a yirã rãmb kongr pʋga. Yaa rẽ n kɩte, tɩ b sãam a Zeroboaam yirã zãnga, n menes-b dũniyã zugu. 
Bɩ yaa maam ne a Barnabe bal n ka tar sore n vʋʋs ne tʋʋmde? Yaa ãnd n kẽed tãpo n le rɩt a meng ligdi? Ãnda n send tɩɩga tɩ b rigd a biis rɩɩbo? Ãnda n kɩɩmd rũmsi n ka rɩt b bĩisim? 
net.
Wẽnnaam na n fãaga Israyɛlle. Wẽnnaam goma ne a Moyiis n yeele: «Mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. La mam maana kãabg ne bãmb n yeel-b tɩ mam na n kõ-b-la Kana tẽngã, tẽng ning bãmb sẽn dag n yaa sãamb a pʋgẽ wã. 
Bao-y kamba biis zomã n naag ko-tʋulg n kõ y biigã. Dɩk-y sutug bɩ  wamd sẽn ya yɩlemde ningd n kõta.
Seg-taab kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ Asɩɩsnasnallã paka a kʋɩlense rũnda yibeoogã Wagademill sallde kõnferãasã pʋga.
Rasem sẽn looge, tẽngã taoor soab ra sega lagem-n-taar sula buud toor-toor taoor dãmba, la pagtɩ Politikã rãmba.
ƐMPESƐƐR a yiib soabã rãmb wilgame tɩ Letena Poll Ãari sãadaoogo DAMIB zãmba bãmba.
Wẽnnaam daoã kãaba tẽn-kugrã wẽng wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn wilgã n yeele: «Tẽn-kugri! Tẽn-kugri! Ade, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame tɩ bi-ribl n na n dog a Davɩɩd buudã pʋgẽ, la b na n pʋd-a a yʋʋr t'a Zoziyaase. La maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ maan-kʋʋdb nins sẽn yõogd wisd fo zugã, bi-kãng na n kʋ-b-la fo zugu, la b na n yõoga ninsaalb kõab fo zugu.» 
A Moyiis siga Sinayi tãngã zugu, la yẽnda rag n zãada kaset kug-wals a yiibã a nugẽ. Yẽnda sẽn wa n sigd tãngã zugã, a rag n ka mi tɩ yẽnda sẽn gom ne Sẽn-Ka-Saabã kɩtame tɩ yẽnda nengã pɩnd ye. 
La sõorã sẽn wa n na n pukã, rẽ t'a Zakoob pɩʋʋga Penuwɛll  kʋɩlgã. La a Zakoob rag n kẽnd n keoosdame, yẽnda kɩʋʋlgã sẽn dãmbã yĩnga. Yaa woto yĩng n kɩte, tɩ Israyɛll buudã ka rɩt kɩʋʋlg gĩind hal tɩ ta rũndã. Bala, Wẽnnaam sɩɩsa a Zakoob kɩʋʋlgã gĩindi. 
Bãmb n get yõ-koglgã, arzɛkã, sõng taabã, tẽngã taoor kẽnde, la tẽngã tods koglg yelle.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE kell n bẽda be n boond nin-buiida fãa tɩ b gãd taab nus n mao tɩ yõ-koglg kaalmã leb poorẽ.
Dẽ, a Moyiis yeela Wẽnnaam yaa: «Beneere! Wa mam sã n kẽng Israyɛll nebã nengẽ n tɩ yeel bãmb tɩ bãmb yaab-rãmbã Wẽnnaam n tʋm maam b nengẽ, tɩ bãmb sok maam a yʋʋre, mam na n leok-b lame tɩ bõe?» 
Israyɛll rĩm a Akaab yeela Zʋʋda rĩm a Zozafat yaa: «Mam na n teema fut n kẽng zabrã tɩ b ra bãng-m ye, la yãmb tõe n yeelga y naam futã.» Dẽ, Israyɛll rĩmã maana wa a sẽn yeelã n kẽng zabrã. Saar-dãmbã nanambs sẽn yãnd a Zozafate, bãmb tẽeme tɩ yaa Israyɛll rĩmã, la b kẽngame n na n tɩ zab ne-a. La a Zozafat kelmame n yeele: «Wa-y n fãag-y-ma!» 
Dɩt yɩng pa be kãabg ye
Maan neer tɩ b nams fo, Wẽnd sã n data, n são maan wẽnga n paam yĩn-maasem. Krista meng kii vugri, yel-wẽna yĩnga. Sẽn ka tar-a yelle kii yell maandb yĩnga, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n tall-do n taas Wẽnde. B yĩngẽ wã la b lebg-bõn kɩɩnga, b sɩɩgẽ wã b kell n yɩɩ bõn vɩɩga. 
Yaa sull ning sẽn teend kibay kũun nins sẽn so b mense, tɩ boond tɩ FAPEPE ( FAPP) wã n kõ-b sõngre, tɩ b reeg n zãms b tʋmtʋmdbã yõ-kaalem sasa kibaya tʋʋm sẽn segd n yɩ a soaba.
Baoosgo, mam na n kõo a biigã buud a yembr t'a sooge, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ mam tʋmtʋmd a Davɩɩd yʋʋrã ra menem mam taoor Zeruzalɛm sẽn yaa tẽng ning mam sẽn yãk m yʋʋrã yĩngã pʋgẽ ye. La mam na n kɩtame tɩ foom a Zeroboaam dɩ naamã wa f sẽn date, n yɩ Israyɛll rĩmã. 
Tãood-n-yõsd mi a sẽn na n dɩ a soaba.
Sõasgã pʋga, a togsa zu-loees nins a sẽn sege, a tʋʋmdã siglg wɛɛngẽ.
Sẽn yɩɩd fãa yõ-koglg kaalmã wɛɛngẽ.
M sẽn na n togsã, m ka na n togs-a ne Soaala yam ye, na n yɩɩ wa ne gãeemdo, tɩ m tara m sẽn na n pẽg m menga. Yãmb sakdame tɩ b kẽesd-y yembdo, tɩ b rɩt yãmba, tɩ b fãad yãmba, tɩ b tar yãmb toogo, tɩ b tʋʋd yãmb, tɩ b laand-y pegse. 
Bʋ-kaod-ro-kasengã no-rɛɛs a Buryaama SƖƖSE, togsa tẽngã taoor soaba, tɩ ka reeg naamã n ya zu-loɛɛgã ye, rẽndame tɩ b tõog n zã-a, la mao n tõog tɩ Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã yi b sẽn be namsg ning pʋgã.
Polɩɩs pipi tʋʋm pakre, yaa nebã ne b arzɛkã koglgo.
A Paskal Kaboor sẽn yaa soda-kʋdr wilgame tɩ sã n yaa ne yẽnda , tigsga loogr poore, yaa Kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWARE, la b yãk t’a zã tẽngã, tɩ permye minisrã yɩ nin-zaal sẽn tara revolisẽo wã yam.
Rẽ n kιt tι kazẽeg yaa moomdã. Yir me, yãndã kιtame tι b ka tõog n gom ye.
Maand-y bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩll tigrã, bala, yaa ra-kãng la mam yiis yãmb tãb-biisã Ezɩpt tẽnga. Bɩ y tẽegd da-kãng yelle, t'a yɩ no-tũudg sẽn ka sɛta, yãmb zamaan-dãmbã fãa yĩnga. 
La Faarõ yika tao-tao n kɩt tɩ b bool a Moyiis ne a Aarõ n yeel-b yaa: «Mam maana yel-wẽnd n beeg Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã, la m beega yãmb me. 
Sɛkã pʋgẽ, a kos-b lame tɩ b tʋm ne tʋʋlem la yãgbo, tɩ bũmbã fãa kẽng taoore.
Sulla neb sãn ya wʋsog bɩ y weel-b sull bõones pʋsẽ.
La Ezɩpt rãmba pʋgla bãmba, yaa Faarõ wiidã ne a saar-dãmbã la a wed-rʋʋdbã ne a tãb-bi-kʋʋngã. La bãmb paama Israyɛll nebã b sikã zĩigẽ ko-kãsengã noor sẽn be Pi-Hahirot n tot Baall-Sefondã. 
Bι d bãng tι rao ka segd n kẽnd t 'a ka tar nugẽ bũmb ye, rat n yet tι rao-teoog sẽn tõe n fãag-a. Tεk la tεka, kaoog raoog n lob pυg-yãanga, kinkirs reeg b bũmbu.
A Yitsaar kom-dibli wã sʋka, yaa a Selomote. A Selomot kom-dibli wã sʋka, yaa a Yakate. A Mika ba-biig a Yisiya kom-dibli wã sʋka, yaa a Zakari. 
A wilgame tɩ yaa tigsgã baosgẽ la b na n yãk taoor dãmba, la noy nins b sẽn na n tũ n zã tarãzisẽo wã.
A Zakoob sẽn nan ket n gomd ne bãmb bal yee, la a Rasɛll sẽn be waoongẽ ne a ba wã piisi. Bala, yaa a Rasɛll n dag n gũud piisã. A Zakoob sẽn yãnd a ma wã tão a Labã bi-pugl a Rasɛll ne a Labã piisã, yẽnda kolgame n bilg kugrã n bas bulgã noore, n yũnug a yɛsb a Labã piisã. 
La rasem a tãabẽ daarã, b tɩ togsa a Labã t'a Zakoob zoeeme. La Wẽnnaam wa n goma ne Aram ned a Labã yʋng zãmsd pʋgẽ n yeele: «Gũus f meng n da yeel a Zakoob tɩ bũmb ye.» 
Zug ka nemdo,wẽbg-f-rẽnd-n-gese.
 B sẽn wa n tar nemdã wõrsgo, m ba a Katr zoe-bõn soabã, kẽngame n tɩ wõrg sũurã, tɩ m ba Wobg ki, t’a yẽdgã page.
Zʋʋda rĩm a Aaza sẽn deeg naam tɩ yʋʋm yiiblẽ, la a Zeroboaam biig a Nadaab lebg Israyɛll rĩmã, la a rɩɩ naamã yʋʋm a yiibu. A Nadaab maana wẽng Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ. Yẽnda me maana wẽng wa a ba wã sẽn dag n maan n kɩt tɩ Israyɛll nebã lʋɩ kongr pʋgã. 
Yẽ paama SIDAwã bãaga bila pag a to nẽngẽ.
Zĩ-zulums lima bãmba.  Bãmb siga zĩ-zulumsẽ wa kugri. Yãmb naam-kãsengã pʋga,  yãmb lubda neb nins sẽn yik n zabd ne yãmbã. Yãmb tʋmda y sũ-kãbre, t'a rɩt bãmb wa moodo. 
B vẽnegame tɩ yaa Letena Kolonell DAMIB na-kẽndrã sẽn da pe le tũud wa bãmb sẽn da gãnegã ye.
A Akiluud biig a Baana n dag n so Taanak ne Megido, la yẽnda n so Bɛt-Seyãn sẽn pẽ Sartan sẽn be Yiizreyɛll sɛɛgã fãa. Yẽnda soolmã sɩngda Bɛt-Seyãn n tall n tɩ tãag Abɛll-Mehola n tɩ tãag Zokmeyam zugẽ. 
A Paskal Kaboor sẽn yaa soda-kʋdr wilgame tɩ sã n yaa ne yẽnda , tigsga loogr poore, yaa Kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWARE, la b yãk t’a zã tẽngã, tɩ permye minisrã yɩ nin-zaal sẽn tara revolisẽo wã yam.
Tõnd yelmansema wẽnda tɩɩg willi. Tõnd sẽn tẽed bũmb niisã  ne būmb niis tõnd sẽn tagsed tɩ b tara yõodã yaa wa tɩɩga yẽga.
Noor soab kõn kong sor ye
Marka rãmbã goama, neb koabg pʋga, neb a 2 n wʋmd-a la b gomd-a.
A Pok zaka rãmb tara zu-loeese
T’a gõodẽ n baood tẽngã sorã n kongdẽ, hal tɩ ko-yũud la kom wa tar-a.
Faarõ tʋma neb tɩ b tɩ gese, la b tɩ mikame tɩ Israyɛll nebã rũng ba a yembr ka ki ye. La baoosg zãnga, Faarõ sũur kengame t'a ka sak n bas Israyɛll nebã tɩ b loog ye.» 
Sã n ya ne Zerom KABRE«tõnd wʋmdame tɩ Zeenero rãmbã pa rat tɩ Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE lʋɩ tẽngã taoor ye, la yaool n yaa yẽ la tõnd rata.
Rũnnã rũndã tɩ-vʋtem ka be n tõe SIDAwã bãag bil ye, sẽn dat n yeel  tɩ tɩɩm ka be n tõe n gɩdeg tɩ SIDAwã bãag da yõk f ye
Pog-yãang sã n pagd peoog bɩ b sok a zʋgo
Tɩ b sɩd be taoor sãagre.
Ges-y neba sõor sul fãa pʋgẽ. Naor kẽere, sulla fãa tõe n naaga taab n sõse ; la wakat kẽer me, a zemsame tɩ y le pʋɩ b sul bõonse, neb a naas bɩ a yoob yoobe, wala neb a yiib yiib menga.
Kom-bɩɩb nins sẽn siglg tʋʋmdã taoor soab a Alẽ TARWAR tɩ boond t’a Alino Faso wilgame tɩ yaa kood toand 400 la futu la b paam yã.
Karen-biisã sẽn yi wã ya a Maru Yɩlbʋʋd sẽn ya Gibo Perfe wã la b kɩs b sũ-pa-noaangã sebre, la yẽ me pʋlmame t’a na taas b kosgã tẽngã zãadba.
La Gesʋʋr ne Siiri rĩm-dãmbã wa n zab n deega Yayɩɩr tẽmsã, n paas Kenat tẽngã ne a tẽn-kɩremsã, la tẽn-bãmb fãa sõorã yaa tẽms pis-yoobe. La neb nins fãa sẽn dag n be tẽn-bãmb pʋgẽ wã rag n yaa a Galaad ba a Makɩɩr yagense. A Ɛtsron sẽn ki Kalɛɛb-Efratã zugẽ, yẽnda pag a Abiya roga yẽnda biig tɩ b pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Asʋʋre. A Asʋʋr yaa a Tekoa ba. 
Sẽn le roga yãmbã ka ninsaal yĩng sẽn mi kũuma ye, yaa Wẽnd ne b gomd pãnga: bãmb n ka mi kũum, bãmb n tar vɩɩm sẽn kõn sɛ. 
A Simri biig a Yediyayɛlle,  ne a ba-biig a Yoha sẽn yaa Tids tẽng rao nedã, N paas a Eliyɛll ne a  Obɛɛd la a Yaasiyɛll-Metsobaya. 
Pag yooda a na sãoog a sɩda
Israyɛll nebã fãa sẽn wʋm t'a Zeroboaam lebg n waame, b tigma taab n kɩt tɩ b bool-a t'a wa, la b kɩtame t'a lebg Israyɛll nebã fãa rĩmã. La rag n yaa Zʋʋda buudã neb bal n kell n pa a Davɩɩd ne a roogã poorẽ. A Roboaam sẽn lebg n ta Zeruzalɛm, a tigma Zʋʋda buudã fãa ne Benzame buudã tãb-biis tus koabg la pis-nii sẽn mi zabr sõama, tɩ b na n tɩ zab ne Israyɛll buud a taabã neb n deeg soolmã n lebs a Salmo biig a Roboaam. 
A Zakoob kũum ne a mumbu. Dẽ, a Zakoob yeela a kambã yaa: «Mam na n kiime n bʋʋg m saam-dãmbã sẽn deng maam n ki wã. Bɩ y mum maam n naag m yaab-rãmbã yaad sẽn be tãn-bok ning sẽn be Hɛt ned a Efrõ pʋʋgẽ wã. 
La a Moyiis gʋlsa Sẽn-Ka-Saab goamã fãa. La yẽnda yika tõdbeoog n maan tẽn-kugr tãngã pende, ne kug piig la a yiibu Israyɛll buud piig la a yiibã yĩnga. 
 La, a sẽn wa n ta zakẽ wã n pʋʋse, a zoa wã sẽn ya kinkirgã, sɩd yiime n pʋʋs-a, n lebg n kẽ a roogẽ.
Nebã fãa mii pʋg-yãangã yʋʋr la b boond-a tɩ b yaaba
Zĩ-kãens fãa yaa bũmb sẽn dat manegre, la rẽndame tɩ b kẽng ne-a ne tʋʋlem.
Dẽ, rĩm a Salmo baoome n na n kʋ a Zeroboaam. La a Zeroboaam yikame n zoe n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽng rĩm a Sɩsak nengẽ. A Zeroboaam zĩnda be hal n tãag a Salmo kũum. Rĩm a Salmo saka a saam-dãmba, la b mum-a-la a ba a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋga. La a Salmo biig a Roboaam n deeg yẽnda zĩig n dɩ naamã. 
Rẽ n kɩt tɩ b pʋd tʋʋmdã yʋʋr tɩ «d naag taab n fãag Gibo» A wilgame tɩ b sẽn paam woto wã, b na n yãka toand 100 n tɩ kõ Gibo rãmba, la b rɩk sẽn kellã n pʋɩ tẽns a taab me sẽn be zu-loees pʋg wala Pama, Barsaolgo, Solã, Seba la Titao.
Rẽ poore, Seba tẽng rĩm-poakã kõo rĩm a Salmo sãnem kɩlo tus a naas la kobessi, ne parfẽ-rãmb wʋsg sẽn tar yũ-noog wʋsgo, la kug-sõama. Ned ka tol n leb n wa ne parfẽ-rãmb wʋsg sẽn tar yũ-noog a woto wa Seba tẽng rĩm-poakã sẽn wa n kõ rĩm a Salmo wã ye. A Hiram koom kogl-bɛdã sẽn da kẽnd Ofɩɩr tẽng n wat ne sãnemã me talla ra-sõama ne kug-sõama wʋsg n wa kõ rĩm a Salmo. 
A ka segd n naag b yiibã n kõ-a ye. Rɩ-tɔka pãrsda biiga  pʋga tɩ zɩɩm tõe n yi; dẽe, a sãn dɩkd bĩisema n paasdẽ, bãaga bil tõe n  tûu pɔglogã n paam biigã.
Yɩɩ sẽn tũ ne mooneg-koɛɛg b sẽn yiis Ɛrtebe televisẽo wã zug zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 8 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, la Kapɩtɛnd TARWAR wilg tɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, b na n zĩniga seg-taab-kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ asiiznasẽonalla.
piig la a nu soabã yãka a Bilga, piig la a yoobẽ soabã yãka a Imeere, pisi la a tãabẽ soabã yãka a Delaya, tɩ pisi la a naasẽ soabã yãk a Maaziya. 
Yaa zɩɩm sase rãmb 3000 la b rat ka ne tʋʋmdã saabo, y arẽ n so tɩ b na n gilg yaar dãmba la raasã pʋse.
la a Yokim, ne Kozeba neb a Zoaas ne a Saraf sẽn dag n zab n deeg Moaab soolmã, ne Yasubi-Lehɛm. Kiba-kãens fãa yaa kiba-kʋda. A Sɩmyõ kom-dibli yaa a Nemuwɛlle, a Yamin, a Yariibi, a Zeera, n paas a Sayulli. 
Yɩɩ Kapitɛnd Faruk Azarya SORGO, n karem sebrã ɛrtebe televisẽo wã zug yʋng wakat a 9 wã kibay kũun sasa.
A Labã soka a Zakoob yaa: «Yaa bõe la mam tog n kõ foom?» La a Zakoob yeela a Labã: «Yãmb ka tog n kõ maam bũmb ye. Yãmb sã n sake, mam kotame tɩ y maan mam sẽn n na n kos yãmbã n kõ-ma. Mam na n kell n zĩnd n gũu yãmb rũm-bãoonegã. La rũndã, mam na n kẽe yãmb rũmsã sʋka, tɩ y welg piis nins sẽn yaa pẽrem-pẽrmã ne wad-wadã, ne sẽn ya-b sablã, la bʋʋsã sʋk me, bɩ y maan woto, n welg pẽrem-pẽrmã ne sẽn ya-b wad-wadã. Yaa rẽndã n na n yɩ mam yaoodo. 
A rãmb wudgu, n baod a zãnkada.
Ad yaa rabeem-kãng n nood a Baning ninã la a sẽn mi n wom n wa pelg t'a biisã nood n yi n tondẽ wã. B sẽn lebg n ta yirã, yellã togsg yaa toog ne-ba. B fãa sura gãa... bala, sẽn togsg kae ye. Yaa rẽ me yĩng la baning sẽn mi n wom t'a zugã surẽ wã.
Rẽ wã, b na n kell n maoome n ta a sẽn na n wa wilg t’a sigame la a bas naamã.
Rĩm a Salmo yãka neb tus pis-tã Israyɛll tẽngã gill fãa pʋgẽ tɩ b tʋmd tʋʋm-wɛgla. La kiuug fãa, rĩmã rag n tʋmda bãmb tus piig-piig tɩ b kẽnd Libã n deesd taaba. Neb tus piig sã n tʋm kiuug a yembr Libã, b lebgd n kuil n tɩ vʋʋsa kiuug a yiibu. Yaa a Adoniram n dag yaa pãng tʋʋmã taoor soabã. 
 La, m ba Soaamb yeelame, tɩ sã n yaa woto, a na n baoo tɩɩm, n were, n tɩ yuglg bĩndã, tɩ sẽn sã-a bĩndã, ki ».
Noaag vuud a to yãad t’a rẽnd vuud beoogo.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã Reezẽo de lɛs soolmã, karen-biisã ne b ba rãmb kẽname, n wilg b sũ-pa-noaanga, ne b tẽnsã pʋsẽ karen-dotã sẽn ket n pag b kʋɩlẽnse, b soolmã pʋga.
«Yʋʋmd fãa, bɩ f maan tigr naoor a tãab n waoog maam. Maan bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll tigr rasem a yopoe, n dɩ bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll wa mam sẽn yeel foom wakat ning mam sẽn yãk bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuugã pʋgẽ wã, bala, yaa ki-kãng pʋgẽ la fo yi Ezɩpte. Ned ka tog n wa mam taoor nug-zaal ye. 
Tõnd pʋʋsda Wẽnd tɩ y ra maan wẽng ye. Tõnd pa rat n maan waa d yɩɩda d taab toog wakat ye, d datame n maan neere, ba neera sã n na n waa ne toogo. D komsma sẽn ya a soab fãa, d bee sũ-noog pʋgẽ, d sã n ne tɩ yãmb wɩɩda pãnga. D sẽn kot bũmb ning d pʋʋsg pʋgẽ, yaa yãmb lebg sõma. 
Yãmb dag n saagame n dat n maan maam wẽnga, la Wẽnnaam wẽnemd-a lame t'a lebg neere, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n pids bũmb ning sẽn maand rũndã wã, n fãag buud wʋsg vɩɩm. 
rĩm-dãmb-bãmb fãa naaga taab n yik zabr ne Sodom dĩm a Beera, la ne Gomoor dĩm a Birsa ne Adma dĩm a Sineyaabe, la Seboyim dĩm a Semebɛɛre, la ne a Sowaar sẽn yaa Bela rĩma. Bãmb fãa kẽng n tɩ tigma taab Sidim longẽ wã, beenẽ yaa yamsem ko-kãseng zĩiga. 
Yaool n yaa neb sẽn da tar sɛba, tɩ seb-kãens ra kõt-b sore.
Wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ sullã yãka yam n na n pʋɩ kood toand a 5 la ze-biisi.
Vẽkembeoogo, rao wã sẽn le kẽng pʋʋgẽ wã, a yãame tɩ kodensã le wa n gaasa bʋd-bogdã fãa tẽma, n dɩ ki wã.
Woto, Israyɛll rĩmã leoka a Zozafat yaa: «Nin-yend bal n ket tõnd sẽn tõe n kɩt t'a sok Sẽn-Ka-Saab n gese, la mam yaool n kisa no-rɛɛs-kãnga, bala a zɩ n togs maam koe-noog ye, yaa koe-beed bala. Yaa a Yimla biig a Miise.» A Zozafat yeelame: «Rĩma, da gom-y woto ye!» Dẽ, Israyɛll rĩmã boola a sõgen a yembr n yeel-a t'a tɩ bool a Yimla biig a Miise t'a wa tao-tao. 
·  A soaba tara noãd a noorẽwã ne a kokora pʋgẽ.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: Rɩgl sãnem tẽn-kugrã sẽn na n tar n yõogd wisdã kaset koglgã taoore, la f yagl fu-lillidgã sɛk roogã noore. 
Fo sã n zãgs n ka bas mam nebã tɩ b looge, beoogo, mam na n tʋma sʋy tɩ b wa fo soolmã pʋga. 
Pag me sã n tara sɩda sẽn nan ka tar tẽebo la sẽn sakd n na n zĩnd ne-a, a ra bas-a ye. 
La b yet tι. Wẽnd pa kυ naab pa kυυd ye. Mogrã zĩig sẽn  zãr yĩnga, neb a yiibã kẽname n wa ya, n zind tιιg tẽngre, n nan pems bilf la b yaool n yiki. B wa n nee yĩisr naoor sẽn kaoog t’a keoosd n loogdẽ.
Kal toda yĩng wɩngr yĩnga.
Neb katɛk n yi zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Gɛpaga la Tapoa porvẽesã pʋg n kotẽ tɩ b lebg n pags b karen-dotã kʋɩlense.
Yaa Israyɛll rĩm a Zeroboaam sẽn deeg naam tɩ yʋʋm pisiiblẽ, la a Aaza lebg Zʋʋda rĩmã. Yẽnda kɩtame tɩ b rig maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ yoaadbã fãa n yiis tẽngã pʋga, la a kɩt tɩ b yiis wẽn-naandsã fãa yẽnda yaab-rãmbã sẽn dag n maanã. 
CEDEAO wã sug-kaot sega Burkĩna Faso  taoor soabã.
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab boola raoã n sok-a yaa: «Fo bee yɛɛnẽ?» Raoã leokame: «Mam wʋma yãmb rãamd zẽedã zĩig pʋga, dẽ, rabeem yõka maam. Bala, mam yaa m zaala. Dẽ kɩtame tɩ mam zoe n soonde.» 
Wakat kãng masã, la neb wʋsg na n bãng yellã sẽn taẽ.
F sã n kĩ ne bʋẽega, f nintãm sata raagẽ
Neb la bũmbu
A Meraari kom-dibli yaa a Makli ne a Musi la a Yaaziya. a Musi kom-dibli yaa a Makli ne a Edɛɛr la a Yerimote. Leevi buudã ned fãa ne a roog la woto. 
 A sẽn wa n kẽn n ta gɛlã zĩigẽ wã, a sĩnda a noore, n kell n sãag n tɩ seg m ba Soaamba.
Woto me, sãamb nins sẽn ka Israyɛll buudã sã n yi zĩ-zãrsẽ n wa yãmb yʋʋrã yĩnga, 
Ned ka tõe n maan n yɩɩg a pãng ye
Yaa rẽ n kɩt b yi n wilg tɩ b pa rat ned a to tẽngã taoor tɩ sã n pa Kaitɛndã ye.
Sãn ya ne yãmba, a Pok ne a ma tagsog da ya a wãn wãna, bãmb sẽn wa n bãng SIDAwã bãaga bil sẽn yɩ toto paam ma wã.
Yaa sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm 2017 soabã, la tẽnsã taoor dãmb ra zĩnd n tags sullã yelle.
La nag-yãan-wagã sẽn ka neebã wãba nag-yãan-neeb a yopoe wã sẽn nobã. La Faarõ nekame. La yẽnda leb n gũsame n zãms zãmsd a yiibẽ soaba. Yẽnda yãnda kaaf a yembr sẽn wom ka-zu-bɛd a yopoe sẽn bɩ sõama n yaa neeba. 
Yaa Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE, ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã, n tik a nug sebrã zug Waogdgo, zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 5 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
Tẽeg-y d yaab a Israyɛl rooga kibare. Neb niyns sẽn da rɩt-b maandã, ka maan-kugra yõod la b da rɩt bɩ? La rẽ rat n yeelame tɩ bõe? Tɩ maanda nemd bee yõodo? Tɩ maanda sẽn waoogd a soaba n tar yõodo? 
Reng taoor zʋʋr pa paad yɩng ye
tɩ neb nins sɩɩs sẽn kẽ belgr pʋgẽ wã wẽed no-koɛɛm n ka basdẽ ye. Bãmb dãmb ka tar sɩd ye, la b rɩka Wẽnnaam sakrã tɩ yɩ arzegs baoob sore. Dẽ wã, tõnd sã n tar dɩɩb ne futu, rẽ na n seka tõndo. 
Tɩ rao wã yet tɩ naafã kʋʋb zĩig pa ka ye.
La, a wa n menmame, tɩ rao wã ka bãnge, a sẽn teesẽ n ye. 
Dɩ m ye kʋʋda baag n mɛ reemdo
Talg tẽn-kugr bee a loorẽ, t’a kẽnd la a pʋlmdẽ.
Woto, a Mariyam gãnma a nẽnga; bala yẽ ra minmame tɩ reemd ne a baaba; la sẽn zems dasm a wãnã a ma da ka le sakd t’a kolg a baaba yɛs ye.
Zĩig sẽn pẽ a noorã, ra yaa sodaas n yãmb-a ne bugra-bɛda, tɩ nebã goam ra ka tũud taab ye.
Rabẽem doog n mete
Maan lutg ne pe-raad gãnd sẽn monem fu-roogã yĩnga, la f maan lutg ne dofẽ-rãmb gãnd n gãneg a zugẽ wã. Maan da-pegd sɛk roogã yĩnga. Maan-b ne akasiya raado, n yik-b n tilgi. 
Yũug ne Baag da nonga taab sõma, tɩ b reemd ne taab wakat fãa. La Yũug tara yam n le mi tɩt wʋsg n yãkd n tɩbsda a taabã b sã n wa lʋɩ bãaga. Sẽn yɩɩd fãa m ba Baag sẽn n mi n zoe weoogã pʋg tɩ kugã, la beoosã wãad-a bɩ gõosã kõs-a wã.
Yɩɩ Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, yɩɩ Politik taoor dãmba, sodaas taoor dãmba, la sula buud toor toor taoor dãmb n zĩnd n dɩk na-kẽnda nins b sẽn na n tik n zã tãrãzisẽo wã.
B togsame t'a Saara na n doga bi-ribla. Sẽn-Ka-Saab puka b meng ne a Abrahaam Mamre tɩɩsã zĩigẽ, wakat ning yẽnda sẽn wa n zĩ a fu-roogã noor tʋʋlg wakatã. 
Gosne-paallã pʋgẽ Miniisr kʋd sẽn da zĩnd Letena Kolonell Poll Ãari Sãndaoogo DAMIB naamẽ wã, n leb n paam tɩ b kell n gãd-ba.
Gãndaadã yʋy la woto:  A Zoaab ba-biig a Azayɛlle, Betlehɛm dao a Dodo biig a Ɛlhana, Gibeya sẽn yaa Benzame  nebã tẽng rao a Ribayi biig a Itayi, Piratõ tẽng rao a Benaya, 
Gomd n wat ne gomde
B gãdame tɩ Miniisr dãmbã na n yɩɩ bãmb 25, tɩ depite rãmbã 71.
Tι b lebg n wa, n wa tυk b yolgã, n le rιk mogrã sore, la b gomd woto: Haya! D zẽk naoore. Mas-masã tι d pa ta mogrẽ wã n lobg kõb-wẽn-kãngã la d paamd d menga. Silmiigã sẽn wυm goamã, a bãngame t’a lυιι yell pυga.
A Mahamuudu Yisufu wilgame tɩ b sũur yaa noogo, b sẽn paam n seg Kapitɛnd Yibrayɩɩm Tarwarã A kell n kẽnga taoor n wilg tɩ masã, bãmb lebg n kuusẽ, b kuusa ne bas-m-yam.
Yaa pʋ-to-nebã: zamaana soaal sẽn sob b rãmb yama tɩ b pa ne Krista Koe-nooga sẽn yãgd ne ziir ningã. Wẽnd ning sẽn kõ noore, tɩ vẽenem pusg lik pʋga, yaa bãmb vẽenem n pusg tõnd sũya tɩ d tõe n wilg neb a taaba, Wẽnnaam pẽgr d sẽn yãend t'a yãgd ne Krista nenga. 
A wilgame tɩ rẽ fãa segd n saame, bala, ned sã n wa tʋʋm zĩigẽ yibeoogo, n na n tʋʋm n tãag zaabre, pa segd tɩ sɛbã ket n zamd taab n pa paamd gesg ye.
La yẽ sẽn da ka mi wã yaa, bõnyẽeg kιtame tι pυg-yãangã loe yẽ mengã ne zãn-daoogã. La sẽn ya likã, katr pa ne sõama ye. A sãmbame tι yaa peosgo t'a lok-a n tεt-a n tutẽ, n kẽed weoogã n yet t'a leb n paama a zaabr dιιbo.
Neb sẽn tar SIDAwã bãaga bil b yĩnsa pʋsẽ yaa wʋsgo, la b ka mi tɩ b tar-a lame ye.
La raop a tãabã ned a yembr yeela a Abrahaam yaa: «Ade, vẽer woto wẽnde, mam na n lebg n waa fo nengẽ, la rẽ tɩ fo pag a Saara roga bi-ribla.» Wakat-kãng t'a Saara rag n bee bãmb poorẽ, fu-roogã noor n yas n kelgdẽ. 
Neb wʋsog tara yɩɩl sẽn gomd bũmb yell toor zalle. Yɩɩl kẽer gomda  nãmsog wala toog yelle.
Yaa rẽ tɩ ned kam fãa segd n kẽng zabrã zĩigẽ tɩ d paam n tõog nin-wẽnsã.
Sãn n yaa tɩ kombɩɩsa zoe n lagma taaba tɩ masã b sẽn  wʋm wotowã b sũyã sãamame, b tõe n maana bõe?
Rabaar soab n tõe tɩɩm soaba
Rẽ wã, Ezɩpt tẽng nebã sã n yãnd foom, b na n yeelame: ‹Yaa yẽnda paga.› La b na n kʋʋ maam la b bas foom. Mam kota foom tɩ f yeel tɩ fo yaa mam tão, tɩ b reeg-m neere, tɩ fo maasem yĩng bɩ m paam n põse.» 
La rabeem yõk-a lame. Yel-kãngã maanda a wãna? La a soaamb rabaar n sat bι? Kom la ko-yũud wa n tar-a lame, la weoog pa tate, kυιlg pa tate. A sẽn nan bυgsd a sẽn na n maan to-to wã, a mika tãoos sẽn tão walga, t’a ki n põoge, tι zũnzũyã be be n yĩgda.
A Lik HALAD kẽnga taoor n paas tɩ bãmb tẽngã na n sõnga Burkĩna Faso sẽn yɩɩd fãa zu-loɛɛg ning a sẽn vʋɩ a soab pʋgẽ wã.
B kẽnga taoor n le boolnebã, tɩ ned kam fãa yi n tʋʋm a tʋʋma, la a zãag a meng ne kẽna.
Ned sã n nan be yell pʋgẽ bɩ a ra gũs ye, a tẽbdẽ bala
M sẽn kot bũmb zãnga, yaa y fãa yɩ yam yɛnga, ne taab kũmbu, ne taab nonglem, ne taab nimbãan-zoeere la ne yam-sulgri, n ka lebsd wẽnga, n ka lebsd tʋʋr lɛ-lɛ. Yãmb yee n kãab noogo la y ra kãab beed ye, tɩ b welg-y la toore, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ y wa rɩ pʋlemd nooga yõodo. 
Ned sẽn zè bĩndu, n lʋɩ yẽdgẽ
B talla ne taab woto, tι sõorã wa zẽke. Ba a ye pa tõe a to ye. Wogb ne yemd fãa wa n dat n maana rabeem ne a  soaamb naafã. Ya n yaa bõe sι-lak naaf la woto? Ya n  suda wãn -wãn bala?
F sã n kẽnd kiu-kiu bɩ f zãms liu-liu
Bãaga bil a naas soaba wa n kẽeme n tɩ  naag ne a taabã tɩ b kʋ soda yenda sẽn da ketã.
Kiba-kɩtbã sẽn sok-a bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a ning sodaasã fuugu, n wa na n gʋls a yʋʋrã.
Kibarã yii peremye ministɛɛrã kiba-kɩtb nengẽ.
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtba nengẽ.
Ninsaal yaa a wae, a ka la piig ye
Wakat ning fãa rĩmã sẽn dabd Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogẽ wã, tãb-biisã sẽn gũud rĩmã zãada gãndã n yãagd rĩmã. La b sã n sɛ, b lebgd n tɩ lebsa gãndã tãb-biisã sẽn yaa rĩmã gũudbã roogẽ. Rĩm a Roboaam ne a Zeroboaam dag n zabda taab wakat fãa. 
Sʋɩ sã n waoogẽ, b rɩta taaba.
Bɩ ned kam fãa deng n tɩg a menga la a yaool n dɩ burã, la a yaool n yũ rãama. Ned ning fãa sẽn dɩt-a bɩ sẽn yũud-a yaare, ya a meng bõne la a rɩta, ya a meng bõne la a yũuda. 
Tekr sã n wẽnd kũun, bɩ ned fãa tall a rẽnda.
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ b bool kiba-kɩtbã n na n wilgb polɩɩs tʋʋm na-kẽndr sẽn segd n yɩ a soaba.
Gãngãad lima lʋmse
Yɩɩl-y wa yãmb tẽnga  rãmb sẽn minim n yɩɩn sũ-sãamsa wakatã.
A Moriis KONATE Waogdg komindã delegasẽo ɛspesɛll taoor soab wilgame tɩ ligdã, yaa soay la lekolse, logtoyiya, la Waogdg komindã nin-buiid yõ-koglg yell la b na n dɩk-a n kẽese.
bɩ y zĩnd y zĩigẽ yĩngr n kelg-ba. Bɩ y kõ Israyɛll sẽn yaa yãmb nebã sugr b beegrã yĩnga, la y kɩt tɩ b lebg n wa tẽng ning yãmb sẽn kõ b yaab-rãmbã pʋgẽ. Bãmb sã n beeg yãmba, tɩ yãmb sɩbg-b n kɩt tɩ saagã ka niida, b sã n pʋʋs yãmb zĩ-kãngã, la b waoog yãmb yʋʋrã, la b bas b yel-wẽnã, 
La, a pʋda yɩɩlle: «Pagbã loogda, a Naamd zũurã be neere, raopã zãnga, a Naamd zũurã be neere.»
Kall yɩgda f yĩng na wɩnge
Pondr ka yõgd pag la, a rõabg ka neer ye.
La rasem a yopoe wã daare, yaa vʋʋsg daar Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã waoogr yĩnga. Bɩ yãmb ne y kom-dibli wã, la y kom-pugli wã, ne y yem-daadã la y yem-pogsã ne y rũmsã la sãan sẽn be yãmb yiri bas y tʋʋmã. 
Koore buudã neb a Ɛlkana, a Yisiya, a Azareyɛlle, a Yoyezɛɛre, n paas a Yasobeyam, Gãndaad n yi Gaad buudã sʋk n kẽng a Davɩɩd nengẽ we-raoogã pẽgsẽ. Yaa tãb-biis sẽn zãms zabre, n tar gãnd la kãna. Bãmb dag n yaa nin-toos wa gɩgma, la b tõe n zoee wa yãgs sẽn be tãmsã zutu. 
Buud niisa sẽn na ka tar Wẽnnaam Sebra ne b buuda goama, bɩ y lebg  vɛrse rãmba ne b goama la y wilig ned sẽn mi sõama t’a gese sãn  zemsame.
Burkĩna Faso kom-bɩɩb n yãk b yam n bool nin-buiidã tɩ ned kam kõ a nug bũmb tɩ b naag taab n maan ninbãan-zoeer tʋʋmde, ne neb nins sẽn be zu-loees pʋgẽ, sẽn kẽed ne nin-wẽnsã tʋʋm-goabã sabaabo.
La sẽn sɩng ne masã, yãmb kooda pʋɩsʋk yaa maam n so.“
Tʋʋmdã kʋɩlens pagbẽ, b yãka Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE t’a lʋɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoore.
Dẽ, b baoo sũ-sãang fut n yeelge, la b loe b zutã tãando, n kẽng Israyɛll rĩmã nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a yaa: «Yãmb tʋmtʋmd a Bɛn-Hadaad yõkd-y-la sɛɛga, n kotẽ tɩ y bas-a la y ra kʋ-a ye.» La a Akaab sokame: «Rẽ yĩnga, a Bɛn-Hadaad ket n vɩɩme la? Ad a yaa mam saam-biiga.» 
Dɩlla m sã n gʋls-y sebre, ad-y ka bɛɛgda, ad-y ka b sẽn beeg a soaba me yĩng ye. Yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ bala tɩ y nonglem kãsenga ne tõnd puk Wẽnd taoore. M sã n saag, yẽ taoore, n pẽg m meng bifu yãmb poorẽ, dẽn ka bũmb sẽn wat ne m yãnd ye. M sẽn minim n togs sɩd bũmb fãa poorẽ, m sẽn togs bũmb ning a Tit poorẽ wã me yɩɩ sɩda. 
B tog n maana a yʋʋsã ne tom-peglem laasã ne sãnem halaale. La bɩ f gũusi, n maan bãmb tɩ b zems mamsg ning mam sẽn wilg foom tãngã zugã.» 
Sa-kẽengã nii dũniyã zug n kaoos rasem pis-naase. Koomã lebga wʋsgo, la a zẽka koglgã t'a bas tẽn-gãongã. Koomã lima tãmsã hal n zʋʋg t'a zulmã ta kãntɩɩg piig la a nu. 
Nebã yika yibeoog pĩnd n maan maand sẽn yõogd bugum, la b wa ne zems-n-taar maando. Nebã zĩndame n dɩ la b yũ, la b yik n maan deem. 
Fo sã n dɩk f ligd n peng mam nebã ned a yembr sẽn yaa naong soab n be ne foom, bɩ f ra maan yẽnda wa ned sẽn peng fo ligd ye. Fo ka tog n kɩt tɩ yẽnda yao ne roagleng ye. Fo sã n deeg ned fu-goabg a sẽn tar fo samd yĩnga, bɩ f lebs-a a fu-goabgã tɩ wĩndg nan ka kẽ ye. 
A wudgdame n ti fão beo-kãngã n tυk n lυι kõe, n tik n yik n yeele: F lub yã, Ia f kõn dιk ye. A sã n yeel woto, rẽ t'a le loogame. A talla woto, n wa kell n tι lυι n ki, ti soaamb sigi, n bao gõos n lud-a, la a bas n looge. Soaamb yel-baoor la a yυ-baoor n sat bι?
A wilgame tɩ yaa tigsgã baosgẽ la b na n yãk taoor dãmba, la noy nins b sẽn na n tũ n zã tarãzisẽo wã.
Rʋg-bẽd a yi pa fõgend taab ye
Ãnda n tõe n bãng ba-bi ba-gae?
Tɩ rao wã ket n zĩẽ, sẽn yi bilfu, la kinkirgã ba wã la a ma wã, tɩ yi n pʋʋs-a n lebg n kẽ.
Nebã sẽn kõ zũudã wa sẽn zems miningã, zɩslem zemsa kɩlo tus a tãab la kobs-naas la pis-yoob la a wɛ, la garem kobsi la pis-nii la a nii. La ra-lugds nins sẽn gũbg zakã naoã ne ra-lugds nins sẽn be zakã noorã naoã, la sɛk roogã biili, la zakã biili fãa maana ne zũudu. 
B yõoga wisd sẽn tar yũ-noog a zug wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. A Moyiis ne a Aarõ la a Aarõ kom-dibli wã yãka koomã n nudg nusi, la b waas b nao. 
A sẽn sõs ne tẽngã taoor soab loogr poore, a kẽnga Nizɛɛr na-kʋdg a Mahamadu YISUFU, CEDEAO sull sug-koatã nengẽ.
Leb n yɩɩ wakat Burkĩna Faso kom-bɩɩbã sẽn yi n wilg b belem ne Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
Yẽnda ninga tuiidsã da-pɩʋʋgdsã kɩremse n tui da-bɩlem a bãmb pʋse n zã taablã. Yẽnda maana teed nins sẽn na n dogl taablã zug ne sãnem halaale, yaa laase, ne wũmbli, la tʋgdo la laas sẽn na n tall n pʋdg rãam n maan maando. 
A Kɩle yiyaasbe, a ye fãa yaa wakɩr 1200.
Rĩmã yeela a nebã yaa: «Ade, Israyɛll nebã sõor yɩɩda tõndo, la b pãngã yɩɩda tõndo. Dẽ wã, wa-y tɩ d maan yam ne-ba, tɩ b ra wa fɩɩg n lebg wʋsg ye. Bala, zabr sã n yiki, b na n naaga tõnd bɛɛbã n zab ne tõndo, la b zoe n yi tẽngã.» 
M kẽnda m na paam noaag yiri, m ka kẽnd a noos waoog yir ye.
A Davɩɩd sẽn ta a Ornan nengẽ, a Ornan gesame n yãnd yẽnda. Dẽ, yẽnda yi a zɛɛgẽ wã, n fõgen a neng tẽng n wõgemd a Davɩɩd taoore. A Davɩɩd yeela a Ornan yaa: Kõ maam zĩ-kãngã, kõ maam zɛɛgã tɩ m me tẽn-kugr n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, tɩ bã-loangdgã sẽn tar nebã sɛ. M na n yao-f-la wa sẽn zems a ligdi. 
Kapitɛnd TARWAR togsame t’a ka rat tɩ kibay kũun pʋgẽ, bɩ b tɩ tik tɩ ya tẽngã taoor soab la b pẽgd ye.
La, rao wã wed-moaagã wa n kʋmame, t’a tik n yiki, n tɩ kolg-a.
Tẽnsã no-rɛɛsdb la tẽnsã sẽn tʋm b rãmbã segd n wa wilga b sorã kũun sebr ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã nengẽ.
A Saadu Ganaba sẽn ya Gibo karen-biisã taoor soab rɩka koɛɛg n wilg tɩ bãmb sẽn yi wã, yaa sẽn na n wilg Burkĩna Faso tẽngã zãadba, tɩ hal kaorengã yikr n tãag bãmb sẽn kẽndã, b karen-dotã ket n pagame, b leb n pa tar karen-saamb dãmb ye.
Waaf sã n kʋ f ma, bẽdeng me yaa rẽ
Mam na n talla yãmb n tɩ kẽes tẽng ning mam sẽn dag n zẽk m nug n wẽen n yeel tɩ m na n kõo a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoobã. Maam a Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n kõo yãmb tẽngã tɩ y sooge.» 
La, a rɩka sorã, n na n bao rao wã ne a biigã.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 2 raare, koees wa n yiime n wilg tɩ sẽn tũ ne dĩin taoor dãmb la rog-n-mik nanambs sẽn kẽes b toogo, Letena Kolonell Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB sakame n sigi, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ sodaasã ra wa welg taab ye.
Bãmb sẽn gom ne a Moyiis Sinayi tãngã zug n sɛ, b kõo yẽnda kaset kug-walse, bãmb kõ-a-la kaset kug-wals a yiibu, Wẽnnaam mengã sẽn gʋls ne b nug-bila. 
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 29 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso gosneema taoor soaba, Metr Apolineer KELEM reega Farens no-rɛɛsa a Lik HALADE.
La Zʋʋda ne Israyɛll tẽmsã pʋga, sẽn sɩng ne Dan buudã soolem n tɩ tãag Bɛɛr-Seba, nebã fãa rag n vɩɩ ne bãan la laafɩ. La rĩm a Salmo vɩɩmã tɛka, nebã fãa rag n vɩɩ ne bãane, n kood b reezẽ tɩɩs pʋto la b send b kankamse. A Salmo rag n tara wiid tus pis-naase, a saar-dãmbã yĩnga. La a tar wed-rʋʋdb tus-piig la a yiibu. 
Sugr soab yaa Wẽnnaam zoa.
 Fo sã n mi n wʋm gomde, reng n togs f zoa, la f yaool n togs f paga.»
Sulla wat n lebsa ligda yʋʋmde  wala yʋʋm a yiib pʋgẽ. Tʋʋma tõe n yɩɩ fut wala zaodes  maanego, bur wala zẽed maanego, koobo wala gʋʋlgo.
Yaa tãn-bok ning sẽn be Makpela pʋʋgã sẽn pẽ Mamre Kana tẽngã. Yaa pʋʋg ning a Abrahaam sẽn deeg Hɛt ned a Efrõ nengẽ n da n maan yaad zĩigã. A Neftali yaa wa walg sẽn tar lohorem  n dogd kom-neeba. 
B yõka Kapitɛnd Sɩdsor WEDRAOOG ne a poorẽ dãmba.
 La, tɩɩmã kisa fo sẽn na n kãab ned wẽnga, bala, kãabgã na n paama pidsgu, a soabã vɩɩm pʋgẽ, fo me na n paama yelle».
Yẽg niisa sẽn ya kʋdã  na n kel n kẽnga taor n pus wil wa pĩnd dãmba bala!
La yɩɩ tɩlɛ tɩ Siiri nebã zoe n na n põs Israyɛll nebã. A Davɩɩd ne a nebã kʋʋ bãmb wed-rʋʋdb tus a yopoe, la b tãb-biis nins sẽn kẽnd ne naoã bãmb tus pis-naase. A kʋʋ bãmb tãb-biis naab a Sofake. Nanambs nins sẽn dag n yaa a Hadadezɛɛr yembsã sẽn wa n mik tɩ Israyɛll nebã tõogda bãmba, b yõga zood ne a Davɩɩde, n lebg a Davɩɩd yembse. Siiri nebã me ka leb n dat n sõng Amo nebã n zab ye. 
La zakã pɛɛl nins sẽn be nin-taoorã na n zemsa zakã yalem: A na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg pis-nu. La bãmb da-lugdsã na n yɩɩ piiga ne b nao piiga. La zakã kɩreng ning sẽn teesd yaangã yalem na n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg pis-nu. 
Bʋʋd sɛb kãens sõngda kɩɩbsã tɩ b paam b  rogm-pʋɩɩre b barãmb loogr poore.
A Pok sũur da ya noog wʋsgo, bala a Yõdɩ da tara laafɩ sõama
Kodgr sã n ta boẽeg bɩ a nak a lemde
Hal ba ne rũndã, kazẽeg sã n wa bι, a ninã yaa moomde, t'a zugã sur gõmm...
Yaa Kapitɛnd dãmb la tẽngã taoor soab yãk tɩ b lʋɩ sullã taoore.
F sã n pa mi tẽng kɩɩmse, f pa wẽed a bendr ye
T’a bõnyẽeg yeel-ba : «Wa-y ne-ba! ».
A DAABO Bukari bʋʋdã paka a kʋɩlense.
A Ram doga a Aminadaabe, t'a Aminadaab rog a Nakõ sẽn yaa Zʋʋda buudã naabã. naasẽ soabã la a Netaneyɛlle, nu soabã la a Radayi, 
La neb nins fãa sẽn dat n kõ wanzuri ne zũudã talla bãmb kũunã n wa kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. La neb nins fãa sẽn tar akasiya raad sẽn zems tʋʋmdã yĩngã tallame n wa. La pagb nins fãa sẽn mi tʋʋmde, la sẽn nong tʋʋm-kãngã wĩi gĩs ne bʋʋs kõbdo. 
La, m ba Katr pagã kẽname, n ta sorã zugu, n wãb nemdã fãa la a rʋʋd rʋʋd-koom, n kiis bugmã, n lebg n wa n na n mok bugmã yasa.
A Moyiis lebg n leba a nebã nengẽ. Dẽ, a Moyiis yii zĩ-kãng n kẽng a rɛɛmb a Zetro nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a yaa: «M kota sor n kuil m ba-biisã sẽn be Ezɩptã nengẽ n tɩ ges b sã n ket n vɩɩme.» La a Zetro yeela a Moyiisi: «Kẽng ne bãane!» 
Sɛkã poore, Nizɛɛr tẽngã na-kʋdgo, a Mahamuudu Yisufu, sẽn le ya sug-koat Burkĩna Faso ne CEDEAO sʋkã pẽgame.
Liuul bõnd paood me a wilgda a paga
M sẽn ta y nengẽ tɩ bũmb paoog-ma m ka lebg yãmb ned ba a ye zɩɩb ye, yaa Masedoan saam-biisi n yaoog-m. M pa tʋlg, ba vugr menga, n kos yãmb sãando la m kõn saag abada. M na kell n maan boto tɩ neb niyns sẽn baood-b n na n kõ b meng bʋʋm, n gomd tɩ b maana wa tõndã, bɩ b ra tõog n paam bʋʋm ye. 
A Zozoe maana wa a Moyiis sẽn yeel yẽnda wã. Yẽnda kẽngame n tɩ zab ne Amalɛk rãmbã. La a Moyiis ne a Aarõ la a Ʋʋr dʋʋ tãn-bilã zugu. 
La, yɩbr naab yeel-a lame, t’a gũus a menga, la a ka kelg ye.
Wẽ-n-pẽdg n kʋʋd waafo.
A wilgame tɩ tẽng ning fãa sẽn segd ne kolgo, la zĩis nins fãa nin-buiida sẽn tar yõ-koagendbã raabo, b na kẽngame.
La fu-roogã lutgã sẽn na n kell peend a yembr yalem pʋɩ-sʋkã, bɩ f bas yẽnda t'a palg sɛk roogã poore. La fu-roogã lutgã woglem sẽn na n kell kãntɩɩg a yembr a noy a yiibã fãa wã, bɩ f bas yẽnda t'a palg sɛk roogã kɩrems a yiibã fãa n lud bãmba. 
Sẽn deng kom-kãsengã sẽn na n sɩngã, rẽ tɩ On maan-kʋʋd a Poti-Feera bi-pugl a Asnat roga a Zozɛf kom-dibli a yiibu. A Zozɛf pʋda yẽnda bi-ribl-kãsengã yʋʋr t'a Manaase, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹yĩmbu.› Bala, a Zozɛf yeelame: «Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ mam yĩm m toogã ne m ba-yirã fãa yelle.» 
Burkĩna Faso tẽngã bʋ-kaod-ro-kaseng taoor soab ne a poorẽ dãmbã na n zĩniga tẽngã taoor soaba, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE a naamã goeel zug arzũma, zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 21 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
Amo rao a Selɛke, Beerot  dao a Narayi sẽn dag n zãad a Seruya biig a Zoaab zab-teedã. Astarot tẽng rao a Uziya,  Arowɛɛr dao a Otam kom-dibli a Sama ne a Yeyiyɛlle, 
Sẽn yɩɩd fãa yõ-koglg kaalmã wɛɛngẽ.
On maan-kʋʋd a Poti-Feera bi-pugl a Asnat sẽn yaa a Zozɛf pagã roga a Zozɛf kamb a yiib Ezɩpt tẽnga. Yaa a Manaase ne a Efrayiim. Ad a Benzame kamba: Yaa a Bela, a Bekɛɛre, a Asbɛlle, a Geera, a Naama, a Eki, a Roose, a Mupim, a Hupim ne a Arde. 
Kãadbã a yiiba tõe n sɩɩsda taaba tɩ ned fãa paam a sẽn  dat wa b lagma taaba, tɩ b yaol n ka na n taas taab  SIDAwã bãag bil ye.
Wãam kong wedre, n yet-a miisa.
 «Yaa mam puglã n liib maam».
Israyɛll nebã seb-gʋndbã kẽnga Faarõ nengẽ n tɩ yẽgem ne-a n yeele: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maand tõnd sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdbã a woto? B ka leb n kõt tõnd moodo, la b yaool n yet tõnd tɩ d wẽ tãn-koɛɛmã! B pãbda tõndo, tɩ yaool n yaa yãmb nebã n beege!» 
Tẽngã taoor soab yãka Letena Kolonell Kiristẽ WATARA t’a lʋɩ L armedelɛɛrã taoore.
A kell n wilg-b lame, t’a na n maoome, n paas kibayã baoob tʋʋmd b sẽn boond tɩ Rãnsayema wã pãng Gibo soolmã pʋgẽ.
Soaala bɩ y kɩt d naag yãmba, tõnd wa yãmb taoore.
Ad yaa yã kom n zãms bagre
A Zozɛf bilga zãmsd bi-bees roogã pʋga. Bõn-kãensã fãa loogr zugẽ, daar a yembre, Ezɩpt rĩmã bõn-yũudlã kɩta, ne a rɩɩbã yel-gɛtã beega b soaalã sẽn yaa Ezɩpt rĩma. 
Woto, Sodom dĩmã ne Gomoor dĩmã, la Adma rĩmã ne Seboyim rĩmã, la rĩm ning sẽn so Bela sẽn yaa Sowaarã yiime n tak zabr ne bãmb Sidim tãngã long pʋga. 
La sẽn paas me, mam wʋma fo sẽn kos bũmb ning a Ismayɛll wɛɛngẽ wã. Mam na n ning-a-la barka, n kɩt t'a rog kamba, n fɩɩg n yɩ wʋsgo. Nanams piig la a yiib n na n yi yẽnda pʋgẽ, la mam na n kɩtame t'a Ismayɛll yɩ bu-kãseng ba. La sẽn kẽed ne mam kaoolã wɛɛngẽ, yaa ne a Izak sẽn yaa bi-ribl ning fo pag a Saara sẽn na n dog vẽer woto wẽndã la m na n vigl-a.» 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: ‹Ãnda n na n tɩ belg a Akaab t'a kẽng n tɩ zab ne Ramot sẽn be Galaadã tɩ b kʋ-a?› La yõwã soab yeelame tɩ woto, tɩ yõwã soab yet tɩ woto. Sɩɩgã leokame: «Mam na n kẽngame n tɩ kɩt tɩ no-rɛɛsdb nins sẽn be ne yẽnda wã togs-a zĩrẽ.» Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Fo sã n sɩd maan a woto, fo na n belg-a lame n tõoge. Dẽ wã, bɩ f kẽng n tɩ maan a woto!» 
Sõng-y pʋg kõapa la kɩɩbsa tɩ tẽnga taoor dãmb la pãnsoaadba kõ  b lohorom tɩ b tõe n tal b pʋta la b rotã tɩ ned a to ra wa reeg n  bas b ye.
Sʋyã rag n luda tẽngã fãa, la tẽn-gãongã zãng rag n sobame. Sʋyã rɩɩ koodã ne tɩɩsã biis zãnga, la bũmb nins fãa sẽn pa sapɩlmã loogr zugẽ wã. Ezɩpt tẽngã fãa pʋgẽ, vãoog ka pa tɩɩg zugu, la moog me ka pa pʋtã pʋs ye. 
Yãmb na n dɩka bõang bi-rẽeng fãa sẽn yaa raoog n tek ne pe-bila wall ne bʋʋga. La yãmb sã n ka rat n tek bõangã, bɩ y wẽ a kãarã n wãage. Bɩ y ra ninsaalbã kom-dẽemsã fãa sẽn be yãmb kom-dibli wã sʋkã. 
Wẽnnaam pʋda sa-gãongã yʋʋr tɩ ‹saasẽ.› Zaabr ne yibeoog zĩndame. Yaa yiibẽ daarã. Wẽnnaam yeelame: «Bɩ koomã fãa sẽn be saagã tẽngrã tigim taab zĩ-yende, tɩ tẽn-gãongã puki.» La a yɩɩ woto. 
Tong wĩy a yiibã noy ne gãtsã sẽn be maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã bãgdẽ wã taoorã. La f maan sãnem tuiids a yiib n ning bãmb yãoog lutgã kɩrems a yiibã gõdgr zĩisẽ, n ning bãmb pʋgẽ, n tablg ne maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã. 
la b fãa yaa a Davɩɩd kamba, pʋg-rɩkdsã kom-dibli sẽn ka naage. B rag n tara tão-poak t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Tamaare. t'a Zoaas rog a Amatsɩya, t'a Amatsɩya rog a Azariya, t'a Azariya rog a Yotam, 
Ki n boond noaaga.
Leb n yɩɩ wakat Burkĩna Faso kom-bɩɩbã sẽn yi n wilg b belem ne Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE.
 A ka le tõe n yeel biigã t'a lebg n kuil ye.
A yeela arzɛkã soab bala :
Dẽ, Israyɛll nebã fãa rɩka Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã la b yɩɩnd n kaasdẽ, la b wẽed nug-poaka, n peebd tãntãado, la b wẽed kɛma, ne kʋl la pendse. Wakat ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã sẽn wa n kẽed a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋgã, a Sayull bi-pugl a Mikall lɩka roog võorẽ n yãnd a Davɩɩd sẽn saood la a kɩdemdẽ. La yẽnda paooga a Davɩɩd a sũurẽ. 
Koob sã n noomẽ,roog-tɩ-d-kuli-n-yɩɩda.
tι wobg yeel-a: M dat f sõngr wε, la maanda a wãna? Ti soaamb yeele: Yãmb pa ne wĩirã, yãmb sã gãd no-kãngã wã yaa, tι mam tι loe naafã ne noor a to wã yaa, yãmb kõn tak-a n yiis faag-faaga? tι wobg yet t’a wυm yã.
Boto, wilgdame tɩ b fãa yaa Burkĩna kamba.
MPP pagtɩ wã rãmb wilgame t’a Rok Mark Kiristẽ KABOORE paama pemsem.
Koob sã n noome, "Roog tɩ d kul" n yɩɩda
Kãoong miime tɩ noaag pa a ma ye, la a pʋgd-a lame
La a Ayisamak biig a Oholiyaab sẽn yaa Dan buudã nedã sõnga yẽnda. A Oholiyaab yaa kug-pɛɛsa, la sʋn-wʋgd sẽn kãt pɛɛl tɩ yɩ gʋlma, ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, la gĩs-moaama, ne gĩs-miidu, la lamd gĩs-bãanega. Sãnem nins fãa nebã sẽn kõ tɩ b rɩk n maan sɛk roogã tʋʋmdã zɩslem yaa kɩlo tusr la kobs-naas la pis-tã la a yoob la garem kobsi la pis-nu, sẽn zems ne sɛk roogã sẽn tar zɩslem makdg ning n makd sãnem zɩslmã. 
Ave Marya.
Ninsaal pa tõe n yã n yɩɩg a yãab ye
Rũmsã fãa ne bõn-bãoonegã fãa, la bõn-yɩgdɩ wã fãa, la bũmb nins fãa sẽn saagd dũniyã zugã wa sẽn zems b buudã sẽn yaa to-to wã fãa yii koglgã pʋga. 
Taoor dãmb nins sẽn get wẽnd doogã tʋʋm yell neerã tog n paama waoogr  n yɩɩda, la sẽn yɩɩd fãa, yaa neb nins sẽn wɩngd ne koe-moonego la ne zãmsgã. Neb nins sẽn maand yel-wẽnã, leng-b nebã fãa sʋka, tɩ neb a taabã me na zoe rabeem. 
Raag yi laafɩ yaa tẽng-n-rãmb n wʋm taab goama
Rẽnd pa segd tɩ karen-biis kẽer sɩng kaorengo, tɩ kẽer zĩ n pa mi b sẽn maand a soab ye.
Dɩlla welg-y mens ne nin-bãmba, bas-y-b kɛɛnga. Da sɩɩs-y bõn-dẽgd buud ye tɩ m zaka noor na pak y yĩnga. M na yɩ Ba y yĩnga tɩ y me yɩ m kom-dibli la m kom-pugli — Pãng-Soaba-Wẽnd n yeele. 
Talla woto, n ta bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, bugraad rãamd sẽn na n leb n nek Waogdg nin-buiidã.
Sõaseg sokdse
A pʋlm-b lame tɩ gosneer na n maana a pãng sẽn tõe, n tõog tɩ zu-loees nins sẽn be b tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ wã paam tɩɩm.
F sã n maan f meng wãamba, b sã n wa baood wãamba, yaa foo la b rɩkda
A Zʋʋda sẽn yãnd-a wã, yẽnda tagsame tɩ yaa pʋg-yoodre. Bala, a nengã rag n pilame. La a Zʋʋda bʋdgame n bao-a n yeel-a yaa: «Wa tɩ mam data foom.» Bala, a Zʋʋda ka bãng tɩ yaa yẽnda bi-pagã ye. La pagã soka a Zʋʋda yaa: «Yãmb na n kõo maam bõe la y yaool n kẽ ne maam?» 
Yɩɩ zɩɩm sẽn ta sase rãmb 70 la b sẽn paam zĩiga pʋgẽ a rood-wokã.
Sãn ka rẽe, sãag tõe n yõka biigã  t’a lebg bãada. Bĩis zom sã n ka be, bɩ y rɩk-y bĩis kooma n paas koom  n wɩng n yaol n kõ-a.
Kãnd fãa tara a gãdb zĩiga
M ba Weoognaab sẽn wa n yi gõob n wa, a mikame t’a roogã pida ne rɩɩbo, t’a na n kɩdem ne sũ-noogo, n pʋd yɩɩll n yetẽ : <……..>
Sẽn leb paasdẽ, b pa tar sor kũun sɛb wala sari sẽn wilg ye.
A Davɩɩd yagense. Ad a Davɩɩd kom-dibli nins sẽn dog Ebrõ wã: Pipi soabã yaa a Amno sẽn yaa yẽnda pag a Ayinoaam sẽn yit Zizreyɛllã bi-kãsenga. Yiibẽ soabã yaa a Dãniyɛll sẽn yaa yẽnda pag a Abigayɩll sẽn yit Karmell tẽngã bi-ribla. Tãabẽ soabã yaa a Absalom sẽn yaa yẽnda pag a Maaka bi-riblã. A Maaka yaa Gesʋʋr dĩm a Talmayi bi-pugla. Naasẽ soabã yaa yẽnda pag a Adoniza sẽn yaa a Hagit bi-riblã. 
A Ɛlkana kom-dibli yaa a Amasayi ne a Ayimote. a Simeya, la sa Agiya, ne a Aazaya. 
La Wẽnnaam leb n naana parwẽna sẽn be ko-kãsengã pʋgã, wa sẽn zems b buudã sẽn yaa to-to, la b naan bõn-vɩɩlɩ nins sẽn dugd koomã pʋgã wa sẽn zems b buudu, la b yaa wʋsg n saagd koomã pʋga. Dẽ, Wẽnnaam leb n naana bõn-yɩgdɩ wã fãa wa sẽn zems b buudu. Dẽ, Wẽnnaam yãame tɩ bõn-kãng yaa sõama. 
Rẽ zugẽ, a Zozɛf kɩtame t'a tʋmtʋmdb nins sẽn dag n be ne yẽnda n yaa logtoɛɛmbã segl a ba a Israyɛll kũumã ne wisd buud toor-toore. La logtoɛɛmbã sogla kũumã 
M sã n dɩt bũmb la m pẽgd Wẽnde, b na yɩɩ wãn n zab ma m sã n pẽgd m Soaala m sẽn paam dɩɩb yĩnga? Gũus-y tɩ y manesem da wa ne ned lʋɩɩse, Zʋɩf rãmb sʋka, bɩ bu-zẽmba, bɩ Tigung kamb sʋk ye. 
Koeesã, rɩkdb yɩɩ neb nins sẽn maan kaalmã roagdba, n paas neb nins sẽn paam-b sãpogrã sull taoor dãmb n gome.
Tak-tɩ-m-tak yaa wam-pɛɛga.
A Kehat kom-dibli yaa a Aram, a Yitsaare, a Ebrõ ne a Uziyɛlle. t'a Uuzi rog a Zeraya, t'a Zeraya rog a Merayote, 
La b togsa a Tamaar t'a sɩdã ba rabda Timna n na n tɩ wõrs a rũm-bãoonego. Woto, a Tamaar yikame n yees a pʋg-kõtã fut n dʋʋge, la a bao fuug n pil a mengã n kẽng n tɩ zĩnd Enayim tẽnga noore, Timna sorã zugu. Bala, pagã yãame t'a Sela bɩɩme, la b ka rɩk yẽnda n kõ a Sela t'a maan a pag ye. 
Kiuug piig la a yiib soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Netofa tẽng rao a Ɛldayi sẽn yaa Otniyɛll buudã ned a yembrã n dag n get sull piig la a yiib soabã yelle. Yẽnda sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. Soolmã yõgnego: Buudã nanambse. Israyɛll buudã nanambs la woto:  Rubɛn buudã pʋgẽ, yaa a Zikri biig a Eliyezɛɛr n yaa b naaba. Sɩmyõ buudã pʋgẽ, yaa a Maaka biig a Sefatiya. 
 Noosã zoe n kẽe roogẽ, n tẽed tɩ yaa saaga n niidẽ.
