Kom-dibli a yiibã bɩɩme. A Ezayu lebga tãoosa, n mi tãoosg sõama, n gõod weoogẽ. La a Zakoob dag n yaa ned sẽn zĩ sɩɩ, n vɩ fu-rot pʋse. A Izak rag n nonga a Ezayu, bala, a dag n wat n kõta yẽnda weoog nemd t'a wãbdẽ. La a Rebeka rag n nonga a Zakoobe. 
Ka bĩnd dugdug la yũug ye.
SIDAwã bãag bil bee neb niisa sẽn tar-a wã yĩn-koomẽ, sẽn  yɩɩda b zɩɩm n wã.
Pondr noor n kʋʋd-a koomẽ
A Zakoob zĩnda a Labã yir n tʋme. A Zakoob yiime n dɩk sor n kẽng neb nins sẽn be yaangã tẽngẽ. 
Katr sãda yibeoog pĩnda, n wa nek m ba a Soaamba, tɩ b na n kẽng n tɩ tão ware, ne m ba Wobgo.
La bʋko, nin-buiidã gũusame n ges tɩ yellã ket n tara taoor kẽnde.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa zabr gãndaoogo.  Bãmb yʋʋr la a Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Bãmb luba Faarõ saar-dãmbã  ne a tãb-biisã ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ. Rudum ko-kãsengã lima tãb-biis nins yẽnda sẽn yãkã. 
Bãmb leokame: «Raoã soka tõnd d yirã rãmb kibar ne pẽdgre. A soka tõnd d mensã yelle, la a sok tɩ tõnd ba wã ket n vɩɩme bɩ, tɩ tõnd tara yao a to bɩ. Dẽ, tõnd leoka a sokdsã. Tõnd dag n ka tõe n bãng t'a na n yeelame tɩ d tɩ tall d yao wã n wa ye.» 
Da waoog-y bõn-naands wa bãmb kẽer sẽn maane tɩ b kibara gʋls woto: «Zãma wã zĩndame n dɩ la a yũ, la a yikame n na n deem a reem.» 
Gʋʋlgã me zĩis beeme , tɩ b tõe n tik n tʋme, tɩ nebã paam rɩɩb sõma.
Sã n ya ne Zerom KABRE«tõnd wʋmdame tɩ Zeenero rãmbã pa rat tɩ Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE lʋɩ tẽngã taoor ye, la yaool n yaa yẽ la tõnd rata.
Karensaamba segd n talla seb kãnga ne a « Pok kibarã », n paas ne  Wẽnnaam Sebrã sẽn gʋls ne buuda goama.
D sʋkda d mens n getẽ sẽn yit-bã na n tɩ fãoonga Pagtɩ a to, bɩ b na n sigla b Pagtɩ wala a Abdulae Moose ne a poorẽ dãmbã sẽn yi n tɩ viglg bPpagtɩ tɩ boond tɩ Pepeyɛsã.
Naab n yagd kae, beoog pa yagd ye
Rao a ye, n wa n be tẽng a yembr pʋgẽ. 
La a Zozɛf kɩtame tɩ b kẽes b fãa bi-bees roog rasem a tãabo. Yãmb sã n yaa sɩd dãmba, bɩ yãmb ned a yembr kell n pa bi-bees roogã pʋg ka, tɩ sẽn ket-bã tall koodã n kuil n tɩ kɩs yãmb yirã rãmba, komã yĩnga. 
Kũum dɩ ned kõn dɩ a yʋʋre.
Ad-y yĩng neong yaa wa moogo: a neerma yaa wa puugu; moog kʋɩtame t'a puuda me sʋʋgdẽ. Sã n ya Wẽnd Gomde, a bee daar fãa. Wẽnd Gomda la Koe-noog ning b sẽn taas yãmbã. 
La b ninga a Zozɛf rɩɩbã toore, la b ning a kẽem-dãmbã rẽnd toore, la b ning Ezɩpt neb nins sẽn mi n dɩt ne yẽnda wã me toore. Bala, Ezɩpt tẽng nebã ka tõe n naag Ebre rãmbã n dɩ ye. Bala, bõn-kãng yaa yel-beed ne Ezɩpt nebã. 
Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã paam pẽgre, bala, taa bãmb yam tɩ b yãk yãmb n kɩt tɩ y yɩ Israyɛll rĩmã! Yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn nong Israyɛll nebã wakat fãa yĩngã n kɩt tɩ bãmb yãk yãmb tɩ y yɩ rĩmã, n kaood bʋʋdã ne sɩda, la ne tɩrlem.» 
Moasã, m biiga, kelg mam goamã neere! Yik n zoe n kẽng mam tão a Labã sẽn be Haarã wã nengẽ n tɩ soonde! Kell n zĩnd yẽnda nengẽ tɩ yɩ rasem a yiibu, hal tɩ fo kẽemã sũur wa sigi. 
Ka-koaad sɩlem ka yɩɩd saag ye.
Kibarã yii libreinfo.
 La, biigã sẽn bãng tɩ ned a to ka le tõe n maan-a wẽngã, wuk-m-meng kẽ-a lame, t’a toor ka le be ne ned a to yas ye.
Kãnkãr ra wɩd a taab tɩ b fãa yaa rʋda
T’a sok a menga : «M tãood-a lame n kʋ, la m sig n tɩ rɩk a ligdã bɩ? »
Tõnd la sẽn sõngd-b Wẽnd n tʋmnẽ, yãmb la Wẽnd pʋʋgo, yãmb la b roogo b sẽn me. 
Karensaamba yeele: “Wakat bilf pʋgẽ bãaga bil ka maand bũmb  ye.” Dẽ poore, a “Weoog” wa zĩiga pʋga, tɩ “sodaasa sẽn zabd ne  bãaga” lob-a yɩnga.
Kapitɛnd Marsɛll MEDA kẽnga taoor n wilg tɩ rũndã, zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 soabã, yaa raar sẽn ya kasenga Burkĩna Faso kʋdemdã pʋgẽ.
Ned sã n tar bũmb a  yembr tõnd sẽn sõdga pʋgẽ, ka rat n wilig t’a soaba tara SIDAwã bãag ye.  Ayo! La bũmb niisã tõnd sẽn sõdgã, a soaba sãn tar bãmb wʋsog wakate  a yembr pʋgẽ, toẽ tɩ SIDAwã bãag tar-a lame, la ket n ka vẽeneg ye.
A katr gjongo, ka yees saag tɩ b sʋkd meelem.
Dẽ a Zakoob kẽngame n tɩ bao bʋ-poalã n wa kõ a ma t'a maan rɩ-noog sẽn ta a baaba wã yam. A Rebeka rɩka bʋ-poalã gãndã n pil a Zakoob nusã ne a yublã sẽn ka tar yĩn-koabnengã. 
 La nin-kẽemã yiime, t’a sũurã tar kiu, kiu, la a yetẽ : «Weoognaab ye n da seg maam sorã zug ye ».
F bõang sã n sut, bɩ f gãd a zʋʋre
Nif pa yalem n get a sẽn pa nong-b rãmb ye
ƐREFI kiba-kɩtbã lebg n dɩka Zend afirik rãmb sẽn gʋls kibar n gomd Burkĩna faso gosneem sẽn wilg tɩ b na n dɩka kom-bɩɩb 350 tɩ b sõng sodaasã n zab ne nin-wẽnsã.
La baoosgo, a Davɩɩd zug maasem yĩnga, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yẽnda Wẽnnaamã kɩtame t'a bi-ribl a yembr led a zĩigẽ n dɩ naam Zeruzalɛm, sẽn na n yɩlẽ t'a Davɩɩd yʋʋrã ra meneme, la tɩ Zeruzalɛm tõe n kell n yɩ soolmã na-tẽnga. Bala, rĩm a Davɩɩd dag n maana sẽn yaa tɩrg Sẽn-Ka-Saab nifẽ, la yẽnda vɩɩmã tɛka, a ka tol n kɩɩs Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeel yẽnda t'a maan bũmb ninsã ba a yembre, sã n ka Hɛt rao a Uuri yellã poorẽ wã bala. 
A Moyiis yeela a Aarõ yaa: «Rɩk-y yʋʋr n sui mandã ne wam makdgã noor a yembr n tẽgn-a Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, n bĩng-a beenẽ yãmb yagensã yĩnga.» 
A ka seg taab n maan tigr ye.
Tũu ne mooneg koees b yiis Burkĩna Faso telavisẽo wã pʋgẽ la nin-buiidã yaool n na n bãng tɩ ket n yaa ƐMPESƐƐRE, la yaa ƐMPESƐƐR a yiib soab n lebg n doge.
Wẽnd Rĩunga ka goam bala, a naaga ne Wẽnd pãng tʋʋma. Bõe la y nonga? M wa y nengẽ ne sãbse bɩ m wa ne nonglem la sũ-maasem? 
Dẽ, a Zeroboaam pagã maana wa a sɩdã sẽn yeel yẽnda wã. A yikame n kẽng Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Akiya nengẽ Silo. La a Akiya dag n kʋʋla wʋsg t'a ninã ka leb n neẽ ye. Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n yeela a Akiya yaa: «Ade, a Zeroboaam pagã biig n yaa bãada, t'a wat n na n yãnd foom n sok a biigã yell sẽn na n yɩ to-to. La a na n maana a mengã, fo sẽn kõn bãng tɩ yaa yẽnda ye. La mam na n wilga foom, fo sẽn na n togs-a bũmb ninga.» 
Daar a yembre, a Poko zĩi tɩɩg a yembr tẽngre n karemd a sebre. A yao-poaka a Yembi zoe n waa a nẽngẽ n bool-a n yeel yaa: “Poko! Poko! M wʋma pagba sẽn gomd bũmb a ye yelle; b yeelame tɩ m ma solga bũmbu.
A Ezayu mikame tɩ Kana kom-pugli wã ka ta yẽnda ba a Izak yam ye. Dẽ, a Ezayu yiime n kẽng a Ismayɛll nengẽ. Yẽnda tɩ rɩka a Abrahaam bi-ribl a Ismayɛll bi-pugl a Mahalat sẽn yaa a Nebayot tão-poakã n maan a paga, n paas a pagbã. A Zakoob paama zãmsd Betɛlle 
A Beriya kom-dibli yaa a Ebɛɛr ne a Malkiyɛlle. A Malkiyɛll n yaa a Birzot ba. A Semeer kom-dibli yaa a Ayi ne a Royega, la a Uba ne a Aram. 
A Penuwɛll rag n yaa a Gedoor ba, t'a Ezɛɛr dag n yaa a Uusa ba. Bãmb dag n yaa a Efrata bi-kãseng a Ʋʋr kom-dibli. A Ʋʋr n yaa a Betlehɛm ba. A Eleya kom-dibli yaa a Serɛt ne a Sowaar la a Ɛtnan. 
Kasem yaa tãmpʋʋr sagdo.
Sẽn gõ-a weoog n mi weoogo.
Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, bɩ y kõ y nebã sugri, b sẽn beeg yãmbã yĩnga, la y kõ-b sugr wẽng ning fãa b sẽn maanã yĩnga. Bɩ y kɩt tɩ neb nins sẽn kẽes bãmb yembdã zoe bãmb nimbãanega. Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, bɩ y ges y tʋmtʋmdã se-yõkrã, la y kelg Israyɛll sẽn yaa yãmb nebã kosgo, wakat ning fãa b sẽn na n bool yãmba. 
No-bil gõaad rɩta tãnbeg-raase
Yɩɩ wakat a sẽn kell n bool nin-buiidã tɩ b bas b yam n tʋm b tʋʋma, la b gũus b mens ne kibay kẽer sẽn yit ẽntɛrnetã zugã.
Wakat-kãnga, Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã pida a Amasayi sẽn yaa tãb-biis pis-tã naabã t'a zẽk a koɛɛg n yeele: A Izayi biig a Davɩɩde, Bɩ vɩ-bãan zĩnd ne foom, Bɩ vɩ-bãan zĩnd ned ning sẽn fãagd-a foomã zugu! Bala, fo Wẽnnaamã fãaga foom!  Dẽ, a Davɩɩd deega bãmb n kɩt tɩ b lebg a tãb-biisã nanambse. 
 A kẽngame, n tɩ yã m ba Katre, n yeel-a : «Wa tɩ d kẽnge, n tɩ pãb d bɛnsã puudã n sʋʋge, rẽ, b womda saal-saala, bɛd-bɛda, wogd-wogdo.»
Tigsgã rãmb sẽn wa n kʋms fãa tɩ sa, yɩɩ tãrazisẽo wã taoor soab n wa n tik a nug sɛbã zut tɩ b page.
Gell mi a sẽn saoodẽ lomdẽ
B naabã yʋʋr la a Ezɛɛre, yiibẽ soab yaa a Abdyaase, tãabẽ soab yaa a Eliyaabe, Bãmb dag n yaa a Gaad yagense, n yaa tãb-biis nanambse. B yao-zʋʋgã a yembr bal pãngã taa tãb-biis koabg pãnga, tɩ kãsmã pãng ta tãb-biis tusr nanambse. 
la neb tus a naas sẽn na n waoogd Sẽn-Ka-Saab ne yʋʋm-teed nins mam sẽn maan Sẽn-Ka-Saab waoogr yĩngã.» A Ladan roga kom-dibli a tãabo: bi-kãsengã yaa a Yekiyɛlle, tɩ sẽn pʋgd yaa a Zetam ne a Zowɛlle. 
Bõang a ye n mog zom tɩ pelg bõensã fãa noy.
F maan neere, f maana f menga, f maam wẽnga, f maana f menga
Yaa sɩda, m pa maan yelle n zĩi n bʋʋd ne m meng ye la ka rẽ n ya kaset tɩ m yell manega ne Wẽnd ye. M kaset soab yaa Soaala bala. 
Tõogã tog n yɩɩ bũmb a yembr Israyɛll nebã ne sãamb nins sẽn be yãmb tẽngẽ wã yĩnga.» La badaar bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ Israyɛll nebã yi Ezɩpt tẽngã, tãb-bi-sull-sulli. 
Miniisr ning sẽn get koobã, a Deni WEDRAOOG wilgame tɩ nasaar birgã ligd sẽn ya toogã, yaa ãndũni wã fãa pʋgẽ.
La bu-bãmb yagensã sẽn dag n ket n be tẽngã pʋg tɩ Israyɛll nebã dag n ka tõog n kʋ wã, rĩm a Salmo rɩka bãmb tɩ b yaa yembs n tʋmd tʋʋm-wɛglã hal tɩ tãag rũndã. Rĩm a Salmo ka tol n yãk Israyɛll ned ba a yembr n kẽes yembd ye. Bala, Israyɛll nebã n dag n yaa yẽnda tãb-biisi, la a tʋmtʋmdba, la a nanambse ne a tãb-biisã nanambse, tɩ kẽer yaa a saar-dãmbã ne a wed-rʋʋdbã nanambse. 
Tɩ, m ba Katr yeel-a :
Ned pa mi wobg sũ-sãang ye
A Yellpagindim sẽn mi tι yẽ zakã rãmb ne naab yaa wõg-wõga, a sιd pelga a pυg n na n zã naafã. Wĩndga, yυngo, a geta naafã yelle, tι bũmb ra wa maan-a ye. A tõogame t’a nob sõama, n yεs yolgemde, n sιd tar rasãnde.
Neba fãa sãn da mi sẽn tuud sor ninga tɩ bãaga yõk fo wala a ka yõk  fo n são.
La b yet tι. Wẽnd pa kυ naab pa kυυd ye. Mogrã zĩig sẽn  zãr yĩnga, neb a yiibã kẽname n wa ya, n zind tιιg tẽngre, n nan pems bilf la b yaool n yiki. B wa n nee yĩisr naoor sẽn kaoog t’a keoosd n loogdẽ.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 27 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, gosneema seb-gʋnd-kaseng a Zak Sostɛnd DẼNGARA zĩniga Rimtallba Emmanuel WEDRAOOGO, miniisr ning sẽn get kiba-kɩtbã, kʋdemdã la gilg-n-ges-yel-soalma a tʋʋmd zĩigẽ.
A Zakoob ninga a Zozɛf kambã barka. Yel-kãensã fãa loogr zugẽ, b wa n yeela a Zozɛf t'a baaba ka keem ye. La a Zozɛf peega a kamb a yiibã: A Manaase ne a Efrayiim, n kẽng a Zakoob nengẽ. B togsa a Zakoob n yeel yaa: «Ad yãmb biig a Zozɛf n wa n na n ges-yã. Dẽ, a Israyɛll modgame n yik n zĩnd a gãagã zugu.» 
Dẽ zugẽ, y segd n naaga vɛrse kãens sebra pʋga.
Ned fãa kẽebda a sẽn bʋde
Yaa rẽ tɩ b seg kiba-kɩtbã zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 27 yʋʋm 2022 soabã n kos tɩ b sik tags rãmbã ligdi, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ b tõog n yãk wakɩr 10 lɩtr fãa pʋgẽ.
Maan fɩtl doagendgã, n ning laas a naas sẽn wẽnd amand tɩɩg bila, n tar yoad ne puudu. 
Sẽn na yɩl tɩ tõnd buudã goam tõog n piuug la a kẽng taoore, b zĩnig na-kẽnda, n na n yãag-a.
A Moyiis sẽn be Madiyã soolmẽ wã, Wẽnnaam yeel-a yẽnda: «Lebg n leb Ezɩpte. Bala, neb nins sẽn dag n baood foom n na n kʋ wã kiime.» Dẽ, a Moyiis kɩtame t'a pagã ne a kom-dibli wã zomb bõense. La yẽnda leba Ezɩpt tẽnga. A Moyiis rag n zãada Wẽnnaam dasaarã a nugẽ. 
A Makɩɩr pag a Maaka roga biiga, n pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Perɛɛze. A Perɛɛz ba-biigã yʋʋr dag n yaa a Sarɛɛse. A Sarɛɛs kom-dibli yaa a Ulam ne a Rekɛm. A Semida kom-dibli rag n yaa a Ahiyan, a Sɩkɛm, a Liki, ne a Aniyam. 
Ade, ned sã n beẽ n tẽed tɩ Krista n so-a, a bãng rũnna la beoog tɩ Krista n so yẽnda, la Krista n so tõnd me. B yetame tɩ m sɛba pʋga m yaa gãndaoogo la nin-toaaga la m sã n yɛs y taoore m ka tar yaoko la m ka mi goam ye. 
Ned pa nong yaoore, tɩ yaoor me, ned nong yaoore, tɩ yaoor me
La a Eli leokame: «Mam tʋma Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Saasẽ-Pãng-Soabã yĩng ne m sũurã fãa, la Israyɛll nebã basa yãmb kaoolã, la b luba y tẽn-kugã, la b kʋ yãmb no-rɛɛsdbã ne sʋʋga. Yaa maam m yembr bal n ket n vɩ, la b baooda maam me n dat n kʋ.» 
Naafã sɩd loogame la a bas m ba Katr boka pʋgẽ t’a yõdg n ki.
Kũum são yãnde
Ned ma pa wẽed pig t'a biig kʋm kom ye
Yʋʋm 2021 la yʋʋm 2022 soabã yõ-koglgã wɛɛngẽ, bũmb ba a ye ka leb poorẽ ye.
Pʋʋg kinkirg ka teeg pʋʋg sag-basdem ye.
Zõang paam tẽt bɩ a zẽk a naoore
Biig sã n ka yãbd me, a rat a ma.
La kinkirgã yikame, n wudg n tɩ tigim we-rũmsã fãa n yeel tɩ : «pʋg-yãang-m-kota-zẽed n be m doogẽ wã, n dat n kʋ maam».
Neb nins sẽn paam kũunã wilga b sũ-noog ne sullã rãmba.
la sã n yaa ne Benzame buudã, b kõo bãmb Geba ne a kɩremsã, Alemet ne a tẽn-kɩremsã, la Anatot ne a kɩremsã. B tẽmsã fãa sõor yaa piig la a tãabo, wa sẽn zems b roto. B kõo a Gersom kom-dibli tẽms piig la a tãabo, wa sẽn zems b roto, la yaa tẽms b sẽn yãk a Yisakaar ne a Asɛɛr la a Neftali ne a Manaase buudã pʋgẽ Basan soolmẽ. 
Tɩ Yũug me yeel-a : « Sã n yaa woto, m pa na n le tɩbs f ye. Fo na n paa ne f nodrã ».
Wẽnnaam malɛɛkã yeela maam zãmsdã pʋgẽ yaa: Zakoobe! Tɩ mam sake. La malɛɛkã yeela maam yaa: Zẽk f neng n gese. Boees nins fãa sẽn dʋʋd yãansã yaa pẽrem-pẽrem, la wad-wada, la bẽesem-bẽesem. Bala, mam yãnda a Labã sẽn maan foom bũmb ningã fãa. 
B paooga a Davɩɩd sẽn tʋm-b rãmbã. Dẽ poore, Amo nebã rĩm a Nakaas kiime, t'a biigã led a zĩigẽ n lebg rĩmã. A Davɩɩd yeelame: «Mam na n maana a Nakaas biig a Hanun neere, bala, yẽnda ba wã rag n maana maam neere.» Dẽ, a Davɩɩd tʋma neb tɩ b kẽng a Hanun nengẽ n tɩ pʋʋs-a, a ba wã sẽn maan kaalmã yĩnga. Woto, a Davɩɩd zakã nebã ta a Hanun nengẽ Amo nebã tẽngẽ n na n pʋʋs-a, 
Soaamb yυ-baoore
A Miise leokame: «Mam yãnda Israyɛll nebã sẽn sãeegd tãmsã zutu,  wa piis sẽn ka tar pe-kɩɩma! La Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: Nin-kãensã ka tar soaal ye, bɩ ned kam fãa lebg n kuil a yir ne laafɩ.» Dẽ, a Miise yeelame yaa: «Beneere, kelg-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab koɛɛga! Mam yãnda Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn zao b naam geerã zugu, tɩ saasẽ dãmbã karg n gũbg-b goabg la rɩtgo. 
Zẽem noom bʋʋg bɩ a yũ
Bala, Wẽnnaam deng n naana a Ãdem pipi, n yaool n naan a Ɛɛve. Baoosgo, a na n paama fãagre, a sẽn lebg ma wã yĩnga, a sã n modg ne tẽebo, la nonglem, la welg toor Wẽnnaam yĩnga, la gũus-m-menga. 
Daar a ye, a pagã wa n da werda ki neerẽ, tɩ noos wa rat n dɩ ki wã.
Katr ne soaamb gεl baoobo
Kom-bɩɩsã sẽn yaa a Roboaam reed-n-taasã yeela a Roboaam yaa: Ad yãmb sẽn na n yeel-b bũmb ningã la woto: « ‹Y ba zɩlga tõnd wʋsgo, la yãmba, yols-y-do.› Yeel-y-b tɩ yãmb nug-bi-kɛmblã yɩɩda y ba wã kanga. La sẽn paase, y ba sã n dag namsa bãmba, yãmb na n paasa bãmb namsgã tɩ yɩɩd rẽ. Yeel-y-b tɩ y ba sã n dag n sɩbga bãmb ne kalwaase, yãmb na n sɩbg-b-la ne kalwaas sẽn tar gõose.» 
Yaa rasem a tãab pʋgẽ la b siglg tʋʋmdã tɩ ned fãa kẽng n tɩ kõ a sẽn tar ne yamleoogo.
Karen-biisã ba-rãmb kẽer wilgame tɩ b bee kambã poorẽ, tɩ bala, yaa bũmb sẽn segde.
Yaa rẽ tɩ b rat tɩ b ges zu-loe-kãens fãa yelle.
Ko-zoetem n dag n yit Edɛn tẽngã pʋg n zãgsd zẽedã zĩiga. La zẽedã zĩigẽ wã, ko-zoetmã welga ko-soay a naase. Pipi Ko-sorã yʋʋr boondame tɩ ‹Pison.› Ko-so-kãng gilga Havɩla tẽngã. Havɩla yaa tẽng sẽn tar sãnem. 
 Guugã, yaa sẽn na n tar n gũud yãmba.
La a Moyiis leokame yaa:  «Yõwã ka tõogr yɩɩl ye. La yɩɩlã ka wẽnd b sẽn tõog neb tɩ b yɩɩndẽ me ye. Mam sẽn wʋmd bũmb ningã yaa neb sẽn yɩɩnd n deesd taaba!» La bãmb sẽn kolg nebã sik zĩigã n yãnd nag-bilã la nebã sẽn saood warbã, a Moyiis sũur yika wʋsg t'a lob kug-walsã tẽng tɩ b wã tãngã sɛɛga. 
A Sɩmyõ yagensã, sẽn dag n yaa gãndaadã sõor yaa neb tus a yopoe la koabga. A Benzame yagensã sẽn yaa a Sayull ba-biisã sõor yaa neb tus a tãabo. Bala, bãmb sʋkã neb wʋsg n dag n get a Sayull zakã tʋʋm yelle. 
Tõnd sãn wa kẽng n na n tɩ ges neb sẽn be kũum taore, d sɛgdame n  paas-b raoodo n wilig-b tɩ b sɛgd n yiisa b toogã, b sũyikrã la b sũsãongã.
Ɛrtebe televisẽo wã ra pa pa le kõt n ye.
Lebg-y tao-tao n kẽng m ba wã nengẽ n tɩ yeel-b yaa: ‹Yãmb biig a Zozɛf yeelame: Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ mam lebg Ezɩpt soolmã naaba. Rẽ wã, bɩ y wa mam nengẽ n da kaoos ye. 
Biigã gom-toogã yĩng kɩtame, tɩ ba wã ne biigã, naag taab n kẽ, n na n kõdg koomã, la, b sẽn kẽ wã, b yiibã fãa paa be n ki.
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbã nengẽ.
La bãmb wʋka b teedã, la b fiuug a zugã, la b wʋk a zab-teedã. Dẽ poore, b kɩtame tɩ b saag Filistẽ-dãmbã tẽng n togs b bõn-naandsã ne nebã fãa kiba-noogã. Yabɛɛs tẽngã sẽn be Galaad soolmẽ wã neb sẽn wʋm bũmb nins fãa Filistẽ-dãmbã sẽn maan a Sayullã, 
Bõe n sek pẽgre, f sã deeg toog sẽn ya f beegr sɩbgre? Sã n yaa y tʋʋm sõma yĩnga la y sakd namsgo, ad-y rẽ n be yõod Wẽnnaam nengẽ. Mik b bool yãmb tɩ y wa namse; Krista me namsa y yĩnga n kõ y togs-n-taar n dat tɩ y pʋg bãmba. 
Sansang pa tog n teeg yɩbrg sablem n do raag ye
A tãnkũp yegd ne kugri, kõ n bãng kugr pʋga. Kugr kjugelgo, tãnkũp kjugelgo.
Soaala Zezi Krista barka, Wẽnnaam Ba nonglem la a Vʋʋsem Sõng zoodo lagem y ne taaba. Ami! 
A Yerɛɛd vɩɩmã zãng yɩɩ yʋʋm kobs-wɛ la pis-yoob la a yiibu, la a kiime. A Matusela rogmã zugẽ, a Enok tũu Wẽnnaam yʋʋm kobs-tã, la a roga kom-dibli la kom-pugli. 
Yãmb fʋʋsame n kɩt tɩ ko-kãsengã lim bãmba.  Bãmb tisga wa namd ko-kãsemsã pʋsẽ. Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, wẽnnaam-dãmbã sʋka,  ãnda n zem yãmba? Ãnda n tar naam ne sõmblem wa yãmba, n sek zoeese, la sẽn zems waoogre, n maand tʋʋm-kãsemse? 
A kell n goma yõ-koglg kaalmã sẽn kɩt tɩ karen-dot tus katɛk pagã yelle.
Bao-y zĩig n kõ neb sul bõones kēer tɩ b tõe n ko bũmb n sõng  b mense. B sã n ka tõe bɩ y sõng-b tɩ b paam tʋʋm teed n sɩnge.
«Fo sã n mi n wʋm gomde, reng n togs f zoa, la f yaool n togs f paga.
Yaa Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE, ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã, n tik a nug sebrã zug Waogdgo, zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 5 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
La a Moyiis yalsa Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor n gom n yeele: «Israyɛll nebã sã n ka kelg maam, Faarõ na n maana a wãn n kelg mam sẽn yaa ned sẽn ka tõe goamã?» Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Moyiis la Aarõ, n wilg bãmb b sẽn na n maan bũmb ninga, sẽn kẽed ne Israyɛll nebã la Faarõ sẽn yaa Ezɩpt rĩmã wɛɛngẽ, sẽn na n yɩl n yiis Israyɛll nebã Ezɩpt soolmã pʋga. 
Burkĩna Faso kom-bɩɩb n yãk b yam n bool nin-buiidã tɩ ned kam kõ a nug bũmb tɩ b naag taab n maan ninbãan-zoeer tʋʋmde, ne neb nins sẽn be zu-loees pʋgẽ, sẽn kẽed ne nin-wẽnsã tʋʋm-goabã sabaabo.
Paam-bʋʋm ka yas na-yir ye.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 5 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaas nins sẽn deeg Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022, gãnega na-kẽndr ning b sẽn na n dɩk n zã tẽngã t’a tũ sari sore, waoog taaba, la soog-m-meng pʋgẽ.
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩbã nengẽ.
Dẽ, a Lot zẽk n gesa Zʋrdẽ kunkubã fãa sẽnẽ zĩisã sẽn paam zãgsg sõama wã. La yaa sẽn deng Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n nan ka sãam Sodom ne Gomoorã, la a rag wẽnda wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab zẽed zĩiga, wa Ezɩpt tẽngã sẽn yaa to-to wã, n tall n tɩ tãag Sowaar tẽngã. La a Lot yãka Zʋrdẽ kunkubã zĩisã fãa, la a loogame n kẽng yaangã sẽnẽ. Rẽ, yɩɩ woto tɩ bãmb welg n bas taaba. 
B vẽnegame tɩ yaa Letena Kolonell DAMIB na-kẽndrã sẽn da pe le tũud wa bãmb sẽn da gãnegã ye.
Rogem yaa wa bugum, a rata tusga
Ned loalg sã n tã ned a to loalg n kʋ, bãmb na n koosa lol-vɩɩgã n pʋɩ taab ligdã, la bãmb na n pʋɩɩ lol-kɩɩngã nemd me. La b sã n dag n deng n bãngame tɩ loalgã yaa lol-tãadga, t'a soaba ka loe-a, loalgã soab tog n lebsa ned a to wã loalga, la a tall lol-kɩɩngã. 
Wẽnnaam Sebrã pʋgẽ, neb n gom ne Wẽnnaam b toog yelle.
Ned pa pengd ger n dĩng wĩir ye
Gãeeng sã n dɩk f kurg tɩ f rigd-a,fo meng la gãeenga.
La bi-puglã zoe n kẽnga a ma nengẽ n tɩ togs-a yellã fãa. La mikame t'a Rebeka rag n tara kẽem-bi-ribl yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Labã. La a Labã yiime n zoe n babs raoã ko-nifã sɛɛga. 
A Abrahaam kũumã zugẽ, Wẽnnaam ninga a Abrahaam biig a Izak zug barka. A Izak rag n tilga a yirã n pẽneg Lakayi-Royi bulgã. A Ismayɛll kamb ne a yagense 
La a Zakoob sok-b lame tɩ bãmb mii a Nahoor biig a Labã bɩ? La b leokame tɩ n-yẽe, tɩ bãmb mi-a lame. La yẽnda soka bãmb t'a Labã keemame. Bãmb leokame t'a tara laafɩ. La b yeele: «Ad a Labã bi-pugl a Rasɛll sẽn wat ne a rũmsi.» 
Kaam sõngda pãnengo.
Yιbrdã sẽn wat n sõsd kυkẽ wã sã n yã-a, b na n sigame n dat n dι-a. Woto, a paamda a ye n yõke. Biigã sιd kẽngame n tι maan wala tιιmã soab sẽn wilgã. A sẽn gãandã, pa kaoos la vιbrdã wa zomb kυkã, n sιng sõasga.
Kom na yi la yãnd kõn sa ye
La beenẽ, a Zʋʋda yãnda Kana ned a Suwa bi-pugl n peeg n maan a paga, la a kẽe ne-a. Pagã leb n dɩka pʋg yɛs n dog bi-ribla, la b pʋda bi-kãng yʋʋr t'a Onan. 
T’a Yamne leoke: Yaa m pυg n pa pid la m ket n pa gõe. Yiri, b kõta maam bĩisim, tι mam yũ n yaool n gũ si.
Naaf sã n sãd neerẽ, bʋʋg yasa zaalem
Bãmb n dʋ arzãna n zĩ b Ba rɩtgo la rẽ tɩ b reng n tõoga yĩngr Sõgen-kambã, yĩngr Kãsem-dãmbã, la Pãn-dãmba fãa. 
A Moyiis rɛɛmbã sẽn yã bũmb nins fãa yẽnda sẽn maand nebã yĩngã, yẽnda soka a Moyiis yaa: «Yaa bõe la fo sẽn maand nebã yĩngã? Yaa bõe tɩ fo zĩ kaanẽ f yembre? La bõe yĩng tɩ nebã fãa yɛs fo taoor yibeoog tɩ ta zaabre?» 
t'a Merayot roga a Amariya, t'a Amariya rog a Akituube, t'a Salum rog a Hilkiiza, t'a Hilkiiza rog a Azariya, 
B rag n naaga sẽbdg ning sẽn tar n sẽbgdẽ wã ne maan-kʋʋd kãsem fuugã n sẽ, la a tara sãnem gĩsi, la gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo ne gĩs-moaama, ne gĩs-miid ne lamd gĩs-bãaneg wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. La b ninga kugã maan-kʋʋd kãsem fuugã bãg-tabdẽ wã. Yaa kug sẽn na n tẽegd Israyɛll nebã yell wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Moyiisã. 
So-taogd a ye kibare.
A Hadaad kiime, la Masreka ned a Samla reega yẽnda zĩig n dɩ naam. A Sayull kiime, la a Akboor biig a Baall-Hanaan n deeg yẽnda zĩig n dɩ naam. 
 A sẽn wa wãb n tɩg marsã, la, a yaool n na n zã nemdã, n kuil n tɩ kõ a sɩda.
Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã leb n vɩɩmda ne buraad rãamd wa yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 24 sẽn loogã.
Koadeng maan neer bɩ a yaas n gũ pʋʋg soaba
Wẽnnaam sẽn deeg arzegs nins fãa tõnd ba wã nengẽ n kõ yãmbã yaa tõnd ne d kambã n so. Dẽ wã, bɩ y maan fãa wa Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ y maanã.» 
Reezẽo di Bukl di Muhundã sull bee Dedugu.
B sẽn! yi n gese, mikame tι yaa a Yamyιιda. Tι naab sok-a tι yaa noog tι yẽ wa peesd pusgã sasa kãngã. T’a Yamyιιd wẽ siri, la a leoke: Hmm... Naaba! Ad yaa yυn-sυk yel-yãgdem. M baaba n dog yaa, tι b tυm-m tι m wa pees pusgã n wa tι b rυg n so bi-pεεlgã.
A Labã yeela raoã yaa: «Yãmb yaa soab ning sẽn tar Sẽn-Ka-Saab barka! Wa-y-yã! Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb yas yɩnga? Mam manega roogo, la m bao zĩig yʋgma wã yĩnga.» Raoã kẽe zakã pʋga. A Labã kɩtame tɩ b sik yʋgma wã zɩɩbã n bao kãenkãe ne yamd n kõ-ba, la a bao koom n kõ raoã ne neb nins sẽn tũ yẽnda wã tɩ b waas b nao. 
Ad-y m zoe n ningd-y la yãnde m sã n sok ned sã n ka be y sʋka n tar yẽesem n tõe n welg y yɛla, tɩ y tat y saam-biis n dabd bʋʋd bu-zẽmba taoore! 
A Zehozada biig a Benaya leoka rĩmã yaa: «Ãmina! Woto yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd dĩmã Wẽnnaamã n gome. Dẽ, maan-kʋʋd a Sadok ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Natã, ne a Zehozada biig a Benaya la Kerɛt nebã ne Pelɛt nebã kẽng n tɩ zombga a Salmo rĩm a Davɩɩd bõn-wɛɛgã tɩ b peeg-a n kẽng Gihon. 
A Eliize basa a niigã, la a wudg n pʋgl a Eli n yeele: «M kotame tɩ y kõ-m sor tɩ m kuil n tɩ pʋʋs m ba ne m ma la m wa!» A Eli leokame: «Kẽng la f lebg n wa! Bala mam ka maan-f bũmb ye.» A Eliize sẽn yi a Eli nengẽ, a kẽng n tɩ yõga niig a yiib n maan maoongo, la a rɩka nag-koodsã raad n dʋg b nemdã n kõ nebã tɩ b wãbe, la a yik n tũ a Eli n lebg a tʋmtʋmda. 
Pagã rag n gomda ne a Zozɛf daar fãa n pẽdgd-a la a kelgd-a ye. A ka sak n gãand ne-a wall a lagem ne-a ye. La daar a yembre, a Zozɛf kẽe roogẽ n na n maan a tʋʋmde. La mikame, tɩ zakã ned baa a yembr dag n ka be zakã pʋg ye. 
Yaa rẽ t’a Asɩl Tãpsoab gʋls sebr n kõ neb nins sẽn sigl seg taabã, n wilg t’a Edi Kõmbeoog pa segd n wa zĩnd tigsgã SEDEPE pagtɩ wã yʋʋr yĩng ye.
A Sesan rɩka a bi-pugl a yembr n kõ a Yaara t'a maan a paga. Bi-pugl-kãng roga a biig tɩ b pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Atayi. t'a Azariya rog a Helɛtse, t'a Helɛts rog a Elaaza, 
Sẽn beẽ n beẽ, m ba Kãoong wa n wʋma kibarã, t’a bao kaam ne rʋko, n tʋk n dɩk sore, n teesd m ba Soaamb sẽn beẽ wã sẽnẽ.
sẽn dɩt-b zamaana yõodo wala b pa rɩt-a meng ye, tɩ y mi tɩ zamaana neng ka na n zɛ teoong ye. M datẽ lame tɩ y zãrẽ ne yɩɩr buud fãa. Rao ning sẽn ka kẽ kãadem yaa Soaala yɛl la a lʋɩɩsd taoore, n gẽesd a sẽn na n yɩlẽ n ta b yam. 
Mam ba wã Wẽnnaam sẽn yaa a Abrahaam Wẽnnaamã, m ba a Izak sẽn zoet a soabã sã n dag n ka beẽ ne maam, yãmb dag n na n kɩtame tɩ mam kuil nug-zaala. La Wẽnnaam yãnda mam paoogrã ne m nusã tʋʋm-toodã, dẽ, yʋngẽ, bãmb kaoo yel-kãng bʋʋdo.». A Zakoob ne a Labã wẽena ne taaba 
La Filistẽ-dãmbã zoeeme n bas b wẽn-naandsã beenẽ. La a Davɩɩd kɩtame tɩ b wʋk wẽn-naandsã n yõog bugum. Fo sã n wa wʋm bʋrg sẽn yit tɩɩsã zut sẽn wẽnd neb sẽn kẽnd rãamde, bɩ f sɩng zabrã tɩ yaa Wẽnnaam n lʋɩt fo taoor n na n sõng foom n zab ne Filistẽ-dãmbã. 
Woto makda neb 13 nins b sẽn kʋ Kõnsaye de Lãntãtã pʋg zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 15 yʋʋm 1987 soabã.
Nin-sõng rogda nin-sõngo, nin-wẽng rogda nin-wẽnga
A Benzame yaa rigd-n-yĩidga.  Yibeoogo, yẽnda wãbda a rũnga. La zaabre, yẽnda pʋɩta a sẽn paamã.» Yaa nin-bãmbã n yaa Israyɛll buud piig la a yiibã. Yɩɩ woto la bãmb ba wã gom ne bãmba, n ning-b zut barka. Yẽnda ninga ned kam fãa zug bark sẽn yaa toor zalle. 
A Zakoob yikame n kẽng Sukote. La yẽnda mee a roog beenẽ, la a maan yãg n kẽes a rũmsã. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ b pʋd zĩ-kãng yʋʋr tɩ ‹Sukote.› A Zakoob sẽn yi Padan-Aramã, a taa Sɩkɛm sẽn be Kana soolmẽ wã ne laafɩ. La yẽnda kolga tẽngã n tilgi. 
A Zakoob yii Bɛɛr-Seba n kẽng Haarã. Yẽnda paama zãmsdo. Yẽnda yãnda raodg sẽn tilg tẽng zugu, t'a zugã tẽkd saasã. La Wẽnnaam malɛgs n dag n dʋʋd beenẽ la b sigda. 
La f yãk kaamã n ning tẽn-kugr ning b sẽn yõogd maand a zugã zugu, ne a teedã fãa. Welg tẽn-kugrã toore, t'a yɩ bũmb sẽn welg toor n yɩɩd fãa. La f sã n so bãmb koomã n sɛ, bɩ f yeelg a Aarõ a fut sẽn welg toorã, n pʋdg a zug kaam, n welg-a toor t'a maan maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd mam taoore. 
Yeel Faarõ yaa: Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Ebre nebã Wẽnnaamã tʋma maam fo nengẽ tɩ m wa yeel-f tɩ f bas bãmb nebã tɩ b kẽng we-raoogẽ wã n tɩ waoog bãmba. La hal tɩ ta moasã, fo ka kelg ye. 
Mam ningda m saag gomtɩʋʋg sawatẽ, la a na n yɩɩ kaoolã bãnde, maam ne dũniyã sʋka. la mam na n leb n tagsa mam kaoolã sẽn be maam ne yãmb sʋkã, la ne bõn-vɩɩsã sʋkã yelle. La koomã ka na n leb tigim n yɩ sa-kẽeng sẽn na n sãam bõn-vɩɩsã fãa ye. 
Yɩɩ Kapitɛnd Faruk Azarya SORGO, n karem sebrã ɛrtebe televisẽo wã zug yʋng wakat a 9 wã kibay kũun sasa.
La bãmb yeelame: «Sã n yaa woto, bɩ d bool pʋg-sadã meng n sok n gese.» Woto, bãmb boola a Rebeka n sok-a: «Fo na n sak n tũu raoã n looge?» La a Rebeka leokame tɩ n-yẽe. 
kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtbã nengẽ.
A leb n pa tõe n bool a zak rãmb bɩ a tũud-n-taas ye.
Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor dãmb na n zĩnda ne taab zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15.
Ned sã n mi nu, tɩ b wilga piiga, a bãngr yaa naana
B buudã nanambs la woto: yaa a Efɛɛre, a Yiseyi, a Eliyɛlle, a Azriyɛlle, a Zeremi, la a Odaviya ne a Yadiyɛlle, n paas gãndaado, ne nin-kãsems sẽn yaa b buudã kãsem-dãmba. La bãmb maana sẽn kisi, n beeg b yaab-rãmbã Wẽnnaam, n paam lagem-n-taar ne tẽms nins Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n sãam bãmb nifẽ wã wẽnnaam-dãmba. 
Pʋʋsg la tʋʋmde
Leokre: B tʋma zak tʋʋma, b waa ne rɩɩbo, b  zind n wẽe kibay noodo. B kɩtame t’a Pok ma  laadẽ. B wiliga a Poko a sẽn tõe n sõng a ma  toto tɩ koɛɛg ka zind ye. B paasa a Pok  raoodo
La tompeglmã na n lebga wubsg n bui Ezɩpt tẽngã fãa, n kɩt tɩ nod-tãoods yi ninsaalbã ne rũmsã sẽn be Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋgẽ wã zutu. 
A Yɩbrayɩɩm SANO pẽga karen-biisã b sẽn sak n lebg n dɩk lekollã sorã.
Daar a yembre, a Pok rãmb baab-bil a ye n wa n ges-ba.
M yaa wiuugu, la m pa kẽed bog mak ye
Kolonell Mazoor Kaasem KULIBALI kosa sodaasã taoor dãmb tɩ b tall mak-sõngo, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ sẽn get b bãmbã tõog n dɩk b na-kẽndrã n tʋm ne pʋ-pelem.
Segb taabã pʋgẽ, b goma tẽngã nug gãag yelle.
La yẽnda bi-ribl a to wã yʋʋr dag n boondame t'a Eliyezɛɛre . Bala yẽnda rag n yeelame: «Mam ba wã Wẽnnaam wa n sõnga maam, n fãag maam tɩ Faarõ ka kʋ maam ye.» 
Nug-tikr a 6 soaba: ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã, tara sor n tõe n yãk neb tɩ b lʋɩ gosneer tʋʋm-no-bɛdã, sodaarã tʋʋm noya, la tʋʋm noy a taab taoore, wala laloa wã sẽn gãnege.
We-rũmsã fãa, wa n tigma taaba, n yiis noor n yeele : «Ned ning fãa sẽn wɩd a to, bɩ weeogã kʋ-a.»
Ned ka tõe n bãng na-goalem koomẽ ye
M da mi tɩ gõaag na kõs-ma, la m da ka tẽed-a-ne-toɛɛg tẽngr ye.
A Pok soka lɔgtor poaka yaa: “Dẽ yĩnga mam sãn sɩɩs m ma,SIDAwã bãaga na n yõka maam bii?“ Tɩ lɔgtor poaka leok-a yaa: “Ayo! Fo wee maan gũusug bala.“
Kũum ka-zoet Wẽndã tʋma tʋʋmde.
Woto, Israyɛll kãsem-dãmbã fãa waa rĩm a Davɩɩd nengẽ Ebrõ, la a Davɩɩd maana kaool ne bãmb Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoor Ebrõ. Bãmb pʋdga a Davɩɩd zug rĩung kaam t'a lebg Israyɛll rĩmã, wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n yeel a Sãmwɛll t'a togsã. A Davɩɩd zab n deega Zeruzalɛm. Zebuus nebã yeela a Davɩɩd yaa: «Yãmb ka na n kẽ ka ye!» La a Davɩɩd zab n deega Sɩyõ tẽngã pãng zĩiga, sẽn dat n togs t'a Davɩɩd tẽngã. 
A Enok vɩɩmã zãng yɩɩ yʋʋm kobs-tã la pis-yoob la a nu. A Matusela sẽn wa n tar yʋʋm koabg la pis-nii la a yopoe, a roga a Lemeke. 
Wẽnnaam maana kaool ne a Nowe. Wẽnnaam ninga a Nowe ne a kom-dibli wã bark n yeel-b yaa: «Bɩ y rog n fɩɩg n pid dũniyã. Bõn-kẽnds nins fãa sẽn vɩ wã na n yɩɩ yãmb dɩɩbo. Mam kõt-b-la yãmba, wa mam sẽn kõ yãmb bõn-vãadã. 
La Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ Faarõ sẽn yaa Ezɩpt rĩmã sũur keng t'a yik n babs Israyɛll nebã. La Israyɛll nebã yaool n dag n yii ne lohorem. 
Sẽn yaa woto wã, m soaala, m kot-y lame tɩ y reng maam taoore, tɩ mam na n kẽna bãanem-bãanem, n zems rũmsã sẽn be ne maamã pãnga, la sẽn zems kambã me sẽn tõe n kẽne, hal n wa n ta yãmb nengẽ Seyɩɩr tẽnga.» 
Bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩll tigri. Yãmb na n dɩɩ bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩll dasem a yopoe tõre. La sẽn sɩng ne rasem a yopoe wã pipi daarã, bɩ y yiis rã-bɩllã y rotẽ wã. Ned ning sẽn na n dɩ-a bũmb sẽn ning rã-bɩlle, pipi daarã n tãag rasem a yopoe daarã, b na n yiis-a-la Israyɛll buudã neb sʋka. 
Pipi, b na n zĩniga porze t’a yãag kibayã kũun tʋʋm-noy tɩ b tõoge, n tʋm tɩ b tʋʋma yɩ naana, wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ.
Daar a yembre, a Pok baab-bila tʋma koɛɛg tɩ wa n yeele tɩ wakat taame t‘a Pok ne a yaopa sɛgd n yii n baas roogã la b bas b bawã pʋta fãa.
Ad a Sɩbeyõ biig a Ana bi-pugl a Oholibama sẽn yaa a Ezayu pagã kamba: Yẽnda roga a Ezayu kamba, a Yewuki, a Yalam ne a Koore. Ad a Ezayu yagensã nanambse. Ad a Ezayu bi-ribl-kãseng a Elifaaz kamba: Yaa naab a Tema, ne naab a Omaare, la naab a Sefo, ne naab a Kenaaze, 
A Uziyɛll kom-dibli wã ne b naab a Aminadaab la a ba-biisã sõor yaa neb koabg la piig la a yiibu. n yeel-b yaa: «Yãmb sẽn yaa Leevi buudã nanambsã, bɩ y yɩlg y mense, la y rɩk Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã kaoolã koglgã, n tall n kẽng zĩig ning mam sẽn segl a yĩngã. 
Bi-pɛɛlg tõe n paam a lame a sẽ wat n be a ma pʋgẽ wala a rogem  wakate, bɩ a sẽn wat n yẽsemdẽ a ma sãn tar bãaga bilã.
A Manaase kom-dibli wã rag n soo Bɛt-Seyan ne a tẽn-kɩremsã, Taanak ne a tẽn-kɩremsã, Megido ne a tẽn-kɩremsã, n paas Door ne a tẽn-kɩremsã. Yaa tẽn-bãmb pʋsẽ la a Israyɛll biig a Zozɛf kom-dibli wã rag n be. A Asɛɛr yagense. A Asɛɛr kom-dibli la woto: yaa a Yimna, a Yisva, a Yisvi ne a Beriya, n paas b tão-poak a Seera. 
Ned sakda booll n yaool zãgs tʋʋmde
Wẽnd sẽn kõt ka-koaad ka buud sẽn na n bʋde, la bur sẽn na n dɩ, b na kõ yãmb a yiiba fãa, la y sõmblema na n woma biis zembala. Ka nin-sõma wã bal nimbãaneg la y kũmd ne kũun-sõng a woto ye, kũuna le wata ne Wẽnd bark pʋʋsg neb ka tɛk nengẽ. 
La b talla rɩɩb n wa kõ raoã. La yẽnda yeelame: «Mam ka na n dɩ, n nan ka togs koɛɛg ning mam sẽn tar n dat n togsã ye.» La a Labã yeelame: «Togs-y-yã.» Dẽ, tʋmtʋmdã yeelame: «Mam yaa a Abrahaam tʋmtʋmda. 
D ka ya wa a Moyiiz sẽn da kong n bao peend n lud a nengã, n zoet tɩ Israyɛl kamb na n wa yãend sẽn ka tõe n ka sɛ wã sɛɛbo. Ya f sã n kẽ Soaala bal la peenda lakda. 
Kʋk laad sɩɩga
Tẽnsã no-rɛɛsdb la tẽnsã sẽn tʋm b rãmbã segd n wa wilga b sorã kũun sebr ƐMPESƐƐR taoor soabã nengẽ.
Koom sã n pa gudgi, a pa tisgd ye
A wudgdame n ti fão beo-kãngã n tυk n lυι kõe, n tik n yik n yeele: F lub yã, Ia f kõn dιk ye. A sã n yeel woto, rẽ t'a le loogame. A talla woto, n wa kell n tι lυι n ki, ti soaamb sigi, n bao gõos n lud-a, la a bas n looge. Soaamb yel-baoor la a yυ-baoor n sat bι?
T’a nk yẽ n dιglg kιrenga, n le wẽ yεsa: .. Pimpindim pindim-pindim… A talla woto, tι kom-pugli a tãabã lυι, n kell a Yamne. A sã n yιιndẽ la a pãbd bendrã, la a Yamne sẽn kuiis toεεgã yĩngr n paasdẽ.
Moasã, tɩ yãmb yet maam tɩ m kẽng n tɩ yeel a Akaab tɩ yãmb a Eli bee ka! Mam sã n tɩ yeel a woto, rĩm a Akaab na n kʋʋ maam!» A Abdyaas kẽng n tɩ sega a Akaab n togs-a yellã fãa. Woto, a Akaab kẽng n na n tɩ sega a Eli. 
Sulla fãa tõe n naaga taab n maan  tʋʋm kãensã wala b weel taab sul bõonse n tõog n naan yɩɩl wala reem  wʋsgo.
A zap nomd gãongo, kõ nom a kuri.
ninbuiid katɛk yiime n wilgdẽ tɩ bãmb ratame tɩ Capitaine Ibrahim TRAOREE lʋɩ tẽnga taoore, la b leb n wilg tɩ rẽndame tɩ b maan nug tikr ne Risi tẽnga rãmba tɩ wa tõog n zab ne yõ-koglg kaalema.
A Poll Ãari Sãandgo DAMIB ra ka tʋlg n na n sak faag-faag ye.
Gom-zug a naas soaba: sari wɛɛngẽ Nug-tikr a 8 soaba: sari wã roog so a menga, yaa bʋ-kaood rotã rãmb n gãnegdb na-kẽnda n tũudẽ.
F sã n tẽeg f zoa yell bɩ f rʋgl rʋko
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela yẽnda yaa: «Kẽng n sig n peeg a Aarõ tɩ y rʋ. La bɩ maan-kʋʋdbã ne nebã ra gãndg bãmb toadgã n dʋ tãngã n wa mam nengẽ tɩ mam wa wẽ bãmb n kʋ ye.» Dẽ, a Moyiis sigame n kẽng nebã nengẽ n tɩ togs bãmba. 
Pak tigri. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis ne a Aarõ Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋgẽ yaa: «Ki-kãngã na n yɩɩ pipi kiuug kiisã fãa sʋk yãmb yĩnga. A na n yɩɩ yʋʋmdã pipi kiuug yãmb yĩnga. 
Yɩɩ bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 19 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, la Burkĩna Faso gosneerã taoor soaba, a Albɛɛr Wedraoog kẽng Amerik soolmẽ pʋgẽ, n tɩ zĩnd tigsg a ye pʋgẽ.
Sã n yaa ne a Amram ne a Yitsaare, la a Ebrõ ne a Uziyɛll yagensã, Yẽnda saam-biisã sẽn dag n yaa a Eliyezɛɛr buudã la woto: A Eliyezɛɛr doga a Rehabiya, t'a Rehabiya rog a Ezayi, t'a Ezayi rog a Zoram, t'a Zoram dog a Zikri, t'a Zikri rog a Selomiti. 
Wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ sullã yãka yam n na n pʋɩ kood toand a 5 la ze-biisi.
«Maan sɛk roogã ne pɛɛl piig sẽn wʋg ne lamd gĩs-bãaneg sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miidu, n gʋl serubẽ-rãmb naand pɛɛlã zutu. 
Wakat ninga a Zeroboaam sẽn wa n be Betɛll n yas n yõogd wisd tẽn-kugrã zugã, Wẽnnaam dao a yembr n yi Zʋʋda n wa ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab koɛɛga. 
Gãngãoog sã n lebge, warb naoor teemdame
M tũu Wẽnd sẽn kõ-m kũun ningã n sɩng roogã wa tãm-met-mita. Ned a to n na n wa me n paase, la yaa pakr tɩ ned kam fãa maan gũusg ne a sẽn met to-to. 
Sɩd me, y sẽn tar bʋʋd ne taaba zoe n yaa y kongr kaseto. Y sẽn sakd n deeg kegr ka são? Y sẽn basd tɩ b fã-y ka são? 
B wa n kẽname, n tɩ seg m ba Bõnyẽega, t’a sok-ba : «Yãmb ka yã mam kambã?» 
Rĩm a Akaab tɩ togsa a pag a Zezabɛll bũmb nins fãa a Eli sẽn maanã, ne a sẽn kʋ Baall no-rɛɛsdbã fãa to-to ne sʋʋgã. A Eli sẽn wʋm woto, a yikame n zoe n na n fãag a yõore. La yẽnda zoe n taa Bɛɛr-Seba sẽn yaa Zʋʋda soolmã, la a basa a rakõorã beenẽ. 
Tõnd lebga wa gãeemse, Krista yĩnga, tɩ yãmb ket n zĩ ne y yẽesem, Krista maasmẽ. Tõnd koms n dɩgame tɩ yãmb wɩɩd ne pãnga. Yãmb gãee ne waoore tɩ sãbsgo ya tõnd pʋɩɩre. 
B vaees-a n gese, karenzi wã sã n sɩd pitame n tat wa b sẽn wilgã.
Yãmb mensã miime tɩ mam tʋma ne m pãnga fãa n kõ y ba wã. La yãmb ba wã bao n na n zãmba maam n tek mam yaoodã naoor piiga. La Wẽnnaam ka sak n bas tɩ yẽnda maan maam wẽng ye. 
Ned fãa saood n lʋɩɩ a toorẽ pag naoẽ
A Davɩɩd bee Zeruzalɛm. Tɩɩr dĩm a Hiram tʋma neb a Davɩɩd nengẽ ne sɛɛdr daado, la a kɩt tɩ tãn-metb ne ra-wãadb kẽng n tɩ me zak n kõ a Davɩɩde. Kamb nins a Davɩɩd sẽn dog Zeruzalɛmã yʋy la woto: yaa a Simeya ne a Sobaabe, la a Natã ne a Salmo, 
Yaa rĩm a Akaab zamaanẽ, la Betɛll rao a Iyɛll lebs n me Zeeriko tẽngã. A Iyɛll sẽn zĩnig tẽngã yẽbgrã, a bi-kãseng a Abiram kiime. A sẽn me n sɛ n lugl tẽngã kʋɩlemsã, a bi-yao a Seguub kiime. Rẽ kell n yɩɩ wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n kɩt t'a Nun biig a Zozoe gomã. 
Fo sã n sak yẽnda koɛɛgã neere, n sak bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn yeelã, mam na n lebga fo bɛɛbã bɛ, la mam na n namsa neb nins sẽn namsd foomã. 
SIDAwã bãag bil sãn yõk neda, a bee a soaba  yĩns koomẽ, sẽn yɩɩda, a zɩɩm n wã, a raolom-koomẽ wala a pɔglomkoomẽ  wala a biisimẽwã.
Haya! haya! n zẽkd sugri
La Silmiigã zĩndã yolgẽ wã n le yeele: Ka sιlem ye. Mam dat n yιι naaba. Tι b yeel-a: Fo rat n yιι naaba? Ka ne bilf bala, d sã n lob-f mogrã pυga, f kõn tι rι naam be ne zĩmã, rendeedã la yẽbsã?
a Hadaade, a Tema, a Yetʋʋre, a Nafis ne a Kedma. Bãmb yaa a Ismayɛll yagense. Yaa bãmb yʋyã ne b tẽmse, la b sik zĩisi. Yaa nanambs piig la a yiibu, wa b buudã sẽn yaa to-to wã. 
Ra-kõor nao n bɩɩsd a bẽnga
Sãan pa gũlgd raboog ye
Sapoalg kiuug rasem 22 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, buudã goam kiba-kɩtb lagem-n-taar b sẽn boond tɩ AEPZILƐND (AEPJLN) boola b tʋmtʋmdbã Nongaana, Lumbil Komindã pʋg n kõ-b Zãmsgo, sẽn kẽed ne yõ-koglg kaalmã wɛɛngẽ, kibaya kũun sẽn togd n kẽn toto.
Ned pa ningd a kɩba-kɩt yãnd ye
Yãk rũm-sõama wã buud fãa kãadem-kãadem a yopoe-poe n ning f nengẽ, raoog ne yãanga. La f yãk rũms nins sẽn ka sõama m nifẽ wã me, raoog ne yãanga. La f yãk bõn-yɩgdɩ wã sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã me kãadem-kãadem yopoe-poe, raoog ne yãanga, tɩ bãmb me buudã tõe n zĩnd dũniyã zugu. 
A Nowe ne a kambã kibare. A Nowe kom-dibli nins sẽn yi koglgã pʋgã yaa a Sɛm, a Kam ne a Zafɛte. A Kam yaa a Kana baaba. Yaa a Nowe kom-dibli a tãabã yagensã n leb n sãeeg n be dũniyã fãa pʋga. 
Kẽng-y toor n tɩ bao mood zĩig ning yãmb sẽn tõe n paamẽ. La b ka na n boog yãmb tʋʋmdã baa bilf ye.» La tʋʋm taoor dãmbã modga bãmb n yeele: «Maan-y yãmb daar fãa tʋʋmdã n sɛ, wa b sẽn dag n mi n kõt yãmb moodã wakatã!» 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab maana woto. La kɛooda wʋsg waa Faarõ roogẽ wã, la yẽnda poorẽ dãmbã rotẽ Ezɩpt soolmã tɛk fãa. La tẽngã sãamã kɛooda wã yĩnga. La Faarõ boola a Moyiis ne a Aarõ n yeele: «Kẽng-y n tɩ maan-y maoong tẽn-kãngã pʋg yãmb Wẽnnaamã yĩnga.» 
Dẽ, a Zʋʋda yeela a Onan t'a peeg a kẽem a Ɛɛr pagã, n kẽ ne-a n dog kamb a kẽemã yʋʋr yĩnga. La a Onan sẽn ges tɩ kambã ka na n yɩ yẽnda kambã yĩnga, a sã n na n kẽ ne a kẽemã paga, a basdame tɩ rogmã bõn-buud koom raagd tẽnga, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n da rog kamb a kẽemã yʋʋr yĩng ye. 
Gosneem wilgame tɩ yaa tʋmtʋmdb nins b sẽns da sɩbg 2016 la 2021 soabã, yaa bãmb dãmbã la b na n lebs-b kiuugã yaoodo.
Dẽ, tɩtã-rãmb maka ne b tɩtã n na n wa ne rũm-pigli, la bãmb ka tõog ye. La rũm-pigli wã rag n bee ninsaalbã ne rũmsã zutu. La tɩtã-rãmb yeela Faarõ yaa: «Bõn-kãngã yaa Wẽnnaam nug n maane!» La a yɩɩ wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeelã. Faarõ kenga a sũur n ka kelg bãmb ye. 
A Nebat biig a Zeroboaam sẽn deeg naam tɩ yʋʋm piig la a niinẽ, la a Abiyam lebg Zʋʋda rĩmã. A Abiyam maana beegr nins fãa a ba wã sẽn dag n maanã. Yẽnda rag n ka loe a meng zãng ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yẽnda Wẽnnaamã, wa a yaab a Davɩɩd sẽn dag n loe a meng ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab to-to wã ye. 
Daar a ye, noosã maana tigr n na n sao.
Ned kõn mum kũum n bas a nao yɩng ye
Yẽnda maana zũud gãmbr n yagl tẽn-kugrã kogrã tẽngre, tɩ gãmbrã noor a ye ta tẽnga, t'a noor a ye wã ta tẽn-kugrã zãntlem pʋɩ-sʋka. Yẽnda tuii ra-bɩlmã tuiids nins sẽn be tẽn-kugrã kɩrems a yiibã fãa wã pʋse, sẽn na yɩl n zã tẽn-kugrã. Yẽnda maana tẽn-kugrã ne ra-pegdo, t'a pʋgã yaa yoko. 
A pẽga ministɛɛrã tʋmtʋmdba, la a kos-b tɩ b sak n kẽes b mens ne Burkĩndi tɩ b tõog n pids tʋʋm ning b sẽn pʋʋs-bã.
Ezɩpt tẽngẽ wã yiibu. Israyɛll nebã yii Ramsɛs n dabd Sukote. Raop nins sẽn dag n kẽnd-b ne naoã sõor dag n kolga neb tus kobs-yoobe, kambã sõor sẽn ka naage. 
Rẽ fãa kɩtame tɩ kibaya kɩsg na-kẽndre, ra segd ne gũusgu, la tʋʋm-minim.
A Hagit biig a Adoniza kẽnga a Salmo ma a Batseba nengẽ. La a Batseba soka yẽnda yaa: «Yaa noog tɩ fo wat m nengẽ?» La yẽnda leokame tɩ yaa noogo. A Adoniza yeelame: «Fo mengã miime tɩ naamã rag n yaa maam n so, la Israyɛll nebã fãa ra tẽedame tɩ maam n na n lebg rĩmã. La naamã wẽnemd n lebga mam yao a Salmo rẽnda, tɩ bala, yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n kõ-a. 
A Poko ne a Yembi la a Ãminat me wa n zĩndame n kelge.
Bãmb sẽn pees bi-pɛɛlgã n saa, lɔgtor poaka yeelame t‘a tara laafɩ sõama, la tɩ b sɛgd gũu kiis a wãn n yaol n tõog n mak biigã n gese a tara SIDAwã bãag bil bii a ka tare.
ne sɩd togsgo, ne Wẽnd pãng bõsgo; d modgda ne sõmblem zab-teed baoobo, zab-teed sẽn zãad n digd bɛɛba, zab-teed sẽn zãad n ligind bɛɛba. b get-d la wa neb sẽn ka yʋʋre, tɩ d yʋʋr yaool n sãt zĩig zãnga, wa neb kũum sẽn yãk raare tɩ d vɩɩma wɩɩd ne pãnga; wa neb sẽn tog ne kaase la d yaool n ka kiid ye; 
Ned sã n ka ki, bɩ a ra sõda yẽn ye.
Sẽn na n yɩlẽ n paam tɩ koodã tõog n t’a tẽns nins b sẽn dat n kõ wã, b wilgame tɩ b rɩka tõkr ne tẽngã taoor dãmba, sẽn na yɩl n paam tɩ b sõng-ba.
Katr n wa n tar a kãoongo, n yẽk-a n kυ n maneg n kυιιs-a, n yaool n bao zĩig n bĩng a. Mik yaa yam. Pυg-yãang me n da bẽ tẽng a ye, n vι a ye, ne a baaga, a Gãre. Pυg yãangã ra yaa rakãagre. Noose, kĩini, bυυse, piisi, fãa, a tara.
Ad yaa wed-dʋʋd n zao kẽgre
Biiga rogame. A ma  pãnga ka le be ye. A  yãbame. A rɩka bi-pɛɛlgã  n zẽk n yeel yaa: “Kɩɩba.“  Dasem a wãn zugẽ, a  mawã kiime; la a Pok  pʋda biiga yʋʋr t‘a Yõdɩ.
M ba Katr sẽn wa n loogdẽ, m ba Soaamb yɩɩ purss… n yi, tɩ, m ba Katr yaeese, n lebg n zoe n kuili.
Yaa maan-kʋʋdbã kom-dibli n dag n maand parfẽ-rãmbã. Dẽ, Leevi buudã kãsem-dãmb nins sẽn yaa yɩɩn-yɩɩndb n be rotã pʋsẽ wã la woto. B rag n ka kõ bãmb tʋʋm a taabã tɩ bala, b rag n tʋmda wĩntoog la yʋngo. 
Bɩ y reeg wanzuri Israyɛll nebã nengẽ tɩ yɩ b yõor yaood sɛk roogã tʋʋmã yĩnga, tɩ yɩ tẽegr Israyɛll nebã yĩng Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, na n yɩɩ bãmb mengã yaoodo.» 
Kẽndbã taoor soab a Yamba Tãnkoaano yeelame tɩ sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm 2021 la yʋʋm 2022 soabã, lekols wʋsg taoor dãmb pa le be Tapoa porvẽesã pʋg ye.
Ka yãnd sãan n gãneg sõngo
La rĩm a Salmo kɩtame tɩ b tɩ bool a Simeyi t'a wa, tɩ b yeel-a yaa: «Mam dag n ka kɩt tɩ fo wẽen ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋr sɩda? La mam dag n ka yeel foom tɩ daar ning fo sẽn na n yi Zeruzalɛm n kẽng zĩig a to f na n kiime? Fo ka leok maam n yeel tɩ beneere, tɩ f wʋmame? Dẽ wã, maan a wãn tɩ fo kɩɩs wẽeneg ning fo sẽn wẽen ne Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, n ka sak mam noorã?» 
Tom loabd a ye tõe pẽkdb koabga
A Yamyιιd taame waa, n pυυs naab ne waoogre, la a. yeel-ba: Naaba, yamb sẽn kιs m ma kazẽegã yaa, a losa kae wã, n dυgle, la wamd kae n vaagd kõgr ye. Yaa rẽ tι m watẽ tι y sõng-ma. Ad kãand biisi.
T’a sok a kug-zĩidbã:  B yet tι Raling ka, biig n be t’a yυυr la a Yamyιιda. Roga rabure? Andã n kõ yυυrã? Andã n so tẽn-kãngã n yιιd maam tι yell a woto wa lingd maam? Bul n yaa ãndã biig sẽ?
Rĩm a Salmo tʋmame tɩ b kẽng Tɩɩr n tɩ bool a Hiram. A Hiram ma wã rag n yaa pʋg-kõore, n yaa Neftali buudu. La a ba wã yaa Tɩɩr neda. A Hiram dag n yaa yõaka n mi zũud tʋʋmde, la a tara yam la minim ne bãngr wʋsgo. La a rag n tõe n talla zũud n maan bũmb wʋsgo. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ rĩm a Salmo tʋm tɩ b kẽng Tɩɩr n tɩ bool-a t'a wa tʋm zũudã tʋʋm fãa. 
Tɩɩg luta a sẽn kɩllẽ
La nag-yãan-wagã sẽn ka neebã wãba nag-yãan-nobds a yopoe nins sẽn deng n yi wã zãnga. Nag-yãan-wagã vela nag-yãan-nobdsã n ket n yas wa bãmb ka vel bũmb ye. Bãmb kell n yaa wag wa pĩndã. Dẽ poore, mam nekame. 
Dẽ, a Davɩɩd maana wa Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel yẽnda wã. Yẽnda zaba ne Filistẽ-dãmbã, sẽn sɩng ne Gabawõ hal n tãag Gezɛɛre. A Davɩɩd yʋʋrã yii tẽmsã fãa pʋgẽ. La Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ buudã fãa zoe bãmb dabeem. 
La, a ra yaa sũ-kĩ-neda, la zoe-bõn soaba, n le yaa wagdre.
Ãnda n sãad naab pʋʋgẽ tɩ ka bẽdenga
Dẽ, a Moyiis kõo noor tɩ b pɩʋʋg nebã sik zĩigẽ n moon n yeele: «Bɩ raopã ne pagbã ra leb n wa ne kũun sɛk zĩigã yĩng ye.» La yẽnda gɩdga nebã tɩ b ra leb n tall n wa ye. Bala, bũmb nins nebã sẽn kõ wã yaa wʋsg n yɩɩd b sẽn tog n tall n tʋm tʋʋmdã. 
B zoeta rabeem tɩ b taaba na n kaowa b bʋʋdo.
Goam yaa pagdo, tɩ sẽn mi-a bɩ a wegse
B wilgame tɩ bãmb me na n kell n maana n pãng sẽn tõe, tɩ bũmb nins miniisrã sẽn kosã paam pidisgu.
Gãeeng zug sã n kẽ, a to n põngd-a
A Abram pɩʋʋga tẽngã hal n tɩ ta Moore terebẽnt tɩɩsã sẽn be Sɩkɛmã. Wakat-kãng tɩ yaa Kana nebã n dag n be soolem-kãng pʋga. Sẽn-Ka-Saab puka b meng ne a Abram n yeele: «Mam na n kõo fo yagensã tẽn-kãngã tɩ b sooge.» La a Abram mee tẽn-kugr beenẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn puk b meng ne yẽnda wã yĩnga. 
Dẽ, mam saglg yaa tɩ y reng n kos Wẽnnaam, n pʋʋse, n yõk sɛɛga, la y pʋʋs Wẽnnaam bark nebã fãa yĩnga: Bala, Wẽnnaam a yembr tãa bal n be, sɛ-yõakd a yembr tãa bal n be Wẽnnaam ne nebã sʋka: Yaa rao sẽn boond t'a Zeezi Kirisi, 
Kapitɛnd TARWAR bẽda be n wilg tɩ tʋʋm kẽer n pa tũud wa sẽn segde, la a na n gesame tɩ b rems-rems ne tʋʋlem, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ bũmbã fãa tõog n zemse.
La Kana tẽngã nebã sẽn yãnd bãmb sẽn be Ataad zĩ-peellẽ wã n yãbdã, bãmb yeelame: «Ad yõwã yaa Ezɩpt tẽng nebã kʋ-kãsenga.» Rẽ kɩtame tɩ b pʋd zĩ-kãng sẽn be Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlgã rʋʋndã yʋʋr tɩ Abɛll-Mitsrayim, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹Ezɩpt kʋʋre.› 
Tõnd dag n bee pʋʋgẽ ne taab n gĩnd ka-gĩna, la mam ka-gĩndã yikame n yals yĩngri, la yãmb ka-gĩnã gũbga mam ka-gĩndã n wõgemded a taoore.» 
Wẽndooga sẽn toẽ n maan bũmb niisã n tõog n nongẽ la b ges SIDAwã bãag sẽn tar neb niisã yelle.
A kosa zãndarm dãmbã tɩ b bas welg taabã, la b naag taab n zabe, tɩ yaa rẽ bal la b tõe n tik n tõog bɛɛbã.
 La, m na n paam-a la yɛ?».
Sula a taab wala, Yiniyão Eropeyɛnd, CEDEAO, Yiniyão Afirikɛnd, la Gãrãs Bertae rãmb wilgame tɩ b na n yãag-b-la b yam yãkrã wɛɛngẽ.
Zĩig sẽn pẽ a noorã, ra yaa sodaas n yãmb-a ne bugra-bɛda, tɩ nebã goam ra ka tũud taab ye.
Tɩ b sok ned fãa, n na n bãnge, ãnda n dɩ ki wã.
B maana ra-pegdã sɛk roogã yĩnga. B maana bãmb ne akasiya raado, n yik-b n yals yĩngri. B maana ra-pegd sɛk roogã yĩnga. Kɩreng ning sẽn be goabgã yaa ra-pegd pisi, tɩ kɩreng ning sẽn be rɩtgã me yaa ra-pegd pisi. 
Tɩ biigã leok-a yasa : «M pa sablem naaba, m pa zẽenem naaba, sã n pa beoogo, tõnd pa kuus ye ».
Rao a ye n dag n be t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Eli, n yit Tisbe sẽn be Galaad tẽnga. Yẽnda yeela a Akaab yaa: «Mam wẽenda ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã sẽn vɩ wã, mam sẽn yaa a soab tʋmtʋmdã, tɩ yʋʋm nins sẽn watã pʋgẽ, meenem ka na n zĩndi, la saag me ka na n ni, hal tɩ mam leb n wa gome.» «Yi ka n kẽng yaang sẽnẽ n tɩ soond Kerit ko-soogã sẽn be Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlgã neng-taoorã sɛɛga. 
B sõasgã sɩngrẽ, tẽngã taoor soab reng n pẽga VDP rãmbã sẽn sak n kẽes b toog Burkĩna Faso wen-vɩɩs a naasã pʋgẽ n zabd n na n fãag tẽngã.
Gom-zug b sẽn tik yʋʋm 2022 la yʋʋm 2023 soabã, yaa ka-koaadb la gʋʋndb paam bãngr n paas sapaol-koobã na tõog n kẽng taoore, la b rũmsã na paam laafɩ la koglgo.
Rao a yembr n da tar a kamba a yiibu, la a yembrã ra yaa kɩɩba (bala, a ma wã ra kiime n bas-a), t’a yʋʋr la a Naamde.
Ko-yũud yõka nebã beenẽ. La nebã yẽgma ne a Moyiis n yeele: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb yiis tõnd Ezɩpt soolmã pʋgẽ, n tall tõnd n wa ka tɩ d na n ki ko-yũudu, tõnd ne d kambã la d rũmsã?» 
Bi-pɛɛlga da tõe n paama bãaga bila a ma nẽngẽ.
“ Woto, a Ãdam pʋlmame t‘a na n karema sõama la t‘a ka na bao pʋgsadb ye
«Maan yãoog lutg sẽn wilgd bʋʋdo. Tog n yɩɩ tʋʋm-mitb n na n tʋm-a, wa b sẽn tʋm maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã to-to wã. Yaa ne sãnem gĩsi, la gĩs sẽn yaa miuug masɩ, la sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, ne gĩs-moaama, la gĩs-miidu, ne lamd gĩs-bãanegã. 
Tab sã n yɩɩg wã n kõ rẽemba yaa nag-bĩngu
Yaa rẽ, tɩ nin-sabls tẽng wĩndg sẽn lʋɩtẽ sul-kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ CEDEAO wã taoor soaba, a Umaru Sisoko Ãmbalo tʋm sullã no-rɛɛsdb Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 4 yʋʋm 2022 soabã tɩ b wa sõs ne neb nins sẽn deeg naamã, la rog-n-mikã la dĩinã taoor dãmba.
A Asɩll Tãpsoab le pasaame tɩ b rɩgla sebr Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kãdensã la yõ-koglgã yell zĩigẽ, sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm-sar kiuug rasem 21 n wilg bũmb nins sẽn be bãmb ne taab sʋka, pagtɩ wã pʋgẽ.
Masã lebga tõnd n so wã, n be taoore.
A Yamne sẽn  yeel woto, pũg-yãangã yikame n tι bao bĩis-naare, n wa kõ-a, la a gõgnemdẽ: Ya n yaa bõe sι-lak biig la woto, n tõt gõeem? pũg-yãangã ne biigã kell n talla woto, hal ti ziigã wa zυυge.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, sẽn kisa, sɩd kisame.
A Moyiis yeelame: «Ade, mam na n yi n basa yãmba, n tɩ pʋʋs Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. La beoogo, kɛooda wã na n loogame n bas yãmb ne y poorẽ dãmbã la y nebã. La baoosgo, bɩ y ra leb n belg tõnd n kɩɩs n ka bas nebã tɩ b kẽng n tɩmaan maoong Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩng ye.» 
Yaa miniisr dãmb 20 ne b sõangdb a 3.
F sã n maan yãnd tɩ sẽn kẽedẽ kaẽ, f kũum n são
A sẽlẽmbooser nif moogre, kõ vol a rõbgo.
Dẽ wã, bɩ y ra leb n zoe rabeem ye. Mam na n gesa yãmb yell ne bũmb fãa, la m ges yãmb kambã yelle.» A Zozɛf goma ne bãmb a woto n bels-ba, la b pɛlgã gãandame. 
Israyɛll nebã yãndame t'a Moyiis nengã pɩndame. Dẽ, a Moyiis lebgd n luda a nengã ne peendã yɛsa, hal tɩ ta yẽnda sẽn na n leb n kẽ n gom ne Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. 
A Basa sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, a basa Rama meebo, la a kẽng n tɩ zĩnd Tirsa tẽnga. Woto, rĩm a Aaza boola Zʋʋda nebã fãa n ka bak ned ba a yembre, n kɩt tɩ b tɩ wʋk kugã ne raad nins fãa rĩm a Basa sẽn dag n tigs n na n me Rama lalgã. La rĩm a Aaza talla ra-kãens ne kug-kãens n me Geba tẽngã sẽn be Benzame soolmẽ wã ne Mispa tẽngã. 
Yẽ wilgame tɩ rẽnda tɩ tẽngã taoor dãmb sɩd rɩk na-kẽnda, tɩ bãmb zu-loeesã paam welgre.
Yũug sã n pa be yiri, yõns panemda gemgondo
Bala tẽngã taoor soab meng wilgame tɩ bũmbã fãa segd n yɩɩ yãgbo.
A Zakoob yii a Labã nengẽ n zoe. A Zakoob wa n wʋma a Labã kom-dibli wã sẽn gomd n yetẽ: «A Zakoob reega tõnd ba wã laog zãnga. La yaa tõnd ba wã laogã yĩng n kɩt t'a lebg arzɛk soaba.» La a Zakoob mikame t'a Labã sũurã ka leb n noom ne yẽnda wa pĩndã ye. 
Pag sã n tar SIDAwã bãag bila, bɩ SIDAwã bãag menga,  dẽ yĩnga a segd n kõo a biiga a meng biisĩm bii?
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam yeelame yaa: «Da kolg ka ye. Piid f neooda wã, bala, zĩig ning fo sẽn yɛsã yaa zĩig sẽn welg toore.» Bãmb leb n yeelame: «Mam yaa fo ba wã Wẽnnaam, n yaa a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoob Wẽnnaam.» La a Moyiis luda a nenga, bala, yẽnda rag n zoeta rabeem n ka rat n ges Wẽnnaam ye. 
A Ezayu ne a Zakoob rogem. Ad a Abrahaam biig a Izak yagense. A Abrahaam n dog a Izake. 
Zemsame tɩ a pʋɩ zãmsog a ye fãa zĩis wʋsgo n zãms nebã. Ad  zãmsog a ye fãa sẽn segd n kẽn toto :
Yaa rẽ n kɩte, tɩ bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 29 ne a rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaasã sull n yik n deeg naamã, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n maneg n sigl tɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn da ka kẽnd sõma wã, tõog n tũ taoore.
La rĩmã yeela bãmb yaa: «Peeg-y mam tʋmtʋmdbã, la y zombg m biig a Salmo mam meng bõn-wɛɛgã zugu, n tall-a n kẽng Gihon. Rẽ poore, bɩ y lʋɩɩs-a taoore, n pʋg-a t'a wa zaoond mam zaoorẽ wã, bala yaa yẽnda n na n led mam zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. Mam kõta yẽnda noore, t'a soog Israyɛll ne Zʋʋda buudã nebã.» 
A sẽn wa n moe n sa, a rɩka laagã ne rɩɩbã, n bĩng a poorẽ wã.
pũg-yãangã sẽn  paam t’a Yamne gũsã, a yikame n saas a sυυgã, n kood kãmb a naasã. sẽn  ya likã, a pa bãng tι  yaa yẽ meng kambã la a sẽn koodã ye. A ra tẽedame tι  yaa kom-pugli wã.
Yaa bãmb n get reezẽo Sãntrã, Palatosãntralel, Lɛse, Sãntr wɛse Sãntrsɩɩde, Sãntr wɛse, Sãntr noore, la Sayɛllã soolem.
D sẽn pa rat tɩ b sãbs-dã, d modgda d manesem fãa pʋgẽ, n wilg tɩ d yaa Soaala tʋʋm-tʋmdba. D modgdame n sak lengr daar fãa, n sak sũ-beedo la yɩɩre, d modgda ne pʋ-peelem, ne bãngr baoobo, ne sũ-tõogo, ne taab sʋk ningri, ne yam sõng baoobo, ne taab nonglem akɩka, 
Yam pidung soab bɛɛ, sẽn gãe ne bãngr soab bɛɛ, zamaana gom minim soab bɛɛ? Wẽnd pa kɩt tɩ zamaana Sɩlma lebg gãeemdo? Zamaana ne a sɩlma sẽn ka tõog n bãng Wẽnd ne Wẽnd yam pidungã, yɩɩ ne goama, pika goam sẽn wẽnd gãeemdã, la Wẽnd tʋlg n fãag tẽedbã. 
Dẽ, rao ning sẽn yaa tẽngã soaalã yeelame: ‹Ad bũmb ning sẽn na n wilg tɩ yãmb yaa sɩd dãmba. Bas-y yãmb ba-biig a yembr ne maam ka, tɩ sẽn ket-bã tall koodã n tɩ kɩs yirã rãmba, tɩ komã yaa wʋsgo. 
Bãng-bãnge: M loee m wed-moaag roogẽ t'a zυυr likd yinga. Yaa bõe ? Leoore : Bugum sẽn be roogẽ tι bug-zõos yita.
Ad b sẽn maan terok-rãmbã to-to: B rag n maana b wamsã ne zũud sẽn yaa paklse, la b rɩk b wamsã n sog ne tebendsã. B rag n gʋla gɩgma, lolse, la serubẽ-rãmb naana pɩgdsã sẽn dag n dog wamsã zugã zutu. La b maana nag-teed sẽn yaa tɩ-puud buud n ning gɩgma wã ne lolsã yĩngr ne b tẽngr tɩ luundẽ. 
A Zakoob yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Pãng-Soab a Wẽnnaam vẽnega b meng ne maam Luuzi, Kana tẽnga pʋga, la b ninga maam barka. 
Kʋk zũnzũur pa mi tɩ tɩ-noog le beeme ye
Ka ne rasem a wãna, m na n lebame, maam ne tõnd zakã rãmb fãa. Nananda, reeg-y bĩisim. Yaa mam niigã bĩisim. Naaba sẽn wυm woto, a kιtame tι b yõk biigã n pag roogo.
Wẽnnaam tʋma malɛɛk Zeruzalɛm t'a kẽng n tɩ sãam tẽngã. La malɛɛkã sẽn sãamd tẽngã wakate, Sẽn-Ka-Saab gesame la b maana b bãngẽ ne to-kãnga. Dẽ, b yeela malɛɛkã sẽn dag n sãamd tẽngã yaa: Bas woto tɩ sekame! Wakat-kãng tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab malɛɛkã rag n yɛsa a Zebuus ned a Ornan   zɛɛgã sɛɛgẽ. 
Dẽ, a Moyiis yeela bãmb yaa: «Yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saab n yeel tɩ b maan a woto. Beoog na n yɩɩ vʋʋsg daare. Yaa vʋʋsg daar sẽn welg toor Sẽn-Ka-Saab waoogr yĩnga. Yãmb sẽn dat n kɩɩm bũmb ninsã, bɩ y kɩɩme, la yãmb sẽn dat n dʋg bũmb ninsã, bɩ y rʋge. La bũmb nins fãa sẽn kellã, bɩ y bĩng tɩ ta beoogo.» 
Kibarã yii Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã la buuda goam taoor kẽndã kiba-kɩtb zĩigẽ.
B sã n na n kõ kibay zabra wɛɛngẽ, bɩ mao tɩ yɩ kibay nins sẽn na n kõ sodaasã raoodo, la a ra koms pãng ye.
A Yembi me yeelame yaa: “Mam me na n kẽngame; daarninga, m na tɩ paam zorãmb n paase.“
M ba Katr yalemda yĩnga a sɩd leba boka pʋga. Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel m ba Naafo : « Fo bao n na n fãaga m ba Katr t’a rat n kʋ foo, loog la f bas-a boka pʋga ».
 La, a zoa wã, yãag-a-la tɩɩm soab nengẽ, n tɩ ta n togs a zu-loɛɛgã.
D ka na n tũ sor a to wala sor ning d sẽn dɩka ka taas tõnd yãmb nengẽ ye. D taame menga ne Krista Koe-noogo. Tõnd pa na n pẽg d meng tɩ loog ne d taab tʋʋm ye la d saagdame tɩ y tẽeba sẽn yẽrgd n dabd taoorã, d na waa n lebg y zu-zẽkre wa sẽn yɩ zĩisa taabã. 
Bala, yãmb meng n wilg maam tɩ y na n kɩtame tɩ m yageng a yembr ledg maam m zaoorẽ wã. Yaa rẽ yĩng n kɩt tɩ m sũur keemẽ tɩ m yas yãmb taoor n pʋʋsdẽ. Taa yãmb yam tɩ y na n ning m doogã barka, t'a tõe n kaoos yãmb taoor wakat fãa. Bala yaa yãmb n so barka, la yãmb sã n ning barka, yaa wakat fãa yĩnga!» 
Yaa bõe tɩ Ezɩpt nebã na n yeele: ‹Wẽnnaam yiisa bãmb Ezɩpt tẽngã n na n tɩ kʋ-b tãmsã sʋka, tɩ b buudã menem tẽng zugu!› Bas-y yãmb sũ-kãbrã, la y ra maan y nebã wẽng ning y sẽn dag n dat n maan-bã ye. 
Vẽkembeoogo, a Moyiis yeela nebã yaa: «Yãmb kongame n maan yel-wẽn-kãsenga. La mam na n kẽnga Sẽn-Ka-Saab nengẽ moasã. Daarninga, mam na n paama sugr yãmb yel-wẽnã yĩnga.» 
La daar a yembre, a Zakoob rag n dʋgda a rɩɩbo, la a Ezayu yii a weoogã n lebg n wa, la a rag n yɛɛ zãnga. A Ezayu yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Mam kotame tɩ f yãk f rɩ-moomdã n kõ-m tɩ m dɩ. Bala, mam yɛɛ zãnga.» Rẽ kɩtame tɩ b pʋd a Ezayu yʋʋr t'a Edom, sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹rɩ-moomde.› 
A Hamoor goma ne bãmb n yeel yaa: «Mam biig a Sɩkɛm yamã loee ne yãmb bi-puglã hal wʋsgo. Mam kot-y lame tɩ y rɩk-a n kõ m biigã t'a maan a paga. Woto, tõnd tõe n maana zood ne taaba, yi-kãadmã yĩnga, tɩ yãmb dɩkd y kom-pugli n kõt tõndo, la y peegd tõnd kom-pugli n maand y pagba. 
Yam-dãmb a yiib sã n wʋm-taab kibare,yaa wa b sẽn yã taaba
Ade, mam tara kom-pugli a yiib sẽn nan ka bãng rao ye, mam na n yiisa bãmb n kõ-yã, tɩ y maan bãmb wa y sẽn date. La bũmb sẽn be bala, ra maan-y rao-bãmbã bũmb ye. Bala, bãmb wa n siga mam zakẽ.» 
Ned kõn yõg wãoor n le zè a met ye
Nebã yeela maam yaa: ‹Maan wẽnnaam n kõ tõnd t'a lʋɩ tõnd taoor n tɛ-do. Bala, Moyiis-kãngã, rao ning sẽn yiis-a tõnd Ezɩpt tẽngã, tõnd ka mi bũmb ning sẽn paam-a ye.› 
Tʋb-kɩd wʋmda a wa reeg kõbre
Ned ning sẽn tara tẽng zug yama ka reegd sẽn yita Vʋʋsem Sõng nengẽ ye: dẽ zʋʋga a yam t'a ka tõe n deeg ye. Bũmba sẽn yɩɩd ninsaal yama, dẽnd a paam Wẽnd dẽnna n tõog n bãng b sẽn yala. 
Rɩk pe-raoog a yiibẽ soabã t'a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã palg b nus pe-rao-kãng zugã. La bɩ f kʋ pe-raoogã n yãk a zɩɩmã n tẽk a Aarõ rɩtg tʋbrã, ne yẽnda kom-dibli wã rɩtg tʋbã, la bãmb dɩtg nug-raadã ne b rɩtg nao-raadã, la bɩ f rɩk zɩɩmã sẽn ketã n daag n gilg tẽn-kugrã kɩremsã fãa. 
Bãng -bãnge: Mam taa tẽngẽ tι sẽn  ki-bã pυυsd maam, tι sẽn vι-bã sĩnd b noore. Yaa bõe? Leoore :  Tιιg tẽngr vã-koeemsã ne vã-maasã.
La a Zozɛf yeelame: «Ayo! Mam ka na n maan a woto ye. Yaa b sẽn yãnd mam wũmblã ned ning nengẽ wã n na n lebg mam yamba, la yãmb tõe n lebg n leba y ba wã nengẽ ne bãane.». A Zʋʋda yõka a Zozɛf sɛɛga 
Kiuug piig soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Netofa tẽng rao a Maharayi sẽn yaa Zerak buudã ned a yembrã n dag get sull piig soabã yelle. A Maharayi sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. Kiuug piig la a yembr soabã pʋgẽ, yaa Piraton tẽng rao a Benaya sẽn yaa Efrayiim yagensã sʋk ned a yembrã n dag n get sull piig la a yembr soabã yelle. Yẽnda sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. 
La a Moyiis leokame: «Yãmb meng n na n kõ tõnd rũms tɩ d maan zems-n-taar maoongã, ne maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã. 
Rẽ ra sẽn da pɩʋʋgã, d fãa ra tẽedame tɩ naam-wẽ-n-dɩkã na ya n kolg weoogo, la moos maan b gomd tɩ « bɛ sã n digdg-f n ka yalse, bɩ f me ra yals ye».
Yãg-yãg n daad baag zugu.
La Wẽnnaam waa a Abimelɛk nengẽ yʋng zãmsd pʋg n yeel-a yaa: «Fo na n kii pag ning fo sẽn peegã poorẽ. Bala, yẽnda tara sɩda.» La rẽ t'a Abimelɛk dag n nan ka kẽ ne a Saara ye. Dẽ, yẽnda sokame yaa: «Zu-soaba, yãmb na n sak n sãama maam ne m tẽnga, baa mam sã n tar bʋʋm? 
Ne raood la ne sũnoogo, a paasa neba pãnga tɩ b tõog n kelg bũmb niisa fãa sẽn kẽed SIDAwã bãag wɛɛngẽ sẽn ya toogã.
Ra maan sũ-kiir ne f to zak ye. Ra maan sũ-kiir ne f to pag wall a yem-daoogo, bɩ a yem-poaka, wall a loalga, bɩ a bõanga, wall bũmb ning fãa sẽn yaa fo to rẽnd ye.» 
Tʋʋmdã ra gãnegame tɩ b na n zĩnda rasem a yiib n tʋme, la a wa n tɩ paga a kʋɩlens badaare, yʋng wakat piig «1h00» sasa.
Bãmb taa Maara, la b ka tõog n yũ Maara koomã ye. Bala, a rag n yaa toogo. Yaa woto n kɩt tɩ b pʋd zĩigã yʋʋr tɩ Maara. 
F sã n kẽ saoog n pa yã kilsg bɩ f targ n leb poorẽ
Havɩla tẽng sãnemã yaa sãnem halaale. Soolem-kãng pʋgẽ me, tɩɩs buud sũm sẽn tar yũ-noogo, la kugr buud b sẽn boond tɩ Onigs n be beenẽ. Ko-sor a yiibẽ soabã yʋʋr boondame tɩ ‹Gihon.› Ko-so-kãng zoetame n gilgd Kuus  tẽngã. 
Ned sã n yãg tɩ malge, a sã n maag-a-meng-n-yɩɩda.
B wilgame tɩ wakat sẽn wate, b na n boola tẽngã tʋʋm noy taood dãmba, la tẽngã neb buud toor-toore, tɩ b lebg n gʋls noy nins b sẽn na n tũ n zã tãrãzisẽo wã.
Koomã rag n fẽbgda bilf-bilf dũniyã zugu, la rasem koabg la pis-nu pʋgẽ, a boogame. Koomã rag n ket n boogdame hal tɩ ta kiuug piig soabã. Kiuug piig soabã pipi daarã, tãmsã zut pukame. 
À T’a Sĩndbal sok-a: Yell paam tôndo? Ãnda? Yell paam foo kae. Pa foo n dιk korgã la? Mam toog be be?  Nebã pema a Ratzãng n tall-a n kẽng na-yiri, n yaoo! N bas a Sĩndbal tι yẽ loog a loogre.  Kiba-kãngã wilgdame tι ned pa sedg n yã ligd n yĩm zood ye.
Wakat ning Wẽnnaam sẽn wa n na n sãam tẽms nins sẽn be kunkubã zutã, bãmb tẽega a Abrahaam yelle, la b yiisa a Lot t'a põs sãoongã, wakat ning bãmb sẽn wa n na n sãam tẽms nins a Lot sẽn dag n beẽ wã. Moaab ne Amo buudã sɩngre 
A Lot sẽn wa n na n ta Sowaar tẽngã, rẽ tɩ sõorã pukdame. Bãmb sãama tẽn-bãmb b yiibã, ne b kunkubã, la b tẽngã nebã fãa, la ne bõn-bɩtsã sẽn yi tẽn-gãongã zugã zãnga. 
Sũm-wagdr bas-a-meng-ne-Wẽnde, zĩ-soalgd kae ye.
A pẽgda Fõndasẽo Ebomaf b sẽn kõ-b kũunã.
Sẽn kẽed ne sodaarã wɛɛngẽ, a wilgame tɩ yaa tẽngã taoor soab n na n ges rẽ.
A koeesã pʋgẽ, a lebg n tẽeg bũmb nins fãa sẽn pɩʋʋg tẽngã, sẽn sɩng ne yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 24 yʋʋm 2022 soabã.
Bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tãrãzisẽo wã taoor soaba, Liyetena Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB tɩ kaaga Nizɛɛr tẽnga taoor soaba, A Mohameed BAZUM, b soasgã pʋgẽ, b goma yõ-koglgã tẽns a tãabã toos pʋgẽ, la Ze 5 Sayɛllã me yelle.
Ziif sã n yi koomẽ n wa yeel tɩ yẽbg nin n zabde, ned pa tõe n kɩɩs ye
Bɩ yãmb da rɩ bũmb sẽn ning rã-bɩll ye. Yãmb sẽn be zĩig ning fãa, bɩ y rɩ bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle. 
La a Moyiis baoome n na n sigs Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yẽnda Wẽnnaamã sũuri. Yẽnda soka bãmb yaa: «Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, yaa bõe tɩ yãmb sũur kãbd wʋsg ne yãmb nebã yãmb sẽn yiis Ezɩpt ne pãn-kãsenga, la ne nug sẽn tar pãngã? 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Sig n keoog nebã tɩ b ra wa yɩ tao-tao n kolg Sẽn-Ka-Saab n na n gese, tɩ neb wʋsg bãmb sʋkã wa sãam ye. Bɩ maan-kʋʋdbã me sẽn kolgd maamã me yɩlg b mense, tɩ m da wa sãam neb bãmb sʋkã ye.» 
Raag kisgu,togsda a raag luglug raare.
Sũ-tõog soab n yũud nag-kɩr bĩisim
A sɛgla sɛb bõoneg ne moore, n na n bilg neba b  sẽn na n maan toto tɩ SIDAwã bãaga bil da yõk-ba, la bsẽn na n maan toto me n ges SIDAwã bãag sẽn yõk neb niisã yell tɩ yɩ sõama.
Wakat ning mam sẽn na n tẽeg m nugã Ezɩpt tẽngã n yiis Israyɛll nebã bãmb sʋkã, Ezɩpt rãmbã na n bãngame tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» Wakat ning bãmb sẽn kẽng n na n tɩ gom ne Faarõ wã, rẽ t'a Moyiis tara yʋʋm pis-nii, t'a Aarõ tar yʋʋm pis-nii la a tãabo. 
A Kayẽ yeela Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa: «Mam kongrã sɩbgr yaa kãseng wʋsg n yɩɩd mam sẽn tõe n zɩ. Yãmb digda maam dũndã n yiisd tẽng ning sẽn sakd koobã pʋga, tɩ mam ka na n tõog n leb n yãnd yãmb yɛs ye, la m na n yɩɩ yɛɛbda, n ka yas zĩ-yɛng dũniyã zug ye. La ned ning sẽn yãnd maam, a na n kʋʋ maam.» 
A Aarõ ne Israyɛll nebã fãa yãndame t'a Moyiis nengã pɩndame. Dẽ, bãmb zoee rabeem n ka rat n kolg-a ye. Dẽ poorẽ, Israyɛll nebã fãa yaool n kolgame, la yẽnda togsa bãmb bũmb nins fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn togs yẽnda Sinayi tãngã zugã. 
Bugum sok waongo, n paas zũnd-zãnde.
Pʋ-peelem ka rɩɩb ye, la a be basem yam
Burkĩna Faso gosneerã  teka bilfu.
Sãan ka mi long ye
Yɩ-y mam togs-n-taase wa m meng sẽn ya Krista togs-n-taaga. 
Wakɩr sã n lʋɩ bulgẽ ne nif sãagre, f sãamda turs n bao-a
Burkĩna Faso gosneerã wilga a sũ-sãang ne kibarã ka sɩd ye.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-biis katɛk yii Gibo tẽngã pʋg n kẽn n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ Gosneer lebg n pak b karen-dotã tɩ b paam n karem.
Ned sã n wãb yiu bɩ a ra yĩm yibeoog saag yell ye.
Politik rãmba, la lagem-n-taarã sula neb kẽer zẽka koeese, la b kosa tẽngã taoor soab t’a kẽes-b na-kẽnd paall ning a sẽn dɩke, wilg tẽngã koglg wɛɛngẽ wã.
Rẽ zugẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab goma ne a Eli n yeel-a yaa: A Eli yikame n dɩk Sarepta sore, la yẽnda sẽn ta tẽngã noore, a yãnda pʋg-kõor sẽn dag n wɩɩsd raado. A Eli boola pʋg-kõorã n yeel-a: «Paga, m kotame tɩ f kẽng n tɩ toog koom bilf ne wamd n wa kõ-m tɩ m yũ.» 
Kɩɩb rɩt medga, tɩ wẽnd pund bɩɩm
A sigbã poore, sodaas nins sẽn deeg tẽngã yiisa mooneg koɛɛg n pʋʋs nin-buiidã, la b wilg tɩ b na n sega ministɛɛr dãmbã seb-gʋndb taoor rãmb tɩ b zĩnd ne taab n ges tʋʋm-yãgdem nins sẽn be.
Dẽ, zĩiga sẽn sobge a Pok kolga a ma n sok-a yaa: “Sidawã Bãag tara m baaba sɩdaa? Togs-m yaa tɩ mame lebga bi-kãseng wɛ! A ma sulga a nẽnga, dẽ, a Pok mikame t‘a ma yãbdame.
Yaa Wẽnd Ba sẽn mi fãa wã n tũus yãmb al daar woko, t'a Vʋʋsem Sõng pids-y ne b kũuni, tɩ y na n pʋg a Zezi Krista la y sak tɩ b mes-y ne b meng zɩɩm. Bɩ Wẽnd nimbãan-zoeere la b laafi sig y zug zembala! 
Tι katr yeel tι yaa yẽ pag a Pok n dυυg n yet tι yẽ wa wυke. Soaamb yaool n miime tι yaa zĩrimbeed bal fass... La a pãngã sẽn pa tõe katr yĩnga, a yeel-a lame t'a wυke, tι katr sιd Wυk n sui a waoogẽ.
M taa Troas n moon Krista Koe-noogã. M mikame tɩ Soaala paka kʋɩlensa yalengo n kõ-m be, baasg fãa m sũura pa tol n gãand laafi tɩ m pa yãend m saam-biig a Tit ye. M pʋʋs-b lame n le wẽnemd n dɩk Masedoan tẽng sor. 
Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab wẽnemd tõnd sũyã n tees bãmba, n kɩt tɩ tõnd sak bãmb tʋlsmã fãa, ne b tõodã la b noyã ne b minind nins fãa bãmb sẽn dag n kõ tõnd yaab-rãmbã. Woto, dũniyã nebã fãa na n bãngame tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab bal n yaa Wẽnnaam, la Wẽnnaam a to ka be ye. 
Moasã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam Wẽnnaamã kɩtame tɩ mam soolmã fãa zĩ bãane, la b kɩt tɩ mam ka leb n tar bɛyã, la toog me ka leb n beẽ ye. Dẽ yĩngã, mam tagsdame n dat n me roog Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa mam Wẽnnaamã yʋʋr yĩnga. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n yeela m ba a Davɩɩd woto: Fo bi-ribl ning mam sẽn na n kɩt t'a led fo zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã, n na n me roog mam yʋʋrã yĩnga. 
Yʋgempeend yãab-raar la a rɩkr-daare.
M ba Katr sẽn yã rẽ wã, a tẽedame, tɩ yaa noosã, t’a kẽng n ta, n kool n sui a waoogẽ, n tall n kuili.
Wẽnnaam yeela a Zakoob yaa: «Mam yaa Pãng-Soab a Wẽnnaam. Bɩ f paam dogem n fɩɩg n lebg wʋsgo, fo na n yɩɩ bu-kãsenga, la buud wʋsg na n yii fo pʋgẽ. La rĩm-dãmb na n yii fo pʋgẽ. 
Neb kẽer reegdame n dɩgendẽ tɩ b wa kõ-b bũmb tɩ b yaool gese.
·  A soaba yĩnga zagemdame.
Yʋng-noaag ka sãoor ye.
Dẽ yĩnga tɩ tags tɩ pʋgsad ka mɩ rao ne nebã yaa sũnoog bii ? bɩ yaa yãnde?
Vɩʋʋg ka relld ye.
M pa kɩɩs yoob wa rɩkr ye
Ãna n get kɩɩbsa yelle ? B sãn ka tar ba rãmb sẽn get b yelle, bõe n maande ? B segd n paama bõe ?
Yʋʋma sẽn loog sẽn ka  kaoose, lɔgtor yir bãngdba maoome n na n gɩdg tɩ bãaga bil da yõk neb  wʋsog Afirik soolome ye. Neb kẽer wɩsga b pãng n moon tɩ b rɩkd suudã  b sẽn boond tɩ kapotã tɩ bãaga bil da yõk b ye.
Tẽegre, yɩɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 25 yʋʋm 2022 soabã la b yiis mooneg koɛɛg n wilg neb nins b sẽn yãk tɩ b zĩnd gosneerã pʋgẽ.
La, a ba wã sɩd wa makame, n kong n deeg zũurã n kõ-a.
Yaa m sũura sẽn da kegem woto la m da rat n deng n tũ y nengẽ n le paas y sũ-noogo. Wala Wẽnd sẽn yɛs b sɩd zĩigẽ, tõnd goama ne yãmb ka naag n yɩ N-yẽe la Ayoo ye. 
La mikame t'a Labã rag n kẽnga a rũm-bãooneg wõrsgo. A Rasɛll zuu a ba wã wẽn-naandse. A Zakoob wʋka a sẽn so wã fãa n zoe. Yẽnda yikame n pɩʋʋg kʋɩlgã n kẽng Galaad soolem ning sẽn be tãms sʋkã sẽnẽ. A Labã babsa a Zakoobe 
Bãmb tõeeme n tal suudã b sãn dat n lagm taaba. La b  segd n zãmsa a sẽn maand toto wakat fãa.
Yãmb da yaa wa pe-yãans sẽn kẽ weoogo la marsã y le leba y pe-kɩɩma la y sɩɩsa gũud nengẽ. 
Vel kĩga yaa nana, la bʋkem-bʋkem lebga toogo
Kur n bao la nang tão-a
Tɩp tɩɩm soaba m ba Yũuga
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeelame: «Mam sɩɩgã ka na n kell n pa ninsaal pʋgẽ wakat sẽn kõn sa yĩng ye. Bala, ninsaal yaa yĩng bala. Dẽ, yẽnda yʋʋmã na n yɩɩ koabg la pisi.» 
Tab koaas pa mi t'a tab pa noom ye
B sã n deeme, b na n yãame».
Rĩmã yeela maan-kʋʋd a Abiyataar yaa: «Yik n kẽng Anatot sẽn yaa fo zĩigã, bala, m dag n tog n kʋʋ foom, la rũndã, m ka na n kʋ-f ye. Bala, fo rag n tʋka Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Zu-soabã kaoolã koglgã n lʋɩ m ba a Davɩɩd taoore, la f naaga m ba a Davɩɩd b namsgã fãa pʋga.» 
Nanambs a yiibã sõasg ne taab loogr poore, b tẽnsã taoor dãmb me zĩnda ne taab n sõse.
Yaa rẽ n so, tɩ sodaas sẽn be ƐMPESƐƐRÃ pʋgẽ ges tɩ tʋʋmd nins sẽn maandã pa b sẽn da tʋlg a soabã ye.
Yoaad a yembr kibare.
A Nowe leb n yeelame: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, sẽn yaa a Sɛm Wẽnnaamã paam pẽgre. Bɩ a Kana yɩ bãmb yamba! A Nowe sẽn wa n na n ki wã t'a tara yʋʋm kobs-wɛ la pis-nu. 
Fo zab ne gãeenga, pa tar yõodo, fo sĩnd f noor me, sũ-toogo.
Tõnd tɩɩm pa kis bɩt ye
Bɩ b yãk a zɩɩmã n mes y rot nins yãmb sẽn na n zĩnd-b pʋs n dɩ-a wã lug a yiibã zutu, la y mes rignoorã zugẽ. Badaar yʋngo, bɩ y sẽ rũngã, la y wãb a nemdã ne bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩlle, la ne mood sẽn yaa toogo. 
ƐMPEYƐSƐR taoor dãmbã wilga mooneg koɛɛgã pʋga, tɩ yaa ne sũ-ka-noong la b wʋmd tɩ neb yiisd koees n boondẽ tɩ b yi n gɩdg CEDEAO wã sẽn tʋʋm b rãmb tɩ b wa seg tẽngã taoor dãmb tɩ b zĩnd n sõsã.
Zõang sã n yẽgd longo, pʋleng yẽgda wẽnde
A kom tar yaka, kom tar da-gjʋngo.
«Fo yãnda a Akaab sẽn sik a meng to-to mam taoorã bɩ? Yẽnda sẽn sik a meng mam taoorã yĩnga, mam ka na n kɩt tɩ yel-beedã paam-a a sẽn ket n vɩ wã wakat ye. La yaa wakat ning yẽnda biig sẽn wat n dɩt naamã la mam na n kɩt tɩ yel-beedã paam a roogã.» 
Yaa neb 30 la b yãk tɩ b lʋɩ tʋʋmdã siglg taoore.
SIDAwã tõe n yõka raopa sẽn ya yʋʋm 20 tɩ ta 39 naana n kʋba.  Yaa neer tɩ b bãng b sẽn na n maan toto tɩ bãaga da yõk ba  wala tɩ bãaga bil da saag neb a taab ye. Yaa neer me tɩ b bãng  b sẽn tõe n zã bãad toto tɩ bãaga da wa yõk b ye.
Rõandã yʋʋmdã, ya a naoor 62 tig-tẽegre.
Nangur waoor la a sẽebo.
B tog n ninga bãg-tabd a yiib a zĩis a yiibã, n tong fuugã taoor ne a poorẽ. Bɩ b kell n sẽ maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugã sẽbdga t'a tabend ne fuugã menga, ne sãnem gĩsi la gĩs sẽn yaa miuug masɩ, la sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, ne gĩs-moaama la gĩs-miidu, ne lamd gĩs-bãanegã. 
Pag sẽn tar SIDAwã bãaga bɩ a bilã sãn yẽsemd a biiga, bãaga  bil tõe n tunega a biisĩma n yõk biigã. Yãmb sãn dat n kogel y  biigã, ad soɛ:
Ned sã n peng rũng ned a to nengẽ tɩ rũngã yĩng will sã n kaooge, wall a ki a soab sẽn ka be beenẽ wakate, bɩ sẽn peng-a rũngã yao. La rũngã soab sã n be beenẽ, bɩ a ra yao ye. La b sã n dag n sara ne taab tɩ yẽnda na n yao rũngã soab rũngã tʋʋmdã yĩnga, bɩ a yao rũngã soab a tʋʋmdã yaoodo. 
Neb katɛk n yi zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 18 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Gɛpaga la Tapoa porvẽesã pʋg n kotẽ tɩ b lebg n pags b karen-dotã kʋɩlense.
Neb nins sẽn baood n lebg arzegs rãmbã lʋɩta makr pʋgẽ, la kũusr pʋgẽ, datem wʋsg sẽn yaa yalemd la wẽns pʋsẽ, la bõn-kãens kẽesda ninsaalbã sãoong la meneng pʋgẽ. Bala, ligdã nonglem yaa bõn-wẽnsã fãa yẽgre. La neb kẽer sẽn nong ligd wʋsgã menemame n zãag ne tẽebã, la b sɩbga b mens ne tood buud toay-toaya. 
Tɩ Gomtɩʋʋg yeele : « Wẽnnaam sẽn waa na n naan maam wakato, tẽngãongã meng da yaa begdo, tɩ Wẽnnaam yeel tɩ m kẽnd n gũusdẽ la m soosdẽ n da wa salg n lʋɩ ye. Ya rẽ yĩng tɩ m kẽnd n soosd wa m bee gɛl zutu.»
Maam yẽe maana yam n fãag-m-menga ; Fo me bãng  sẽn na n maaneg n yi.
A Abrahaam peega pag a Ketʋra n paase. A Abrahaam leb n peega pag a to n paase. Pʋg-kãng yʋʋr la a Ketʋra. A Ketʋra roga a Abrahaam kamba. Yaa a Zimran ne a Yoksan la a Medan ne a Madiyã la a Yisebak ne a Suwa. 
Rãam yʋʋr tẽga a to bokẽ
Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor soab togsa tẽngã nu-gãaga.
Komindã taoor saob bẽda be, n bool neb nins sẽn deeg zĩisã Wagaẽntɛɛr gaarẽ wã, tɩ b modg n dɩk b zĩisã.
 Tɩ biigã sɩd be ne-a taoor sãagre, n tɩ ta zĩ-peel pʋgẽ, n fãeeg-a be.
Ned fãa togame n bãng a yel-sõm-dãmb la a bẽeb n bake
«Maan fut sẽn welg toor n kõ f kẽem a Aarõ, sẽn na n wilg yẽnda a zĩiga, la a naam. 
 T’a bõnyẽeg kok n lembe, n bas n yeel m ba Soaamba : «Ad Katrã fulfuldã noomame dɛ»!
Dẽ n so tɩ d vɩ ne d yĩngã bɩ d yeeg-a lame n base, d sẽn baood la Wẽnd daab maaneg bala. D sẽn ya a soab fãa, d na n yaasa d kãre bʋʋda raare tɩ ned kam fãa reeg a tʋʋm keoore, tʋʋmd ninga a sẽn tʋme, a sẽn da waa n ket ne a yĩnga, a tʋʋm sõng wala a tʋʋm wẽnga. 
Sa-kẽengã waoongo. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Nowe yaa: «Bɩ foom ne f pagã, la f zakã rãmb fãa kẽ koom koglgã pʋga. Bala, mam gesame, tɩ fo zamaanã nebã sʋka, yaa foom f yembr n yaa nin-tɩrg mam taoore. 
Wʋg fuug ne lamd gĩs-bãanega, la f maan zu-vindg ne lamd gĩs-bãanega. La f wʋg sẽbdg sẽn kãde, t'a yaa neere.» 
A Zozɛf yeela a baaba yaa: «Ka woto ye m baaba! Bala, yaa ada soabã n yaa kẽema! Ning-y y nug-rɩtgã yẽnda zugu.» 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 29 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, karen-saamb a Zãmbatiis BÕNTOOG sega kiba-kɩtbã n wilg t’a yiisa reem paalle, t’a yʋʋrã ya Tẽeg-n-paase.
Sulla neba segd n naaga taab n ges yam-yak paalg bʋg la b na n yãke ned  fãa yĩnga la wẽndooga ne b tẽnga yĩnga.
Sẽn tar-a pãng n tar sugri.
Dẽ, a Koore ne a Meraari kom-dibli nins sẽn yaa rigno-gũudbã ne b sulã la woto. Tʋʋm b sẽn kõ Leevi neb kẽere. Yeyiyɛll buudã neb ne b kom-dibli wã, ne a Zetam ne a yao a Zowɛlle, bãmb n get Wẽnnaam doogã laog yelle. 
A Zakoob yeela a Labã yaa: «Kõ-y maam m pagã tɩ mam tʋʋmdã wakat pidame tɩ m dat n peeg m pagã.» La zĩigã sẽn sobge, a Labã peega a bi-pugl a Leya n tɩ kõ a Zakoobe, la a Zakoob kẽe ne-a. 
A kinkirg zomb reoogo, zu-wees paam taaba.
Nug-bi yang ka wʋkd zom ye.
Woto wã tʋm-y burkĩndlem tʋʋma. Da lʋɩɩs-y burkĩndlema taoore n dɩk menesg sor ye, yɩɩ-y Wẽnd tũudb bala. Waoog-y neb fãa, nong-y y saam-biisi, zoe-y Wẽnde, la waoog-y dĩma. 
Zug sã n põnge, ka pam ye.
Yaa rẽ tɩ Gibo karen-biisã yi n kẽn n wilgi, tɩ b sũur ka noom ne ye.
Zɩɩmã sẽn be rot nins yãmb sẽn be b pʋsẽ wã zutã na n yɩɩ bãnd yãmb yĩnga. La mam sã n yãnd zɩɩmã, mam na n zʋʋg n basa yãmba, la toog sẽn sãamdã ka na n paam yãmb wakat ning mam sẽn na n sɩbg Ezɩptã ye. 
La Edom nanambsã pelens yɩkame.  Moaab pãens rãmbã rigdame. Kana nebã fãa gĩin maagame. Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, rabeem-kãseng  ne yɛɛsg yõka bãmba, yãmb nugã pãn-kãseng yĩnga. Bãmb lebga mugs wa kugri, hal tɩ yãmb nebã looge, hal tɩ yãmb nebã yãmb sẽn da wã looge. 
A Davɩɩd lebga Israyɛll dĩma. Israyɛll nebã fãa tigma taab a Davɩɩd nengẽ Ebrõ n yeel-a yaa: «Tõnd ne yãmb yaa bũmb a yembre. A Sayull sẽn dag n yaa rĩmã wakate, yaa yãmb n dag n luɩt Israyɛll nebã taoor wakat fãa tɩ b kẽnd n zabdẽ, la y lʋɩt b taoor tɩ b lebg n wa.» Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa yãmb Wẽnnaamã yeela yãmb yaa: «Foom n na n yɩ Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã pe-kɩɩma. Foom n na n lebg Israyɛll sẽn yaa mam nebã naaba.» 
B na n tõog n baasa b lekollã.
A Izak rag n tara rũm-bãoonego, la rũm-bɛd wʋsgo, la a tar tʋmtʋmdb wʋsgo. Woto kɩtame tɩ Filistẽ-dãmbã maan sũ-kiir ne a Izak paoongã. Filistẽ-dãmbã wʋka tom n yẽd buls nins fãa a Izak ba a Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdbã sẽn dag n tu a Abrahaam wakatẽ wã. 
A ta n dιka a rasaarã n wẽ yolgã la a gomd a yembre: Yaa ãnd soab n yĩm a yolg ka? A Yamyιιd zĩnda yolgã pυg n yeele: Hũmm...! Y maand-m-la pãnga. N yet tι m pa rat n yι naaba, tι y rat n modg-m n kõ naam. Ayo. M pa rat n yι naab ye.
Dao sã n fõgen bũmb a zug n na n pʋʋs Wẽnd bɩ n na n togs b goama, a paoogda a zu-soaba. 
Reezẽo de lɛs nin-buiidã yiime n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b pak b karen-dotã.
M pẽgd-y la y sẽn tẽeg m yell bũmba fãa pʋgẽ la y reeg m noya fãa wala m sẽn wilg-y. M datame tɩ y bãng tɩ rao tara zu-soaba, yaa Krista; la pag me zu-soab la raoa, tɩ Krista Zu-soaba ya Wẽnnaam. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 3 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã, la buudã goam taoor kẽnd seb-gʋnd-kaseng a Yɩbrayɩɩm SANO, tɩ kõo sor tɩ yʋʋm 2022 n la yʋʋm 2023 soabã, kaoreng pak a kʋɩlense.
Põng-m tɩ m põng-f pa be keoor ye
La a Salmo yeelame: «A Adoniza sã n maan sẽn yaa sõama, yẽnda zoobg ba a yembr kõn lʋɩ tẽng ye. La a sã n tagsd n dat n maan sẽn yaa wẽnga, bɩ a bãng t'a na n kiime.» Rĩm a Salmo tʋma neb tɩ b tɩ yiis-a tẽn-kugrẽ wã n wa. La a wa n ta n wõgemda rĩm a Salmo taoore. La rĩmã yeel-a lame t'a yik n kuili. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 12 sẽn loogã, sull ning sẽn sigl kẽndã taoor dãmb sega kiba-kɩtbã n wilg b sẽn tagsd bũmb ning Reezẽo de lɛs zugu, la b kos tẽngã taoor dãmb tɩ b puk b nin n ges tɩ karen-biis sõor sẽn ta tus 100000 n be Reezẽo wã pʋg n dat n leb b karen-dotẽ wã.
Bãmb yeela maam yaa: Ad maam! Mam na n kõ-f-la rogem, la m na n kɩtame tɩ f fɩɩg n lebg wʋsgo, la m kɩt tɩ f lebg buud wʋsg ba. Fo loogr poore, mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo yagensã soog tẽn-kãngã wakat sẽn kõn sa. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 6 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso galentẽngã pʋgẽ, kom-bɩɩb ka tɛk n yi n tigim Ɛɛrtebe televisẽo wã zak noore, n wilg b sũ-pa-noaang ne b sẽn wʋm tɩ sodaasã taoor dãmb tigma taaba, la sã n ya ne bãmba, b tigs-taabã yaa sẽn dat n deeg Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE naamã.
B togsa toog piig soabã waoongo. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Mam na n kɩtame tɩ toog a to paam Ezɩpt rĩmã ne a nebã: Dẽ poore, yẽnda na n basa yãmb tɩ y loog n yi zĩ-kãngã. La a sã n wa kong n na n bas yãmb tɩ y looge, a na n diga yãmb tɩ y yi n looge. 
Woto yĩngã, mam kot-y lame, tɩ y fãag maam m kẽem a Ezayu nugẽ! Bala, mam zoeta rabeem t'a na n wa kʋ maam ne m pagbã ne b kambã! Yãmb yaool n yeela maam tɩ: ‹Mam na n maan-f-la neere, n kɩt tɩ f yagensã lebg wʋsg wa ko-kãsengã noor bĩisrã, tɩ b ka tõe n sõd n sɛ ye.› » 
A pag rog y aim kõ n tɩk vjẽela.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 5 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaas nins sẽn deeg Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022, gãnega na-kẽndr ning b sẽn na n dɩk n zã tẽngã t’a tũ sari sore, waoog taaba, la soog-m-meng pʋgẽ.
yaa Ebrõ sẽn be Zʋʋda wã ne a kɩremsã, la Aaza ne a kɩremsã, la Bɛt-Semees ne a kɩremsã, 
La yẽnda maana sãnem sogds pis-nu n sog pɛɛlã ne taab tɩ b lebg roog a yembre. B bogla pɛɛl a nu wã ne taaba, la b bogl a yoobã sẽn kellã me ne taaba. 
Woto, Wẽnnaam  toẽ n maaga b sũyã, la b kɩt tɩ laafɩ la sũnoog lebg n pid sũ-kãense.
Yaa beenẽ la mam na n seg foom. Mam na n goma ne foom bas-taal zĩigã zugẽ, serubẽ-rãmb a yiibã sẽn be kaset koglgã zugẽ wã sʋka, n kõ foom mam noyã fãa Israyɛll nebã yĩnga.» 
Pipi toogo: koom sẽn tek n lebg zɩɩm. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Faarõ sũurã riglmame. Yẽnda zãgsame n ka rat n bas nebã tɩ b loog ye. 
Pipi, b na n zĩniga porze t’a yãag kibayã kũun tʋʋm-noy tɩ b tõoge, n tʋm tɩ b tʋʋma yɩ naana, wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ.
 La rẽ tɛka, rao wã pa le tõe n gũs ye. Tɩ bala, a ra tara tagsg wʋsg a mengã ne a paoongã yĩnga.
Bãmb leokame: «Ayo! D soaala, ka woto ye! Yãmb yembsã wa n na n daa koodo! La a Zozɛf yeel-b lame: «Ka sɩd ye. Yãmb wa n dat n bãnga tẽngã pãn-komsem zĩiga.» 
Tι Pυg-yãangã yeel-a tι yell ka be ye. A sιd loogame n kẽnge, n tι kaoos bilfu, n lebg n wa. Pυg-yãangã kẽeme.
Bɩ neb nins sẽn be yembd pʋgẽ wã ges b mens zu-soben-dãmbã wa neb sẽn zems ne waoogr fãa, tɩ b ra wa n paoog Wẽnnaam yʋʋrã la tẽeb zãmsgã ye. La neb nins zu-soben-dãmb sẽn yaa Kiris tẽedbã, b ka tog n paoog-b n yetẽ tɩ bãmb yaa ba-biis ne taab ye. B tog n tʋma b yĩng sõama n yɩɩda, bala, b yaa tẽedbã, la nin-nongds bãmb sẽn maood tɩ maan-b neere.  Ad bũmb nins fo sẽn tog n zãms nebã la f sagl-b tɩ b sake. 
Gosneer  na n yiisa milyaar 10 n kẽes Sapaol-koobã pʋgẽ.
Dẽ, a Eli talla kug-bãmb n me tẽn-kugr Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋrã yĩnga. Yẽnda tuu bok n gilg tẽn-kugrã. La bokã zulum tõe n deega rʋg-bɛd a yiib koom. La a Eli yeelame yaa: «Pids-y ko-yʋy a naasã koom n wa kiig maoongã ne raadã zugu.» La a leb n yeel tɩ b tall n wa ne yɛsa, la b maana a woto. La a Eli yeelame tɩ b leb n maan a woto naoor a tãabẽ soaba, la b maaname. 
Kʋlg be koom, raad n togsde
Pag ka lub a pʋg-to, la a sõrsg be neere.
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam pʋda tẽn-gãongã yʋʋr tɩ ‹tẽnga›, la b pʋd koomã sẽn tigma yʋʋr tɩ ‹ko-kãsemse.› Wẽnnaam yãame tɩ bõn-kãng yaa sõama. 
Bɩ f tall lol-pollã n wa sɛk roogã noore, la bɩ a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã palg bãmb nus lol-pollã zugu. La f tẽk f nug-bil lol-pollã zɩɩm pʋgẽ n mes tẽn-kugrã. La f raag zɩɩm ning sẽn kellã fãa tẽn-kugrã sɛɛgẽ. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Gʋls gom-kãensã. Bala, yaa ne gom-kãensã la mam maand kaool ne foom, la ne Israyɛlle.» A Moyiis paa ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab rasem pis-naase, n ka rɩ rɩɩbo, la a ka yũ koom ye. La yẽnda gʋlsa kãabg goamã sẽn yaa tõod piigã kug-walsã zutu. 
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab rɩka sĩifã kõbr ning bãmb sẽn yãk ninsaalã sĩifẽ wã n naan pag n tall-a n wa ninsaal nengẽ. La ninsaal yeelame:  «Ade, moasã, yõwã yaa mam kõabã kõbre, la mam yĩngã neongo. B na n boonda yẽnda tɩ paga:  Bala, b yãka yẽnda rao yĩngẽ.» 
Ned sã n do f raag ne kuga, f rooda a raag ne kuga
Wagdr pag yɩɩd a sɩda.
A pẽ naab n tʋkd a zãr-naab waooga
Wa yʋʋmd fãa sapaolg kiuug pipi daare, Bukĩna Faso Sodaasã tẽegda b tʋʋmdã siglgu.
La daar a yembr zaabre, a Izak yiime n na n kẽng we-kɛɛng n kok pemsem. La a Izak sẽn zẽk n gese, a nee yʋgma sẽn wate. A Rebeka me zẽkame n gese, la a yãnda a Izake. Dẽ, a yɩka yʋgemdã zug n sigi. 
Tẽn-bãmb yaa Kɛn nebã, ne Keniiz nebã, la Kadmon-rãmbã, la Amoor-dãmbã, ne Kana-rãmbã, la Girgaaz nebã, la Zebuus nebã tẽmse.» 
Pĩim sã n kẽ koẽeg bɩ b yiis-a koẽega
Rũng sẽn deng n dum bãada sãn n wa rũm yãmba ? (Ayo)
Tẽng sã n zãr, a to n be taoore.
Yeelg f kẽem a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã ne fu-kãense. La f pʋdg kaam bãmb zut n ning tʋʋmdã bãmb zutu, n welg bãmb toor tɩ b maan maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd mam taoore. 
tõnd nengẽ Wẽnd yaa b ye tãa, yaa Wẽnd Ba, bũmb fãa sẽn yit a soab nenge la d sẽn vɩ a soab yĩnga, la d Soaala me yaa a ye, a Zezi Krista, bãmb nengẽ la bũmb fãa yita la bãmb yĩng la tõnd be. 
La bʋko, nin-buiidã gũusame n ges tɩ yellã ket n tara taoor kẽnde.
La no-rɛɛs-poak a Miryam sẽn yaa a Aarõ tão wã rɩka sɩlsãka, la pagbã fãa yii n pʋgla yẽnda n wẽ sɩlsãgs n sao. La a Miryam rag n deesda bãmb yɩɩllã n yetẽ:  «Bɩ y yɩɩl n waoog Sẽn-Ka-Saabo. Bala, bãmb wilgame tɩ b yaa na-kãsenga. Bãmb luba wiid ne wed-rʋʋdb ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ» 
Bũmb nins fãa sẽn dag n vɩ dũniyã zugã kiime. Yaa bõn-yɩgdɩ wã, la yir rũmsi, we-rũmsi, la bõn-bãooneg nins fãa sẽn saagd tẽn-gãongã zugã, la ne ninsaalbã fãa. Bũmb nins fãa sẽn vʋʋsd ne yõor n dag n be tẽn-koɛɛngã zugã kiime. 
Kibarã yii Omega.
Ezɩpt nebã rag n pẽdgda Israyɛll nebã. Bãmb dag n datame tɩ Israyɛll nebã loog n bas tẽngã tao-tao, bala, b rag n tẽedame tɩ bãmb sẽn yaa Ezɩpt nebã na n kii zãnga. Israyɛll nebã maana wa a Moyiis sẽn dag n yeelã. Bãmb kosa Ezɩpt nebã wanzuri ne sãnem teedo, la futu. 
Naabã wa n yiisa noor menga, tι biig sã n doge, a yυυrã kũun pa segd n ling yẽ ye. Fo me pag sã n doge, tι yaa pag tι yaa raoa, fo kẽngda na-yirã, n tι  reeg biigã yυυr be.
Dẽ, a Zozɛf sẽn ta a kẽem-dãmbã nengẽ, b yõk-a lame n yeeg a fu-gʋlmã a sẽn dag n yerã. Bãmb yõka a Zozɛf n lob bulgã pʋga. La bulgã rag n yaa bul-koɛɛng sẽn ka tar koom ye. 
la ka rẽ bal ye, yaa kristneba fãa n yãk-a t'a yãag tõnd d so-toaka pʋgẽ, n naag n yãend y vaag-n-kõ zãnga sẽn wat ne Soaala pẽgr ninga la a naag n yãend tɩ yɛla me tũu wa d sẽn date. Ka Wẽnd taoor bal la d baood tɩ d yɛla tũ sor ye, yaa ninsaalba me taoore. 
La a Aarõ leokame: «M zu-soaba, da puug-y y sũur ye. Yãmb meng mii nin-bãmbã sẽn yaa neb ninsi. Bãmb datmã yaa tɩ maan wẽnga.
