A Labã rɩka a yem-poak a Zilpa n kõ a bi-pugl a Leya t'a yɩ a tʋmtʋmda. Beoogã sẽn vẽege, bõe la wã, a Zakoob mikame tɩ yaa a Leya. Dẽ, yẽnda yeela a Labã yaa: «Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maan maam woto? Mam sẽn tʋm n kõ yãmbã ka a Rasɛll yĩng la? Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb zãmb maam?» 
A kell n wilgame tɩ sɛkã pʋgẽ, b togsa CEDEAO sullã sẽn dɩk na-kẽnda nins n na n yãag Burkĩna Faso nin-buiidã, tɩ b tõog n zã tãrazisẽo wã t’a tũ sore.
Biig ka yã a ma wẽnd n ye t’a ba sãam ligdi.
Ned tõeeme n tɩ baa gãande, la a ka tõe ta a muma nin ye.
Rĩm a Akaab tʋmame tɩ b tɩ bool Israyɛll nebã fãa, la a kɩt tɩ b tigim no-rɛɛsdbã Karmell tãngã zugu. A Eli yeela nebã yaa: «Maam m yembr bal n yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs sẽn kete, la Baall no-rɛɛsdbã yaa bãmb kobs-naas la pis-nu. 
A Pok baaba la sẽn ki la. A ma me tʋta me tɩ  pãng le kaẽ ye.
Bãmb n get yõ-koglgã, arzɛkã, sõng taabã, tẽngã taoor kẽnde, la tẽngã tods koglg yelle.
A yikame n pãensd n yita, la a gomd a yembre: Iye! Tι m yaa rεεm yĩnga, mam wed-moaag la kυυda? Yell a woto sakd sιda? Pa saagd ye. Ayo. sẽn na n yι. Mam pa sak ye.
Seg taabã loogr poore, sodaasã taoor dãmb, wilgame tɩ b na n yãaga MPSR sullã, nin-buiidã la tẽngã koglg pʋgẽ.
Tõnd vɩɩ dũni wã pʋga, yaa sɩda, la tõnd ka zabd ne dũni rãmba zab-teed ye. Yãmb tũudma sã n lebg neer zãnga, d na yik n zab la d sɩbg kɩɩsd fãa. 
A kell n kẽnga taoore n paas tɩ sẽn sɩng ne marsa maam n yembr n so wã pa le be ye.
Dẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã talla Sẽn-Ka-Saab kaoolã koglgã n tɩ ning-a a zĩigẽ, ro-taoorã sẽn yaa zĩig sẽn welg toor n yɩɩdã pʋgẽ. La b rɩgl-a-la serubẽ-rãmbã pɩgs tẽngre. Bala, serubẽ-rãmbã pɩgsã rag n yɛdgame n lud zĩig ning kaoolã koglgã sẽn beẽ wã. Serubẽ-rãmbã pɩgs luda kaoolã koglgã ne a ra-bɩlmã sẽn be a zugã. 
Tãrãzisẽo tʋʋmd na n yɩɩ kiuug 21, la b segd n tũu ƐMPESƐƐRÃ rãmb sẽn tik bũmb ning n lub naamã, la b reeg n na n lebg n demsã.
Zap biig kẽnda ne naood-zagdo
Ned sã n wẽ a yem-daoogo, wall a pãb a yem-poak ne dasaar n kʋ, bɩ b sɩbg-a n lebse. La yambã bɩ yem-poakã sã n kell n vɩɩmd daar a yembr wall rasem a yiibu, bɩ b ra sɩbg a soaalã ye. Bala, yambã yaa yẽnda ligdi. 
Fo ba wã bark yaa kãseng n yɩɩd neb  nins sẽn dog maamã rẽnda. La a yɩɩda hal kʋdem-wẽndẽ tãmsã barkã. La a yɩɩd pĩnd kunkubã bõn-neeba. Bɩ bark-kãensã zĩnd a Zozɛf zugu, bɩ barkã zĩnd soab ning sẽn welg toor a ba-biisã sʋkã zugu. 
A Zakoob kambã maaga b meng n leoka a Sɩkɛm ne a ba a Hamoor ne sɩlem, a Sɩkɛm sẽn sãam bãmb tão a Dina wã yĩnga. Tõnd ka tõe n sak yãmb sẽn datã, sã n ka tɩ raop nins fãa sẽn be yãmb sʋkã n kẽ bãong n lebg wa tõndo. 
A yeel-b lame t’a mi zɩɩb ning b sẽn pʋʋs-a t’a tʋma tiiri.
A Rubɛn yagense. A Israyɛll bi-kãseng a Rubɛn kom-dibli la woto. A Rubɛn n dag n yaa a ba wã bi-kãsenga, la yẽnda sẽn kẽ ne a ba pagã yĩnga, b reega a kãosengã n kõ a Zozɛf me sẽn yaa a Israyɛll biigã kom-dibli. Woto, b ka leb n geelg a Rubɛn wa a ba wã bi-kãseng yɛs ye. A Zʋʋda n dag n tar pãng n yɩɩd a ba-biisã, la yẽnda yageng a yembr n lebg Israyɛll dĩma. La baoosgo, a Zozɛf n kell n soog kãosengã. 
Nin-kẽem a yembr kibare.
Bãmb kãaga b rũmsã, la b wʋk b paoongã b sẽn dag n paam Kana tẽngã n zã n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽnga. Dẽ, a Zakoob talla a yirã rãmb fãa n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽnga. A Zakoob peega a kom-dibli wã ne a kom-pugli wã, la a kambã kom-dibli ne a kambã kom-pugli, la a yirã rãmb fãa n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
 La, m ba Katr sẽn zuk waoogã, n pẽes no-kõbdã, n tẽed t’a na n yãa noaag a pʋgẽ, a pa yã baa fɩ.
Mi neb são a mi tẽnga
Yaa ãnã n be yãmb tẽngã n tõe n zãms nebã b sẽn na n maan toto  n ges SIDAwã sẽn tar neb niisa yell sõama tɩ bũmb ka maan-ba?
Liuul ka wekd raagẽ tɩ haya-haya le yɩk-a ye. 
Toog piig soaba: Kom-dẽems kũum. Yʋn-sʋk wakate, Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ Ezɩpt kom-dẽemsã fãa ki, sẽn sɩng ne Faarõ sẽn zao a naam geerẽ wã bi-kãseng tɩ ta sẽn be-b bi-bees roogẽ wã kom-dẽemse, la rũmsã kom-dẽems me. 
Yiib soaba, noy nins fãa b sẽn da rɩk tãrãzisẽo wã zãab wɛɛngẽ yalsame.
M ba Soaamb kẽe yυng a ye n mak gõeem n konge. A tagsa a sẽn na n maan to-to, n paam n tιlg ne a zakã rãmba. La soaamb n kongd dabaar bι? A ninga a yamẽ wã t'a tõe n belga a Katr yalem-zaallã n paam n yi yellẽ wã.
Sẽn yõod-a yaad ka zoet kɩɩms yãbr ye.
La wed-moaagã yeel-a lame :
A Nowe roga kom-dibli a tãabo: A Sɛm ne a Kam, la a Zafɛte. Wẽnnaam gesame tɩ dũniyã sãama zãnga. Bala, ninsaalbã fãa rag n tʋmda tʋʋm-beed dũniyã zugu. 
Rĩm a Salmo sẽn wa n na n sɩng Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã meebã, rẽ tɩ yaa Israyɛll nebã sẽn yi Ezɩpt yembdã pʋg tɩ yʋʋm kobs-naas la pis-nii. La wakat-kãng yaa a Salmo sẽn deeg naamã tɩ yʋʋm naaslẽ. Dag n yaa yʋʋmdã kiuug a yiib soabã b sẽn boond tɩ Zɩɩv kiuugã pʋga. Roog ning rĩm a Salmo sẽn me Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋr yĩngã woglem yaa kãntɩɩg pis-yoobe, t'a yalmã yaa kãntɩɩg pisi, t'a zãntlmã yaa kãntɩɩg pis-tã. 
A Bɛn-Hadaad yeelame: «B sã n wat n na n baoo laafɩ, bɩ y yõg-b vɩɩse. La b sã n wat n na n baoo zabr me, bɩ y yõg-b vɩɩse!» Dẽ, Israyɛll rĩm a Akaab yiime n kʋ wiidã n sãam saar-dãmbã, la a tõoga Siiri nebã ne tõog-kãsenga. 
tι neb a yiibã leok-a: F lebga Silmiig masã? Bas rẽ la f lebg Marenga. F yet tι f sιlem waoog laa..., so-kãngã yẽ, fo kiime bala. B ra tẽedame yaa a Yamyιιd n maand dabaare, n teem a koεεgã n dat n belg bãmba.
A lɩkr n bao a korbo
Yʋʋm 1996 soabã, a naag Gilung Parwaasã Koralle, b sẽn boond tɩ Rĩmpʋgbnooma.
Kur ka mi yãgb ye, la a tata bãkẽ
la zũud tẽn-kugrã ne a gãmbrã sẽn yaa zũudã, la a ra-bɩlmã ne a teedã fãa, la pekr sĩngã ne a naoorã, la maan-kʋʋdbã tʋʋmd fut b sẽn na n yeelg n maan sɛk roogã tʋʋmde. Yaa maan-kʋʋd a Aarõ fu-sõama wã ne a kom-dibli wã fut b sẽn yeelgd n maand maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmdã. 
Gom-zug a yiib soaba: ƐMPESƐƐRE Nug-tikra 2 soaba: yaa ƐMPESƐƐR sodaasã n get tẽngã zãab yelle hal n tɩ ta wakat ning b sẽn na n yãk neb nins sẽn na n lʋɩ tãrãzisẽo wã taoore.
Saame ne a wõdɩ fãa yaa nug-raoog tʋʋmde.
A Davɩɩd ka kɩt tɩ b sõd neb nins sẽn dag n tar yʋʋm pisi la sẽn yɩɩd woto wã ye. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab rag n yeelame tɩ b na n kɩtame tɩ Israyɛll buudã fɩɩg n lebg wʋsg wa yĩngr ãdsã. A Seruya biig a Zoaab sɩnga nebã sõadga, la a ka baas ye. Sõadgã yĩng kɩtame tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab sũurã puug ne Israyɛll nebã. La b ka gʋls nimbuiidã sõor dĩm a Davɩɩd kibayã sebr pʋgẽ ye. 
T’a sũurã sãame, t’a yãs sɩɩ…
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 26 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, gosneem seb-gʋnd-kaseng a Zak Sostɛnd DẼNGARA tɩ zĩniga Metr Apolineer de Taanbɛɛll KELEM gosneerã taoore.
T’a na n dɩk yellã, n togs a zoa a yembre.
Nebã sẽn wʋm koe-kãng sẽn yaa toogã, b sũyã sãamame. La ned baa a yembr ka yeelg a fan-teed ye. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela a Moyiis t'a yeel Israyɛll nebã yaa: «Yãmb sũyã yaa kegemse, mam sã n wa yãmb sʋk wakat bilf bala, mam na n sãama yãmba. La moasã, bɩ y yiis y fan-teedã tɩ mam bãng mam sẽn na n maan yãmb bũmb ninga.» 
Yaa tẽngã zãadb sẽn dɩk noor n na n dɩk kom-bɩɩb tɩ b sõng n zab ne nin-wẽnsã, wɛɛngẽ, la b gom sapaolg kiuug rasem a 2 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, nin-sabls tẽns kibayã kũun pʋgẽ.
Woto wã d ka le ne ned ba a ye ne ninsaal nif ye. Ba sã n da yaa ne d nin la d da bãng Krista, ka boto marsã la d le get-b ye. La fãa yita Wẽnd nengẽ, bãmb tũu Krista maasem n maneg tõnd yell ne bãmba la b kõ-d la maneg taab yell ne tʋʋmd ning d sẽn deeg b nengẽ wã. 
La, b sẽn tar tãoob n tar tãoobo, m ba Soaamb le wa n bas a menga, tɩ m ba Wobg kʋ-a, n bas n la, n yaag a yẽdgã woo…!
Yaa sɩda, b saka komslem, tɩ b ka-b pika la ne Wẽnd pãnga b ket n vɩɩme. Tõnd me boto. Tõnd me komsame, la Wẽnd ne b pãngã na kõ-d vɩɩm, d tʋʋmda pʋgẽ. Wala m sẽn tẽedã, y kõn yãend tɩ d bãong lukr ye. 
Wẽnnaam yeelame: «Bãmb sã n ka tẽ foom, la b sã n ka sak n deeg dẽenem bãndã yĩnga, b na n tẽe yaoolem bãndã yĩnga. La bãmb sã n ka tẽ bãn-kãens a yiibã fãa, la b sã n ka sak n kelg fo koɛɛgã, bɩ f yãk Nill kʋɩlgã koom n pʋdg tẽn-koɛɛngã zugu, la kʋɩlgã koom fo sẽn na n yãkã na n lebga zɩɩm tẽn-koɛɛngã zugu.» 
Soaala neng togla nin-sõma la b tʋb kelgda b pʋʋsgo. Soaala nini yaool n gẽenda sẽn maand-b wẽnga. Yell bʋg n tõe n pak yãmba, yãmb sã n baood neer ne y sũur fãa? 
Zaamẽ pʋʋsg yaa f bãng tɩ kũun taa a soaba
La b gʋla serubẽ-rãmba, gɩgma ne koms tɩɩs naana terokã zugu, ne a tebendsã zutu, la b gʋl tɩ-puud n gilg a zãngã. A Hiram maana zũud sĩn-bi piiga. La sĩn-bil a yembr fãa tõe n deega ko-yʋy pis-naase. La a yembr fãa zãntlem tata kãntɩɩg a naase. La terok fãa zugu, sĩn-bil a ye n dog be. 
SIDAwã bãag bil maanda a wãn n yõk neda?
Rɩk a yãadã kaam la a sãoorã kaam ne a yiim a yiibã fãa ne b kaamã n yõog bugum tẽn-kugrã zugu. La f yiis lol-pollã nemdã ne a gãongã la a bĩndã sik zĩigã pʋgẽ n yõog bugum yɩnga. A yaa yel-wẽnã maoongo. 
A Zeroboaam dag n yaa a Salmo tʋmtʋmda, la a zaba ne rĩmã. Ad bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ b zab taabã. A Salmo manega zĩig tãngã zug n na n ko, la a yẽd võorã sẽn dag n be yẽnda ba a Davɩɩd tẽngã lalgẽ wã. A Zeroboaam dag n yaa gãndaoog n tar pãnga. La rĩm a Salmo sẽn yã bi-bɩ-kãng sẽn tʋmd sõama to-to wã, a kɩtame tɩ yẽnda soog Efrayiim ne Manaase buudã neb tɩ b tʋmd tʋʋm-wɛglã. 
No-bi-gõaadg rɩta tãnbeog-raase.
Ba-bil yeelame tɩ maoor noog yaa lub-m tɩ m lub-fo.
 M ba Katr me, kẽe pʋ-bedrã pʋgẽ n solge.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela yẽnda yaa: «Mam wʋma fo pʋʋsgã ne f kosgã f sẽn kos maamã. Dẽ, mam na n welga roog ning fo sẽn me n kõ maamã toore, n ning m yʋʋrã a pʋgẽ wakat fãa yĩnga, la mam belmã ne m sũurã na n zĩnda ro-kãngã pʋg wakat fãa. La foom a Salmo sã n tũ maam ne pʋ-peelem, la ne burkĩndi, wa f ba a Davɩɩd sẽn dag n tũud maamã, la f maan bũmb nins mam sẽn yeel foom tɩ f maanã, fo sã n sak mam noyã ne m minindã, 
Wĩnto-sʋkã loogr poore, b sɩngame n gom n ta zaabr sẽn yaa maoongã maaneg wakatã. La bãmb ka tol n wʋm koɛɛg tɩ b gomd leokre, la bãnd me ka zĩnd ye. A Eli rɩgsa kug piig la yiib wa sẽn zems a Zakoob kambã sõore, wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn dag n gom n yeelã: «B na n boola foom t'a Israyɛlle.» . 
A sẽn wẽ bendrã woto wã, la pυg- yãaga sẽn sιng lυιιse, n tek n vagle. Ta le we, t'a le farg n kolg noorẽ, n le tek n yagle. T'a le wẽ yεsa, tι pug-yãangã vũ n wa tẽng bup!
Rao n baood a ki t'a pag sãrge
Tẽngã taoor soab yeelame t’a na n kell n dɩk a sodaarã kiuug yaoodo.
Yaa rẽ n kɩte, tɩ bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 29 ne a rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaasã sull n yik n deeg naamã, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n maneg n sigl tɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn da ka kẽnd sõma wã, tõog n tũ taoore.
A pẽgda Fõndasẽo Ebomaf b sẽn kõ-b kũunã.
Zĩnd n bala, poore, sẽn paam-b zãmsgã sũur yɩɩ noogo, hal tɩ b pẽge, la b bõos tɩ b leb n sõng-b ne zãmgsg a taaba.
A Rebeka tão wã ne a Rebeka ma wã yeelame: «Bas-y tɩ pʋg-sadã zĩnd ne tõnd rasem piig n paase, rẽ poore, y tõe n yaool n loogame.» A Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdã yeelame: «Ra kɩt-y tɩ m leb n kaoos ye. Bala, Sẽn-Ka-Saab manega mam so-toakã, dẽ wã, bɩ y bas-m tɩ m lebg n leb n soaalã nengẽ.» 
Sʋʋr-sʋʋr n pit korgo.
Rẽ n soa, t’a kot-b tɩ b kell n kẽng taoor ne b tʋʋmã.
Haya-haya n zẽkd sugri.
Yɩɩ neb 250 n sak n kõ meng ne yamleoogo n tʋmd tʋʋmdã, ned ba a ye pa reeg ba wakɩr ye.
Wẽnnaam leb n yeela a Abrahaam yaa: «Ade, fo pag a Sarayi yʋʋr ka na n leb n yɩ a Sarayi  yɛs ye. Yẽnda yʋʋr na n lebga a Saara. Mam na n ninga a Saara barka, n kɩt t'a rog fo bi-ribla. Mam na n ning-a-la bark n kɩt tɩ buud wʋsg yi yẽnda pʋgẽ. Rĩm-dãmb ne buud wʋsg na n yii yẽnda pʋgẽ.» 
yɩɩ Zaabr wakat a 3 sẽn wa n loog bilfu, la Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE sig Bamaoko Mali na-tẽnga.
Dẽ poore, yãk nin-yẽesens nebã sʋk sẽn zoet Wẽnnaam, la sẽn yaa sɩd dãmba, la sẽn kis zãmb bũmbu. Yãk neb tusr-tusr nanambse, neb koabg-koabg nanambse, neb pis-nunu nanambse, la neb piig-piig nanambse. 
La, a ba wã tõdgame, t’a kõn tũ ye. Tɩ bõe?
Rẽ zugẽ, a Leya rɩka pʋg n dog bi-pugla, n pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Dina . A Rasɛll pʋda biigã yʋʋr t'a Zozɛfe . A Rasɛll yeelame: «Bɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab leb n kõ maam bi-ribl n paase.» 
Yõnk n lub yaa ka-pãnga, la zaoẽ n tẽgdẽ wã yaa ka-neda.
Dẽ wã, yõk-y Sẽn-Ka-Saab sɛɛga, tɩ b kɩt tɩ sa-tãsã ne sapɩlmã yalse. Woto, m ka na n leb n gɩdg yãmb tɩ y ra loog ye.» 
Soaamb ka nobd-n-yɩɩg a gãong ye.
A Zafɛt kẽem a Sɛm me paama kom-dibli. Yaa a Sɛm n yaa a Hebɛɛr buudã yaaba. A Aram kamb la woto: a Utsi, a Ulli, a Getɛɛr ne a Maase. 
Kinkirgã sɩd mak n kongame, n kõ-a nug-bĩnga, la, a yeel-a, t’a ra wa saag n togs ned ye, bala, a na n kiime.
 B sẽn wa n tar bokã tuubu, n wa kolg m ba Katre, b baoo yamsem ne tɩpare, n to, n puus a Katr bokã pʋga.
A Zakoob ba a Izak kũum. A Zakoob waa mamre, a ba a Izak nengẽ, Kiryat-Arba sẽn be Ebrõ soolmẽ wã, zĩig ning a Abrahaam ne a Izak sẽn dag n be sãand weoogã. A Izak vɩɩmd n kaoosa yʋʋm koabg la pis-nii n yaool n maan kaalem. 
Kũuna wilgd-b-la yãmb sẽn ya neb niynsi la b pẽgda Wẽnnaam b sẽn bãng tɩ yãmb sɩd tũuda Krista Koe-noogã. B pẽgd-y lame yɛsa tɩ y sẽn kõt n pa keesdẽ wã, pukda y zood ne nin-sõma wã la ne tõnd me. Wẽnnaam paam barka tɩ b kõ-d la kũuni sẽn yɩɩd noor toagsg! 
Ned sã n gãe a to pĩirẽ, a gãyã tẽnga
Yaa Wẽnd meng n da tũ Krista n wẽnemd dũniya neng n le tees b menga; b basa ninsaal beegr taale la b kõ tõnd zelemd sẽn na n gom n maneg d taab yelle. Ned ning sẽn ka maana yel-wẽndã, yẽ soab basame tɩ b tʋk-a yel-wẽnd zɩɩb, sẽn na n yɩlẽ bala tɩ Wẽnd tũ a maasem n pids tõnd ne b sõmblem. 
Rẽ wã, nin-kẽem sã n sagl biiga, bɩ a reege, la a ra paoog-a, t’a yãa pĩnda.
Ned pa nong ned me bɩ a nong a yʋʋre
Yaa rẽ n kɩte, tɩ bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 29 ne a rasem 30 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, sodaasã sull n yik n deeg naamã, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n maneg n sigl tɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn da ka kẽnd sõma wã, tõog n tũ taoore.
Mao-y n bilig neba fãa bũmb kãensã. Kit-y tɩ b lagm n leo
Maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ yoaadbã sẽn zĩnd hal a Zozafat ba a Aaza zamaanẽ wã, sẽn dag n ket n be tẽngã pʋgã, a Zozafat menes-b-la zãnga. Rĩm a Zozafat kɩtame tɩ b maan Tarsɩɩs koom kogl-bɛdã buudu, tɩ b na n kẽng Ofɩɩr tẽng n tɩ bao sãnem, la bãmb ka tõog n ta ye, bala koom kogendã tek n sãama Esɩyõ-Gebɛɛre. 
Pagã leb n doga bi-ribl a to n pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Sela. Pagã sẽn wa na n dog bi-kãngã, rẽ t'a Zʋʋda rag n bee Keziibi. A Zʋʋda bi-ribl-kãseng a Ɛɛr ka maan sẽn noom Sẽn-Ka-Saab ye. La Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame t'a ki. 
Rogem paamdame la gʋʋlg pa paamd ye
A Ornan leoka a Davɩɩd yaa: M dĩm la m soaala, reeg-y-yã-a n maan y sẽn date. Ges-y-yã, mam kõta yãmb niigã tɩ y maan maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã, la ra-vuudsã tɩ y maan bugum daado, la koodã tɩ y maan zom kũunã. Mam kõta yãmb bõn-kãensã fãa. La rĩm a Davɩɩd yeela a Ornan yaa: Ayo! Mam na n da-a-la wa sẽn zems a ligdã sẽn yaa to-to wã. Mam ka na n deeg zaalem bũmb n maan maoong sẽn yõogd bugum, n kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saab ye! 
La a Moyiis yeela Faarõ yaa: «Yam-yãkrã bee ne foom! Fo ratame tɩ mam kos Wẽnnaam dabʋr n kõ foom ne f tʋmtʋmdbã la f nebã tɩ b sãam lomsã tɩ b bas-yã, la b yi fo yirã, sã n ka Nill kʋɩlgẽ wã bala?» 
La Wẽnnaam yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Mam yaa m sẽn yaa-a soabã.» La bãmb leb n yeela yẽnda n paase: Tɩ yeel Israyɛll nebã a woto: «A ‹Mam yaa› n tʋm maam yãmb nengẽ.» 
Baa ne tõnd sẽn kongd bũmb ninga sẽn yaa a soaba, baa tɩ yaa tõnd  laafɩwã, a zemsame tɩ d sũur toẽ n yiki wala d kɩɩs tɩ d ka kong bũmb  kãng ye.
Sãn ya ne yãmba, sor bʋg la sõama n yɩɩd biig sẽn na n tu n bãng t’a ma  bɩ a ba tara SIDAwã bãaga?
 Biigã kẽngame n na n mok bugmã, n tɩ mik tɩ bugmã soab yaa kinkirga, la a sokame :
Yaa rẽ t’a wilg tɩ nebã fãa n segd n kẽes b toogo.
Kõn tʋm wã yaa kõn rɩ wã
Yɩɩ Gʋngẽ Lekoll C wã pʋg la Kolɛɛs Wẽndmanegda, la reezẽo di sãntrã guvɛgneer a Abdulae Basenga n wa n yãag ministɛɛrã seb-gʋnd tɩ b kõ sor tɩ tʋʋmdã sɩnge.
La a Izak mee tẽn-kugr beenẽ n pʋʋs ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋre. La a tilga a fu-roogã beenẽ, la yẽnda tʋmtʋmdbã tuka bulg be. A Izak maana kaool ne a Abimelɛke A Izak yeela bãmb yaa: «Yaa a wãn tɩ yãmb wat mam nengẽ? Ka yãmb n kisg maam n dig maam n yiis yãmb sʋk la?» 
La biigã sãame tɩ zõosã wa.
La yẽnda yeela bãmb yaa: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã yetame: ‹Ned kam fãa bob a sʋʋg n pɩʋʋg sik zĩigẽ wã, sẽn sɩng ne noor a yembre, n tɩ tãag noor a to, n kʋ a ba-biiga, a zoa la a roagda.» La Leevi buud nebã saka a Moyiis noore, la badaar bala, nebã sʋka, neb tus a tãab n ki. 
La m sã n wa loog n sɛ, m na n yaool n yãka m nugã tɩ f yãnd mam kudgã. Bala, ned ka tõe n yãnd mam nengã ye.» 
Nug-tikr a 7 soaba: taoor soabã le tara sor n tõe kõ tẽns a taaba no-rɛɛsdba, bɩ zamaan-zẽns rãmb sẽn tʋm neb nins sõor tɩ b tõe n zĩnd Burkĩna Faso tẽngã pʋgẽ.
Rẽ n so tɩ b gʋls b su-pa-noaang sebr n wa kõ taoor dãmbã, tɩ b sõng-ba, tɩ b tõog n paam karen-saamb dãmba, Reezẽo pʋgẽ, la b paas yõ-koagendbã sõor Kõngũs ne Gibo sorã zugu.
Sã n wʋke na n kellame
Yaa rẽ n so tɩ ned ba a ye, pa segd n tʋm a meng wen naf ye.
ƐMPEYƐSƐR rãmb keoogda Burkĩna Faso nin-buiida tɩ b maan gũus ne kibay kẽere.
Kẽng-y n tɩ yeel-y Israyɛll nebã fãa yaa: ‹Ki-kãngã rasem piigã daare, zak fãa tog n baoo pesgo, wall bʋʋga, la yaa rũng a yembre, zak fãa yĩnga.› Zakã neb sõor sã n paoodẽ tɩ b ka tõe n sɛ pe-tõre, bɩ b pʋɩ-a ne b yak ning sẽn pẽ n yɩɩdã, wa sẽn zems nebã sõore. Bɩ y pʋɩ pesgã n zems ned fãa sẽn tõe n dɩ to-to. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saabo, sã n yaa ne tõnd sẽn wʋmd tɩ b gomdã, ned ka be n zem yãmb ye, la Wẽnnaam a to ka be sã n ka yãmb bala. Dẽ yĩngã, buud bee dũniyã zug wa Israyɛll sẽn yaa yãmb nebã, tɩ b Wẽnnaamã fãag-b n kɩt tɩ b lebg a neb sɩda? Yãmb maana bõn-kãsems ne bõn-yɛɛsdse, n kɩt tɩ nebã bãng tɩ y yaa kãsenga. Yãmb kɩtame tɩ buud toay-toay zoe neb nins yãmb sẽn yiis Ezɩptã taoore. 
Ãnda n tõe n bãng põeer lamboaama?
b sãn tɩpd SIDAwã bãada, y segd n saka sagls kãensa n  kɔgl y menga :
A Zozɛf yeela a kẽem-dãmbã yaa: «Mam na n wa n kiime! La Wẽnnaam na n wa yiisa yãmb tẽn-kãngã, la yaa bũmb sẽn na n pidsi, la b na n tall-y lame n kẽng tẽng ning bãmb sẽn dag n wẽen n yeel tɩ b na n kõ a Abrahaam ne a Izak la a Zakoobã.» 
Pʋ-to-ned rʋʋdem sẽn maan to-to fãa a baasda a taoore
Fo kẽemã sũur sã n wa n sig ne foom, t'a yĩm bũmb ning fo sẽn dag n maan yẽnda wã, mam na yaool n kɩt tɩ f lebg n wa. Bala, na n yɩɩ a wãn tɩ mam na n kong yãmb y yiibã fãa daar a yembr pʋgẽ?» 
A Adoniza sõsa ne a Seruza biig a Zoaabe, la ne maan-kʋʋd a Abiyataare, la bãmb lebga yẽnda poorẽ dãmba. La maan-kʋʋd a Sadok ne a Zehozada biig a Benaya, la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Natã, ne a Simeyi la a Reyi ne a Davɩɩd gãndaadã ka zĩnd a Adoniza poorẽ ye. 
A kell n le pʋʋsa neb nins fãa sẽn sak n zẽk b naoore, n wa naag tigsgã pʋgẽ wã.
B bogla pɛɛl a nu wã ne taaba, la a bogl a nu wã sẽn ketã me ne taaba. B maana gãts pis-nu peend a yembrã zugu, la b maan gãts pis-nu peend a yiib soaba me kɩrenga. B ninga bãmb b yiibã fãa gãtsã tɩ b zems taaba. 
Yaa lagem-n-taar sula, Pagtɩ politik rãmba, la sula buud toor-toor no-rɛɛsdb la b yãk yã, tɩ b na n naag n zĩnd n bale, la b pʋɩ taab yam dãmba, tẽngã na kẽng taoor yĩnga.
Ned sã n tõe n kʋ bʋʋg n maan doaaga, a ka zabd noaag yãad poorẽ n ye.
Wã masã la Ratzãng yeel yã: Ad yell paam tõndo! À T’a Sĩndbal sok-a: Yell paam tôndo? Ãnda? Yell paam foo kae. Pa foo n dιk korgã la? Mam toog be be?
Rĩm a Davɩɩd dag n kʋʋla hal wʋsgo. Ba b sã n dag n pil-a fu-gobse, a waoodã ka yit ye. Dẽ, rĩm a Davɩɩd tʋmtʋmdbã yeel-a lame yaa: «N-na, bas-y tɩ d bao pʋg-sad sẽn ka mi rao t'a wa be y sɛɛgẽ n get y yelle, la a tõe n gãand y sɛɛgẽ n wɩngd y yĩnsã.» 
Kaorengã sẽn pak tɛka, komind dãmb 27 wã zugu, yaa komind a 8 pʋgẽ bala, la b tõog n pak karen-dotã.
Burkĩna Faso ne Mali taoor dãmbã yãka yam n na n paas b zoodã pãnga, la sẽn yɩɩd fãa, yaa yõ-koglgã wɛɛngẽ.
Yɩbrdã sã n yã foo, b na n tẽeme, tɩ yaa kũum, tɩ b na n dɩ. Tɩ f paam-ba, n yõke.»
La mam sã n paam waoogr Faarõ ne a saar-dãmbã la a wed-rʋʋdbã fãa yĩnga, Ezɩpt rãmbã na bãng tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» Dẽ, Wẽnnaam malɛɛkã sẽn dag n be Israyɛll nebã taoorã lebgame n leb bãmb poorẽ. La sawad-taokã yii bãmb taoorã n tɩ yals bãmb poorẽ, 
Rẽ yɩɩ sabaab n wa ne Burkĩna Faso wen-vɩɩs a naasã nin-buiid sũ-puuri.
Baag ka wʋmd a zugẽ yũug ye.
La b sã n wa lebg n kuili, a yembrã yeta a ba wã, t’a pidg a Naamd zũurã, n kõ yẽ.
Dẽn yĩnga, sẽn yɛsa yĩngr n pẽgd a menga gũus n da wa lʋɩ ye. Y nan pa seg kʋɩɩbgo sẽn zʋʋg ninsaal pãng ye. Wẽnd yɛsa b sɩd zĩigẽ la b kõn sak tɩ y paam kʋɩɩbg sẽn yɩɩd y pãng ye; kʋɩɩbg sã n wa, b na kõ-y dabaare tɩ y rig-a n zãage, b na kõ-y pãng tɩ y maan daoodo. 
La baa ne bũmb nins fãa fo sẽn ka kosã, mam na n kõ-f lame. Mam na n kõ-f-la arzɛka, la ziiri. La fo vɩɩmã tɛka, rĩm-dãmba sʋka, ned ba a ye kõn tõog n wẽneg foom ye. La fo sã n maan mam daabo, n sak mam no-tũudsã ne m tõodã, wa f ba a Davɩɩd sẽn dag n maanã, mam na n kõo foom yõ-woko.» 
La yãmb yeela tõnd tɩ d tɩ peeg-a n wa yãmb nengẽ, tɩ yãmb meng nif yãnd-a. La tõnd dag n leoka m soaalã n yeel yaa: bi-kãngã ka tõe n zãag n bas a ba wã ye, yẽnda sã n bas a ba wã, a ba wã na n kiime. 
Nag-bil pa mi we-naab bɩ a sok a ma
Mooneg koɛɛgã pʋgẽ, a wilgame tɩ ƐMPESƐƐR dãmb ket n be b na-kẽndrã sẽn ya zab ne yõ-koglg kaalmã t’a sa, la b mao tɩ tẽngã paam zã-sõngo.
B sẽn sʋkã, a wilgame tɩ yaa hal Yinata yel-beedã poore, la a sẽ fuugã.
Yaa ne m tʋʋm-tʋmda bõe la m belg yãmb n dɩ? Al daar zãar menga yãmb da tõeeme n yõke tɩ tõnd dat n kõ-la d meng bʋʋm, yãmb taoore, baa fɩ! Tõnd gomda Wẽnnaam la Krista taoore la rẽ fãa yaa yãmb sõngr yĩnga, m kom nongedse. 
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam naana ninsaalbã n wẽneg b menga. Wẽnnaam naan-b lame n wẽneg bãmb a Wẽnnaam mengã. Wẽnnaam naana bãmb pag ne raoa. 
Tẽegre, yɩɩ yʋʋm 2019 soabã, la Fõndasẽo Ebomaf sẽn yaa gurup EBOMAF tʋʋm-noor lugl yã.
Kũum ka yãbd a pid doog ye,yãbda mi-a soaba.
Ka zabr be beoogo la werd weef ki ye
Poandã wã wa n n tigma taab yʋʋm vẽkr kiuug n na n kẽng n tɩ pʋʋs b tẽngã naab ne a taabo.
Foom a Basa roogã ned sã n ki tẽng pʋgẽ, baas n na n wãb-a, la a sã n ki weoogẽ, weoogã bõn-yɩgdɩ n na n dɩ-a.» A Basa saka a saam-dãmba, la b mum-a-la Tɩrsa tẽnga. Yẽnda biig a Ela n led yẽnda zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. 
Yãmb sẽn dag n ka zĩnd kaanẽ pĩndã yĩnga, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã sãama neb wʋsg tõnd sʋkã, tõnd sẽn ka rɩk kaoolã koglgã wa sẽn zems tõogã yĩnga.» A Davɩɩd yeela Leevi buudã nanambsã, tɩ b kɩt tɩ b saam-biisã sẽn yaa yɩɩn-yɩɩndbã wa ne yʋʋm-teed sẽn yaa kʋla, pendse, la kɛma, n yɩɩl n kaas ne sũ-noogo. 
La sã n ya pag n pʋʋsde bɩ a togsda Wẽnd goama t'a zug ka teeg bũmbu, yẽ me paoogda a zu-soaba. Yaa wala a sã n da põnga a zuga koeelle. 
Dẽ, a Zʋʋda yeelame: «Bɩ a tall bũmb ning sẽn be yẽnda nengẽ wã! Wa tɩ d ra bao yãnd n kõ d meng ye. Ade, mam tʋma bullã, la fo ka tɩ yãnd-a ye.» La sẽn wa n zems kiuug a tãab rẽ zugẽ, b wa n togsa a Zʋʋda t'a bi-pag a Tamaar yoome n dɩk yoob pʋga. Dẽ, a Zʋʋda yeelame tɩ b tall-a n yi tẽngã kɩreng n yõog-a bugum. 
Ned rɩt-n-taag la a zabd-n-taaga
 La, sẽoog sẽn wa n ta, b fãa tɩ bʋdame, ne b zak rãmba.
Kʋɩɩm wãk sakda a to pʋʋgẽ
La rasem sõor ning nebã sẽn tog n dɩk n yãb kũumã yĩngã sẽn sɛ, a Zozɛf goma ne rĩm a Faarõ yirã rãmb n yeele: «Yãmb sã n nong maam, mam kotame tɩ y yeel Faarõ, 
F sã n laad ned t'a yaa rakõore, a wat n la-f lame tɩ f pag yaa pog-yãanga
Ned sã n yet t'a mii bũmbu, a bãng tɩ baasgo, ka waa a sẽn teeda zãng ye. Sẽn nong-a Wẽnnaam, Wẽnnaam me mii yẽ soaba. 
La bũmb a yembr bal la mam dat n kos foom moasã, ra zãgs m kosgã ye.» La a Batseba yeelame t'a togse. A Batseba yeelame: «Beneere, mam meng na n tɩ goma ne rĩmã fo yelle.» 
A Israyɛll yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Mam dag n ka tagsd tɩ mam na n leb n yãnda foom yɛs ye. La ade, Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ mam yãnd fo kamba!» A Zozɛf peega kamb a yiibã, n gãd a Efrayiim ne a rɩtg n ning a Israyɛll goabga, la a gãd a Manaase ne a goabg n ning a Israyɛll rɩtgo, n kɩt tɩ b yiibã fãa kolg a Israyɛlle. 
la a pees kug ne pɛɛsdga, sẽn na n ning gãtsã pʋse, la a pees raado la a maan tʋʋmd buud fãa. Mam yãka a Ayisamak biig a Oholiyaab sẽn yaa Dan buudã t'a sõng yẽnda. La mam kõo bãmb bãngre tɩ b maan bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn yeel foomã. 
A Pok ne a ma ra zĩi tɩɩg tẽngre. A ma laafɩ wã ra  ka le waoog yɛs ye.
Saag sã n pãb-y bɩ y ra pãb taab ye
Bao-y kooma b sẽn boond tɩ zavɛllã wʋmbla n ning so pʋɩsʋk koom n  kalem n pek bãada fut la y pek rooga bɩ a zĩigã.
A Saadu Ganaba sẽn ya Gibo karen-biisã taoor soab rɩka koɛɛg n wilg tɩ bãmb sẽn yi wã, yaa sẽn na n wilg Burkĩna Faso tẽngã zãadba, tɩ hal kaorengã yikr n tãag bãmb sẽn kẽndã, b karen-dotã ket n pagame, b leb n pa tar karen-saamb dãmb ye.
Tẽegre, neb wʋsg ra yii zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 6 soabã, n wilgd tɩ bãmb wʋmame tɩ Sodaas taoor dãmb b sẽn boond tɩ Zeenero rãmbã tigsa taaba, n dat n deeg naamã Kapɩtɛnd Yɩbrayɩɩm TARWAR nugẽ.
Lɔgtorã yiri, lɔgtor poaka kõo a Pok ma tɩɩm sẽn toẽ n paas a yĩnga pãnga la sẽn na n zab ne bãas a taabã.
Bala, nebã yetame, tɩ f sã n maan sãan yel-sõmde, a wat n leba f menga, wall f kamba.
A Ela tʋʋm a taabã ne bũmb nins fãa a sẽn maanã gʋlsa Israyɛll rĩm-dãmbã kibay sebr pʋga. Zʋʋda rĩm a Aaza sẽn deeg a naam tɩ yʋʋm pisi la a yopoe, a Zimri me reega naam Tɩrsa, n dɩ rasem a yopoe. Rẽ tɩ Israyɛll nebã rag n tilga b tãb-sikã Gibeton sẽn yaa Filistẽ-dãmbã soolmã, n na n zab ne Filistẽ nebã. 
Tãoos a yembre kibare.
Gom ne tʋʋm-mitb nins fãa mam sẽn kõ yamã tɩ b maan a Aarõ futã tɩ b welg toore, yẽnda sẽn kʋʋd maand mam taoorã yĩnga. 
A Aarõ kom-dibli wã sʋka, bãmb tʋʋmd Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã pʋgẽ rag n yaa zagsã ne ro-pʋsã yell gesgo, la teed nins sẽn welg toorã yɩlgre, la tʋʋm nins fãa sẽn kẽed ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã. Yibeoog ne zaabr fãa, b tog n wata Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore, n pẽgd-ba, la b waoogd-ba. 
Sẽn tar-a yam sẽn zʋʋg tẽng zug rẽnna, tõe n goma bũmb fãa yelle tɩ b pa yãend kegr ye. Ãnda n bãng Wẽnd tagsg n na n sagl-ba? Tõnd yẽ tar-a lame, tõnd tara a Zezi tagsgã. 
Nebã a yiibã yalsa wυmm..., n pa mi b sẽn maandg ye. Yell wa yã! B wa n baas n sιd lebg n dιka yir sore. B kulame n tι be viri, n vι b beoog-beoog fãa vιιmã, n tυmd n ditẽ, la b gυυnd b kamba.
Yaa rẽ n so, tɩ zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã pʋgẽ, sẽn sigl-b tʋʋmdã seg kiba-kɩtbã Waogdgo, SIYAWO wã zak pʋg n wilg-ba, b sẽn paam yãagr ninga.
Maan lamd gĩs-bãaneg kur-koees n kõ bãmb tɩ b sẽgen n lud b yãndã, sẽn sɩng ne b seesã tɩ tãag b gɛy wã. 
M pa zèt n bas m ba raboogo, sẽn yɩɩd f ba n pa wa
Zu-noog soab yoor n kiid-n-bas-a-menga.
A Zozɛf be a Potifaar yiri. B talla a Zozɛf n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽnga. La Ezɩpt tẽng rao a Potifaar sẽn yaa Faarõ sõgen-kãsengã, n leb n yaa gũudbã naabã raa a Zozɛf Ismayɛll buudã neb nengẽ. Yaa Ismayɛll buudã neb n tall a Zozɛf n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽnga. 
La koom n dag n pusgd n yit n zãgsd tẽn-gãongã. Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab yãka tẽngã tom n maan ninsaala. La Wẽnnaam fʋʋsa ninsaal yõ-bogdã pʋga, n ning vɩɩm ninsaal pʋgẽ. La ninsaal lebga nin-vɩɩga. 
Ned kõn bas kur n dig kãan-woabg ye
Roog noor lebgdame tɩ ned noore
Ned sã n yũ rãam n tʋ-f,bɩ f wãb kae n pãb-a.
Dẽ, a Zozɛf raa Ezɩpt tẽngã pʋtã fãa tɩ lebg Faarõ rẽnda. Bala, Ezɩpt tẽngã nebã ned kam fãa koosa a pʋʋgo, komã sẽn dag n namsd bãmbã yĩnga. Dẽ, tẽngã zãng lebga Faarõ rẽnda. A Zozɛf yiisa nebã n tegs b tẽmse, Ezɩpt soolmã tẽms fãa pʋse. 
Tõnd na n yikame n kẽng Betɛlle. D sã n ta be, mam na n lugla tẽn-kugr n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam ning sẽn leok maam m sũ-sãangã wakatã, la b yãag maam m so-toakã pʋgẽ wã.» Bãmb wʋka b wẽn-naandsã b sẽn dag n tarã, ne b tʋblondã n kɩs a Zakoobe. La a Zakoob rɩk-b lame n bus terebẽnt tɩɩsã sẽn pẽ ne Sɩkɛmã tẽngre. 
Zabr sã n ka na n vaal bɩ f reng wẽedo.
La a Yamne basame tι b looge, t’a soos n pυg-ba. B sẽn wa n kẽn n zãage, la b yaool n bãng t’a soos n pυgdame, tι b kell n bas-a t’a tũ.
Kapitɛnd Yɩbryɩɩm TARWAR yãka zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 14 ne a rasem 15 sẽn watã raare, tɩ Burkĩna Faso tẽngã taoor dãmb na n seg taab n dɩk noy tãrãzisẽo wã zãab wɛɛngẽ tɩ b boond tɩ Asɩɩsnasnalle.
Dẽ, b maka kãntɩɩg pisi sẽn sɩng ne roogã yaanga, n bao sɛɛdr ra-pegd n pasg tɩ lebg ro-pʋga, la ra-pegdã tilga tẽng n zẽk n tãag lalgã zãntlem. La b boonda taoor do-kãng tɩ zĩig sẽn welg toor n yɩɩd fãa. 
A sιd kẽe : yolgẽ wã, t’a Yamyιιd maneg a noorã n sẽbg sõama, la a bas n peeg a niigã n looge. Nebã a yiibã me riga yĩisrã, n wa mik tι b pa na n paam-a ye.
B maana kãana, n ning-b n gilg sĩn-bedrã noor zãnga, la kãntɩɩg fãa yaa bãmb piig-piiga. La kãanã yaa ruls a yiibu. B naaga sĩn-bedrã ne kãanã n yõg tɩ kell n yaa bũmb a yembre. Sĩn-bedrã ra roga zũud lols piig la a yiib zugu. Lols a tãab nens ra teesa yaanga, t'a tãab tees nin-taoore, t'a tãab tees goabga, t'a tãab tees rɩtgo, tɩ sĩn-bedrã rog bãmb zugu, la lolsã fãa sees teega taab sĩn-bedrã tẽngre. 
La bɩ f pʋdg kaam a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã zutu, n welg bãmb toor tɩ b maan maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmdã mam waoogr yĩnga. 
Tũnig-y ne sɛg-taabã n wilig neb a taaba yãmb meng sẽn zãms  bũmb ningã.
A nii soaba, nin-zaalsã sula tʋʋm yalsame.
Ba y ya karen-biis sẽn tar neb ka tɛk sẽn get y yelle, Krista tũudma pʋgẽ, bãng-y tɩ y ka tar ba rãmb kʋʋng ye. Yaa maam bal n dog-y Krista buudẽ ne Koe-nooga moonego. 
A Moyiis sẽn maan woto n sɛ, sawaodg waa n luda sɛk roogã, la Sẽn-Ka-Saab ziirã pida sɛk zĩigã. La sawaodgã sã n ka zẽke, bãmb ka yikd ye, bãmb paada beenẽ hal tɩ ta daar ning sawaodgã sẽn na n zẽkã. 
A Davɩɩd kɩtame tɩ b sõd Israyɛll nebã. Daar a yembre, bɛ wã baoome n na n maan Israyɛll nebã wẽnga: A tusa a Davɩɩd t'a na n sõd Israyɛll nebã. Dẽ, a Davɩɩd yeela a Zoaab ne nebã nanambsã yaa: «Kẽng-y n tɩ sõd-y Israyɛll nebã, sẽn sɩng Bɛɛrseba hal n tɩ tãag Dan, la y lebg n wa wilg-m tɩ m bãng b sõore.» 
Ad a Baag zaba ne a yirã rãmba
Bilg-y goam niisa sẽn na n pʋgla sulla neb fãa. Kɩt-y tɩ neba gome. La y wa sõng-b n maan reem d sẽn na n bilg tẽngrã
Katr zakã rãmb sẽn wυm yãbrã, rabeem yõk-b lame, tι katr yeel tι b vaag g ε lã tao, n lob rapoorã. B ra kell ba a ye rυkẽ wã ye. Tι bãmb me sã n wãbe, b na n kiime. Soaamb basame tι zĩigã sobg waa, t'a tι wυk a bũmb n wa wãb ne a zak rãmba. Moos nong n yetame tι sẽn ka tar-a pãng segd n talla yam.
Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ Faarõ keng a sũuri, n ka sak n bas bãmb tɩ b loog ye. 
La daar ning b sẽn segd n tɩ pãbe, m ba a Soaamb bɛngã puudã n sʋʋge, m ba Soaamb yika yibeoog pĩndã, n kẽng n tɩ solg sorã noore, piding poore.
Tigunga rãmb ned a yembr kolga a Pok n yeel-a yaa: “Tõnd datame tɩ foo ne f yaopa wa sõng tõndo n zãms nebã b sẽn na n maan toto n tõog n põs SIDAwã bãagã.
Zabr sã n yik yãmb ne taab sʋka, bõe tɩ y boond taab bʋʋd bu-zẽmba taoore, n ka na n kẽng Wẽnd kamba taoore? Bɩ y yĩmame tɩ yaa bãmb n na n kao dũni wã bʋʋdo? La sã n ya yãmb n na n kao dũni bʋʋdo, bõe tɩ y maand wa y ka tõe n bʋ yell faadã? 
A Zozɛf kẽem-dãmbã wa n kẽnga Sɩkɛm n na n tɩ wãben b ba wã rũm-bãoonego. A Israyɛll yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Fo kẽem-dãmbã bee Sɩkɛm n wãbend rũmsã. Wa tɩ m tʋm-f b nengẽ!» La a Zozɛf yeelame tɩ b tʋm-a. 
La a Abrahaam sẽn zẽk a nengã, a yãnda pe-raoog sẽn be yẽnda poorẽ wã, t'a yɩɩlã gaag kãgre, la a Abrahaam kẽngame n tɩ yõk-a n wa maan maoong n yõog bugum n ledg a biig a Izak zĩigẽ. A Abrahaam pʋda zĩigã yʋʋr tɩ ‹Adonay-Yɩɩre› sẽn dat n togs tɩ ‹Sẽn-Ka-Saab n na n gese.› Rẽ kɩtame tɩ hal tɩ ta rũndã, b ket n yetame tɩ: ‹Sẽn-Ka-Saab tãngã zugu, bãmb geta yelle.› 
Nanamb-kãens rag n kaooda nebã bʋʋd wakat fãa. Bãmb dag n tallda yel-kãsemsã n wat a Moyiis nengẽ, la bãmb mensã rag n kaooda yel-bãoonegã bʋʋdo. Dẽ, a Moyiis basa a rɛɛmbã t'a looge, la a rɛɛmbã lebg n kuila a tẽngẽ. 
 La, vugr bala, zakã lebga kãgre.
A Bekɛɛr kom-dibli yaa a Zemira, a Yowaase, a Eliyezɛɛre, a Eliyohenayi, a Omri, a Yeremote, a Abiya, a Anatote, ne a Alemete. Nin-bãmbã fãa yaa a Bekɛɛr kom-dibli. B sõda bãmb roog-roogo, n yãk-b tɩ b yaa buud nanambse, la gãndaado. B sõorã rag n yaa neb tus pisi la kobessi. 
Tẽms wʋsog pʋsẽ, neba pẽgda pag sẽn ka yita, sẽn maand sɩd ne a sɩdã a yembr bala.
A Enoos vɩɩmã zãng yɩɩ yʋʋm kobs-wɛ la a nu, la a kiime. A Mahalaleyɛll rogmã zugẽ, a Kenan vɩɩmda yʋʋm kobs-nii la pis-naase, la a roga kom-dibli la kom-pugli. 
Dẽ, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sã n wa n pɩʋʋgd n na n sɩbg Ezɩpt nebã, n yãnd zɩɩmã sẽn be y rignoorã ne y lug a yiibã zutã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab na n zʋʋga yãmb dignoorã, la b ka na n bas sãamdã ne toogã t'a kẽ yãmb dotã pʋs ye. 
Yãmb sã n maan woto n sɛ, bɩ f tall a kom-dibli wã n wa n yeelg bãmb b fu-yerdã. 
A Moyiis rɛɛmbã yeela yẽnda yaa: «Fo sẽn maand bũmb ningã ka neer ye. Foom ne neb nins fãa sẽn be ne foomã na n gɩmbame. Bala, tʋʋmdã yɩɩda fo pãnga. Foom f yembr ka tõe n maan yõwã ye. 
A Lot sẽn dag n tũud a Abramã me rag n tara rũm-bãoonego, la rũm-bɛd ne fu-rot me. Tẽngã rag n yaa bilf n ka sekd bãmb b yiibã ye. Bala, bãmb b yiibã arzegsã rag n yaa wʋsg tɩ b ka leb n tõe n zĩnd ne taab ye. 
Ad paoor pa yɩɩd "Fo me waa raag la?"
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 12 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE zĩnda ne kiba-kɩtbã laegm-n-taar sula taoor dãmb tɩ b sõs tẽngã nug gãag wɛɛngẽ.
Capitaine Ibrahim TRAORE wilga VDP rãmbã, tɩ na-kẽnda la b na n dɩk wakat sẽn wat pʋgẽ, n sõng-b b tʋʋmdã wɛɛngẽ.
Nin-kẽem laadg kʋmbr ka moogd ye.
Ti pυg-yãangã leoke: M dat n wãa m maana. La yaa bõe yĩng tι fo yẽ  ket n nan pa gõe?
Sapaolg kiuug rasem 15 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, tẽngã taoor sega neb nins sẽn kẽes b toog n zabd tẽngã fãagr yĩngã.
A Sɩkɛm yamã rag n loee ne a Zakoob biig a Dina. Yẽnda rag n nonga pʋg-sadã hal wʋsgo, rẽ, yẽnda goma gom-nood n na n noog a Dina sũuri. La a Zakoob rag n wʋmame t'a Sɩkɛm sãama yẽnda bi-pugl a Dina, la sẽn seg tɩ yẽnda kom-dibli wã rag n bee weoogẽ wã ne yẽnda rũmsã yĩnga, yẽnda kell n sĩnda a noor n gũ a kambã waoongo. 
La a Rubɛn yeela a baaba yaa: «Mam sã n ka tall a Benzame n lebg n wa, bɩ y kʋ mam kom-dibli a yiibã. Bas-y-yã-a ne maam, la mam na n lebg n tall-a lame n wa kõ-fo.» 
B sõasgã poore, A Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB wilga kiba-kɩtbã, tɩyaa sẽn kẽed ne yõ-koglg kaalmã sẽn be toos a tãabã pʋgẽ wã la b zĩnd ne taab n sõse, n na n ges b sẽn tõe n dɩk rabay ninsi.
Ka tõe n bãng no-bil kõbg sẽn na n yɩ a soab ye
Dẽ, a Leya yeelame: «Ad yaa zu-noog menga.» La a pʋda biigã yʋʋr t'a Gaade . La a Leya yeelame: «Ad maam la sũ-noog soaba! N-yẽe, pagbã fãa na n pʋʋsa maam n yeel tɩ maam la sũ-noog soaba!» La a Leya pʋda bi-kãng yʋʋr t'a Azɛɛre . 
Woto, tõnd na n talla d Wẽnnaamã kaoolã koglgã n kuil d tẽngẽ, bala a Sayull wakatẽ wã, tõnd dag n ka ges a yell neer ye.» Dẽ, a Davɩɩd tigma Israyɛll nebã fãa, sẽn sɩng ne Sihoor sẽn be Ezɩptã, n tãag Hamat tẽngã noore, n na n kɩt tɩ b kẽng Kiryat-Yeyarim n tɩ tall Wẽnnaam kaoolã koglgã n wa. 
La Israyɛll nebã fãa yẽgma ne a Moyiis la a Aarõ we-raoogã pʋgẽ. Israyɛll nebã yeela bãmb yaa: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sã n dag n kʋẽ tõnd Ezɩpt tẽngã wakat ning tõnd sẽn dag n ket n zĩ nemdã rʋgd sɛɛgẽ, la tõnd sẽn dag n dɩt n tɩgdã n são! Bala, yãmb sẽn tall tõnd n wa we-ra-kãngã pʋgẽ wã yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ kom kʋ kʋʋn-kãngã fãa!» 
A Davɩɩd ne Israyɛll nebã fãa kẽnga Baala sẽn be Kiryat-Yeyarim, Zʋʋda soolmẽ wã, n na n tɩ tall Wẽnnaam kaoolã koglgã sẽn be serubẽ-rãmbã zut tɩ b boond Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋrã a zugã, n wa. Dẽ, bãmb dɩka Wẽnnaam kaoolã koglgã sẽn dag n be a Abinadaab zakẽ wã, n dogl terok-paall zugu. La a Uuza ne a Akiyo n dag n kẽnd n yegd terokã la b get a yelle. 
A Yediyayɛll biig yaa a Bilan. A Bilan kom-dibli yaa a Yewuusi, a Benzame, a Ewuudi, a Kenaana, a Zetan, a Tarsɩɩse, ne a Ayisahaare. A Supim la a Hupim dag n yaa a Iir kom-dibli, t'a Husim dag n yaa a Ahɛɛr biiga. 
Naafo : « Fo rɩta bõe ? Bas-m la f yaool n gome »
A wakatẽ wã nin-buiidã ra wilgame tɩ b sũur ka noom ne b sẽn paas-a wã ye.
Bãmb leokame: «Ezɩpt ned a yembr n fãag tõnd dũm-kɩɩmbã nusẽ, n tol n toog koom n yũnug tõnd dũmsã.» A Moyiis sakame n na n zĩnd rao-kãng yirã. La a Rehuwɛll rɩka a bi-pugl a Sefoora n kõ-a t'a maan a paga. 
F sã n yeel tɩ wĩntoog kẽ-f lame, f mikdame tɩ beoog vẽega nina t'a kẽnda
Dẽ, a ma leok-a lame yaa: “Wẽnnaam na n sõng-d lame.“ Dẽ, bãmb b yiiba zĩndame n yãbe
Koe-toagsdbã lebg n wa a Zakoob nengẽ n wa yeel yaa: «Tõnd kẽnga yãmb kẽem a Ezayu nengẽ, la bãmb me yikame n kẽnd n wat n na n seg yãmba. La neb kobs-naas n tũud-ba.» 
Tekrã sẽn maana yaa ministɛɛr ning b sẽn da yãk t’a get leebgã , la ministɛɛr ning sẽn da get zagsã, la tẽnga meebã.
Tɩ, tãoosã zĩẽ n kelgdẽ.
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem a 6 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Kapitɛnd Faruk SORGO, yiisa mooneg koɛɛga.
Rũmsã fãa rag n wat n tigma taab beenẽ, tɩ b bilg kugrã n serg n bas bulgã noore, tɩ b yũnug piisã, la b lebs kugrã n pag bulgã noore. A Zakoob soka pe-kɩɩmbã yaa: «M saam-biisi, yãmb yita yɛɛnẽ?» La pe-kɩɩmbã leokame tɩ bãmb yita Haarã. 
To nodr n sakd rãmsgo
Ned kõn sõng liuul n yãb a biig kʋʋr ye
Walg ka zèta t'a biig keoos ye
Pʋs n seka woto, gomd n pa sɛtẽ soab sã n be y sʋka bɩ a bãng tɩ tõnd ka minim dẽ, la Wẽnd Tigenga me ka minim dẽ ye. 
Bi-bɛɛg sã n be ra-poore, a to n be nin-taore.
Rat n yeel tɩ sull ning sẽn da wẽ a Rok naamã n lubã, yaa sul-kãnga, la ya b yãabã n da ka yɩ a yembre.
Waogdg ne Bobo nin-buiidã yiime n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ Farens sodaasã wʋk b teed n kuli.
Sõs-n-kõ taabã, pʋgẽ, a wilgame tɩ b na n lebg n sigla kaorengã.
La a Izak sẽn zĩnd soolmẽ be n kaoose, daar a yembre, Filistẽ-dãmbã rĩm a Abimelɛk rag n lɩkda roog võorẽ n getẽ, la a yãame t'a Izak reemd ne a pag a Rebeka. 
A sẽn wẽenã poore, tẽngã taoor soab rɩka koɛɛg n wilg tɩ b yãka yam n na pids raab ning bãmb sẽn tik n deeg tẽngã, wala Kapitɛnd Tooma SÃNKAR meng sẽn da wilgi.
Sodom ne Gomoor sãoongo. Malɛgs a yiibã taa Sodom tẽngã wĩndgã kõom wakate. La a Lot dag n zĩi Sodom tẽngã noore. A Lot sẽn yãnd-bã, a yikame n kẽng n na n seg-ba, la a wõgemdame n fõgen a neng tẽnga. A Lot yeela bãmb yaa: «Mam zu-soben-dãmba, mam kot-y lame tɩ y wa sig y tʋmtʋmdã zakẽ n gãand yʋngã, la y waas y naoã, n yaool n sãd beoog n looge.» La raopã zãgsame n yeel tɩ bãmb na n tɩ gãanda zĩ-vɩʋʋgẽ wã. 
Kẽer tẽeme tɩ m ka na n wa y nengẽ n yik n tãoosd daoodo. Yaool n ka na n le kaoos tɩ m ta y nengẽ, Wẽnd sã n sake. Wakat kãng la m bãngd b tɩtaama sã n yita b pãngẽ bɩ sã n teka noor goam bala. 
Neb nins sẽn zĩnd tigsgã pʋgẽ, kell n dɩk noore, «Agtɩkll limor a 6» sẽn be tẽn-kug-bilã pʋgẽ, n wilg tɩ yaa tẽngã bʋ-kaod-ro-kaseng taoor soab n segd n zĩnig tẽngã taoor soaba.
B sõsa ne taab tẽngã nug-gãag sẽn ya a soaba.
Moosã sẽn mi n yetẽ tι f sã n bas f riẽ yaoore, tãmbeok la f gũudã, b pa yag ye. Rat n yet tι fo sã n sãbs bũmbu, f zug sã n pa yi noogo; sẽn pa são rẽ la fna n tι rι.
SIDAwã bãag sãn yõk neda, a soaba ka le toẽ n sãoog ye. Vɩtamɩn  dãmb toẽ n sõngame t’a yĩnga paam pãng bala. Tɩt kẽer me toẽeme n  sõnge t’a soab ninga sẽn tar SIDAwã bãaga bãas kẽer kolog weoogo sãn  ya wa kõsgã, noãdã, wala sãagã.
Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeele : «Ad nob-miidu ».
 M ba Soaamb ne m ba Kãoongo.
Komisɛɛr Apolineer KAFAAND sẽn ya polɩɩs rãmbã kiba-kɩt togsame, tɩ f sã n dat n kõ ned sɩda, rẽnd f reng n bãng a sẽn ya a soaba.
La, a ba wã sɩd kõdga kabrã tomã n lobe.
Bãmb yeela a Moyiis yaa: «Gom ne tõnd f toore, tɩ d na n kelg-f lame. La bɩ Wẽnnaam da gom ne tõnd b toore, tɩ d wa ki ye.» La a Moyiis yeela nebã yaa: «Ra zoe-y rabeem ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam sẽn wa wã yaa sẽn na n mak yãmba, tɩ yãmb zoe bãmb n da maan yel-wẽnã ye.» 
A Eman kom-dibli wã yaa a Bukiya, a Mataniya, a Uziyɛlle, a Sebuwɛlle, a Yerimote, a Hananiya, a Anani, a Eliyata, a Gidalti, a Romamti-Ezɛɛre, a Yosbekasa, a Maloti, a Otiiri, la a Mahaziyote. 
Arzẽk soab a ye kibare.
Tõnd ka ya wa neb wʋsgo sẽn pund koom n paasd Wẽnd gomda ye, ayoo! D yaa neb sẽn pelg b sũuri, n gomd ne Krista sɩda, Wẽnd taoore, wa neb sẽn deeg b tʋʋmda Wẽnd nengẽ. 
Tɩ bõn-kãng wilgdẽ, tɩ fo ka na n maan tõnd wẽnga, wa tõnd me sẽn ka maan foom wẽngã. Tõnd maana foom neer bala, la tõnd basa foom tɩ f loog ne bãane. La moasã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab ninga foom barka.» 
Yʋng na yɩ neer bãngda zĩã-sobdo
Woto wã, da yãg-y ne bʋʋd ye. Bas-y tɩ Soaala wa. Bãmb n na n vẽneg lika zãnga la b puk bũmb ning fãa ninsaal sẽn sed a sũurẽ. Wakat kãng la ned kam fãa na n deeg Wẽnnaam nengẽ, pẽgr ning a sẽn tog ne. 
A pẽ naab n tʋkd a zãr-naab waooga
Masã, SIDAwã bãaga yõka a Poko ma. A yĩnga sɩngame n lobd noada.
Pagã sã n tɩ zãgs t'a ka na n tũ foom n wa, wẽeneg ning mam sẽn kɩt tɩ fo wẽenã taal ka na n zĩnd fo zug ye. La bũmb ning sẽn be bala, ra tall m biigã n kẽng beenẽ ye.» Tʋmtʋmdã rɩka a nug n tik a zu-soab a Abrahaam gerã n wẽen n yeel t'a na n maana wa b sẽn yeelã. 
Rĩm a Salmo mee roog a to sẽn wẽnd ‹Libã tɩɩs roogã›, la ro-kãng rag n bee zak a to pʋgẽ, bʋʋdã roog poore. La a mee ro-kãng buud n kõ Faarõ bi-puglã sẽn dag n yaa yẽnda pagã. La ro-bãmba fãa, sẽn sɩng ne b tẽngrã n tãag b yĩngrã, b talla kug-bɛd sẽn pees tɩ yaa neeba, n me ro-kãense, la ro-yɩngã ne zag-kãsengã pʋgã. 
Tao bal t'a Sika a raagã teed n dιgle, la a bas n kυι tĩig n na n babs poorẽ soomsã. Sasa kãng la a Soaamb tik n yik zãe! N vaag katr yolgã ne a teedã fãa, n tar põe, põe, põe n pãrgd weoogã, n kũiis a yiri, n na n tι rι koodã ne a ma, la a pag la a kamba.
Rιιb me n wa n be ne m zι n yã. Bi zι n yã tõta yãabo. Mam sẽn wa moog yυυm piig la a nu la woto. Mam sẽn di bãmbã buud ka be tεk ye.
A kolem dagre, n do a Tão-la-f-yẽke.
B tʋʋma zĩisi, yaa sodaasã sull taoor soab n yãk-b n tʋmẽ la b kẽnda.
Dẽ wã, bɩ f bao tɩɩg raad sẽn tar pãng n maan koom koglg f mengã yĩnga. Fo tog n maana koom koglgã, t'a tar pʋse. La f bao sũud n bol a pʋgã ne a yɩngã. Ad fo sẽn na n maan koom koglgã to-to: Koom koglgã woglem tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg kobs-tã, t'a yalmã yɩ kãntɩɩg pis-nu, t'a zãntlmã yɩ kãntɩɩg pis-tã. 
Yʋʋm a yopoe soabã, bɩ f bas-a t'a vʋʋse, tɩ naong rãmbã sẽn be ne foomã wʋk n dɩ, tɩ we-rũms rɩ bãmb sẽn bas bũmb ninsã. Maan woto ne f reezẽ tɩɩs pʋʋgo, la f oliiv tɩɩsã me. Maan f tʋʋmdã rasem a yoobe, la rasem a yopoe wã daare, tog n yɩɩ vʋʋsg daar fo yĩnga, tɩ fo loalga, ne f bõang me vʋʋse, tɩ f yem-poak biig ne f sãan me paam n vʋʋse.» 
Ned pa yõgd a pag ma n le bʋ a pag paab ye
Sayɛll soolmã karen-biis yiime n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ b pak b karen-dotã.
Neb nins sẽn wilg tɩ b pa le naag Mpp pagtɩ wã sʋka, d tõe n sõdga miniisr ning sẽn da get zamaan- zẽns zoodã, a Alfa Baari, la miniisr ning sẽn da get kʋʋra wã, a BasirYɩsmayɛll Wedraoogo, la depite kʋdg a Lasina Wattara.
A Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdã wudgame n seg-a n yeel-a: «Mam kotame tɩ f kõ-m f yʋʋrã koom bilf tɩ m yũ.» La pʋg-sadã leokame: «M zu-soaba, yũ-y-yã!» La a kɩlla a yʋʋrã noor tao-tao n kõ tʋmtʋmdã koomã t'a yũ. 
B talla sãnem halaal n maan fɩtl dogends piiga, n ning a nu ro-taoorã sẽn yaa zĩig sẽn welg toor n yɩɩdã rĩgnoorã rɩtgo, la b ning a nu goabga, ne tɩ-puudã, la fɩtl-dãmbã ne b sãnem gãtsã, ne la-bãoonegã, la sʋʋsã, ne zɩɩm mesb laasã, ne tʋgdã, la wisd yõogr laasã sẽn maan ne sãnem halaalã, ne sãnem kʋɩlems wẽnemdedse, ro-taoorã sẽn yaa zĩig sẽn welg toor n yɩɩdã yĩnga, la ro-yɩngã kʋɩlemsã fãa yaa sãnem. 
Ministɛɛr ning sẽn get kaorengã yell togsa tʋʋmdã b sẽn siglg toto yʋʋm 2022 la yʋʋm 2023 soabã.
Pipi serubẽ wã pɩgsr a yembr woglem yaa kãntɩɩg a nu, t'a ye wã me woglem yaa kãntɩɩg a nu. Dẽ, sẽn sɩng ne pɩgsr a yembrã satmẽ n tɩ tãag a to wã satmẽ wã, yaa kãntɩɩg piiga. 
Ziri sã n tũud sore, sɩd baooda moogo
La yẽnda yika beenẽ n viig a fu-roogã, n kẽng tãmsã sẽn be Betɛll tẽngã yaanga. Yẽnda tɩ tilga a fu-roogã Betɛll ne Ayi sʋka, tɩ Betɛll be nin-taoor tɩ Ayi be yaanga. A Abram mee tẽn-kugr beenẽ Sẽn-Ka-Saab yĩnga, n pʋʋs ne Sẽn-Ka-Saab yʋʋre. A Abram leb n yii beenẽ n tees  Negɛɛv  sẽnẽ, n kẽnd la a yalsd zĩig-zĩiga. 
B na n pʋɩ-b-la tẽngã we-n-vɩɩs a naasã pʋgẽ.
Bɩ Faarõ sɩng moasã n yãk neb n kõ-b noor soolmã pʋgẽ, tɩ tɩgrã sẽn na n zĩnd yʋʋm a yopoe wã pʋgẽ wã, bɩ b reeg koodã peoog a nu sʋk fãa peoog a yembre. La tɩgrã sẽn na n zĩnd yʋʋm a yopoe wã pʋgẽ, bɩ bãmb tigs koodã fãa, n wa kɩs Faarõ t'a kɩt tɩ rɩɩb zĩnd tẽngã fãa pʋgẽ, n kɩt tɩ b gũ. 
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 15 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, Burkĩna Faso tẽngã rãmb maana a Tooma SÃNKAR kũumã yʋʋm 35 tẽegre.
A Moyiis yeela nebã yaa: «Da zoe-y rabeem ye. Yaas-y n ges-y fãagr ning Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn na n fãag yãmb dũndã wã. Bala, Ezɩpt neb nins yãmb sẽn ne rũndã wã, yãmb kõn leb n yãnd bãmb abada. 
Beoogã sẽn vẽege, Faarõ pɛlengã yɩkame t'a kɩt tɩ b bool tɩtã-rãmb fãa ne Ezɩpt tẽngã tɩtã-rãmb zãng tɩ b wa. La Faarõ togsa bãmb yẽnda zãmsdã sẽn yɩ to-to. La bãmb ned baa a yembr ka tõog n na n bilg zãmsd baa a yembr võor n kõ Faarõ ye. Dẽ, sõgen-kãsengã sẽn yaa bõn-yũudlã kɩtã goma ne Faarõ n yeele: «Rũndã, mam na n tẽega m kongrã yelle! 
Dẽ wã, bɩ f wẽen ne Wẽnnaam yʋʋre, tɩ f ka na n zãmb maam bɩ m kambã, wall mam yagensã ye. La tɩ fo na n maana maam ne soolem ning fo sẽn yaa sãan a pʋgẽ wã neere, wa mam sẽn maan foom neerã.» A Abrahaam yeelame: «Mam na n wẽena woto.» 
Ned pa tuud yaad t'a ma wa ki n kong yaoog ye
La vẽkembeoogo, bi-pugl-kãsmã yeela a yao-bi-puglã yaa: «Yʋngẽ, mam kẽe ne m baaba. Wa tɩ d leb n yũnug-b rãam yʋngã tɩ fo kẽng n tɩ kẽ ne-ba, sẽn na yɩl tɩ d ba wã paam yagense.» Badaar yʋngo, bãmb leb n yũnuga b ba wã rãam, la yao-bi-puglã kẽe n gãanda ne a ba wã. La a ba wã ka bãng wakat ning yẽnda sẽn gãande, la a sẽn yik wakat ning ye. 
Bala, b reega pʋʋgã ne tãn-bokã sẽn be beenẽ wã n da Hɛt nebã nengẽ.» A Zakoob sẽn gom ne a kambã woto n sɛ, a rʋʋsa a naoã a gãagã zugu, la a kiime tɩ b mum-a n naag a saam-dãmbã. 
Sã n ya ne naabã menga, yẽ ra tagsdame tι raar ninga, nebã tek n basa a Yamyιιd t’a põse, la a sẽn lebg n wa wã. La a Yamyιιd taame waa, n pυυs naaba, la a yeel-a: Naaba, ad m wat n na n bãnga y keelem yaa, la m pυυs m zaamẽ beoogo.
Bark ka sũ-ki-neda. Ned sã n paam bũmbu, zabd-a lame. La bũmb ning sẽn  wa n ti zabd-a n yιιda, yaa tι b ba wã kũum poore, naamã na n põsg-a lame.
Tʋʋmdã sɩngrẽ, yɩɩ Asãmble wã seb -gʋnd-kaseng n dɩk koɛɛga, tɩ tʋʋmdã sɩnge.
Burkĩna Faso sodaasã yiisa mooneg koɛɛg n wilg tɩ  b rata neb 15000 sẽn na n sak n kõ b mens ne yamleoog n zab n fãag tẽngã.
Gosneerã taoor soab kẽnga taoor n wilg tɩ gosne-kãngã, yaa tʋlsem a tãab la b rat a pʋgẽ.
Wãb yamdã wala f sẽn date, tι yell kae ye.  Mik rẽ fãa yaa a sẽn da zoet rabeem masã wã, n tagsdẽ t’a sã n zab ne soaamba, a na n tees-a-la ne a nug-bilã t’a põogã.
Tẽegre, yɩɩ wao-fugdg kiuug rasem 24 yʋʋm 2016 soabã, la Burkĩna Faso bʋ-kaoodbã pa sak kɛgr sull kẽ gẽeb pʋgẽ, n wilg tɩ b ratame tɩ bʋ-kaood roogã soog a menga.
Rĩm a Akaab ne a tãb-biisã yii wĩnto-sʋk n na n tɩ zabe. Wakat-kãnga, rẽ t'a Bɛn-Hadaad ne nanambs pis-tã la a yiibã sẽn wa n na n sõng yẽnda wã rag n zĩi zãnã tẽngr n yũud rãam tɩ b nems yilimdẽ. Israyɛll soda-kom-bɩɩsã n deng yi. A Bɛn-Hadaad tʋmame tɩ b tɩ ges n bãng yɛlã sẽn yaa to-to, la b togs-a lame tɩ neb n yi Samaari n watẽ. 
Koaadbã sẽn pa tar bãngr sõma koobã la gʋʋlgã wɛɛngẽ wã, kɩtame tɩ rũm-bãasã kʋʋd b rũmsã.
Yẽnda soaalã rag n nong-a lame, la a kɩtame t'a Zozɛf tʋmd yẽnda tʋʋma, la a kɩt t'a lebg yẽnda zakã yel-gɛta, la a rɩk a bũmbã fãa n ning a Zozɛf nugẽ. 
Ra sɩɩs-m yaa raag kɩrenga.
Ning f meng f to zĩigẽ
Neb nins fãa sẽn dag n yi n kẽng tẽngã noorã saka a Hamoor ne a biig a Sɩkɛm sẽn yeelã. Dẽ, b kẽesa tẽngã raop nins fãa sẽn dag n be-b tẽngã noorã bãongo. La ra-tãtẽ daar sẽn ta, tɩ bãongã ket n zabdẽ, a Zakoob kamb a yiibã, a Sɩmyõ ne a Leevi sẽn yaa a Dina tãopã yikame n bob b zabr sʋʋs n soos n kẽ tẽngã tɩ ned ka bãng ye, la b kʋʋ tẽngã raopã fãa. 
Zu-bʋko, beene b ra ka tar tɩɩm sẽn toẽ n zab ne SIDAwã bãaga bil ye.
Ned pa tog n yĩm a som-soab ye
Rĩm a Faarõ leb n lebsa bõn-yũudl kɩtã a tʋʋmdã pʋga, tɩ yẽnda leb n kɩt Faarõ a bõn-yũudlã. La bõn-yũudlã kɩtã ka tẽeg a Zozɛf yell ye. Yẽnda yĩma a Zozɛf yelle. 
Tɩ bala, sẽn sɩng ne sigr kiuug yʋʋm 2021 sẽn loogã bãmb a pagtɩ wã taoor dãmb ra sɩbga a Edi Kõmbeoogo t’a ka segd n naag pagtɩ wã no-rɩkr pʋgẽ kiis a yoob tõore.
A Ɛtsron bi-kãseng a Yerameyɛll kom-dibli la woto: yaa a bi-kãseng a Ram, ne a Buna, la a Orɛn ne a Otsɛm la a Ayiya. A Yerameyɛll bi-kãseng a Ram kom-dibli rag n yaa a Maats ne a Yamin la a Ekɛɛre. 
Nif la zaka
 La rao wã, sẽn da tar sulg-m-meng yĩnga, kɩtame, tɩ nebã ra waoogd-a.
Ka-ra-bed-la-bugum ye.
La, daar a ye, a wa n kẽnga zĩigẽ wã, n na n tɩ tãoose.
Yãmb maanda a  wãn n sõng komdibliwã ne kompugliwã tɩ b gũus ne ninkãensa  buudu?
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 25 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, kibay ra yiime n wilg neb nins b sẽn yãk tɩ b na n zĩnd ministɛɛr dãmbã taoore.
Vɩʋʋg pa reld ye
Moasã, tõnd Wẽnnaam, tõnd pʋʋsda yãmb barka, la d balemda yãmb yʋʋrã sẽn tar ziirã. Tõnd yaa sãamb la nin-loogds yãmb taoore, wa d yaab-rãmbã fãa. Tõnd vɩɩmã dũniyã zug ka yaa wa sulunsuku, tɩ tẽeb kaẽ ye. 
Noaag sã n ka ki, a gɛl ka põogd ye.
Wakat-kãnga, Sẽn-Ka-Saab yeela b no-rɛɛsdbã ned a yembr t'a yeel a to wã yaa: «M kot-f lame tɩ f wẽ-ma!» La a yembrã zãgsame t'a ka na n wẽ-a ye. Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-kãng leb n yãnda ned a to n yeel-a: «M kotame tɩ f wẽ-ma!» La yẽnda wẽ-a lame n pogle. 
Sodaasã sull b sẽn zĩnigã, a na n zĩnda Tamale Gãna tẽng a ye pʋga, la kibayã baoob sull na n n zĩnda Waogdgo, Burkĩna Faso na-tẽngã .
La maoong ning sẽn wilgd tɩ b ninga maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd bãmb zutã nemdã ne burã sã n kell n vẽeg beoogo, bɩ b yõog-a bugum. Bɩ y ra rɩ-a ye. Bala, yaa bũmb sẽn welg toore. 
A Eleyazaar kiime n ka tol n paam bi-ribl ye. Yẽnda roga kom-pugli bala. La yaa a Kiis kom-dibli wã sẽn yaa bãmb ba-biisã n dag n peeg bãmb n maan b pagba. Nin-bãmbã n dag n yaa Leevi buudã neb b sẽn sõd roog-roogo, ne b buudã kãsem-dãmbã, neb nins b sẽn sõde, n bool b yʋyã kãsem-kãsmã. Sẽn tar-b yʋʋm pisi la sẽn yɩɩd dẽ wã n dag n get Sẽn-Ka-Saab roogã yelle. 
«Rɩk parfẽ buud toor-toor sẽn yaa sõama wʋsgo, rɩk miir halaal kɩlo a nii la garem koabg la pis-nii la a nu, la sinamom sẽn tar yũ-noog sẽn zems miirã zɩslem pʋɩ-sʋka, sẽn dat n togs tɩ kɩlo a naase la garem pis-wɛ la a tãabo, la parfẽ sẽn tar yũ-noog sẽn zems kɩlo a naase, la garem pis-wɛ la a tãabo, 
Woto wã, tõnd sẽn paam tʋʋmd kãng ne Wẽnnaam nimbãan-zoeere sẽn maneg tõndo, tõnd ka mi tadgr ye. D sẽn moond Koɛɛg ninga sã n ket n ka vẽenega, yaa ne neb niyns sẽn kẽed-b moogã la a ka vẽenega. 
Ra-wẽng n mi a sẽn na n maan tɩ pag sak-a
La saagr bee wʋsgo tɩ y sẽn naag tõnd n namsã, y na naag n kɩdem sũ-noog ne do. Sɩda tõnd meng d toore n sak tɩ b paalg tõnd d kũum bʋʋdo la woto d bãngame tɩ d ka tog n teeg d meng ye. Yaa Wẽnd la d tog n teeg tɩ bãmb n vʋʋgd sẽn ki. 
Raopã ne pagbã fãa sẽn dag n tar sũ-noog tɩ kõ wã talla kũun n wa: kẽer yaa sogdse, kẽer yaa tʋb-londo, kẽer yaa nug-bĩnsi, kẽer yaa yãndo, yaa sãnem teed buud toor-toor fãa, ne neb nins fãa sẽn dɩk b sãnem n wa kõ Sẽn-Ka-Saabã. La neb nins fãa sẽn dag n tar gĩsã waa ne gĩs sẽn yaa kẽeg haoo, la gĩs-moaam ne gĩs-miid la lamd gĩs-bãanega, ne bʋʋs kõbd la pe-raad gãnd sẽn moneme, la dofẽ-rãmb gãndo. 
A Davɩɩd yeela Wẽnnaam yaa: «Mam maana yel-kãseng ne bũmb ning mam sẽn maanã. Moasã, m kot-y lame tɩ y kõ mam sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã sugr a beegrã yĩnga, bala, mam sẽn maanã yaa yalemd meng-menga.» Kẽng n tɩ yeel a Davɩɩd tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab yetame yaa: Mam ningda tood a tãab fo taoore. Yãk a yembr bãmb sʋkã, tɩ m sɩbg-f ne to-kãnga. 
Zakã noor da-lugdsã yaa a naas ne b zũud nao a naase. Bãmb yagendsã maana ne wanzuri. B bãensã rag n yaa wanzuri, la b rag n bolga b pugli wã ne wanzuri. B rag n maana sɛk roogã biili wã fãa, ne zakã sẽn gilg yẽnda wã biili fãa ne zũudu. 
Ned pa tʋmd noaag t'a ra nemd ye
Woto, Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab kɩtame tɩ gõe-kãseng yõk ninsaal t'a gũsi. Dẽ, Wẽnnaam yãka ninsaal sĩif kõbr a yembre, la b lebs nemdã n page. 
Yaa woto la b gʋlsyã: Sẽn deeg-a wʋsgo ka paam tɩ yõsg ye, la sẽn deeg-a bilf me ka yãe tɩ paoog-a ye. D yãka d saam-biig a ye t'a yãag-a; kristneba fãa pẽgda nin-kãng sẽn tʋm tʋʋmd ninga Koe-nooga yĩnga; 
a lebga lakr kugri, lak-n-lʋɩ pĩiga. Kɩɩsdba lakd-a lame tɩ b pa tẽ Gomda ye, la lakra la bãmb me pʋɩɩre. La yãmba, yãmb yaa buud Wẽnd sẽn welg tore, buud sẽn paam maan-kʋʋr naam, buud sõngo Wẽnd sẽn tũus n na n kils Ned ninga sẽn yisa yãmb likĩ n kẽes-y vẽenem sẽn ka taar pʋgẽ. 
Mam na n kenga Faarõ sũuri, t'a yik n pʋgl yãmba. Mam na n paama waoogr Faarõ ne a tãb-biisã fãa yĩnga, la Ezɩpt nebã na n bãngame tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» Dẽ, Israyɛll nebã maana a woto. 
La a Leya leoka a Rasɛll n yeele: «Fo sẽn deeg mam sɩdã n bas-ma ka sek foom, tɩ f rat n deeg m biigã mandragoor me n paase?» Dẽ, a Rasɛll yeelame: «Beneere! Kõ maam f biigã mandragoorã, la yʋngã, a Zakoob na n wa gãanda ne foom.» 
Ra-koẽeng kaoos koomẽ me a kõn lebg yẽbg ye
F sã n vʋʋg ned yoore, f pag la a yõgda
Polɩɩsã taoor dãmb sega kiba-kɩtbã.
M yak paam soaamba, m paam zẽedo
 B sẽn wa n tar gõob weoogã pʋga, m ba Soaamb wa n yeela m ba Laabo, t’a tees nug-goabga, tɩ yẽ tees nug-rɩtgo.
Fo na n yũuda ko-soogã koom, la mam na n kɩtame tɩ gãabd wat n kõt foom dɩɩb beenẽ.» La sẽn wa n kaoos bilfu, ko-soogã koom sɛɛme, bala saag ka tol n ni tẽngã ye. 
Gosneerã taoor soab reega a tʋʋm sɩngr sebre.
Metr Apolineer KELEM wilgame tɩ b pa tõe n zã tẽngã ne na-kẽndr a to n zʋʋg Kapitɛnd Tooma SÃNKAR sẽn da gãneg na-kẽnda ninsã ye.
La yaa Gosɛn tẽngã pʋg bal la sapɩlmã ka ni. Yaa beenẽ la Israyɛll nebã rag n be.» Dẽ, Faarõ kɩtame tɩ b bool a Moyiis ne a Aarõ, la a yeel-b lame yaa: «So-kãngã, mam beegame. Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa tɩrga, la yaa maam ne m nebã n konge. 
Dũniyã sẽn na n zĩnd tɛka,  bʋdb wakat ne tigsg wakat kõn kong ye. Waood wakat ne tʋʋlg wakat kõn kong ye. Sẽoog ne sɩpaolg na n zĩndame. Wĩntoog ne yʋng na n kell n zĩndame.» 
Zɛ bĩnd n tɩ kẽ yẽd-nifẽ
Ned sã n wẽ a ba bɩ a ma, bɩ b kʋ-a. Ned sã n tʋʋs a ba bɩ a ma, bɩ b kʋ-a. 
Ka-koaad sɩlem pa yɩɩd saag ye
Wakat-kãnga, rao wã kẽem bãnga a yamẽ, t’a yao wã bee yell pʋga.
A Roboaam vɩɩmã tɛka, yẽnda ne a Zeroboaam dag n zabda taaba. A Abiyam saka a saam-dãmba, la b mum-a-la a Davɩɩd tẽngã pʋga. La a biig a Aaza n led a zĩigẽ n dɩ naamã. 
Sullã rãmb wilgame tɩ b sũur yaa noog ne gosne-paallã, a sẽn zoe n mi karenzi wã zu-loees tiirã.
Ad yãmb sẽn na n dɩ-a to-to: Sẽb-y y sẽbdga, la y wid y neooda, tɩ y dasaarã be y nugẽ. Rɩ-y-yã-a ne yãgbo. Sẽn-Ka-Saab Pak tigrã la woto. 
Rubɛn, fo yaa mam bi-kãsenga,  n yaa mam pãnga, la mam bi-bɩɩlem wakatẽ bi-rẽenga. Fo tara ziir n yɩɩda, la f tar pãng n yɩɩda. A Sɩmyõ ne a Leevi yaa ma-biisi.  Bãmb tara b sʋʋs n maand nen-kegl-tʋʋma. 
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ nebã rɩk we-raoogã sor ning sẽn dabd-a rudum ko-kãsengã sẽnẽ wã. Israyɛll nebã tonga taab tãb-bi-sull-sull n yi Ezɩpt tẽngã. 
Yoaad a yembr kibare
Yʋng koom zãgsda noorẽ.
B sã n wa gomd m ba Katr yell fãa, yaa sẽn na n gom a yalemdã yelle, bι a yã-raoogã yelle. Nebã fãa pυs n ninga b yamẽ wã tι katr yalemdã yaa wala b Wυg n so-a lame, t'a koko-raoogã yaa wala kurg naoore. A Sιd nonga rιιbo, la mik a tara rabaar me.
Yũbl-n-be tɩ lar bugda.
Bɩ f welg pe-raoogã yãoog ne a gerã b sẽn zẽk n yuumã toore. Yaa pe-raoog ning b sẽn kʋ wakat ning b sẽn ning maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmdã a Aarõ ne a kom-dibli wã zutã. 
Gãabg yeelame tɩ ned sã n deem n lobg bɩ f reem n yɩke.
A Zakoob biig a Zʋʋda yagense. A Zakoob b sẽn boond-a soab t'a Israyɛllã kamb la woto: A Rubɛn, a Sɩmyõ, a Leevi, a Zʋʋda, a Yisakaare, a Zabulõ, a Dan, a Zozefo, a Benzame, a Neftali, la a Gaad ne a Asɛɛre. 
A Yeroham biig a Yibneya, a Uuzi biig a Ela, a Mikri biig a Uuzi, ne a Sefatiya biig a Mesulam sẽn yaa a Sefatiya biiga, n leb n yaa a Rehuwɛll yagenga, la a Yibneya yagen-tʋbrakẽega, Maan-kʋʋdbã rag n yaa a Yedaya, a Yehoyariibi, n paas a Yakin, 
Pag a ye, n wa n be tẽng a yembr pʋgẽ.
Ad bũmb ning a Zozɛf sẽn tʋm tɩ b tɩ kõ a ba wã: Yaa bõens piig sẽn zɩt Ezɩpt tẽngã bõn-sõama buud fãa, la bõn-yãans piig sẽn zɩlg koodo, rɩɩbo, n paas rɩɩb ning a ba wã sẽn na n dɩk sorã n wa wã yĩnga. 
A wakatã gosneer wilgame tɩ yaa sẽn tũ ne Risi la Yikɛrɛnd zabrã, n kɩt t’a ligd paas ãndũni wã fãa pʋgẽ.
Ned sãn mõdg yãmb n gãand-yã, bɩ y zoe n tɩ mak n gese.  Lagem-taaba a woto tõe n waa ne pɔglogo taoorã tɩ bãaga bil  kel n tu n kẽ yĩnga pʋgẽ naana naana.
B sẽn wa ta minit 72 soab zĩigẽ, Komoor bal-tãod n maan kongr ne Burkĩna Faso bal-tãood a Sɛk Gibril Wattara zugu, tɩ sẽn get-a ballã bʋʋd kaoob wilg tɩ yaa rɩgl n wẽ b sẽn boond tɩ penalti wã.
a soab tʋʋmda na puki; Raara-raare a na vẽnege: Bugum n na n vẽneg yɛlã, bugum n na n wilg ned kam fãa tʋʋmd sõmblem. Bugum sã n dɩ, rolb me sɛ yã. Tʋʋmda soab na põse la na yɩ wala a tũu bugmẽ n looge. 
A nii soaba, nin-zaalsã sula tʋʋm yalsame.
Dɩk-y weer n pʋʋse yamyãkawã  yĩnga la y pʋʋs taab yĩnga. Karensaamba tõe n kɩtame tɩ pʋʋsga  yɩ sul bedrã wala sul bõones pʋsẽ.
Yẽnda mikame tɩ zĩig ning yẽnda sẽn be  wã yaa sõama. La tẽngã yaa noogo. Yẽnda kɩlla a bãok tɩ b zɩlg-a zɩɩbo, la a kẽesa a meng yembd tʋʋm-wɛgl pʋga. A Dan na n yɩɩ a nebã bʋ-kaooda,  wa Israyɛll buud a taabã. 
Karensaamba yeele: “Rũng n  dũm a Abdu.” Ned ninga sẽn tar “Weooga” bãnda kẽ neba sʋka; a  sẽn zab ne sodaasa wakat bilfu, sodaasa tõog-a la me n yiis-a  yɩnga.
Ned ka tõe n kɩɩs tɩ wẽn-tũudbã yel-soalmã ka bõn-kãseng ye.  Kirisi, soab ning sẽn dɩk yĩng tɩ neb yãnd-a wã, soab ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn kɩs a kaset-sõngã, b puka b meng ne malegsã, neb moona b yellã buud toay-toayã sʋka, la tẽng zug ka, neb tẽ-b lame, la b paama zẽkre, la ziiri. 
A kis to kõeebre, n yaol n pẽgl f rɩl bokẽ.
Bɩ ned da tũ foom n dʋ tãngã ye, la bɩ ned da kẽng n ta zĩig baa a yembr tãngã zug me ye. La sẽn paase, bɩ rũm-bãooneg ne rũm-bɛd me ra kolg tãngã pend n wãb yamd ye.» 
A Abrahaam yeelame yaa: «Mam Zu-soaba, m kot-y lame tɩ y ra yik y sũur ye, tɩ m leb n gom ne-yã. La sã n mikame tɩ nin-tɩrs pis-tã n be beenẽ.» La Zu-soabã yeelame: «Mam sã n yãnd nin-tɩrs pis-tã beenẽ, mam kõn maan tẽngã bũmb ye.» 
Sɩda, yaa ne yam-yoodre, ne sũ-weoogre, n paas nintãm la m gʋls yãmba la m da pa maan dẽ n na n sãam y sũur ye; yɩla y bãng nonglem kãseng ning sẽn be m sũurẽ y yĩnga. B sẽn pʋs n na n kõ-a sugr la raoodo n são, sã n ka rẽ a sũ-sãanga wat n loogame. 
A Semaya kom-dibli wã la woto: yaa a Otini, a Refayɛlle, a Obɛɛde, a Ɛlzabaad ne yaopã sẽn yaa gãndaadã: a Elihu ne a Semakiya. A Meselemiya rag n tara kom-dibli la ba-biis sẽn yaa gãndaado, la b sõorã rag n yaa neb piig la a nii. 
A koeesã baasgẽ, a kosa a tʋmd-n-taasã tɩ b zãag b mens ne welg-taabã, la b kõ b mens n tʋm tẽngã na kẽng taoor yĩngaKibarã yii Peremye Ministɛɛrã kiba-kɩtb nengẽ.
Dẽ, a Abrahaam yeela a tʋmtʋmdbã yaa: «Bɩ Yãmb pa ka ne bõangã, tɩ maam ne bi-bɩɩgã na n kẽnga tãngã zug n tɩ pʋʋs Wẽnnaam la d lebg n wa paam yãmba.» A Abrahaam rɩka maoong sẽn yõogd bugmã raadã n tʋk a biig a Izake, la a rɩk bugmã ne sʋʋgã n zãad a nugẽ. Dẽ, bãmb b yiibã rag n tũuda taab n kẽnda. 
B wilgame tɩ b sẽn kõ sor tɩ nin-buiidã tõe n gʋls a meng ne yamleoog sõng sodaasã ne zabrã, yaa sẽn na kɩt tɩ ned kam fãa tõog n kẽes a toogo, a tẽngã fãagr pʋgẽ.
Leb n yaa sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ fo togs f kambã ne f yagensã mam sẽn maan Ezɩpt nebã bũmb ninga, la bõn-yɛɛsds nins mam sẽn maan bãmb sʋkã. Woto, yãmb na bãng tɩ mam yaa Sẽn-Ka-Saabo.» 
Kibarã yii na-zakẽ kiba-kɩtba nengẽ.
La a Lot pẽdga bãmb hal wʋsgo, tɩ b kong n wẽnemd n tũ yẽnda n na n kuil a yirã. A Lot maana tigr bãmb yĩnga, n maan bur sẽn ka ning rã-bɩll n kõ bãmba, la b rɩɩme. Wakat ning bãmb sẽn dag n nan ka kẽ gãagã, Sodom tẽngã nebã fãa gilli, sẽn sɩng ne b kom-bɩɩs tɩ tãag b nin-kẽembã wa n gũbga roog ning bãmb sẽn be wã. 
T’a sig n dɩk a guugã, n kẽ n pãb noosã, n kʋ, n wʋk n sui a waoogẽ, n kuil n tɩ kõ a paga, t’a maneg n dʋg tɩ b wãbe.
Ned nug pa põogd t'a kʋʋg n lob ye
Kelems sẽn tat yɩɩg na n zĩnda Ezɩpt tẽngã zĩigã fãa. A buud nan ka zĩndi, la a kõn tol n leb n zĩnd abada. La sã n yaa ne Israyɛll nebã sẽn beẽ wã, baag meng ka na n wes ned wall rũng ye. Sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ yãmb bãng tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab welga Ezɩpt nebã ne Israyɛll nebã toore.› » 
Ezɩpt rĩm a Faarõ dag n kẽng n tɩ zab n tõoga Gezɛɛr tẽngã n ning-a bugum, la a kʋ Kana nebã sẽn dag n be a pʋgẽ wã. La a rag n dɩka tẽn-kãng n kõ a bi-pugl ning sẽn yaa rĩm a Salmo pagã, a kuilsgã wakate. la Baalat ne Tadmoor tẽngã zĩig ning sẽn be we-raoogẽ wã. 
Yaa tõnd la Wẽnd tũ a Vʋʋsem Sõng vẽnegre n wilgi, la sɩda, a Vʋʋsem Sõng vɛɛsda fãa n tãag sẽn zulem Wẽnnẽ. Ãnd n be ninsaalb sʋka n mi ninsaal yalẽ tɩ ka tũ ne yam ninga ninsaal sẽn tarã? Wot-ome ned ka mi sẽn solg Wẽnd nengẽ sã n ka Wẽnd Vʋʋsem. 
Bi-peelgã zinda a ma wã poorẽ n yeele: Lebg-y tι d kuli. Lebg-y tι d kul tι mam Zoe n tara yυυre.
Rĩm a Salmo yalsa Sẽn-Ka-Saab tẽn-kugrã taoore, tɩ b nengã tees Israyɛll nebã fãa. La a zẽka a nus n tees yĩngr n yeele: Yãmb pidsa kãab-noog ning yãmb sẽn dag n kãab m ba a Davɩɩd sẽn yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdã. Yãmb noorã sẽn yeel bũmb ninsã, yãmb pids-b-la rũndã ne yãmb meng nusi. 
Maan yɩɩl a kɩremsã gõdgr zĩis a naasẽ wã. Maan-a yɩɩlã tɩ b yɩ yembr ne tẽn-kugrã, la f bolg-a ne zũudu. 
Ned ka tõe n bãng nao-goal-koomẽ ye.
Wakat-kãng tɩ nin-wobd bee dũniyã zugu, la b kell n zĩnda rẽ zugẽ me. Wẽnnaam kom-dibli wã sẽn wa n dɩgs ninsaalbã kom-pugli wã n maan b pagbã, b kẽe ne-ba, la b roga kamb n kõ-ba. Yaa kom-bãmb n dag n yaa kʋdem-wẽndẽ gãndaado, la b yɩɩ neb yʋʋr sẽn yi. Sẽn-Ka-Saab gesame tɩ ninsaalbã wẽngã lebga wʋsg dũniyã zugu, la daar fãa, ninsaal tagsda wẽng maaneg yell bala. 
Moasã, fo kamb a yiibã fo sẽn dog Ezɩpt soolmẽ wã sẽn deng mam sẽn na n wa fo nengẽ wã na n lebga mam dẽnda. Yaa a Efrayiim ne a Manaase, wa a Rubɛn ne a Sɩmyõ. La fo sẽn yaool n dog kamb nins bãmb zugẽ wã na n yɩɩ fo rẽnda. Bãmb na n naaga b ba-biisã n paam pʋɩɩre. 
Dẽ, bãmb leb n yeela yẽnda yaa: «Lebs n tʋm f nugã f yãoogẽ wã.» La yẽnda lebs n tʋma a nugã a yãoogẽ wã. La a sẽn yiis a nugã n gese, a mikame t'a nugã leb n lebga wa yẽnda yĩngã fãa. 
Bãmb sẽn wa n be so-toakã zugu, Sẽn-Ka-Saab sega a Moyiis sikã zĩigẽ, n baood n na n kʋ-a. La a Sefoora rɩka kug-sɩleng n wãag a biigã yo-gãongo, n sɩɩs a Moyiis naoã la a yetẽ: «Fo yaa mam zɩɩm sɩda!» 
A Rebeka yẽ la sẽn yas yãmb taoorã la, peeg-y-yã-a n tall n looge, t'a tõe n tɩ yɩ yãmb soaalã bi-ribl paga, wa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yeelã.» A Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdã sẽn wʋm a Labã ne a Betuwɛll sẽn gom woto wã, yẽnda wõgemda Sẽn-Ka-Saab taoore. 
Bi-bɩɩg ning sẽn dag n zãad-a a Sayull zab-teedã sẽn yã t'a Sayull kiime, yẽnda me rɩka a sʋʋgã n tilg n bas a meng n lʋɩ a zug n ki. Vẽkembeoogo, Filistẽ-dãmbã wa n wʋka sẽn ki-bã teedo, la bãmb yãnda a Sayull ne a kom-dibli wã sẽn ki n dɩg Gilboa tãngã zugu. 
Zaabr sẽn ta, kodens n wa n lud sik zĩigã. La vẽkembeoogo, meenem n gãneg zĩigã fãa sẽn gilg sik zĩigã. La meenemã sẽn wa n mesge, bũmb n be tẽn-gãongã zug we-raoogã pʋgẽ n yaa faasga, n yaa bɩrb-bɩrba, n yaa pɛɛlga. 
Tι b lebg n wa, n wa tυk b yolgã, n le rιk mogrã sore, la b gomd woto: Haya! D zẽk naoore. Mas-masã tι d pa ta mogrẽ wã n lobg kõb-wẽn-kãngã la d paamd d menga.
B fãa sιd yiime, n dιk sor n dabd raagã. A Soaamb ma sιd tek n vegemdame, wala b sẽn da sedã, tι wĩirã tõsge, t'a zõond n kelem wala a sũurã sιd sãama ne a ma wã wĩir kaoogre.
Talla woto, hal tɩ wa gilg n ta m ba Laabo.
A sẽn ta wã, yɩɩ Mali tẽngã taoor soab a Asimi GOETA n seg-a a sɩlg yiri, tɩ b tũ taaba, n kẽng b sõasgã zĩigẽ.
Dẽ wã, sã ya rũmsa nemd wãbre, rũms niyns sẽn kʋʋd bõn-naandsa yĩngã, d miime tɩ wẽn-naand yaa zaalem, dũni pʋgẽ, la Wẽnnaam b ye tãa la Wẽnde. Ba bũmb sã n be yĩngri bɩ tẽng zugu tɩ b get-b wa wẽnde -la sɩda wʋsg beeme n boond tɩ wẽnd dãmba, n boond tɩ dũni soaalba — 
Yʋʋmd a yembr yɩbrg me, n ta, n laandẽ.
Neb nins sẽn tũ a Zakoob n kẽng Ezɩpt tẽngã fãa sõor yaa neb pis-yoob la a yoobe. La rat n yeelame tɩ yaa a Zakoob kom-dogdsã ne b kambã, a Zakoob kambã pagb sẽn ka naage. 
Ad fut nins bãmb sẽn na n maanã: yaa yãoog lutga, ne maan-kʋʋr kãsem fuugu, la fu-yor-bil ne fuug sẽn kãde, la zu-vindga, ne sẽbdga. Bɩ bãmb maan fut sẽn welg toor n kõ f kẽemã ne a kom-dibli wã tɩ b maand maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmd mam taoore. 
Ki n boond noaaga
Sʋyã na n wa pida tẽngã, tɩ ned ka leb n tõe n yãnd tẽn-gãongã ye. Bãmb na n dɩɩ bũmb nins fãa sapɩlmã sẽn ka sãama, yaa yãmb bũmb nins fãa sapɩlmã sẽn basã, la b na n dɩɩ tɩɩsã sẽn yit yãmb pʋtẽ wã fãa. 
A togsame t’a sã n paam tɛɛndba, a ket n tõe n kẽnga taoor ne yɩɩl a taaba.
Ka yambẽ pag yaa wẽemba
Ad-y yaa rẽn yĩng la bãad-dãmb ne koms rãmb ya wʋsg y sʋka, tɩ wʋsg meng tol n maand yõore. La tõnd sã n deng n tɩg d pʋga, d paalgr bʋʋd kõn kao ye. 
A Zʋʋda ne a ba-biisã lebg n taa a Zozɛf yirã, la rẽ t'a Zozɛf ket n bee yiri. La bãmb wõgemda a Zozɛf taoor n fõgen b nens tẽnga. La a Zozɛf soka bãmb yaa: «Yaa bõe tʋʋmd la yãmb sẽn maanã? Yãmb ka mi tɩ ned sẽn yaa wa maamã bʋgda bagr n bãngd bũmb ning sẽn be la?» 
Bãmb sã n na n kẽ sɛk roogẽ wã, bɩ b nudg b nusi, la b waas b naoã ne ko-kãnga, n da wa ki ye. La bãmb sã n na n kolg tẽn-kugrã me n maan b tʋʋmde, n yõog maoong bugum Sẽn-Ka-Saab waoogr yĩnga, 
Rĩm-poak a yembr sẽn yit Seba wʋmame tɩ b gomd rĩm a Salmo yʋʋrã sẽn yi wã yelle. Dẽ, a wa n na n maka a Salmo ne yel-bũna. Seba tẽng rĩm-poakã kẽnga Zeruzalɛm ne a poorẽ dãmb wʋsgo. B waa ne yʋgma sẽn zɩt  parfẽ-rãmb  sẽn tar yũ-noogo, ne sãnem wʋsgo, la kug-sõama. La a sẽn ta rĩm a Salmo nengẽ, a soka a Salmo sokds nins fãa sẽn dag n be a sũurẽ. 
Bi-kaseng segdame, n tall bi-kaseng yam.
Yaa rẽ t’a Asɩl Tãpsoab gʋls sebr n kõ neb nins sẽn sigl seg taabã, n wilg t’a Edi Kõmbeoog pa segd n wa zĩnd tigsgã SEDEPE pagtɩ wã yʋʋr yĩng ye.
 Ra yaa ned me, sẽn da get a roagdbã yell sõma.
Moasã, leb-y y tʋʋmdẽ wã. B ka na n leb n kõ yãmb moodo, la y na n wẽe tãn-koɛɛmã t'a sõorã ta wa yãmb sẽn mi n maand raasenkamã.» Israyɛll nebã seb-gʋndbã yãame tɩ b sẽn yeel bãmb tɩ b ra sak n boog daar fãa tãn-koɛɛmã sõorã, yaa yel-pakr pʋg la b kẽes bãmba. 
Wẽnnaam menesa bõn-vɩɩs nins fãa sẽn dag n be dũniyã zugã, yaa ninsaalbã, rũmsã, bõn-bãoonegã ne bõn-yɩgdɩ wã. B menesa bãmb fãa dũniyã zugu. Yaa a Nowe ne sẽn dag n be-b koglgã pʋgã bal n põse. Koomã kell n yɩɩ wʋsg dũniyã zug n kaoos rasem koabg la pis-nu. 
da kιs m baaba wã segd n tara nag-bi? A sẽn yeel woto wã, naabã bãnga masã tι biigã gom n lub-a lame.
Wãam zʋʋr n loet-a.
Naab a Hiram tʋma a meng tʋmtʋmdb sẽn mi koom koglg rugsg sõama, tɩ b tɩ sõng rĩm a Salmo koom kogl-rugsdbã. Bãmb kẽnga Ofɩɩr tẽng n tɩ rɩk sãnem kɩlo tus piig la a naas la kobs-yopoe n tɩ kõ rĩm a Salmo. 
Woto, wa mam sẽn zoe n yeel Faarõ tɩ loogã, yaa Wẽnnaam n wilgd Faarõ bãmb a Wẽnnaam sẽn dat n maan bũmb ninga. Ade, yʋʋm a yopoe n wate, n na n yɩ tɩgr yʋʋm Ezɩpt soolmã zãng pʋga. 
M tʋllẽ lame tɩ y fãa yɩẽ wa maam; la m miime tɩ ned kam fãa paamda Wẽnd nengẽ kũun sẽn tog ne-a: yãoo soab wã, yãoo soab woto. La b sã n ka tõe b mense, bɩ b kẽ kãadem tɩ rẽ n são bugum sẽn dɩt-b. 
Tɩ rao wã leoke : «N-yẽ! ” Tɩ gãeengã yeel-a : «Fo sã n tɩ loog toɛɛgã, n ta taoor bilfu, bɩ f wẽneg n kẽ f yẽdgẽ wã, tɩ Dõosẽ sor la be ».
Rẽ wã, bɩ gũus-y, tɩ nina manesem, yaa tudgr manesem, sẽn na bao yell n dogl yãmba.
Yaa lagem-n-taar sula, Pagtɩ politik rãmba, la sula buud toor-toor no-rɛɛsdb la b yãk yã, tɩ b na n naag n zĩnd n bale, la b pʋɩ taab yam dãmba, tẽngã na kẽng taoor yĩnga.
Yubl n be tɩ zug beẽ
La yʋʋm a yopoe sẽn yaa kom-kãseng yʋʋm n na n pʋgl n wa. La nebã fãa na n yĩma tɩgrã sẽn dag n zĩnd Ezɩpt soolmẽ wã yelle. Komã na n sooga Ezɩpt soolmã zãnga. Kom ning sẽn watã toolem yĩng na n kɩtame tɩ tẽngã ka leb n mi tɩ tɩgr n dag n zind ye. 
A Zakoob leoka a Labã yaa: «Yãmb mengã mii mam sẽn tʋm yãmb yĩng to-to, la rũmsã me sẽn lebg to-to mam zug maasem yĩnga. 
Yaa rẽ t’a Asɩl Tãpsoab gʋls sebr n kõ neb nins sẽn sigl seg taabã, n wilg t’a Edi Kõmbeoog pa segd n wa zĩnd tigsgã SEDEPE pagtɩ wã yʋʋr yĩng ye.
Yẽnda rag n yaa a Perɛts kom-dibli wã sʋk ned a yembre, la yẽnda n dag n yaa pipi kiuugã tãb-biisã nanambs fãa naaba. Kiuug a tãabẽ soabã pʋgẽ, yaa a Zehozada biig a Benaya sẽn yaa maan-kʋʋr kãsmã n dag n get sull a tãabẽ soabã yelle. Yẽnda sullã neb sõor yaa raop tus pisi la a naase. 
Ka zɛt nif toga ne zõanga ka tog ne nin soab ye
A Zakoob kẽnga Ezɩpte. A Israyɛll talla a sẽn so bũmb ninsã fãa n looge. La bãmb sẽn ta Bɛɛr-Seba, a Israyɛll maana maoong beenẽ n kõ a ba a Izak Wẽnnaamã. 
Wẽnnaam ning-b-la bark n yeel-ba: «Rog-y kamb n fɩɩg n pid dũniyã, la y soog-a. Soog-y zĩmã sẽn be ko-kãsengẽ wã, ne bõn-yɩgdɩ wã sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã, la y soog rũmsã sẽn vuud tẽn-gãongã zugã.» 
A zagl wõba a naafã nemd yʋʋm a tãabo, yaa a sẽn kʋ a naafã n yãk n pʋɩ
Mam na n tʋma mam malɛɛk t'a reng foom taoore. La mam na n diga Kana-rãmbã ne Amoor-dãmbã la Hɛt-dãmbã ne Perɛɛz-rãmbã la Hevi-rãmbã ne Zebuuz-rãmbã. Kẽng-y tẽng ning sẽn tar bĩisim ne sɩɩd wʋsgã. La mam ka na n yãag yãmb ye, mam sã n yãag yãmba, mam na n wa sãama yãmb sorã zugu. Bala, yãmb yaa neb sũy sẽn yaa kegemse.» 
 La, we-rũng fãa sẽn loogd n pʋʋs m ba Soaamba, a yet-a lame : «Mam me, wa n maanda bilf-bilf ka, n gũud saaga.» 
B sẽn yãk a soab fãa segd n tʋma nin-buiidã fãa yĩnga.
Bɩ ned da belg a meng ye! Ned sã n be yãmb sʋka n tẽed t'a yaa sɩlem soaba wa zamaana sẽn dat sɩlem ninga, bɩ a lebg gãeenga t'a na paam sɩlem. 
A Zeroboaam rɩka nag-bil a yembr n tɩ ning Betɛlle, la a rɩk a yembrã n tɩ ning Dan. A Zeroboaam kɩtame tɩ b me rot maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ wã, la a basa Leevi buudã sẽn yaa maan-kʋʋdbã, n yãk nin-zaals n kɩt tɩ b lebg maan-kʋʋdba. 
A "nin-zabd" ne a "pʋg n pid" pa tũud taab ye
la pe-raad gãnd sẽn moneme, ne dofẽ-rãmb gãndo, la akasiya raado, ne kaam fɩtl-dãmbã yĩnga, la  parfẽ-rãmb  sẽn tar yũ-noog nug-tikr kaamã ne wisdã yĩnga, 
Bala zabr ning zug b sẽn be rũnda wã, pa zabr sẽn yɩɩd b pãng ye.
Kur n bao la nang tão-a.
Rʋg paall pa tar sag-kõt ye
Yaa sẽn tũ ne nin-buiidã sõadg sẽn zĩnd yʋʋm 2020 soabã, la b wilg nin-buiidã sẽn gomd b buudã goamã la a wʋmdbã sõor sẽn ta toto: Neb koabg pʋgẽ yaa neb 53 n wʋmd moore, la b gomd-a.
Sig-noy kiuug rasem 11 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, ƐMPESƐƐR pipi gosneerã yiisã mooneg koɛɛg n wilg tɩ sig-noy kiuug rasem 12 yʋʋm 2022 soabã tɛka, karenzi wã ligd paasa wakɩr 20.
Sõs-y ne taaba sull bõoneg pʋsẽ. Gʋls-y leokdsa sebr zugu. Wa-y naag-y  taab sull begr pʋgẽ n pʋɩ sull fãa sẽn paame tɩ b gese. Bũmb niis sẽn  pʋgda sãn paoog bɩ y paase.
La rĩm a Salmo sẽn wa n be Gabawõ wã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab vẽnega b meng ne-a yʋng zãmsd pʋgẽ. Wẽnnaam yeela rĩm a Salmo yaa: «Kos maam fo sẽn dat bũmb ninga, la m na n kõ-f lame.» La rĩm a Salmo leokame yaa: «Yãmb maana m ba a Davɩɩd sẽn yaa y tʋmtʋmdã neer wʋsgo, bala bãmb dag n tũuda yãmb ne sɩda la tɩrlem, la ne pʋ-peelem. Yãmb maana bãmb neer wʋsg n kɩt tɩ b biig led bãmb zĩigẽ, n zaoond b geerã n dɩt naam dũndã. 
Soaamb yaool n yeela wobg t’a sã n ti loe a naafã n sa, a-na n wẽe bendr naoor a tã, t’a yaool n sιng takre. A sẽn yι kudi, a tι yãa yemde, n togs yẽ me boto, tι yẽ naaf n be weoogã pυga, t’a wat n na n kos-a t’a tak-a n  kõ-a.
Bala mam mii hakɩɩka, tɩ kãabd nins fãa Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn kɩt t'a kãab Betɛll tẽn-kugrã, ne a sẽn gom maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ pʋʋsg rotã fãa sẽn be Samaari tẽmsẽ wã wɛɛngẽ wã na n paama pidsgu.» Bõn-kãensã fãa zugẽ, a Zeroboaam kell n ka wẽnemd n bas wẽngã maaneg ye. Yẽnda leb n yãka nin-zaals Israyɛll nebã sʋka, n kɩt tɩ b lebg maan-kʋʋdb maoong kʋʋb zĩisẽ wã. Ned ning fãa sẽn dag n dat-a n yɩ maan-kʋʋda, yẽnda yãkd-a lame n kɩt t'a lebg maan-kʋʋda. 
A Sɩkɛm ba a Hamoor yiime n na n tɩ gom ne a Zakoobe. A Zakoob kom-dibli wã sẽn yi weoogẽ wã n wa, b wʋma yellã. Dẽ, bãmb sũyã sãama hal wʋsgo, la b sũyã yikame, a Sɩkɛm sẽn maan tʋʋm-beed ning a Israyɛll buudã pʋgẽ wã yĩnga. Yaa yẽnda sẽn gãand a Zakoob bi-pugl a Dina wã, yaool n dag n yaa bũmb sẽn yaa kisgu. 
Zõang pa wẽend t'a tat pa wẽen ye
Rĩm a Faarõ ne a tʋmtʋmdbã fãa sũur yɩɩ noog ne gom-kãngã. Faarõ yeela a Zozɛf yaa: «Ade, Wẽnnaam sẽn tõog n kɩt tɩ fo bãng bõn-kãensã wã, tõnd ka leb n tõe n yãnd ned a to sẽn tar bãngre, la a tar yam wa foom ye. 
t'a Adaya yaa a Etan biiga, t'a Etan yaa a Zima biiga, t'a Zima yaa a Simeyi biiga, A Meraari kom-dibli wã sẽn yaa bãmb ba-biisã rag n yasa bãmb nug-goabga. Bãmb taoor soab rag n yaa a Etan. A Etan yaa a Kiisi biiga, t'a Kisi yaa a Abdi biiga, t'a Abdi yaa a Maluk biiga, 
Osti sõng paam pẽgre.
A Sarayi yeela a Abram yaa: «Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn ka kõ maam dogmã yĩnga, m kot-y lame tɩ y kẽ ne mam yem-poakã, tɩ daar ninga a na rog bi-ribl n kõ-ma.» Dẽ, a Abram kelga a Sarayi goamã. A Abram sẽn zĩnd Kana soolem tɩ yʋʋm piiglẽ, yẽnda pag a Sarayi rɩka a yem-poak a Agaar sẽn yaa Ezɩpt buudã nedã n kõ a sɩd a Abram t'a maan a paga. 
Asɩɩsnasnallã paka a kʋɩlense.
Yãmb sãn kẽ kãadem, bɩ y naag taab n tɩ mak lɔgtor yir n gese.  Da n saag-y kõ y zĩidentaaga bãaga bil ye!
Dẽe, a ma mii n lɛngd-a lame n yetẽ:  “Eyy! Biiga, mam ket n yaa y ma koe!”
Tall-y y mens neer bu-zẽmba sʋka tɩ ba b sã n wɩt yãmb wa nin-wẽnse, bɩ b yãend y tʋʋm-sõma. Rẽ n na n sõng ba tɩ b wa pẽg Wẽnnaam b waoonga raare. 
Dẽ, a Nabot sẽn be tẽng ningã nebã, ne kãsem-dãmbã la kug-zĩidbã maana wa a Zezabɛll sẽn yeel-b tɩ b maanã. B maana wa a sẽn gʋls sɛbã pʋs n tʋm bãmbã. B tʋmame tɩ b tɩ togs a Zezabɛll tɩ b loba a Nabot kug t'a ki. 
Zood ne taab rata koglg wakat fãa.
Dẽe, a Yembi soka a meng yaa: “Eyy! Dẽ yĩnga dao ninga sẽn kõ maam bãnga ka rat n gãand maam sɩda?“
 T’a Soaamb yeel-a : «Kẽng-y tɩ no-raoog sã n kũmi, bɩ y lebg n wa».
Zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 20 yʋʋm 2022 soabã pʋgẽ, Burkĩna Faso kiba-kɩtbã maanda b soog-b-mens ra-kasenga.
La yaa be la mam na n segd Israyɛll nebã, la a na n welga toor mam yʋʋrã sẽn be beenẽ wã yĩnga. Mam na n paa Israyɛll nebã sʋka, la m na n yɩɩ bãmb Wẽnnaam. 
B kō paam kamb sēn deng kãadema ye.
Burkĩna Faso tẽnga taoor soab sega pagtɩ politik rãmba la nin-zaalsã sulla taoor dãmba.
Sẽn wilg-ba, ya a Daooda GƐLLO, a Ousmane BOUGOUMA, la a Benedit BAYILU.
A Nowe kambã yagense. A Nowe kom-dibli wã, a Sɛm ne a Kam la a Zafɛt yagens la woto. Sa-kẽengã loogr zugẽ, bãmb doga kom-dibli. 
Bĩisim sãn kaẽ, wakat kẽere yaa tɩlɛ tɩ baa paga sẽn tar bãaga bil  yẽsem a biigã. La a segd n yẽsem-a la kiuug a yoob bala, dẽ zugĩ bɩ a  kõ-a rɩ-tɔko.
Sã n yaẽ la maam la tʋʋmda zu-raoogo soaba m togẽ la ne rolbo; m sã n ka tar dolbã, dẽnd yaa zɩɩb la neda to zɩlg-ma. Bõe n na n yɩ m dolbo? M tɛka yaa m paam n moon Koe-noogã tɩ ka tũ ne rolb ye, n ka reeg Koe-nooga sẽn tõe n kõ-m bũmb ning ye. 
B wilgame tɩ b pa na n lebg n kẽ zagsẽ t’a DAMIB sã n ket n tagsdẽ t’a tõe n wõra nebã n pa naamẽ wã ye.
M gomda woto y sõngr yĩnga, ka bẽdg la m gãnegd-y ye, m datame tɩ y yama zẽk n tees sẽn ya neere la a tabend Soaala n ka pʋɩ zĩis a yiib ye. Fo maanda wa f sẽn date, kãadem goam sãn zoe n gomame tɩ foo ne bi-pugla nan ket n paoodẽ la f neeme marsã tɩ kãadma sã pa yi na yɩɩ toog ne foo, Fo tõe n kẽe kãadem la f ka maand yel-wẽnd ye. 
A Zozɛf kẽem-dãmbã waa a Zozɛf nengẽ b toore, n ta n wõgemd a Zozɛf taoor n yeel yaa: «Tõnd la woto, tõnd yaa yãmb tʋmtʋmdba.» A Zozɛf yeela a kẽem-dãmbã yaa: «Ra zoe-y rabeem ye! Mam bee Wẽnnaam zĩigẽ la? 
B ra yãka a Poll Ãari Sãandaoogo DAMIB n lʋɩɩs b taoore.
B sẽn le tar gẽesg n tar gẽesgo, soaamb le wa n yãa vak ne gela. T 'a yeele: - Ad m vak ne gεla. Tι katr le soke: Yaa gεl a wana? Gεl a yopoe. Ãa!... Rẽ yaa m biig a Bãngzoees n dυυge. Tι katr le wυk rẽnda.
Letena Kolonell Evraad SÕMDA, Zãndarem dãmbã taoor soab wilgame tɩ b na n kell n kẽnga taoore, ne b tʋʋmdã tɩ wʋm taab yɩ vẽenega, n tõog n kolg nin-buiidã ne b arzɛka.
Yẽnda n leb n kʋ Ezɩpt tẽng rao a yembr woglem sẽn ta kãntɩɩg a nu wã. Ezɩpt raoã rag n zãada kãnd sẽn yaa bedr wa koeer-bõanga. Yẽnda sega Ezɩpt raoã ne dasaare, la yẽnda reega raoã kãnde, n wẽneg n kʋ-a. Nanambs pis-tã wã sʋka, yẽnda n paam waoogr n yɩɩda. La yẽnda ka ta gãndaad a tãabã ye. Dẽ, a Davɩɩd kɩtame t'a lebg a gũudbã naaba. 
Ka geay lʋmba-lʋmba la zak soab ye.
Yaa rẽ n so tɩ b segd n sõd b fãa n togse, tɩ b tara b tʋʋmde.
B maana poeer n yãk tẽms piig la a yiib Rubɛn ne Gaad la Zabulõ buudã soolmẽ n kõ a Meraari kom-dibli wã wa sẽn zems b roto. B yãka tẽms Efrayiim buudã pʋgẽ, n kõ a Kehat rot kẽer yagense, b soolmẽ wã. 
Yɩɩ neb 250 n sak n kõ meng ne yamleoogo n tʋmd tʋʋmdã, ned ba a ye pa reeg ba wakɩr ye.
Silmiigã bee yolgã pυg n tar gõgneng la gãgnengo, la nebã a yiibã ra ka le kelgd-a ye. B taa mogrẽ wã n lob-a be faoo... la b lebg n zãensdẽ n kuiisẽ, n ta n togs naab t’a Yamyιιd yũug menma dũniya.
Da guglem-y wala bãmb neb kẽer sẽn maane tɩ Tẽn-kũuma na n loog ne b fãa gilla ye. Dẽ fãa maaname n na n nek d yam la rẽ fãa gʋlsa tõnd zãmsg yĩnga, tõnd sẽn pẽneg dũni wã sɛɛbã. 
Bɩ y ra wãb rũngã nemd tɩ ka bɩ n ta, wall y rʋg-a ne koom ye. Sẽ-y-yã a zugã ne a karsã la a pʋ-teedã. Bɩ y ra bas rũngã neong ba a yembr tɩ vẽeg beoog ye. Beoogã sã n vẽeg tɩ nemdã ketẽ, bɩ y rɩk-a n yõog bugum. 
M ba Katr wa n diga Yãk n na n yõk n wãbe. La a sẽn wa n paam-a n gãd n tar taeeb la a sẽn tɩ lʋɩ bok pʋg n pa tõe n yi ye. La a tar yãbre.
A Moyiis yeela Sẽn-Ka-Saab yaa: «Ade, yãmb n yeel maam tɩ m yik n tall nin-bãmbã n looge! La yãmb yaool n ka wilg maam yãmb sẽn na n tʋm a soab t'a yãag maam ye. Baoosgo, yãmb yeelame: ‹Mam mii foom ne f yʋʋre, la fo tara bark mam nifẽ me.› 
Ad-y yaa rẽnd yĩnga la kɩɩm-kulga meng paam tɩ b moon Koe-noogã, woto ninsaalb sẽn paalg b rãmb bʋʋd tẽng zugã tõog n paama yĩngr vɩɩma Wẽnd nengẽ. 
La tʋmtʋmdã leokame tɩ yaa yẽnda soaalã. Dẽ, a Rebeka rɩka a peendã n pil a menga. La a Abrahaam tʋmtʋmdã togsa a Izak yẽnda sẽn maan bũmb ningã fãa. 
T'a Yamne leoke: Yaa m pũg n pa pid la m ket n pa gõe. Yiri, yυngo b kõta maam nanguri, tι mam wãb n yaool n gũsi.
Tɩ noosã tũ fenetrã, n yi, tɩ b kõbdã sʋʋg n pa.
Katr na ki t'a ka walem baag ye
F sã n tɩ ta tẽng n mik tɩ b pãbd gãngãad ne gɛto, bɩ f sao n kẽ gõosẽ
Tẽngẽ-n-ned n tõogd yʋng-tãoongo.
Dẽ, yʋʋm a tãab loogr zugẽ, a Simeyi yembs a yiib n zoe n kẽng a Maaka biig a Akiis sẽn yaa Gat rĩmã nengẽ. B togsa a Simeyi t'a yembsã bee Gat tẽnga. La b tɩ togsa rĩm a Salmo t'a Simeyi yii Zeruzalɛm n kẽng Gat tẽng n lebg n kuili. 
Ad a Israyɛll kamb nins sẽn tũ n kẽng Ezɩptã yʋy: Yaa a Zakoob ne a kom-dibli wã: Yaa a Zakoob pipi bi-ribl a Rubɛn. A Sɩmyõ kamb yaa a Yemuwɛlle, a Yamindi, a Ohaade, a Yakin ne a Sokaare, n paas Kana tẽng bi-puglã biig a Sayulli. 
Sẽn-Ka-Saab wʋma yũ-noogã, la bãmb yeela b sũurẽ: «Mam ka na n leb n kãab dũniyã kãab-wẽng ninsaal yĩng ye. Bala, hal ninsaal yãadem wakate, a tagsda wẽng maaneg bal a sũurẽ. La mam ka na n leb n sãam bõn-vɩɩsã wa mam sẽn zoe n maanã ye. 
Tɩɩr dĩm a Hiram dag n yaa a Davɩɩd zoa hal daar zãra, dẽ, a Hiram sẽn wʋm tɩ b pʋdga a Salmo zug kaam t'a lebg rĩm n deeg a ba zĩiga, yẽnda tʋma neb a Salmo nengẽ. «Yãmb bãngame tɩ m ba a Davɩɩd dag n dat n mee roog Sẽn-Ka-Saab sẽn yaa bãmb Wẽnnaamã yĩnga, la b ka tõog ye. Bala, bɛɛbã rag n yita zĩig fãa n wat n zabd ne bãmba, hal tɩ Sẽn-Ka-Saab wa kɩt tɩ b tõog b bɛɛbã. 
Nebã sẽn yã woto wã, b fãa tυka bυυre, n yetẽ: M ba Soaamb wa yã, a zomba katre, ad a sιd yaa raoa! Yaa rao tεkẽ!
Ned kõn sagl zõang t'a gũs ye
A Sɛt vɩɩmã zãng yɩɩ yʋʋm kobs-wɛ la piig la a yiibu, la a kiime. A Kenan rogmã zugẽ, a Enoos vɩɩmda yʋʋm kobs-nii la piig la a nu, la a roga kom-dibli la kom-pugli. 
B sẽn tar weoogã kakrã, n tar sõasgã la b baood raadã, b wa n menmame. B ra ka le mi b sẽn beẽ ye. B ra ka le mi yir sor me ye. B kẽna yaare, n wa tι yã roog sẽn yas weoogã sυka.
Bala, yãmb sẽn dag n tar rũms bilf ning sẽn deng mam waoongã fɩɩgame n lebg wʋsgo. La sẽn sɩng ne daar ning mam sẽn kẽ yãmb zakẽ wã, Sẽn-Ka-Saab ninga yãmb barka. Woto wã, yaa wakat a wãn la mam na n tʋm m zakã rãmb me yĩnga?» 
B sɩɩgã n tol n taas Koe-noogã neb niyns sẽn da pag roogo. Bãmb dãmb n zãgs tẽeb pĩnda, Wẽnd sũ-maasma wakato, a Nowe sẽn waa n kaad a koglga wakato, tɩ yaa koglg kãng pʋga la neb sẽn paoode, neb a nii bala, paam n dʋʋg kooma n põse. 
Ade, wakat ning fãa y sẽn dɩt bur kãngã la y yũud la-kãnga, yaa Krista kũum la y moonda la na n yɩɩ woto n tãag b waoongo. 
Ned ka rʋʋd n wẽbs n sig n lob ye.
A Abram kẽe ne a Agaare, la a rɩka pʋga. La a Agaar sẽn mik tɩ yẽnda tara pʋgã, yẽnda ka leb n nand a zu-soben-poakã ye. 
A Zakoob kambã, tigm-y taab n kelg-y-yã!  Kelg-y yãmb ba a Israyɛlle! Rubɛn, fo yaa mam bi-kãsenga,  n yaa mam pãnga, la mam bi-bɩɩlem wakatẽ bi-rẽenga. Fo tara ziir n yɩɩda, la f tar pãng n yɩɩda. 
Yɩɩ seg-taab ning sẽn zĩnd Ãkara Gãna na-tẽngã Sapaolg kiuug rasem 22 yʋʋm 2022 soabã, n tigim nin-sabls tẽns wĩndg sẽn lʋɩtẽ tẽnsã taoor dãmb la b gosneem taoor dãmbã, la b yãk yam n na n zĩnig sodaas sulli, tɩ b sõng n zab ne nin-wẽnsã.
Hal, tɩ sakã neb fãa, wa gomd a yelle.
Ned a ye da tar a koom kogleg n togd n tall Bʋʋga, Ki ne Baag n pɩʋʋg bãka.
Kibayã kẽer wilgame tɩ yaa pa wʋm taab n be neb nins sẽn wẽed n yitã ne MPP wã Pagtɩ taoor soab a Bala Sakãnd sʋka, rẽ n kɩt tɩ tãp-biisã yita.
 La, m ba Soaamb kõo noore, tɩ b naag taab n wẽ pʋʋrã.
To saoog n dɩkda, to zʋg ka rɩkd ye.
Maasem sã n ka tat walga, walg n bʋʋgd maasem.
A wilgame tɩ rog-n-mikã la dĩinã taoor dãmb sɩd kẽesa b toog n sõng tɩ yellã paam tɩɩm.
«Maan sɛk zĩigã zaka. Maan zakã kɩreng ning sẽn teesd nug-goabgã ne lamd gĩs-bãanega. A kɩreng a yembrã woglem tog n yɩɩ kãntɩɩg koabga. 
Wãoor sã n paam a yẽgr mẽeb bɩ a pʋʋs nus dãamb a zaamẽ
Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel-a : «Kuil la f wa beoogo, tɩ d kẽng n tɩ bao».
